1b1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tA tsit+ta gra h+Na dz+nyA na Ar+tha gar+b+ha kro d+ha badz+ra ku la tan+na ban+d+ha r+m+ma bid+d+ha yog sid+d+ha nA mA ma hA yAn sUt+ma/ bong+ga skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
1b2(rnying rgyud): sa ga m+b+hi
1b3(rnying rgyud): dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du
1b4(rnying rgyud): bzang po rdo rje srang he ru ka gsang ba mchog ge bdag po byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang phyug/ mi zad mdzod kyi bkod pa/ che ba'i don la dam pa'i spyod pas bskyod pa de/ rmad du byung /
1b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i don 'di nyid bshad pa'i gnas gsang ba'i yang gyisang bya kun ga'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho drung theg le bdal ba'i spyod/ ye 'byang rmad du grags pa'i gzhal yas rgya phyogs
2a1(rnying rgyud): su yongs su ma chad pa/ chos nyid kyi nam mkha' las rgyo 'phrul gyi sprin kun du 'gribs pa byang chub kyi char mngon par 'bab pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba 'angs par gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mu gu mngon par bskyed pa/
2a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rtse mo kun du rgya mnyam pa/ rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par brgyan pa/ mu tig gi lcang lo dang / chun 'phyang dang / lnga ldis mdzes pa/ nyi ma chen pos gsal btab pa/ zla ba chen pos phra bkod pa/ skar
2a3(rnying rgyud): ma dang shin tu skar ma dag gis gzer sbas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i 'od snang bas kun du mdangs phyung ba'i mkha' la/ rlung nag gi phung po rgya yongs su ma chad par mnyam pa/ khrag gi phung po dpa' klong du 'khrug pa/ rgya phyogs su yongs su ma
2a4(rnying rgyud): chad pa/ ma tang gi gnas dang / bis ma 'bur 'phang bar chags pa/ rus ma phung po rgya kun du mnyam pa'i gzhi la 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang 'od zer kun du 'phro ba/ ga bu cung brtsegs pa'i rtsig pa la/ gnam lugs kyi gzer ta le bang
2a5(rnying rgyud): btab pa/ rtsibs kun du nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang ma rangs par 'gro ba/ nya chen po kaM gadzung l-i nya phran dra la dz+ra ba gtams pa/ zla ba'i ka rten dang / nyi ma'i ka mo dang / sbal d+han gyi karma nu la sogs pa/ hUM gau thog dang / me'i char
2a6(rnying rgyud): mngon par 'bab pa/ chos nyid kyi phra ros rnam par brgyan pa/ ye shes kyi lnga lngas mngon par bres pa/ rdo rje'i rgyan dang 'phan gyis bklubs pa/ sbrul nag gi zar rdzogs dang / sprin nag gi grib so lta bus gzhol ba'i thar par thams cad
2b1(rnying rgyud): na rin po che dang / mu tig dang / me tog gis mdzes pa/ 'khor ba'i maN+Da la yo bkramal ba ma ril che chung dang / khog skam stod smad dang / yan lag ring 'ung dang / dbang po'i phreng ba dang / rdo rjes kun du spras pa/ sgo dbus kun du gsal bar gyur pa'i gnas
2b2(rnying rgyud): nardo rje rgyal tshab ces bya ba'i zhe sdang rdo rje dang / rdo rje go phur zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal rin chen dang / rdo rje ging zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags pad+mo dang / rdo rje karma zhes bya ba'i phrag dog sna tshogs dang / rdo rje bya rog ces bya ba'i drod kyi rtags 'dzin dang / rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya
2b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i mthun 'jug gi bka' sdod dang / rdo rje spun thams cad dang / rdo rje ming thams cad dang / rdo rje rig 'dzin thams cad dang / rdo rje lus thams cad dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor thams cad dang / rdo rje dag thams cad dang / rdo rje las thams cad dang / rdo rjeyid
2b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang / rdo rje ma thams cad dang / rdo rje ging thams cad dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro ba thams cad dang / rdo rje phra men ma thams cad dang / rdo rje kun tu 'bar ma thams cad dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin thams cad dang /
2b5(rnying rgyud): rdorje srin mo thams cad dang / rdo rje skas dang / rtse mo dang / bran mo la sogs pa bud med thams cad dang / rdo rje mngag pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje khro bo thams cad 'dra bar gyur pa/ rdo rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dgying bag gi tshul gyis bsnyengs pa
2b6(rnying rgyud): mi mnga' bar rdo rje gdan la 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/ cho 'phrul chen po nam mkha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / cho 'phrul chen po rnam grol smin pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / cho 'phrul chen po rnam gro la spogs pa
2b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / cho 'phrul chen po thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / nam mkha'i bu mo da'ang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / nam mkha'i bu mo dga' sdud ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / nam mkha'i bu mo rnam par
3a1(rnying rgyud): na thab das 'byor mastan da sa pa ngas sus sa pab yod pa ma brgyan / nadu bsung can pa'i 'khong sa da rgyan can pa'i sa
3a2(rnying rgyud): dus sas / na pa'i sa pa
3a3(rnying rgyud): rjeg can me rje dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i na pa 'byor mtshan po dang / dam tshig ce po dor ba'i dbang phyug mazhes kyi 'dzin pa 'byod pa tsha gyi dang / ngam chog na po hUM bang zhugasa'i ba'in la 'byor mtshan mo dang / ngas kyi rje
3a4(rnying rgyud): pa phyag la yis sa nyin la 'gong ma che ma ma te/ du pa del mthong de/ smrab med nga du' / gas bcon pathams par byung bzhusas pa'i sa sa ma dang / sa
3a5(rnying rgyud): 'a sangs rgyas dang / nga brjen pa dag sa mang poni kyimapa na mo'i kyi stong po nas tha bsas cas dang / ba ba bapa su sa ma byangs da dag
3a6(rnying rgyud): brdzun gyi joms byed dbang phrag pa zhes bya ba'i rdul 'byong mtshan pa dang / grasang ba rtson mo'i bye pa'i sogs ra na po dang / gas ba chen po tha'i pa dbang phyug pa zhes bye ba'i rdul grang chen mo nga
3a7(rnying rgyud): ba 'khor dag/ gzhid yang ral pa can pa'i 'khar 'dzi du/ la mini pa'i mas ces bya'i kyi phyinimi byed po ngas bya 'dzid
3b1(rnying rgyud): rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas bi shA he rA ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma yak+Sha shau ri ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma rak+Sha sha ra ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen mo'i rdul 'byor ma thig sha sho ri ka zhes bya
3b2(rnying rgyud): rol pa chen po rnal 'byor ma bi shwe shi gzhis lngab dang / shin tu rol pa chen po'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen pa'i 'khor 'di lta 'aM/ 'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas te sha he ru ka zhe sa bya ba dang / 'jigs byed
3b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ke sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i sadus rgyas pa sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas pi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'gyor ma te sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs
3b4(rnying rgyud): bed chen mo'i rnal 'gror ma ke shA sho ra ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'askor ma pe shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor sa bai shwa go ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor dang /
3b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang 'joms byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ 'jom pa byed chen po'i sangs rgyas rba ke sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen po sangs rgyas d+hi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas ka shwa h+ne ru ka zhes bya ba dang /
3b6(rnying rgyud): mus byed chen mo'i sangs rgyas pag sha he dz+ye k+Sha zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen mo'i rdul 'byo ma trag na ri kra zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen mo rnal 'byor mA d+h+ye shwA sho ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen ma'i rnal 'byong ma
3b7(rnying rgyud): sho ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed byed pa rdul 'byor pa bag sha sho ra ka la sogs te// shin tu 'joms byed chen po'i 'khong dang / gzhan yad babyed chen po'i 'khor 'dzi ste/ babyed chen po'i sangs rgyas ru ti he ru kaM zhes bya ba da /
4a1(rnying rgyud): za byed chen po'i sangs kyis rabA tI he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / tha byad chen po'i sangs rgyas kha hi he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen po'i sang+yas smras sa hA hU drAk+kazhes za ba dang / bzed rnon mo rnal 'gyong sa rba ka sho ra ka zhes
4a2(rnying rgyud): dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma tag ti sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma kha nyi sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma sa ha sho ra ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor rab tu mang zhing bsam gyis
4a3(rnying rgyud): khyab pa'i he ru ka mtha' yas be sha stag rnams dang / gzhan yang gsang ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ gsang ba'i bu mo kar mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i phra mo rkun mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu ma myongs mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang pa
4a4(rnying rgyud): mo ro langs ma zhes pa pa dang / gsang ba'i sa mo zlos mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo spre sha can zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo mchogs ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i bu mo'i 'a
4a5(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang dga' ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ dga' ba'i bu mo seng gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo bya rgod gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo stag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo la
4a6(rnying rgyud): gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo che gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo dur bya gdong ma zhes zla ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i phra mo mun gdong ma zhis b+hA ba la sogs pa shin tu dbu' ba
4a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang shin tu gus pa'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ shin tu gus pa'i bu mo rta gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gus pa'i bu mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gus pa'i bu mo spre'u gdong ma zhes bya ba
4b1(rnying rgyud): shin tu thum pa'i rnam tha la kyad la la sags pa shin mas byang tham mamar dang / gzhan yang can yo byag kya khong pa sa/ tugam gyu ngag cug sum zen nga dag/ gsu dang
4b2(rnying rgyud): 'ad su gsag gi sa sa nga thub dang / ga nagasang partson por la sha pa nga sgyid sa zla ba dang / na cig sa pa rnyed pa dpa lagasag mtha 'i sa bya ba dang / rnyen cigasod pa chen padab te man zhes thub pa/ sa
4b3(rnying rgyud): bachen po dpal sbyang ki'i 'phrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gsod bya chen po dpal sa steng mthun zhes bye ba dang / shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal rom gyi mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gsod pa chen po dang la phag gi mgrin zhes bya bdud/
4b4(rnying rgyud): la dzi pang du 'a pas gas pa sa
4b5(rnying rgyud): gtum po zhes bya ba dang / shin n+ya gsong ma chen po rdorje mda' sems ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gsod ma chen po rdo rje su 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gsong ma chen po rdo rjer byed ma zhes bye ba dang / shin tu gsang ma khyen mo rdo rje 'drin ma zhes bu 'i
4b6(rnying rgyud): dang / shi na gsong ma ched mardorje sbyor ma zhes tha ba dang/ shin tugs ma chen ma 'khor rab cu mang po rnams dang / de dag la sogs te rdul phrar ba nyid dang nabs cig go// lung dro ga na dru ba pos gas pang nyid ci sa na pa par bzhes /
4b7(rnying rgyud): mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sgra mnyam pa nyid mo mims pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par grags sa// gsung
5a1(rnying rgyud): na ga / chu na nan nam nga gas te/ ga / / nan ma sa/
5a2(rnying rgyud): das gas na chog gi bdag pa sa ngas pa rnal panyid nga stong nyid pa 'a ba rtenas par brtul// / bad med pa rkyen rnan pa nga s+ho// rnam pa 'dzin las
5a3(rnying rgyud): te bar ga shegs// ye shes rgyam rnam byar grol bu thong // mi gnas mi de migs ni ma ma nga gyis nas bzhengs/ zhes bskul nas/ tsam ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pa des rgyas thams cad byang chub sems la shA
5a4(rnying rgyud): mkhyen nus stong pa nyid kyi dngu las rdo rje'i sri mngon du phung ste/ dper na nam mkha' dang bya las zla ba dri ma chad par shar ba lta bu'o// de nas yums ba sho ra kA la gzigs te/ 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad ngo // dper na nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer bste
5a5(rnying rgyud): pa lta bu'o// de nas 'od kyi zer de dag las byang chub kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te/ rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol ba sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang rol pa sna tshogs kyi klu /
5a6(rnying rgyud): la pa ni tshogs kyi gang dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyang da / dung dang keng kong dang gling thu dang rol pa tshogs kyi can dang / rol pa sna rdzogs kyi sdig pa dang steg pa dang / 'khyung pa dang skyeng ba dang / sbyor ba dang bsgris pa dang mnyes pa dang/
5a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis gsapa pa dang myang ba dang / 'cha' ba dang bde ba dang / rdo dang / 'jo ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzod de// de nas lam kun du bzang mongs spyan thim pag gis rnam papa
5b1(rnying rgyud): bya'i tshul du 'byos ldan las gas su mchog gi bdag po la rnam par bstas te/ rnal 'byung por ba'i thag lus kun dus la brlabs nas rol bsnyen po'i grwa 'dis gsol ba bdu na// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings yis// spongs spyod/
5b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i wa// rdo rjes rnas dpa' skal bzed dpa la khyod 'dag/ thabs kyi rol bas pade chen de byings nas bzhengs// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pa des glu des bskul bar grags su chung nas/ 'di btsun pa
5b3(rnying rgyud): dang de las cho 'phrul chen por rnam par bzhes te/ rnam par 'gying ba dang / rnam par brjid pa dang / gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang / rnam par bshad pa sna tshogs dang / zhabs kyi brkyang bskum dang / sku'i 'gyur bag dang / smin ris kyi 'bri ku ta bstar
5b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' thams cad kun du khyab par mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang thams cad la mtshan ma dang / rnam pa dang / yod pa dang / med pa thams cad la gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun la khyab par mdzad de/ de dag
5b5(rnying rgyud): gi ngang bzhin du rnam par gnas so// de nas rdo rje kun du 'bang mo de ngo mdzar du gyur te/ yang rdul 'byor pa'i phyag lus kun dus la brdabs te/ cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i grwa 'dis gsol ba btab bo// ye shrIs sums rnam par rol pa'i sgra// thabs
5b6(rnying rgyud): shes rang rjepa med dres pa'i// 'phags ni rdul pa mang po'i byung ba'i gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad bzhengs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo snga rol pa'i dri lon nyi sa bya ba
5b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa snyoms pa sru pa ga ba rdzogs so// dengs du mdzorje can du babang modang / ngang kyis gyon brgyan sems dpa' pa logs pa 'iso shing tu meng ba rnams ro macar du gyur te/ de dag pams sa mthon pa
6a1(rnying rgyud): kho na'i glu 'dis bskal te gsol ba btab bo// e ma'o// yid bzhin sku mchog nam mkha' lta bu las// khyab pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje gar mdzadu cing // gzhi 'arjid sbyin dpung rol pas bsgyings pa'i tra// thogs med rdo rol dra
6a2(rnying rgyud): rdo 'phrul ston// e ma'o// yid bzhin gsung mchog sla brnyan lta bu las// snyan pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing // yan lag rgya mtsho mi zad bkod pa'i gsung // seng+ge s+tha yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston// e ma'o// ye shes snying po
6a3(rnying rgyud): nyi su la bu las// ye shes byi na ba rlangs rdo rje bde mdzad cing // thig lnga spos bral rnam par me tog zugs// nam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston// mi shes blun mongs 'das bying 'gro ba rnams// sdug bsngal tu mchos bcings pa thabs kyis
6a4(rnying rgyud): ma rig mun pas ldongs pa don gyis phye// 'khor ba'i rgyal tsha rol pa'i gru yis sgrol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po// ye shes rngon gyi snying po mchog dang ldan// nal 'byor bag chen rdo rje kun 'dus rgyung// 'dus pa'i tsho gsal rgyar
6a5(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// a la la ho zhes nges par btung de rgas ma ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rjes rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te 'dzum pa
6a6(rnying rgyud): ladzan no// 'dzum pa mdzad pas thugs rnam par dag pa'i sgong nas rig pa'i nyi ma durjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa khyab par shar bar mdzad do// 'od zer de dag re re las do rje he drug rab tu mang du'i rdzo gsas
6a7(rnying rgyud): par mdzang ngo // de dag re re las kyang sangs nas 'dum phrag 'khor sa so'i zhabs 'bring bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do// de dag las rig pa rje tri la'i char mngon par phab las phyin pa 'gror thams cad gsal bar mdzad do// rig pa
6b1(rnying rgyud): dang / reg pa chos kyi char dang / rig pa'i chos kyi gru sna tshogs dang / gar sna sogs dang / rig pa'i chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'bras klas pa'i nam mkha' la sla sna tshogs phan tshun dang / yan man dang / snrel zhi la sogs pathams
6b2(rnying rgyud): cad du khyab par ling long phyed par byung ngo // mchod pa'i char yang mngon par phab/ rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ling long phyed rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o// rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang a la la he zhes
6b3(rnying rgyud): sgrogs/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag kyang gsung dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu/ e ma'o rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don blang ngo zhes sgrogs/ 'khor 'bum phrag dang gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar skyed/ rig pa'i rtsa la spangs don gyi
6b4(rnying rgyud): baphyung / dam zhing ngo mtshar par gyur te thams cad nye bar gnas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par spong ba'i rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje
6b5(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so// hUM hU~M hUM rdo rje 'du bar bsdus pa yi// dam tshig chen po'i rig 'dzin rnams// bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral 'khod de// rigs ma yin pa rigs min 'gyur// skal ba bzang po'i dam tshig 'di//
6b6(rnying rgyud): skal ba ngan la 'bab mi 'gyur// de las 'das na de drag byed// hU~M kro d+ha dwe la sa ma ya/ rak+Sha dz+wa la sa ma ya/ yak+Sha dr-i la sa ma ya/ tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya zhes gsungs pa tsam gyis zhal ljags kyi dbang po 'od me dpung chen po las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba
6b7(rnying rgyud): dang / srin po 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang / gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'jug pa dang / ba byed 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba brgyad mar byung bas ru tra can dang / bdud dang / srin mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'jug sred dang / sred med dang / dbang
7a1(rnying rgyud): thAg dang / stobs ldan dang / spre dang / ra dang / wa 'di dang / sbrang ma dang / b+ha rog dang / mkhyer dang / 'khor ba dang / rga dang / sa dang / nam mkha' dang / mye dang / skra dang / pus pAngan la sogs pa brlag /
7a2(rnying rgyud): gnas par gyur cing rgyad du thang ba nyid du mdzad do// de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang / 'khor mang po dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa/ e mra'o// am bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis zin gyis brdab tu gsol zhes gsol ba
7a3(rnying rgyud): btab pa lngas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des zhal gyi mdangs phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od gi zhing 'khyil ba dang / mdzes shing bde ba dang ldan pas thams cad rangs par byas pas snod du rung bar rnam par spangs nas 'od na
7a4(rnying rgyud): dag 'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng+ga rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa/ gsang ba'i nges pa/ rgyud kyi 'grel
7a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ rtags kyi rol pa/ rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po sku 'dis bshad do// a o o/ sa ma ya/ a d+hi/ guh+ya/ pra ti a ho ku la ma tod b+hid ta pa dra a mo g+ha I shwa sA ya na/ gu ti a la la ho zhes cang mi gsung ngo // kun du ma
7a6(rnying rgyud): gsung rab tu mi gsung / gsungs pa mi 'gog 'gog pa ma yin/ mu gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so// rnam par bzhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la zhil gzigs te/ 'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzad do// de nas
7a7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' des bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs nas/ rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas nas lce pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas/ lus sal brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su gyes nas/ sar+b+ba
7b1(rnying rgyud): tu na su ma na
7b2(rnying rgyud): chod pa gcom pa tu byalas/ na 'das gas par chog gi bden pa das rjelas kyi bka' ba byen gyis brgyad pa'i byer drung rnam par tho ba zhes zla pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' gyur to// bdagam zlas tu
7b3(rnying rgyud): gagasu / da pa bya par mig cig sems pa 'dadzang baglerla babs par thar das pa ma dbang ci par tha~Mng / rnam pa ma parten bya shi d+ha bung rmobs su du / na kyis bya pa pa bag
7b4(rnying rgyud): rab tu ga lda kyi po // de nas sems dpa' ro'i sems kyi mtshan ma de la gtus sa te/ skabs chag sa dang / gang dang / klus rdzogs rdo tshig tu yinacing dang ma zla las kyi 'khang ba lani rnam pa bciganyis su
7b5(rnying rgyud): grangs gnyis dang khri bamyung sa/ sa ba sa che 'dag rnam par gi 'os te/ grA ma sa/ rab tu gams/ kun du rab kyi gsos/ 'phrul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'phrul/ sdig/ rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu we// 'jugs/
7b6(rnying rgyud): dzin pa/ pani na bas/ drang dub rgya/ panadungs sa ba sa/ ba pa sa ste/ kaug thams zed ni 'a 'i kyis long dag myig tu thur/ byazad yul ba mdza ga
7b7(rnying rgyud): rnam par rjes pa gro'i gyib stod pa'i bdu logs ma pa'i gang pa 'byung thog ga tshul gyis rnas par gan mas// denas 'dus pa'i 'khang thogs dums kyis bcom ldan 'das pa man
8a1(rnying rgyud): e ma bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni 'di ltar mthu chu ba/ 'di ltar byin rlabs chab/ 'di ltar rgya che ba/ 'di ltar mkhas pa/ 'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las skyes pa lags so// zhes
8a2(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jus pa chen po'i tshogs sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems thams cad kyi phye mo// snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsan// byang chub sems dpa'
8a3(rnying rgyud): reg pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yab/ rnal 'gyor pa thams cad kyi mes chen po// mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad kyi ded dpon/ bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po// chos thams cad kyi mdzod/ ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur
8a4(rnying rgyud): pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog pa dang tha ma med pa mnyam pa'i dus/ pha mtha' las kyang phra mtha'/ dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa/ 'byam klas pa'i dus nas bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te/ chos
8a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor zhing gnas pas na/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te/ de 'dra'o zhes bka' stsal pa las 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni
8a6(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ngo mtshar lags so// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa lnga logs su btud de lus sa la brdebs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas te/ rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang / tshogs kyi mchod pa sna
8a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs byas te/ 'di ltar rmad kyang ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa// ci lter zhing 'dir snang zhig gre// rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras// ngo mtshar khyod byas spyod pas na// bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor //
8b1(rnying rgyud): slab pa'i lam mchog dam pa dag/ tshig gis mtshan de gsal bar mdzod// A la sa nye zhes gsol ba btang // de nas dam pa'o rjes rdo rje 'askor te bsgyur nas brjid lag tu rmig tu mtsho ni ste smras pa/ oM \u0f7f// Al pat+to/ rgyal ba'i sras pas/
8b2(rnying rgyud): cad mi gsung // mi gsung bas ni rgya cher bshad// bshad du med pa'i chos 'di ni// rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnam par brjod par mi bzhed de// rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa'o// skye ba med pa'i
8b3(rnying rgyud): chos rnams ni// ma skyes par yang snying por bzhed// snying po'i don du gang gyur pa// tshig tu smra ba legs ma yin// spros pa nyid na grol ba zhes// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bshad// de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid// bka' mu stsal bar dgongs pa'o//
8b4(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa// ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar// dgongs don rig la sdud gyur pa// ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na// tshig tu spro bar ma yin na'ang // mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa// tshig la zhib cing don la rtsing // tshig/
8b5(rnying rgyud): phyir blo 'brang rtsal zhan rnams// padri phyir bsam pa rangs bya ba// mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi// cho 'phrul tshig gis mtshon pa ni// babyed gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don// mnyam nyid byas chub theg chen po//
8b6(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bkod de res brjod kyis// rgya chen 'jus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// stong par sbas pa'i don 'di la// dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis// mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgor bye byas/
8b7(rnying rgyud): sbas pa'i don 'byin gsal byed pa// sA lu phub khrod snang me bzhin// bsal bteg swab rnyed sa ler 'dug/ zab mor spyod pa la mos pas// gang zhig don la 'dris pa yi// gsang sngags spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni// mthun pa'i dmigs bcu per
9a1(rnying rgyud): bzhag s+ho// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya// l+h+wam sgrog d+hA rtsol sa dang // gzugs pa rdad do na grong khrur dang // thags rgyu b+hUmag yong dang // mu ma sathus dang dag pa mad srung // zlabar dgas dasngags spyod pa dang /
9a2(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang ni gnas dag dang // bzlas pa'i sgra dang phyag char rtog/ ting 'dzin lba ba tsong bral brtag/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ni// rjes bu dag gi rtsol ba dang // spyan dang sngags kyi thong b.las// dbang po yid 'phrog cer blang yang // de la
9a3(rnying rgyud): rong ga la yod// de ltar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // yig 'bru rdzas kyi sbyor ba las// grub par snang yang rang bzhin med// ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni// zhing pa'i dus kyi zla ba la// drod dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba las// bres pa gdungs pa'i
9a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyis// chu yi 'du shes ci bskyed kyang // tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur// gsang sngags meng gi khyad par yang // rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la// mtshan ma'i tha sad ming du btags// de nyid spod pas ming mi dmigs//
9a5(rnying rgyud): dper na rmi lam rang bzhin ni// skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na// thang cig skad cig yud tsam dang // lo la sogs pa de bzhin du// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong // sangs nas ce yang mi dmigs ltar// de bzhin stegs kyi spyod pa dag/ stong
9a6(rnying rgyud): ma nyid kyi rang bzhin la// spyod pa'i rnam pa cir snang yang // brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral// gzugs brnyan sdang ba'i mtshan nyid na// dper na gdong dang me long las// brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs kyang yang // rad par gyur pa ga la yod// de bye'i
9a7(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi dngos grub kyang // sgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad las// brten nas dngos grub tshul byung yang // gsol theb dmigs pa ga la yod// dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni// mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' 'os la// dri za'i gzugs ni gar byung yang // grong
9b1(rnying rgyud): da// / dang ya gagang/ gang sa ga / sa / na na ga ga tus sa
9b2(rnying rgyud): su sa
9b3(rnying rgyud): sa du
10a1(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad// mtshan med dang du gcig pas na// rtog pa'i bag chags ci 'byung yang // chos kun dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir// rtog 'jug smos pa'i mtshan makun// ma byung ma gyes dbyings nyid la// g.yos pa med cing /
10a2(rnying rgyud): cho 'phral 'byung // yon tan tshogs ni 'byung bya'o// gter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan yang // gla cig gcig la de la 'angs// de bas yid bzhin rin cheni 'di// ldog pa med pas dang du zang // don
10a3(rnying rgyud): dam yang dag gter sti mchog/ rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste// gang rtogs de 'thob gcig pu nyid// 'brel med gzhan gyis thob par dka'// bdag med gnyis thal bde chen grong // sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che// lce nas lhan gras
10a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus ma byas// thig le chos nyid ye 'byam pas// kun khyab 'dal pas snying por 'dus// mi 'amigs smos bral byang chub sems// zab mor snang ba'i ngas don 'di// mkha' la mdud 'drar gting dpag dka'// rdul 'byor dmigs lnga
10a5(rnying rgyud): b+h+yorlung zhing // gang zhig ca la zhan de rtog pa// gsor ma'i rdul du bdug byanag pa// btags sang rtogs par myi 'gyur ro// dpe na nyi ma'i snying po la// mig gi dbang gos rab btags na// de brtags don de mi rtogs kyi// 'od kyi zer gyis
10a6(rnying rgyud): byi du Sh+Tagyur// de 'drar bris pa'i rang baman gyis// khyab ma dun la cir btags kyang // yang dag don mi mthong ba// blochen gyis pagaca bsngal// banag tu byed pa thos rnam sani// rtog pa rkyen sa gas
10a7(rnying rgyud): dadon mi rtogs phyir// g.yangs lhung ba ci cha yod// gdod nas mthos shin tung dge// bas pa dang thal bas de bzhin gzhag/ mi brtags bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang // byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan// bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te// bstan
10b1(rnying rgyud): du med cing go bar dka'// tshig gis brjod pa kun dang bral// 'di zhes bstan du ga la yod// med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi byed// mi dmigs chos la blo spangs shing // yid kyi me long gsal byas na// nam mkha' dag la rab brtags na// sdang //
10b2(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni// nam mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' gang ming rjod byed pa// brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste// dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang // nam mkha' de la 'ag
10b3(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur// de bzhin ma rtog rjod byed pa// brjod pa de nyid rnam rtog ste// rnam rtog rdo yi ming brjod kyang // mi tog de la 'gag mi 'gyur// de 'drang sems kyang de ltar blta// sems nyid gzhan du ma grub ste// de bzhin myos kyang grub pa yin// sems
10b4(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi chen po ltar// b+h+rUM med byang chub myu gu skyed// ma yi rang bzhin ltar snang bas// mongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed// rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na// mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel// chu yi rang bzhin yin pas na// nyon mongs gdung bgran sim
10b5(rnying rgyud): byed// sman gyi rang bzhin yin pas na// 'khor ba'i gcod rnying rnam par 'byin// de ltar rtsi yi rang bzhin pas// 'gro bya rnams kyi gsos su 'bab// de bzhin rno dpal rang bzhin pas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod// nyi ma lta bur sdang
10b6(rnying rgyud): sum dang byu sbyinas labar byud// de rang sa bu'i nga bzhid pas// brtan po mi 'gyur gso ba med// rgya maco bu'i ring bzhin du // migs thos byi s+ho// sems ni 'drin co 'phrul bas/ byar ma
11a1(rnying rgyud): 'das// gnyis su snang ba ma yin te// sems kyi rang bzhin bzang ngan las// gnyis kyi 'du shes phye ste bstan// sems las yang dgra ye shes 'gyur// de bzhin pade dang sdug bsngal 'byung // chos dang sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur// dge
11a2(rnying rgyud): 'dun yang ni de bzhin no// 'di las pha rol phyin tshogs dang // byang chub dang ni pad+mo 'byung // 'di las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dri med rin chen dpa' sprin 'byung // de bzhin rdo rje dpag med dang // sna tshogs rgyal ba 'di las 'byung // 'di las phyag
11a3(rnying rgyud): rgyu ste tshogs dang // rig pa'i snying po thams cad 'byung // 'di las 'dod chags ni sngar dang // lhag bsngal brgyal phrag dog 'byung // gti mug dag kyang de bzhin te// 'di las khams gsum thams cad dang // skyes pa bud med ma nir 'byung // 2
11a4(rnying rgyud): las 'dod dang 'dod gzir dang // nyon mongs gdung 'dod chags pa 'gyur// ri dang skye bo de bzhin du// nam mkha' dang ni rlung dag dang // sreg pa'i me ni rab tu 'byung // 'di las sa dang chu dang ni// rdo dang sa bon myu gu 'byung // de bzhin glog dang skar ma
11a5(rnying rgyud): dang // nyi ma zla bsri rnams 'thung // de bzhi spod dpa'i spyod kun// thams cad rnams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// dpe nanam mkha' rang byazhin las// seMn dang dngus thug rlungs dang // thA banyi sa skad tshogs dag/ sngang yang rnam mkha' bzhi
11a6(rnying rgyud): gnas// de bzhin sems kyi nam mkha' las// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci byung yang // chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin gnas par// rnal 'byor can gyis blta bar bya// de lta bu yi sems nyid ni// rtogs dang ma rtogs rang bzhin la// lta ba'i khyad par
11a7(rnying rgyud): so sor blta// rtog pa can gyi dog la// rtog pa 'khrul pa'i ngo bor sdang // kun du nyer 'jog la mtshor la// kun du rdul gyi phung por snang // tshogs spyod snying rje nyer 'jog la// thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// de nyid mnyam par shes gnas na/
11b1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i rang bzhin mthong bar gnas// ye shes rang snang nam mkha' la// nam mkha' nyid du snang bar zad// brjod bral mthong med dmigs dang bral// mthong ba med pa'i don 'di ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// bde gshegs
11b2(rnying rgyud): snying po byang chub la// dgongs pa 'di las gang mi mnga'// lta ba de dang ldan bzhin du// dam tshig nam mkha' lta bu la// bsrung dang mi bsrung phyogs dang bral// 'di'o zhes ni bsrung du med// bsrung ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed cig/ dus gsum
11b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas gsungs mod kyang // bsrung ba'i mdo ni gcig tu 'dus// nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor bsdu// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i dam tshig bsrung // da yang bsrung du med na bde// bzhan pa theg pa chung ba rnams// bsrung ba'i mtshams dag bsrungs
11b4(rnying rgyud): nas ni// skyon yon chos la blang dor byed// bsrung dang bral ba'i chos rnams ni// bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag/ de bzhin pa yi dam tshig la// ji bzhin pa yi b+h+yo gzhag ste// brjed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyis// bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsdum//
11b5(rnying rgyud): bsrung med nam mkha'i dam tshig 'di// ji ltar grugs pa'i rang bzhin la/ sdom dang tshul khrims so sor snang // byis pa rnams ni tha tshig sdom// bden gnyis rgyal ston par grags// bla med mchog la dam tshig spyod// gcig gi don las ma g.yos
11b6(rnying rgyud): kyang // 'dul dbang ngo la so sor grags// kho na nyid ldan dam tshig mchog/ de dang gang ldan dam pa ste// de las 'das na 'tshig par 'gyur/ de phyir dam tshig chen po ni// nam mkha' 'dra bar dpa' bos bshad// rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad la//
11b7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig 'di las yod mi mnga'// spyod pa dag gi khyad par yang // chos nyid bya btsal kun bral la// bsgrub dang sgrub pa'i dmigs pa med// 'khrul pa gcod pa'i skye bo dag/ dmigs med byang chub bde chen la// sdug bsngal rtsol sems
12a1(rnying rgyud): bcug pas nor// bya ba med pa'i chos nyid la// nyon mongs bya med smad pas 'khrul// rang byung ldan grub gnas bzhin du// byis pa'i spyod pas ci btsal dgos// gang zhig 'dod de ci zhig sgrub// ci sprad ci bsgrubs ci brdal
12a2(rnying rgyud): yang // sdug bsngal nyid de byang chub med// dmyal ba sangs rgyas chen po la// sdug bsngal byang chub la ma nyid de// nyan thos rang rgyalas gnyis dang // theg pa'i khyad par che bsten pa// byed rtsol bcas pa thams cad 'khrul// bla maud byang chub gegs
12a3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig btsal med bde chen don// sems kyi grong 'dis mya mthong ste// sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spad kyang // bris pa don med sden 'khyam// btsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la// rtsol ba'i spyod pas ci zhig bya// 'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la// tshig
12a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nor ba'i col byar med// bgrod du med pa'i chos nyid la// bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor ming dang bral// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la// rtog sems bsam pa'i dmigs dang bral// btsal med pa yi chos nyid la// btsal med ye nas lhun gyis
12a5(rnying rgyud): grub// mtha' dbus med pas bdal ba che// phyi nang med pas ye gsal khyab// skyon yon med par lhun gyis rdzogs// bsgrub du med pas btsal sems bral// gzung du med pas dmigs dang bral// thams cad mkhyen pas byin brlabs che// gdod
12a6(rnying rgyud): nas byang chub snying por gnas// spyod pa'i khyad par 'di lta bu// des na gcig las med bzhin du// spyod mthun rtsol ba'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog spyod pa so sor sdang // 'khrul pa thams cad 'khor bar spyod// rgyu 'bras mi slu bden don spyod//
12a7(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs pa la nam mkhar spyod// de ltar spyod pa kun spyod kyang // dam pa'i don de spyod mchog nyid// dam par gyur pa thams cad la// dam pa'i spyod pa de las med// skyes bu mchog gis de skad bshad// the tshom med par shes par gyis// ma bcos
12b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub de bzhin nyid// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid la// bsgom pa dmigs su med pa ste// ting 'dzin zhes ni gdags su med// bsgoms kyang rnyed pa ma yin la// de bzhin ma bsgoms snang ba med// bsgom chos sna tshogs cir snang yang // bsgoms/
12b2(rnying rgyud): nas de ya dang mi gnas// de bas byis pa'i spyod yul yin// dper na byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sa la sogs pa gzugs sna tshogs// mdzes par byas nas skad cig mthong // mthong ba nyid na ma grub ste// skad cig kho nas zhig gyur nas/
12b3(rnying rgyud): sa la sogs pa'i rdul du snang // de bzhin rnal 'byor byis pa yis// gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs bsgom// sems kyi bye brag skad cig la// yid kyi rgyab sna tshogs 'byung // byung ba bzhin du de ma grub// sems kyi skad cig dran pa la// yid kyi
12b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa rgyun chad nas// byung tshor chad pa'i mtha' spangs te// chos rnams nam mkha' lta zur rje// brjod med rgyan mi 'chad par dmigs// dAd d+hA na ci ma log par// brjed med ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mchog/ ci phyir chos kyi dbying sa nyid ni// d+has
12b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' lta bur 'dus ma byas// bsam du med pas nam mkha' 'dra// brjod du med pas gzugs dang bral// kun gzhi kun du nam mkha' la// yid ni mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// rnam shes nyon mongs sprin gyis khebs// 'du byed rlung gis kun 'askyod
12b6(rnying rgyud): de// gasngal dang byung 'jug sangs dang 'gag/ rnam shes mtshan ma'i rtog pa yis// kun gzhi nam mkha' mthong mi ster// kun gzhi mthong nyid chos sku ste// 'di don nam mkha' ma brjed pa// ting 'dzin chen po rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig
12b7(rnying rgyud): 'di don yid 'chang ba// gzugs kyi dngos po cir snang yang // sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das// bde chen sangs rgyas thams cad la// dgongs pa 'di las yong mi mnga'// snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' 'di// ting 'dzin chen por gnas bzhin
13a1(rnying rgyud): du// 'di las glags te ci zhig tshol// rgyal bas btsal kyang yong mi rnyed// 'di las gzhan du gang tshol ba// btsal ba nyid du chi chad 'gyur// gzhan nam dmun pa'i sgo rnams ni// ting 'dzin med pa'i chos nyid la// 'dzin
13a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin bcug pas nor// de dag la ni gang spyod rnams// zen tsher mig ni nam mkha' la// phra rab then thag 'dzud pa ltar// byis pa las gang byed pa de// shed can dag gis byar mi rung // shed can spyod pa'i nam mkha' de// then tsher nam mkhar
13a3(rnying rgyud): shong mi 'gyur// de bas gzhan la bstan pa min// bstan na byis pa ga Na da'agyur// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos// gsal bar 'ong stong nyims 'grub/ byin parlabs 'od kyi zer phreng tsam// sgra ma ltar snang mtshan mang pob// mi g.yo mtshan
13a4(rnying rgyud): med rang bzhin dngos// skye med sems kyis ma mthong ba// byis pa 'drid pa'i rtsed mor sdang // dngos grub chen po'i sems nyid de// yid bzhin 'byung ba rin po che// ji ltar dmigs shing bsgyur bar 'gyur// grub pa'i don chen thams cad rdzogs//
13a5(rnying rgyud): sems kyis sems kyi tshul mthong na// dngos grub ces de dag las 'ong // gang gis stsol te lu yis blang // sbal dang stsol bar byed mi dmigs// dper na chu dang me long dang // mkha' dang ral gri shel la sogs// gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la//
13a6(rnying rgyud): rtog med la sogs bltas gsal ba// chu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin// de la ngo mtshar che mi 'byung // sems kyi chu gas la nam mkha' la// nyon mongs sbyin gyis rnyog med na// dngos grub nyi zla skar tshogs bkram// sgrib med b+hin brlabs dang gis 'char//
13a7(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi nam mkha'i snying po de// nyon mongs sprin gyis gting spangs pa// shes rab rlung gis ma gtor bar// gzhamakhan gyi spyod dri yis// sgrib pas la chos nyid gsal 'dod pa// ji ltar mus gsher byis pa dag/ nyi ma sprin ldan grib ma yis/
13b1(rnying rgyud): shin tu bsgribs par gyur pas// smin chen 'dus pa'i phung po la// kha yi dbugs kyis bus byas na// sprin bsal nyi 'od gsal 'dod 'dra// de phyir rnal 'gror dbang phyug gis// sems nyid don la rnam brtags te// kun ga lertsa bA shes par bya/
13b2(rnying rgyud): sems nyid de la bltas gsal ba// rtsa ba dang ni gang ldan pa// dus dang tshigs dang lor gyur yang // yal ga lo 'dab 'bras thar bstan// rtsa ba'i sa bon med mi 'gyur// ci ltar sbyor ba'i rdul 'byor rnams// nan gyis mtshan pa'i dngos grub dag/ gyis
13b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i sems kyis blang 'dod na// de yang mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur// dper na me yi rang bzhin dag/ sa dang nags tshal sreg byed pa// rgyu rnams tshogs pa'i bden pa las// med las yod pa'i bden par snang // de ltar mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor yang // mtshan
13b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i cho 'phrul thob 'dod pa// mtshan ma'i rgyu rnams tshogs pa las// mtshan ma rangs pa'i mtshan mar snang // shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la// byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pa'i// dam pa'i don la cher dmigs pas// gsang mchog rig pa'i dngos grub
13b5(rnying rgyud): myur// mtshan mar mi rtog rang bzhin gyis// zab mo'i don chen go ba ni// nges pa'i don gyis thag gcad de// mnyam pa'i don la yid ches bya// ji ltar mkha' la tshig tsam du// ngang du brjod pas rjod byed kyi// brjod pa'i bsnyad dang bral bas// ji ltar
13b6(rnying rgyud): 'khrigs kyi smig rgyu dag/ snang ba nyid na med pa ltar// chos so cog gi rang bzhin gsal// gsal ba nyid na de mi dmigs// thabs chen gting zab shes rab lam// spos bral mtshan ma'i 'phrang las 'das// gtos ches yangs pas lam gnyis
13b7(rnying rgyud): bral// dbus mtha' mi dmigs mnyam pa'i lam// gcig tu mnyam par chud nas ni// yul med tshol ba'i sems bral de// blang dor gnyis kyi mtha' spangs nas// gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// chos nyid dbyings su ro gcig phyir//
14a1(rnying rgyud): shes dang shes bya gnyis med de// yenas shes nyen chos shes na// chos nyid gzhan nas btsal ci dgos// dper na snga ma'i bde sdug cang // bsal nas gnyi ga mi dmigs ltar// 'khor ba 'gyur ba'i brda sdug kyang // mnyam par
14a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin don gyis mnyam// ji ltar dus rnams thams cad dag/ mnyam pa nyid du rtogs nas ni// spos tshig rjes su ma 'brangs na// mnyam 'gyur dus rnams ga la dmigs// mkha' la rang gis gzugs med phyir// dmigs su zin par mi
14a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bzhin// sems kyis ma skyes don mi dpogs// skyon dang yon tan gnyis 'byed pa// rtogs nas gnyis kyi don spangs te// rang bzhin mnyam par don bzhag na// bsgom zhes ming du brjod par zad// gnyis su lta ba ma skyes phyir// gnyis kyi
14a4(rnying rgyud): 'du shes ci byung yang // rang byung zhi ba ma bkag chos// ye nas ma bac+doMs don gyis gsal// ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// mi gnas ye shes thugs dang mnyam// rig dang ma rig khyad par las// 'khor 'das rten dang 'brel
14a5(rnying rgyud): bar snang // rnam rtog med phyir zhi ba med// 'dzin par ma yin skos bral min// drang ba'i don bstan ma gtogs par// don la tshig gis brjod du med// snang yang med pa'i rang bzhin la// shes blo yod pa'i sems mi 'byung // mnyam nyid
14a6(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i don 'di la// don ldan stong pa'i sgo mi 'dogs// ma bcos rang bzhin zhi ba yi// mtshan ma'i rtog bral shes ldan pas// med do tsam du'ang mi dmigs na// byung tshor 'dzin par ga la 'gyur// thams cad mi gnas byang chub pas//
14a7(rnying rgyud): btsal nas grub pa ma yin yang // sgyu ma sangs nas 'khrul bral bzhin// spos bral ye shes snying por gnas// 'khor bar rtogs pa dug yin te// 'asor ba'i sdug bsngal mi shes na// dug 'thungs bde ba ga las 'ong // sbyar legs dug
14b1(rnying rgyud): sbyang gyur// 'khar lasangs sa // shA ya nga gag smra // ba ga 'a bya ga sa dang// da/ shin tan gag pa 'ad
14b2(rnying rgyud): go btsun gzhan gyis mi phan te// bdud pal gyi dang 'dra ba mi// yang dgul pa rtsog rtogs pa \u0f7f// nga na smos byung ba'i// na cig pa'i ma yod rjeng// bcu dang 'd-i dag me ga
14b3(rnying rgyud): 'thor ba rigs parnal ba la/ da la tshul gyi gagags nyid nga drug gyisabad
14b4(rnying rgyud): 'khrul ba'i tshig dums// ma' dul la dag grolags kyi brlom sa pazod nyid dadang po da zhes 'anyes pas don ma dngogs/ 'jal/ gas
14b5(rnying rgyud): ma pa nyid pa blangs rgyas riganas/ dag pa'i dzin pa tsun dung zhing // rang 'thung po d+ha ma par sa pan pa nyin// ngas sa ldan papa rdzog sa// ye shes mchog ldan ma tas tud / te
14b6(rnying rgyud): ldan tha ma'i dbang // dbye bsags mchog ldan lus spyod pa'i// bsod nam sa mchog ldan gzugs kyi sra// rdo'i sprin tshul gyis 'brub me lnga// btsal nas thob par mi byed de// rgya la bu nyid 'bras du mchog/ myod ba sems nying ting 'ji
14b7(rnying rgyud): rings can pas na don la spyod// ldan grub se la bgrod mi byed// 'khor ba'i sa shes pa de ldan gan / srog pa'i tshor ba'i 'phrul yang // byang chub 'khor 'a'i lam nga brung // d+ha ma'i mtshor nyid ma bkag rgyal// ngang byung ga
15a1(rnying rgyud): dumanam// mnam tad cad panan pa / sa nyid pa yang mas nyi gsal// mnyam pas ma na du// / mnyam pa'i don dang ma ste 'thar// byang sa ba yang sri myigs// miganas zhes ni gdus mang/
15a2(rnying rgyud): gnas dang dmigs pa'i gnas 'dzin pa// gzung 'dzis zhes ni dwe la b+ha// sgra 'drar byang chub sems med na// dngos bral yul me stong pa dag/ mkha' la rang bzhin mi gnas zhes// bstan pa de ni yod ma yin// bsam gtan lus ni
15a3(rnying rgyud): dang // gnas de lus kyi phyag tu kun// mtshan mar mngon par zhen las thung // mtshan med sems la byab rtsal med// sgrib chu bzhin du lus reng na// gnas dang phyag rgyar dmigs pa med// byed spyod med du skod byed cing // bya med byung gyi
15a4(rnying rgyud): de sa bres ga sred pas// gnas byang nga lus 'tshas khas byed/ zhe par 'jas lam spyod byed pa// de nyid gzung ba'i rnam rtog pa// rnas ma gtam du sang bed 'anam snyen// mkha' la mas dben dben pa mchog
15a5(rnying rgyud): dben pa'i gnas yid to// 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod mchog gnas// thAg pa lug gzhal med min// soms nyid dpa g.yas gzhal myed mchog/ 'dini rmang zung nor bu'i gzha'// mye dang nang med kun du nang // 'dra badra 'dras pa tshogs pa ba
15a6(rnying rgyud): sa ma m+b+ha shes pabs 'dus mchog/ ldan 'das pas lus pa med// dpagra med rta lnga ba ma nyes pa mags// byang rngub 'byor pa po byang sa nyid 'byor ba rdzas dang ldan// sdug pa'i rjes mchog 'ad shes sa//
15a7(rnying rgyud): la thomam bye sgrub par byed pa smom pa dang // bsus byed rdzogs su dri nga'o// 'di la sas kyi ba sa / da ma dus ting bskyong sa bya bya ma byaspang bya
15b1(rnying rgyud): swar 'das nas tshig shes na// bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o// tshig tu mnyam brjod mnyam mi dmigs// sems nyid rang drug mnyam pa la ka/ mnyam pa'i don nyid lhag par med// ngadi don mnyam shes mnyam pa'i ngon// brtul wa
15b2(rnying rgyud): min te// sems la sems gzhol rol spyod pa// thabs che yangs pa smod pa'i mchog/ byang chub don gyi skye mo dra// sems kyi phyi mor ye gnas pas// gsol thob mtshan ma'i ming mi dmigs// dngos grub chen po rgyun mi 'chad// de skangs ma
15b3(rnying rgyud): sems mthong na// ye shes kyis ni chos nyid mthong // dus kun du ni skye 'gag med// sngon ma mthong ba'i don mthong 'gyur// de yang dngos po cang mi mthong // thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhig/ blo la 'grus pa kho nar zad// de lta bu yi don mthong na//
15b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang med// sgyu ma tsam du tshul shes nas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i don snang 'gyur// kha cig dag ni de don la// mthong ba ci yang med 'gyur na// sdang ba zhes ni ci phyir gdags// med pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur zhes//
15b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur de dag la// mthong ba med pa'i don de nyid// yid kyi ngol snang 'gyur na// snang zhes de phyir brjod par bya// de bas 'khrul pa ma zad par// nam mkha' mthong ba med pa de// de nyid yid la snang 'gyur yang // 'dzugs la snang bar 'gyur
15b6(rnying rgyud): sems nyid bden par ma mthong na// yid la mtshan med don gsal dang // mtshan ma 'khrul par rgyu ba gnyis// 'dren mar rgyu byed 'bral 'gyur min/ de nyid bden par mthong 'gyur na// de nas de ma thag tu yang // yid kyi rgyub rgyan chad nas//
15b7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul mtshan pa'i chos bral te// des ni bden pa mthong ba yin// de bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// sems ni yang dag la ma nyid de// mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin// gol med lam zhes 'dren pas bshad// de ltar bshad pa'i lam de yang //
16a1(rnying rgyud): kun gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// tshig tu mtshon te bshad mod kyang // dmigs med cig gi yul bral ba// de yi rang bzhin de yin na// rang bzhin gzhi las mtshan mar g.yos// de la ming med ming btags rgyas// yin dam pa
16a2(rnying rgyud): na the tshom skyes// de las rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur te// de bsngal don phyir mtshan ma yi// tshig gi tshogs kyi rnam grangs las// sgo yo dpag tu med par bshad// de yis nges don rjes bcad pa// thugs kyi klong nas bton pa yi// tshig gi smon mas
16a3(rnying rgyud): don bcol ba// lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na// dran byung rjes su 'aglengs na ni// 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khor bar 'gyung // dran 'byung g.yo ba tswi bkug pa// de dag 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur// dran gyur med par blun pa ni// mu stegs can lam mun par 'gyur//
16a4(rnying rgyud): 'di zhes sems su gcig bzung na// mtshan ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin// spa phyi med ces phyung bcad na// med de chad pa'i mu can yin// gzhi yi don las yud tsam zhig/ cir g.yos blo 'gagabyung ba de// rnam grangs lam de 'phel 'gyur gyi// lal
16a5(rnying rgyud): kyi chos nyid ga la 'gyur// dper na 'gro gang byis pa dgra/ grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol// rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis// btsal na grib med dag mi rnyed// don nyid ye nas gnas bzhin du// sems nyid sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis// sha blang bar ni
16a6(rnying rgyud): na tshol ba// don med bdud kyi las yin no// don la tshig tu brjod pa ni// nam mkha' dag la rtsod pa 'dra// tshig tu sman dang dpyad bshad kyang // nad pa'i tshogs la mi phan no// sems nyid don du ma shes na// tshig tu don brjod don mi rtogs//
16a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba spangs nas 'das tshol ba// gzugs btang nas ni grib tshol 'dra// lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na// ma rig ye shes tha dad min// ma rtogs rtogs pa lam du gcig/ sems 'di sna tshogs par snang bas// sna tshogs sems su gcig pa yin/
16b1(rnying rgyud): dper na gser du gcig pa las// dbyibs dang gzugs ni pa dang phyung // byis pas so so'i ming dra grags// grags kyang gsar gyi jo bo ka // de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin la// 'khrul dang ma khrug khung bAr rjes/ nga 'a
16b2(rnying rgyud): dang skar kang // ljang yang sems las gzhan mi dmigs// smon mar 'bar ba'i rin chen ni// gal te ngan khung lngas gyur kyang // de nyid yon tan rang snang bas// 'od ni mkha' la gsal bar 'gyur// de bzhin sems nyid rin chen d+mod/
16b3(rnying rgyud): zas dag 'khor bar phyed gyur kyang // rang thung rang zhing ba sdang bas// shes rab chos nyid mkha' la gsal// sems nyid nam mkhang 'drar mtshungs te// kun khub stong gsal sna phyogs 'byung // byung tsho ga po 'grog thams cad kyang //
16b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis 'thung dang gis so// mdor na ji ltar brtags pa pa sa bzhin// 'gyur bas thams cad nga brda snang // mi bcos g.yo ba med nyid la// sna tshogs rgyu'i gling mo sbyin zhing // tshe'i rdul mi 'ugag nya mad med// the bzhin nas mkha'i rang badzin/
16b5(rnying rgyud): la// blo bzhag ma g.yengs kho nar zad// de ni skyes mchog don po che// de sems dus gsum thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas 'thung ba'i dze n+da yin// de lta'i don la'ing zhig nas// shes shing 'dris par gyur 'an// des don mthong ba'i nyamasarjod na//
16b6(rnying rgyud): dr-in dang mang khri ba'i rtags chen yang // mi dag lung gis brgya dang cang te// ngas par don gsum myong bar 'byung // de dag srog kyi legs pa'i// drod can tegs su bstan pa yin// da yi ga byas byung ba'i rjod// 'khor ba rdo stsal snying rje ye// rje/
16b7(rnying rgyud): sems kyang skye bar 'gyur// mtshan ma rtag pa rkyen rnams pa// ya sa sa pa hU~M shes d+he// chos rnams 'di ltar yin pa pas// 'dra sngar 'khrung ma ma // ya mtshan byung pa'i 'du shes 'byung // 'di don sa shes 'gro ba
17a1(rnying rgyud): col srub dka' ba'i thabs can gyis// yang dag rngon tshol lam re ring // bsags pa'i 'bras bu yod/ gyur yang // don de mthong // long ma sbyas// de 'dra'i 'du zhes 'thung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes pa'i nyams rjod ni// skab
17a2(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i skyes bu gang // rgyud 'gros tshig gis ma bkrol bar// sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas// sba ba'i sgo mar thams cad gsal// don la nges pa'i gtan migs dag/ tshig tu mtshon te 'byin par nus// de ni mos su mnyam nyid dang /
17a3(rnying rgyud): dbyer med gnyis su med pa yin// rten pa'i gsung thugs su brnyan dang // den mtshungs pa yod yin no// zhi lus mthar 'gog ljon gnyis dang // de ni mtshungs pa yod ma yin// sa la slob pa'i sems dpa' dang // de yang mi mtshungs tshul bas gsu
17a4(rnying rgyud): dag 'dzin drang srong don dpyod dang // lus 'ang sems ni yang mi mtshungs// de gyi rnam dgal ba na// sems kyi gsang pa 'di yin pas na// la ldan 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// lam 'di shes par bya ba las// bsal pa bya pa'i rgyu med de/
17a5(rnying rgyud): lam 'di shes pa de nyid kyis// dka' ba'i tshal sgrub ma byas par// thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de byas na sems 'di ni la ba zhes bya'o// 'khor ba zhes bya'o// sems can zhes bya'o// gru zhes bya'o// bgrodapa
17a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// byang chub ces bya'o// sems zhes bya'o// shes rab ces bya'o// ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// gnas zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// zab pa zhes bya'o// gsang bya zhes bya'o//
17a7(rnying rgyud): gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya'o// chos zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jug pa'i phyir ni lam mo// 'khrul pa'i phyir ni 'khor ba'o// ma shes pa'i phyir ni sems can no// sprol pa
17b1(rnying rgyud): phyir ro bya'o// brjod pa'i phyir ni 'azod par// 'dre ba'i phyir ni byang chub bo// dran pa nges pa'i phyir ni sems so// mkhas pa'i phyir ni shes rab bo// gsal ba'i phyir ni ting nge 'dzin to// phyin pa'i phyir ni gnas so// bla med dungabyer myi nga
17b2(rnying rgyud): mtshar ba'i phyir ni mchog go// 'phags pa'i phyir ni phul lo// dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa'o// gting ring ba'i phyir ni zab pa'o// gab pa'i phyir ni gsang ba'o// phra ba'i phyir ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// kun 'byung ba'i phyir ni chos so// sa
17b3(rnying rgyud): don pa'i phyir ni byang thab sems pa'o// mab phyin pa'i phyir ni smras byas te// sems dpa' drin ma dang phyir narnal 'byor kyil ma 'di shes par byaste// lam 'di ni thos thams cad cigana'o// sangs byas bams cad dri sum mo// ci'i phyir zhen
17b4(rnying rgyud): dus 'ad nag / ma sa yis pa zhes byug
17b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab ces kyang bya'o// de bzhin du mram zhes kyang bya ba dang / sgras zhes bya ba dang / bdag po gas bye ba dang / gdung zhes bya ba dang / srog ces thab dang / nor zhes bya ba dang / byas zhes dru ba dang / tha gas
17b6(rnying rgyud): gsu shes bya ba dang / thugs zhes bya ba dang / yon tan zhes bya ba dang / phran las chen po zhes bya bya'o// tsa'i phyi zhe na/ thabs chen po dang / shes rab chen po dang / byang chu brgyan po dang / dbang chen po dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 'ad
17b7(rnying rgyud): bang dgang bdang / cho btid pa ma shes pa dang / skang rje chen pa dang / rnam par brjed pa da / gas su spyor pa dag sa drangu babyen pa dang / ci yang 'byung ba dang / nga ba stsogs bu byer de dag ni myur yin pa shes par ma
18a1(rnying rgyud): phyir yang lam 'di yongs su shes par bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o// 'tsho ba chen po zhes gru ba dang / longs spyod chen po zhes bya ba dang / 'azud man po zhes bya ba dang / zla zhes bu ba dang / gdags pa ba dang /
18a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / spyod pa zhes bya ba dang / cho 'phrul zhes bya ba dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba dang / bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / tshogs chen po zhes bya ba dang / kun du rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//
18a3(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul pa 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang / dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / 'jol tog tu spyod pa dang / dgos bsgrub pa dang / 'bras bur byed pa dang / kun du log pa dang / don grub pa dang / smin par bsags pa dang / rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /
18a4(rnying rgyud): ba byed pa dang / sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang / mtshan mar bstan pa dang / rnam par 'dud pa dang / shin tu mdzad pa dang / 'dod pa byed pa dang / lhag par 'dod pa dang / kun du 'byor pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bya'o// gzhan yang
18a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa chen po'i tshogs 'di la ni thams cad yod de/ chos thams cad ni rnal 'byor rnams gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang / rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing
18a6(rnying rgyud): las 'byung bar shes par bya ste/ de yang ji ltar zhe na/ rgya ni 'khrul pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o// de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang / rtog pa gsum dang / log pa bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / dbang
18a7(rnying rgyud): lnga dang / gajug dang / rkyen rjeg nyi dang / skye ba cug nyis dang / 'ang bzhin badra brgyad dade/ spyod pa'i rgyag gangag spen pa ni / 'am da / gnas drug das srogasas ni te phyi 'dapas su mi nga shis mi gyur
18b1(rnying rgyud): byang byen/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir byung ba'i phyir te/ lam de nyid marig pa'i phying 'phrul ba zhes na'o// sras dang gnyis su blang bu'i byung nas nga zhes bya'o// dus gsum ngas pang to / dang pa ga
18b2(rnying rgyud): don las gol ba dang / mnyam pa la su gol ba dang phyogs las gol ba dang bzhi las gol ba'i phyir log pa zhes bya'o// gru 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir dmun pas 'jibs pa dang / sre pas gangs pa dang / ston pa dang / byed ngas 'bras
18b3(rnying rgyud): dang / kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o// kun nas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang / rkyen du tshod pa dang / mtshan mar shes pa dang / thams cad nas byed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o// sgor gsa' zhing yul la nga
18b4(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i phyir mthong bar dbang ba dang / thos par dbang ba dang / tshor bar dbang ba dang / myong bar dbang ba dang / rig par dbang pa'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o// 'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang / mnyen par byed pa dang / chags par byed
18b5(rnying rgyud): bung/ skyed pa gas pa sa su bu'i byu 'i da da
18b6(rnying rgyud): yul du'i phyid byed kyis la mtshan pa skye ba byung med brtse stong ba dang / sa byed/ / / byad / da/ pa dang / skye byedapa/ ra byed/ mtshan du
18b7(rnying rgyud): na kyi phyir// mthong ba'i chos nyid dang / snang ba 'tshes dang / ltung re ba'i rgyas dang / thos pa'i byas da/ grags pa'i chos dang / gsal ba'i chos dang / rgyas dang / 'itshus dang/ ma pa'i dang / dang /
19a1(rnying rgyud): bro ba'i chos dang / reg pa'i chos dang / reg bya'i chos dang / nges pa'i chos dang / shes pa'i chos dang / chos kyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya'o// mtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes sbyar ba'i spyod pa
19a2(rnying rgyud): dang / dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang / smos su 'dogs pa'i spyod pa dang / zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang / kun du 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang / bla brtsal 'tshal ba'i spyod pa dang / chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang / kun du
19a3(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi spyod pa dang / phyin ci log pa'i spong pa dang / gnyis la rten par spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o// 'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs par smin pa dang / rim par smin pa dang / glo bur du smin pa dang / bsgyur te smin pa'i phyir smin pa zhes bya'o//
19a4(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i phyir gdung ba'i lam dang / 'gog pa'i lam dang / mun pa'i lam dang / 'dam kyi lam dang / yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o// brten par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang // yid ldan gyi gnas dang / mnyam ldan gyi gnas dang / 'ang
19a5(rnying rgyud): ldan gyi gnas dang / cod ldan gyi gnas dang / dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir gnas zhes bya'o// bde ba'i mu la bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang / byed pa dang dbang phyug gi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rkyen gyi rnal 'byor
19a6(rnying rgyud): ni 'di lta ste/ shes pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang / lam 'di shes par bya'o// de bzhin du de ni gnyis dang / tshul gsum dang / thabs bzhi dang / chos lnga dang / rigs drug dang / mdzad pa chen po bcu gnyis dang / cho 'phrul chen po
19a7(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis dang / ye shes bcwa brgyad dang / sa'i khyad par bcu gcig dang / sku bzhi dang / lam lnga dang / 'bras bu chen po drug dang / byang chub chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang rkyen
19b1(rnying rgyud): tsam du chud cing 'bras bu'i can du 'gyur ba'i gyur te/ las de nyid mnor par shes pa'i phyir de shes pa N+Di \u0f88\u0f90 shas nA'o// bdenas gnyis su snang ba'i gyi ba na gnyis pa zhes bya'o// mthor nyi gsum thAs slong bar phyir kun brtags mthu pa
19b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul dang / gzhan dbang mi mthun pa la med pa'i tshul dang / rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i phyir tshul zhes bya'o// mkhas pas zin pa'i phyir khad kyis 'jug pa'i thabs dang / dz+nyAn la sbyor ba'i thabs dang / mngon par 'jug pa'i thabs
19b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o// rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir chu'i chos dang / lam gyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos dang / 'bras bu'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o// phyis 'byung bar shes pa'i phyir rgya'i dran pa dang / 'bras bu'i dran
19b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / sgra'i dran pa dang / sbyor ba'i dran pa dang / gnas kyi dran pa dang / mngon sum pa'i dran pa dang / rig pa'i phyir rig pa drug ces bya'o// gzhan gyi don du mdzad cing 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo bo'i tshul dang / bltams pa'i tshul dang /
19b5(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i tshul dang / mnga' dbang chen po'i tshul dang / thar par gyur pa'i tshul dang / dka' thub chen po'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas pa dang bdud btul ba dang 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud brtul ba'i tshul dang / cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshul dang / mya ngan
19b6(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i tshul gyis phyir mdzad pa chen po zhes bya'o// sna tshogs su 'phrul pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang / snang ba'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / bas
19b7(rnying rgyud): gtan gyi cho 'phrul dang / byin brlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang / skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang / stobs kyi cho 'phrul dang / yon tan gyi cho 'phrul dang / 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul dang / de'i phyir cho 'phrul zhes bya'o// phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i phyir nang
20a1(rnying rgyud): gtses thams cad shes pa dang / bya'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / phyinang gatshas thams cad shes pa'i ye shas dang / snang ba'i chos thams cad shes pa'i sa shes dang / don dam pa'i chos ta zas pa' ma shas dang /
20a2(rnying rgyud): byas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtha' mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dus gsum gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / blang dor mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / rang bzhin
20a3(rnying rgyud): kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / chos can gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dmigs pa med pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan mar mi rtog
20a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dngos po mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / brten te gnas pa'i phyir mi gos pa'i rig pa dang / mi nyams par rig pa dang / mi
20a5(rnying rgyud): sgrib par rig pa dang / rdzogs par rig pa dang / ma g.yos par rig pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rig pa dang / gnyis su med par rig pa dang / yongs su dag par rig pa dang / kun du legs par rig pa dang / de la thag par rig pa dang / rdzogs par
20a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rig pa la brten pa'i phyir sa zhes bya'o// kun du brjod cing ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / rdzogs longs spyod pa dang / 'dren par sprul pa'i phyir sku zhes bya'o// bgrod cing 'jug pa'i phyir tshogs dang / sbyor ba dang //
20a7(rnying rgyud): mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mtha' zad du phyin pa'i phyir lam zhes bya'o// rgyal don yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rdzogs pa dang / thams cad du mkhyen pa dang / yongs su khyab pa dang / tshigs su 'byung ba dang / kun du dbar ba dang / dgos pa
20b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya'o// mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub chen po zhes bya'o// 'dus pa chen// 'chags 'bras bu jal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ mnan pa gcig shes te grub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par byar// dpazhan drangs
20b2(rnying rgyud): dang / yon tan gsum dang / dgongs pa bzhi dang / chen po lha dang / tshogs pa drug dang / 'byung tshul bcu gnyis dang / ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis dang / ye shes chen po bcwa brgyad dang / rnal 'byor chen po bad+ma gcig dang / sgrub pa chen po bzhid
20b3(rnying rgyud): sbyor la lnga dang / dngos grung chen po drug dang / rdzogs pa chen po gcig shes te chu ba par 'dod pas kyang la ma 'di shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rtswa nyid 'bras par sgrub pa'i phyir gtan la phebs pas ma nor ba zhes bya'o// the mom mi za ba'i
20b4(rnying rgyud): kyis nges pa dang / shes rab kyis nges pas nges pa zhes bya'o// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang yongs su khyab pa dang / rlabs su che ba'i yon tan dang / rtsis las 'das pa'i phyir yon tan zhes bya'o// thabs kyis ldem por dgongs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid la
20b5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi phyir dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang / gnyen po'i phyir grangs gzhan la dgongs pa dang / btur ba'i phyir don gzhan la dgongs pas na dgongs pa zhes bya'o// lhag par 'phags pa'i phyir mngon pa dang / bdag nyid chen po
20b6(rnying rgyud): dang / de yin pa dang / thams cad du che ba dang / kun du rdzogs pa'i phyir chen po zhes bya'o// kun nas tshong ba'i phyir/ mnyam pa chen po dang / 'byor pa chen po dang / 'dus pa chen po dang / rig pa chen po dang / dbang chen po dang / 'dres pa chen po
20b7(rnying rgyud): phyir tshogs zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi don du 'byung zhing 'gro ba'i tshul dang mthun pa'i phyir gnas su bskyed pa dang / mnyam par gyur pa dang / yadzes par gshegs pa dang / spro bar spyod pa dang / gsang bar sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma bcom pa dang / mdza pa med
21a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sang+ge'i gsung sgra dang / nges par rdzogs pa dang / cho ma ngam chen po sprul ba mdzad pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'byung tshul yin pa zhes bya'o// gsal zhing mi gtong ba'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa ste/ nam dag dbyed sa kyi ting 'dun
21a2(rnying rgyud): dang / snar gsal yel 'gro ting nge 'dzin dang / mi zad mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'byung chen sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang sgyur thabs kI ting nge 'dzin dang / rtse
21a3(rnying rgyud): gcig 'phros pa'i ting nge tshan dang / tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen myu gu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dug 'joms sman gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rgya'i ye
21a4(rnying rgyud): dang / thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes dang / yi ge'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i ye shes dang / sprul pa'i ye shes dang / cir yang mdzad pa'i ye shes dang / me lod lta bu'i ye shes dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes
21a5(rnying rgyud): dang / rin po che lta bu'i ye shes dang / nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes dang / snang skyong gsal ba'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su gsal ba'i phyir ye
21a6(rnying rgyud): shes chen po zhes bya'o// 'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor dang / bka'i sdod pas kyi rnal 'byor dang / rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rtags kyi rnal 'byor dang / gsang sgro lung gi rnal 'byor dang / spyod ba rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma \u0f7f
21a7(rnying rgyud): gyi rnal 'gror dang / lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rtsal chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i phyir rnal 'byor zhes bya'o// mnyam
21b1(rnying rgyud): pa nyid du bus pa dang / bdab can par grub pa dang / ngas partogs par thub pa dang / 'dus cad gyu rjes bu ba'i tshong bub pan pa nas rgyug/ spya pa bras par byung ba dang / babs dang shAs rab tu stor ba dang / dbyi sa dnga' shes du byung ba dang
21b2(rnying rgyud): sems rang chos su sbyor ba dang / las dang brags rjer sbyor bas sbyor ba chen pa zhes bya'o// srid pa rgyam gyi dbyings su rnam pa dathung pa dang / 'khor ba rgya mtsho dag gir grub par gyur pa dang / bdag nyid chen po lhan gyis grub par gyur pa dang / dmigs pa gang min
21b3(rnying rgyud): pa de bzhin grub par gyur pa dang / cho 'phrul rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub pa dang / don dam bcud kyis rnam shes rgyas par grub pa'i phyir dngos grub chen po zhes bya'o// rnam grangs thams cad byang chub kyi sems bde 'a chen por rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir
21b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po gcig ces bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs sa'i khyad par chen po bcu gcig non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'dri la bslab par bya ste gang zhe na/ 'gyur dbang ma nges pa'i sa dang / brten pa gzhing sa dang / gal chen sbyor ba'i sa
21b5(rnying rgyud): dang / mi ldog gnas pa'i sa dang / bslab pa rgyan gyi sa dang / cho 'phrul sprul pa'i sa dang / bsten pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa dang / dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang / gnas pas mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang / bdal ba chos nyid kyi sa dang / rdzogs pa
21b6(rnying rgyud): spyir chib kyi sa ste/ sa 'di dag non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen pongo tshogs 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcu chib par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ gang zhe na gzhi dam tshig 'dis
21b7(rnying rgyud): bzung bar bslab pa dang / rgyud zos pas dgrol bar bslab pa dang / phul du mkhas par dbyung bar bslab pa dang / ske kun nas sbed par bslab pa dang / rim pa dbang gis bgrod par bslab pa dang / la spyod pas dong bar bslab pa dang / thag lta
22a1(rnying rgyud): bas gcad par bslab pa dang / nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis blang bar bslab pa dang / don man ngag gis bsgrub par bslab pa dang / mdogacig tu bsdu bar bslab pa'o// 'dul ba chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta / yon tan gyi che
22a2(rnying rgyud): par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ gang zhe na/ che ba nyi shu dang / rol pa nyi shu dang / cho 'phrul nyi shu dang / rngom pa nyi shu dang / brjid pa chen po nyi shu dang / nyi chen po'i nor bu'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ mang
22a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i mthu chen po nyi shu yong par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'jig rten chen po drug 'phang bar 'dod pa dang / gu'i phung po chen po rngungs te nga mdzar 'dod pa dang / 'dug brgal ba 'ching bar 'dod pa dang / nyama'i kyi
22a4(rnying rgyud): 'bum brtse bar 'dod pa dang / bsreg pa'i bskal ba chen po gsum gzhol bar 'dod pa dang / nAm mkha' thams cad baspu gcig gis dgang bar 'dod pa dang / ba spug cig las sangs rgyas byed da bye bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas byed nga su gcig
22a5(rnying rgyud): par 'dod pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad ba spu gcig tu rngub par 'dod pa dang / ba spu gcig gis 'khor ba thams cad la khyab par 'dod pa dang / bskul pa'i 'khor lo chen po ring du bsrung par 'dod pa dang / thung ngu bskur bar 'dod pa dang / dus kyi 'ad
22a6(rnying rgyud): po mnyam par bskor bar 'dod pa dang / 'khrug par bskor bar 'dod pa dang / las kyi 'khor lo chen po rgyun du bskor bar 'dod pa dang / rgun gcad par 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo bzlog par 'dod pa dang / lugs su bskor bar 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal
22a7(rnying rgyud): kye 'khor lo chen po rgyan gcad par 'dod pa dang / dmyal ba'i 'khor lo chen po dong sprugs par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor rtog pa'i ri bo brgyad cu rtsa gcig gzhil par 'ad
22b1(rnying rgyud): kyangang ma 'phel bslab par byaste/ dngas gzhi ba pa dgu dang / mtshan ma'i rtog pa dgu dang / rtags kyi rtog pa dgu dang / rkyen ma rtag par byu ga/ lang+gA ga tog pa dgra pa/ smon pa'i// ga bAdag dang / rdzu 'dzug pa dgra sa pa'i rtag pa
22b2(rnying rgyud): dang / mngon par rdzog pa dgu'o// 'das pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'dzin ste/ lung ba'i sgo dgu shes pas kyang lam 'di la brlab par bya ste/ de yang ging zhe na/ bdud chen po'i ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang / mu ste gas kyi khams su ltung ba'i sgra dang / sran po
22b3(rnying rgyud): khams su snang ba'i sgo dang / brjod sbyin gyi ris m+b+ha wAr ba'i sgo dang / rlung chen por ltung ba'i sgo ga/ bgegs chen por lung ba'i ts+tsha dang/ sgo chen po 'dis bu ltung ba'i sgo dang / shog ma can chen gyings su lhung ba'i rdo dang / dkyil pa chen por chung ba
22b4(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i tshogs gzhan da swA ste/ lam 'di shes par 'dod na sang sa rgyas kyi chos shes par bye'o/ nyinas skyeni nyin pa ma s+hog/ chad par phyung lta// bye bar sna nga// dum-igs pa ma dang/ @
22b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi chos 'dren 'dod chags dang bcas pa'o// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'o// gti mug dang bcas pa'o// nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o// phrag dog dang bcas pa'o// mtshams med pa lnga dang bcas pa'o// de dang nyer lnga dang bcas pa'o// rtsi ba bzhi dang
22b6(rnying rgyud): log pa brkyang rang yang bcas pa'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ srog gtsang ba dang bcas pa la// mkhyen par len pa dang dacas pa'o// 'dod pas log pa ba yim pa dang bcas pa'o// badz+ra me deng bcas pa // phra ma dang bcas
22b7(rnying rgyud): rag rtsung mo dang bzas pa'o// chos khyal ba dang bcas pa'o// brnang sems dang bcas pa'o// gnod sems dang bcas pa'o// log pa de lte ba dang bcas pa'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de bas na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de rnams la spyod par 'dod pa
23a1(rnying rgyud): lam 'di la bslab par bya'o// shes par bya'o// goms par bya'o// grong du gyur par gyis shig ces sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'du jig pa'i mdo la san la 'byor rang bzhi le'u ste dang po'o//
23a2(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor der 'das par gyur pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che'i tshogs kyis rmad byung gi phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po smra ba'i seng+ge khyod la bdag cag shin tu zhu bar spobs na gnang ba'i
23a3(rnying rgyud): skabs dbye bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / slu ba'i se nges 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs ji ltar zhu ba'i don gnang gis kun du spobs pa sred la zhu ba'i don gsol cig// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa chen
23a4(rnying rgyud): po'i chags kyis a la la to zhes gsol to// smra ba'i se chen po khyod kyis rgya cher bshad pa'i rnal 'byor rang bzhed chen po'i don gyi rjes su bdag cag 'jug par 'tshal te/ 'di la 'jug pa'i ches/ thabs ji ltar lags/ 'amag stang 'de/ sems
23a5(rnying rgyud): pa' chen po 'di'i don chu cher bshang dra na pa ma/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / smra ba'i sirnaMs bkang stsal pa/ grogs po dag legs so shin tu legs so// nges pa legs so// khyed kyis nus pa'i don 'di rnams ngo gyur Ne ste/ chos thams cad pa 'jug
23a6(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing rgya che ba zong de/ rdo ltogs pa bus par tan ceg gsal bar bshad par bya'o// de na 'khor gyi nang du ba ng+ge'i gsung sa mis kyis rnams kyi skong byed pa 'di gsal bar bshad par bya'o// sangs kyis cho kyi na ma // grangs chung 'asam gyis mi khyab
23a7(rnying rgyud): nga // mang rung dus na gsu sa rdzogs pa// rtsom pas 'dug pa'i sgo ma dang // grub thangs kyi sbo ma dang // meze byed 'bras bu'i rnam // dang ba pa yang gsum yod// mtshan nyid rdzams kyi bla ma dang // rngub pa rigs kyi 'jug sgo dang // bab
23b1(rnying rgyud): gsang nam// de dag tu mar rala'ang // gsus gsum med par na 'gab sha// gtas nas dang gang ma bdang// shas ba rgyags pa na ma dang / da 'donagasas pa 'an pa dang // ga sus gyu pa 'is gags pa// bas ma
23b2(rnying rgyud): nam thar gsum gyi grozhes pa da/ ga pa'i lam 'ang 'dis pa// dam pa gsum jug la bar bshad/ med pa'i marjod dang // thub pa zod po 'jig sgo dang // dun mchen pa'i ma dag mag pa'i thabs kyar
23b3(rnying rgyud): thabs la thabs byung bab sa gsum ste// don dung yi ge tid 'dzin gyis// rjes pa gang gisu brtag byas na// 'jug pa'i thabs kyi dam bu'o// don bu rjes su 'jug pa yang // don ni chos nyid snying po la// rjes su 'jug pa'i sems yin te/ sems can
23b4(rnying rgyud): ma snang ba kyis ma ni dmag kyi ga/ ba nyi shing dag shes napa kya ba gan paslo 'dang/ pa ba bye / la dun pa ba seMmapa'i dang/ 'gyur ba sa
23b5(rnying rgyud): dang // sgor chen la 'jug gnas skabs dang // ro nyid tshor ba'i gnas skabs dang // yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skams dang // rtog chen nyid la phebs skabs dang // de nyid gdeng du gyur pa'i sbubs// las su rung ba'i zhabs dang ngaru// bcu po dang
23b6(rnying rgyud): driri yi// thabs su sams dang chos phrad pas// rig pa byang chub sems 'thung // byang chub sems ni gang sbyin// 'di mi grangs cad rna pa bcu// g.yob byang chub sems nyid dang // de bzhin sngon pa byang chub sems// ldeng nga byang chung chen po
23b7(rnying rgyud): sems// de bzhin sbyor ba byeng chub sems// 'jug pa'i sems dang dge ba'i sems// mo 'gyur ba dang rig pa dang // gnas pa dang ni rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems zhes grags pas ni// sems bcu dag tu rtul bas bshad// byang chu
24a1(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin de// skabs bcu dag tu sbyar bas na// gzugs brnyan chos nyid ngol snang // gzugs brtan rang bzhin ci skad snang // phram tsam gyi skang ma dang // de bzhin skar mtham la pa// skar sa chan pa dag dang ni// thA bsngos gartag nam
24a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// bachud dang bcu drug rnam pa yi// gzugs brnyan dag zhwa snang ba ste/ dngos por snang bcing ma yin// chu zla lta bur gzung du med// sems kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dang // chos nyid gsal ba'i nyi ma gnyis/
24a3(rnying rgyud): yul dang dbang po'i tshul lta bur// dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin gsal// 'di ni rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i lam// bgrod par byed pa'i thabs chen yin// lam 'di goms par bslab bya na// rnal 'byor bslab par bya ba'i mtha'// gnas bcu dag kyang 'di
24a4(rnying rgyud): ste// ji ltar sa gzhi gshin pa la// brten nas sa bon btab pa las// 'bras bur smin par gyur pa yis// 'tsho bar byed par srog 'dzin ltar// chos nyid kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// dam tshig 'di la brten nas ni// dngos grub lo tog smin pa yis/
24a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o// bslab pa 'di yi dam tshig ste// bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin du// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// ji ltar cang shes kyi ling dag/ sdom byed sgrog gis bcings gyur pa// bkrol byas bde blag kyang 'gyur na// ci la'ang thogs
24a6(rnying rgyud): med 'gro ba ltarare// sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di// mi shes bcings pas bcings gyur pa// rnam grol thos pa'i sgo mo yis/ shes rgyud kun grol thogs med 'gro// 'di ni mi shes rgyud 'grol ba'i// bcing bar bya ba 'gro ba ste// chung nas dgrol
24a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i bslab pa ru// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// ji ltar ri mthon rtse mo la// sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na// ma sar phyin cing rkyenon pas// yul khams rtogs shir lam la mkhas// de bzhin shes rab mthon rel// spyod mi lug par mnyan
24b1(rnying rgyud): bsams na// kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin// mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do// don la mkhas par bya ba de// phul du dbyung bdi bslabapa te// shes rab chen pa 'di dag pa// goms par bya rab tu gces// dper na rung ba khung rtsol ba// kun du 'jan
24b2(rnying rgyud): cing byung nas ni// rang gi 'jal khung gang yin par// nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar// ral 'byor don gyi rjes tshol ba// smo niHyod bstan te bkra// lha sgor 'jun cing brtags bsngar na// mnor nges pa'i dbu ma pa// cho don kyi
24b3(rnying rgyud): byed// sgos kun nas bskur ba yaM// bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin te// goms par bya ba rab tu gceg// ji lta rgyal rigs kya byung ba// mang po'i da ldan pon bskabs te// 'khor lo chog sa rin chen byed// dran la dbang ltar thob pa ltar/
24b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba// chos kyi dbang por dpon bstabs te// phyag rgya la sogs rtags chen gyis// rim par kun gyi thog mar 'gro// 'di ni dbang gi khyab par te// sa la rim par 'byung ba 'i// rtsal gyis bgrod cing 'brang ba'i mthag/
24b5(rnying rgyud): par bya ba rab tu btses// ji ltar glang po zur 'dzag pa// tshe mtsho ma chags rdzogs yod med par// dga' 'dzi ma rjes sun khrod tshul gyis// me ldog pa ro ba tsun pa sbyar// na'i 'byor nges par spyod pa'i sgo// brtul 'gru tsha'i chur dag pa/
24b6(rnying rgyud): chen spong ba'i grong tshul gyis// chags thogs med par dor ba'o// bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin no// spyod pa'i bslab pa dam pa ni// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// ji ltar khyud chen mkha'i lding ba// gshog pa'i rtsol gyis nam 'phang gtsad
24b7(rnying rgyud): grog tu bung mtha' yas kyang // gshog rlabs 'og tu kun chung ltar// rnal 'byor mnyam nyid mkhar lding ba// theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang // mnyam pa chen po'i don gyis ni// ltang phang rlabs kyis theg gcad pa'o// 'di ni ri dong dogs pa la/
25a1(rnying rgyud): chom gcad bang lta ba ste// don la sems kyis blta ba s+ho// bslab pa 'di dag goms pa gces// dper na nam/ nga lan me// Am+b+ha dang zla lan sgrub smrabs// sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsnga lta kun// drAH btums blangs
