25a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ de btsun nal gyur ga/ na byu par dag// gnas pa da mas 'ad ga// te ma'i su thas nubu seM da / 'di kyang 'drid dam pade// nyams ma pa kyigs
25a3(rnying rgyud): 'i las// 'drin pa dbya btug ci re// de ltar thun pa bu dang rjes/ na rig se du dru bsan// gyur gyi du gamed pa'i ming// 'i mas can pa rdzogs pas// ga pas ma sbyin kyang mi 'gru te// bshig na dgas
25a4(rnying rgyud): mis// tshogs med kyi na'i tshul gyis na// 'byung bas sA ni sbeng kyis 'gyu ltar// ni la b+h+yo d+ha na po 'dron sgrub pa// kun gAN+DI gnas 'gyur man dgra dang // yang dag mi ldan pas kyang ni// dka' bo rgyadakyang 'gyung yid// mas kyi gas
25a5(rnying rgyud): sus mthong ga// de dag man ngag ldan pa ste// 'dod pa'i doni mchog gang yi na pa// de dag tshigs med rtse nas 'brug don nams smrab pa gang byed pa// man drug can gyis 'grag pa gyur// don rnams 'grub par 'gyu bya ye// bslabs
25a6(rnying rgyud): 'ang+ge drug gyu // du ba na // 'dzun/ drI wa la d+ha 'gro byed na// phul gyi rnam pa mtha' las kyab// brjo pa'i lam gnas gcig las med// de bsnyen pa ma myos me khyen pa'aM// brgyad khri ng+ge ni dzub bas /
25a7(rnying rgyud): shri shing drang ci cig na / bam pa'i na / denanam sdug tu byed pa dra// 'aslab pang bya byeng byu na/ nges par bcig las med pa'i phyir/ 'di dag gosas par bya ma yin// slo ba ma ma gro sa byung
25b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te// lobs pas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// sngags kyi yon tan chen po pang // rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni// thams cad thams cad byam rtsod// rkyen gyi grangs kyi spyod
25b2(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa skye// dper na nam mkha' rgya mtsho'am// ji ltar me dpung rgyal po 'dra// de yang de yul che chung gi// khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin// rgyal lo de ya byed par gyis// dbang phyur byi ba'i khams rnams la// tshe chung
25b3(rnying rgyud): pa yod pa yin// rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang // thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang // bab tshod thad du 'jug pa ste// dper na gleng chen chur 'jug pa// rab dang glang chen pa bami bab// de yang rtsal sprid de gzhan gyis// la la thang du gcod pa la/
25b4(rnying rgyud): la la bsegs su 'gro ba yin// la la chung zhig bshad thabs 'phro// de ltar rnal 'byor chu nyid na// 'bras bu'i don la ba'achod kyang // rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis// ji ltar nus tshad der ldang khyer// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang /
25b5(rnying rgyud): dang go las rtog pa dang // spyog dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang // dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang // lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur rnams// thams cad gcig las med na yang // grangs dang dbye ba'i bye brag rnams// snod kyi rtsal drang sbyar nas ni// chos
25b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kun gzhir gcig pa 'o// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur rnam po lngaste// byi brag pa mya sa saswA dr-i// gzhi hrI rgyu pa~M kun+d+re ga ni dang // sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi dang // snang ba drerje kyi kun bzhi dang // 'gyur ba med pa'i kun gzhi dang // btsal med
25b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i kun gzhi lnga// skabs lnga dag tu gnas 'gyur bas// se yi khyad par bgrod pa yin// de yang gnyis kyi chos 'di dang // kun kyang yongs kyis rnal 'byor dang // 'gro don gsum gyis 'gro ba de// dge don dang ni sgrub pa bo// rig 'dzin rjes
26a1(rnying rgyud): // ni rdzogs pa yin// des na rtsal gyi khyad par gyis// dang po las kyi rnal 'dror pa// sogs pa ri na klong chung ngu rnams// dang rang rtsa ba pyo nas ni// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnam myong la// phyogs pa dpang ranA@
26a2(rnying rgyud): spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa// sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang // bsnol ba'i yul ni chad pa yin// nor yang dmas pa// rang skal 'tsho ga'i ched byor nas// rgyal po thob pa kyis la phang mtho ba'i// longs spyod mel dmigs
26a3(rnying rgyud): bcas kyang // de dag me 'thob 'tsho bral bzhin// ska la ldan can gyi don 'di dang // skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dga'o// tshogs gter gyi khang pa dag/ rgyal po'i mdzon du gyur pas na// spyod spro 'jug pa thams cad kyang // dpa chub kyi
26a4(rnying rgyud): bar gyis// rin chen sna dgu'i rim pa dang // so so'i las thabs mtho dman gyis// yul de gcig las med na yang // yig tshang sgo dgu so sor spyod// rgyal por gyur na de kun la// dbang sgyur byed pa'i bdag po yin// mi gnas chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /
26a5(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i yul du gyur pa na// reg partsal gyi khyad par gyis// blta yul gci gra las med na yang // so so 'jug sgo kun nas spyod// dbyings kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la// rtswal 'phung mtho do man khyad par gyis// sras kyi gdang du rtsi bltar// sa dang theg
26a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyad par du// mtho dman rim par snang ba yin// mnyam par gyur pa'i gzhi gcig la// mthun dang me mthun don gyis ni// dper na khang pa sgo mangs bzhin// sa dang theg pa so so'i sgo// mi mthun so sor snang ba yid// so so theg pa'i sgornams
26a7(rnying rgyud): la// 'jug pa la sogs ma sbyangs kyang // kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bcad pas// gcig ste tha dad yongs kyis med// don ri dang lhun pong ma// kun du rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar // mthong thos spyon pa'i khyad par ni// don gyis de ltar yod pa yin// nges
26b1(rnying rgyud): rnams bsus rung// ma' gangs 'ad 'anas pa// na bral du ru sa rgyad// ban phyi ba shes par bya// 'di ltar zhes ba dpa 'byong pa// pa cwo 'byas la ma lags ste// bya spyod las tha bdangs
26b2(rnying rgyud): pade rnyed grub pa'o// rnyed pa'i lam nyi gang zhe na// rnal phyir spyod pa sa yin te// sa tu ma kyis bzod bya'i phyir// sa yi khyad par bshad par rje// 'di yi gnas 'dri spyod pa'i sa// rnam pa bcu phrab gi rjeg gis phyogs//
26b3(rnying rgyud): sa/ comam 'asnyen po pa dang // chu byags dang thos pa dang // dge 'a 'dun pa rnal ste// 'a ga sang dang banas pa yis// kur du 'khor zhing myi ngas // 'dun pa sems pa'i nab 'byong ba// gnas
26b4(rnying rgyud): gas te// bden pa 'i po da pa// dang bas rten pa 'byur dang / bras ba da sa ba pa// dag dang mngog dus ma'o bras dang / pa'i sanas bshad/
26b5(rnying rgyud): gas can skye // dge ma gan las rgyams / kyang byung ba chub/ gsad pa
26b6(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i rjod// dzizhin rtags rten gragro ba dang // thob pa da bdun pa ste// rnam 'byong rnam pa drug podag/ bzlab pa'i gnas brgya na ma byin cing // ji ltar bya ba la gAsal brgyan// bskab pa sa shes 'dre // de
26b7(rnying rgyud): sa pas 'jug pa sa nas pa das// ngan ming mju gnani pa dus du gyi dri nga nga nga byin pa'i bya// brgya byinapa na na mchub sa du
27a1(rnying rgyud): gnas shing spyod pa'i sngags bshad// bstod na pas gter gyis 'di la// spyod pa rgyun gyirna la 'byor nyid// mas pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas// rtsal can blo la ba skye gnas sa// bslab pa'i mtha' 'du ba sa// bsten pas byung
27a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'dri la// dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rigs rjen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs tshe// nges par spyod dang rna la chen skyong // yul la 'jug dang rig par sbyor// bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste// bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras 'di bcu la// gom sa
27a3(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor// ngal bso bal thams cad mthong // mi ldogs la goms byar med// 'di dag sbyor ba gzhi gcig kyang // so so thun mong ma yin pa'i// sgrib las zhes myi byed cing // ye shes re re 'char ba'o// des na bslab pa'i mtha'
27a4(rnying rgyud): gcig la// mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams// mnyam pa la bzhag re re la// ye shes re re 'char ba ste// tha ma rang byung nyid kyis rdzogs// mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang // mi ldog rnams la rim pa bzhin// rmi lam dag dang rten dang //
27a5(rnying rgyud): sum nges paci rigs par// rnal 'byor rdo rje bral tho ba// do ni rnon che ge mo// zhes ni ning dngas khams dang // myid khams kun du bsgrags byas nas// rnal 'byor lung rab ston pa'o// dmigs pa'i 'brang bu kyi 'dril// grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal
27a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor che// nges par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor gsum// rgyal ba'i thugs las rgyal skyes shing // rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tsho ba pa// khyad par rtsa lnga 'phang kun rdzogs shing // ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o// gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la// tshogs chen
27a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs// gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste// phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po// mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug pa// rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs pa'o// bdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la// rol pa
27b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan min la 'byor dang // bde ba rje dang thig ler rdzogs// gsum nyid du ni rdzogs pa la// yul don ye shes de myur ba// shes par byas pas rnams cad rdzogs// sgyu ma 'ang d+ha mdzod sprod pa// rdzogs pa snang mi bas 'dren// bcu yi zlu ma dang
27b2(rnying rgyud): las// mthar rdzogs kun gyi chog len te// klong yangs nam mkha'i snying po la// sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal// tsi raM snang ci yang ma yin pa// mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo ma// ci stir bltas dbu der sbyar ba// thig mchog sbyi rgya'i rlabs kyis bcad// de yang lha
27b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i khyad par gyis// bdag nyid chen po'i rgyal 'byor dang // wu na gyis klub dang klong langs chub// gsu rdzogs dang byeng bdal pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor stod pa'i lam// rnal byor chen gyi skye bgro par bya// gzhin yang 'dus pa'i rnal dbyar nam //
27b4(rnying rgyud): don sa rjes ni tshol 'don na// tshig 'grang thos btsu ma sbyi nA~M/ tshig pa'i 'du shes ma skyed rje // lding kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi// yang dag don la rdul mi 'amyod// spyod pa 'gyur bar byen mong ste// yang dag don du yongs sngar// chags sdad las la
27b5(rnying rgyud): zhen mod kyi// dam pa'i don la yong ma zhen// longs spyod rgyu mer byed mod kyi// chos nyid don gyi ro ma tshor// bdag mod phyogs bral zer mod kyi// nyon mongs la dang yod ma dral// brtul zhugs rtog pa choms mod kyang // gzung 'dzin rtog pa yong ma
27b6(rnying rgyud): choms// dI bas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// thos pa tshig go sgron ma yis// yang dag don gyi gser btsal na// rtogs 'dod spreru 'di bzung nas kyang // rkun ma b+ha la btags byas te// gse khung skar khung kun dgug cing // khang stong phang phung
27b7(rnying rgyud): bsheg nas ni// rgyal po'i dkor mdzod la sbyin// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin// pa dag don gyi la mtshal na// rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya// rtog pa dgas pa'i ri bo dang // mtshan ma rgya batshong ba dang // skyeng tshong dron lnga bsal bar bya//
28a1(rnying rgyud): rtog pa lnga ga gnyis yod de// drugapa dang byung da// dang zhan pa tsu pardzun dug tas// mdzang ngag nyis// dbazhan nor ba gsal mi gas pa/ dganyis pa nga ba pa // myang da ni sgyum 'ang du/
28a2(rnying rgyud): don la sgrib pa po// rtog pa chen po'i gegs chen yid// ci phy-ir don de mi mthong phyir// mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang // kun du 'thibs dang srin phung dang // na mun lta bu bsgribs pa yis// yang dag mi gas la mthong ma 'gyur// 'od la bye zag
28a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis gnyis te// mun pa mun nag chen po dang // bran nas 'thabs pa lce bu dang // kun du 'khregs dang bsgribs pad // 'thi shid chen po rlung ngu ba nyis// sprin chen 'bribs dngu' la rol dang // dathun gtams dang ben bun gyis// gnas ngan gsumad
28a4(rnying rgyud): mi'i gnas dang // 'dod khams bzhi yi lha gnas dang // gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal gnas su lhung // ltung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon chen ni// mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba rnam drug yin// rang bzhin yul la g.yeng ba dang //
28a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin phyi rol g.yeng ba dang // nang dang mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba dang // yid la byed dang gnas ngan len// 'di dag rab tu bsal bar bya// bsal nas don la mnyam bzhug che// mnyam pa'i don la sgrib pa'i skyon// rnam pa lnga 'byung 'di lta ste// byang
28a6(rnying rgyud): dbang gis g.yeng ba dang // byi dmugs dbang gis 'bebs pa dang // 'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa dang // ther zug dbang gis rtog pa dang // phyal ba'i dbang gis med pa ste// 'di ni mnyam pa'i skyon yin no// skyon chen de dag glan pa'i tshas// sems
28a7(rnying rgyud): kyi lon 'di rgyal bas bshad// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rnam par me tog don tshol na// gcig pu dben pa'i sa gzung ste// tshad ma gsum dang ldan pa'i blos// rnam par rtog pa'i rjes gcad do// yod med sngon thog ga las kyang // btags
28b1(rnying rgyud): klu smras ba smra/ / na na/
28b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa des/ de gyur// ma rnyed na na
28b3(rnying rgyud): gyu / bA shi / nga gsan // nga N+Di
28b4(rnying rgyud): gas cwag/ demyu pa sa myang bste/ na/ nam ni pa
28b5(rnying rgyud): nga pa gtsugs partan 'dru ba la// sems nyid sbyi m+b+has bas yod mye las thos/ m+b+ha zhes pa'i / 'dod 'ams lta pa gyu 'gyur/ / mad par das padam/ da kyis chub yis pa/
28b6(rnying rgyud): stegs ngas 'gyur// byad thugs ni drim gyu bas// dudu shes bar ltung mi 'gyur// 'dzi she rjes sum 'brangs pado// sem na gnas srid mi 'khod// bcug zhi'i don lagasasu bas ni// tan thos gnasas / 'i chung //
28b7(rnying rgyud): shes myangs du sa da 'do sa
29a1(rnying rgyud): na dun na na na smra/ su na /
29a2(rnying rgyud): du med pa'i chos nyid ni// bsam du med papa de bzhin gzhag/ rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid pa// sems kyi kyi nad skad cig mas// mig pa rgyun tu dran par bya// de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na// rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung // drod dang nags
29a3(rnying rgyud): dang cho 'phrul dang // mngon shes dang ni ye shes 'byung // drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang // rtag pa ni byung dang brtan pa dang // cho 'phrul byung dang rdzogs pa dang // rig pa phra mo thams cad gsal// des ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin// dper na mun pa
29a4(rnying rgyud): sangs pa dang // snang ba byung dang nam mkha' dang // kun du mthong dang thams cad gsal// de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni// bag chags mun pa kun bsal te// ji ltar rlung gis smen phyags ltar// skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis// sgrib pa'i
29a5(rnying rgyud): phung po 'phyag par 'gyur// ji ltar mar mes mun bas lan// mun nyid snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin// skad cig ma yi don rig pas// ston nas bsags pa'i mun pa sel// de ltar reg pa'i skyes bu ni// dan la reg pa'i sgra rgyu zhing //
29a6(rnying rgyud): mig dang dri ldan pas// mthong zos tshig lde'u tshig bzhir bsdebs// swa pa yin pas don la spyod// chos kyi mig dang bldan na// mu mtha' las pa'i tshig rnams kyis// don gyi tha skad ci brjod kyang // nor ma nor gyi don mi dpogs/ sa kyi blo brangs
29a7(rnying rgyud): dmu rgod de// bslab pa'i sa dang lam pa yin// tshig don 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang // gzhan la ston par ma byed cig/ bsten na rdo rje bka' thun de// dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// gang dag tshus 'chos mkhan dag gi// don la blo shed ma bye bar//
29b1(rnying rgyud): mig dang li ges khrid nas ni// ma shes bzhin du chos bstan na// sems can thams cad srog phrogs pas// me shes chos ston de bas lci// de bas mnyam pa'i don 'di la// bstan te cig car 'jug shes na// bsgom pa'i yun ni ring thung dang // las
29b2(rnying rgyud): 'phro yod dang med pa dang // nam grub snyam pa'i khar ma lus// mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhug na// de ma thag tu rig pa 'char// mnyam pa'i don las ma g.yos na// gzugs khams gnas su de mi ltung // mnyam pa nyid la ma chags na// gzugs med khams
29b3(rnying rgyud): su ltung mi 'gyur// mnyam nyid mngon du gyur pas na// nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung // ci yang med pa'i don mthong na// sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya// des ni ting 'dzin khyad par 'di// rnal 'byor can gyis 'dris par bsgom// thams cad mi rtog skye med
29b4(rnying rgyud): cing // rtog pa'i mtha' spangs nam mkha'i dbyings// ji bzhin mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid// mtshan ma'i rtog pa yul las 'das// yul med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems// nyi ma stong gi dkyil 'khor shar// mtshan
29b5(rnying rgyud): ma'i chos rnams kun la khyab// nyi ma 'bar ba snying po las// 'od zer yig 'bru'i mchog tu gsal// thams cad 'byung ba'i yi gri a// cir yang 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'byung // de yang rtsal gyi khyad par
29b6(rnying rgyud): las// dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang // thos dang mthong ba la sogs te// sems kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par// rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur lcig// yan lag yi ge so so yi// rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig
29b7(rnying rgyud): bcas// 'phro 'du tshad kyang phyag rgya'i// chom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhin no// 'di ni dang po'i 'jug rims te// mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o// yi ge'i ye shes las sbyin te// don byed pa dang phyag rgyar skyed// rgya mtsho gnon dang nam mkha' /
30a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas// rlung kyang ba dang rgyan bzlog drung // bsreg pa'i bskab pa gzhal ba dang // ti d+ha gon dang 'jig rten 'a// nga la 'jam dbang rab dgas// stong gsum grangs 'brur 'jug rdul dang // gzhig dang spang ba la sags te// bas
30a2(rnying rgyud): bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa// goms pa las su rung ba yi// rnal 'byor rgyal chen spyod par zad// bzlas pa mthar gyin grub pa dang // bcing ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang // bsam pa las su rung ba dang // don mthong ba dpa tshis grub pa// bya ba yongs su dag pa dang /
30a3(rnying rgyud): do gcig yul la sa sor snang // des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang // dbyings nyid gcig le sgom mod kyi// rnal 'byor rdzas kyi khyad par gyis// bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te// dang po'i sa la gnas pa yi// brtsam pa las kyi rnal 'byor pa// 'dun
30a4(rnying rgyud): pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byo na ma drug so// shes rab rtsal pa 'phang ngams pas// ting na rtsal phung chung ba ste// don la mthong bar mi 'gyur te// rang gi mos pa'i sgra zluman// lha yis pan gang yin pa// ba dog mon
30a5(rnying rgyud): nas ni// pA lI dbugs la r+b+ha byas te// dbugs kyi gra mu du byar tshad du// thung bsgril par 'gyegs la bA las// 'gro 'dra'i gnas su bskrad par bya// rang gi rtag tshad dang snang ba'i// spu yi khyon yang de tsam mo// gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa le/
30a6(rnying rgyud): bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni// sa bon rang bzhin yi ge waM// 'od zer 'bar bar bcas pa de// dri byung yul ni tshun chad du// 'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las// rang gi
30a7(rnying rgyud): chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i// sku yi khyod yang de tsam mo// gsum pa'i ba la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor lung gi bka' bsngolas// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gsum po// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod// sgra yi sa bon gang yin pa/ @
30b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin sa gar shAd+hA thA te// 'od zer 'bar dang brgyas pa phyis// thos pa'i sbrul ni rgyud zad du// bzla 'dugasal bar byub pa pas// rang gi chag cang pa'i bsgyur rnam// wu la khyon par datsam mo// de bzhin napa 'byor rim bya hrIn// b+ha lI khyad pa /
30b2(rnying rgyud): gang yin pa// piM gri'i rim pa bzhin byas nas// 'phro 'du'i tshad kyang de bzhin te// rim pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang // 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang // sems kyi lcogs tshadang tshun chad du// sku yi khyon gyi khyad par yang // chos kyi dbyings kyi ma
30b3(rnying rgyud): byas par// sku yi khyon gyis gang par bsgom// gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// yi ge'i rjes su don dpag pa na// yi ges don rnams ston par 'gyur// ji phyir don nyid yi ger snang // dbyings las a byung a las ni// yi ge'i
30b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs byung sna tshogs 'bros// a ni rang bzhin yi ge skye// rten dang bral bas rgyu rkyen med// brdu la khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra// a ni chos nyid cho 'phrul te// chos nyid zab mo'i ngang las ni// cho 'phrul yi ge a byung bas// as ni chos nyid mtshon
30b5(rnying rgyud): par byed// a las yig 'bru'i tshogs 'phros te// tshig/ tshogs bstan pa rgya mtshor grags// yi ge'i sgraskad kun bzung ste// sna tshogs yi grwa'i skad du 'asgyur// pheg 'brub na lab mang po rnams// rang bzhin a bI dang du 'dus// thugs kyi grong nas
30b6(rnying rgyud): byung bas// a li 'od zer 'phro 'du las// mgur gyi byasang bar shar ba las// gsungs yi ge ltar 'thos pa// a/ ka kha ka byung // de nas yi l-i 'od zer de// lcags kyi chu bum pa d+hA 'bros// lcags kyis nI la du khyil bya las//
30b7(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru ljang shar ba// tsa d+hI ta/ de nas a laM 'od zer de// ljags kyi rtsal 'phros pa las// 'od zer yig 'bru bcur shar ba// rba ShA NAr+thAH/ ta thad d+ha naM/ do nas a yi 'od zer de// zhal gyi sprinas 'phros pa las// cho 'phrul yi sa
31a1(rnying rgyud): sha ga// bab bat+tas// de nas a 'i 'od zer de// phyi rol yul du 'bros pa las// cho 'phrul yi ge sgra tshogs 'thos// ya wa ra la sha Sha sa h+yak+Sha// a AM u.A e maM o oM oM aH/ a lAmra rdzo phrul 'od 'phros pas/
31a2(rnying rgyud): ge'i phreng ba chog byung ste// ya~M ge'i yan lag ye shes la// spangs rgyas sku yis bor byung // dpag tu med pa rgyal ba rnams// sgra dang gsung thugs sprul pa'i tshigs// phyag rgya sa migs mdzes par snang // des na yi ge'i rang bzhin ni// rgyal ba
31a3(rnying rgyud): spu nyid yin parabashad// a ni thugs kyi sa bon te// ka la sogs pa dang po lnga// mgur gyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yin// gnyis pa tsa la sogs pa lnga// zlag ma ljags kyi rang bzhin yin// gsum pa TA la sogs pa bcu// ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang
31a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin yin// bzhi lnga pa la sogs pa lnga// zhal gyi spros las byung bar bshad// lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi// bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag/ mA las 'phros par rab tu bshad// zhabs kyi 'khor mo'i 'od zer las// sgrib pa skyeg pa'i yig 'jug//
31a5(rnying rgyud): gsang pa'i myaba' yi 'od zer las// cho'i phrul dbyung ba'i yig 'braSh+Ta/ prA pa~M na na pran zungs// 'dod 'byung ba'i yin 'thuhA// thugs gang 'khyil pa'i dbul pheM ru las// mtshan ma dag pa yig 'bru shA// phyag gi 'khor ba'i 'od /
31a6(rnying rgyud): rgyo 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'gyu Ta// skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las// rnyog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'phrul// rjes kyi na po'i rda phur la sa// 'dod chags sreg pa'i yi ger// skyes su chen po mang bu skabs las// ga ti mug sel ba'i yi ge wa// skye rkyen
31a7(rnying rgyud): bar byon pa las// 'khor ba gnon pa'o leg 'phrul// skyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las// zhin pag oM gnyis shA // skyes na po'i gnyis las// rang btsun gyi gre u gnyis shing // skyes bu chen po'i shangs btis las// rang bzhin
31b1(rnying rgyud): sha drag// bAHsa// nas ma 'i 'ad bar de// bya la ltu gas pa'as/ smyan na gan 'anas// 2 ba ga/ sa t+yA// ma A san+ta nga ma ma ma ya.aH/ a rlo rjod 'as pas/ @
31b2(rnying rgyud): nyid yin par/ shrId// a ni thugs kyi sa bon te// ka la sogs pa dang po lnga// mgur gyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yin// gnyis pa tsal sogs pa lnga// b+hag ma lhags kyi rang bzhin yin// gsum DU l+ya sogs pa badz+ra// ljags kyi nu mo nga
31b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin yin// bzhi pa pa la sogs pa lnga// zhal gyi spros las byung bar bshad// lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi// bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag/ mA las 'phros par rab tu bshad// zhabs kyi 'khor mo'i 'od zer las// sgrib pa sgeg pa'i lcig /
31b4(rnying rgyud): 'a pa mas na/ / ngon pa ldan shug+sa/ ra
31b5(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo 'phrul ston pa'i lag tu rmA Ta// skyes batshon pa'i dpung pal / rdzog pa'i rnams pa'i log // sa rgyan po'i mung las// 'ding chags theg pa'i yi sher// da pong dasus pas las// ga ti mugasel ba'i yi she la// skye
31b6(rnying rgyud): ba byin palas/ la bag dan rgyas kya kyis rgyas nyis so phyog sa sros bre kyi thob rgyas kyi shus kyi
32a1(rnying rgyud): sgra skad sna tshogs dang // yi ge'i gzugs su bstan nas ni// 'khor ba'i khams su snang bar byed// ci'i phyir zhe na ya ga ni// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid pin te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te// thugs rje'i rang bzhin
32a2(rnying rgyud): yin pas na// bams kyi bye brag snga tshogs kyis// thams cad bral phyir mdzad pa'o// de bzhin pa gA'i rdzogs 'di yang // yan lag sbyor dra sna tshos skyes// rnams ga tsug ng+gA byed// yi ge rang bzhin gyi shes ni// sa ma'i dod rnam
32a3(rnying rgyud): bshad par bya// a ni ma skyes ye shes yin// rang bzhin thas pa dzad stong ba ston// kA ni d+hA b+ha'i ye shes te// la sa gyis rnams kya grol bA b+h+yo // kha ni khyam bar byed pa'i so// ni dmigs thams cad stsol bar ston// gni doran du gyur ba'i sgra/
32a4(rnying rgyud): yul med thams cad grol bar ston// b+ha ni gnas pa'i sgo yin te// gcig tA ma nges grol bar ston// nga ni 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo// 'dzin grol thams cad grol bar ston// tsa ni 'gag pa med pa'i 'o// ra yang sna bas thams cad grol/
32a5(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba med pa'i sgo// 'bral ba med pas thams cad grol// dza na ma byung ba yi sgo// mi gnas pas ni thams cad grol// spyo rtog ma bral ba'i sgo// drim dgra pas thams cad grol// ha ni snod dang bral ba'i sgo// bya ba med pas thams cad grol/
32a6(rnying rgyud): ning rgyal med pa'i skye// ri bo med pas thams cad grol// dzA ni b+han la myed pa ma// byed pa med byas thams cad gro/ ni 'breb pa men / rjod pa med pas ma grong // slab med pa // sgyu ma rnams cad slob par byed/
32a7(rnying rgyud): ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo// 'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol// ta ni tha spyad med pa'i sgo// brjod pa med pas thams cad grol// thani rten dang bral ba'i sgo// gnas pa 'ad pas thams cad grol// da ni gtor dang bral ba'i sgo// len pa med pas
32b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad grol// d+ha ni rang bzhin med pa'i 'o// mtshan nyid med pas thams cad rdol// na na yul dang bral ba'is+ho// 'dzin pa me pyas thams cad gral// ba ni nges byur 'byung ba na mo// 'gag pa myed pas thams cad gro pa// bzhi dngos po med
32b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo// ci yang med pas thams cad grol// ba ni brjod pa med pa'i sgo// brjod pa med pas thams cad grol// d+ha ni rdul dang bral ba'i sgo// rtog pa med pas thams cad grong // ma ni chags pa med pa'i sgo// rtag pa med pas thams cad grob// yan
32b3(rnying rgyud): chags pa med pa'i sgo// gos pa med pas thams cad grol// wa ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i sgo// 'bras bu med pas thams cad grol// ra ni rkyen dang bral ba'i sgo// dor ba med pas thams cad grol// la ni blang ba med pa'i sgo// yon tan med pas thams cad
32b4(rnying rgyud): grol/ sha ni smos pa med pa'i sgo// zhi bas thams cad dgrol bar byed// ShA ni khu dang bralta ba'i sgo// lci ba med pas thams cad krol// sa ni yang dag gsang ba'i sgo// nges pas thams cad grol bar byed// ha ni n+ya dang bral pa'i sgo// rkyen dang bral
32b5(rnying rgyud): bas grol bar byed// a ni khams dang bral ba'i sgo// mtshan nyid med pas grol bar byed// i ni mthong ba med pa'i sgo// gzugs dang bral bas thams cad grol// u ni thos pa med pa'i dro// sgra dang bral bas thams cad grol// e ni tshor ba med pa'i
32b6(rnying rgyud): sgo// dri dang bral bas grol bar byed// oM ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo// reg dang bral bas thams cad grol// oM ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i sgo// cir yang snang bas thams cad grol// mya ngan spadas dang 'khor ba'i chos// yod mthong snang grags chos
32b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad// yi ge'i tshogs su mngon sangs rgyas// yi ger ma gyur gang yang med// chos nyid snying po'i nyi ma la// 'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogs su 'bar// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la// yig 'bru sna tshogs phra bkod pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i
33a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdzogs// nyi ma 'bang ba 'od ra las// 'od kyi 'bang ba 'ardorje 'bur// rbarga ga 'od 'phros pasna// na byung bams can zhes// rdo ni rigs kyi zhing du grags// ta mya'i 'od zeng dran chen las// yig 'bru 'o
33a2(rnying rgyud): 'bros pas// rin chen snying po'i sa bon zhes// rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyi ma bad+mo 'bar 'phros pas// tshe 'phrul yiga'i oM du 'bar// pad+ma rigs kyi zhing du grags// sna tshogs nyi ma'i 'od 'phros pas// cho 'phrul li ge ha ra gsapa bas/
33a3(rnying rgyud): chogs snying ba sa so ste// las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grags// dus gsu sa rgyal ba thams cad ci// thugs nirdo rje ye shAs yin// ye shes dam pas phul pa li// rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la// rdo rje rigs zhes bya bar bshad// yo tan ye shes
33a4(rnying rgyud): rkyen yin// rin rkyen de las sprul ba 'i// rgyal ba dag tu med pa la// don chen grus zhes bye ba ba shed// gsung gi so shis 'a ste// madz+ra bye las sprum pa / bdapag tu med pal/ hU~M srin gyi zhing dgrags// phrin las rgya
33a5(rnying rgyud): ga ste// sna rdzogs ye shes spel pa bi// rgyal ba dpag tu med pa'o// pus kyi rigasu zhes bya bar ba shad+tha// thA hU~M me bcos de bzhin nyi // de bzhin gyi hUM le shes pa// sprul pa rdu la ba dpag med la// de bzhin rigs zhes bye bar bshad// de bas rigs
33a6(rnying rgyud): kyi gtan chags ni// ma bcos sku ni de bzhin nyid// mi 'gyur rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs// yon tan kun 'byung rin che ni rigs// chags med gsung gi pad+mo de rigs// byang byed pa las kyi rigs// sku yi sprul pa thams cad ni// de bzhin rigs kyi gdung chud
33a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// thugs las sprul ba'i sangs rgyas ni// rdo rje rigs kyi gdu byed 'dzin// yon tan tshul gyi sangs rgyas rnams// rin chen rigs kyi gdung chud 'dzin// gsung pas sprul pa'i sangs rgya rnams// pang rigs kyi gdung rgyu dzin// mdzod
33b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// phrin las rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin// ci phyir rigs zhes bya zhe na// dang po de las byung ba dang // bar du de yi bya ba byed// tha mar de yi rgyud 'dzin phyir// de phyir rigs zhes grags pa yin// dper na me dang chu dag dang // nam
33b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' dang ni sa dag la// gnas pa'i sems can mtha' dag kun// gnas rgyan nyid kyi ming 'dzin de// me la gnas pa'i sems can la// me yi yi dgas ma zhes zer// tshul gnas pa'i sems can la// chu srin tra ran zhes zer// ci phyir lnga zhes bya
33b3(rnying rgyud): zhe na// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad la// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang // mdzad pa phrin las nyid dang lnga// rig pa lnga dang lnga nyid du// thams cad kun tu gsal bar snang // des na lnga zhes nges par bshad// ci phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kun//
33b4(rnying rgyud): lnga po de las ma gtogs pa// gzhan las byung zhing gzhan na med// sangs rgyas mtshan gyi khyad par yang // mtshan med pa las mtshan btags pa// thams cad lnga po nyid las btags// mtshan gyi bye brag thams cad kun// tha snyad tsam du gdugs
33b5(rnying rgyud): par zad// rigs med pa las rigs smos pa// 'dul ba'i dbang du ltar snang yang // drang ba'i don te dngos gzhi med// ci yang med las ci snang ba// mkha' la 'ji tshon byung ba 'dra// chos kun nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes// gsang ba mchog gi bdag
33b6(rnying rgyud): pos bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam mata mi pa yin// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// 'khor ba med cing chos nyid med// dmigs pa med de mi dmigs med// de ltar shes pa mkhas pa yin// rig dang ma rig tshul gcig ste// de ltar shes pa rgyal
33b7(rnying rgyud): ba yin// sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sems can te// sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa yin// de ltar shes pa rgyal pa'i sras// byang chub phyir ni gang ma brnyes// ma brnyes gang yang de ma brnyes// brnyes pa med pa'i
34a1(rnying rgyud): don mthong// don nas na// gzhan ya pa pa/ 'dod// n+d+ha chu sasan// / ma // mganasas pa ldan tu
34a2(rnying rgyud): lam gyi rgyal mkhas par bya// bgacigs sa sa dpapa kho dro ba kyang / nam mda' da rje dang zhes nges pami/ mas pa te togs thun/ mapa med tu ma mtshan
34a3(rnying rgyud): bamyigs pa'i rgyun sa ma/ mas khyi'i tsho 'phrul gcig tu da// rtag tu de ltar snang ba'idi// dab na sgyuma'i nga bzhin mi // sku nga drid ky-i ska nga // l+h+wa ma'i 'phrul pa dang ba bye// rtag tu ra snang ba // da
34a4(rnying rgyud): sa / rdug pa das pa satu gas de/
34a5(rnying rgyud): sa / du
34a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bul sogs sangs su na ban/ dang pa brtan par // gzugs gnapan/ sa ste// rkye dang lal rdzogs pa yis/ ma 'i snang 'gyu /
34a7(rnying rgyud): ma na ma
34b1(rnying rgyud): na // sa sa hAn ga / na
34b2(rnying rgyud): sman 'dus rig pa'i mad sa rgyal 'byor nas su 'jug pa'i phreng ste gnyis pa so// de nas su ma gsas pa dang nags ldan pa zhes bya ba'i dzin ma rnams par zhugs sa// ting ngo ben po'i byin gyi mam
34b3(rnying rgyud): pas byamam pa dag thos par gyur te/ don pa rdzogs pa'i 'bras kyi mar gyug// 'khor 'dus par gyur brnams pa nga shi sa byin pa pa' 'dzing bar gyur to// ba na rab rgyangs dzin/ bya ni
34b4(rnying rgyud): sani
34b5(rnying rgyud): da na
34b6(rnying rgyud): sha ngag tshul zhe nus pa ltas/ chen pas pa / la ma rtsor bu ma nas da ma na po dngas mnas pang gi
34b7(rnying rgyud): nga ba shig das pa'idi na mam nga'i skyes yin na nas gsus pa sa// sa chos gsu ma gro de ni gyi lu ma gas// don man ste thu gas/ 'du cig
35a1(rnying rgyud): drug su lags pas pa las sems dpa 'durnas pa/ 'artsam pa// 'du ca rnam rgyags chags sa// spyod pas sa badza dan cam shad pa chu/ gags lags shA / rnab ban nan 'dzu
35a2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor don la sbyor ba'i tshe// spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis// khams dngas na gar 'gro ba// mdo ngon tshul lngas lung bstan no// nges pa'i snga ltas byung ba yi// 'bras bu rtson gyi byed par yang // cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston par ma// de nas yang
35a3(rnying rgyud): dag bden pa 'thob// nges pa'i snga ltas rnam pa lnga// rgya li dus na 'byung 'di// chog gi brjod pa 'di lta ste// b+h+rU~M rtsal lngas kyi khyad par yang // snang baM lus kyi snga ltas dang // ngo mtshar rdzas rnyed tshul rtags dang // mtshan ma pra li mr-i lta sa dang // 'dun
35a4(rnying rgyud): pa mang po'i snga ltas kyis// 'bras bu gang dang gang 'grub pa// mtshon ma gsal bar rgyud las 'byung // dper na me yi swa ltas ni// ngu ba'i mtshan ma nus par 'byung // du ba gar byung gnas de na// me nyid yod par nges pa yin// de bzhin nu yi snga ltas
35a5(rnying rgyud): kyang // rlangs dang sngabs dang srog chags 'byung // de na chu nyid yod par nges// rlung gi lhas kyang 'di lta ste// sprin rnams rgyugacing dum bur 'chad// des na rlung chen 'byung bar nges// hU~M mtshal lo ma gang byung ba// de na gser lung yod pa skur// sna ltas
35a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'di dag gis// 'bras bu mthong man gar 'gyur ba// rdul mkhas par byas nas ni// mtshan mye'i byung de la sbrar// bar nad med pa'i bcom 'grus kyis// srog la bab kyang mi blta bar// rnal 'byor yul la 'jug pa dang // ting 'dzin rig pa'i
35a7(rnying rgyud): tsal sngags la// gnyen po kun bsten sa spangs nas// rnal 'byoras la brtson par bya// 'dis ni gdon morba ba dang // la la the tsom mi skye zhing // mdzes la zhugs the tshom med// dper na 'jig rten byis pa dag/ yun rengs ma la skye ba ltar// swa l+h+was
35b1(rnying rgyud): blang ba nga thas na// shin tu zad pas mngan pas sbyar// zhas can byung ba zad pa cag/ shan kya can pas pa dbang 'gyur// dbus smra smras mtshan marnams// shas rnas brtson par dpa' dgas// rnaH la las / khyang par bya/
35b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin drod kyi snga lhas 'byung // yang dgra bden pa'i don bstanan// ba~M skrag mi dang dga' brtse// yang dag don ladzes bcus na// 'khor ba'i chos la skyob ste// yang dag don la 'dres pa dang // rnam grangs chos la dang mi 'gyur// yang dag don nad
35b3(rnying rgyud): mthong ba ni// tshig la dga' ba mi skye zhing // don nyid nye bar 'dzin par byed// don mthong ba dang ye shes skye// ye shes smos par gyur pa dang // dngos por snang ba thams cad kun// sgyu ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur// sgyu ma tsam du shes pa la// ba
35b4(rnying rgyud): nas chos nyid don bskyas na// snang ba med pa'i don nyid ni// snang ba med par mthong bar 'gyur// snang med srid pa mthong ba'i tshe// cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung // de nyid bden pa'i snga ltas so// de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi// rdul phran 'dra ba'i mtshan ma
35b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung // de ni g.yo ba'i snga ltas so// de nas sgeg rgyu lta bur 'byung // dang po'i drod ces bya bar bshad// de nas mtsho yi rlabs ltar 'byung // bar gyi drod ces bya bar bshad// de nas rlung chen lta zur yang // thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur// tha
35b6(rnying rgyud): ma'i dz+rod ces bya bar bshad// de nas yig 'bru'i drod smos pas// char chen+da 'bab pa lta bur 'byung // dza nI thob pa'i drod ces bya// de nas mnga' la sbyin lding bzhin// t-ing 'dzin rtsal 'phang mtho bar 'gyur// dza na~M krAn+ta t+ye brtan pa'i drong // de nas
35b7(rnying rgyud): la gcig tsam du// bdag gi was ni dbang med par// mkha' la 'phar zhing 'phags par rtsol// 'di ni shin tu gsal ba'i drod// de nas sa chen g.yo ba ltar// shin tu yam yom mar mer 'byung // 'di na dang po'i rtags shes bya// de nas
36a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs na// ci ltar dmigs pa der 'grub ste// me yi skye mched der bsgoms na// me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur// mu yi skye mched der bsgoms na// chu yi skye mched nyid du 'gyur// rlung gi skye mched der bsgoms na//
36a2(rnying rgyud): gi skye mched nyid du 'gyur// yig 'bru'i skye mched der bsgoms na// yig 'bru gang ltar gsal bar 'gyur// de ltar rdzas kyi skye mched du// gang ltar bsgoms pa de ltar 'gyur// dri ni rtags chen thob pa yin// blo yi ting 'dzin byal rdzogs na// ngag
36a3(rnying rgyud): bden pa'i rtsal 'byung ste// sreg pa'i mtshan mthong ba na// zhi bar gyur cig byas pa yis// de nyid du ni zhi bar 'gyur// rgyu glang gnod pa'i rgyun byung me// ched par gyur cig brjod pa yis// de nyid rdo chad par 'gyur// rlung chen gnod pa'i rten byung
36a4(rnying rgyud): ra sa sa
36a5(rnying rgyud): ngag gis brjod byas pa// thams cad mi lus grub par 'gyur// ngag gi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na// lus kyi drod la rtsal 'byung ste// gnyid kyi rtog pa tshoms pa dang // lus kyi bzod pa thob pa ni// 'di ni dang po'i drod yin no// khams kyi zas dang bral
36a6(rnying rgyud): dang // mdangs dang dbang po gsal 'gyur ba// 'di ni gnyis pa'i drod ces bya// shing ba la lta bur yang ba dang // khams 'di mi bde mi 'byung zhing // nad kyi tshogs dang bral 'gyur ba// 'di ni drod cher bstan pa yin// khams kyi bas lam bsnyen
36a7(rnying rgyud): yang / dbang pog ni me ngas shin tu gas pa// 'dzi ting mdzud tsheng rmugs// gzhan yang lus kyis skyes ni// mnyam pa sbrel krung bcas nas ni// khra gang tsam du'abar ba dang // la ga tsam pa lo// 'di yang sgras chen rnags yin
36b1(rnying rgyud): 'anang snang ba nam ma dzu' pa// nam pas brjod da 'brub dang // rgal ma myongs la drug/ mams ma 'amag rlung bcang ba// 'di yangasanas can bu s+ho// lus pa dad na ladugasas/ cu du nga
36b2(rnying rgyud): ste// mthu yi rkyen brlabs bas ma mi khyab// gal te dgas sam 'dod pa na// suM 'am rdo'amartse ma dag/ gser dang dngul la sogs par sbyar// skams dgel chu 'byin cing // sel bdag ye sngon shing byung // de la rdzogs pa'i dgo pa
36b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar 'grub// spyod pa'i mthu dang rtsal rdzogs na// 'byor ba'i yon tan rdzogs 'gyur te// yid du 'ong ba'i nor 'byung zhing // 'dod pa'i bsams pa thams cad 'grub// rjes kyi mchog tu gyur pa yi// ngo mtshar ca
36b4(rnying rgyud): rnying par 'gyur// de dge rung ba'i snga ltas so// 'phrog du 'dra ba'i snga ltas kyang // kun gyis bkur zhing dga' ba dang // kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// thams cad 'dul zhing thams cad la// dbang ltar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// de dag snga ltas
36b5(rnying rgyud): chen po yin// mtshan ma pra li rmi lhas cing // shin tu na cher 'thung baT+Te// rnal byor can gyis shes par gyis// bgatsigs byung ba'i sgra ltas snang // rtag pa ga tsor bar 'byung ba dang // khrus chen rtag tu byed pa dang / d+hAn+da'i tshogs rnam seM ng+yas
36b6(rnying rgyud): pad// chu bo dag lus rnal ba dang // mtsho rje dag 'i rnal pa dang / kyi sbyi kyis 'azla ba dang // gzhan gyis rnam pa gang pa'i rgyu// bdag gi rdzas gas pa dang // snod phyin pas rmeg pa dang / shin tu rjod pa'i dag las/
36b7(rnying rgyud): nga su 'ag 'ag sa 'bras subyed pas 'i tes bad / dus su sa/
37a1(rnying rgyud): gzhananang nas thos pa dang // dugand dag las sos pa dang // bcangs pa dag las grol bdung // thug pa bcang par gyur pa rnams// mtshan ma bzang po'i sngaltas yin// sa rnams thob pa'i sngags na// dz+nyAn dag la 'jog pa dag/
37a2(rnying rgyud): rdul pa'i skas la 'jig pa dang // rnon shing dag pa 'dzag pa dang // gyen du shin tu 'gro ba dang // ri bo'i rtsi ba 'jog pa dang // rin chen sras la 'jog pa dang // mchod rteni dge la 'jog pa dang // namam pa'i sras la 'jog pa rnams// 'di dag don
37a3(rnying rgyud): b+his+yA ltas yin// sa rnams non pa'i hUM ltas kyang // je mngon snyed na 'dug pa dang // glang po che pazhon pa dang // seng ge dag la zhon pa dang // khrung chen meng la zhon pa dang // mchod rten pa la sbyin pa dang // ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang // nam ma
37a4(rnying rgyud): dbying san 'dug pa dang // lus las sprin phung 'byung ba dang // zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dang // nyi ma'i steng na 'jug pa rnams// rnal 'byoras la gnas pa'i rtags// sangs rgyas sras kyi ste ltas ni// rgyal po'i bka' la btags pa dang // bka'
37a5(rnying rgyud): dbang por bskos pa dang // gzhan la dbang sgyur byed pa dang // 'jig rten skyes la'i thabs pa dang // gzhan gyi sde ba dbang sdad dang // g.yul chen dag las rgyal ba dang // bdag nyid rgyal por gyur pa dang // mgo la me tog skye ba rnams// rgyal ba'i sras
37a6(rnying rgyud): su gyur pa'i ltas// chos la dbang thob snga ltas ni// glegs pa ma zab mo rnyed pa dang // de bzhin 'dri ba mang po dang // de dag la ni dpyod pa dang // gzhan la 'chad cing ston pa dang // don nyid gtan la 'bebs pa dang // me long dag la lta ba dang // shel
37a7(rnying rgyud): kyi bum pa gang ba la// lta zhing brtags te 'thung ba dang // rin chen nor bu thu he dang // 'khor lo lag tu babs pa dang // nyi zla lag pas zin pa dang // ri rang klad la skor ba rnams// chos la dbang thob snga ltas so// bden pa mthong ba'i snga ltas kyang //
37b1(rnying rgyud): sngon ma mthong gi yul mthong dang // stong gsum rgya rgyar mthong ba dang // klung rnams gzhan du byin pa dang // ri rab kha la phyin pa dang // nam mkha' rgya cher mthong ba dang // rgya mtsho'i gting du ldan pa dang // lag na sgron ma thogs pa dang // nyi ma sna
37b2(rnying rgyud): por lta ba dang // snang srid dpyod pa byed pa rnams// chos la dbang thob ltas chen yin// lung bstan thob pa'i snga ltas ni// rol mo'i sgra rnams thos pa dang // 'brug gi sgra ni grug pa dang / seng ge'i nga ro grug pa dang // chos kyi sgra yi gtam thos dang //
37b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan zhal ni 'dzum pa dang // sangs rgyas gsung thos sku mi mthong // lha mo glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang // gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung dang // grogs po grogs po zhes brjod cing // chos kyi bgro ba byed pa rnams// lung bstan 'byung ba'i snga ltas
37b4(rnying rgyud): so// de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams// lhas chen kun du snang ba dang // gang zag las kyi dang po rnams// rig 'dzin so so'i sa pa ni// 'gyur ba'i snga ltas bshad pa yin// rdul 'byor las kyi dang po la// lhas chen 'di dag gang byung yang // 'khor ba
37b5(rnying rgyud): 'dredra 'dzi kun bsal nas// don la rtogs shings rnams sbyong // des ni don la reg par 'gyur// don la rig pa'i byin brlabs kyis// rig 'dzin rdo rje re lhun gyis grub// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa dang // sa la rtsal chen skyong ba'i tshe// rtsal gyi
37b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang // ri rab rked nas gsor ba dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang // sreg pa'i bsgral pa gzhil ba la// sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kun// khyad par rgyal gyis ston par nus// de la
37b7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni cho 'phrul yin// rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni// 'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la// so so'i skad dang chos mthun par// 'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su// so so'i skad du ston par nus// de dag rjes su
38a1(rnying rgyud): sa par// sa // sa sa la ga byod// na ma sa 'as sa sugs/ gyu byu / na na/
38a2(rnying rgyud): ci'i sa
38a3(rnying rgyud): sa na
38a4(rnying rgyud): sa
38b1(rnying rgyud): shin tu gsang ba'i dam chog ni// rjod ma yin par gyur pa las// phyi nang gsang ba gsum dag tu// smra ba'i thabs su spyad nas kyang // gsang ba'i chos rnams gsang bar bya// bstan pa'i gnas med sdod ngan dag/ rnam pa bzhis bsdus bya brag rnams// ma 'ongs
38b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bcud can gyis// shes nas spang bar bya phyir bshad// 'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang // mu stegs log lha'i lha la dga'// dad med blo zhan g.yeng rmugs shing / bslab nyan mi brtson byol sor mtshungs// dad log dam nyams don las
38b3(rnying rgyud): sol// byang chub bag pa gting nas chad// sems kyi myu gu'i rtsa chog pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dam gu bsdu ba yin// sdod med kha lnga bde dag la// gsang ba'i spro bar bya ba min// sbas na de nyid kha sbub 'gyur// gsang ba'i cho sa rnams khar spa yang // gab pa gsung
38b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i don mi shes// rnon tan spa los sgrogs rnams la// gsang ba'i don rnams lhag par smra// brten sgrub gsang ba'i tshig rnams la// skal tad kyang don mi gnyer// snying po'i don gsang mi thub pa// bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin// gsang dzin
38b5(rnying rgyud): mi thubarjod ngan la// gsang ba smra bar gang byed pa// de dang snod med snod nga ni gnyis// 'khor ba'i khams su zab par mnyam// lha dang mchog sgrub pa yi// dam pa'i mdzod gsum smra zhes kyang // goms pa'i mabu med gnas ma gyur// ngan sgra phrag dag
38b6(rnying rgyud): ser sngas gdungs// bya med chos la blo gtod cing // spyod rtsing dmar la rdeng med par// rnal 'byor spyod la lnga dman zhes// zer ba pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'pho// snod ngan 'khor bar 'pho ba la// gsang ba'i don rnams smra byed pa// gsang pa nyams pa'i dang
38b7(rnying rgyud): gis na// nyams pa de dang de 'drar 'gyur// zla ngan nyams sod can lan 'dren// khags ga lce gnyis sgyur byed cing // sems la nyon mongs lnga bcangs te// chu dang sgra spyod brdzun la dga'// tshe gcig grags pa ched phyir du// gang zag phyir 'breng tshig
39a1(rnying rgyud): 'ga' la// mnyan te brjod 'dod tshul 'chos pa// log sla dug can thar ma ltung // dug can ltung ba'i snod de la// gsang ba'i dmigs rnams smra ba ni// rnal 'byor nyams pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i tha mar de ltung 'gyur// 'di
39a2(rnying rgyud): ltar pham 'gyur stod ngan la// gsang ba gsang chen la sogs pa'i// don dang rang bzhin gang yin pa// bstan kyang pham ltung gegs su 'gyur// de bas bstan par bya ba min// gal te bstan par gyur na ni// ston sgra nyan byed de dag rnams// mthong
39a3(rnying rgyud): yun phung byed gnyis skrag 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkhas gsal don ldan la// rnal 'byor mi shes gang dag gis// dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog gi// sems kyi rnam grangs ci skyed pa// de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par// 'bras bu mi bzad
39a4(rnying rgyud): byung ba 'gyur// ldas DI 'dri nan// sted bsgral bar gzing 'dug dgos// ma bas gsal don ldan gis kyang de// gor mu bzhin drungan bas ma sun// de yang gnas nga ni yi pa ste// mkhas pa des kyi rgyas// rnal 'byor dang lda ba
39a5(rnying rgyud): mthun la// ngan pa'i tshig gis sems dbugs shing // sgo srung chu dang brlang btab na// dmyal ba rdo rjer de lhung 'gye rwa// zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang // ji ltar rgya mthun de 'drar 'gyur// skal pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rtsa nyams skyon can rang bzhin
39a6(rnying rgyud): ni// ngan sems khro gtum ldan pa dang // mi zad phra men las skyong byed// gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can// byis pa'i rang bzhin glo zhe pas// shin tu dman pa'i lha sems kyis// tshul bcos mkhan la bkur bar byed// gang dag dam tshig yon tan lnga ma
39a7(rnying rgyud): la gnas shing rtag tu bzod// tshul shis don gyi gzhung rnams spong // de dag la ni 'dun pa med// dam tshig spre'u ltang spyod bzhin du// byang chub snying po thob pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'byung bar yang dgangs ma mthong // rgyal ba'i sras
39b1(rnying rgyud): gyur rnal 'byor pa// lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la// kha cig dregs dang phrag dog gis// khro spong thabs kyis spyod par byed// de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste// nams kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung // mi shes pa yi rnal 'byor pa// yang dag don dang ldan pa'i
39b2(rnying rgyud): me// rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing // longs spyod 'du 'dzi gang ldan pa'i// rjes su 'gro zhing de la 'dud// de ni log pa'i lam pa yin// rnal 'byor ltang dang byang chub khe// 'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung // zang zing nor dang g.yo sprul khe// chung yang cis
39b3(rnying rgyud): 'grub srog dang sngo// rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can// bum snod nang gi gsal ba ltar// shes rab mdzod kyi gter ldan yang // srog chags rkun mo'i sder mo ltar// khong nas gab sbas don ston la// blun po rnams kyis cing mi mthong // dper na
39b4(rnying rgyud): 'di 'drar tshul gcig ste// sras lag t+ter 'chang mi dang na// blun por myur ba'i mying ga gnas// 'grobs kyang gnyis mtshungs khyang par 'dra// tinga? 'dzi bsngags parjo byung cing // ting 'dzin da da drung nyer ba pa // yang dbya btags pa rjo byung cing //
39b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag don du gnyer ba med// dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing // dam tshig don du gnyer ba med// ji ltar 'gro gang la la dang // nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'gyur zhes// den chen ngag gi yon tan brjod// de la 'gro gang gzhan
39b6(rnying rgyud): dag gis// de ltar 'dod pa 'byung gyur na// de ltar cung zad yod dam zhes// dris kyang med pas slar spras pa// gang zhig dgos pa skyong ba yi// yon tan cung zad spos par zad// de nyed bdag la med ces sgra// de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas// bslab pa
39b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i chos bral la// chos nyid bsngags pa brjod byed kyang // de dag la ni chos nyid med// de las spyod pa'i log spyod rnams// dam tshig can gyis spang bar bya// rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can// gsang ba 'jig
40a1(rnying rgyud): su 'gyur// bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa// ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis// nams kyang gnod pa yong mi mdzad// de yi 'khor na gnas pa la// gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams// rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams ca// skyon mdzod dza man+ta rba
40a2(rnying rgyud): pas gcod// thams cad ngan 'gror spre'u tshugs ltung // sgrub pa'i snod mchog gcig yod de// 'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i// rgyud mnyan don ldan dang tshul bzang // ci la chags med gtong ldan sems// shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis//
40a3(rnying rgyud): gti mug zar ma glo phye nas// chos kyi snying po'i mig ldan pas// rtag chad phrad mthong dbu ma'i yul// ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas// sdong po ldong chen rab dul ba'o// tha tshig lung las byung ba bzhin// gzhung srong thub par byed pa de// rgyal ba'i
40a4(rnying rgyud): sras po yin pas ni// de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// ji ltar dumatshig thub pa ltar// de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu ste// yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung // rigs 'dzid rgyal ba kun yum mo// de bzhin dam tshig thub pa ltar// gnas par byed pa'i rten
40a5(rnying rgyud): yang yin// dam tshig kun gyi srog yin te// dam tshig kun gyi nor mchog go// dam tshig 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs// dam tshig 'grod pa lam gyi mchog/ dam tshig chu bo sgrol ba'i gru// dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin// dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin
40a6(rnying rgyud): te// dam tshig long ba'i mig bla yin// ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar// gzhan mi sdeb 'joms pa yin// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed// des na dam tshig rgyun bzhin bsrung // mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum po// dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzang
40a7(rnying rgyud): nas// lha dang grogs dang slob dpon dang // bdag nyid dge pa maM khrel ba'i// sku la gsum mo gnod dam bcas gsus// yongs sum nya sa ma na sa// mthung byed kya tugs rnas pazhir bcas// zong rdzun pa la bzung bcwo// brtul zhugs
40b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i dgrang mthong nas// de dag smyig pa 'thong ba ltang // slad cing chad pas gtsang byung ba// byas pa don tul ba'i bras// dbang na man pa gang dag gis// nyes byas khrims dang 'gal 'gyur na// 'ga' bar mi gtod khrims dang /
40b2(rnying rgyud): bkA yi ma srung rtsor po // rgyal po'i thugs 'dzin dam pa zhes// kun du rgya che dgrags par 'gyur// wA m+b+ha rang drug gi slong byes na// bdag pos drug tu shes mthag/ cang nas byung ste med par byed// ci phy-ir l+h+wam zas de dag las// dug 'phel gyuran
40b3(rnying rgyud): 'chi phyir ro// de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can de// brdal zhugs can gyi na la 'byor nges// gnas sa pa l-i y-is lcags te spang // gang dag mi stong mgon byed pa// de dag gsang ba'i rim gri yin// don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// tha tshig zab mo
40b4(rnying rgyud): bcas rnams las// bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bskrin// rdza ba yan lag bcas rnams la// gal te mtshar zhig skur kyang // rnam smin yod kyad ma minyams// ji ltar byung po e ne ya// shi nas do gyur mo kyang // gaM wang gyis ni don byed ltar// rnal
40b5(rnying rgyud): gyur / sa sa sa sam
40b6(rnying rgyud): gis ni// rnal 'byong can pa rnam du 'gyur// 'ayod pa'i gdus Sh+Ta g+sa // ga 'das hU~M da sma / la sa me ya bas// thams ca 'a sa 'i spang ba bya// gal te ma mas srung // 'am pa'i ga
40b7(rnying rgyud): gyu te// du byud sa ma gyur// sa su su sa gyu su sa// gas
41a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig ni// dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro// wa dang cang shes kyi ling dang // blang dor ming bral khro chen bdag/ shin tu glang chen gyos 'dra'i sems// dpa' rgyal stag mchog rngam zhing gtum// mkha' lding khyud chen lhag mi lha//
41a2(rnying rgyud): gtumathung dom chen sdong gcig pa// yid thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser// gti mug lkugs pa'i blo tshol ldan// ri bo mi 'gyur brtan pa che// mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang brel// gnam lcags lce yi drag shul can// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs
41a3(rnying rgyud): bdag/ zon pag u'i phrig kha rog sems// nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan// zla bral seng ge ri dgas rgyal// re 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo// g.yo ldan lhag chen sgyu ma'i rgya// gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing // thogs med gsod spyong
41a4(rnying rgyud): spang khwa// che ba'i nga rgyal stag mchog blo// kum 'dzem blo ldan nam mkha' lding // sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor stong // rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni// bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan// goms nas nyams su len byed pa// rnal 'byor gas
41a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i bka' ba yin// dul gA'i rmad ldan 'a chi ga rten// srung nge gsung thugs rngardza ma// b+ha sgang dang brjing dang gsang ba // yan lag spang pa'i ngamajug dang // yid 'ad dang du byung ba dang // gaN+Dal thugs zab mor spya ba dang // rdul 'byor rnal 'gyur
41a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// mi 'dor mi spong sbyar ba yi// rigs ldan shes par bya ba dang // thob cing grub par bya ba yin// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ldan pa// spyad par bya ba'i nor mchog yin// rnal 'byor//
41a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems rgyud la// nges par btags te spyod pa'i rtsa// zang mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan// 'di ni sngar 'gro tha chog ste// zab ma sgrub pa'i sngan log suM // rje wa~M tshig drug pa'o// gcan 'bra la ma
41b1(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba'i phyir// sI dang khyad par dam dzeg rnams// nges pa'i don gyis bsrung byas na// de ni dbyig gi sdong chen yin// de ltar sgo yi sdom pa la// gnas nas dus kyi sbubs 'di dra// bsung bya thub par bya ba ni// mi shigs pa ni seng ge ste// gcan
41b2(rnying rgyud): bzan rgyal po yin pas so/ za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gcer// drug lho ba ni der mi rigs// rin chen myu gu'i lhag phran dag/ don breg pa'i rigs ma yin// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag/ mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min// pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru kham
41b3(rnying rgyud): bye// zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye// ma brtags bug rdol can gyi snod// khwa m+bi dbye zhing bcud mi blugs// don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i rtags// bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min// shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag/ 'dam rdzab khung du bsrub mi bya// seng nge/
41b4(rnying rgyud): dkar mo'i 'o ba dang // dug can snod du blugs pa min// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsreg par bya ba yod ma yin// khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba/ de dag gcag par bya ba min// gnam lcags me yi dur mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yin no//
41b5(rnying rgyud): stag gzig 'drol bas las byas pa'i// las kyi lhag ma badz+ra mi bya// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi// de dag gzhig par bya ba min// rdo rje ra ba'i go chags ni// bsdam pa bral bar bya ba min// bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma dag/ g.yeng ba'i chung gis
41b6(rnying rgyud): bskyod mi bya// rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol bar gcad par bya ba min// rgyal po'i bka' rtags phyag rgya dag/ nam zhar dbye bar mi bya'o// rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar// rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o// gtsug gi nor bu 'angar ba dang // rgyal
41b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya// rnal 'byor las kyi khyad par can// skal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste// skal bar ldan pa'i nor mchog yin// rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni// rdo rje las kyi thun tshags dag/ rdo rje go phur sdom chen gyis// srog pa par
42a1(rnying rgyud): chang byed pa'i dag/ tan mongs 'dzings pa de gzhom bya// rlom las 'kho'i dpung bsrung ba// zag pabar ma tshul ba// rdegs byed dbang ba zlas pa'i btung// dpa' byed chen yang bsdam par bya// rdo rdzags chogs gad
42a2(rnying rgyud): pa// 'dres pa gang zag byis pa'i tshig/ zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing // thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o// ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dag/ gshed rdza'i mis ni gsod pa'i tshe// thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa bzhin// le lo'i dgra bcom pa
42a3(rnying rgyud): par 'bar// rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gegs bsal ba// dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can// 'dod dang longs spyod mi mthun dang // sti mthun nang du mi gcig pa// phyi nang can dang gnod byed dang // 'dod chos bying rmugs brkam pa dang // dad med rtsa nyams 'a
42a4(rnying rgyud): gamed can// mkhas pas bsgrims te spang bar bya'o// de ni rnal 'byor glegs yin te// dngos grub tu po gcod par byed// rnal 'byor nges par spong ba la// bar du gcod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung // rnam rtog 'phrig pa'i bdud nyid dang // de bzhin btang
42a5(rnying rgyud): le lo'i bdud// longs spyod 'du 'jig yeng ba'i bdud// tshig rtsub mtshon che rnon po'i bdud// khrog tum dang zung 'khrug pa'i bdud// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bdud lnga po// yang dag don la sgrib pa ste// gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis// zhi ba chen
42a6(rnying rgyud): dung du bzlog/ nal 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po// thabs la mkhas pas gdul bar bya// rdo rje rnag pa gsang 'phel bas// ngag gi dbang po nyams 'gyur te// kha na mdzes phog par 'gyur// de dag bcas kar 'bud pa'i dgra// lha dman
42a7(rnying rgyud): spyod cing 'tshal ba yis// bka' yi gzung bar log par spyad// narabs par chang 'byung bajing du// dmas kya chung pa ma yin// 'ang dge' rdo rje mchog gsum po// bad rnams phyel bar shang ngani// rtsa ru ba'i na
42b1(rnying rgyud): bskyed// bka' chad chen po 'bang pa'i gnas// bcas pa las la rkyor pa'itsho// 'bad pa'i rtsal shubs rdung ba yis// don rnams thub pa ma dzin te// 'bras byar mi 'grar 'jog pa'i druH// ngal 'byong zad par spyod pa la// 'dod pa'i nod mamag
42b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang // zangs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis// skyon gyi dgu bzhi snang bar bya// srid gsum btul ba'i zhing 'di dag/ sangs rgyas zhing du rtogs pa ni// sa rnams cig car sbyangs pa ste// zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin ra// khams gsum mchod pa'i rgya
42b3(rnying rgyud): yo byad chen po'i mchog sbyin te// rgyal ba mas cad dzes pa'i zla// mad du tre pa'i mdzod pa'o// 'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag/ bde ba chen pa'i gnas yin to// mnar ma pa tsas chos kyi dbyis// la med ldan gyis za pa la/ @
42b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu ba'i rtsa ba dag/ ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba ste// kun shes kun rig gsal ba'o// rang rig ye shes rang las byung // rnal 'byor chos mig ldan pa yis// nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o// 'di ni rgyan gyi dam tshig ste// brjod du med pa bsrung ba'o// bsur
42b5(rnying rgyud): ba bub par bya ba la// dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni// gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi// sgro la nges pa'i lung du baM stan// 'dod pas chags dang 'joms pa dang // gti mug nga rgyal phrag dag rnams// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste/ don dang ldan pa'i skyes
42b6(rnying rgyud): spyad// sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang // ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed// rnal 'asnong dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog/ spyad par bya ba'i las yin no// rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang // dngos por brtags pa thams cad kyang // don gyi dang du gcig pa ste// 8
42b7(rnying rgyud): lUgasung thugs kyi bdag/ mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad ni// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang dugapa la// theg pa 'og ma'i khyad par rnams// kun kyang rang rig blo la gas pa// yon tan ci 'byung me brjod cing // 'og ma rnams la ma spod cang // tham
43a1(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i dam tshig ste// 'di ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs// gzugs rnams rnam par snang ba mdzad// tshig rnams brjod pa sdang mtha' yas// rnam rtog kun du sems rdo rje// rig dang tshong ba dan chen 'byung // yid g.yo bu
43a2(rnying rgyud): pa don kun rdzogs// stan 'gan rang bzhin spyod pa'i gnas// zhing bcu dag dang ldan pa na// bde ba ched po'i longs spyod de// thogs med phrin las rnam bkar rdzogs// rtse yi yul dang nang gi sems// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de la sgrib dang me
43a3(rnying rgyud): skyeb ces// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs// thams cad mnyam nyid dbyings gyur pas// phung po lnga don ye shes lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug ni// phyag tu chen po'i rig 'dzin yin// yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las// gzhan gyi rang
43a4(rnying rgyud): drizhin med pas na// mtshan ma'i rnam pa cir snang yang // de la chad pa'i gnas med do// dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na// rtogs pa dam pa dam tshig ste// rtog par byed pa gang yin pa// de ni dam tshig chen po'o// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la granas//
43a5(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las// dngos su spyod pa thams cad bya// don dam tshig chen po yin// snod du gyur pa dbyings// bcud rnams rnyil pa yab kyi mkha'// 'byung 'jug rig pas longs spyod de// 'di na rdo rje rnarmig yin// srid pa'i
43a6(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad dang // thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun// so sor thams cad snang ba ste// bAn+d+ha kya mnyam pa'i ngad du gsal// spyod pa'i las dang rtogs pa dang // mtshan mar gyur pa thams cad kyang // sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de//
43a7(rnying rgyud): btags na longs spyod tshogs su 'gyur// me skyes stong po sgra yi rgya// rang bzhin sprin med gsung gi don// mtshan med yid las 'dus po thugs// rnam gsum bde chen sangs rgyas so// mnyam pa'i lta bas dbang sbrar na// 'khor ba thams
43b1(rnying rgyud): na nan na nadu/ su
44a1(rnying rgyud): rten rdzogs bang ba zan po yi// khyang pa chen po kun 'dal bas// sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzogs// rnam grol bcings pa kun dang bral// lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin// zhes smra ba'i seng ge chen pos gsungs so// rgyang kyi
44a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus reg pa'i mdo las dam tshig gsang ba mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa rdo rje de chos thams cad brdas mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ngan so tang
44a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang // 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ sam+bas dpa'i chen po chos thams cad ni bdag cag rnams kyis de rda rig pa tsam gyi ngo bor mthong ngo // de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po la
44a4(rnying rgyud): gras chos thams cad nI brda dang / tha skad dang / brgyags pa tsam du shes par gyis shig/ brtags ma'i chos thams cad dri phyi nang gang na yang mi gnas te/ chos thams cad la mi dge gzhi med cing brtags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yin no// ngan zhes
44a5(rnying rgyud): ba ni smras pa btags pa'i tha snyad yin no// sbas pa'i chos rnams gsang ba'i phyir// thams cad snga zhing brgyad par bya// 'di lta ba brda yi sbyor ba la// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis// de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems
44a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen pos brda yi chos rnams rgya cher bshad du gsol// bdag cag gis kyang chos thams cad// brda yi don gyis brgyud par bgyi// badz+ra zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// spras pa'i chos ni gang dang ga dra// mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags// de skad ces
44a7(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / spred da'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa chen por tshogs// badz+ra zhes bya ba sdus pa/ skyes te gsang ba'i chos rnams ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yid// mi bstan gzhan la gsang ba ni// chu skyegs la
44b1(rnying rgyud): sde ba rnams// rnal 'byor spyod la 'phya ba las// shin tu blan zhing sba ba'i phyir// sbas pa'i brdams bstan par bya// brda yi yon tan chen po ni// grangs kyang bsam gyes maM khyab na// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi yod de// gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin
44b2(rnying rgyud): dang // rnal 'byor rig pa'i spyod yul dang // skyes pas grub thag nye ba dang // gsang ba'i dam tshig mi nyams shing // brdal dga' ba'i ma sring rnams// nye zhing gdung ba'i thabs su 'gyur// de bas sbas pa'i brda rnams ni// tshig gis mtshan te brjod par
44b3(rnying rgyud): bya// a lA la hoH/ a ti pu hoH/ prA ti pu hoH/ ma hA gau drA saM kra ma/ gu ya de bI sa ma ya/ ma hA tsAn+da/ ma hA mArba/ gu ya/ b+ha gA/ ma hA badz+rA/ sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya stAM/ ra ho ya haM/ ra ga yA maM/ sa ma yA dzaH/ lhan/ oM tAM hUM/ sa ma ya/ sa
44b4(rnying rgyud): ya/ e h+ye hi/ i h+ye hi/ hA he ha/ ha he ha/ ma taM kha/ ma ti kha/ kU ruk+Sha/ ka ruk+Sha/ k+ShaM ba ri/ k+ShaM ba re/ ra ho he ru ho haM/ sa rba ya hi/ a la g+ho/ a la skr-i/ ga ba le kha le/ sha dA pa/ shrI da pa/ kha raM khA hi/ kha pa khA hi/ ba le b+h+yo/ kha le ha
44b5(rnying rgyud): khA/ kha ka Sha/ haMH/ rA/ bA tirak+ShaSh+TA tAM/ ha / gr-iH/ ts+tsha/ sin+ta/ sa mi/ ma le mu le/ tA leng le/ maH \u0f7f/ brgyas/ ba myaM/ pad+yan+ta/ shi bar+t+ta/ shA ts+tsha/ ma mkhA katraM/ m+me ai e ste/ \u0f7f/ \u0f7f/
44b6(rnying rgyud): gA pa le le/ krArma ma ti d+d+ho/ rak+Sha kra ma b+h+yo/ rak+Sha kra mA b+h+yo/ kArma ma le/ karma ma le/ k+Shu ti sha ne/ kyA tI sha ne/ rAk+Sha kama?/ rak+Sha kAma?/ po d+hak+ShaM/ b+h+yo ShA hi d+d+ho/ tsa le yaM/ tsa le yau/ pra tsa le/ pra tsa le/ pre rA yaM/ gu d+ha yAM/ byaM gr-iH/
44b7(rnying rgyud): ba/ pa shaH/ mdzan/ rig rji sa tshig ni myig tu// b+hUk+Sha phU/ b+he hU~M/ dri'i / ma / badz+rI pa 'i te/ ning tu sa/ nas/ baN+Di bcwa la/ na / na
45a1(rnying rgyud): bya canagasas na d+ha ma/ skye ma// ka g+sa na ka d+ha hAN+Da/ brgya / badz+rab+h+ya/ gab+h+yo// gtsu/ n+naH/ thA hA/ dpa' byed la/ dpa' byed la/ zlab rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang / zlab dkar dang na grom mchog/ dzan
45a2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gtso mo dang // 'jam po thar pa chen po dang // gal zhes bya ba'i ri mchog dang // gzong rjong chen po'i d+hI ni ma dang // bran mo dang ni gzog 'chang ma// 'jam dngapal rnon po'i ka tar dang // mA tha ya mA tha ya/ paR+Sha ti pad+ma ti/ dA na ma ma/
45a3(rnying rgyud): pa te lba kha t+taMH/ rA ti d+h+r-i ra ti hAM/ di haM tha/ shi ti tha/ ka raM tha/ kA raM tha/ shan+ti kha sha rti kha/ yo gtsa nAn yog tsan+dan/ sgo bar da mchog gi phyag rgya'o// lag gi phyag rgya chen po ni// gar thabs g.yas g.yon bskor nas kyang // segal brda ba
45a4(rnying rgyud): pa 'dren pa'i brda// bskor nas thal sbyar phyag rgya'i brda// shin tu bskor nas spyi bor dgrol// 'di ni mchod pa bzhes pa'i brda// bskor nas snying gar bcangs pa ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje brtan pa'i brda// gar bskor shin tu gnyis bstabs pa// mchod pa
45a5(rnying rgyud): stobs par byed pa'i bar// gang bskor dbang po'i spro khor ba dag/ spyor ba'i don 'jug pa'i bang // tharab kyis spyi song bzhag pa dang // shes rab dbang mo snying gar ro// thabs kyis gsang ba g.yas bajug na// shes rab zlos byed gsang ba yin/
45a6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis nas g.yas brdegan// shes rab nas g.yon bteg pa'o// thabs kyis don mug rgya bstan// shes dbang rdo'i phyag chubartan// thabs kyis spri na ma g.yas bstod na// shes rab N+DI rnam g.yon rtag bya// thabs kyis phyag g.yon dbyung ba
45a7(rnying rgyud): dang // shes rab g.yas kyis 'khyud tshul bstan// phyag rgya gar bskor thal brdabs shing // de'ang me lcel reg de ni// tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i brda// log gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thong // de nas dbang mo sbrel rig/ 'dza' gang
45b1(rnying rgyud): 'drim pa'i brda thabs so// ma hA ging chen karma dang // rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin las// sogs pa'i brda yi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub// lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya'o// zhes smra ba'i seng ges gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
45b2(rnying rgyud): po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnal 'byor rol pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las
45b3(rnying rgyud): bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng ge chen po chos thams cad ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang / slu ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i
45b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shig/ rjes bka' stsam pa dang / 'dus pa'i phyogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo na tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag rgyag
45b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam ste// rnal 'byor kun gyis spyad pa'i lam// sa mchog bgrod pa
45b6(rnying rgyud): lam 'di dag/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya// brtsam pa las kyi dang po pa// rdo rje tshogs la 'jug pa na// khyad par rim pa ci bzhin du// las mchog 'di yi rang bzhin gyis// ji bzhin rim par sbyangs nas kyang // sa rab mchog tu
45b7(rnying rgyud): pa la// thabs mchog lnga yis bgrod bya ste// rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyen pa dang // nye ba dang ni bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya// ji ltar grangs dang dus chen dang // mtshan pa byung bar bcas rnams las// gab pa'i sgra thabs de sbyar mas/
46a1(rnying rgyud): dunan na na na tu bya dun ma
46a2(rnying rgyud): na na
46a3(rnying rgyud): dud pa ba pagyur/ mi di ga ngas
46a4(rnying rgyud): ga/ sa ni 'di ba
46a5(rnying rgyud): du
46b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug tshul dbang dang 'am grub tho// dang bcwaganam thams// bsgrub pa'i gtord nams marigs dang // rdul gyi ma bur bye dus te// rtags nan mda' 'dod do// de ngas smrab pa ca rnams// ji ltar 'dang pas man tan gyis/
46b2(rnying rgyud): rje rnal 'byor bkar bya'o// mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i// dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya// rmongs pa gsang phyir sems bskyed de// ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur// shes nas mig ye shes bya'i yul// thams cad rim gyis bstan par
46b3(rnying rgyud): drod can 'khyil pa'i blo ldan la// rdul 'byor na spar mdzod sgo dbye// rtsing po 'gros kyis dmu rgod la// gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan// rdo rje lung gi tshad can la// ji ltar nus pa de dbang paskar// btsal med mi rjes yul can la// phan
46b4(rnying rgyud): zhig bsngags pa yin// gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dang // 'od me bsrub cing lding mi nabab// rdo rje blo yi yul can la// rdul chen ljongs zhes gdams par bya// rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du// rdo rje na gyi snang chen pa sher// rtsa lnga dang rim pa khyad par
46b5(rnying rgyud): so sor gas kyi phyag rgya / spre'am yang na re ro'o// de nas smra ba'i seng ge de shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gas
46b6(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni shes rang rdzogs kyi dkyil 'khor du gda' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil
46b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin las byung zhing shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gsal lo// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin
47a1(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams la rgya char bshad du gsal/ daskang cas gsol pa dang / sems dpa' ben pas bya// 'a stsal pa/ 'dus par rnal 'brung chen po'i tshogs// shas rab gzus rang bzhin no// rgya char ba shang cas shes par shes/
47a2(rnying rgyud): ri ltar thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar// gang dag nal 'byor mang lda nams// rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// skyem 'chags mi star das kyang // ninam+b+ha 'di 'ag dga' las gsung// thabs kyi phyag tu mtshan ma mas// rdo rje mnam pa'i gang
47a3(rnying rgyud): rnams/ ma das la nyis pa gyi/ klog pa gal sog jisad btsu // de sa ming sems pa'i dorjod popa 'du sa dang shes rab pa ba
47a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin la sgoms par 'gas so// de das de la zhi de ltas bzhengs pa dang / 'khod dmas kyi gnal / bya su ma thams rnying ze rang ba ni thangs dang shes ba 'bra' ba'i rang bzhin kun du bdag pa gnams kyis zang /
47a5(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba ste/ gnyis su myed par shes par gyis shig/ de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa
47a6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dra bar 'brel pa'i don bshad du gsol/ sems dpa' cher pos bka' stsa lu ba/ 'brel pa'i don ni 'di lta ste// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// phan tshun 'brel pa'i tshul du
47a7(rnying rgyud): slong // co kun namamakha'i mtshan nyid las// skal pa bye ba par yang sbeng// gnyis med du pa'i tshul du 'phrus// byo gsang gA'i tshig yang // Nal dang sa pa sapa ba/ 'di lo gas srung bye bar bya// gsong 'ding drung ba'i
47b1(rnying rgyud): la// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrags// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril 'khrud sbyor// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang // rang rang mtshan ma 'bar
47b2(rnying rgyud): ba'o// g.yon gyi sgra snyan dril bu dang // rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te// kha dog
47b3(rnying rgyud): lnga po 'od 'bar bas// ban+d+ha drug ches ni skyeg pa rnams// rim gyis bskyed dang tshig car bskyed// dbang po'i rim par sbyar bar bya// gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang // gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// phyag r+b+ha sbrul po rgyal mor baHsa/
47b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'khyud sbyor// sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba// bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no// rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje
47b5(rnying rgyud): 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor longs spyod che sbyar pas// mnyes nas skongs phyir rim bzhin dbul// gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rnams sgrub par byed// ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan
47b6(rnying rgyud): 'das sems dpa' rdo rje de rdo rje kun du 'brel pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsal to// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings su bdag cag
47b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs dra ba'i dbyings su shes par gyes shig/ chos thams cad ni thugs kyi rig pa las byung la thugs kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dus pa'i tshogs
48a1(rnying rgyud): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshogs bdag cab rnams lnga rgya cher bshang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'dus pa can po na la 'byor bya// dza rje chen po rig pa'i don// dra ba 'brel ba'i byengs
48a2(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// nges par bshad kyis rtse gcig nyon// thugs kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di// nges pa'i rdo rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pa'i don// thams cad 'byung bas dbyings shes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin sogs bcas// 'khril mnyam pa yang de
48a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas// rim pa'i tshul bzhi ni sbyar byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
48a4(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mthong ngo zhe lnga gsol
48a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam par rtogs pa yin te// chos thams cad ni dus bzhi'i ngang du rdzogs par shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi rang la
48a6(rnying rgyud): dus snga phyir snang ba med do// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol ste/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa chen po'i dus nyid bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du
48a7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po yi ni tshogs// mnyam pa nyid kyi dus rig na// dus zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rdo rje dus kyi lha mo'i tshogs// 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang // mi 'byung ba yi cha
48b1(rnying rgyud): la// dbang sgrar mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams// 'dreg dang sgra dang smin pa dang // 'gag par gyur pa de dag dra// rdo rje rnamathar zad med dang // sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dpal gyi dkyil// de bzhin rim par rdo rje yi// b+hU gar
48b2(rnying rgyud): la sogs yo byad kyis// mchod dang 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin// cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lho yi nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen po la sogs pa// tshem bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams// spyir ngam re rang sbyar bar bya// 'das la rnam thar tshogs
48b3(rnying rgyud): bskul te// da ltar byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems dang mnyam par bskrun// mnyam pa'i rgyal por de 'gyur te// bde gshegs dus kyi rgyal por 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'ongs sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi bla'i tshogs
48b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nyi zla'i tshogs su mthong ngo // de skad ces
48b5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yin par shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni byang chub sems las byung zhing
48b6(rnying rgyud): snying rje'i rang bzhin can yin no// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje dang byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ chos rnams can gyi yo byad ni// snying
48b7(rnying rgyud): rje byang chub sems yin te// yo byad de dang ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor byang chub sems rdzogs pa// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bla rgyas tshul// snying rje ye shes shar ba ni// mkha' la ti gsal shar ba'i tshu // ngan
49a1(rnying rgyud): swA// gnyis rdzogs pa 'arnal 'byor ba// rnal 'byong ngas pa'os pa yin// dras pa'i stsal ban pan// darlungs mi thun phyogs byas// sogs chen nam gnyis pa/ na pa // skar chags dang san ga// byacu drug zhagags rdzogs pa
49a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// bcu gsum rgyal chen rdzogs pa'is// bcu ga rdzogs kyi rdzogs pas ni// mangs pa'i nyim bdu drug gi 'o// tha~Md kyil 'o sa zag rgyal// dzes par smras pa'i bde bde// bcu ga tshogs kyis bsod rnams bsgyud// myeng rdzogs
49a3(rnying rgyud): chags 'phel de phan chad// mi dmigs chos pa blo skye sa yin// de TIdzi ni mi dmigs pa// mtshan ma shes kyi bsrabs pa ste// bsod nams tshogs kyang mi dmigs pa// mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na// rnams cid chos skyer rdzogs pa ste/
49a4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// 'di la zad 'byung sems bskyed de// zla ba dus kyis mtshan ma dang // gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod pa bya// rnga ze'i drong du nyung ba dang // spar te rang las phy-ing rnams la// rtse ba gcad phyir yongs rdzogs pa/
49a5(rnying rgyud): tsham med par dang spangs nas// dus de nyid du nyi ma 'char// dus 'di rgyan gyi bar bcad na// bsnyen pa dag gis bzlog par dka'// bar chad byang nags zhing bskung // mkha' la rmi gsal gra byas ne// sa la rnal 'byor gror rgyas pas// bsod nams
49a6(rnying rgyud): spel ba chen po dang // bsngo ba rnon po'i las rnams bya// des na 'bras bu chen po yang // nyi b+ha kon nas 'gro ba yi// rig 'dzin sa la slebs phan chad// dpalnga chen btu drug sa la 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de sngun du
49a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
49b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin la// rgyal ba thams cad na ma ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes pa gyis shig/ gsol pa/ yi ge phyag rgya'i don gang lags pa bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes nus pa lA/
49b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te// rgyal ba sku gsung thugs su gsal// sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya dag/ yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnams// rgyun du bsgrub par bya ba yin
49b3(rnying rgyud): rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob// rgun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa// rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i tshogs bskyed tshogs sbyar la// phud lhag bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di ni don la nye ba'i lam// bsod nams bskrun par de myang ngo // kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgya des ni//
49b4(rnying rgyud): yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba// mchog gi bde ba dam pa dang // de nyid chen por de nyid 'gyur// 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba mthun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs// mdza' 'phrod sman dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang reg 'dzin
49b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ril// ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad// skad cig yud dam thang cig gam// yud tsam nyin zhag zla re 'am// lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi// tshogs la bab pa'i dus 'di dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin// ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo
