49b6(rnying rgyud): byed rnams// phyi dang nang gi khyad par gyis// gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung po la// rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la// ji ltar 'byor bzhin nan tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang // chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi po dge spangs nas ni//
49b7(rnying rgyud): las bzlog pa'i tshul ldan pas// rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur// gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// ji bzhin 'dod pa nye bar sbyar// lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang // bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // don grub shi pa gso ba'i phyir// las
50a1(rnying rgyud): spyad pa shin tu gnas// chags 'ang sa chung gas bzugs par// mdun du brjod par bya mi dgas// rdzas dang ma byad// pas da // tsas 'ang 'a dum+WA blangs kyi ldang // dban papa 'di byud par rang // gas la tshabs brgyad
50a2(rnying rgyud): snyi srungs te// bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi byeng d+he drug pa'o// de nas
50a3(rnying rgyud): yang zla ba'i seng gisems dpa do 'das pa brjod byinapa tha ba'i nying nge la na pa sgom pa par zhugs so// denas ting nge 'dzin de las pa zhengs par gyur ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i chog pa rnams kyis 'di da ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das sngags
50a4(rnying rgyud): smod pa'i gyon dang yon tan ci lags pa bdag cag ga dag pa lnga snang bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsung sngags chen po 'don ni rab tu snang par dka' bang shes par gyis she// ri ci'i phyir
50a5(rnying rgyud): na/ gsang sngags kyi myigs ni shin du me da 'dra ste/ mini rkyen du bcangs shing spyad legs na ji wA rI 'dod pa'i na rgyud dri med // nyi ji lta ba bzhin du snyed na me'i phreng po chen por 'gyur te/ spyod par byed pa nyid kyang bsregs// khyer nas khyim bya
50a6(rnying rgyud): sregs/ rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang bsregs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngags 'don chu dang 'dra ste/ chu thibs kyis zin cing skyed legs ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' ba dang phudro du yod de/ rgyal dga' ba der thang chu chen po la 'bog
50a7(rnying rgyud): par nus so// chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la ma goms pas ni spyod par byed pa de g.yeng zhing 'chi bar byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni gcan gzan gdug pa can dang 'dra ste/ gcan gzan gyis sems can gzhan gyi srog gcod
50b1(rnying rgyud): par byed pa yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dka' ba bzhin du dbang du 'du'o// thabs kyis ma zin na srog gcod par byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/ sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug
50b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yongs su zin na ni dbang du 'du zhing spyad du yod la/ thabs kyis ma zin na ni 'tsho ba'i srog dang 'bral bar byed do// de bas na gsang ba chen po 'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi tshe na yang spyad nyes pa'i log pa'i lam pa can
50b3(rnying rgyud): mang por byung ngo // don dang lam la mkhas pa'i skyes bus thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na ma nor ba'i lam du zhugs pa yang mang por byung bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i thabs la yongs su mkhas par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa
50b4(rnying rgyud): dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags log pa'i lam las byung ba ni gang gang lags/ spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni gang gang lags// bdag cag la rgya cher bshad du gsol// de skad
50b5(rnying rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyis legs kyi rim pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / da ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe// gsang ba spyod pa'i don 'di dang /
50b6(rnying rgyud): s+ya don pa la cher nang byar gyur// tshul 'dra tsa mI zhig gnas pa la// kun kyang khril cher spyod mod kyang // don dang phrad pa ngas ma mthong // san kyang ldog pa'i lam spang ngo // log pacan nyid gang zhen// 'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang // 'di las
50b7(rnying rgyud): log dang log tshu'i spyod// 'di tshul ma yin 'dir mdzes// g.yo sgyus bden bcos 'gal ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bskal pa kun bkod bya ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po de// mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og tu// byung pa'i
51a1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bcang can // mi shes byas pa la bar rnams pa// tshul 'amam log pa 'chags bsrungs pas// chom bu lnga brgyang bcas pazhig/ don las gopa zhing 'bar bar log/ de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ ma byung gsung ma/
51a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshad ma rnams// phal cher mi gnas skabs dag tu// mi shes ngan rtog can rnams kyis// dkrugs 'gyur bka' bskrad gzhung por te// nor pas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing // bdag yin gzhan 'di ma yin zhes//
51a3(rnying rgyud): bdag bstod gzhan la spyod pa log/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bsgral pa de nyid dus dag pa// rnal 'byor pa'i sbyin bu bzhig/ don mtho shidam gyi zhing // lam gyi thabs la mim khas pas// des don bka' yi gzhung bor nas// chos ma yin pa'i chos
51a4(rnying rgyud): spyod nga // gzhan dag des don spyod pam// khyod kyi ni don ma yin// den mchog bdud rtsi gang yin pa// de ni pe chos 'di yin// zhes ni bdag brjod gzhan la smod// 'di yang srid pa log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul dum spyong cig/ sngar byung
51a5(rnying rgyud): sgyid kyi rjes gnas pas// deng me bzhin du dpon pa ta bskyed// tshig ga tu dgas pa'i dbang nges ni// mi shes bzhin du ras gcod pa'i// tshul 'chos sems kyi ma bru can// smyon thabs blun pa'i sdig can ljin// de yang rdo lta dri zhen// den
51a6(rnying rgyud): maud spyong ba zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor tshul 'dre zhig/ don la mkhas pa'i rjes su zung // rlom bu 'brum gyi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rjes su byung ba yis// don med dge slong de nyid la// tshig gi gnyer chen sti phab pas// l-I dung tsho btse ni
51a7(rnying rgyud): to// brtson pa dregapa pa rnye/ zhes badzin tshum sa te// dri tshul lo ba chodu drangs// mthu thu mdang ches po zhig/ drugs pa chen pa'i drung byung // delu tshul dus spyon / mnga' 'drini brang te di
51b1(rnying rgyud): dang // rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba'i 'khor// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur dogs nas// ska ras chung chen so sor gtsad// 'khor 'di bdag gis sbyin bya yi// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag 'di dang ma 'brel zhes// nyon mongs tshig gis sgo byed/
51b2(rnying rgyud): nor// de yang ji lta bu zhi na// rnal 'byor na zhig nas pa zhes// bya ba'i tshem bu lnga brgya zhig/ shin tu gsang sngags spyod do zhes// dgon pa'i gnas su 'jug nas ni// yul khams chen po de dag gis// gnas par gyur pa'i mi rnams kun// gdul
51b3(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba'i zhing du spyod// gzhan gyi sde par gyur pa yi// dge slong don dang ldan pa zhig/ yul der ched du 'ongs nas ni// rnal 'byor nges pa'i lam mchog gcig/ rgya cher bstan par bsams pa las// dge slong dgon par gnas pa des// nyon mongs tshig
51b4(rnying rgyud): gi bsgri ba byas// 'khor 'di bdag gi zhing yin gyis// khyod ni 'di la ma gtogs zhes// sgo dang tshan dang ris bcad pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam du lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor chen por bsngos gyur la// sna 'gas ci rgyal
51b5(rnying rgyud): gsog 'jog byed// gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nem zhar longs spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor bde ldan shes pa zhes// bya ba'i tshom bur bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyod pa las// 'khor na gnas pa'i rdul
51b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma// bud med bzang ldan bya ba zhig/ tshogs sbyor ging du bskos pa las// 'byor pa'i yo byad de dag la// ser sna'i sems kyis gsog 'jog byas// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// yi dgas khyi yi lus su skyes// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/
51b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// log lha snying rtol gtum khro che// sdig spyong don dang mi ldan yang // bdag ni yang dag yin no zhes// bab tshol bka' chu spu byed bslad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// chos sbyong
52a1(rnying rgyud): ye rnal 'byor pa// pra mde zhes bya ba zhe// don dang pham la me mkhas par// bdug ni mkhan po yin no zhes// kun la rgya cher sna bsgrags nas// rgyal ba'i bka' ba cus 'gro ba rnams// bslus par gyur pa'i rnam smin gyis// 'og
52a2(rnying rgyud): pa can gyi 'jig rten pa// mu stegs spyod pa'i khams su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cing // tha chog nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pas don la khas 'ches phyir// rdo rje rgyal dbang thob 'dod pa// khrel med spyir rtol mun sprul 'tshal//
52a3(rnying rgyud): yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa// be na ya zhes bya ba zhig/ tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa byung // rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don la mkhas pa'i tshul bcos phyir// rdo rje tshul
52a4(rnying rgyud): po'i dbang mnos pas// ri bos srog chags mnan pa bzhin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis// 'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa'i// srog chags phrag gi rigs su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs par/
52a5(rnying rgyud): tshig du mnyam zhes rjod byed cing // chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'chel ba// rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong bde sbyin bya ba zhig/ tshom bu stong dang bcas par de// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i las la
52a6(rnying rgyud): skrod// pa la chags kyi mngon par 'cheb// la pa~Ms snga chen gsod par spod// tshogs snang las kyi rnam smin gyis// k+Sha min po'i khams su byung // de dra'i tshul du ma spyod cing// gang dag rnal 'byor mo chung rnams// rdo rje gal tshogs
52a7(rnying rgyud): don glengs na// de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// swa nu me mi dga' 'byol byed blan// de yang ji lta bu med// dge slong lhas byin bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor dang po'i sar sprong tshe// rnal 'byor don ldan mang po rnams// phal cher tshogs par gyur
52b1(rnying rgyud): dzes dan gsang ba'i don glengs na// lhas byin 'khor bcas de las phyir// don gleng ba la mi dga' zhing // dran pa'i sems kyis phrag dag sbyos// rang gi gnas su song nas// mkhas pa de la me stan brjod// lus kyi rnam smin de yis na
52b2(rnying rgyud): bskal pa dpan/ tu med par// yang dag don lis grol bar 'gyur// 'khor ba don med gnas su 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal tshor nyid kyis rnal 'byor la// shin tu gdug pa'i drug mangs gtong // ji tshig btsan po rdzong lnga bu/
52b3(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bgegs so// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor rnam dag blo gros zhes// bya ba'i don ldan mkhas pa zhig/ mi 'jigs blo gros zhes bya ba'i// thabs dang don la mi mkhas pa// sde ba mang po skyong ba'i sar// rnam dag blo gros
52b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor banas 'ongs// mkhas pa don ldan bzod thob la// ngan sems phyar ki'i sgro skur btab// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// mi 'jigs blo gros mnar med lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spong sdig/ lta bdamigs bu dang bral bas// yang dag dbu
52b5(rnying rgyud): ma'i lam mi gsal// kyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de ni rdul 'byor long ba'i tshogs// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po rabags pa 'dzin pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig byung // shes rab lte ba'i mig med par// rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul
52b6(rnying rgyud): bzung nas/ thos tsam gyi gzhung sprad pas// mig med 'khor bya'i khams su snang // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ de la stsogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// log pa'i tshogs su spyod pas ni// 'khor ba ldog pa'i tshogs su 'gyur// des na 'dus
52b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin tu gsang ba'i chos 'di rnams// golas che bar tshul bas bshad// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yis// don dang ldan par bya ba gces// thabs la mkhas par spyad pa yi// legs pa'i lam gyi rnal 'byor pa//
53a1(rnying rgyud): sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi// rtsal can rnams kyi don bshad pa// skyes bu mchog gi spyod pa 'di// yon tan sla bsgrags sus thos pa// ming tsam gyis kyang de thob cing // dran pas ngan 'gro las slob yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/
53a2(rnying rgyud): shin tu gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di// lha gnas gsum du grags pa las// lU yi bu ni 'od ldan de// mi nAg 'chi ba'i dus bab nas// 'chi ka'i snga ltas byung ba'i tshe// mi dga' bar ni 'du shes gyur// phyi ma'i 'du shes bskyed pa las// mi gtsang zas su za ba
53a3(rnying rgyud): yi// dran pa'i srog chags lus len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong // shin tu lags pa'i 'du shes kyis// skyabs kyi yul rnams yid la byas// gzhan gyi dran pa mi gsal bar// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs rkyen gyis// mtshan nin pa
53a4(rnying rgyud): dbang pos thos// thos pa yid la dran byas pas// ngan 'gro'i lam las slar log ste// tshogs chen spyod pa'i skal ldan pas// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas su skyes// de bzhin thos pa dag par spyod// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs 'di la// gang ni
53a5(rnying rgyud): dka' zhing 'dud skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze'i bu ni byams ldan te// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs 'di dag/ spyod par mos nas kun du btsal// btsal bas rnyed par ma gyur
53a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs zhes su 'dug nas ni// shin tu ngus nas smras pa ni// e ma'o bdag gi las re pham// skyes nas rgas par gyur bar du// tshogs chen zab mo'i don btsal na// don dang ma rmad las re ngan// da sodang ji ltar btsal na rnyed// btsal byas rnyed pa
53a7(rnying rgyud): nga mi 'gyur// thugs rjes bdag la sbubs su mchi// gdung bsgra cher phyung ba las// nam mkha'i khams nas spyi phyung ste// sbrul dang ldan pa'i bram ze khyod// de ltar yi dam la brten pa/ ni don gyi skal pa can// dus gsum
53b1(rnying rgyud): mas cad shA// grang sa byed pas nub par mdang // dbas sgrub mgalal bar/ grub pa sung bya'adrabs dag la// mkhas shing brtson par bu dgas// / rang gis rnams 'thas dasun// khrag can dugags pa rjod par// nga d+hags dag nga /
53b2(rnying rgyud): gus// dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas// de ma thag tu don thob 'gyur// de skad lung bstan thob nas ni// dga' ba'i bsam pa cher g.yos te// lung bstan pa ltar de sprad pas// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras su gyur// de bzhin mos pa dag ngar bye
53b3(rnying rgyud): mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs pa// thams cad du yang de bzhin te// tog ni rtse mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs kyi nub pa ma yin no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// lha yi bu zhes bya ba ni// dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de// tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ gsangs
53b4(rnying rgyud): na/ ga sa sa ga su sa
53b5(rnying rgyud): thob ste// mya gnas kun du bgrod pa dang // 'byung chen lus las sprul pa dang // dza ga dag dang 'phang ba dang // mi 'chi tshol gnas pa thob// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du// mthong ba dge pa'i chos de nyid// bskal par chub byar mA m+bAr
53b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis// mthong ba sa chos 'di yongs dag pas// ye shes smon ma'i mig rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyis// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa bzhin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze kun ri bye ba zhig/ chos kyi mig ldan
53b7(rnying rgyud): don mthong nas// gsang chen gzhung bzhin spyod pa la// bram ze ga ni bya ba zhig/ dad pas don gyi rjes su 'grongs// gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshogs mthong ba// chos kyi mig dang ldan 'gyur te// don gyi snying po mthong bar 'gyur// spyan grub rtsal
54a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa la// rag 'dzin chen pa'as gad rdzog// de byazhin mthong bas dag par gyis// gzhan dag 'ad na mang na spyod la// dga'ab yid kyis phyogs byed pa// de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bral yang mthong man med//
54a2(rnying rgyud): de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig la// chom bu bcu dang bcas pa'i 'khor// dag 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs// sngags spyod 'bras bu cher thob ste// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag/ thob
54a3(rnying rgyud): ba kun du grags par gyur// de la gzhan gyi sde pa yi// bram ze dge slob bya ba zhig/ shin tu dag pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'jug cing bslab par zhugs pa las// rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsdams// bram ze dad pa ma log par// 'byor
54a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yo byad ci yod rnams// rgyal po'i 'khor du phul nas kyang // rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogs su// yid kyis phyogs te smon lam btab// rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab// rjes su yi rang dam par ni// yid la byas pa'i bsod nams kyis//
54a5(rnying rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal po dang // sgrub dang me ldan bram ze gnyis// 'bras bu mtho dman med par thob// 'di ni tshegs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i reg 'dzin yin// de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la// dga' bas rjes su yi rang gis// dge ba
54a6(rnying rgyud): skyed dang ma sprad gnyis// 'bras bu mnyam por thob par gyur// bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyal rnams 'dir bslab 'dir mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen du// kun gyi bdag por gyur pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na//
54a7(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi bram ze gsal byin gyis// gsang chen 'di yi don bslabs nas// rang gi sems la goms byas na// sems nyid bden pa'i don mthong ste// chos rnams kun la mkhas par 'gyur// kun gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas//
54b1(rnying rgyud): sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas// chos kyi rgyal por der gyur nas// sangs rgyas smra ba'i seng ge zhes// zhing khams kun du grags par 'gyur// de bzhin bslab pa dag par gyis// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// skye la nyan thos
54b2(rnying rgyud): bsam yas la// sbyin pa'i tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi yod do// ci phyir zhe na gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang // nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal ba gnyis// so so ma yin tha mi
54b3(rnying rgyud): dang // sgra dang gsung thugs gcig las med// 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par las// bsam gyis me khyab bstan par zad// de na khyad par de ltar snang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// las rnams dag pa'i bram ze ni// dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis// dga' ba'i
54b4(rnying rgyud): dang pas par skyes// gcig la gcig ni thatshig byas// gcig gis nyan thos bsdam yus la// mchod sbyin byab rgya cher byas// gcig gis tshogs mchod rgya cher byas// tshogs la spod pa'i gsal ldan ni// 'dri tshi gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// sbyin pa
54b5(rnying rgyud): spel ba'i dgo ldan ni// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub// de bas gnas 'dir stong pa dag// rnal 'byor gsal ldan tshul bzhin spyod// 'di dag rtag tu su 'chang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// tshe yon rtag tu ci 'dra bar// don gyi gzugs
54b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas par 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// khyim bdag mes sbyin bya ba de// tshom po brgya dang bcas pa zhig/ rgyun gyi rtag par 'di spyod pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra bar// skye ba de yis nges par thob// sra
54b7(rnying rgyud): dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// goms dang brjod dang spros pa yis// chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhing // yon tan sde gtsug nyid du 'gyur// de yang ji lta'u zhen// drang srong rnal 'byor shal yan sa//
55a1(rnying rgyud): drang srong rnam pa mang po la// tshogs 'di yon tan rgya cher bsgrags// don rnams nges par bshad pa las// drang srong mang pos rig 'dzin thob// ston par byed pa'i ka la ya na// gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por gyur// 'on tung gsang ba'i don 'di dag
55a2(rnying rgyud): nga nu pa'i 'grib sa/ 'an tan pa gang dang dang pang byas// dang ni yang ni cin pa dang // nga'i rnabs pa 'thob bar 'gyur// de du nga da pa tshogs// rtswa ba'i ma blags ma na// bya ba'i tshigs 'di
55a3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig rdo ldan pas// skad cig tsams mthang cig la// rgyal ba'i tshogs 'di ba bsrun na// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig 'dzin tshul 'byor mtha' dag dang // tha tshig zab mo skongs nas kyang / ga ni thob par 'gyur// des ni tshogs
55a4(rnying rgyud): srang yon tan dang // log par sbyang ba'i skyonarnams ni// sngon kyang phreng gzhib dang pa yin// zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gzungs so// sa gyi rdo rje kong gan 'dus rig pa'i mdolas 'das bsngod byung gi la ru zhes bye ste bdun pa'o// / dam
55a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de bcom ldan 'das gsang pa mchog gi bdag po de'i zhal du shin tu re zhing bka' sdod pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun du brjid par 'khor gyis bskul ba'i sa la sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'khor phal mo
55a6(rnying rgyud): ces rnam par bskul bar rig nas rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas a lA la ho zhes bya ba'i sku phyung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa/ e ma rdo rje sems chen po// rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'bang // mgon po yon tan bsam
55a7(rnying rgyud): las 'das/ cing rngub kyang ba bya 'thos pa// ma song byed da// mags ning gyis su/ byang bya ga gyi ngongs/ 'i' ba 'a rgyag 'i 'a ba ba ma
55b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs sbyar rig ma khyen// bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung // gsung lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal la// e ma gsang ba nam mkha'i thugs// mnyam nyid mi gams so gsal// kun rig sbyang po ye shes mchog/ thugs lnga' mchog la phyag
55b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// e ma me mdzad mdzad pa che// ma tshugs chags bral 'dod chags mdzod// thams cad sgrol pa'i las chen po// phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal tshab khyod la gsol ba ni// byams mgon thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// sprul pa'i
55b3(rnying rgyud): go chags ru mnyam ste// 'khor ba'i byas lings chen po la// sdug bsngal shin tu gsang pa'i phyir// thams cad dur khrod chen po ru// byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod// a ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ sems dpa' rdo rje chen po ris nal
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa'i phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus pa/ a la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po/ yang gsang bla na med pa'i bdag nyid/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rmad du byung ba'i tshig shin tu
55b5(rnying rgyud): tu la phod pa gsol ba 'tshal ba 'di shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// 'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgongs te/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i bsam pa dengs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po
55b6(rnying rgyud): des kun du 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i 'khod gyis bskor ba drang khrod sbyid gyi rol pa las rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i tshig 'di gsungs so//
55b7(rnying rgyud): ba ba tung lang tul srungs su ma su / sa lu rgyal gyi sas su sus// 'du dun phyogs bam pa'i yas pa thoms kyang dung nga ci kyil nga
56a1(rnying rgyud): nas/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ shin tu rnam par 'thor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'khor gzhan gyis yid tshod du mi 'gyur ba'i sgra'i chos bstan pa ni sku kun du dur khrod
56a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag po chen por bskyang nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang // he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang // dpal gyi chas brgyad dang // dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po dgu dang // don gyi rtags chen po bcwa brgyad dang // dur khrod kyi longs spyod lnga tshogs pa bstan pas zhal
56a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las sems dpa' rdo rje des ma khyen te/ bka' gsang dbang chen 'dis don du ni bshang/ tshig tu bsgrags par rig nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin tu ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa/ bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di/
56a4(rnying rgyud): gas na na /
56a5(rnying rgyud): snyam nas// mtshan ma rang dgar spyad bsgrubs kyang // rang bzhin 'grub par mi 'gyur te// chud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas// myu gu brlag ste ga la 'byung // gtan tshigs de bas 'di don dge/ rtsal zhan dag la bstan min zhes// gsang bdag rgyal po
56a6(rnying rgyud): kun gsung na// ci khyod rnams kyis mi shes sam// zhes rnam par smras pa las// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis slar gsol pa// e ma'o sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang dam pa 'dir gsung ngam// 'on te mi spyod dam/
56a7(rnying rgyud): zar ma lags grang / ci blang ngor mdzad dam/ e ma snang du mgyur pa ni gang mchis/ thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags na/ thong kun du rab tu thong / rnam par rab tu gsungs/ 'gag pa mi mnga' mi 'gog gsungs// ci phyer migs rdzogs
56b1(rnying rgyud): 'ad bas// rtul ba 'das padus 'ad lags// gas nga shA du'ad lags// ka' gas dkyil la bar gnas 'ad lags// gsang pa dang grad rnal 'di lags// rnyenangs ma dzangs drung// gas ba dang gsang rjod pa dang / ga
56b2(rnying rgyud): ba ye gsang khyod la 'dud// dkyil 'khor rgyal po khyong la 'dud// 'khor lo snying po khyod la 'dud// gsang chen snying po tshul ci lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags// 'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags// ma 'ongs pa yi rnal 'byor dag
56b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs na dang len 'tshal ba yi// rig par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags// 'byung chen rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de shin tu bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad de/ a a he he'i gad rgyangs
56b4(rnying rgyud): bsregs pas 'khor thams cad kyang gdargyangs kyi sgra chen po sgrogs par mdzad de/ dkris pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi dpal de dgyes pa'i rlol mo sna tshogs yid khyong myed par byung ngo // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des lus spyan bsrang ste/ dur khrod/
56b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs bas pa dz+dzi rtags bcwa bcad 'bang byar byas nas brjid pa'i gaslong gis gas sabyas rgya mtsho dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs don mi bsgrib pArtags kyi rol pa gsang badzi kyil 'khor rten po 'di dag pashad po// gcig tu yang dag sa
56b6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'o// don la rnon byed rnal 'byor rnams// thogs med nyed du'i greb 'dod pa// ji ltar bcoMg ga khan dag gis// ras dkar spangs pas tshwani 'dzin ltar// rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni// skyongs dang spyod pa'i las rnams gnas//
56b7(rnying rgyud): rdib mong 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas// sems nyid gting nas tshe gcad sbyor// theg pa dman pa'i skye bo nga // spyan cig ci la 'ang mi brtul lo// de las gyur pa'i yo byad dang // rus sbrul mgo la 'ongs pa dag/ shin tu 'khrugs pa'i
57a1(rnying rgyud): chen gyis// byamams bshags te spang bar bya// gal te gang zag dbang gas na// nyams pa'i chad pabyung ban// na rgyun kyis nyid cungab nas/ rlung shAg tsug tu ra// ma stonanam yang ston nas// zhag mangs
57a2(rnying rgyud): ga sngon logs nas// sdig sungs byang chub sems bskyed de// dge ba'i'adon la 'dun par bya// slong mo dang stong la dga' ba// blong la po'i da rnams// sde dang chen dang grar byas te// snying rje med pa'i zhing rje bya// sprin dang 'bru dang kyi rnams
57a3(rnying rgyud): dang // bzud kyi mchog tu d+ha re ba dag/ btags sam phye mdu sbyar nas kyang // klung ngam mra thung margya min // d+yor te chags med sbyin par bya// dge ba'i yod bdag dang blangs te// nad gso shes smin sri somyas// bzugs te bsti gnas mchog
57a4(rnying rgyud): zhing // dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya// gsung sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs pa yi// glegs bam zab mo kun bsten te// brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis// rgya chen yangs pa'i las rnams bya// ye shes tshogs rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// shes rab
57a5(rnying rgyud): lo ba bkar te// rgyung sbrang lhag pa'i shes rab bAlta// sho gam srang dang sho ga mA lem// mi bde gnod pa can bsal te// tshad maud snying rje'i 'kho rje lo za srod// sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyan mi gcad// chu 'am su 'am num mkha' 'am// me 'am
57a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin rlung rnams la// sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams// brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lor bya// mtshams med zlog par byed pa yi// lus sems rgyud la rdul rlags te// 'phags pa'i sprin tshogs pho brang du// rdul snyed lus kyi
57b1(rnying rgyud): babyed sems pashag+sas// rgyal mnyes las ni grus shig pa// thabs can myong ba'i las can las// rnam byan pa yi las mchog tu// ngas nam tshams cad rtog pa yin// thugs rngu 'byung ba'i 'khar langag/ gang ltar gams ltar 'bad rtsal /
57b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa spyod pa'i tshogs rnams la// sbyin mchod sbrel ba'i las rnams bya// de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la// nan tan tshogs kyi dpung chen bskyed// 'di ltar las chen ltang sogs pa// gzhan du bskyed pa ma yin
57b3(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor pa// rgyud ldan snod ldan bya phyir dang // gal te rtsa la zhan ma grub na// dge bsags lteng chen kun bsdoms te// las kyi bsags pa don bgrangs shing // gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sbags nas// nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan
57b4(rnying rgyud): ltar// rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub par gces// de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang // bdag gi don du 'gyur bar bya// de ltar spyad pa spyod pa yi// phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgo 'phel ba// chung ngu chung sogs mthar zad nas// skong ba'i rnal 'byor 'khor lo yis//
57b5(rnying rgyud): zhig dang ral dang chag 'dres dag/ bskad gso gzhug pa'i las 'di bya// las chen skong ba'i khyad par gyis// gnas su brtag par nges med de// mi sdug skyon can bkra mi shis// spangs te med par gyur pa yi// shin tu sar pa'i gnas chen dag/
57b6(rnying rgyud): bslang ba'i gnas su de 'gyur ro// de ltar yid 'ong gnas btsal nas// drod ldan bla ma spyan drangs te// sri zhu rgyal chos spyi bor bkur// de yang dmigs kyis zhu ba dag/ maN+Dal khar gsil tsam dag la// me long snying po ltar byas te// gtsang ma'i rgya las
57b7(rnying rgyud): rdzas byas pa// yid 'ong rnam lnga'i mchod pa la// rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// brgyan te bklubs pa'i sprin phung rnams// mnyes nas slongs phyir tshul la dbul// phyi 'khor sbyong ba'i mgon po la// 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi// yid bzhin
58a1(rnying rgyud): grongs spyod chen dang bcas// yon tan cha las smon bco ba mchod// mnyes nas skongs pa'i stongs su 'gyur// khams gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la// yo byad sbyin tshogs chen po las// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rangs rgyas na// mgu bas
58a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i stongs su 'gyur// dgegs su gyur pa'i bgegs ris kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi dbyung // dmigs kyis kha zas sna tshogs las// bgegs rnams mgun thams cad kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis slongs pa'i rgyur// cung zad tsam du
58a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba yin// de ltar skongs pa'i las rnams kyis// bskang bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni// rnam pa lngar ni snang ba ste// kun du nyams pa chen po dang // rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// bslang ba'i thabs kyang lnga
58a4(rnying rgyud): srid de// spyad pa'i las kyis bskang ba dang // rdzas dang don dang ting 'dzin dang // man ngag gsang ba'i thabs chen no// de dag la yang lA lnga ste// spyod pa'i tshul gyis bskang ba la// rnam pa lnga ru bshad par bya// dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste/ 61
58a5(rnying rgyud): lnga stong gsum mo// yan lag nyams par gyur pa la// snod lnga ba rtsegasum ngon par bya// bzlas nyams bcwa lnga bzugs sum// nar gyis nyams par gyur pa la// bcwa lnga gcig gsum ngag gis songs// rdzas kyis bskang ba'i thab su ma
58a6(rnying rgyud): ni// gal te bsrung ba 'ga' zhig las// byang chub tha tshig rul gyu rAn// gti mug rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // dmangs rigs bla ma stan drangs la// nyes 'gal mi bcapa stong du bshags// gser lo sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha chog sung
58a7(rnying rgyud): brlag nor des bla// byang chub sems bskyed rgyud srung mnyan// rdo rje the tshigar la gyur ni// zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas me bcab 'bum du bshags// shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen mes// tha tshing
58b1(rnying rgyud): bcwag na sun// thasam gtan tung na parnam banaH// de ldan pa rgyaganyams gyus// 6sa dgas pa ga bdang// rnam gsu thas ldan nangasaH// sa rgya ze ba cad zang bshugs/ rna pa zugs rgyan sa/
58b2(rnying rgyud): ga gang brlag tsu des tha// snagadung ring bsre rnam par blong // bad+ma'i nachog pa gyu // dzad chags dgas rgyag panang // ga rigs zla ba smin rdza sa la// tis byam sa bzab brgyur ba shags bya// b+hi dri la sogs rdzas rkye gyis/
58b3(rnying rgyud): tshig gang bzag nor das rtse// sa shad bya bab mo'i skyegs pa ma marjod// las kyi thacig la kyang na// phrag dog rigs kyi mchog bad+hA // bram ze rigs pa shes ldan drangs la// nyes byas ma~M bcab badz+ra ltar bshags// aN+Da la sogs rdzas
58b4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis// tha tshig gang brnyan no des b+ha// mchod sbyin pas de rnams las chen bya// des ni bslang ba 'i las chen 'grug// don rjes bskang ba'i nabs mcho ga sung // rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya// chos kun nam mkhar bsgoms nas ca
58b5(rnying rgyud): bag chags bzang ngan thams cad kun// ci yang med par grol bzhag/ de la goms byas nyes pa med// kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la// rgya che yengs pa'i chos mnyan te// bsam pa'i las rnams rgya cher bya// yid kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na/
58b6(rnying rgyud): ba nyams pa skong bar 'gyur// gal te yan lag nyams gyur na// chos nyid nam mkha'i don ston pa'i// glegs pam zab mo kun brtags te// don rnams rgya cher ba rtag par bya// des ni yan lag nyams pa med// bzlas na tha chog nyams gyur na/
58b7(rnying rgyud): bram skyes bu mkhas pa la// gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig/ ston pa'i yod pa ni ga ter zla // sgo ye rtsal can kun 'ang+yas te// de'i chos bdud rtsi bstan pa bsgrags// gal te gar gyis nyams kyu na// bsnyen pa'i lpags pam
59a1(rnying rgyud): cha can rnams// skyes nas nas kyi sprin par thA// des ni zhar nyams sangs par 'gyur// dung 'dzin rtsal gathabs pa chog ni// bag chags can gyi smrig ga tu// rtsa dmar 'don ma lang tsam// shan tu 'bar zhing 'tshor gas pa
59a2(rnying rgyud): bas// chags dang bcas pa'i phung po bsregs// rnam grol sems kyi rang bzhin dang // 'od kyi rang bzhin gcig pa las// dkar dang dmar dang mthing ga yi// 'od kyi thig le gsum du 'gyur// dkar por ltos pas khyab pa rje// dmar por spros pas
59a3(rnying rgyud): chags pa che// mthong gzugs kyis bon // rnam gsum gcig tu 'dus pa las// ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs// srugasung thugs kyi dam theg gongs// dkar po dang sti'i dkyil nga khyor pa// desar pyo drad pa'i drung byung bas// mtshan
59a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bag chags rnam par gtor// dmar po rna zla'i dkyil 'khor pas// mthing ga ye shes chu byung bas// dngos po'i ldan ljin thams cad bkrus// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // rnal 'byor can gyis chog 'di brjod// rdzas bsreg pa la me dgas
59a5(rnying rgyud): kyang // bag chags tshig la me me dgos// rig pa ye shes me byung bas// mtshan ma yi ni bud shing bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang // mtshan ma gtor la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdul tshogs
59a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phyag/ lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang // sems bkru ba la rgya mi dgos// mnyam nyid chu 'o khrus kyi rdzing // ye shes chu bo'i rgyun blang bas// bag chags ldan ljin thams cad bkrus// oM kro d+hi shwa ra~M sarba pA pa~M sho d+ha ya oM A hUM/ /
59a7(rnying rgyud): de skad tshig tu brjod pa yis// nyams pa'i chad pa mi 'thung ngo // gcig tu bskang ba'i las chen yid // rigs kyi rdzas dang yo byed rnams// gnas su bsags nas byin ba rlabs te// skyo nang mtshams bzed brtan byis nas// so so rigs kyi
59b1(rnying rgyud): dag / ga dag du / ga smras// sa smrasas sa sa / ga tud ga na na nagags rgyan
59b2(rnying rgyud): pa ma / pa du miganas / / nug dun /
59b3(rnying rgyud): mkha'ags pa pas// te dra ga po'i dran pas pa te// byang chubs tha'abar bar 'gyur// de lta ra gas rir byung ba dang // rnal 'byor ban gyis tshig 'di rjod// seM gshegs zug sus// drang chub sems bdags pa 'bar po// don
59b4(rnying rgyud): gtong gzhi du skyed de// sangs nas gdung chen tud skam pang // de keng rla bar rin pa// N+Da la byung ba'i rang bzhin pas// byang chub rgya chu ma khang// gzugs kyi phu po'i khri khams su// nga de mchog ma pa'i mnyam dbying chen gas pa// gnyen pas
59b5(rnying rgyud): dus pa'i thong brten pa/ bas 'ji chags das / gas 'i duji rdzog di/ ngan pa pa dag sa des rnamus nos 'dra rabasam pa'i'adon dukyang // sarbata thA ga ta ba tum ma poto// don phyog tu dang /
59b6(rnying rgyud): tsul thug tu gyur/ nga regs kyi mig sa// zus su shes med do// dodangs pa'i dadus gnas par nga bya yi 'odags pa 'bar// gsapa 'byol thug par gyur dang // phaT zhes drug tu bdabs pa mi// dad 'tsha
59b7(rnying rgyud): rje'i thalam gyi'o// ni slong po rgyags nas byung // shes rabs par 'dags pa 'bang// de ti rigs papar gyur ban// ga brjod/ ga rnams/ ma shes gsapa 'ang ba// thags
60a1(rnying rgyud): na / man mgan da can ga
60a2(rnying rgyud): ga sungam ga nas ga 'i na 'dun
60a3(rnying rgyud): par// yeng dag zhin dugs pa 'dum// sa smra nom chug du la/ oM byuN+Da bdab sgrub na/ sa na bdag gra nas// bzod rnams na shing be rtag par// de
60a4(rnying rgyud): ngar gyur ba na// na'i 'byor can kyis tshig 'di brjod// e mngon can sa// bseM nams yon tan 'od 'a bar ga ni mi nga gi zhi byung / chen rnyed panyam las// lta mapa' la tshigs 'thams
60a5(rnying rgyud): las byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis// matog 'dang dzis yal pa dang / tshor ba khamasas// che ba'i ye shes pa ma 'byung / sa pa thabs rten pas nangango dam ma thags ngam bdang // gsang bangan
60a6(rnying rgyud): ga pasu du thugs ngas bang / nga thur ba papa 'dudu bya sarba gra sa so/ da// 'i 'a 'i bral gyi gsu da migs gas sa dang chag las
60b1(rnying rgyud): ba ba / 'du gam pa masas+ho// nga cog dag byar la 'gyur ro// bzang pa 'a 'ad/ bshA' ba pa dadus gnas par// ma tha ba dung dgras pa la dang// gsu 'thog jug par shA bya// ju
60b2(rnying rgyud): sa// 'od 'dres pad+ma'i maman malas// 'dod chags rgya mamong skams gyur nas// blang kyi mi shes 'byor// de lta gsal ba bya sa na// rnal 'byor cad kyis tshig 'di 'dzad// mama' brdol gtsug las do /
60b3(rnying rgyud): gta pa zhing srid // gsung cag gdu cheni rgyang mnyamangs// des mi stor na migang// rgyalas ldar pa'i dang bzhi cig/ dazlar ba shes rab ma 'ang// dang shes sring por mang khams su rtogs pa thas shid 'o thos pas/
60b4(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i nabs chem las// bsla nga bskal pa'i thugs dam bskyed// gas bye dan kyi rdzas mcho ga 'dis// gsung mya chog bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// grangs gyur bsam pa'i don du srung // es rba twa thAg ta byams ma la to// den cig tu rjon
60b5(rnying rgyud): sa sul rdzag d+hA// ga gis kyi gas pa m-i sa y-ig da/ gas
60b6(rnying rgyud): maM rA zhin mau gas la 'ber// gsal 'gro 'khrug par gyur byan// sa kyis drug kyang rngubs pa lngas// 'od 'drim rdo rje'i la gra mis// thag dag mtshan chags pas gyur nas// rdo rje ma ye shes rabar// deg rigs la de gyung 'an/
60b7(rnying rgyud): du nam na 'du mangs / pa'i dri skyengs la/ rgyal la bya/ mya
61a1(rnying rgyud): rlab ma khad// 'du byed phung po'i zhing khams sa// gang shes mtshon ma'i 'od 'thos pas// gnyenams parnams pa'i thabs can las// bslang nga bskal bu'i thug spya sa sa// gsang bdun mams pa nga// pas
61a2(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du spang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // lus kyi brda mi tshul phyag sbyar// res kyang spong ba'i las chen 'grub// man ngag thabs kyi don mchog ni// rtsa ba
61a3(rnying rgyud): yan lag de rnams las// gang dag nyams par gyur pa la// man ngag thabs mchog lnga yis bskang // nyams pa chen por lcang 'gyur na// bla mar gyer pa'i skyes bu dag/ rgyal po dgu yi spyan lam du// sgrub pa chen po dgu brtsam zhing // mchog chen dgu
61a4(rnying rgyud): yi brtul zhugs spyad// rang gi gzungs ma gang yin pa// bla ma dgu la gzungs mar dbul// de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang // zla dang zhar las nyams pa la// sgrub pa don gyi khyad par rnams// bdun nam lnga 'am gsul ma ma gcig/ rim pa bzhin
61a5(rnying rgyud): du sbyar byas na// des ni skongs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// bskang ba'i yul yang rnam lnga ste// bder gshegs rgyal ba mtha' dag kyang // mdo ru bsdu na rnam lnga ste// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog 'di lnga dag/ rtsa bar gyur pa'i
61a6(rnying rgyud): skyes na// gzhi yang thams cad 'dis bsgyur bas// nyams dang ma nyams tha tshig dang // longs spyod spong len thams cad rnams// 'di rgya yin pa ga bya ste/ rgya nyid rgyar btags dbang gis na// bsgyur bas dug kya sman che ni ltar// de nyid mtshig
61a7(rnying rgyud): por bsgyur// 'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+mor las lnga'i rigs su 'dus// de dag thugs dam mchog nyid kyang // rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la// rtogs nas bsrung bsgrub dam bcas pa// so sor 'gal zhing
61b1(rnying rgyud): DAg nyams na// sam nyid du bas ba par bya// sku la chags nyams gnas sgra gzhug/ gsung gi 'gal 'khrug sto rla bas pa// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul gsor med de// rngarnga sbrang po'i tha chag la// bskangs pas skyongs par gyur pa sa// ga
61b2(rnying rgyud): chen dag kyang 'di lta ste// rdul ba sangs rgyas rig 'dzin gyi// gang chen dge las byed pa ma// shar d+him zhes byu ba de// byams cad smras su spyod par byed// shel gyi mi ti gnang du// dag par bajug ste bcas pa las/ 1
61b3(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i// 'ag gnag cing 'bros par 'gyur// nyims pa rmongasas ma meng rgyad cing // bras thaMd ma tshig ma nyamasas// khajig dkang zhing 'tshar byar 'gyur// legs pa'i smon tan 'byung ba // ngas ma rgya na da
61b4(rnying rgyud): ga nyig gags migs lan// s+yA te ba sgrims nas bskyor bajog pa// 'on tung nyams pas phrog cing // de dag mi rnags pan// rtags chen 'di ni bsten bya ste// 'di dag shin tu btugs nas ni// dkar pa gyur bar gyur bas/
61b5(rnying rgyud): yan laganyams pa rnamam+b+ha/ slongs nya sor chung rtags yinan// ngas nal 'byor las smyig tsor// spyong dang skyong ba'i las rnams rba// badzem ldan 'das sems dpa rdo rjes dri ga rgyas gsungs pa dang / 'khor der 'dus pad+ma lta nga
61b6(rnying rgyud): brjid gyi rje ba las lha'i rigs su byer pa sangs rgyas kyi 'khor 'phags pa 'arigs 'didag rkyen mangs pa lnga'i ba ngag po lha chen po lnga la sogs pa bka' ba dra rung bar byed gyis brlabs te 'khod pa las/ 'dod chags thams cad kyi gtso bordo
61b7(rnying rgyud): bye bya thogros ngas kyis ga/ rgyas dus phyo kyi'as gyis dus dngas bu 'gab 'thul du myong ba byang po'i phyig dung ba bye pa ba 'bye bragra gdusas /
62a1(rnying rgyud): ma/ bshang du gas pa zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das sams dpang rdo rjes bka' stsab pa/ 'dod chags kyi bdag zo la sogs pa rnams dum chag nyams pa'i chad pa'i sde gnas dudu b.lags kyis yid tsam par byungadu ba ba shang byas nyon
62a2(rnying rgyud): cig/ rtsa ba yan lag 'di dag las// gal te zhig gam nyams kyang na// rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las// lung gi gsang sgor zhugs pa'i tshe// don dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rdo rje tha tshig byin brlabs nas// lce la dam tshig chu bzhag pa/
62a3(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba rdo rjer dmod btsugs nas// yi ge hU~M du byas pa de// snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang // lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa'i// khro bo rak+Sha zhes bya ba'i// khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas ni// snying khrag pa zhibs te 'thungs nas ni// sdug bsngal
62a4(rnying rgyud): chen por bsad nas kyang // dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// gal te tha tshig ma nyams na// lce la bzhag pa ar+g+ha ste// snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang // ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang bar// gyur te sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas sras su
62a5(rnying rgyud): skyed par byed// 'dod chags dam tshig nyams gyur na// mngal gyi grong khyer chen por 'gro// zhe sdang dam tshig nyams gyur na// rak+Sha srin po'i rigs su 'gro// gti mug dam tshig nyams gyur na// mi gtsang zas su nga ba yi// rmongs pa'i phag chen
62a6(rnying rgyud): lus su ltung // nga rgyal dam tshig nyams gyur na// rus sbal nag po'i lus su ltung // phrag dog dam tshig nyams gyur na// chu min mgo dgu'i lus su ltung // dam tshig chen po kun nyams na// ru dra nag po'i lus su ltung // las kyi rkyen dang ma phrad du// thar pa
62a7(rnying rgyud): skabs ni mi srid do// sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po rig 'dzin rnams kyis shin tu tshe de chen po 'byin cing dus der e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na bdag la ltung rgya mchis te// dang
62b1(rnying rgyud): po bcom ldan 'ad kyi bka' la btags pa'itshe/ bka' lam dang mgus pas bka' la slar cing spus long btags pa dang / ston pa dang grogs la smad cing spus long btags pa la sogs pa ltung ba'i rgyu mang po bgyis pas/ nga ni bdag kyang chud pa'i skye
62b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su che bar nges na// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bzung ste bka' 'khor du bkod pas da ni thar pa thob lags zeng / 'od kyang 'gyod pa drag po'i dbang gis yid kyi sgrib pa ni byang chub sems kyis bshags/ ngag gi sgrib pa tshig tu 'dzin
62b3(rnying rgyud): rjeng skyes te bshags/ lus kyi sgrib pa ni lus gdan thi la phul te bshags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes gzung 'tshal na gnyen po ni gang lags/ thabs ni ji ltar bshags/ yul ni gang la bshags/ rgyu ni gang mchis bcom ldan 'das
62b4(rnying rgyud): kyis bi shad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa thugs rjes bsgrub tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rig 'dzin chen po me thod can rnams nyon cig/ ltung bar gyur pa'i gnas rnams la 'gyod par gyur nas zhus pa legs so// ltung
62b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnyen po ni gang zhe na/ nyes byas rnams bshags par 'dod na gang 'gyod pa drag po skyes nas pa sru ni gzings mche ma 'byin pa yin no// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// gang zhe na/ shes rab chen po'i rgyud kyis bag chags thams cad rang bzhin
62b6(rnying rgyud): med par shes pa dang // ting nge 'dzin chen po'i mes bag chags thams cad bsregs te med par bya ba dang / byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bag chags kyi mun nag thams cad bsal te de dag dgu par bya ba dang / spyod pa rlabs po che'i chus bkru bya'o//
62b7(rnying rgyud): de la bshags par bya ba'i yul ni 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas dang / reg 'dzin dang / lha dang / bla ma dang / glags bam dang / grogs po dang / rten du gyur pa rnams so// bshags par bya ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa che chung bshags pa'o// nyon
63a1(rnying rgyud): mangs pa rags pa mngon du chub bshags pa dang / bag la nyal dang shas bya'i sgrib pa bshags pa la// de'i phyir ldang bar gyur ba'i las rnams 'gyod pajug pas dren la thabs la mkhas pa srung byad ste// sgribapa che chung cha shas kyis
63a2(rnying rgyud): kyil gus par bshags pa kyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rig 'byin po na pa me'i thod pa can rnams mdu zhing rangs ten la 'arjor sbyor pa'i rtsag byas nas// 'gyod cing gdung ba'i sgra 'di blangs so// la shis phra mchog
63a3(rnying rgyud): khor ste// rnam su bzhin du zhes pa mi mnga' yang // rigs rje gas la'od bzhin byoms mdzod // / bde dag shegs bzhugs shing du dgal dgongs su gso// 'arjod med shes radri mi ga mo chos mchog dbyings// ba de chen 'ongs slong
63a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sgra rigs lnga'i gtso// thugs rje thabs mkhas kyu tshe rol pa yi// cho 'phrul sbrul ba'i tshogs pa rgyag 'tshal lo// dngos su 'thor dang mid kyis sprul pa 'i// kun du bzung po'i gre med mchod sprin gyis// mkha' dbyings rna ma dag rgya chen
63a5(rnying rgyud): yongs bkang nas// gyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya cher mdzod// kun du bzang lo yum gyi b+ha ga la// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pa'i// gnyis myed byang chub sems kyis mnyes b+har cig/ sems kyi rang bzhin chos dang ngas nam mkha'//
63a6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rnam dag rgya che 'od gsal bas// rnal 'byor nyid dbyings spabs ma las 'das pas// mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud// kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas bdal ba la// gyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni// snang srid nam
63a7(rnying rgyud): dag sun pazang chum gyi dbyings// 'byung dang 'thung 'gyur la sus sbyin rdzogs rnams// gas na rdzogs grangs can bdag nyid ma// gnyis meng theg ma chen par 'dags la pa// car yang srung bas bden na gsung drung // 'dra
63b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan yab yum dang // byang chub lham dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs// rdo rje lha mo tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag/ ma ltar byams shing srid ltar gdung la sogs// nyes legs ltang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod
63b2(rnying rgyud): dbang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// thugs rjes gdung 'tshe ba rdo rje thod pa can// bdag cag dregs pa'i bdag po 'dir tshogs kun// 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed de// bla med go 'phang 'thob par bya ba'i phyir// bstan pa rgya mtsho
63b3(rnying rgyud): so'i 'dul khrims dang // sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog/ 'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang lhag pa'i khyad par dam tshig rnams// snga phyi mnos shing gnyer du ma'o 'tshal// don las gol zhing ldog sems ma mchis//
63b4(rnying rgyud): kyang // gdod bya long yod snyam po dril lo dang // klong du gyur pa'i rtse la shugs chung ba yis// shes bzhin ma ldan dam tshig 'gal 'gyur te// dang po'i thatshig bka' la btags pa'i tshe// bka' la mgus 'gal bgyis dpyas long btogs// drang
63b5(rnying rgyud): bslab pa'i gnyid chen pog pa'i tshe// bslab la mi brtson don la g.yel ba dang // za ma 'di tshe 'bras bu sgrub pa na// bka' dang gzhung bzhin ma lcogs don las 'gral// tshong dang mtshor sgrib pa che chung rnams// shin tu mi shes ma rig dbang gis na
63b6(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal bgyis pa// dpa' bo thugs rjes bdag la bzod par gsol// 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// las kyi dbang gis bdag cag ring du 'khyams// nyon mongs phog par lta ba'i dug 'thungs te// sdug
63b7(rnying rgyud): bsngal nad kyis shin tu gdungs pa la// bde gshegs thugs rje span pa'i rgyal po bis// dam tshig bdud rtsi thar pa'i spyan stsal bas// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i nad rnams zhi mdzad cing // bla med byang chub snying por 'tsho mdzad pa// byams mgon thugs
64a1(rnying rgyud): rje'i bdag la skyabs su mchi// zhes ngus nas/ a la la ho zhes brjod de gnyen po drag por bsten nus lus gdan khrir phul te/ byang chub sems kyis rnam par 'dud pa'i don la rnam par spangs pas lus gcer bu zang mar phyung // gnod
64a2(rnying rgyud): pa drag po'i 'gyod pa byas pas bde bar gshegs pa rnams mnyes par gyur to// des sgrib pa byang zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i rtags lus gos dang phral nas ldan pa'i thod pa yang zla ba tshes brgyad par gyur to// sa thob pa'i rtags su de bzhin
64a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i zhabs rten du gnas par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de dgyes te bka' stsal pa/ mi'i thod pa can rnams 'gyod pa'i las kyis bshags pa legs te/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur to// da ni shes bya'i sgrib pa dag
64a4(rnying rgyud): sa rdzogs rjes byu da pa 'a sags gsadu lags gsas sa nyi / de banisanas sang ba bdun bras thayos rdzogs par 'gyu / skad ces gsungs pas 'bying bas ma sa
64a5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las skong ba las kyi bslub lugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog nyid ting nge 'dzin rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
64a6(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po yang ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyang sna tshogs 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal
64a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis chos thams cad ci yang med par mthong ngo // chos thams cad ci yang med par gsal bar gyur pa dang / chos nyid stong pa'i nam mkha' las brag ca'i tshul du sgra 'di byung ngo // mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral// ma chags chags bral yul
64b1(rnying rgyud): las 'das// ci yang mi 'byung cir ma yin// rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral// zhes sgra byung bas ston pa ni don gyi che ba sbyang / 'khor rnams ni rdzal sbyangs// thams cad don la dam zhing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das
64b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid snying rje rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la snying rje byang chub sems kyi gzugs brnyan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhig shar bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i
64b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams yang dag par rtog pa 'di ltar skyes te/ e ma chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar yin pa las 'di ltar ma shes pa'i 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor byed pa 'di yang snying rje zhes snying rje byang chub kyi sems skyes par gyur to// de nas
64b4(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo // yongs la khyab pa'i nyi ma'i 'od// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// rnam rtog mun pa sel byar snang // yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'o// zhes sgra byung ba las chos thams cad byang chub sems
64b5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'od zer du gsal bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog gi bdag po de nyid cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis nyi ma'i snying po las
64b6(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rgya yi ge a dkar po shar bar mthong ngo // de nas a las cho 'phrul snga byung ngo // a ni chags med yi ge'i mdzod// cho 'phrul rtog pa kun gyi rgyu// nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdong // rngo 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i chu// zhes
64b7(rnying rgyud): bas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis chos thams cad cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de tsa yang mi mdzad pa cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du sdang bar gyur to// de nas yum chen mo nam
65a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' dbyangs phyag sa zhes rgya 'an mas thams cad nam ma kha thag rnyan bya rlob bzhi rgyun dang na la mas par gagasus// zhugs par byung ba dang 'dus pa sam na dang kyis thams cad namamakha' khyab bar
65a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i snying po las 'od zer mthing ga 'phros nas nyi ma'i snying po'i a la bskul bas yi ge e mthing ga 'gros te lding zhing gnas pa las tshe 'phrus kyi rang sgra 'di byung ngo // a ni e yi rang bzhin te// a las e byad mkha'
65a3(rnying rgyud): khyab bdal// mi 'gyur thogs med bsum las 'das// mtha' dang dbus med kun du bdal// zhes spa byung bas/ thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du phyam chad par gyur to// de nas yang yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyag mas yang zhing g.yo ba rlung gi dkyil
65a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa phralA mchu'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas rlung de las rgyo 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo // a yi byin brlabasu ye shes las// rlung gi cho 'phral lo du shar/
65a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'degs pa'i stobs ldan zhing // rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'gro// zhes sgra byung bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil par gyur to// de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyag ma zhes bya ba des 'bar 'phro mo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
65a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas mo'i 'od zer la cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba/ a yi byin brlabs ye shes las// cho 'phrul me yi snying por shar// 'bar bas gsal byed ye shes 'phro/
65a7(rnying rgyud): dngos po kun zad me klong 'tshub// ces sgra byung bas me'i bskal pa 'byam klas so// de nas yang yum rin chen dbyings phyag ma zhes bya ba des sdud pa rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyi chos thams cad tshul
65b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gnas par ya nga // de nas nga kyi'adra bar las tsha phrul tsas 'ad byung // rgyus lag 'ad na pas// rtswam d+ha ba na pagang // nams tu nga nyam pan/ A \u0f7fthams cad nus par gyur// was m+b+ha byung bas
65b2(rnying rgyud): da yum drin chen dbyings phyug ma'i rang bzhin gyis khyab par gnas so// de nas yum chen po rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya bas zhing khams thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal ma
65b3(rnying rgyud): 'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas sa rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi snga byung ba/ mi dmigs pa las sna tshogs par// snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung ba// rnal 'byoras badz+ra
65b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i don// lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che// zhes smra byung bas sa dgra 'dul ba'i bye brag tu thugs su rgyud par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de ri bo brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// des 'dus pa pa la
65b5(rnying rgyud): sengs pa rdong nga shing // de seM 'i 'i la khye / dgas 'dag ba sa
65b6(rnying rgyud): par byed// rjes sgra byung bas rdo rje 'bring ba'i dngos nyon mongs pa'i ri bo rnams cad zil gyis mchod to// de na sa dbyings phyug mtshan mo lnga/ shes rab za mo'i gzhal yas yum gyi mkha' klong rnam dag ces tha ba Sh+Ti tIng nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs
65b7(rnying rgyud): sa// rdzus snying po chos tshe 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung // thugags rje'i 'od zer las// bajug shegs pazhugs pa gzhal yas khang // rnam mkha'i mtha' snar dpag tu med// dus gsus rtul ba rgya mtsho'i byung sa// zhes sgra byung ngo //
66a1(rnying rgyud): blang bas nam mkha' thams cad pho brang gi gzhal yas 'byam klas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog de nyid chos thams cad skul yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam phyag rgya thams cad rnam par spab
66a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man
66a3(rnying rgyud): tshad du rdzogs par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'khor ba 'dod pa khams ni chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs/ 'khor ba gzugs kyi khams ni zhing chen gyi sa gzhi bdal ba la rdzogs par mthong ngo // keng rus la gzugs med pa'i khams
66a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par mthong ngo // ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi gcal dang // a spa gar ba'i 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrigs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo //
66a5(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin po che'i steng na rdo rje rtse gsum dang rtse lha'i brag gtams pa la kr-i ya dang u pa ya dang yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo // rdo rje brag chen gyi steng na pad+ma dkar po'i maN+Dal la bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad rdzogs par mthong ngo // pad+ma'i steng na
66a6(rnying rgyud): ma nyi shu rdza bzhi dang / zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyor du bkod pa la dbang phyug pho nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbang phyug pho mo'i steng byol song gi gtso bo brgyad nI rig 'dzin chen po'i rnal 'byor nyon mongs pa sbyangs nas
66a7(rnying rgyud): shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir dpa' brtun stag dang / 'jigs byed seng ge dang / gdug pa'i gzig dang / gtum pa'i dom dang / stobs kyi glang po dang / brjid pa'i mahe dang / 'dzin pa'i chu srin dang / zhe sdang gi sbrul rnams la rig 'dzin
66b1(rnying rgyud): thams cadas la yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // gzhal yas chen po 'bar ba la yum kun du bzung ma rdzogs par mthong ngo // me dpung chen po dgu la ye shes kyi sgo dgra brtsegs su yongs su 'bar bar rdzogs par mthong ngo // zhabs brgyad lags pa'i sum pan//
66b2(rnying rgyud): dang / skom ba ni rdzogs par mthong ngo // dur khrod pa rgyan chen po badra brgyad ni me mo chen mo bcwa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par gsalalo// phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni phra men ma brjid thug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na khung bcu 'bar ba'i kha nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'thob/ mkha'
66b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na seng ge kha glal ba brgyad kyi kha nas ral gri 'bar ba brgyad 'phro ba/ shugs 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na stag mche ba gtsigs pa brgyad kyi kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba/ ma mo brgyad dbyug par 'gyur ba'i phag
66b4(rnying rgyud): nam mgro brgyad rdo rje lubu rgyud kyis btags nas klad la bskor ba/ 'brar ma brgyad dbyug par 'byung ba'i lag na me dpung 'bar ba brgyad las tha lam 'thong de/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sugs pa'o// phyag bzhi bcurtsa gnyis ni khrag 'thung 'bar ba ba'i/
66b5(rnying rgyud): gang pho dgu mo dgu/ za byed pha bcu gsod byed ma bcu ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sku gsal lo// zhal nyi shu rtswa gcig ni srid pa za byed gsang ba'i dur khrod nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo// spyan 'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni he ru ka yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhir gsal lo/
66b6(rnying rgyud): dbuti shu rtsa gcig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gzug tu gsal lo// g.yas kyi dbu bdun sde gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi sku re byung ba'i dbul 'khor ma 'di zer dang bcas pa ra bar ba/ dekris kyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi dpur re byung ba'i
66b7(rnying rgyud): li rin po che'i mchod rten 'bar ba bdun du gsal ba/ g.yon gyi dbu bdun pas dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi sbu re re byung ba'i dbul nor bu rin po che bdun du gsal ba/ 'khor lo dang mchod rten dang / rin po tshod dag gi lte ba dang / bum pa dang / rtse mo las rtsa
67a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan chen ma brda 'bar ban rta bya'u lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gdul bya sha pa'i tshal ma tshan dang / gAHna gzan gzig gi rgal mtshan dang / smub rba rngu rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / ran chen sbrul nag ga rgyal mtshan dang / dpa' bo stag/
67a2(rnying rgyud): gyi rgyal mtshan dang / gzi mdangs me'i rgyal mtshan dang / dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang / rtsal chen seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / gtum chen du mu gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan dri rnams kyi ts+tsho mo gcig tu 'dus te/ gser gyi gtsug
67a3(rnying rgyud): tor tog stong 'bar ba mo// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis zhabs kyi gdun khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbu las byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rgyal mtshan chen po bcu la rdzogs
67a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor yongasu su rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbu'i gtsug tor chal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gser gyi tog stong ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo // de ltar mthong zhing gsal bar gyur pa dang // chos thams cad skye la
67a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i don la 'khor thams cad dam zhing ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis skul yongs su bstod pa/ oM ma'o chos kun spru la longs smra rdzogs pas chos kyi sgra// rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal te ru ka/ chos nyid
67a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' la sbyar tshogs rgyas pa'i sra// dbyar gyi char sprin gtibs pa lta bu'i gzugs// chu rlabs lta bur brjod pa'i zhal gdangs shing // nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bdal ba bzhin// theg chen dgu dang 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// phyag rgya gcig tu
67a7(rnying rgyud): bkod nas rdzogs pa'i sgra// sgra gsum snyan grub chos sku tog stong 'bar// dpe sba kham nag ral pa'i cod pan can// klu rgyal 'dzam gyis bslabs shing mchod kun 'bul// rdo rje gsung gis ljags spa brdabs pas kyang // hUM dang phaT tsaM lnga sba
67b1(rnying rgyud): 'jog pa grogs// b+hag can dan ma gsang sngags blags pa 'jig/ 'bar ba ldan ma than dum klog wAr laH// smyan dam bzag pa'i srang mag ta sbyar 'bar// 'bar ba shangs nas drasmra pa'i ga 'gyu// dang rgyan da
67b2(rnying rgyud): gnam lcags ser chen 'bebs// rno dpal mche bzang yag gtsigs pa yis// nyon mongs log lha'i tshogs la ngam zhing 'khrug/ thod rus sha khrag rkang rus 'bru dang rnag/ za byed rngam pa'i zhal du chem che ma gsol// sbrul gdug ko rlon la
67b3(rnying rgyud): sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan// rngam pa'i sku la shin tu brjid par brgyan// za byed rngam dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad// 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun// dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjid
67b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin me banagacig // gsadun chog 'bar sh+tha sgrug pa byu/ da kyi brjod pa'i ma la sa sa thus nga byur byer / nga sa nga
67b5(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag po hUM nyid phyug rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to// sgo brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chos nyid rgyun sti ting nge 'dzin zhes b+ha bya'i ting nge 'dzin ma skems par zhums
67b6(rnying rgyud): so// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' rngon gyi sgrogs pa mA la// sbyar tshogs rig pa'i yig bris te// 'byung chen bzhi pa sgra bsgrags pas// gsang sngags chos kyi rgyan mi 'chad// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya
67b7(rnying rgyud): ba yongs su rdzogs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// stod gsum b+han d+ha'i bzang khong du// srid gsum sems can dug chen las/
68a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas pasumasangasan kya lal du// masadzunas// sa gsugs du na da dang na tu na chu 'dun pa smrams par rdzags/ na rdzas gas
68a2(rnying rgyud): so// 'khor ba rgya mcho po khyad rnams// mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan yin te// sred pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kud// kun bzang mchod sbyin mchog tu rol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas
68a3(rnying rgyud): brjod rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las// sems can sangs rgyas snying po shang // sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig// ces gsungs so// /
68a4(rnying rgyud): nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sbyor ba rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis// 'du 'bral med par sbyar bas ni// thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su
68a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed// ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ba rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i zhing 'dri dag/ ye shes 'byor ba'i mtshon chen gyis// rang bzhin mo
68a6(rnying rgyud): par bsgral nas ni// mnyam nyid chos sgra chen por btod// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje snying po de sgra gdung rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs
68a7(rnying rgyud): khams pang rim khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med bu ma rten bum par bcas// gdung chen chos skur rgyan du gnas// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// nam mkha' me chus rlung rnams// rmang gzhi re rab
68b1(rnying rgyud): rten du snang // bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams// de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brtan// ri bo bum rten bum par bcas// 'di yang chos sku rgyun mi chad// sems dpa'i rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dzugs pa'i yan lag bzhi rmang rten// 'khor
68b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen khri 'phang brtan// yan lag dang po bu mnyen bcas// ljang lo cod pan phreng bas bklubs// zhes gsungs so// de na sa sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des shrI ba yongs su spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ro yi sgrub
68b3(rnying rgyud): lpags chen po ni// dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams su// ro yi rdzas rnams btsal nas kyang // 'dod pa bsgyur ba'i sngags kyis gdab// ro yi stong du gnas nas ni// ro yi gnyen por bdag bsnams nas// ro sngags rgyan mi 'chad par bzlas// rol
68b4(rnying rgyud): bkrag dang medangs byung ni// grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags yin te// rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin bya// ri ni 'grel bar gyur pa dang // gser 'gyur gyis ni byug par bya// ro yi yan lag sman bcings nas// sngags ni dag par bzlas par bya// de nyid
68b5(rnying rgyud): langs par gyur pa dang // ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas// ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi// rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur// lce bcad ral gri
68b6(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha des// ro yi b+han d+ha bcad pa dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste// b+han d+ha go ru bzung nas ni// lce yi ral gri thogs nas ni// lha min g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur// ro langs grub pa'i rkang mgyogs ni// dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa
68b7(rnying rgyud): ste// skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa bzhis// phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas nas// dus gcig mda' yi rgyang 'phangs nas// mda' nis la ma 'bebs par// bzhi ka bar snang las blangs nas// skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten skor// skyes bu lag tshod ma
69a1(rnying rgyud): sa sasu chu da su na smras/ na nan/ smran sa// klun tu /
69a2(rnying rgyud): kha brim gas zhes bya ba'i ting di 'dzin mi rnams pa zhugs nas 'di rjes gsungam sa// rnamam pa' da brnams sas / dzin da pa d+ma b+ha byan// ngan sbyinas grwa'i byabs tshul na// rdzams la brjod ni// de 'i'i
69a3(rnying rgyud): ngas sa ma smras nga// sna da 'dag ma khams ba// des nasems ma 'angs par gyur// sa gsangs sa// denas yangasasas pa dzi ba cas na gtsun pags pa'adi de 'dzin la rnams pa chu sa te'i ts+tshe
69a4(rnying rgyud): sa gsu mas// ma rjes gtams pa na/ 'dzi na gas la bar thar pa dang// ma chen par bso sa te// rnamacher gnas pa'i sas spya rnams// de 'di nas nas par \u0f7f// zhes su y-i sa// de na
69a5(rnying rgyud): ting pa gis med byu zla dbye la khyong pa mams par thugs nas 'din kyi gas sas// rnams pa'i jig ga yan la// zla 'i dal lakhyi sa gas pa//
69a6(rnying rgyud): skyes gsungs so// de nas yi sems dpa'i darje snying songs nyim rab snang ba zhes ma pa mi nge 'dzin la rnams par zhugs nas 'dri na pas gsangs so// rnams pa 'dug gi 'dul/ nyi sa'i kyil la sa ga skye ba//
69a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nas pad // mun pa'i gnas rnams sems cad bas pa// gsungs 'o// derjes sa s+yAng bangs sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhis khri zhes kya nga 'dzin pa snyams par grags so// rdul ra rjegs pa
69b1(rnying rgyud): la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal 'bar// bsgoms te ting 'dzin rtas pa dang // chu rgyan babs te gzhil bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des stong gi 'jig rten chung mar 'phen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par/
69b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor las kyi dkyil 'khor du// stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa dang // ting 'dzin rtsal can rab spang phyir// nam mkha'i khams su 'phangs nas ni// sa nas saM ru s+phar
69b3(rnying rgyud): bar bya// de skad ces gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar
69b4(rnying rgyud): ba las// 'od zer 'bar ba 'bum 'phros pas// 'od zer de dag re re las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'phros pas// des ni mun pa thams cad sel// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de 'brang ba chen po bskal pa'i chu rgyan zhes
69b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor lag pa'i 'khor lo las// chu zla'i snying por bshar te// bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun bab pas// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me chen gsod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems
69b6(rnying rgyud): dpa'i rdo rje de sku'i phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rin chen 'bar ba'i ling+ga la// sangs rgyas ye shes dpal gyi sku// rin chen 'bar ba'i ngos brgyad la// rig pa'i ma mo dpal 'bar ba// brgyad
69b7(rnying rgyud): drigasal bar gyur pa dang // ye shes rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa rdo rdo rje snying po des gsung gi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting rje 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// pad+ma 'bar du
70a1(rnying rgyud): let+pa la// ran chen 'bar bang yig 'bru brgyad// shin tu 'ab ba ning 'gro 'dra ba// gsung ga rtsa ba'i myug rgya len// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje de thugs kyi phyag rngu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
70a2(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ling+ga la// yi ge hU~M gi 'bru yis bskor// mtha' ma rin chen yig 'bru brgyad// kha dog mthing gas bskor ba ni// thugs kyi gsang ba'i ye shes yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo
70a3(rnying rgyud): rje des ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo 'di gsungs so// sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang // mdo bzhin snang bar ma gyur kyang // sems nyid brtags pa de ltar 'gyur// gdos bcas dmigs bus mi mthong yang // mngon shes yid
70a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs can gyis mthong // gang ltar brtags par yun brtags na// rtog partas pa'i 'bras bu ni// mngon sum gsal bar red par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge'i bag chags dang // yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin rnams// bag chags rtas pa kho nar
70a5(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gshegs shul te// 'jig rten gang zag lam yang yin// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma
70a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs// log pa'i lam bzhi mtha' bsal nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug/ des na sgrub pa'i lam mchog 'di// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya// shin tu gus pas mnyan par gyis// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis
70b1(rnying rgyud): gsang brtsong pa'i phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po bdag cag rnams la gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ bka' gsang ba chen po ye shes rmad du byung ba/ sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i shul
70b2(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa'i dron bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa las sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de/ btsun mo'i tshogs la dgyes par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
70b3(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+ma ni// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i pho brang ste// sngon 'das rgyal ba brnal ba'i dbyings// da ltar bzhugs pa gnas pa'i rton// sbed kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul// rgyal ba rnams la de ltar snang // de ltar ma shes 'khor ba'i
70b4(rnying rgyud): lam// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyes// yul gyi mchog ni 'dir gzung ba// mtshan ldan pakra shai stu gsang ba'i smras// sprin dmyas dang la lag sor pa// tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad // kha nas ut+pal dang ldan zhing // yid 'ong
70b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed// sgra 'jam mthon mthing lcang lor 'khril// so dkar tshags dam smin dgyes ring // zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan// dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams 'khyug/ sgra bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rigs// lus drang
70b6(rnying rgyud): ske ring sems ma'i tshul// nA ma'i dkyil 'khor zla rgyas 'dra// sha dkar tshags dam khril bag can// khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jam// skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu sgrogs// ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan// skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung // gzungs
70b7(rnying rgyud): su byin gyis brlabs pa ni// de yi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa de// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yum lnga'i skur cho ga gsal// rdo rje thabs la'ang de bzhin
71a1(rnying rgyud): s+yA ga sa ba // mam // gdung na ga nA/ sa / na nga // na sa na na/ @
71a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang ma 'gags pa// rig pa rang ldang mnyam pa 'o// mkha' dbyings rnam dag pa de chen grong // mi gnas padab chen po'i khyed// rig pa thabs s+ho bzhin pas// rte nA pa rnaM sna nga dbang dang gis gas la// bzhin mdog ma pa gyus // dargyal
71a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyes che sprin dkyus ring // mig gi mdangs gsal dkyus sa dang // dung chen thags dam shas mdog chags// bzhin gyi gzangs ring gos koH// lus la rnam pa'i dri ldang zhing // kha nas gzar dang ldang bya// rna ma'i dkyil mtho nu mar 'khyil/
71a4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma can zhes bya bar grags// dud can ma zhes bstan pa ni// dkar mo zla ba'i mdang s+ya su gas lnga// bzhin lus drang ltar g.yas sA g.yo// gtsug drud mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil// skad che gdangs snyan rtsig tu gas la// bong chung lus ni mdzem
71a5(rnying rgyud): par snang // bu mo mig dring zhes bya ba// shes rab gsal zhing 'dod pa che// gtso bo nges pa'i brtul zhugs can// zla gsang dkar dmar drung kar g+ha~M// rnam par brdeg cing 'khyil pus ni// kun gyis drod ni yong mi lon// gsang ba spras pa'i
71a6(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas// phye nang drung kar gser ltar lci// rtog pa med cing don la gzhol// bzhin ni grwa bzhi'i dbyebs ldan la// mig ring phra ba shad 'khyil bag chags// dkar dmar mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis batshan// ljon pa dag gi rigs smos pa// sngo
71a7(rnying rgyud): po la lag mang po'i dkyil// shin tu 'dab rgyas yal gar legs// mthon mthing sgra yi rang bzhin ni// byang chub sems 'drar lung lor bshad// stod spad kun du phral legs// srid du ring zhing ldem bag can// lcag zan zhes bya'i mtshan mo
71b1(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis ti shu rtsa lnga pa// rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phog cing // mu la rak+Shar ldan pa la// phra zhing bshad la gzangs su ring // ban glang ser mo gru bzhi la// kham la mig 'bur smin tshogs che// skra kham mA la so che zhing // sna ring 'gram skang
71b2(rnying rgyud): ring pa yir// ri mo can gyi bud med ni// nag lo k+Sha gsum gyid mgom// tho gti chen la ge ma ga gzugs// klong gcig yan pag gtan med bya'o// sde ba'in myed pam+bu shAs// mi rag yal gnyis tshig yin// pre ni da/ bstan mo
71b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // gang dag dang ldan brtul zhugs can// yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams// dad pa chags shing lus 'bul na// thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya// rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa// de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas// mad du gsang ba'i mchod/
71b4(rnying rgyud): sa 'di pa gas su / rlu tugs pa'i da / ma pamigs sa da sa
71b5(rnying rgyud): tu gyur pa kun// rtsi 'am barbad dang sbyar nas kyang // nang gi rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya// rjes kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mi dmigs chos la b+h+yo sbrengs phyir// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don// rgya cher shin tu
71b6(rnying rgyud): da par bya// phung po sgyu mar snang bas na// sems la rang bzhin med par nges// snang srid nam mkhar gcig pas na// 'khor ba sgyu ma yin par nges// kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod yin pas// sangs rgyas gzhan na med par nges// byams la dang
72a1(rnying rgyud): ma chags pas na// sdang la sems mi 'khrug par nges// gnas la nges pa med pas na// sa rnams bgrod pa med par nges// sems la skye shi med pas na// 'pho 'gyur dag la nyam ming // des na thams cad sgyu mar snang // sgyu ma rang
72a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin med shes pas// thams cad chos nyid snying po yin// mtshan ma rtog pa'i dri ma dag/ chos nyid chu bo des bkrus na// 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag par 'gyur// de nas rgyan gyi cho ga ni// rdzas kyi yo byad yin pas na// rlob cing 'phur ba'i chas gos dong // na//
72a3(rnying rgyud): chen phrog dang rna char bcas// 'jol sgeg mgul rgyan la sogs pa// dpung rgyan do shal se mo do// nor bu rin chen la sogs brgyan// rkang gdub lag gdub la sogs pa// gser dang dngul la sogs pas brgyan// rol mo sgra dbyangs sna tshogs
72a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// mchod rdzas sna tshogs thogs par bya// de nas 'dren pa'i cho ga ni// gsang ba'i tshig gis bsreb na// rdo rje lce yi dam tshig gis// tshig gi brdas ni mtshon par bya// sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes kyang besre// ra gi ya mi zhes
72a5(rnying rgyud): brjod na// ra ha haM zhes brjod par bya// ti pa su ki zhes brjod na// gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon// a ti pu ho zhes brjod na// pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon// g.yas kyi smin ma bskyod byas na// g.yon gyi sprin mas mtshon par bya// nA sa g.yas kyis mtshon
72a6(rnying rgyud): byas na// de bzhin nus g.yon gyis mthon// gtsug tor gtsug tu mtshon byas na// de bzhin dpal be'u'i ling+gar mtshon// rdo rje ling+ga 'od 'phron// pad+ma ze 'bru 'bar 'phro 'khyil// zhes pa'i tshig gi don rnams bsre// bskul ba'i cho ga khyad pa
72a7(rnying rgyud): yang // don gyis 'di ltar bskul bar rigs// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyos// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od la bskul// bskul ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang // mchod pa'i yo byad dbul bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
72b1(rnying rgyud): dang drugs papar gyur // / shes banying 'dakyi bya'ong ma dang dugasas bar bya// ngan rgyang thar bas 'ad byud ces pan smra// mag nga phyagag tum mdag sasasmras// rnam pa btan du tu dwa // dong ba da nga dang /
72b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra'i 'al// dgyes pa rob pa'i don la babyings su gsol// de skad ces bskul ba dang / zla ba'i drod zer las 'di skad ces bskul to// rang 'ong 'byor d+han rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings// shes rab zang mon ma dag pa dngas// b+ha curang rang nga/
72b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyod mchog ma// yid 'ong 'byor ldan rdzo 'phrul sna tshogs bstan// zhes gsungs so// de nas yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad shin tu 'bul ba zhes bya ba'i cho 'phrul byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer las smra byung ba/ pad+ma'i ze 'du 'bar ba 'di// 'dzum pa'i
72b4(rnying rgyud): du gyis tshu lags me// dkyim smyes sa / ba'i 'a zer ba rjo b+h+ri sa bla g+sa/ em me rdzog sum// brdu pa'i de bar 'byas// ba gza 'gyel ba la/
72b5(rnying rgyud): na nga chung 'bar// zhes twa blang bas// b+hag N+DI tshogs kyi rgyo dz+wal 'byung ba'i rgyu ra // de na sa sems rjo rjengam pa des 'ayong bamams kyang drugs rjes yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par drad nas/ ba
72b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rjo pa bye ba las 'dri drung // 'i dadang po thams cad // rdzogs pa'i dbying b.rig ca ma yin// chags pa rnam par snang ba'i phyir// 'dud pa gnas sa drung ba bya// zhes byung ngas/ de bang bya ng+yas pang dag rje
72b7(rnying rgyud): po'i lhung bzed kyis bzung ngo // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de sgrib pa sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lang+ga la// a yi ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chags pa'i sgrib pa'i bud shing rnams/
73a1(rnying rgyud): mA la ye shes kyis kyang smras// de nas snang sems do / b+hU rgyas rgyab pa la snyoms pa nag+sas nasag+sa smra pa/ la byung bar snang ba'i thos rnams pa/ / sngags pag// rgyam kyi lus kyi lan gan ga//
73a2(rnying rgyud): bum lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des chags pa thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos nyid nam mkhar rtogs gyur na// sbyor slol ma
