73a3(rnying rgyud): po ci byas kyang // chags sdang drang ba'i thabs yin te// rdul cha tsam yang snang ba med// ces gsungs so// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad la dgyes pa'i rol pa la zhugs par gyur te/ mi dmigs pa'i bde ba la ci yang mi
73a4(rnying rgyud): g.yo bar byung to// de nas byang chub sems kyi char chen po pad+ma'i snying po rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par gyur to// 'khor ba thams cad ni rgyal ba'i sras por bskyed// rgyal ba 'gog pa ni byang chub sems kyis brlan par mdzad cing sbrid pa'i myu gru mngon par bskyed/
73a5(rnying rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lcang long phyed par byung ngo // rig 'dzin gyi sems dpa' thams cad ni/ shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas chos kyi sku'i nang du brlan par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'gro ba thams cad
73a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// 'khor ba'i sems can rgyu las byung // 'khor ba'i sems can rgyan ched na// sangs rgyas rgyun yang 'chad par 'gyur// 'khor ba chos nyid rang bzhin
73a7(rnying rgyud): du// shes nas smra bar gang byed pa// rig pa'i ye shes rang dbang de// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sras// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des chos thams cad grub pa smon lam gyi sgo nas 'jug par mkhyen nas smon gnas chen
73b1(rnying rgyud): ma da gsungasas// ma pa'i can zu ga// martogs pa gyi bar rnam pa ban pa/ pa ngas tsudan // 'khor ba can dmas na hA/ spyo ba tu // ba zugs pa rgyags pa gyur/
73b2(rnying rgyud): des na rigs ldan mtshan bzang la// don dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa yis// sbyor ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs nas// yum gyi mkha' dbyings b+hA ga ma la// grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du bskyed// rtsibs brgyad zla bA me dbur gapal la// byang chub
73b3(rnying rgyud): sems las phyag rgya'i tshogs// lha dku gsal ba'i ye shes bskyed// des ni thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig po'i mdo las gsang stong sgru ba ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rba/
73b4(rnying rgyud): nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mi 'gyur ba gtan 'pho ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin gang zhig rnams// myi 'pho bar ni gnas 'dod pa// lo gcig gam ni zla gcig gam/
73b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin zhag gi rnam grangs kyang // bcwa lnga'am yang na bdun par du// tho rangs thun tha'i dang po'i tshe// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// shar 'i phyogs su kha bltas te// shar phyogs nam mkhas bsdus pa yi// lha klu gnod sbyin 'jig rten
73b6(rnying rgyud): bcas// thams cad khrod du bzlas nas kyang // dbugs de skar la mi dbyung bar// rang gi khong du bstim par bya// tha mA pA li nang du bsre// de ltar sang por bsgrubs pa dang // dpal cha gzi brjid thams cad 'artson// sa sa // de nas yang
73b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po desarten po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gang nig rten la gnas 'dzud pa// mtshan ma bzang po'i gnas mchog tu// thams cad 'byor par byas nas ni// sa las byas
74a1(rnying rgyud): stegs bya ba shams/ dbus kyi pad+ma 'a ba brgyad la/ thag ma dmar pa sgo bzhir ldan/ mtha' ma rdo rje rabs bskor// dpal lda po la phyag rgya dgod// drin chen lugs kyi bum pa la// choms rgyas par byas nas ni// batshan lda/
74a2(rnying rgyud): snon kyis kha dga' byi// rdo rje gzungs kyis btogs nas ni// tshe tshad med par mnga' gsol la/ dang sde su de bzhin gzhag par b+ha/ sprin nA tham pa bzhi sa la// gas pa'i bu mo bzhi bkod gzhag/ yi mtshon byung ba'i thug pa la// rigapa
74a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas yab yum dang // so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams// thabs dang shes rab sdebs nas ni// phyogs phyogs gnas bu chom bur bri/ sgo bzhir sgom bzhi rnams gzhags/ sems kyi phyag rgya kun bkod nas/ nyi rgya ga 'u ru a y+ya ni// 'asgril
74a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar 'tsher zhing gsal bar bya// a yu byang chub sems su zhu/ rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin chen gter/ dbang bskur dpal ldan mdzod ldan ma// gsang ba'i bu mo tshwa gter 'dzin// a yu yum bzhi'i thugs kar 'phros// de bzhin tshom bu rim
74a5(rnying rgyud): par brgyad// rdo rje tshe mchog kun bsdus nas// dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstim/ de nas rdo rje tshe phyeng bzlas// nub phyogs tshe yi dbyings mchog gi// pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams su// bya mas ldan ye shes tshe dpag med// thugs kyi dpal be'u
74a6(rnying rgyud): chen po ni// gnyis gsal 'od kyi gzhun// byang chub sems kyi A phu 'bar// drim gsal 'bar ba'i mo mchog de// rig 'dzin rnalnga 'gyor rnams la 'phro// 'phrob pa dgu lung dam pa ldis// tsid+hA'i dbugs pa bklag tu bstan// de nyams cu drug
74a7(rnying rgyud): kun spangs nas// gzi byin skye ba'i rgyu lnga bsgom// byang chub sems kyi a yu de/ skye med dbyings su sbas nas kyang // phyag rgya'i tha mar bdun gyis bshad// dang po sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// gnyis pa gnod pa'i rgya gram 'bar// gsum ze rta mchog dpal
74b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa rin chen dpal be'u sgra// lbu bu gser gyi guH'o// drug pa zla ga ma dramar po la// bdun pa nyi zla ga 'ub 'bar// tshe yi ngo bo rgyud gsum po// srog gi ngo bor gzhal yas khang // lab rgan 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ a yu dmar
74b2(rnying rgyud): po 'di 'gro ba// 'tsho ba med pa'i srog bcugs te// 'gyur ba med pa'i g.yung drung yin// chos nyid dbyings su tshe smras pas// dus gsum rgyal ba dgrar langs kyang // de la gzung zhing bstan du med// de nas ci bde spyad par bya// de rje tshe sgrub che'o//
74b3(rnying rgyud): denas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de rje rje bo tshe kun du 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gnas 'gyur maN+Dal 'bar byas la// ye shas khri ze 'bar ba yaM// thugs dpal ba'u'i 'od zer mas/
74b4(rnying rgyud): nga gi sgram zang po'i rjeng// rdum tog dang brtsis pa yi// lcags kyu dkar dmar mgun thogs// de'is 'gro drug rnams cad kyi// khyod dag kyi byin rnams cad 'phrogs// ma tog tu brdzus nas kyang // dz+ha la dge 'dzin rnams la byAm+b+hi // dzi /
74b5(rnying rgyud): sa
74b6(rnying rgyud): ya drugs pags kyi mi 'do pa nga mi byang mam smi pa du bya nga nig ga du ltal na nga me byed la da phral da sa bya
75a1(rnying rgyud): na tu/ /
75a2(rnying rgyud): gan du chen sa tha pa'i gnas yin te// mngon du rkyen po bsgrub pa'i ldanas// du khro dang srog pa ba'i gnas/ ga ga du me dzi na pa yin te// rgyags pa bsgrub pa'i gnas yin do// 'drabs/
75a3(rnying rgyud): bting sa pa'i nang // shin tu btsun zhing 'jigs pa'i ngogs// lhag gcig 'a khru ba'i gnas yin te// 'dod pa sgrub pa'i gnas sngags// hU~M mdo rgya 'jigs mtsho gling // chu li bas kun bskong ba// chugacan khwa ba'i gan ma sbyin pas// byang/
75a4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i las la bya'o// der ni yo byad phun sum tshogs// ci 'dod bltas te ma thogs par// kha na ma zo bcas dang bral// 'byor pas nan tan mchog bskyed pa// khams las gyur pa'i nad chen rnams// bdud kyi mchog gis bzlog bya'i phyir// rtsi 'a
75a5(rnying rgyud): bcud mthar ba rnams// nyer rdzogs su ni gzhag par bya// 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nang // dug las byung ba'i nad rnam ba bye// rkyen gyis par chad 'byung srid phyir// sman dang mkhas pas bcas te sbyar// ka pA la dang lcang lor bcas// hA
75a6(rnying rgyud): rlung la sogs pa'i rdzas// phyag ma tshe dang ldan byas la// das grub 'byung babyirten du bya// sgrub chog gas nga ba'i rnal 'byor ba// bro ba'i yid rnams bsarba phyir dang // gti mugu mun pa gzhom pa'i phyir// dung dang 'khar rnga rdza rnga dang // trang te'u
75a7(rnying rgyud): pa 'ang ko ki la// snyan par rdzogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun// sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rol mo ste// nye ro rdzogs su ni 'byor par bya// shin tu gtams pas tshogs chen ni// bla mdo rje khong lo rgyal// gsang ba sbyor ba'i dus chen du// sgrub chen sgrub pa'i rnam
75b1(rnying rgyud): bapas dang dag rnams dang // gdung ba byang chub pa chu tu da// dbadun pa dang gas pams/ gas pan/ byung / shA chags //
75b2(rnying rgyud): la// yon tan mchog gi gter gyur cing // srid pas nus kyang zad ma shes// rkyen bu dbang lung rdzogs pas gzung // rdo rje kun gyi gzugs 'dzin pa// kun sbe de kun 'byung 'khrug med cing // nam mkha'i ljon rA bat+pa la b+ha// me ste byams
75b3(rnying rgyud): ma mchog sa cung // da sbyangs 'dul tshugs chog 'ching zhing // thogs ma sa ma pa // 'dzin rgyags med ci blang dong med// brtan ldan gzungs the rdo rje gang // da kyi dus 'dzin cad/ na sa pas / @
75b4(rnying rgyud): ma da do// na ti ma dmig sa sdug pa 'jugs so// rna gshegs saska rdzu nam / dasug gal ga ste/ sa tho pa byas byung // 'di ltar kyang ma dum can 'ang/
75b5(rnying rgyud): brtags te na do gzung ba// rig byed dag gi yan lag las// shes par bya ste legs sbyar ba// bkra shisaM lha yi nyi ma dang // 'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po rnams// 'jig rten mtshan ma'i rtog pa ste// brtags na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung // dus cha
75b6(rnying rgyud): zhi yi dang po ni// mchog nyid mngon spyod ro langs yin// dbyar tshe ston sman shis pa ste// zhi dang rgyas pa de bzhin sbyar// dbang du bsdus pa'ang dbang yin te// bam chen gsang ba'i dus su bshad// nor 'dod rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang // chu bzhir khyab
75b7(rnying rgyud): bar sbyar ba'o// bsgrub pa chen po'i rdzas mchog dag/ gal te dus la po 'gyur na// dus 'di dngos grub dus chen te// dus 'di mkhas pas yong mi bcab// rnal 'byor las kyi dang po rnams// ci ste 'dod pa'i mtshan medang// yid 'or 'byung zhing thag po
76a1(rnying rgyud): rnye pa// dam cig gzungs 'dungs can yin// klu khasas la thur byin cid// rnam tha'i yo na thogs rgyas // 'dud ba chud pa pa shAn// sa kyimachog 'dun pa btag/ 'di ltar chu ba ni 'byor b.las// dazas bya sa
76a2(rnying rgyud): por grub pa ste// gru dang mnyan pa mkhas pa la// bsten pas rin chen lon pa 'dra// ji srid gnas pa'i rgya mtsho rnams// rang bzhin med par kun gcig pa'i// bdag med phyogs bral lhun gyis grub// gcig las rnam grangs dang gi sa med// tha snyad dag par
76a3(rnying rgyud): yongs chud na// nges pa'i don chen de nyid de// thams cad dag par 'gyur ba'o// bdag dang gzhan du mi gnyis pas/ bdag nyid bdag gi rang bzhin te// sangs rgyas zhes bya gzhan na med// bdag nyid ldan grub dbang phyug che// gang 'dod pa yi dngos po dag/
76a4(rnying rgyud): pa/ / da ra gyus/
76a5(rnying rgyud): brtson pa'i bsgrub pa dag/ rdzas dang yo byad la sogs te// shes dang yon tan phun sum tshogs// gzhan du reg las med pa ni// thams cad tshang bar rdzogs pas na// phun sum tshogs zhes de la bya// gsang chen bsgrub pa'i las 'di dag// 'khor ba'i
76a6(rnying rgyud): las dang mthun sprad cing // nyon mongs lnga ltar spyod snang yang // 'od kyis mun be snang 'gyur ltar// snron ni yon tan chen po la// g.yo mtshang dngos grub chen por 'gyur// de ltar 'khor ba dzi na bzlog pas// mi gnas ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil//
76a7(rnying rgyud): gnas rab brtag pa'i gal chen yang // nam mkha'i 'khor lo rdo rje dang // rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma'i dbyings// rgya gram la sogs 'dra bar brtag/ sa gzhi yang ni de bzhin te// ri bo brtsegs dang bzung ba dang // de bzhin bsgreng dang gtams pa'i
76b1(rnying rgyud): tshul// 'dra bar mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yang rigs kyi khyad par ni// lnga la sogs pa so so yi// gnas gnas dag tu rtogs nas ni// nor bu rin chen de bsgrub bya// byon gyi gnas dag spang ba ni// gshin rje gdug pa'i gdung rtse dang // ma mo rnam/
76b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i spar shad dang // srin mo ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang // gnod sbyin khro bo'i rba ba shul dang // 'byung ngo rkun po 'jol la sogs// gnas kyi skyon rnams dgra dang rgun// mkhas pas nges par spang bar bya// kha na mthor bcas pa dang // nyams pa las byung //
76b3(rnying rgyud): nyen dang bral// ma dag pa yi yo byad rnams// gdug can par du 'ongs pa ltar// wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yi// bskal pas bshugs te spang bar bya// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung ba dag/ dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/
76b4(rnying rgyud): ba yi// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir// snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsgrub pa brtag pa mthar dbyung phyir// rgyal po rten dang 'khor bcas la// bden pas bsgo ba 'am yang bslang ba// dgongs shig thugs
76b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i lha// lha gru gnod sbyin sde dpung bcas// gang snga re rtse dang rin chen ri// kun dga' ldu mar skyed mos tshal// mtsho rjeng lum 'bab chu'i gnas// 'jig rten 'jig rten thams cad kyi// gang dag bdag por gyur pa rnams// rnal 'byor
76b6(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug bdag nyid kyis// sa 'dri ldan gyis grub bya'i phyir// 'dzam gling grub pa'i sa slong ni// 'khor dang bcas pa 'drir 'khod la// rin chen gter gyi sa gzhi bslang // zhes pas rin chen sna tshogs kyis// sal gnas pas de mgu bya//
76b7(rnying rgyud): des ni bdag gir de 'gyur zhing // nyes pa de dang bral ba yin// byang chub spyod pa g.yo ba dang // bsod nams dga' ba skyed pa la// shes ldan rdzu 'phrul can gyi bu// ma skrag phrag dog yong ma skye// rnal 'byor mchog gi sgrub pa po// bdud
77a1(rnying rgyud): 'dul phyag rgya rdzogs pa tsho// dra du tshogs kyi rgol ba la// skyes skalas kyi don 'grangs te// don gyi dbang po'i phyir snyan pa// rgyal ba dbang phyug thams cad kyis// don mchog yang dag mdzad pa mo// b+he s+'u N+Dal /
77a2(rnying rgyud): par las// 'di tshe dbang mkhyen dmigs 'byed ma// sngon mo dpal chen gar dbang gis// ru rdo sde bzhi bsgral na // gsang ba bsten pa'i rgyas mdzad nas// 'gro drugazugs rjes bsgral ba ltar// rnal 'byoras la spyor tshe 'dir// sna mA
77a3(rnying rgyud): mkhyen par mdzad nas kyang // bde chenas la bgrod pa'i tshe// dra dra'i rgol ba 'byung ba'am// sprin ldan khyong gyis dbang mdzod cig/ sgrub pa'i las mchog khyad par sa// brtsam par bya ba'i las rnams kun// mchin mas mtshan migan
77a4(rnying rgyud): 'i phyir// ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya// dge bar gyur na de gnas bya// gal te shis par mgyurang de// rjes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis// gnan nam spro ba'i las kyi sa sbyar// der ni bu sod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga la sog
77a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// sa gzhi gter chen rgyas par bya// bkra shis mchog tu bsngags pa yin// sa zhag spos chen+da rnam lnga'i khu// bsres pas kun du gru bzhi ni// maN+Dal rgyas pa'i dbyibs 'dral// ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags ldan pas// mtshan ma'i dngos po
77a6(rnying rgyud): kun sbyangs te// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i rten du bya// rdo rje byin brlabs 'byung gnas dang // gnas rnams shin tu brtan bya'i phyir// mchog gi sbyor ba dag pa yis// sa gzhi gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs// de dang der ni ste sbyangs te// thig gis yul
77a7(rnying rgyud): btsod skabs dag tu// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho tha~Mng der// rdo rje drag po'i gang chen gyis// lce po gnag po'i drud pas bcu// rgyun mi 'chad du byas nas ni// lnga po drag po'i sngags smos shing // rdo rje khro bo'i stabs kyis ze skor// shes rab yum gyi nga /
77b1(rnying rgyud): tshul gyi// rnam gnyis rdzas kyi 'degu dag/ srin bal le'u sbyar ba yis// kun du zla ba'i thig le bya// rdo rje rgyal po 'phags rnams kyis// so so'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i rgya// so sa'i sbyang stabs sbyar nas kyang // de dag gnas su byin gyis rlob// gsang
77b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i don la zhugs bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i las kyi sngon logs su// bstan pa skyong ba'i mgon po la// sbyin mchod bsrung ba'i las chen bcol// gzhal yas granas kyi phyi rol du// mgon po gnas pa'i rten gzhi dag/ rin chen 'bras las 'byung khungs
77b3(rnying rgyud): smras// shing ngam pa sad dag las// lugs sa ma b+hag cu'i gzugs byas te// mgon po ba'i ru sanga'u gsol te// gnas kyi ni srungs par bya// ri rab rnying bzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas// rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gis thus// 'jig rten myong ba'in
77b4(rnying rgyud): tshig can// mthu chen mgon po sde bzhi rnams// sa so'i bgegs ris 'dul la mkhas// chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas// rigs bzhi kha dog sa ser gsal// rang rtags lha yi mtshan ma thogs//
77b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor stong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong gis// rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod// bslab pa'i rtsal 'di mthar dbyung zhing // rkyen gyi bar chad bsal ba dang // gsang ba'i man ngag spyad pa'i phyir/ 'jug srid dam bri
77b6(rnying rgyud): gnon par bya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i gnas dag tu// dngos grub chul rdul 'jug cing // khro bo rta chen kun 'dus nas// gsad cing gnon bu'i las bya ste// ri rab chen po'i chang du gtang // ya~M mA ra dza'i
77b7(rnying rgyud): zas su sbyin// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdang // 'khor mo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas gnon// bdun kya de rigs ni brlag sbyang nas/ rnams kyang spong bar ma nus te// byang chub sems ni skyes na // badz+ram sgrib// bam pa sha~M ku nan// suM bAn ldan
78a1(rnying rgyud): mags ga nayang bangs nan la sa dang la mnas dang 'dus byu ba 'ams// sang ba ma 'ang gan marnams pa dang bdan byud// dacir byad ces gnasas 'thal bas 'thab/ rang bzhan pa kyis can sa 'das nas da /
78a2(rnying rgyud): da sa la nyon pas/ rang bzhin nyid rje chud ces \u0f7f/ yang yang sa na sa/ gzhigacig bo khyad par 'ang pas/ ma nga/ thabs dang kyimad rang bzhin tud ces ni/ da ma na ma/ btags pa com du deng snang yang / brta na pas zhin glang po gzhogacig rang bzhin sto ngas ngon pang med/
78a3(rnying rgyud): dad ma yin tha par 'gyur ba med// dpeng na skyes bu gang zhig la/ // rlung ni gamam sam mang po yod b+han ni// gang nas thod kyang de yag nas/ snang ltar// 'gyur med don yang de bzhin no/ ga nga/ de nas rdo rje 'don pa yis/ ga da pa rdo rje 'changa' 'di skad gsol/

78a5(rnying rgyud): dza che tod chen dang / da gi rlung rnams rab tu byed pa 'i// ting nge 'dzin pa sang zhengs nas ni// rdo can 'dis gsungs// e mdza rje 'dzin pa nyon// de ny-id du yong 'a gro sa po rnam par bshad par bya/ yangs dmangon tu dang nitshig gi rgyang legs so// don ni ljar go co bstan rim pa'o/ ma pa nga/
78a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud ngom pa gsal bar dbye/ so dgi/ spros pa 'i ni dgarjod byed 'khor ba yi// don rnams ci rgyud kyis 'grol bar 'gyu da nyonan rgya mtshos med / yanar dang na nyam nyan ma mas dang nyid dang / ga na nog seng ge gci byed she slos dang rna ma bya ba'i rgyalu gakyang game pa dang / 'a dang 'khor

79a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod tshul dag// ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar spyad// e ma du brjod gsang ba la// zang zung zhing khams dga' tshal 'dung // sbrul ldan drang rtag tshal ba'i nas// 'dus pas chags pa'i rig 'dzin rnams// mA ma /
79a2(rnying rgyud): dka mchog bde chen thogs// dumachog srog gi lung chung // thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// sprul pa'i gzhog lpags gcas pas// tshogs gnyis rtsal zhes bar+d+hangasaM spar nas// chos nyid mkha' la rnyir bar rigs// a \u0f7f
79a3(rnying rgyud): stan// de ring phan rgyang rgyal ba'i sras// dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod// rnal 'thor longs spyod ba skyed pa dang // drag rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yi// mA las skyes pa'i ye shes kyis// zangs mi dngos po 'du 'dul bya// dem rdzas yo byad
79a4(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rnams// gor nas cha gsum so so nas// shan ma 'dres par s+tha gan bya// phyi si cha la 'jug pa yi// mchod sbyin spel ba'i yo byad bya// de gnyis gnyis pa'i cha dag las// mjug gi rgyal chos longs spod bya// rmad 'byung nang gi cha dag
79a5(rnying rgyud): ni// thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni// ras sam shing khyon dag tu ni// bsdus te bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgag/ byug pa chen pos de la gtor // lce bo ga nag po'i dud pas bdug/ rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang // 'bar ba'i lta bas brjid par bya//
79a6(rnying rgyud): tsham da ma chen po'i skabs kyis bsgyur// sna rdzogs bsad ky-i dri san+d+ra gdon// de nas po'i phreng brda sa// yo byad de dag badz+ra m+b+hi rba// dmardzas bong 'arjes nas nI// de lcang du rtswa'i 'gro 'du las// grwa nas phyag mtshan nam
79a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar// dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por zhu// shes rab lha po rig 'dzin ma// bzhi 'am yang na rnam pa 'argyad// rdzas sam yo byed rang bzod pos// zas mchog gar gyis spri blangs te// longs spyod spel pa'i dbyangs 'dis bstar// bdag cag rang
79b1(rnying rgyud): ngan shes rab // \u0f7fla sras pa lce dngos du ba 'dzid// dgyes pas tshim pa'i longs spyod // ji skang yid bzhin nor bu'am// dpag bsam shing ljon 'dod 'jo ba// mthos lo tog zlas pasgyur// rdal 'gyur longs spyod chen po dag/ rnamam du
79b2(rnying rgyud): rnams su gtibs nas kyang // don dgyes rdzogs san 'dus nas// skab ldan rnams kyis rab sgras c-ikA/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang sgyur nas// sgeg pas lha mo 'jo tshul dag/ badrang cing stod pa'i tshul g+has ni// rol mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba skyed// oM
79b3(rnying rgyud): shrI badz+ra lA h+ye bA hU~M/ badz+ra mA lo trA~M tAM/ badz+ra gI ti d+hIHhrIHbadz+ra nr-i d+ha aHaH/ rdo rje karma 'i dzA ba sa mchog gis// rdo rje glu 'dis gze byin bskyed// rdo rje bdud rtsi longs spyod 'di// rtse mchog bcud kyi snying po ste// gzi mngangs rgyas par byed pa'i mchog
79b4(rnying rgyud): bkrig 'dzin gzugs mchog dran pa'i dpal// rdo rje can gyi byin stobs kyis// skal ba can gyi zas su bya// skal med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur// dper na sbal la 'o ma bzhin// sa ma ya dzaHku sra tsa ma maM// sdug zil lha me mnyen gsal ma// rlan
79b5(rnying rgyud): rnams bdud rtsir snar byed ma// bdud rtsi cu rgyan dngos phrab 'dzin// rang gter las swapa chu rgyun 'bebs// shing lo 'dab las bdud cir sbyar// 'bru thog sna tshogs dngos thab 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal 'bras bur skyid// lha mo sra brtan dbang bla
79b6(rnying rgyud): kha ba brgyang las brjod rtsir 'gyur// bdud rtsi kun chen dngo sa grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal brtan par byed// rdo rje lha mo shel mo gaM ma// nyi zer badrid rdzir sbyar byed ma// gastsal ba mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal gzi bya
79b7(rnying rgyud): skyed// lha mo khro gnyer sngo ba sangs ma// dur khrod rdzas las bdud rtsir sbyar// sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyid las rgol byin 'bebs ma// tsaM yo lha mo blo gros ma// rtsi thog bdud rtsir sbyar byed ma// rtse mchog kun gyi dngos grub 'dzin
80a1(rnying rgyud): rang ga nyer las skal che mazed mra// sman gyi lha ma nor la ldan// dag rnams bdud rtsing sbyar byud ma// bdud rtsi spyan gyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gtar las skal 'ad kun yang // rdo rnga gru yi brtan nas na// rnal 'byor zin par yo byad du// ral
80a2(rnying rgyud): gos dga' ston longs spyod bya// de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir// phyi nang mthun 'jug bkang sdod pa'o// gshin rje chos kyi phyag d+hA yis// bran gyi bya bar dbang bsdus nas// phyi mtshams bsrung bar dbang bskur haM// 'bur ram lugs sam ri mo'am/
80a3(rnying rgyud): 'dra bar ni byas nas kyang // phyi khyams sgo yi phyi rol du// ma he khri la bzhag nas ni// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mgu byas la// de tshe 'di yis bsgo bar bya// gsang chen lhan grub pho brang nas// las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang nas// bcom ldan chos rjes bka' stsal
80a4(rnying rgyud): ma
80a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par smin pa'i chos shod la// gsang ba mchog gi rdul 'byor pas// bla med 'bras bur mthur tshor// sa pa yan chad ma gtang bar// dpal chen mo pham bka' ma 'da'// bdag cig ye nas gnyis med de// de tsam ngon gyi dbyings su gcig
80a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rol sbyor pa'i mu ran la// rdo rje yal dam thub par mdzod// badz+ra ya ma rA d+ha sa ma yA s+t+waM// zhes pasna gshin rje mnas bsgrags te// gal te 'das na khro bdag 'chag/ brtsam par bya ba'i las chen po// dngos grub 'byung bar byed pa'i rten// phyag rgya che
80a7(rnying rgyud): dang gzugs mchog gi// stegs bu legs par sbyangs na 'grub// mtshon pas khrid par byed pa yi// rdul tshan 'dus byas chu rnams la// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor bshad bgyi ba// so sor brtags te bshad bgyi ba// brtan zhing nges 'jam khang pu
80b1(rnying rgyud): la// 'brur khung khod snyoms 'phang mtho ba'i/ kha dog lnga yi gzugs byas nas// des ni mtshan ma'i dngos grub ster// shing shun ras sa mdur khrod kyi// zheng chen nas la kha doku lngas// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i gzugs zas na// dang ngamatshan ma/
80b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i rten// rdo dang shel rdo la sogs pa// dung ngam pa so'i rgyu las ni// mkhas pas 'bur du btod byas nas// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur// gser dngul rin chen la sogs pa// zangs lcags khur ba'i rgyu dag las// mkhan gyis
80b3(rnying rgyud): blugs te ma nyams na// de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// bAk+Sha byang chub shing la sogs// rgyad shing yal ga mnyen pa las// phyag rgya'i gzugs de legs sbyar na// de yang rten du mkhas pas bshad// mnyen cing sbyin pa'i mchog rnams la//
80b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang 'brel khugs legs sbyar te// phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs byas na// de yang rten pa'i 'os su 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams la// yi ge 'am yang na mtshan rtags sam// ming ngam thig ler rdzas la bri// bsgrubs na mtshan ma'i rtem
80b5(rnying rgyud): du 'gyur// de las re zhig 'dir bshad pa// stegs bu la brten mtshan ma dag/ bsgrub pa'i don du brtag gzung ba// brtsam pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// gong du spros pa'i rgyu rnams la// stegs bu mdzes shing mnyam byas te// kun du gru bzhi cha
80b6(rnying rgyud): mnyam la// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// me long la bur snying por bya// rdzing byung yang dag byin brlabs can// ye shes rang byung grub pa'i rdzas// bka' gsang rmed byung pho brang du// dur khrod rdzas lngas sbrang rdul bya// rdo rje srad bu'i thig gdab pa/
80b7(rnying rgyud): cho ga rnam par bshad bgyi ba// gsang ba'i phung lo 'khri la mangs dang // rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa// ring thung maN+Dal 'khor khyud la// 'drar mdud can du la gyur pa'o// ma snrel snyoms pa'i tshad ldan ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal/
81a1(rnying rgyud): dpyad kyis bzla pa'i zabs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa la// yig gnyis pa 'byod du las// da/ radamang bdam gsar slong 'dra// dadzag snang ba'i thabs cas // byang chub sems 'dzin 'khal ba'i yum// nges par
81a2(rnying rgyud): brtags te 'dir bzung ba// mtshan ldan pakra shrIs gsang ba'i yum// sprin dgras ring la lag sor phra// tshogs mig blam la phya bar bshad// kha nas ut+pa la dad ldang zhing // lus lag pur tsan+dan dri// yid 'ong mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed// sgra 'jam
81a3(rnying rgyud): mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil// mo dkar tshags dam dkar dmar byed// ma~M kA gi dgras ring sprin dkrugs legs// zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan// dpral ba'i dbyes che ska ma tshams 'khrug/ sna bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rags// lus drang ske reng
81a4(rnying rgyud): sems ma'i dzel// rnga ma'i dkyil mtho zla rgyas 'dra// sha dkar tshigs dam 'khyil ba gnags// khong dal 'gron gom pa'angam// sad ni dang pa gzhon du spogs// cir yang mdzes pa'i skabs rgyal ldan// skyes bu tha mA sa swam du gzung // gzungs su
81a5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa ni// bram gyi phung po gnas ldar te// bde bar gshegs pa'i mabon sde// 'gro 'dugs pa par sbyar ba dang // yang kyis rkyen bad+hA pa dab de bskur nas// bde ga shegs yum lnga'i ma chog gsal// rdo rje yAbral 'ang de bzhin te/
81a6(rnying rgyud): ltar gsal byar gyur pa dang // yum gyi mkha' la me ri sgom// gsang ba dbugs kyi zlag ma la// byang chub sems kyi 'gro 'dra bya// gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin// yum gyi mkha' la de bzhin no// de nas rdo rje tshig 'di yis// lus kyi yum la
81a7(rnying rgyud): nges par bsgo// shes rab lha mo gsang ba'i yum// 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i 'phrul mo che// chags pa'i tshul gyis thabs la 'dud// g.yon du 'khril cing g.yas su 'khyud// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis zla gam sbyor// gsang ba'i byang chub sems
81b1(rnying rgyud): nang // da na lha mo chal bar sras// rang bzhin chos kyi mtshan ldan pa// rdo rje las kI yum yin gyis// gsang ba'i las rnams kun thos shig/ lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas sa// ny+tsa zla 'bang ba'i tshogs bkod de// gsang bu'i thang
81b2(rnying rgyud): dkar dmar 'dre// thig le yi ge'i ngo bor gdab// las kyi rdo rjeng bar ba yaM// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya yis// byang chub sems kyi thig 'di drongs// rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di drongs// rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di kyis// oM tsan+d+ra d+ha ratrAM zhes pa'i// gsang
81b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// rdzas mchog 'bar ba'i thig le yis// gnas lnga dag gi gzhal yas su// gsang ba thabs kyi thag le bya// srad bu'i sbyor ba de rdzogs nas// grol sgrib rtag chad sngon bral ba'i// che chung ya yo med pa yi// rdo rje dbu ma'i
81b4(rnying rgyud): thig 'di dgye// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas su// mi dmigs bdal ba'i maN+Dal la// ye shes lnga yaM thig 'phros pas// bde can rnam thar phyag rgya'i tshogs// kun gzhi nam mkha'i gzhal yas su// nyon myongs rtog pa'i mAHla la// tIng 'dzin
81b5(rnying rgyud): 'od zer zag 'phros pas// phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar po'i tshogs// mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i gzhal yas su// zla gam pad+ma'i maN+Dal las// byang chub sems kyi thig 'phros pas// ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba'i tshogs// bkra shes dben pa'i gzhal
81b6(rnying rgyud): yas su// mtshan ma rten gyi maN+Dal la// rdo rje srad pa'i thig 'phros pas// cho 'phrul gzugs bad+d+hAn phyag chu 'bar// stong gsum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rmang byung rdo rje'i TIg 'gyed na// gsang ba'i dam la gnas pa yi// 'byung po skye bo gdol pa
81b7(rnying rgyud): can// rdo rje rtsal gyi hUM reng las// rdo rje mtshon tsha'i bu yug 'tshub// phyogs mtshams bla 'og khro bos gtams// 'bar ba gsang ba'i mtshams bzung ste// phyi rol sde pa'i 'drul rnams gcod// rdo rje mtshon cha 'bar ba'i tshogs// sreg dang
82a1(rnying rgyud): dums par dag bral ba/ dadza rnaM mas 'di 'dabyun// dong nyam gzhal las // dang pal ba bajug/ mamangs zhes dang bzhan can// dal rgyu can thos byang babyur bya// dbazhan dang can 'ab sa gan
82a2(rnying rgyud): bad+mazla pa 'khor lo pa// dpag med nam mkha'i gzul las rba/ dang ba 'o phyug/ mi shes zin pa dbye che// ral 'byor ca dkyis gdab par \u0f7f// rdo rnga ma pa' la 'khor lo ra// 'is dang nas pe nga bya
82a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma'i rnab tu bdang na / rnam mapa' dngas pa gang pol// smad the ba'i yi pas ze// de ma na padas/ ba pa po dang dgra // darnamang pa'i thag ci kyis// thug te bklags pa'i gnas rnams can// chung med par rnams pa
82a4(rnying rgyud): 'dir ni rdo rje ma khyud bdun// 'byung po'i rim pajug par de// 'khor lo dru gang rdzogs snying por 'bar// grwa chad rtsibs mtshan me ri gro// mu khAd tsang gsum 'bar ba'i phreng // bar khyams bzhis mdzes b+h+rUM khyams dang // lnga dgas rbam+b+ha
82a5(rnying rgyud): dgra shar du brtags// pho brang de yi gnas gnas su// phyag rgya'i tshul rnams 'byung ba ni// mu khyud mtha' zad yad chad du// yab yum drug cu rtsa zhi po// cho 'phrul dam tshig tshad med pa// rol ba 'jigs byed 'jigs byed che// ka tsa lI la sogs
82a6(rnying rgyud): par bri// de bzhin za byed yab yum bzhi// las ts+tsha b+h+rUM sne hA rAka/ 'khor lo Ta mA'aM rtsi bas la dgod// gnas dang yul hU~M rtsagatu dag/ grwa zang kyi dang nang la dgra ma// hU~M chen bcu yi yab yum dag/ shin tu mngos par dang po la'o// de nyid la nam brgyad
82a7(rnying rgyud): dang // gang chen bcwa bcad rgyas par dgod// gnyis pa'i khyams la mkha' 'gro brgyad// thugs 'gro rgyang byeng de bzhin no// gsub par khams latha ma brgyad // de bzhin 'bar ma bskyed rnam mdzes// yan pa'i khyam pa la zang thogs brgyad /
82b1(rnying rgyud): nga nga// ngadu mangs par bab // mas ga pa dang // dag zhan par dbyug/ dayang naladug nga na/ nga nan ga sgyu /
82b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar te// bcod pa'i yo zad thams cad dang / rmang dra byung ba'i rdzas mchog dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i rim gyis ba'od// rdo gas sbyin no// ti 'din dkyil 'khor shA rdzogs nas// rang bzhin yul nas phra ba nas ni// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnye ngo
82b3(rnying rgyud): 'dir yang don kyi khyad par byas// rig 'dzi na bo'i saspya ba// shar gyi gdin gyi khyad par bya// dza rje ming gis bteg 'khor lo// zla banyi ma g.yas g.yon gyi// zhabs rten tshul gyi maN+Dal ni// rdo rje rgyal po yab l+r-is bzhugs// yi gdan
82b4(rnying rgyud): pa de la// phreng che rdo rjes bdags 'khor lo// pad+ma ga las g.yon zhabs brten tshul// rdon rgyal ba pab gram bzhugs// byung gi gdan gyi khyad par la// pad+ma rdo d+ha ga r+b+ha tham// rdo rje kar yab yum bzugs// nub pa mgyogs pa
82b5(rnying rgyud): me ba dang / gzhin ngas gtsugag gyu ba // byu bamed pa'o// rjes btam ma shin byar / rdzogs gcig car 'byur bya// bdag 'angar ba'i rang kyis zugs// rgyal 'byung zung 'a bar bye//
82b6(rnying rgyud): dam mi ldan pa'i// pa la dge la thA ba n-i// rengs pa'i gdan gyi mtshan ma la// yang rgyal 'phang che chung // lA rje gsum rjes mdzad// la la rdo rje byed mas mnan// lal pa rangs blags kha// nang du bstan pas mtshan par byar// ral rtsa
82b7(rnying rgyud): ngags de par mdza/ lal bad+ha brtsegs pas pa'o/ pa 'dag la mtshan pamed / pa pas phreng da dra // ma pang dag pa dzas/ khro ba'i dang byings sa gyur/ nga dbang bar spying du'i rgyur/ bab bya pa zhes byas /
83a1(rnying rgyud): kun du khyab par 'us bder sbyar// rmad byung sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya// 'dod par bya ba bsgrub pa dang // gtor ma la sogs rdzas kyi rnams// cha gsum ngag la bgos nas
83a2(rnying rgyud): kyang // gcig ni sbyin sreg las mchog bya// gcig la rnal 'byor longs spyod gter// gcig ni mkha' 'gro'i 'khor tshogs bskyang // gnas su bkra shis la sogs kyis// sgrub pa rdzogs pas mthar dbyung ngo // dur khrod gsang mchog dbyings nyid la//
83a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbu ba rtsegs dbang gyi rgya// ye shes dgu yi khong gseng gsal// maM ri 'od kyi thig thag gcad// 'khor lo tshogs chen bslab pa'i sa// rnal 'byor rtsal mchog can gyi gnas// sgrub pa rtsa yi dkyil 'khor de// dur khrod gsung ba mchog gi mdo/
83a4(rnying rgyud): 'di du sa nga
83a5(rnying rgyud): par 'grub par 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o// de bzhin thams cad kun rdzogs nas// rigs kyi khyad par 'di dgu dbye// so so'i rigs su bsgrub par bya// rdo rje can la dang pa beru ni// dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'bar ba'o// de bzhin rin chen rin chen te// pad+ma dmar
83a6(rnying rgyud): po 'od kyi dkyil// las ni kun du rgya gram 'bar// de bzhin rin chen 'khor lor 'bar// so so'i rigs rnams gtsor gzhag ste// 'khor ni de bzhin mi 'gyur bar// rnam par bkod de legs sbyar nas// bsnyen pa dang nI nye bsnyen pa// bsgrub dang sgrub chen
83a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bsgrub// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni// so so'i rigs ni gang yin pa// ting 'dzin bye brag mang po la// yid kyi sbyor ba gsal bar bya// des ni reg 'dzin gang 'dod pa// gsol bar nges par 'grub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyad
83b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gastangs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni byung ngor med par rig par
83b2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la// bzang ngan rtog pa'i tshig dang bral// bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med de// gtsang dang mi gtsang gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin me'i thod pa can mang po dag rnam
83b3(rnying rgyud): par bkod pa rnal 'byor gyi grul nas langs te// a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po brjod nus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la bdag cag shin tu gnas par 'tshal na/ bdug cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das
83b4(rnying rgyud): kyis ma gsungs so zhes gsol pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i thod pa can rnams rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'i dam tshig rnams spobs pa skyed la phul cig ces gsungs pa las// 'dod chags kyi rig 'dzin bram ze mi'i thod pa can
83b5(rnying rgyud): rdorje thal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // rgyu dang mi chu'i 'jig rten gyi// bud med thams cad thams cad la// 'dod pa'i chags pa ci spyad kyang //
83b6(rnying rgyud): yang dgra reg na mi gros so// zhes gsol to// de nas rig 'dzin dkya mi'i thod pa can zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste// bdag ni gsod la dga' ba ste// sems can thams cad bsad nus kyang /
83b7(rnying rgyud): zag pa mi gtsang snyigs ma dang // mi sha la sogs thams cad kun// zos na dam tshig mchog lags te// mthu dang gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur// bdag gi dam tshig de lags so// zhes gsol to// de nas yang gnod sbyin rig 'dzin yak+Sha mo'i thod pa
84a1(rnying rgyud): can zhes bas na ces gsulato// bcoMm na 'das bdag gang cig 'dag s+ho/ ma bdag pa thams dpa// 'dod pathams kya brog bya dang // gas la sogs bya basmras spya byung // yung dan dra nachags te// 'dod bslar pa'o/
84a2(rnying rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// bdag gi dmachog de lags so// zhes gsor to// de nas yang mu stegs rig 'dzin 'od skang dul pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dmatshig ni 'di lta ste/ mi yi mgo 'o bcad nas kyang // bzang dang ngan na
84a3(rnying rgyud): bye brab rnams// rig pas brtags te shes byas nas// bzang ba'i rtags can bsten bya ste// dkar po ri di lcang lo can// 'di dag rtag tu sras 'chang ba// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa ste// rgol ba thams cad 'joms par nus// yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra bar//
84a4(rnying rgyud): de yi yon tan 'di las 'byung // bdag gi dam tshig de lags so// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bram ze sha la dga' ba dang // sha za mo'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// ba blang
84a5(rnying rgyud): wI sha ta shwa dang // mri shag+h+rang rkyen sha la sogs// shA rnams 'dra bar gtsang sme med// zos na yon tan sna tshogs 'brub// bdag gi dmachog de lags so// zhes gsol to// de nas yang srin mo'i rig 'dzin khrag 'phrog ma zhos bya ba la sogs byas
84a6(rnying rgyud): 'dre skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byadag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ srog chags sems cani thams cad gaM// bslad pa 'i khrag ni dron myo dag/ 'thungs na gA zi byin 'bar bar 'gyur// bdag gi dmachog de legs so// zhes gsol to//
84a7(rnying rgyud): mo klu mo rigs ngan mo la sogs pa bud med kyi tshogs thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig 'di lta ste/ bro gar glu tshig chen po ni// thams cad bston pa'i mchog lags te// bro yi 'jo tshul stabs chen dang /
84b1(rnying rgyud): kA yu~M wAn dngags byon bsgrags nas// yid kyi dbang po thams rgyu 'phrog/ 'aglen pa'i thabs kyis ga sbyong ba// 'di ni dga' ba da mchog s+ho// bdag cag rnams tha~M mchog lags// zhes gsol to// de nas ngag 'dzin de kun gyis 'di skad ces
84b2(rnying rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi spyi'i dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ dkar nag las ni ni spyad kyang // rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bya dang // rab 'bring tha dang bye brag med// de bzhin 'di la bde sdug gam// dge dang mi dge'i cod pa med// non
84b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshon gyis gcad du med// ci phyir rnam pa bdun stong pas// thogs pa med pa'i don phyir ro// srog kyang bcad cing gsang du med// ci phyir rdzas 'di 'jigs pas so// sdig pa chen po'i las rnams kun// bdag gis byas sam gzhan byed bcug/
84b4(rnying rgyud): gal te gang gA'i bye snyed kyi// sems can de la sbyin byin dang // de bzhin gang gA'i bye snyed kyi// sems ldan thams cad gas dpa gnyis// yang dag rig la tha dad med// nam mkha' dag la rdul dang rgyus// de ltar myi chags pa bzhin no// gang zhig khrel
84b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzem ldan na// dregs pa'i rtog pa de bzung bas// dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur// chags pa'i spyod pa la sogs kyis// lus rnams gdung bar byed pa yi// sems can de ni 'du shes chung // zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
84b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// A ma'o tho pa can gyi tshogs// khyed kyis smras pa'i tshig 'di rnams// mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te// khur dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag yang dag ces smra ba// yang dag nyid kyi mdud pa ste/
84b7(rnying rgyud): mdud pa'i bkrol ba ma byas na// tha ram phyed par mi 'gyur ro// chags pa'i las rnams sbyor ba dag/ chags pa'i dbang gis der sbyor na// de dag de yi grong khyer du// gnas 'gyur de yi sems can yin// 'du shes sbyar ba'i las chen dag/ sdang ba'i
85a1(rnying rgyud): rabang gis skems shor ma// shan pa gsod pa'i 'dzin du// klung 'gyur ldog pa'ar po yin// yul ba rnams ni gtsang bas na// gang tshe bdag shugs rgyal ba'i zhag// mig tsang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bstabs pa gyur/
85a2(rnying rgyud): de tshe las kyi rnam smin gyis// bar med nad kyis bzung nas ni// 'dun du bying bar mi 'gyur ram// sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas// dka ba drang zas chen po // gang gis zos pa'i g+has rnams la// 'byung po d+hi zan 'das rnaMs// drim
85a3(rnying rgyud): ro rang brkyad rnams 'byin// des TI ga zi mdangs yal 'gyur na// ci phyir ci sted de rnams bza'// sems nyid rin chen pod bzhin du// gzhan gyi rin chen spyod byed pa// log pas log pa len pa'i chos// 'di dag mdud pa rim po yin// dkar gnag las
85a4(rnying rgyud): khyad med ces// thams cad khro bos stod pani// rigs ming rigs chad 'og pa ri las// 'brang bu ldog pa'i khams su 'drar // bdeg shegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la// yan lagacog tu mdag na// nyes byas las kyi rgya ngas ni// gang gi dru rnams
85a5(rnying rgyud): rnams cad du// dbang po lan lagamatshang zhing // d+hI pa'i byung po nyams par 'gyur// dag byang chuba'i rab 'byor pas shegs rgyal bas rjes pa/ drus kho tshul brgyan pad+ma'o// mtshan pa nyid du de dgon// lan gyi srin po'i rig 'dzin
85a6(rnying rgyud): yin// rgyun dang d+hA lpags thams cad kun// natshun ma nyid du badzugs gyur na// dri lta 'ang rjog cing chags pa yi// 'dzin pa'i phurang pa chen por 'gyur// adang hU~Ml legs pa sa// l-I le ge thams cad kun// mtshan ma nyid du der brtags na/
85a7(rnying rgyud): rdul gdug pa soshes par// spang gyur rtog pa'i gegs kyin yod// khrag sa sogs pa'i rdzasamasadangos por rig ba / ga kyirjes dza// sa bya'o// 'du su pa sa su dra /
85b1(rnying rgyud): zhig rtog par der gon// srin mo mi stag sha za mo// lang+ka'i yul du de dag 'khor// mtshan ma'i bla thabs mgo brnyan can// der btsan der bzung dmigs pas ni// sho gam gnas kyi gcan chen rigs// 'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur// lus
85b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang btsan bran mo'i tshigs// de 'dra nyid du de brtagasar// gnod sbyin chen mo'i tshigs su 'gyur// gzhan gyi tshe ba 'tshe ba yin// des na mdung pa chen po 'di// khur du bshal ba'i gangos yin te// 'chal pas lta ba'i mig long ste// sems kyi nor
85b3(rnying rgyud): ba chen de// na khalus sa sbyor bar 'gyur// de lta'i snron chen spring bar gyis// de sbed nas pakang sprul pa las thod pa can gyi rdzogs rnams rtogs pa'i 'du shes kyis zin cid rang rang gi spyod pa la sgro bskyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan das
85b4(rnying rgyud): na ga d-i/ thA r+b+ha b+h+ri ba gA / ga pa shA da'i gA / khyur ts+tshabam/ da sa / dz+nyAn/ deb 'gyur ba lags
85b5(rnying rgyud): so// gAsang sngags chen po'i sgo ni bskal pa me dpung lta bu ste/ bdag cag rnams kyi rtog pa so sor ji ltar mos pa ltar bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes pa chen po'i bzhad pa mdzad nas/ rigs kyi bla rnams ni de ltar zhu ba
85b6(rnying rgyud): legs kyis shin tu nyon cig/ khyed rnams kyi spyong pa mi dgag par ji ltar dge' ba'i bsnam pa so sor rings par bya ste/ 'jig rten mtshan ma'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams gsang sngags kyi dka' thub chen por bya'o// rang rang gi spyod pa me dkrig por
85b7(rnying rgyud): sgo gsum lhag par spyod cig/ de nis sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma'o thod pa can gyi tshogs// bud med bud med thams cad kun// skyed par byed pa'i rten yin te// 'bras bu spen pa'i zhing yang yin// bsngal zhing gdon
86a1(rnying rgyud): bya'i gnas yinA// shes rab dgu' pa'i yul senan// da las myas gsum gnas pa// yanas dag pa chos nyid sems// gakha' dang sgor babyang chub sems// snyid rjes sgrol ba gsas sgyu te// chos nyid gsung ba shar
86a2(rnying rgyud): snying rjes rgol ba gsum gyis sbyar// ting 'dzin byin brlabs ye shes kyis// chos nyid dur khrod mkha' la bsgral// bskal ba'i rgyu mchog man chad nas// shel tshon tsar la sogs pa// dri la rgyu drugs bon gdab// rang bzhin ye nas de
86a3(rnying rgyud): klung pa du d+hA/ shid nas/ ni ga nga rgyag shes // seMganas la gas da // ba ba'i ba
86a4(rnying rgyud): pa de// rdo rje rol pa'i rngam tshogs kyis// 'jo tshul stabs kyis sbyar bar bya// kha T+wAM la sogs sngags bcas pas// bsgyel te ma rig sgo dbye bya// rnam shes dbugs kyi sgrom drangs la// rdo rje rgyal po'i rlung sbom du// bsdus te rdo rje dbugs can la// hU~M byas
86a5(rnying rgyud): sgril ma de la bslan// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mtshon gang 'od du bstim par bya// yu ti a hUM gis swar te// gsal na de dang mnyam dugs // rdo rje tshol bsnun par bya// rdo rje rlung gis de brags sbyin te// thAg sI las rgyud sgom lam du sbyar/
86a6(rnying rgyud): nim mkhye' chos kyi gzhal yas su// nyi ma'i steng na hUM du gsal// ye shes seMnas dpa' chen gang ba// haM thA ga'u'i bar nu gsal// a yang phriT kyis skyod 'phangs pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar 'phros// ye shes sems dpe gsal ba laM/
86a7(rnying rgyud): dngos por snang ba 'dzin dang bral// g.yo 'gul 'phar 'phrig ma chad par// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te// rigs kyi lha dang snying po sbyin// rdo rje gdung ba'i glu brangs to// man ngag gnas kyi smon lam gdab// bzhi tshal dag tu byas nas ni// sman gyis btab ste phung por
86b1(rnying rgyud): bcapa// 'khor ba'i phung por bsdus la// rdo rje stabs dang grwa yis sbyang // gnas gnas dag tu bsngo bar bya// phung po mchod pa'i rdzas su bstim/ dzo na pA yaHsa rnams gdub// des ni mnyes dang skongs pa dang // rdo rje las rnams 'grub pa yin// rnal 'byor las
86b2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug che// mtho ga tsang shes rab gdus rum nas// reg pa'i sdor mo sbyar shad can// nga rgyal dregs pa'i glang po 'joms// rnal 'byor rtsal rgyas skyeng b+hag rnams// rdo rje rtsal chen 'di stangs pas// rnal 'byor lha mchog gshegs pa'i rten// dngos grub 'brang
86b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rin po che// mthu stobs skye ba'i thabs chen po// byin brlabs phebs pa'i dbang mchog 'dis// rgyal ba'i dngos grub man chad nas// mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang // dregs pa ma rungs sde pa rnams// thams cad dbang du 'gyur nges na// 'byung po
86b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan lte smo ci dgos// 'khor ba'i skam gling chen po la// rig drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// rgyung dgu 'das pa'i rnam shes srog/ dus gsun mtshon gyis bsad pas ni// rtag chad mthir shi'i ro gling nas// gti mug bam chen ro blangs nas//
86b5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi sman chen ye shes kyis// rtag chad mtha' las ro blangs shing // byang chub sems su gsal ba'i phyir// ro yi rjes rnams btsal bar bya// khro tshogs rngam par bdag byas te// rdo rje 'bang ba'i mig nang nas// mthing nag hUM gi seng chen ni// 'khor
86b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i ro rmong khams su spro// bsgral ba'i dur khrod mtha' dag kun// ye shes rol pa'i zhing du blta// khro bo gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis// tsha mang ma chen po'i rngam tshul gyis// dbya' bo rdo rje'i 'dzur 'gros sbyar// thabs chen brje brkyang stabs kyis sbyar// 'jo
86b7(rnying rgyud): tshul thabs kyi 'gro skabs kyis// 'jom tshul ste zhing rnam par rtsen// sgra skad sbyar zhing he nyes sgrogs// 'thab cing rtsod pas rnam par rngam// 'bri tshogs lta zhing 'drog tshul spyod// g.yas su lta zhing g.yon du 'gyur// yid mches te phyir yang blta/
87a1(rnying rgyud): sdud mig lcogs kyi khyab par blta// rdo rje 'gros su rgyug cing 'gro// ha ha du lha'i rngam sna sgrogs// so so'i brda skad 'byen byed cing // rtod pa'i tshul gyis mchong zhing rgyug/ yid bzhin gter chen kha phye nas// 'dod 'byung rin chen phung po
87a2(rnying rgyud): de// 'khor ba'i rnam smin dpyis phyung nas// rnam gsum dug chen gtan sngags nas// thugs rje rngam pa'i kha long kha// rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis// dngos grub lo tog phral nas kyang // rdo rje bzhin phyogs ma nor bar// shel phur gnyis kyis
87a3(rnying rgyud): gsang gnas bzung // nges byar gshin pa'i gzhi ma la// rung zhig brtad de nye 'khor bsgyur// bzhin phyogs gang ltas legs nyes brtag/ phyi yi bzang ngan de nyid ni// nang du nges par gsal ba yin// nyes pa'i mtshan bud mkhas pas mnan// gal
87a4(rnying rgyud): te dri bas gleng slong na// de yi the tshom gsal ba dag/ dngos por spyod la zhugs rnams kyis// mtshan mar rtog pa 'di dag rnams// 'jigs byed bka' la btags pa yi// 'dod chags bdag po de la gsol// ji skad smras pa de bshad kyis// mtshan
87a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i rdzas rnams rtogs par gyis// 'jig rten mgon khyod bdag la gson// bdag cag spyod pa gsol bar bgyi// snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang ngan gyis// nyes dang legs pa 'di las byung // skyon gyi mtshan ma bdun pa ste// kha sgrub pa dang gdan las
87a6(rnying rgyud): bskyod// skad mi 'phel dang mtshams sugs// bar chad 'byung dang bgegs lhung ba// mtshan mya ngan pa 'byung ba'o// 'di dag mkhas pas yod mi 'chang // legs pa'i rgyu ni bcu gcig ste// gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dang // rig 'dzin lam
87a7(rnying rgyud): nam mkhar 'phur// khams gsum dbang baspu rdo rje spyan// pha rol g.yul smrig zil gyis gnon// mthu dang byin brlabs tshe 'phel dang // mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang // slob ma tshwa yi rgyud 'phel ba// dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa dang /
87b1(rnying rgyud): gyi mar sangs rgyas myur ba dang // dngos grub rnam gsum thob pa ste// smon lam bzhin du 'grub pa // da yang bye brag 'di lta ste// phyang du 'gyur na bzang yin// sram cha tsa mal btang snyoms so// nga yangs ma 'a mtshan rtags su// brtag rting mang /
87b2(rnying rgyud): brjod bya ba// da/ ba smos med chos kyis// ljang lo kun rdzogs yongs myed ldan// mi 'ongs smras pa mdza pa'aM ky-id// 'dis dang da ltar mi 'ongs par// rnal 'byor sa la 'gro ba'i rigs// bder gshegs dus gsum 'byung ba'i rtags// ngan can
87b3(rnying rgyud): gter gyi ga'u 'di// babyes kyi rgyal po dpal gyi dkor// pho brang rtags ldan snod bcud rdzogs// 'phrul zhal yid bzhin 'dod zho'i ba// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i mchog/ ngo mtshar thog thog rgan sgra can// rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang sna dag/ rig
87b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rtsal can kun la sgrogs// nga ni skyes mchog rtsal can gyi// rmad byung bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas// su zhig dngos grub gang 'dod pa// the tsom med par dus 'dir myong // gang dag bka' ltar mi byed cing // su zhig dam lA mi gnas pa// nga pe gzugs
87b5(rnying rgyud): mthong tsam gyis 'tshig/ sgra thos tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur// zhes pa'i sgra byung cho 'phrul ni// rgyal ba'i gzhal yas kun las sgrogs// 'di dag don dang ldan par spyod// 'di ltar grags pa nges don ni// rnal 'byor can gyis shes bya ba// thams cad
87b6(rnying rgyud): dbu' ldan lcang lo nan// la la bkra shes mtshan ldan te// de bzhin pa tsa kA la yin// lal dpyad kyi nu sha yin// de bzhin mi 'gyur sa mkhregs yin// mehA ko sa dpal dang ldan// ye shes lnga ldan zhes ni bya// A hraHpha la tshe yi mchog/ lA
87b7(rnying rgyud): mo le de bye brtan// la la de bzhin pa sgra ba// bcu pa yi dpal dang ldan// bkra shis don 'byung de ltar// bder gshegs mtshan ldan rdzogs pa yin// gtsug drung dge gtsug dpal dang ldan// dz+nyAn su de bzhin no// la la dz+nyA na sur+b+ba wi/
88a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin thob t+ta li// e kang na mtshan ldan pa// a be m+ba katogs pa'o// 'dod pa brtan ldan bdab s+ho// gnyis ma ngon ldan thob pa'o// phun brel lkug zhan rgyas// rdo rje bste sgo mtshan rtogs nas// shes sgo gas
88a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i don 'byung ba// sku gsung ljon grub ka pA la// thams cad reb yid bzhin stong // de bzhin yon tan rdzogs kun rdzogs// bkra shis mtshan ni kun ldan pa// de bzhin myi 'gyur g.yung drung brtan// mi shigs mdzod yin kun 'byung ba'o// cho 'phrul
88a3(rnying rgyud): rtags 'byin dam pa 'byung // srid pa yongs sgrol las kyi mchog/ khams gsum dbang sdud khyad par ldan// drug gsum gtan sngags las mchog can// mtshan ma'i spros bral nges pa'i don// rigs drug mdog drug dbyibs drug dang // yon tan
88a4(rnying rgyud): skyon rnams sbyar bar bya// mang dang nyung ba'i gasdang ba ni// bcas dkar 'brel dang mgo ma 'byung // rje ste 'dra la sogs skyon rnams spang // dug gsum stongs mdzad rgyal ba'i bka'// sku gsum smin pa'i g.yung drung rtags// sgra thabs gsang ba'i
88a5(rnying rgyud): du'i sa smra sa
88a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin lnga bdun 'bring du grags// dgu ni dngos grub tha ma ste// bcu gcig phan chad yal bar bshad// de bas rnal 'byor rtsal can gyis// nges par brtson te brtag par rigs// 'dod chags pa dag pos de skad bshad// mtshan ma yin phyir der nges
88a7(rnying rgyud): pa// mtshan ma can dang mthun bya'i phyir// thabs kyis de dang mthun spyod la// yang dag don la kha lo sgyur// de dag rnam par spang ba dang // 'gro drug shin tu g.yeng ba can// yid rnams drangs te brten byas nas// thabs kyi don la sbyar ba'i cho ga/ rgyu
88b1(rnying rgyud): drug 'dus pa 'as gzhal// gla gro gar gyo rol pa yis// srad gsum thal gnon dbang lhud pa// bajig rten mthun 'jug spyad par bya// dbyer na 'jig rten khams dag na// 'gro bas 'gro ba 'dul byed pa// de dga'i las pa de zhugs te// da dang bas ma/
88b2(rnying rgyud): pa mthun spyad pas// de dung 'dris nas de dga' byas// de nas de yi drod lon nas// de yi 'du shes sbyar ba'i tshig/ de sde bdag gi thogs khyod kyi// las la zhugs pa shin tu nor// 'dir nyes las kyi bsags pa bgrang // nyes kyang bdag gis khyod dgar
88b3(rnying rgyud): byas// de ni bdag dga'i las 'di la// grogs khyod shin tu 'jug dgos so// byas pas de yi sde sems de// zin pas gcig pa phyi sems kyang // 'dzin cing de dga'i las la 'jug/ spyod pa'i las kyang 'di lta ste// rgyu drug 'dus pa'i phung po la//
88b4(rnying rgyud): dran song gnas 'joms rdo rje'i rtags// ye shes thabs kyis sbyin pa'i glu/ rmad 'byung gsang chen sgrogs pa'i tshig/ nyon mongs lnga yi sa gzhi la// yi ge ye shes lnga gsal bas// 'bar ba khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin// khyu mchog lha yi stabs
88b5(rnying rgyud): kyis rol// seng ge ro rngam pa'i glu// rdo rje don rab sgrogs pa'i chog/ rma byung rol ba'i don byung ba// sa ngo mtshur la mtshan che// dgyes pas rol pa'i byin brlabs las// rgyad drug rtsad gcod ngo mtshar rje// mnyam pa chen po'i nam mkha'i las
88b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'bar ba'i me byung bas// 'khor ba khrag gi rgya mtsho skams// sdug bsngal dbyings su zad mdzad do// mi ga nas klong nas cho 'phrul ba// gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor 'bar// khrug 'thung 'byar ba'i sprin 'phros pas// srid gsum khrag mtsho
88b7(rnying rgyud): rdo nas skams// dpa'i bo tsham ngamagyad kyi stabs// srin po ma traM khros pa'i glu// thig chen rmad byung gsang ba'i tshig/ chags pa'i rtod phur gting nas phyung // mkha' bzhi dbyings kyi bde klong nas// tshom bu 'bum gyi cho 'phral 'phros// dgyes mchog
89a1(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i phrin las las// lal shes rab thabs la rol// la la thugs rngalas lo rol// la la gdul b+ha'i yul la la// la la ye shos dbu su la rol// thabs kyi rgyal po rtogs pa dbang // thob srang gi khyad par lus// rgyal
89a2(rnying rgyud): kun dang mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i stabs// chags med mkha' la gsal ba'i tshig/ dug gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i blo// 'jig rten de mgyis snang po'i phyir// 'jig rten khams su rol babyung // 'jig rten drug gi snying la rol// bdag
89a3(rnying rgyud): ma nas/ 'a rten pa'i tshigags brnyen// 'byeng ba'i ngam nyan pa du/ shudan sum pa'i pa brnyes// ga 'ag ba da/ ga pa bde dpapa 'kho das 'ing rngu /
89a4(rnying rgyud): bas// thabs kyi byang chub sems sprin spros// dbang snyed chags pa'i khyad par las// 'jig rten bu mo drug dang rol// seng ge rnam par rol pa'i stabs// rdo rje khyed skad 'gyur ba'i sgra// chags pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshig/ rdo rje rlob pa'i don chen po// 'khor
89a5(rnying rgyud): lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mtshan cha bring po'i srog 'bru gros// rgyu drug ngo bo r+d+ha dra nas gtsa // drug lnga'i phung po rnam par s+ho// ye shes rdo dpe'i mtshon rgyan po// chos nyid bdal ba'i stong nas 'ad+mo// thabs mchog dbyig gau rkye la shugs
89a6(rnying rgyud): las// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab// yi ge ye shes mtshon cha'i char// rdo rje lce yi shugs kyis dbab// rin chen gter gyi longs spyod rnams// rtog pa'i ri bo gzhom pa dang // dug gsum phung po gzhig pa'i phyir// 'khor lo lcags kyu
89b1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa// rten dang gsang chen til mchog dang // dang sa ma la stsogs sgo kun rnams// so so'i rma du phye nas ni// thugs rdzas nyon mongs spyod ba yi/ so so gany+tsir gyi rang skal du// phyag rgyas so'i skabs su gdab// de ltar rdzogs par gyur pa dang // maN+Dal
89b2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi tshad 'dral// dbus su thig bzhi le tshe dgu// mtha' skor 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad bya// de la sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas// mthang zong bskal pa'i me ri bri// dbus su dkar dmar kha spyod bri// phyogs mtshams brgyad du khaM brgyad bri// 'khor lo'i
89b3(rnying rgyud): bar mtshams mu khyud la// nang du bltas pa'i khaM brgyad gsal// rtsibs la nang du lbu ba brgyad// mu khyud brgyad la phyir lha brgyad// gru chud bzhi la nang du lta// thig le rnam bzhi bri bar bya// phyi rim par khyams de dag la// thig le nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// phyir+ya
89b4(rnying rgyud): lta ba bri bar bya// bskal pa chen po'i me khyams la// thig le phyir lha bcugs la bri// de la phyag rgya rim par dgod// maN+Dal sgo rub ma chen gcig/ glu bro gar gyis rnam sbyangs te// dbus su bzhag ste shar du bstan// de yi phung po gzhal yas khang //
89b5(rnying rgyud): las bskyed de gsal bar bya// de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs chen bsgom// rdzas kyi gnas rnams so so la// rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod// de nas rdo rje bsnyen pa bya// byon phebs rtags phung mgu ba na// ba mr-i kyang shar mtshams su bsgral// rdzas rnams
89b6(rnying rgyud): sa song ba ste nas kyang // b+hag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su// men bar yang dgod de sbyar// dpal dang ldan pa stong dgu la// rmed du phreng ba de ba // 'bad pa chen po'i gnas gnasas/ brjod pa'i tshul dugasal bar ba skam// byug
89b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rdzogs par dgod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen zlag ma skar tshogs bkram// rdo rje mo phyed dgur 'bar ba// che ba dgu yi khyad par las// dpal chen dgu ni sgra la rdzogs// yum che ni dgu ni dbyings la rol/ dpal
90a1(rnying rgyud): pe'u dgra ni thugs la 'bur// 'byung chen dgu ni klong du 'khyil// khwa zug dgu ni rang skad rdzogs// stan tu dgunani dpal dang ldan// blag ma dgu ni yum gyi byings// thig le dgra ni byang chub sems// nyi zla dgun 'od 'phro 'bar// de ltar da
90a2(rnying rgyud): dgur gsal ba yi// dgu klo b+ha gA gcig gi dad+ma// dgu bkag gcig rtse thig le'i don// thams cad 'byor pa rgyas byas la// ba mra dgu phan cad sman du sbyar// rdzas kyi dngos grub blangs te spad// ces bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs
90a3(rnying rgyud): so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rmad byung rdzas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni mngon sum du shes shing
90a4(rnying rgyud): rig par bya'o// mngon sum gang zhe na/ dran pa mngon du bzhag pas yul la mi gnas pa'i chos thams cad dang / phyis 'byung ba'i chos thams cad dang // sngon du byung ba'i chos thams cad mngon sum mar rig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon sum mar shes
90a5(rnying rgyud): pa ni ye shes chen po'i ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de yang ji lta zhe na/ chos thams cad sgra ma d+hi rang bzhin du dran pa mngon du bzhag na mngon du gyur pa'i chos nyid kyi ni nI mo log par shes pa yin no// chos nyid phyin gyi ma ldog par mngon du gyur na myi gnas pa'i ye
90a6(rnying rgyud): shes chen po nyid de yin no// de bas na mngon par shes pa rnams dran pa mngon sum mar yid la byos shig de skad ces gsungs pa dang / mngon shes rig pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa ni
90a7(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rnams kyi dmachog bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig 'dzin chen po rnams ye shes chen po'i rgyu mngon par shes pa ni rnam pa
90b1(rnying rgyud): sa// mag ga dbang byams pa dpas// rnab cwa d+hags pa rnamar na// bdu pa byung por sbyar byas nas// mthong ba'i slong ba 'gras panas na// thams cad ma smras nga ba gyur// 'a na gsu nga na gams da d+ha rna
90b2(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i tshig/ dus sam kun du brjod par bya'o// badz+rA tsak+Shu gar+b+ha bid+d+ha hrI// d+hU ba'i dbang po thams cad kyang // btags sam phye mar byas nas ni// bcud kyi snying por sbar byas te// thos pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas na// sgra yi bye brag thams cad thos// 'di nA
90b3(rnying rgyud): dbya'i mdzan shes so// da tshi bad+hag pa ni// 'adz+rag ma / 'i dbang po thams cad can// brnams sa makyi m-i byas nanan// badz+ran kyi sto por gyur byas to// dra phyogs rnyeng bskyes pa las/ dz+dza\u0f88\u0f90 byo 'bram panasam/
90b4(rnying rgyud): mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje tshig tu gzung ba ni// badz+ra na ma si tihU~M// lce yi dbang po thams cad kun// bskams sam phye mar byas nas ni// bcud kyi snying por gyur byas te// ro yi mchog la sogs pa las// ro yi snying po 'bum bzlas te// hUM byed
90b5(rnying rgyud): yid kyis 'khor ni// stegs bu zla gang bung zhi'// dbus sugs dpa'i rdo rje bri// mthu' ma lce yi pad+mas bskor// lce 'chog gi 'od zer 'gro// sgru ba'i baisgrub pas 'di rdzogs nA// sba ba'i dbang po khyad bye zhing // ro rnams thams cad shes par 'gyur/
90b6(rnying rgyud): 'di ni lce yi mngon shes yin// rdo rje tshig tu brtag pa ni// badz+ra pA sha sing+ga hUM// snying gi dbang po thams cad kun// bskams sam phye mar byas nas kyang // snying po mchog dang sbyar byas shing // dran pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas shing // dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil
90b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// dran pa'i rten gyis yongs bskor te// snying gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // dbang po thams cad gsal ba dang // thams cad ma lus shes par 'gyur// gzhan gyi sems ni shes pa'i mchog/ badz+ra tsit+ta sid+d+ha hU~M// lus kyi dbang po
91a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// btags sum phye mar byas nas nI// sum khregs bcu dang sbyar byas te// reg bya'i snying po 'bum bzlas na// lus kyi mngon shes thob par 'gyur// mngon shes 'di dag kun rdzogs na// mi ga nas ye shes chen po'i rtswa// phra mo
91a2(rnying rgyud): nan tan mchog tu bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mngon shes rig pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcwa lnga pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus
91a3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i tshogs mchog chen po'i bsgrub lugs ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// don la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las kyi stegs bu chag phyed pa// me ris bskor te 'bar bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi maN+Da pa ni// sum brtsegs byas pa'i dbus zla gam//
91a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis mdzes par bya ba'o// phyi mtha' thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// de mtha' me dpung 'bar bas bskor// de yi phyi mtha' dmar chen rgyas// zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar// zla gam brgyad lag nas bdag brgyad// mthing nag ya tha me rir
91a5(rnying rgyud): dbyar// de 'og zed pa tshar gsum dang // sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor// sgo brtsegs sgo/ khyud tha ma bran// thams cad gang yin de ltar sbyar// phun sum tshogs par gyur pa na// rnam bzhi las kyi maN+Dal brtsam// 'jigs byed bskal
91a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor du// za byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// thar pa tsa ra bsgral pa'i phyir// drong ldan min ngag 'chang ba dres// mchog gi byin brlabs gzhag par bya// drag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrang nas// gnas mchog dben pa'i ri bo rtse// rna
91a7(rnying rgyud): nyan phrags ga can dang bral// 'du 'dzi 'gro 'od chad pa dag/ gsang chen spyod pa'i gnas su shis// rnam bzhi las kyi rtags nyung nadang // gcig gnyis ldan na 'bring du bshad// bsgrub pa'i rgyal po gdeng ldan pa// shin tu brjid cing sran tshugs
91b1(rnying rgyud): pa// khru phrig rtog brul baN+Dal zhugs can// las kyi phreng ba lha gu chad med// dri zhim dag pa'i sman dgra gis// phyi bkra shi ned hu las// nang yang dag pa chen por bya// rgyud mar sbyar ba'i bka' dang ni// ldan nas dus btab shin tu bar+d+ha ma// de yang
91b2(rnying rgyud): brtag pa'i gal chen ni// bkra shis mdzes dang ldan 'gyur ba// bong tshod lo ni dar la bab// rigs lnga'i mtshan dang ldan pa la// bsgral ba'i rdzas su rung ba dag/ yid 'ong 'byor ldan btsal nas ni// bsgrub pa'i rjes su bya ba de// de 'dra'i mtshan rtags yod pa
91b3(rnying rgyud): ni// su d+h+wangs sa pa slebs pa'o// bsgrub pa'i sbyim chog de dag na// 'dra' thuman 'das dbang po sna // ro rje phram pan phab na ni// rlung rdzi byam byung dri bangam// legs te 'a thams cad dri bar bya// dbang po lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi rnam
91b4(rnying rgyud): pags/ shes rnams / ga m+b+ha byas gdang/ pa ston mongs bcwa'o/ m+WA bams d+hangs na// da dang shes dang ma y-i sa
91b5(rnying rgyud): bya'o// gong ma bzhin du las brtsams nas// thar pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni// rus pa rdo rje thal bar bsgrub// rus pa'i tshogs ni thams cad kun// bsregs dang lce bog nag por sbyar// khyab 'dug ga'u kha sbyar du// bcug sti 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang /
91b6(rnying rgyud): drag po sngags kyis bsgrub byas nas// thub na rnal 'byor don ldan gyi// bar chad zlog pa'i gnyen por sbyar// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dur rig pa'i mdo ba rdo thal chen gyi sku thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas
92a1(rnying rgyud): du nardzun na na zhu na
92a2(rnying rgyud): rnganA shrIs// phyi li khrus rnams byas nas ni// shar du kha bstan dbus su gzhag/ rje pa gzungs thAg sna lngas gdags// rnal dpyor rnams rnaMs bskor bar bya// phrug tu rdzas dang bcas par dgram// de yi khong drugazhal las bskyed// rim par brdzogs
92a3(rnying rgyud): pa dkyi 'khor ni// 'ber ba'i 'byung chen 'bang brdze// don gyi lha mo lnga drugs pa// ngan gzhig ni du bzang mo gsal// de yi thugs kyi khod zug tu// thig le tsA ba nye byas la// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gdab// thugs kar nor bya rin chen
92a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar// dbus su nyi ma'i gzhal// dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i tham pA la// hU~M dam kyil 'brang gnas pa ni// bde rkyen byang chub sems zhes bya// rdo rjegasang thag tan mA~M gcad// rdo rje kha brag ba par bya// de nas mtshan ma byung gyur na// ngos grub zlas
92a5(rnying rgyud): te de bsgral la// bskams te bdud rtsi rtsa bar bya// zhes gsungs so// rgyud gi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchog phran thabs kyis bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad
92a6(rnying rgyud): ce gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha ma ni dngos por sngang yang rang bzhin med pa yin te/ rang bzhin med pa'i don ni chos nyid rdo rje yin no// de bas na sgyu ma'i chos thams
92a7(rnying rgyud): cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs bdag sgra ma mkhan zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyid mchog ni skye ma'i mo 'phrul laganas shing sgyu mched du bgyid lags
92b1(rnying rgyud): kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don ched du sgyu ma'i chos thams cad bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshogs bdag chen po sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// chos rnams thams cad sgyu mar snang //
92b2(rnying rgyud): ma'i rang bzhin stong pa ste// stong pa'i don rnams gang yin pa// mi 'gyur myi shigs rdo rje'i don// stong pa nyid la sgra ma yi// tshe 'phrul bye ba mang po 'byung // de bzhin lha ma'i cho 'phrul yang // gyi nad tsam gyi rgyu rkyen las// cho 'phrul gzugs ni tha
92b3(rnying rgyud): hAhA// kAr ya dngos por ma grub ste// 'gyur 'jigs med pa'i rdo rje'i don// ban no ba sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyang // dre dang shing ba'i gya dgra lasra// sman dang sngags kyis seMn bur nas// babs rba d+d+ha ma'i gyi 'phrul 'byung// sgyu ma gsang chag rtso
92b4(rnying rgyud): bani// lha mu'i bdag pos 'di skad ba shad// rgya la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la// she'u ri'u spyan gyis btab nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba bya// she'u bu i na ya// a mo khA a gusa? bus// chag shing dag gis brdabs byas na// ji ltar
92b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa sna tshogs bya// bsdu bar 'dod na skar bzlog bya// des ni sgra ma'i g.yeng bcan// drang ba'i thabs kyis bkri bar bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las spyi mardo rje bang+gA ba lugs kyi pe Ta ste bcwa bkyang pa'o//
92b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo dz+nye des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad la dbang skar bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o// phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan nas// stegs bu kun du gru bzhi pa// mu khyud gcig tu bskor
92b7(rnying rgyud): nas ni// zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs su sbyar// sgo bzhi bu chad bzhir ldan bya// dbyibs kyis thig le zlum po la// rdo rje dang ni nya mas bskor// dbus su blun d+he dpal ldan la// dpal chen yab yum sbyar lag zhag/ tshal bu brgyad la gnas brkya
93a1(rnying rgyud): sa gnas/ gdag na // na man su ga/ gas mas ga sa pa ba / sa da dun/
93a2(rnying rgyud): mdzes par dgram// rdo rdo rnal 'byor de dag rnams// rdo d+ha 'gras pa'i rtags kyis mA tshan// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas// spyan drangs mdzod pa dran pa sogs te// 'dzag dang dngos bu'i gsol ba dang // dbang bskur las rnams can
93a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nang // rmang du byung ba'i gtor mdag/ cha gsum dang po sbyin thug bya// bar ma zad ga ter du // blang chub sems kyi su po dang // chos ny-id namya mra brji kyis chen dang // rtag yas g+ha sa gzhi la// shin tu smra ba'i tshul du sbyar// cha gcig gzha /
93a4(rnying rgyud): yas shar sgo nas// bcu gsum btsal bar stegs bu bya// der ni gnas bdun gtso rnams kyang // de bzhin bcu gsum lan re la// gnas kyi mgron nem sreng rnams// bdun cu bar du kun rdzogs bya// tha mar maN+Dal zla ga ma la// nus na mkha' 'gro nam
93a5(rnying rgyud): ma pa'i hom// rdzogs bye ma lus de mgu bya// lhag mar gyur pa kun rdzogs b+ha// snyigs mar gyur pa thams cad kyang // swa'am bsreg gaman+ta klung 'dor// rdo rje gnas chen de bsrungs te// gnas ni s+tha b+hir sa dag gas // mr-i rigs phyi rA na mtshan mdag/ rang
93a6(rnying rgyud): rang gnas sa slebs par bya// gang dag 'ang mo nga de bzhin no// 'di ni thig gcig pa Te// bar+b+ba ba lpags mi nA pa rgyal bas pashad// 'di dag sgrub pa'i skyes byi na// zla ba'i 'khor lo l-I gnas niso// nyi ma'i 'khor lo grags nas ni// yang dag
93a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings nyid la// dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// yang sems dpa' rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// 'di yang rim gyis gong ma ltar// thams cad tshul bzhin skur byas nas// phyir kun
93b1(rnying rgyud): drag+ha bzhi la// thig le bla ba gcig tu bya// de la srad bu bzhi bsnol bas// la'u tsho dgu ru gyur par bya// phyi rol mu khyud thod pas bskor// grwa bzhi grwa chad rab mdzes brgyan// de yi mtha' zad khyams gcig pa// sgo gdong srub pa po la lta// dbus
93b2(rnying rgyud): su thig le dkar dmar la// kha sbyor bar dag rdo rjes 'brel// der ni dpal chen yab yum bzhugs// phyi mtshams le'u tshe de brgyad la// zla gam brkyang pa brgyad byas te// ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad dgod// phyi rol sgo gcig khyams de la// bsgrub pa'i
93b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas kyis mdzes par dgra ma// bsam bya ba sgrub pa la sogs kun// thams cad de bzhin 'dir sbyar bya// 'di ltar grub pa'i skyes bu gang // chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa ste// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ba'o// skyes bu chen por de 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so//
93b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des cho 'phrul thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// 'di yang thams cad de 'drar sbyar// kun du gru bzhir ldan 'gyur ba// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya// gru chad
93b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi phyi rol du// sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya// phyi khyam sna dmar nag me ri klong // shin tu brjid cing 'jigs par bri// thig le dbus kyi snying po la// bla gu mo 'bar bsdu mtshan par bye// dzI bas mchog brgyad la zla ga ma ni// nang du lta ba de brgyad
93b6(rnying rgyud): bri// rtsibs mtshan brgyad la'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje sgo mo bzhi rnams te// phyag rgya rim par bkram byas nas// bslab pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs bya'o// de ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las// 'das pa'i cho 'phrul
93b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las thig le sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces
94a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams dregs pa can rgya tshogs thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o// 'di ni byas la sogs pa'i lus// 'di ltar 'byor dang phun sum tshogs// thabs la mkhas dang
94a2(rnying rgyud): yo byad dang // ji ltar rig par 'dir bsdu bya// de nas mu dz+wal 'dra cig la// dur khrod mgo ma yang du bya// zur po zhi maN+Dal bzhi byas la// bzhi las de bzhis tshig res bstod// de nyid ma tang gzugs rba bya// snying ga man chad dbus su bsnol// dkyil
94a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i thig btab ste// dpal rkyen lnga yi phyag ca bye// khyams gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod// sgo bzhir rdo rje 'on ba bzhi// yan lag sprul pa'i mgo bairnyan gnas
94a4(rnying rgyud): khyams rdo rje me ri bye// de yi rmyi rol phreng chen gtams// skam drang nga'i ljon pas bskor// de yi phyi rol me bur 'tshub// bskul pa'i bu yug bri bar bya// rdo rje sgo khyed sgo khang du// gu gu thul dang zar tshags// zheng dang sbrul gyi chun po bri// de nas
94a5(rnying rgyud): bon+du dpal ldan la// rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge dag/ bris la kha sbyar sgrub ste gzhag/ ga'u chud la ngal pa can// brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gnas su gzhag/ las byed brgyad dam bcu gnyis la// las byed bcu gnyis bris la 'god// thar pa gnas kyi
94a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// gdol pa 'byung po rgyal can// chags snga rnams kyis bsdad pa'i rgyu// de yi dug gsum bshig pa'i phyir// don gyi bslab pa chen po bshad// rbA dra l-I yi tshogs chen te// ting 'dzin ye shes lngas bcom nas// rdo rje drod kyis
94a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par sbyar// mdo yis pa stabs gcig tu'o// bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po// drag lnga rtog pa nyid las spyos// khyer dang gsum gyi drung khrod na// gzhi rtsa ngag dang lus sems so// brjid ldan dpepa cher drur khrod bdag / kha/
94b1(rnying rgyud): rtog rtog 'joms tid 'dzin gyis// srid gsum ru dra drar khrod du// tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya// ma rig mun khang sgo phyed nas// glang chen smyon pa de bzung nas// gzung 'jan dum po'i rtod thag bcang // dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur
94b2(rnying rgyud): dbyung // ngan song 'dam nas drangs nas ni// nyon mongs dpung rgod de brtul nas// ye shes thabs kyis rnam spangs te// nam mkha'i klong du dmigs med par// bde chen mchod pa'i tshogs chen dag/ ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyang bas// chos
94b3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rgyas pang sbyar// mnyam nyid bde ba'i snying rje yis// dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang // 'khor ba'i dra ba gcad pa'i phyir// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas// gtumathung rngam pa mgyogs pa'i tshogs// phyag brnyan char chen phab nas
94b4(rnying rgyud): ni// 'khor ba'i rnga ba spangs nas ni// bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste// byang chub myu gu bskyed nas ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lo tog bskyed// dur khrod chen po'i bzhin phyogs ni// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bting // rkang pa byang shar natshams su
94b5(rnying rgyud): bting // nga ni drar khrod dbang phyug che// sangs rgyas sku ste ye shes yin// thugs rje rnon po'i dmag tshogs la// ye shes rnon po'i mtshon tsha yas// log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun bcad do// gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo rje yi// dbye bas 'dra'i thab ni brtsigs
94b6(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // snying gar 'khor lo'i thab rgya bya// rigs kyi yam shing lnga badz+rIgs te// ho ma lha 'brel pa'i las chen brtsigs// thabs rkyen wa yi hom khung du// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yam shing la// ye shes chen po'i me klong du// nyon mongs lnga
94b7(rnying rgyud): yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs// bya bar sbyor ba mtha' dag kun// ji ltar 'byor cing 'tsham par 'ong // zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun bdus rig pa'i mdo las dregs pa can gnon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shre pa'o//
95a1(rnying rgyud): Anas pa ba dang sa do/ smos gsungs spya canapa ga na dab da pa rnam la 'a nas byab ba nan das ga dz+nyA/ 'du na nanas/
95a2(rnying rgyud): 'khod las na smran pa smrasas// khri ga thay-i/ seMd // nen bo nga rgyu da / nas skyed rgyas ma // de rnams na tang / rdo m+bi ni ma ldan sbyin drug/ sbyin ma tshad rgyas par dab ga
95a3(rnying rgyud): dge bsnyen nun pa // glog su ma rnams las na nga // rgyams cand phyog rnams// ga myed pa 'i stegs blan/ ShAt+pa la ba'i t+yA ba'i sa la// tshogs rgyalas byas pa me// mthun pa'i gzugs bcu
95a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bzh-i t+ta/ khro ba gaur gyi nang mtsham ste gcang // de nas ma gnon par ste// phyogs pa na rdza rdzog can+te de // rnams kyang baphrul ba'i zhid yin te// ti mAH si d+hi d+hag mA d+hA dA d+hA d+hA trA~M b+haR+tha sh+tsa r+dz+nyAH/ khadz+ra ga bste na /
95a5(rnying rgyud): ma rig mun pa'i sgo menas// nam shrIs arba b+hin brlabs te// gas chen thugs kyi skyong du bstim// skyebs ni gzhal las 'bar bar bya// stegs bu ma tri gzugs 'dral// 'gyel thibs bzhin phyogs ci 'drar bya// kha dog sngo sgyu gan rgyal
95a6(rnying rgyud): thabs// me lung med med gnas kyis byur// de ye ste gA dru bang di ma gsus// dang pong dbang po zla ba zhi bzugs// gshes pa mang drug ga ga san+ta// gsum smug nag zla ga ma b+ha// yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug/ gsang sgo gnyis/
95a7(rnying rgyud): brgyad dag la// stegs bu chag phyed gru bzhi brgyad// de yi mtha' rim yongs zad du// zlog ma gsal ba'i maHla rgya// de dag mi tshong 'bar bar bskor// ma jog thrig ma nga dag tu// dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mchog bzhugs/ mthong chug
95b1(rnying rgyud): gsum ma dpung bre// grwa bzhi'i dmar po bad rim la// rigs pa ni lha mchog dpal ldan gzhag/ yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon brgyad// dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyud// bri b+ha yang na mAdza na ma gzhag/ rdzogs chen brgyad la yul bdag
95b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad// ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o// sgo bzhing gsang bsgom dag zhig/ mtha' bang yongs kyi thag ma la// bud med nyi shum brgyad gzhug/ ming ngam ma tshan mkhyen te gzhag/ de yi khal thub tu brtsegs// brlad pa la bzhung byings 'dra bab// mangs
95b3(rnying rgyud): pas yam shing btsam bur bya// bya ba'i bya ba thams cad kun// gong du stong bde ltar sbyor// zhes gangangs so// spyad kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor ba thams cad spol ba bgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//
95b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des drug gsum thugs su dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// drug gsum dbang du bskur ba yang // 'di ltar khong du chud par bya// drag gsum rang bzhin gang yin pa// sku gsum ci
95b5(rnying rgyud): ste// gzhan nas be tsel ba ci yang med// de ltar shes par 'gyur ba dang // kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur// thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar la// stegs bu 'dom gleng pa zhig la// phyer dmar po rgyas par bya// de nas mthing nag zu ga sum
95b6(rnying rgyud): brtsig sa/ de nas dmar nag zla ba ma b+ha// zla ga ma dbus su dpal chen 'bur// dbang gyig gnas bkyed zug ma mtha'// bang rim par la dur khrod 'bor// tha mdad skang po gru bzhi la// sgo bzhi po sbyang bcas par bya// de lce thA ma chis bskor/
95b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i rtags rnams dgod// bsgrub dang 'jug dang dbang bskur rnams// gong ma bzhin du sbyin par bya// des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin// drug gsum thams ca zil gyis gnon// zhes gsungs so// spyang kyi rgyal po chen po rdo tra bkod pa dun 'dres rig pa
96a1(rnying rgyud): 'dolas drag gas ma dbang bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i bslab pa'i khyer sa nyi shu rtsa gnas na'o// danas sems dpa 'do rje dmu dus bud med thams cad la dbang sbyang ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i dgras saso// 'dus cad
96a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o// bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te// chags pa khrag gi rgya mtsho phyi// las kyis 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bying // chags las rnam
96a3(rnying rgyud): sgrol 'gog pa ste// rdzogs pa de nyid khrig ces bya// khrag gi rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir// bud med khrag gi rgya mche rnams// 'tho ba bdud rtsi'i rgyu mthod babyung // de ltar shes par gyur pa dang // sman rdobatshul du 'di ltar gyur// phas kyi brtsams pa phun sum
96a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas kyang // mad+hAl 'dom gang gu bzhi la// 'kho mo bzhi ma thig tu gdab// u khyud phyi ma tha zad pa'i// denas rlomams dmar por bya// kun gyi phyir ma lagadutu'o// ma de 'bar bas gtib thag gcang / dbu
96a5(rnying rgyud): su shwar lta zlag ma bri// b+hin d+ha dpal ldan yab yum dgod// 'khor lo bzha la rigs bzhir ldan// bar khyams gnyis lha gnas yul rnams// zla ga ma thig phyir ldan par bya// zho khyams go bzhi bla ka ma bcas/ gyi khyams lag dzA tra yI me// me'i lboT
96a6(rnying rgyud): thig ler bcas// dur khrod rgyan gyis kun brgyan bya// ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos bsgrub dade// 'jug pa dbang bslar dngos grub rnams/ gnas bsrung pa sogs rdzogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'das rig
96a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo las 'khor lo dbang ster gyi slab lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjedam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams 'dzin bdud rtsi sprin gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o//
96b1(rnying rgyud): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni 'tsho ba chos nyid kyi tshe yin// ma rtogs na ni 'chi ba 'khor ba'i dug yin// de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de ltar shes nas kun rdzob tu 'di ltar bsgrub
