96b2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas// mthe log pa'i snying ga ru// 'dom gang tshad dang mthun pa la// rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i 'khor lor gdab// me yi 'od kyis bskor bar bya// rdo rje rabs bskor ba yi// mtha' mo sgo khyud 'bar bar bya//
96b3(rnying rgyud): das sung rjen brgya bya// de na phyag rgya bang bye dgod// bdug bskul pa gnas mchog 'dir// ral pa can gyi phyogasu 'dus te// dak+ta 'joms pa'i mthun gan// phred pa gsum pe 'dir grol ba'o// dus bzhin byed pa'i dmangs kyi/
96b4(rnying rgyud): sa da da sa
96b5(rnying rgyud): ston me dgun sa ste// dpying rlung nam mkha' gsang bar sbyar// cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas// de dgA ral pa can du bsrub// ting 'dzin rnam pa lpags pa byas// 'byung lnga las byung sha rigs lha// khyau sha ba lang rta sha dang // bye dang ri dgas sna tshogs naM/
96b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul shugs su sgrub pa'i rnga'o// sgrub pa'i rgyas chen 'byod chen lnga// 'jig rten kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// de ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang // ting 'dzin bsgom dang bsgrub pa dang // thams cad song dang mthun spya nas// 'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams//
96b7(rnying rgyud): ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po ni// gong
97a1(rnying rgyud): ma bzhin du legs sbyar nas// maH mdzangad dang mthun pa la// bad+ma mang ba 'od kyi mkha'// phyi sa zlag ma mang ba bzhi// rdo rje 'bar bas mdzes par bskor// me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni// zlag ma mtha' zang su bar bya// rin mnan
97a2(rnying rgyud): par phreng bas ni// pad+ma'i lce la bskor bar bya// sgo bzhi rin chen 'bar bas bya// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha bkod na// dbus su gser phor stsal med la/ dung chen 'khor ba can gyis sbyar/ shar du shel phor sul 'greng la// rin chen mdzod srugs pa bas
97a3(rnying rgyud): sbyar// lho ru rin chen sul mngal// rin chen lo 'dab rgyas pas sbyar// nub tu rgya phor zla ga ma la// bzhin mtshams rin chen 'bur gnyis sbyar// byang du bse phor rgya gram la// gtsug tor rin chen 'bur bzhi rgyas// rtsa ba lnga ni phyogs phyogs sbyor//
97a4(rnying rgyud): lnga'i gtso bo rigs su sbyar// dbus nas shar lho nub byang du// ka ko la dang du rus// dza te pha la khwa dri zhim// khye bog dkar zhes rim par sbyar// de bzhin gong gi rim pa bzhin// a ru ra dang ga pur dang // gur gum pad+ma li ga dur// de na r-I sa yA na
97a5(rnying rgyud): rnams// thams cad ngogs dang kha dog dang // las dang mthun par sbyar bar bya// sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar// dab pa dang ldan pa'i snod nang du// yab yum snying po rim bzhin bya/ dbus dang pad+ma lce la dgod// gnas yul la sogs mdzes par
97a6(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang bkra shis rdzas// 'byor pa'i yo byad thams cad bshams// de nas byin phab dngos grub gsol// thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya// dam pa de nyid gsang chen gyi// rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis// thams cad sbyar
97a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchog tu bya// de nas khrol bu sbyang ba na// bsal bsngo bsdu dang dbye ba dang // khrus bye ba dang bshags pa dang // yon tan brjod dang byin dbab bya// de nas skad cig thang cig gam// zhag gcig dag gis sbyar bar bya// rtags dag byung na dar
97b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyos pa'o// phye ma'i mchog tu spang ba ni// snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas// bsdus te btags pa'i cho ga yang // yum gyis bzung zhing yab kyis btags// rig 'dzin rtsal can dbabacad drung // so so las kyi sngags brjod cing // gtan gtun thabs
97b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab ste// sman nyid byang chub sems su sbyar// rdo rje gru 'di lha mos blang // kun du bzang mo'i gzhal yas su// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las// 'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du sbyar// ye shes lnga ru gsal ba las// 'bras bu sku gsum thugs su
97b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// 'tshe med badred kyis gcong rnyeng spang // mtshan ma brtag phyir btsal nas ni// rdo rje dpal ldan kha sbyor blugs// kha dog rigs lnga'i ras kyis dkri/ rdo rje dbang gi khyu yis gdab// rdo rje ljags kyi gzungs kyis gdags// dpal chen sgra ldang
97b4(rnying rgyud): shesas med de / 'dug ci da dadur bya/ shAn gyis brgyad na dang sa ba du // dang sman sa pa dge slo dang / gas ldan 'dun na myong / ma mi snad mang bas bsten/ bsla' pa bramachog gtams
97b5(rnying rgyud): pas dag // bkra shis gros kyis rgyas par bklubs// gzungs thag gnyer can rigs su dbul// ting 'dzin me yis rnam par spyid// rtags chen lnga ni gang byung yang // sbyar te dngos grub blang bar bya'o// bdud rtsi sgra las drangs nas ni// dpal ldan pad+ma ldan
97b6(rnying rgyud): pa ru// thams cad bdud rtsi sa ma ya// mkha' klong yangs par bde chen rdzogs// rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ gzhan nas bsgrub pa ci yang med// 'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang // tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya/ zhes gsungs so//
97b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi phye ma'i bsgra po rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad de 'drang sbyar nas kyang // baN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs byas nas/
98a1(rnying rgyud): sman slang btags btsags bcwa la nas kyang // sgrar zad 'ams gong bur bya// ba sror mtshan ldan nung du gzhag/ legs par kha sbya ngas kyis dkri// kor ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas// dngos grub mchog rnams bdag gis bya// zheg gsungs so// bcu
98a2(rnying rgyud): chog rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// sgo ma'i cho ga 'di lta ste// thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas// mtshan ma gsal po 'byur ba dang // phye ma chu tshags nang nas dbyung // phye ma'i mchog
98a3(rnying rgyud): khyed rnam ma da / gas pa bskyed dudaso// byin bye mang sa// thos ba na gyud byed/ ba makyang// kun pada'o ma la mogastsag// san ge khyab du gyu/
98a4(rnying rgyud): na ldan du// thugs sbyar rgyas btab nas// 'gro 'dra ban pa rjod grongs basbyin// byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang // dngos gab chen po byung bar bya// e ma'i bsgrub rdzas de dashin// cha lha dag tu dgos nus pang // rab 'byong sa so'i cha mas
98a5(rnying rgyud): sa// ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang // sbyar chang cha lngar dgos pa las// rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las// sbyar te dngos bu brten du bya// zla ba gcig tu zos pas ni// ba spa rangs shing gnyer ma rangs// bla ma gnyis su thos byas na// gzi mdangs nyam
98a6(rnying rgyud): cad 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba gsum gyi ni yon gyis// nad kyi bras la ba dag / las zar// zla bzhi phran cad gang drug gis// bsa? dung mi 'dres brtson bslabs na// gzhan gyi rlud rnams 'joms par nus// drug dang bdun dang bcad rnams la// bdung ci bar+d+ha
98a7(rnying rgyud): gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur// dgu dang bcul zag pa zad// bcu gcig rig 'dzin nam mkhar 'phur// zhes gsungs so// bdud gyi skyo ma'i bsrub pa rnam par ga shad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa
98b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lha'i zas// lde gu'i cho ga chen po ni// 'di ltar khong du chud par bya// sbrang rtsi bu ram rkun 'brum rnams// lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang // kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba// lo yi 'tsho bar gzung zhing bsrel// sngan
98b2(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal por ma nye bas// rgyun du gsos pa'i 'o mede// rig 'dzin zas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// bdud rtsi rgyal mo ram nye ba// phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang // lo yi 'tsho ba'i skyar byas te// sus mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs su// bsgrub rdzas de dag 'akram
98b3(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // bdud rtsi bsgrub pa de bzhin bya// dus bab pa yi tshod rnams pa// bsgrub rngas de dag thams cad kyang // ba yi 'o mas lde gur bya// cha res bskyed cing bza' bar bya// zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro//
98b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi lde gu'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// 'di yang gong ma ltar byas te// de dang mi mthun bslab rdzas rnams// bdud rtsir
98b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun// thams cad thams cad bsdu bar bya// til chen la sogs thun gyi mchog/ thams cad bslus shing skur byas nas// gar+b+ha s+ya glang gong ma bzhin btsal+ya te// bdud rtsi bkram nas bslab par bya// 'phro 'dra ba rnas
98b6(rnying rgyud): rgyan mi gcad // grub pa'i rdzas su gyur pa dang // sman rnams phye mar brtag par bya// de dag phyi mar gyur pa dang // zhun chen deg dang sbyar bar bya// sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang // dngos grub mjog ni blang bar bya// gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang /
98b7(rnying rgyud): yis pa shugs te 'phreng mi bya// 'tshe ba bdud rtsi tshun gyis sbyar// bdud gyi grub pa'i rtags chen ne// nga sgra langs dang gi bri mdangs 'ab / khyad kyi byis bral ba de bang rtse// shes rab gas la zhing thogs pa m-i / thug pa zang nas rnam ma kha /
99a1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs sa// bdun kyi kun can gyi bsgrub pa pa shang byung // de nas yang sems dpa'i dadzangs 'don ces gsungs sa// 'dus partan ngon pa gyu nga// rlan pa 'ongs pa stan bslabaH// thams cad gangam pa nan sbyang dang/
99a2(rnying rgyud): lag pa pa'o// ba ga pa da pagas+ho// byung sa smraH/ da ba nas kyi gas nga na sa pa'i yin sa/ dang nga mas / sa da bcwag grang ma nas
99a3(rnying rgyud): byed pa
99a4(rnying rgyud): sman gyi bslab pa'i le'u m+b+ha te shurtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po des/ sgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsung chen thugs kyi rtsub pa zhes za ba 'di bshi do// 'dus pa chen ba'i rdul 'gror ba thams cad ni dbrings su shes par
99a5(rnying rgyud): bya ste/ 'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni dbyings su 'dus la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni ye shes su 'dus so// de gnyis su med pa ni chos nyid byang chub sems kyi bde ba chen por 'dus par shes par gyis shig/ de bas na chos thams cad
99a6(rnying rgyud): ni thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te gnyis su med do// de ltar na kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rig par bya ste gnyis su med pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// dam pa'i don gyi chos rnams kun// thams cad rang gi sems la
99a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// kun rdzob chos rnams gang yin pa// lus dang ngag la rdzogs par bshad// des na chos 'di thams cad kyang // rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa ste// 'di dag bslab pa'i thabs mchog kyang // rnam par rtog pa'i rdul bas pa nas// bsgrub pa'i rgyal
99b1(rnying rgyud): po rab yum gnyis// don la mkhas par byas nas ni// so so'i thags la thig le dngag// zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya// de yi rdzas mchog chen po yang // thabs kyi grwa pur chen po dang // shes rab gsang ba'i tsan+dan gnyis// dkar dmar zla gam
99b2(rnying rgyud): chen por bya// yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la// thig le kha ni ma lta bu'o// yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la// thig le kha ni yar lta ba'o// yab kyi thig le'i dbus su ni// dpal be'u dbus su nyi ma bri// dbus su oM gsol nang du hU~M// yum gyi thig
99b3(rnying rgyud): lo'i dbus suni// pad+ma dbus su thob bre// dbus su a gas pa rje// de ltar gsal bar sbyar pan// kun du bzang po yab sum du// gnyis su med par bsgrer bar bya// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang // ring las byung ba'i bdud rje yis// ga
99b4(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis kyi mchod pa bya// rang las byung ba'i dngos grub dag/ rang nyid sa ni bstim par bya// 'di ltar sgrub pa gtsor byed na// bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang // bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa rnams// lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang // bsnyen sgrub yan
99b5(rnying rgyud): lag rnam bzhi las// bsnyen pa dag gi dus su ni// gang zag mi yi zas la brten// de yang lo yi skad cig gam// gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar// lo yi skad cig bar du ni// bdud rtsi yo byad rnams la brten// de nas lo yi skad cig ni// gcig
99b6(rnying rgyud): gam gnyis kyi bar dab tu// dang las byung ba'i rdzas rnam lngas// 'phags pa mchod cing rang gis bza'// des ni drod la gnas par 'gyur// drod thob gyur pa phan chad ni// lo yi skad cig nang cig gis// ting 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas// kham gyi zas drang
99b7(rnying rgyud): bral bar 'gyur// drod zen rnam gsum rdzogs nas ni// rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur// rtags kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni// rin chen phung po 'dod pa na// sa rdo la sogs byas na 'grub// chu dang mkha' la 'gro 'dod na// brtsams pas me 'bring thogs med
100a1(rnying rgyud): nas 'dun// sa // na sa na/ sog pams sudun su na
100a2(rnying rgyud): byug pa'o// dang da du ngas byed drad pa po 'gapo mang pa'i bklu nyi gyis pal/ das pa maldan 'du sems de dzo ma nga ba ba ni khyo ting pa dzin pa snyams pa
100a3(rnying rgyud): de 'as par chags thums pa sa ba ring den du bya mi // skye shi tu 'aspyod pa// ma'i semapa / 'dzi ci de ljing bya// 'drab na ba na pa ci/
100a4(rnying rgyud): sna brjin dun/ na'i gi ste / du dzugasadad la sa da// dngang gi kying gyis mang dpal ba
100a5(rnying rgyud): thug chen pa yu la lta// den grabadzin pa a la'aM/ ga sa byed che gyis pa'i// dgyes pa na pa su nga // deg sa pa pa/ nga khyod byeng sa ste// 'ang ba rnams pa bshu
100a6(rnying rgyud): pa shad // me pe rang bzhin chen bdug/ bdag pa ga rnams pab shing ba gas // nisags pang btang pal me// sems dpa'i rdo rjesang kyis te 'di dang rgyas pakang sprul to// 'dus partson po rdo pa'i ba nga// dza me rang bzhin dag/ bya klung zlu
100a7(rnying rgyud): da sa kyis sa/ sa
100b1(rnying rgyud): chub ye shes mes// mtshan ma'i bgazugs bsregs sbyangs thim// rnam dag rta ga'i ho mkhwa du// chags pa'i yam shing spangs pa la// bde chen byang chub me sgrar te// 'khor ba'o dngos po sngags sbyangs tham// dpapa chen napa kyai hom khrung du// nyon mangs la na/
100b2(rnying rgyud): yam shing pa// ye shes lnga yi me skar te// gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs spangs thim// skang srid rnam ma pa'i tom khring du// 'brang ba bzhi yi yam shing la// phyag sna'i tshogs kyi me sbyar to// sdang med dngos po bsregs spangs them// las bzhis som
100b3(rnying rgyud): khyad par gyis// phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas// ji ltar yin pa de ltar sbyar// shan wA nub byang dkar ser dmar// mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar// zlum po pad+ma le'u tse zhi// 'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas// zla ga ma dru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang //
100b4(rnying rgyud): gru gsum b+ha ga kha mngon sbyor// sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes// las kyi yam shi rdzas kyis rgyas// ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan// bla ma gsum gyis thabs mchog sbyar// dag pa'i mtha' 'dzin nyes mchog 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba'i g+ha pro
100b5(rnying rgyud): glar// mchod pa gsang ba dus tshigs sbyor// rdo rje lam gyi smon lam sbyar// gsang ba las// rgyud ldan pas// ba shar grede bzhi pa'i lha rgyud dang // rgyas dang dbang ba shar rgyud bshar bas// lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang // de bzhin rnyed dang 'byor dang bya//
100b6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi lha chud lnga rnams ni// so so'i rigs su bshar btab ste// klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hoH/ khung du// dem rdzas bdud rtsi 'brar ba yis// sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os// bsreg rdzas skye ba'i tshes yin te// skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad//
100b7(rnying rgyud): 'dir ni dngos po bzhin snang ste// chos can rkyen dang 'byung nas dang // rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni// skye ba nyid du 'dod pa yin// 'di ni skye ba'i chos can te// rang byung sreg rdzas rang zhing thim// nyon mongs lnga yi ma rdzas dag/ ye shes lnga yi klong du
101a1(rnying rgyud): dal// zla ba cwa srid mardzas rnams/ babs mchag ya pa'i thug banas// 'byung ldas 'azlas pa'i ba sanams// shes sum pa ngangs // ba shos nga bya bcog rnams// shas gnas rtsom brgyad pa
101a2(rnying rgyud): la thig yeng ba rnam pa bcad// dmigs mid dngas kyi the brag bcad// skye ba zhelas kyi brdeg rjes rnams// nam thar thob 'i nga 'dring ma// thabs mchog la sogs 'jug sa// na mra'i man na thams ci dag/ yang brjod nas kyang /
101a3(rnying rgyud): dgra mnyes pa'i mchod pa brtsam// mchod pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang // drib byang mabyang don chen rnams// thub dang mgrub don rnams ni// mi la mkhas pas brtag par bya// mi skra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis// 'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnam drug/ de dag yongs
101a4(rnying rgyud): sa shes par bya// gal te mtshan ma mi sdug na// bkra mi shrIs pa'i rtags yin pas// bsreg stang chen po rgyas par bya// de nas 'dod pa'i rtags byu na// me la 'dod pa'i dngos zlab rnams// rnam gsum gang ltar grub pa blang // ro yi rdzas rnams 'asreg stangs nas/
101a5(rnying rgyud): la sngags kyis btA' nas kyang // shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// rol byug cing bkru bar bya// bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis// ras la thugs pas ro dkris te// ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par// sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas// phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab
101a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag ni// gzhung yin pa yi phyag rgya rnams// du 'byung ba dang mnyam pa yi// sdong bu'i grangs kyang de ltar bya// sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi// mnor rtsa ba'i snying po dag/ ras chen dag la bris te gdags// ro mi sbyor ba
101a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa dang / ro ma gyi shun thams cad la// 'khor ba'i bag chags kun bkod do// ngas sam shing shun shog shig la// 'khor ba'i sa pa na thams cad dag // nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas// bre ba'i lam la cung drug rnams// maung ngam/
101b1(rnying rgyud): bcugasas byas nas // gnas gnas dag byung ba dbar bya// khams dang rnam na phur pos// gzang 'din mying du bdus pa rnams// dadu mi na ma du thos namaH// darnams khyad pa dang ga ba \u0f7f// denanar ma thang bad// na na thogasas ma byugs pa pa/
101b2(rnying rgyud): steng du ma khas pas gzhag par bya// thad kyi cho ga brtsam pa ni// maN+Dal 'khor khyud tsam zhig la// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin pa'i// phyag rgya bzlugs pa'i pho brang dag/ thig gis yul gtsang so sor bya// de yi steng du shing brtsigs pa// dbying
101b3(rnying rgyud): ni bla bzhi gtams pa la// zur bzhi ka ba bzhis brtan bya// sum brtsegs yang thob par khang bcas// mtha' ma shing gis brdung bar bya// bar khang dag gi glegs ma la// ro yi bzhin phyogs shar du bstan// ro yi steng gi khang pa la// ras sa ma shog
101b4(rnying rgyud): shog la bris pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod// ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la// thugs rje gzungs thag bzhis btags nas// phyogs bzhi blam bzhi lnga dbul// shing gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // shing gi phyi mtha' stegs bu la// phyag
101b5(rnying rgyud): rgya'i lha rnams rim par dgod// stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // rdo rje las kyi skos gdab pa// rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la// 'khor ba bsreg pa'i mda' gsol te// ting 'dzin ye shes rtse gcig pas// me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya// rdo rje las kyi karma la//
101b6(rnying rgyud): las rnams rdzogs pa'i mnga' gsol te// las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya// rdo rje chen po'i bla ma zhig/ ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas// las ci bsags pa bgrang zhing bshags// rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma yis// bdud rtsi skabs kyi mchod pa sbreng //
101b7(rnying rgyud): brogang glu tshig gis// skabs kyi glu gar mchod pa dag/ por mos drangs te dbul bar bya// rdo rje gnas kyi smon lam ni// skabs dang las kyi mjug tu gdab// rdo rje las kyi lhar 'dzin pas// rtsa brgyad las kyis grangs bzung ste// dkar byed bla ma'i phying
102a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ 4\u0f7f/ na // byu sa / phyu g+sa/ ma nga rgyun rlu // smo / sa su sa na
102a2(rnying rgyud): d+hAsh+tsa// rgyal ba grang kyi na mchog ste// bzla la nga tu shing // ma su ngan sa ng+kA g+sa ga yid// mi ga su ma sreg pa nas kyis 'ches// 'byu ba'i theg pa'i dzin las la// thugs dme ba na pa yang mi 'ad // hrI ma rjeg thams pa sa// man
102a3(rnying rgyud): dang ma nyi coM// den rtog // ma ts+tshab byeng bang // man sa thab 'i ma ga// las mags pa shA / na mahrI byung ban/ sreg ga ra// kAl tu mngan ga grubacag// ral thal ba /
102a4(rnying rgyud): la ba'i bgyug/ spyod / sa d+hA/ da nga rdzam ga pa 'i sa glu / ngas semapa pa dzi
102a5(rnying rgyud): des dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis rlob bzhes bya ba'i rdo rnga sngags kyi chog 'di gsungs so// sarba ta thAg ta ma hA shrI hi ru ki badz+reHN+Ta/ sarba rbadz+nyAM sa~M shrI hi ru k+She te kaM han pa tsit+ta nI/ sa sa ses sa ma ya sa~MnA ne/ sa no d+ha ra/ badz+ra gar+b+ha/ ra dzA gaN+Da/ bad+ma gaH/ ka zag d+ha/ mi trig /
102a6(rnying rgyud): gaH/ log gaH/ bi ma gaH/ yaH/ g+has/ bi shrI/ d+heH/ ke shwa/ ba shwa/ bi shwa// dzaM shA/ ka sh+tsa/ baH/ ti/ n+ti/ ShIte/ siH/ sas sems sas/ samams sasas/ semamasasas pa/ samasasas seMs/ zlab sa rnaH/ bran rgan ts+tsha/
102a7(rnying rgyud): dra nga drug bya ma tshum kyi rgya tug TI tra t+ya tug tu bya bya brgyargya chu ba b+ha gangagag bsas gas bag gaganagagags/ gagragagags //
102b1(rnying rgyud): tatAtAta/ ta ta ta ta tat+ta/ twAtwAt+tASh+Thatat+taH/ tat+ta t+yAd+hAta taSh+yA/ ma b+ha thAn mA myA T+Ta/ mA mAm sa mA rbu ma?/ grAm+ba ma ma mam sa/ mamamamam ma ma/ bAh+mAh+mA r+thAd+hA b+hUt+ma/ bA tA Sh+Ta hat+ma/ hA na drA h+mah+nAhA/ hwAHhAd+ha twA d+hAH/ g+h+r-i d+hI b+h+r-i b+hI m+b+hi b+hU b+hA/ g+h+rA dz+hi ts+tshi nr-i / dz+hats+tsha d+haH
102b2(rnying rgyud): kr-i kr-i 'dzi 'iphyi pa sos sa ye yi de yos sas seMs Shi TI Ta TI Sh+ra Shi DI/ Sho Sha Sha'i 'i'o'i dri'i'i Sh+Na TI 'i
102b3(rnying rgyud): d+b+ha T+Te/ b+h+rUM ShIts+tshiSh+NI shrI shrI b+hI/ hU~M te he te/ ha hi hi hi te he he/ he he he he hi hi he/ he he he he hi he he/ ru ru ru ru ru ra/ ru rung bu ru ru / rdo rdo rje rje nan du byeng / kAk+sha ka~M ka~M ka ka~M/ kr-ikaki ke kr-ikA ki/ kI ki kiki ki ka~M kaM/ ka ki ka ka ki ki kaM/ /
102b4(rnying rgyud): hrIhrI hU~M hrI/ d+haHshwAsh+tsA shAts+tshash+tsa/ sh+tsa sh+ma shwA sh+tsa sh+tsa shA sh+tsa/ shwa sh+tsA sh+tsA shAsh+tsA shAsh+tsa/ shwa shwa sh+ma sh+ma shwA shA sh+tsa/ r-i ri ngo ni/ ri d+hi / ra de rlung / ri re ri ri dar de/ khab lpa pa kha khra pa// gags kha 'a la/
102b5(rnying rgyud): kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha Sha/ muM mr-i mu~M muM muM muM muM/ bru~M m+bu nr-i r+m+ma Tu buM muM/ muM mr-i mr-i mr-i mr-i mr-i mr-i/ mr-i m+bu kl-i mr-i mr-i mr-i muM/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+wa dz+ra dz+wa dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dzA dz+nyA/ gau rI/ tsau rI/ pra mo hA/ be tAl+lI/ g+hasma d+hI/ puk+ka sI/ smA shA nI/ tsaN+Da lI/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ sid+d+ha/ b+hA b+h+yAM/
102b6(rnying rgyud): gr-i ga la/ shA na/ kr-i d+ha/ kAng+ga/ kha g+ha/ U lu/ mu mu mu mu mu mu mU mu/ khA khA kha khA kha kha kha kha/ he he he he he he he he/ ba bab ba/ dra dr-i dr-i dz+ra/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ dzeHhUM baM hoH/ Ur+ya ti tsa te dngaHpA shwe hUM/ l-i ki ba~M/ b+has+t+ri ya ti hoHbi be ba ba bi ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+wa dr-i dz+ra dza dz+ra/
102b7(rnying rgyud): ts+tshi noHe h+ye hi/ dra la? mrar+thats+tshe ts+tsha rbu dz+dza/ badz+ra sa ma ya dz+dza drA sl-i/ baidz+dzi sh+le te dra ka/ tiSh+Thas ma ya s+than/ mahA shrI he ru ga ha ha ha ma/ sa ma ye hoHphaT/ badz+ra A ra li phaT/ a ti \u0f7f hoHpra ti pra haMH/ a d+hi pur+b+r-i drA pa/ ba li/ tai dza hoHkha r-i bI hi/ ma hA //
103a1(rnying rgyud): hrIH/ baHsaHta/ !/ b+h+ya ta/ nas na/ DAka/ yag / mad+ha/ nga lda// khakha'/ shatu wAn/ al la/ swA chu ya na na kun/ ungasus pa / bdusasas sa A/ sa nga sapas gyu/
103a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i cho ga zhes thams cad shin tu 'bar zhing rgyas par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bgrod pa kun 'das drig pa'i mdo las rdo rje gsang sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des sbyar ba phyig rmyi'i le'u 'di rtse char gsungs so//
103a3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog gi lag gnyis la// nyi zla 'bang ba'i'i DUr ni// a dang pad+mag nyis gsal te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med ster// mnyam pa'i rgyal gyis gnas pa la// ma yi steng du a nyid gzhag/ bya ba thams cad bral ba'i cha// a dang ma yi 'bru bcu rnams//
103a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'du bya zhing kun du bsgyur// g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yon du 'khyud// 'don cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rtsa// a dang ma yi 'gra rnams brgya// so sor bcangs te myu gur bya// shin tu bstod de kun du bsgyur// 'di ni snying por gyur pa'i rgya// ma les sbyin pa gtong tshul la// a
103a5(rnying rgyud): yis thams cad skyob byed pa// 'di ni tshad med chen po'o// kun la snyoms pa'i phyag rgya yin// ma nyid khrag 'phrog pa yi snod// a nyid so phreng mche bar sbyar// 'di ni thams cad rol pa yi// 'jigs tshul ston pa'i phyag rgya yin// a dang ma gnyis gting sbyar te// so phreng ma che
103a6(rnying rgyud): bA'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu kha glal pa yi tshul// 'di ni 'jigs byed chen po'i rgya// ma yis bzung ste 'then nas ni// i yis gdengs shing 'joms byed pa// 'joms byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin// ma dang a yis mgo mjug nas// bzung ba'i tshul du byas nas ni// kha
103a7(rnying rgyud): yis 'drad cing 'dren byed pa// ze byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin// ma dang ma ye shes rab las// g.yas g.yon tshul gyis bsgyur byas te// so so ji ltar yin thabs sbyar// gnas dang yul mi gtan tshigs su// bsgyur ba gar gyi phyag rgyar bshad/ dpa' bo gdan
103b1(rnying rgyud): la bzhengs nas ni// phyogs mtshams kun du bltas byas nas// shin tu 'gyad zhing brjid par byed// a dang ma yi 'bru rnams ni// so sor brdabs nas dkur brten bya// 'gying ba'i tshul gyis sbyang byas nas// stag gi stabs kyis kun du bskor// de nas rgyun bya stabs kyis
103b2(rnying rgyud): ni// gong ma bzhin du bskor bar bya// de bzhin dus sbal gzig dang stag/ sbyang ki seng ge dom skabs dang // phag chen drod kyi stabs kyis ni// thams cad thams cad bskor bar bya// de bzhin 'dob chags thams cad kyis// 'jo tshul stabs rnams rdzogs byas nas/
103b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las sbyar ba phyag rgya'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// hUM
103b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba chen po nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi mdzod// nam mkha' las ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa 'byung gyur cig/ zla rgyas la sogs snying po mchog/ mi sa la sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas// me tog la sogs tsan+dan phreng // sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur
103b5(rnying rgyud): cig/ mi mo rnams kyi ngag bya mchog/ 'khril 'khyud sbyar ba'i gzungs chen ma// dbang po spyod pa'i dgyes mchod de// bde ba'i mchod pas tshim gyur cig/ rdo rje rol pas tshogs mchog 'di// mchod sprin kun du rgyas gyur cig/ dug gsum brtsigs pa'i ri bo 'di// sku
103b6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi klong du bsgrubs// dug lnga rol pa'i tshegs mchog 'di// ye shes lnga yi nang du thim// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// dbyangs dang ye shes klong du thim// 'khor ba mtshan ma'i chos can 'di// chos nyid dbyings kyi ngang du thim// phung po tshigs kyi yan
103b7(rnying rgyud): lag 'di// rnam grol phung po lnga ru thim// 'byung chen rgya yi mtshan ma 'di// mkha' klor 'bar de lnga ru thim// rol pa chen po mchod sbyin la// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams rol// bla med stan 'gan mchod pa 'di// sngon tshad rgyal bas bgrod pa'i lam// dug gsum ga
104a1(rnying rgyud): nas gsad pa'i thad// sngun gyi thugs dbya bzhin du ba zhes// med brgyu cigs na// ras byas pa rnams sang bar byed // ga rdzang ba 'dasas byed pa// tsam rdog spyan mchong bar byazhes// zhes mchod pa'i chags rnams pa 'ang byung sa dru/
104a2(rnying rgyud): bas rgyal ba rgya mchu tshogs longs spyod ngas mnyes par gyur to// rgyud kyi tshul po chen po rdo rje bkod pa dun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchod pa dam pa gas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de rjes sems dpa rdo rje des rdo rje sbya'i le'u 'di gsungs sos+ho// 'dir ni rdo rje rnal
104a3(rnying rgyud): dbyor dmahA// bsnyen byar snang ba'i dbang thob nas// bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru ba rgyad s+ho// yi ge b+ha yi rgyan yin te// thA li yi ge bcu drug las// yi ge yan lag bsgyur bsdebs nas// kA yi bye thag bas ma mi khyab// dang por gru yi don byung ba// oM gyis kyu rnams rab tu
104a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// oM yang oM mtsho 'phrul te// ma ni chos kyi yi gri yin// A las oM byung rgyal ba'i thugs// rnga lAb chos kyi dbying sa las d+ha r+pa// A las a byung gsung gi mchog/ gsung las glu yi yan lag 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cur grags// gla yi yon tan
104a5(rnying rgyud): bAs ma ni khyab// sngon gyi rgyal ba glu yis grub// rig 'dzin rdo rje gru yis 'dren// rnal 'byor dbang phyug glu yis 'grub// bstan pa chu mtsho glu yiswa spel// srid pa'i bu mo glu yis bsnyen// bdud dang srin po glu yis 'dul// dngos grub rgya mtsho ga yis 'bebs// chos nyid
104a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi klong dkyil nas// dpal be'u nyi ma dgu shar bas// rnam thar sgo bzhi rang gsal yang // ma rig mun gnag 'thibs pa yis// bsgribs par rig pa'i sgo mo byi// 'khor ba'i mun gnag klod num na// byang chub sems kyi zla shar bas// mun bsal rnam thar
104a7(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhir snang // rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams// dpal chen thugs nas 'od shar bas// bag chags sprin mthong bye ba ru// rnal 'byor thugs kar zer bab pas// mun bsal rig pa'i sgo phye ste// rnal 'byor don la 'jug par bya// rig pa thugs kyi dkyil
104b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// rwa lu 'od zer sgo phye bas// smyos pas cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // srid pa gsum gyi bye brag phyed// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems// nyon mongs rgyu drug gnas nas sgrol// dug gsam rdzab srang nas gcad// bdud dang sbyin po gdug pa 'a
104b2(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs dngos grub char ltar 'bebs// ji ltar dbang po'i sgo phye nas// 'dzum mdangs gsal bar 'byung ba ltar// dpal be'u thugs kyi sgo/ bas// chu m+bu'i 'od zer yig 'bru shar// mthing nag ser nag dmar nag ljang // sdug nag 'ber ba'i lag 'bru rnams//
104b3(rnying rgyud): yi ge rigs kyi phreng bar drang // rgyangs kyis bskul dang dkar gyis dbab// bsten kos nye bar gyur pa la// 'jim gos mngon sum gsal bar bya// 'bir klas gnyis su med pa la// 'dren kos yi ge'i phreng ba drang // de nyid la ni glu drug ste// sha ta pa dang gar ta pa// cang
104b4(rnying rgyud): gar ta pa yi glu blangs pas// gnod byed thams cad rdul du rlog/ cang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor me ltar mchod// bad ka de'u yi gru blangs pas// drag po gtum po lhan ner 'gyur// br-ing nge ba yi glu blangs pas// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul
104b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'gyed// dung de ba yi gru blangs pasdu// srid pa'i bu mo dbang du sdud// yi ge 'bru dgu'i rang bzhin la// phyag cha'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs// de bzhin 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// khyams dang sgo khyud gsal ba'o// srid pa mthong yod
104b6(rnying rgyud): sdang grags kyang // thams cad sngags kyi tshig tu rdzogs// yi ge rgyal bkun dang 'brel// 'khor lo'i sa la nye ba'o// yi ges dmigs pa thams cad 'brub// chags med lhun grub don po che// rnam bzhi las kyi khyad par yang // bya ba
105a1(rnying rgyud): nga su ma// sogag nga sa// ma du pa thas nga // gas dang sprul yag// rang sa du ma byas// dag ba ma sa// dam 'a kya rdzogs /
105a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sgrib pa'i bud shing bsreg/ gti mug mun sel ye shes 'bar// rig pa'i nyi ma gsal bar 'bebs// bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs// tsit+ta dpal be'u zur brgyad 'bar// rin chen yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal// dpal chen rin chen 'bar
105a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i thugs// dpal be'u stag po zur brgyad las// gser gyi zhi ma dgra shar ba// 'od zer ru lU yig 'bru brgyad// rdo rje 'bar ba'i rlung skyom du// shin tu 'bar 'phro 'a khrug byas te// spros pas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi// nas g.yas su drung bar bya// go
105a4(rnying rgyud): gzhal yangs// di na b+hang tsam kyi d+ha khyon pa// glas gas // shar ba ni sman yig/ 'dre kri// gapal ba ga zhal las byang// gabye ban bregs te// de med ni ga seng chu rnam pazhin/
105a5(rnying rgyud): 'tsher zhing dod 'brar ba// rtsal las gyur pa'i zla dkyil 'khor// nyi ma'i steng na dpal be'u 'bar// de la ru lu 'phro zhing 'dra// dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor 'di// yig 'dra 'bar ba'i ga'adugra pa la// pad+ma 'bar ba'i ga'u 'di// yi ge phreng ba 'khyil
105a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas// dper na me tog 'bar ba las// bcud len bung bas bcud blangs te// rtsi yi bur du srog pa ltar// dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'od kyi me tog 'bar// ru lu'i sreg 'bru bcud kyis rgyas// rnal 'byor sems las byas pa
105a7(rnying rgyud): yi// bzud 'byin phung ba mang po 'phro// phar ldeng yi ge'i bskyed phyung nas// tshur lding sems kyi gzur bsgrim// dang po shel gyi kha dog la// shin tu gsal zhing 'tshong 'angar po// gnas dgu dag tu zla ba yi// thig la dkyil gyi dpal bai'u la// 'byung kod gsal
105b1(rnying rgyud): ba byad pa dang // shes ba mang ba // rmongs ma / par spring brda byung bya ga pa lag/ 'ag me bar bas// drug nags zung shi ba thugs ga sungasas 'a'as//
105b2(rnying rgyud): myig / do/ dag sgragang // na da nga
105b3(rnying rgyud): sa// kun gyi pa mer babyu // nga pa'i gong pa bcwas cad pan// ming dag 'bang ba nga zh-i ni// rlung chen ga can 'a nas da tsa// khyod cing pon can rjod // dral brjod byin das su ma // dza 'i sa
105b4(rnying rgyud): gas kyi 'bar bkra da rdzas// dal ba la mazung pa yis// rgya rten ga/ sa shing rda mi tig sa// 'drabya ba'i thugs sum byed pa sa na// mtshal pa phyen byung // 'di ni mi gang ba
105b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor rtag gcig tu 'i hrI// lhamachog na ba zugs pa yang // chos nyid deng na/ mjug gyi brdul ba \u0f7f// rjegs rje chags pa'i mad sad+d+ha nAs// mardzun sa ga da // mtho
105b6(rnying rgyud): bal gang/ mi ba ra// b+hag sbyi tshig par b+h+riH// dbye wajo ba rje ba ni dpe// ye shesadon pa ldan pa// de yo pang 'dun ga/ rdul baphrul ba'i snre ga
105b7(rnying rgyud): byed/ dgacig bya phyir/ sa pa drug dang bskyed pa dang / gtur bam nga la bye bar 'gyur/ 'di gyu myong ba'i 'dron spyod badrub yi 'i thol/ rtags pa mdzang pas can na// du
106a1(rnying rgyud): dang // yad mthong ste thos kun la 'byung // lus kyi drod dang rmil ma dang // sems kyi rtags su gsal ba dang // dbugs dag la yang nges par 'byung // shing bal lta zar yang ba dang // me bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin// reg la
106a2(rnying rgyud): tinge 'dzin gsal ba dag/ rmi lam du yang myos par 'gyur// dang zhing dga' la mgu bgyi// gdung ba'i byang chub sems skyes shing // ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid do// 'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang thob ste// dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o// rdzas ni 'bar
106a3(rnying rgyud): dang 'phar ba dang // je dang 'od 'byung ngo mchog ste// mi zong mang du 'phel ba dang // srung du 'angam dang zhing ngamaT+wA~Mg rnyed// la mi gnod pa zhin la ston// zas na bzhin 'gyur lus nas 'gyur// sel snyan yad 'ong sde sman gzugs// drizhis 'byung
106a4(rnying rgyud): bde lta'o// rdo rje phra rnams bzang ba na/ rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste// sbyar te dngos grub blang bar bya'o// bde dang gi'u'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje bum pa'i 'phro 'dra yis// dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la dbab// yab yum spong ba'i lhag sems dag
106a5(rnying rgyud): ma phebs pa yi bar du dag/ shes rab gsal ba'i lha mo bzhes/ hasta me long b+han d+ha dang // zhing chen phreng ba la sogs dang // kha dog lnga yi dar g.yab kyis// g.yab cing rig 'dzin mang po 'bod// rol mo cha byad mang po dag/ rdo rje gar dang snyan pa'i
106a6(rnying rgyud): sra// srid pa'i mam then rten byeng // byin brlabs rkyen po da ba par bya// phebs ma dag tu dngos grub pa ma// dId nI rdorje rgya lakhor lo/ ye shes rgyan g+hi las yin no// zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// rgyad kyi chel po na po rdorje
106a7(rnying rgyud): bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje g+hu'i la'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ gsang ba'i dkyil
106b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor dam pa 'dir// gang dag 'jug par byed pa yi// rnal 'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun// snod du gyur pa kun bsdus nas// byang chub mchog gi sems bskrad de// tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya// e mra pade mchog dag 'tshal 'dir/
106b2(rnying rgyud): bdag cag kun du 'jug par 'tshal// dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas// gsang ba'i don 'di sprad par bgyi// de skad gsol te zhus pa dang // gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis// rgyud spyang rgyud drug las sgo gcad// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
106b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor kun// dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bton te// phyag rgya dbar dang bcas pa yi// 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams spang bar bya// 'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru// rgyad drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang // b+h+rUM lnga dag gis gnan par bya// brdeg pa
106b4(rnying rgyud): byung ni// pa yi ye shes skrun pa/ ba kha ba ni ba la// mi nA yis pon gong// shAr ts+tsha dang byung dag tu// na 'gro yi gas dang // dmyal ba rnams kyi sa po na gdab// ga lA ma zhogaca par bya// lagag nyi mdzen/
106b5(rnying rgyud): chung mthe bos mnan// sor mo gsum sbyor dpral bar bsnol// lha dang lha min gnas dag tu// mi gtong bzlog pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis bsnol nas mchan khung bsdam// mi yi khams nas bzlog pa'i rgya// khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgreng nas//
106b6(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi steng du ma nan pa 'di// byol stong gnas nas bzlog pa'i tshe// zil mo mnam sbyang gung rtse spang// glang mo chub tu srin lagA bsngopa// mthuli nas mdzub mas 'khyud ben// ye dgas khams las bzlog pa'i rgya// g.yon thog ga yang
106b7(rnying rgyud): rgyab sbyar te// srin lag krung mdzub gcig nas gcig/ 'khyud pa dmyal ba'i sgo gcod // lag gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni// ngag ga rdo rje rgya brjod pa// kyem dra dra kro d+ha kri hUM// hri sa ma pa tsan+d+ra// dris pa dza hUM// 'di ltar gsal
107a1(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa dang // sgrib pa dag par bya ba 'byor// rnal 'brang sbyong bu phyug wA// dza ngan la 'byung mchogag// 'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal mad pa// da can la phrag 'tshal lo// byams mgon khrod la grubs su mtshan//
107a2(rnying rgyud): de skad gsol ba btab pa dang // rnal 'byor chen pa'i zhabs nyid la// 'jug pa de li spyi bos gtsigs// sangs rgyas pad mchog thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsung mchog gsum las byung // srid pag blam gyis phyag byas pa// dbang bskur gnang
107a3(rnying rgyud): ga du ga/
107a4(rnying rgyud): brnams cid bzlas pa yin// ga 'thung khaM 'bo ma'i tshogs// khris nas snying khrag thogs pas 'byung // badz+ra sa m+ba la oM dan zin dkan// ba ra hr-id lan ma pa sbyinan// saMm yarak+Sha sid+d+he ba d+he bad+hA amra ta kaM// da ji rje tshig chu blang
107a5(rnying rgyud): yang gsang ba ma smra shig/ gal te spras na de myal bar 'tshig/ khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo// rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'dzin// gsang ba mchog gi ming sbyin gyis// zhing khams kun du bde bar spyod// des ni sadus rgyas zhing du
107a6(rnying rgyud): skye// zhes gsungs so// kyad kyi rgyal ma chen mo rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dres rig pa'i mdo las rdo rjernal 'byor 'jug pa'i larje zhes bya sumacu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongs su gas
107b1(rnying rgyud): dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// sred pa gsum gyis phyag byas pas// bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni// gsang mchog sum cu rtsa drug yin// phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang // bsgrub pa'i
107b2(rnying rgyud): dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang // bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang // rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// de la dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te// oM d+h+waM sa hrIHha// kun gyis 'dra' bang dka' ba yi// tshig btsun
107b3(rnying rgyud): yul la dbang sbyar ba// rgyal po bka' rtags phyag ca'i dbang // sku la yongs su tshogs par 'gyur// rigs rnams sa sor rgyud 'dzin cing // rtags kyi mtshan ma chen po ni// spyor ba chen po'i phyag mtshan te// dmachi
107b4(rnying rgyud): sug tu rdzogs par 'gyur// shes rab gzungs kyi gsung mchog ni// de ni dang ldan par gyur pa li// mtha' gnyis dag tu mi gtong ba'i// gzungs ma'i rgyal mo chen mo yin// gnyis mod yongs su rdzogs pa na// thams cad
107b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ngang // byang chub sems dang don du 'brel// shes rab chen pa rdzogs pa'i dbang // bkra shis chen po rngam pa ni// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur pa yi// dbang
107b6(rnying rgyud): de la smin par bya// gsang ba'i bstan pa rgyas nas ni// yun ring gnas par 'gyur ba yi// bkra shris rdzas kyi dbang mchog kyang // gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya/ don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi// 'dod dgur re skor rin pa
107b7(rnying rgyud): rtse// rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis// rgyal po mchog tu dbang bskur ro// rin chen pad+ma seng ge'i waM// zla par gyur pa'i gdan mchog de// khyad par chen por thar pa'i dbang // khri med dgal bzhag par bya// nga ba
108a1(rnying rgyud): matog phrar la sogs// dbang mchog brjed pa'i rgyan gyis bklubs// dgra rgan da sha la sam do// dpya gyen rkang garngub lag gdung rnams// dbang po brgal pos de la sbyin// dbyang thob mdzes pas brjod par
108a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po de// dbang phyug yin pas de la kun phyag 'tshal// rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal po'o zhes par ni// kun gyis sgra chen pod cing bsrug par bya// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs khrud ldan pa zhig/ rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni// rang /
108a3(rnying rgyud): rten kun la kha lo sbyar ba yi// dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya// phyi 'khor spong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad// bla med mchog gi rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas// gsang sgo phyi nus nang du gzhug par bya// shin tu
108a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur nas// gsang sgo gang las 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu// gnang chen po yi rtags su byin gyis brlabs// gsang ba'i don la nyan cing slob pa'i dbang // dbang thob skal can de la sbyin par bya// bdud rtsi
108a5(rnying rgyud): chu 'dis rna ba'i gseng sgro dbye// sarba ta thA ga ta sta ma tI ho// glegs bam zab mo la sogs thams cad rnams// rigs kyi b+ha mchog de la sbyin par bya// des ni 'gro ba'i don byed nus pas na// las rnams rgya mtsho thams cad
108a6(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i rtags// rdo rje rje gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas// bu mchog de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya// gzhan gyi 'don song ba'i bu mchog de// rgyal po ky-il rigs rgyud du byung ba bzhir// grul zeb rjes kyi chung ngu byung bas
108a7(rnying rgyud): ni// tan+da la sogs dam pa'i mdzad gsum sbyin// des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun spyod dus phyir// bstan pa sgrogs pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir// rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mchog 'di// theg tshon dbu ye rtag se
108b1(rnying rgyud): sbyin// de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na// sa rnams nan pa'i rtags mchog gdun khri'i dbang // lha chen la sogs zhing chen nyi zlar bcas// khru mchog seng ge ma nya gzig dang stag/ gtam pa'i dom gyis slar te sbyin par
108b2(rnying rgyud): bya// rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun// spel dbang sbyar rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs// pha rol dpung 'joms skyed thub 'dzin pa dang // bdag gzhan ngon sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan// dgos 'dod yid bzhin slong ba
108b3(rnying rgyud): napoche// sbrul po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya// de ni rgyal ba'i mchog sras len pas ni// phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// rams ma 'thar ra ma lugs su rmugs pa yi// phyag ma'i gzugs brnyan de yi spyi bor
108b4(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ ye shes chen po'i don dang de ldan pas// ye shes lnga yi nAgs mchog phyag rgya yis// gnas lhur gtugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin// oM mahA shwa n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma ny+dza Ad r+ya dz+nyA na badz+ras
108b5(rnying rgyud): zlab t+ma ko&ha~M/ oM mA hA sa ma tI dz+nyAn bedz+nyA swa rbA pa y+ya t+ma kon hU~M/ oM ma hA pra d+hatra bye/ dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma kain ha~M/ oMm hU~M kr-id+ha rbar+thA nA dz+nyAn badz+ra sar+b+ba ba At+ma ko&haM// sri da gsung thug spyardo rje li// rnal 'byor ba mchog de yin
108b6(rnying rgyud): bste// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog 'di// rje ts+tshin la sbyin+d+ra par bya// oM san ti thA ga ta kA la dI swAb+hA ba At+ma ko&d+haM/ oM serba ta thA gi ta wA ka badzi ste b+hA ba AH kro&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ka ta tsiSh+Tha badz+ra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko&/
108b7(rnying rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog de// don rnams grub par bkra shis phyir// bdud 'dul bkra shis rdzas mchog rnams//
109a1(rnying rgyud): kyis brgyan te sbyin par bya// don rnams grub pa'i bu mchogad// rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na// zhing khams kun du grags pa yi// rtsal gyi thig le rdo rje sbyin// nang du 'jug pa'i dbang thob nas// de dag glan lnga stod srub
109a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// dbang mchog dam po sbyin par bya// skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid la// sems kyis dbang bskur thob pa yi// shes rab chen po rig pa'i dbang // sems lon don gyi gtan tshogs sbyin// bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing //
109a3(rnying rgyud): med gnas pa'i byang chub sems// snying rje chen po bde mchog gis// khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur sprin// srid gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun// thams cad rdzogs par nus pa yi// rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni// thong gshol
109a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba sbyin par byed// dug gsum gting nas spags pa yi// rtags chen gawa rnam pa gsum// de mar chen dag gis bkang nas kyang // dbang chen thob de'i lag tu sbyin// srid gsum sgrol ba bya ba yi// dbang mchog chen po sbyin pa'i phyir// ka
109a5(rnying rgyud): tar la sogs mtshon cha rnams// dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin// 'khor ba'i chos la cir sprad kyang // skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i// rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po ni// rnam dag rdzas kyi pad+ma sprin// las rnams rdzogs par gyur pA yi// dbang
109a6(rnying rgyud): mchog thob pa'i rtags chen ni// stera'i dbyug pa chen po dag/ dbang tho ba dA yi lag tu sbyin// yu ma dang gnyis med 'khril ba yi// chos nyid don dang gnyis med rtags// s+tha thAg 'khril pa'i phyin po 'di// dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin// gas
109a7(rnying rgyud): basbyor ba'i shes rab ma// dri med rnam dag lha mo zhing // mtshan ldan shin tu brgyan byis la// dbang thob de la sbyin par bya// dbang thob rgyal po chen po de// kun gyi bdag po yin pas na// rol ma dri dang zhal zas dang // 'dod yon lnga la sogs/
109b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // nya za yongs spyod rgyan rnams pan// thams cad thams cad snyan par bya// sgrub pa'i rgyal bad lan// sgrub pa'i las la dbang baban// dang sams dpa' lasags pa// rgyal ba rnams cad bslang pa dang // nga nga da par byas/
109b2(rnying rgyud): thub pa ma lus sgrubs shig ces// bsgrub rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dbyang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i phyir// rig 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang // rdo rje ming ni sbyin par bya// bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rjes mchog
109b3(rnying rgyud): gas ba'i bdag pa yin bstan// gas pa'i b+h+ri macag ston par bya// dga' babyung sa sbyin pa// rin rtsi par byed pas// dag da sa ga pa'i byung chu ba sams// dbang med la la gzhag/ dkyil med pa
109b4(rnying rgyud): nga sems chen po// shes rab chen po'i rtsal gyis ni// chos su smra ma ri dbang sbyar nas// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas// rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang // kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang // chos la sems kyi dbang thob na// nga/
109b5(rnying rgyud): ngag 'dzin thams cad dang // sa gsum dbang can thams cad dran// de la dbang thob bskur bar 'gyur// dbang gi myed ni 'di lta ste// dad ldan gri zhur ldan pa 'o// gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang can bskur// rnam pa kyi las ky-i
109b6(rnying rgyud): hA// lung rnams byed pa'i dbang thob bo// lta ba'i dmigs zlas chos mdza na// rgyal zeb 'jad pa'i dbang thob bo// rkyen zlab wad ma gar+b+ha mA ldanA na// bla ma rdo rje slob dpo na dbang // dam pa me gsam thams cad la// rdzogs
109b7(rnying rgyud): med par ni 'chad shes nas// rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang 'thob bo// dad med smon ni rdzob pa che// tshul 'chos mkhan pa ras gcod byed// de ni dbang gis 'tshog par bshad// gsang med brjed ngas dbang mi 'chags// dad med g.yel thugs
110a1(rnying rgyud): dbang mi 'gas// snod med bcud pal kun stongs pa// basmani dbang thob ma yin no// snod ldan bzang rdzogs dbyang ban// d+yabang mchog thob pa'i sgra zhes bshad// \u0f7fsa gsungs so// mA kyi tshul ba rgyan pa dang bkad pa
110a2(rnying rgyud): kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang / sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang bcas pa chos thams
110a3(rnying rgyud): cad kyi me long yin par rig nas/ 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ bstod pa shin tu dga' ba chen po'i grwa 'di gsungs so// oM me hoH/ nyes bcom legs ldan mtshan zhi mtha' las 'das// da pags
110a4(rnying rgyud): blams snyoms don gyis bdag gzhan dpal// don dam gsang lhas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khril// rdo rje che mchog dbang phyug kun gyi bdug/ 'dzin pa mi rtog sha rus khrag la rol// thugs kyi gdung zag 'khor ba'i mtha' la rnga// yul med ma smras mtshan
110a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i g.yul laswa rgyal// bde mchog rgyal po khyod la phrag 'tshal bstor// shes rab rjen po nam mkha'i nyi myar gsal// byang chub sems kyi 'od brir dbyings su 'char// dpa' brtul myur ba'i thugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol// rtog 'joms ye shes rdo rnga tshe 'phrul 'gro// dam pa
110a6(rnying rgyud): don gsungs bya sa me stod pa'i bu// smra ba'i seng ge khyod la phywa/ 'tshal lo// den rjen ga ter ldan 'dod dgu dkun snying zhig// lung da rigs pa gtan phyogs kun gyi mdzod// bai can yang dag men pa'i mi lo gas la// oMrje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal po'i rgyud//
110a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi mo nga 'dil 'di cig 'dzid// rlud kyi rgya mo chen po rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdolas dri'i tshur ba gad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa mo// / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus reg pa'i mang rdzogs /
110b1(rnying rgyud): #// rgya gar s+yAd dra/ sarba ta thA gra ta tsit+ta dz+nyA na buH Ar+tha gar+b+ha b+hU ha badz+ra taT+Ta/ sad+d+hi yog A ga ma sa s+thA dza sarba bid+d+ha sA dra ma hA yAn a b+his+thA mA ya d+har+m+ma par+yA ya bi d+hu ha nA ma s+t+ra traM/ bu zha'i skad du/ ho na pa nA ril ti la pi prA ba ta la te ta sed wAn rub hang /
110b2(rnying rgyud): par ril bu ba bi su bad ri zhe ha la pa'i ma kyang kwa'i dang rod te/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor grub pa'i lung kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
110b3(rnying rgyud): bla mos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po dang po ste byog mar drug pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gro ba byed thugs de'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol baTI la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad 'gro ba bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
110b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po ji skad du rnam par 'gro ba'i skyes bu smra ba'i seng ge de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa na 'khod cing sems can gyi ris za dad pa na bzhugs te bsam
110b5(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa bsam du med pa'i chos dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa'i 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/ thams cad rig pa gsang sngags kyi ngo bo ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa/ chos thams cad kyi me long de nyid mi 'gal bar nyan cing mnor
110b6(rnying rgyud): bar nyon te rnam par bgro ba ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i zhing khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis rnam par brgyan pa na/ rdo rje phung po'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zags yi'i 'khor
110b7(rnying rgyud): dang nga cas te/ sems bye dkyil 'khor 'od gsalang gsang sngags kyi ngo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyen cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/ yongs su 'das kyang de bzhin nyid du bskyed pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do// sangs rgyas rin chen
111a1(rnying rgyud): 'brang ba shing khams dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ngan pa za'i phung po rnam par bkod nga nu bin+d+ha n+ya 'od mtsho ba zhes bya 'a 'a bo la skyes bu chen po rdon rin chen zhes phra bar byang chub sems dpa' bre ba grags ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi
111a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/ yongs su 'das nas kyang ji bzhin par bskyed pa'i sgo nas de rnam par 'gro bar byed do// sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams pad+ma can zhes bya
111a3(rnying rgyud): ba pad+mo mdzes par bkod pa na/ pad+ma'i phung po'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po chos kyi sprin zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye
111a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la de bzhin skyon te/ yongs su 'das nas kyang de lta bar bsnyad pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do// sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba in dra nI la'i dra bas brkun pa na rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i spo zhes bya ba'i
111a5(rnying rgyud): ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje las zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' phyi phrogs ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/ yongs su 'das nas
111a6(rnying rgyud): kyang ma nor par brtags pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing khams byang chub kyi snying po can zhes bya ba sems sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa na chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya bar
111a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrags pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi rong bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid ring gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/ yongs su 'das nas kyang de kho na nyid du nges pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bzo bar
111b1(rnying rgyud): byed do// sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang po'i zhing khams mos pa can mi mjed kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu zhes bya ba rdo rje gdan gyis rnam par brtan pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na skyes bu chen po gsang pa pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar byang
111b2(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya gnod sbyin gyi rigs can mang po'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gseng sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston to// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bsam gyis
111b3(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa'i zhing khams dpag tu med pa na grangs med pa'i skyes bu chen po zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrags ya brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo mtha' yas de nyid rang
111b4(rnying rgyud): na cing 'i / sa su ga rnam pa shA nga byu sa chub tha ma
111b5(rnying rgyud): bya bar/ rgyal tshab skyes bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas par gyur pa gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid la dgongs pa nges par 'grel to// de bzhin du sems can skyes bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
111b6(rnying rgyud): lho'i ris dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / klu'i ris dang / mi'i ris dang / gnod sbyin gyi ris dang / srin po'i ris dang / byol song gi ris dang / yi dgas kyi ris dang / dmyal bde ris la sogs pa 'jig rten dag gi phyogs bcu bu dad pa nA dad
111b7(rnying rgyud): dpon tha dad pa'i skyes bur gzugs tha dad par rnam par snang ba dag rang rang gi lus kyi 'khor tha dad pa dang bcas te/ sems kyi me long 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang rang gi thub pa'i dbang po la rang rang gi skad dang brda dang mos pa sna tshogs kyis
112a1(rnying rgyud): nyan rdzing ming dang mtshan mar brtags pa'i sgo nas rang rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston to// de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang la la ni byang chub kyi rigs can dag go// la la ni byang chub pa dag go// la la ni byang chub sems dpa' dag
112a2(rnying rgyud): po// la la ni byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po dag go// la lA ni byang chub chen po dag go// de bzhin du gzhi lnga las btags pa tha dad du grags pa ni 'di lta ste/ rjes su yi rang bdag dang / me skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dag dang /
112a3(rnying rgyud): chos pa chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa dang / gyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa dag dang / 'dun pas phyogs pa dag dang / dad pas mos pa dag dang / yongs su bsti gnas pa dag dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag de
112a4(rnying rgyud): srid pa tha ma pa dag dang / lam du 'jug pa dag dang / 'gro ba dag dang / phyin pa dag dang / phyir 'ong ba dag dang / gnas pa dag dang / smon pa pa dang / ldang ba pa dang / 'jug pa pa dang / gnas pa pa dang / rdzogs pa pa dang / rtsol ba pa dang / slob
112a5(rnying rgyud): pa pa dang / mi slob pa pa dang / goms pa pa dang / mngon du gyur pa pa dang / rgyung du byung ba ba dang / rigs su nges pa dang / chos su shes pa dang / chos lugs pa dang / rgyal tshab pa dang / rigs thams cad pa dang / gzungs sngags pa dang / rig
112a6(rnying rgyud): sngags pa dang / gsang sngags bya dang / rigs gsum pa bzhi pa lnga pa dang / tshigs pa pa dang / sbyor ba pa dang / mthod pa pa dang / sgom pa pa dang / mthar phyin pa pa dang / 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang / rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
112a7(rnying rgyud): dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang / lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang / rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang / tshig gi tshogs pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs pa dang / ming gi tshogs pa dang / brda'i tshogs pa dang / tha snyad kyi tshogs pa la sogs
112b1(rnying rgyud): pa sha dag go// de dag las gzhi gsum pa ni gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug go// spyod pa dang gnas pa dang / thob pa dang / phyir lta ba dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de kun du sgra la gnas pa dang / sa la gnas pa dang / tshe la gnas pa dang / phyag
112b2(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / lhun gyis grub par gyur pa 'ba' zhig go// de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'dzam pa'i gling tha dad pabye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu dang bcas pa mtha' yas par 'jig rjen gyi sgron ma bye ba
112b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa re shar ba de dag kyang 'khor bzog ma tha ma med pa nas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i khams su bskal pa thog ma tha ma med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i skabs la rtag par rgyun gyi khor mor 'byung zhing sgron ma'i bya bas lha mi'i 'jig rten gyi mun pa byas pa
112b4(rnying rgyud): nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas te/ nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor nub pa ltar yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su grags shing rnam par snang ngo // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thun mong
112b5(rnying rgyud): bca' gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas ji ltar de ltar 'di sbyar mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdo rje thub pa'i dbang po de skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa la byung ste/ yun ha cang mi ring ba zhig bzhugs te yongs su
112b6(rnying rgyud): mya ngan las 'das par dgongs nas yul yangs pa can zhes bya bar 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs par dbyar gyi ngo bo gsum 'das nas 'jig rten gyi slob ma la gdums ngag gsum gzhag pa'i slad du 'khor 'das pa rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul
112b7(rnying rgyud): tshorang spyod la bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul can khyed de la 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btun nga'i slob ma gang dag 'khod pa 'di bar phyogs pa dag gang ji snyed pa rnams sdus shig/ nges par gzhag par bya ba dag yod do zhes gsungs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
113a1(rnying rgyud): can ngas chos kyi skang cig gis go bar brtags nas thams cad bzlas pa ni 'dos s+ho/ rgyal ba'i tha~M 'gyur ros drug gang sru ga/ 'di byung ngos shing phyogs pa gan nyon cig/ da 'dir rgyal ba brgyad rdzo gsum 'dog gis// dun
113a2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'joms par 'dod pa kun 'dus shig/ de skad ces bsgrags pas dam pa'i rigs can lha maM gtogs 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi bsam gtan chen po'i nang du yang dgu 'jog pa bskul ba chen po lang kwa'i mnga' bdag blo gros thabs ldan la sogs
113a3(rnying rgyud): las gzhan thams cad 'dus par gyur to// de nas 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// 'byor pa thams cad ni mthar rgud pa'o// dngos po thams cad ni nges par 'jig pa'o//
113a4(rnying rgyud): glang zag gi srog gi dbang po la ste shri yod pa'i phyir du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas su dag the tshom mchod pa rnams dri ba gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po kun dza ra zhes bya ba de rang
113a5(rnying rgyud): gri stan las langs te/ seng ge'i lha stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas 'dri skad ces gsom s+ho// khyod ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// 'dra' dang mi 'da'i yong mi mnga'// 'jig rten pa la mthun 'jug tu// 'da' bras yongs su 'dul bar
113a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs// khyod ni 'jig rten sgron mar shar+ya// l-I m+b+hi'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi// mun pa'i dkyil 'khor kun bsal nas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsul mdzad de// sa dang rnam thar la spyad pas// byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yi// 'dren
113a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i theg pa rnam gsum la// gang dag rim par bkod lags na// mnyam pas blang dor med spyod cing // byang chub gzhan nas mi 'tshal ba'o// thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i// nges pa'i theg chen yong ma gsungs// rgyal ba'i dgong
113b1(rnying rgyud): pa chog gsum po// gdams ngag lung dum bzhug na// bro chung mun pas rmongs pa rnams// nges pa'i blo gros gang la gzhag/ rnam par thar pa'i theg pa gsum// gang bsdu gang la gang gis bsdu// 'jig rten gsal ba'i nyi nub na// sgron ma gang
113b2(rnying rgyud): gis mdzad par 'gyur// bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sde pa// rgol ba gang gis tshar gcod 'gyur// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa chen po legs so// khyod kyis dri ba lnga dris pa ni shin tu legs
113b3(rnying rgyud): so// 'di lta ste/ de kho na nyid du nges pa'i theg pa chen po ste/ gnas skabs gnyis dang bcur 'byung ba ste/ gang rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba na ying 'byung / gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongs su bkod pa na yang 'byung / gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'gyur
113b4(rnying rgyud): gyu/ das sa / ga pa snyed na byung/ rkyen gyi la wA/ na ba ga nga
113b5(rnying rgyud): na yang 'byung / lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang 'byung / las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang 'byung / dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang 'byung / de dag ni thams cad kyi thams cad nas thams cad du kun du yongs su rnam par snang ngo // sdang bar gyur to//
113b6(rnying rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bku' stsal pas dri ba dang po'i yongs su rtog pa chad do// de nas yang ston pas dri ba gnyis pa bka' stsal pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa chenu po blo dang ldan par bya'o// gros kyis chod par bya'o// thabs kyis zin par bya'o// bsam pa dag par bya'o//
113b7(rnying rgyud): brjod pa dang por bya'o// spyod pa legs par bya'o// don btsal bar bya'o// dgos ched baM rtag par bya'o// nges pa rnyed par bya'o// bden par smra bar bya'o// tshig mi 'gyur bar bya'o// ji skad smras pa bzhin du bya'o// sgo gsum la mkhas par bya'o// sngags
114a1(rnying rgyud): a// gsum la bslab par bya'o// grong por gsum pa shog par bya'o zhes pakla stsas pas/ dro ba gnyis pa sangs su zla dang // da nas yang ston pasung byag rtsub pag/ ba/ reg pa 'dzin du / na rnam ga nan/
114a2(rnying rgyud): pa// snod gsum dag tu snang ba ste// lci gnas lhag mthod las mtha' gsam// dang por shes pa'i rgyud gsum pa// de nas ye gri'i tshogs nyid pa'o// che chung rim pa'i skyo bong phyir// theg pa'i ris pade bzhin te// bsdu pa 'ang che chung gnyis kyis so// rnam
114a3(rnying rgyud): ma sa
114a4(rnying rgyud): mu gnyis/ gcig gis yongs sa rjod par byas// chos kyi spyan du byas pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig/ sgron ma byed pa'i bya ba yang // sngon du byung ba'i lung bsanA pa'i// 'gro ba'i lus kyi sems dpa' ga// byung nas gus pa byed lo gsun 'byen/
114a5(rnying rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal byas dri ba bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i yongs su rtog pa chad de yongasu su mya ngan lus 'das par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgengs pa 'dris pa'i mdo rnga na po las gdams ngag dri ska bar gzhug pa'i laT swA gas pa'o// // de'i tsha
114a6(rnying rgyud): dus na glang dag mi chen po rnams ni phongs su gdung ba med par rlung du yang dag 'jog go// byis pa rnams ni yongs su gdung bar gyur te blo le lnga bor gyur cing shin tu spyong nas rtag par rab tu ngu'o// 'jig rten pa la s+ya nI shrI la thug par gyur/ lcu
114a7(rnying rgyud): brgyal cing 'phog par gyur/ la la ni khams nas robs pa bzhin du gyur to// de bzhin du thams cad gtso mang po la sha~M ba bzhin du gyi hud kyi nyung gis gdung ba'i sna sgrogs so// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang sdod ni ping du mi 'ong bar gyur to// btsu
114b1(rnying rgyud): kyang sems kyi dkyil 'khor mog mog por gyur to// chos 'di par phyogs pa rnams ni mdangs nag por gyur to// bdud kyi cha 'dzin cing gzhan gyi sde pa rnams ni bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dkar por gyur te kun kyang kyal ka'i tshig spogs par gyur to// de
114b2(rnying rgyud): nas lo brgyad dang bcu gnyis 'das pa na dam pa'i rigs can sems dpa' chen po dag nang du yang dag 'jog las langs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi ston pa nub par gyur pas rmag chad par dus nas kun kyang rang rang gi mngon par shes byas lad ka'i yul gyi
114b3(rnying rgyud): grong rdal gyi mtsho gling ri ma la ya ga nam lcags yod pa'i rtse la rdzu 'phrul gyi bya bas mngon par rab tu 'dus so// yongs su 'dus nas 'dus pa de kun kyang mgrin gcig tu shin tu nyam thag pa'i nga ros smre sngags kyi gdung ba bton pa ni 'di lta ste/ e
114b4(rnying rgyud): ma'o kyi hud e ma'o blong // ston pa'i sgron ma'i 'od nub na// 'jig rten mun pa gang gis sel// tshad ma'i zhal de mi bzhugs pas// tshad mas gsungs pa'i bstan pa la// 'jug par 'tshal ba'i 'gro ba rnams// log par 'jug par mi 'gyur
114b5(rnying rgyud): ram// tshad mar dam bcas gang zag gis// ngesnga ma rnyed pa'i gang zag la// phan par bya phyir bka' bkrol bas// gtan la phebs par 'gyur zhig gu// legs nyes 'byed pa'i spyan zum pas// bka' nyid khyad du gsod pa yi// skyon gyi spyi
114b6(rnying rgyud): gtsug mthar phyin pas// log stobs 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram// log pa'i bstan pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas// bden pa gnyis kyi nyi zla nub// 'gro ba gang zhig lam tshol ba// mun par 'khyams par mi 'gyur ram// ston pa mya ngan 'das
114b7(rnying rgyud): 'og tu// bdud dang srin po mu stegs dang // gnod sbyin 'byung po mi ma yin// ma rungs gdug pa sus 'dul 'gyur// dri med bstan pa'i bdud rtsi 'di// nub na shin tu ma rung na// rtsal dang ldan pa su zhig gis// 'bar zhing snang bar byed par 'gyur//
115a1(rnying rgyud): bslab pa dam pa'i rin po che// bral na shin tu mdzang na// skyes bu dam pa gang zhig gis// tshul rnams 'dzin par byed par 'gyur// ston pa mi bzhugs de rjes na// ston pa'i skyob ma ji snyed pa// 'phags dang gang zug tha dad pa/
115a2(rnying rgyud): lung bstan 'byung ba gang sa zhing // bstan pa nam mkha' 'dzab la// mos pa tha dad sar bzung nas// yin+da dang ma yin cha 'dzin cing // rtsod pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram// de nyid nges par rigs gtsig pa// rigs mi mthun par tha dang spyod// rigs
115a3(rnying rgyud): gcig tha dad rigs rnams su// bskrad cing bcos par mi 'gyur ram// rin thar med pa'i rin po che// mi mkhas gang zag tha dad pas// nyon mongs 'dod pas khrid dbang gis// dug drang brje bar mi 'gyur ram// chos kyi rgyal po ston pa ste// 'di sngon
115a4(rnying rgyud): phun chad zhal bzhugs tshe// ma rungs pa rnams 'tshe bgyid na// gdug pa dar bar mi 'gyur ram// gang 'dir bstan pa gnas pa'i yun// ji srid gcig tu gnas par 'gyur// gang 'dir sngar 'byung gang sngar 'byung // phyis 'byung dus 'di ji ltar 'gyur//
115a5(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i bstan pa thu ma'i tshe// nges par ji ltar 'gyur zhig sa// bsgrub du 'dzin pa'i slob mi rnams// tha ma ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu// 'di nas mya ngan 'das 'og tu// gang ltar su yi ston par gre shegs// zhing khrims phyogs ni gdon bzhugs// don
115a6(rnying rgyud): bister pa ci zhig sgrogs// nga yod 'jig rten mgon med rnams// mgon dang skyabs su gang zhig 'gyur// 'phrul gyi blo dang gros sbyor na// blo dadu glos ni gang nas btsal// nges pa'i don 'di ma rnyed na// nga yod des don gang las gzung // mchod
115a7(rnying rgyud): gnas yid rten mo bzhugs na// sku gdung ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu// smad kyis mchod gnas ci la bgyi// da ltar ston pa 'dis 'og tu// gdung 'tsho ba skyes bu 'byung 'gyur ram// e ma'o kyi hud oM ma'o blong zhes yongs su gdung ba bton to// sangs
115b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'das pa'i mdo chen po las thog mar dam pas gdung ba bton pa'i le'u ste gsam ba'o// / de skad smras te gdungs pa las// sred ga ma 'gro bde N+DinA ga cig pa// nal brgya mad+mo rnams kyis gastan// snying rjer
115b2(rnying rgyud): bdag po de dag kun// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// gsang ba'i bdag po gnas su 'dus// bsgral ba chen po 'di skad gsungs// gas ba pra yi bdag po khyod// sngon gyi go cha yal lam chi// 'jig rten sdug bsngal mi shes sam// snying rje'i sa la ba
115b3(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // 'jig rten gdung ba bsal ba'i rigs// so so'i rigs kyi cha bzung bas// ma rungs po dag kun btul te// 'dod khrid thabs su tshig rnams kyis// las kyi tshe dang spyod mthun par// 'du shes btung ba byas nas ni// bka' yi bgro ba bshA
115b4(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas// yang dag don la dgod pa'i rigs// de skad rnam par bskul ba las// dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gdul dka' 'dul la mkhas pa'o// 'jig rten kun la rgyal ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i rtags 'dzin rdo rje can// dgyes shing /
115b5(rnying rgyud): gdan las bzhengs nas ni// cho 'phrul chen po kun bstan nas// 'jig rten log pa'i gtso bo rnams// sgal dang ldan par lung bsten pa// las dang skal bar rab ldan zhing // rgyal bas 'byung bar lung bstan pa'i// bsod nams chen po'i
115b6(rnying rgyud): skal can rnams// sprul pas ji ltar lung bstan bzhi ni// da ltar dus la 'dir babyas kyis// 'khor ba'i snying por lung bstan phyir// cho 'phrul rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig/ ji ltar bshad cing lung bstan
115b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// skal ldan can la bgro bar bya'o// drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri// dgon pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni// ye shes snying po can rnams kyi// theg chen gsang ba 'byung ba'i gnas// thog ma tha ma'i dus med par// dam pa rnams
116a1(rnying rgyud): gyis bsngags pa yin// thog ma tham med pA ye// rgyal ba dpag tu med bya yis// dam pa'i dgon glanas chen po dang // sems gli kyil 'khor ma long bzhin// bskrun pa dwe lta du badrug gyis kyang // thogs pam da/
116a2(rnying rgyud): brla// bskal ba'i dus ni ga byung bar// bdag kyang de bzhin mo grul snang // zhes bgros so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po lus gang gyi gdung ba se bar bzlos pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas du
116a3(rnying rgyud): nga gang na// m-i nga ga pa / zla bral pa zhes bya // gdod 'dra ba' ma / na gas zla ga sa/
116a4(rnying rgyud): rje sA la mngon ste gi shegs// sa rnams ngas su gsos 'gyur te/ maung thung sa grIs// thams bde ba spyong // dzo du ba sal rgyan// dman pa'i lus dzin dras pa'i rigs// me las rgyal rags
116a5(rnying rgyud): drim che// rgyal rje la byan skye shA // de rmongs pa'i rag tu can rnams// gang ba dang nas kyi tsho d+hIs/ sa rji d+hIH/ oM m+me de ma myur med ded+he// skyes bu chen po ljod su zhig// gang nas byon te gad ltar byung /
116a6(rnying rgyud): gleng la brten nas gong du b+h+yon// don gyi ched ka tsaM zhes hrIs// cho rgyal chen pos 'di dang // da ni cis kyang mi bskyod de// myi dkrug rdo rje sems dpa' yin// snying rjes gapo zhing bstod pas ni// sbrid pa gsum gyi gnyen gcig blo// skyong pa
116a7(rnying rgyud): chen pongs sus// rdo rje rigs chen ngape gdung // pha ni babapa mchog dpag tu med// mini shes ba brjod las 'a // thog ma med pe 'dus kyi che// ngam song bzhin nor buskor// nor blo rin chen bcung rtsod// bde par ma shes spyir ba
116b1(rnying rgyud): tshor// de tshe kun nas dbul ba dang // thar med nad kyis gzir 'gyur zhing // mun pa mun nag skrag tu 'khyams// bgrod par bya ba'i lam yang stor// gdungs par gyur kyang der ma shes// de tshe nga yi bshes gnyen mchog/ byams mgon dam pa
116b2(rnying rgyud): zhig zhes brtan// e ma'o khyod ci mi shes sam// mthong yun kun du bde ba yi// don srid chen po 'byung 'gyur ba// nor bu rin chen ma brlag gam// 'on te yod par mi shes sam// 'di ci chad par 'dug gam ci// de skad bshes gnyen mchog
116b3(rnying rgyud): des sman// de tshe nga yis slar sbran pa// don srid chen po 'byung ba de// yod par ma shes stong par tshor// 'di dang phrad par bya yi thabs// bshes gnyen khyod kyis lung ston cig/ dam pa de yis dmigs bstan pa// de dang myur du phrad 'dod na// btsang
116b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs la brtson bya dgos// sa mkhan dam pas dmigs mtshon te// mun snad khams dang sa khams dang // sna tshogs lam rnams bgrod byas nas// btsal kyang gzhan nas mi rnyed de// rang gis khams nyid nas 'byung // de ni rin chen sngar rnyed
116b5(rnying rgyud): pang+ge// dum ngams kyi kyim sun// de ni byed bla pa y-i/ pa sa kyi stong gnas yin// de// degs ni pa den ngas// gang pa pa'i rjed rtsi nga // dam pa la la mi sa te// ts+tshasangs pasangs pa s+ya/ 9
116b6(rnying rgyud): shes de zhon te// mun snang gnyis kyi khams nas 'ongs// gcan 'phrad chu bo bzhi rga la te// sna tshogs lam bgrod kun btsal nas// dam pa rnams kyi lum du zhugs// sa dang rnam thar lam bgrod de// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer bsnyags//
116b7(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin chen rtsad bcad ni// ma byung ma rnyed rang nyid kyi// chos nyid dbyings kyi khyim nas rnyed// rnyed pa nyid na rnyed med de// stong pa nyid rda'ang stor bral med// yod min med min stor rnyed med// gzhan nas ma byung rang 'thung bar// shes la rnyed
117a1(rnying rgyud): btags ma shes la// stor zhes tha snyad btags par zad// yod dang stor dang rnyed pa'i dus// thog ma med pa'i dus nas so// de ltar chos nyid med pa las// sprul pa snang ba'i dus 'dir ni// mun snang gnyis kyi khams 'dir 'ongs/
117a2(rnying rgyud): nga ni thabs kyi mnyan pa mkhan// 'khor ba'i chu bo mtha' med las// srid gsum bsgral bar dam bcas kyis// thar par 'dod pa lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi mig mkhan ti// 'jig rteni long ba dpag med rnams// lir thog bsal bar dam
117a3(rnying rgyud): bcas kyis// gang zhig mthong 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi sman pa ste// grong khyer gsum gyi nad pa rnams// gcod rnying spyad par dam bcas kyis// gang zhig bde 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi sa mkhan te// 'gro ba lam log
117a4(rnying rgyud): lam stor rnams// ma nor khrid par dam bcas kyis// yang dag lam 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thugs rje spyan ras mkhan// 'khor ba'i dgra dpung 'jigs pa las// thams cad bskyab par dam bcas kyis// 'jigs dang bral 'dod lam 'dir
117a5(rnying rgyud): shog/ nga ni rdo rje rdong chen te// 'khor ba'i g.yul chen dmag dpung las// 'gro ba'i 'khras sar dam bcas kyis// gang zhig mkhar 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni thabs kyi tshong dpon te// 'dod pa rgya mtshos mi ngoms rnams// gter chen sbyin
117a6(rnying rgyud): par dam bcas kyis// gang zhig gter 'dod lam 'dir shog/ da ni thabs kyi sgron ma ste// mun nag smag tu 'khyams pa rnams// mun nag bsngal bar dam bcas kyis// gang zhig snang 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni yid bzhin nor bu ste//
117a7(rnying rgyud): yang dag yid bzhin 'dod pa rnams// yid bzhin bskang bar dam bcas kyis// lhun gyis grub 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni bka' yi lde mig ste// bka' sgom tha ram gsang ba rnams// rnam par 'byed par dam bcas kyis// gang zhig grol
117b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod lam 'dir shog/ nga ni bka' yi 'grel pa skye// gsung gi glegs pa ma zab mo rnams// nges par dgrol bar dam bcas kyis// gang dag shes 'dod lam 'dir shog/ rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol 'dir// skal ldan gang zhig su bzhugs pa/
117b2(rnying rgyud): nori bu rin chen 'od 'bar ba// nges par 'thar gyis brtson par zlog// de nyid sems kyi ma 'o ste// mngon sum gsal bar rtogs ma thag/ 'gro ba'i sus la sangs rgyas yin// rdo rjegs chen gsang ba la// des dron dam pa'i mdzod mchog rna
117b3(rnying rgyud): 'dir bgros gsal bar bshang sbar bas// lha dang mi yi rig 'dzin las// rim par brgyud de grags par 'gyur// lha mi 'jig rten thams cad kye// mun pa'i gdung ba kun bsal nas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// ci n+yaH/
117b4(rnying rgyud): mun pa'i gdung bar zhugs// thub pa mya ngan 'das gdung ba// de ni nam mkha'i sku mnga' ba// 'da' dang mi 'da' mi mnga' ste// 'pho 'gyur med pas nam mkha' bzhin// de skad sprul pa'i sgra 'byung bas// sngon du byung ba'i rigs can rnams//
117b5(rnying rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba cher skyes te// dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa bris// lus ba tudra shin tu gus sbyar+ya nas// stan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// mtshan mo'i mun nag smin dum nis// glog 'gyur bar snang ston lta bur// thog ma tha ma med pa
117b6(rnying rgyud): ye/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// rnam drag lam chen de nyid du// byung ba'i skyes bu rdo n+do graba~M khyod// dam pa rnams kyi gsang 'dzin rlung // gsang ba pa yi bdag por grags// bka' rnams 'gro bar khyod bsngags pas// khyod ni bka'
117b7(rnying rgyud): 'brel chen por grags// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la// mdzod gsum gsong ba'i nyi shor ngo// shes bya'i mun pa sun bsal phyir// khyod ni gsal ba'i nyi mar grags// gdul dka' ma lus kun 'dul zhing // bdud kyi brdud
118a1(rnying rgyud): bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'joms byed pas// khyod ni bdud kyi bdud du grags// de bzhin nyid gi ngo bo nyid// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// chos kun gzugs brnyan snang bas na// chos kyi ma long zhes
118a2(rnying rgyud): kyang grags// drag 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyis// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pas// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po grags// dga' mgu rangs par mdzad pas na// khyod ni gdung 'i spel bar grags// 'dod pa yid
118a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin skong bas na// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bur grags// dam pa rnams dang mthun mdzod la// bdag cag reg pa 'dzin rnams la// dam pa'i sprul pa gang ltar nub// dam pa'i sgron ma ji ltar bkod// dam pa'i gsang lung ji ltar 'byung //
118a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rgyud kyi bzo ba mdzod// dgongs pa'i cho ga gsum bgro ba mdzod// nam mkha' rdo rje bgro ba mdzod// ces gsol ba btab bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las lung dam pa bsgo bar gsol ba btab pa'i le'u ste/
118a5(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// // de skad ces gsol ba btab pa las// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// sngon du byung bar lung bstan pa'i// 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams// gdung sngags dri ba dang bcas pa'i// sgyu ma'i rtog pa dgrol gyis
118a6(rnying rgyud): nyon// sems kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid// nam mkha' bzhin du chub pa med// rang bzhin ye nas 'di gsal bas// de la gang sle ba de nyid stsol// tshang mya gnyis kyis gang gzhal ba// shes bya de yang tshad mar byung // leg d+ha tes
118a7(rnying rgyud): ba'ang de nyid pas// de nyid de la 'gyur ba med// sems kyi rang bzhin medags sa pas// dkar bas dkar bdeni bla med// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'// chos kyang rngub par mi 'gyur te// phe la can la phan gdags phyir// sprus pa rnams ni 'a
118b1(rnying rgyud): ldan// ji ltar nam mkha' zhig 'gyur na// de tshe mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// gang dag gdug pa ma rungs pa// bdag med sbyong ba'i stobs kyis 'dus// rang bzhin thod gsal smos bral ba'i// bstan pa rgya mtsho'ang de nyid pas// rang
118b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung se ge rtsal can gyis// kun du 'ab zhing sbeng bar byed// bslab balhag pa'i sems ci bas// bsgrub pa kun gyi mchog 'di ni// sa rab snang ba skyes 'byung ba'o// 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' 'dzin// mtha' blag med pa
118b3(rnying rgyud): ldan rnams// byang chub snying por yaM gnas blas// de bzhin nyid du rgyud des hU~M // kun kyang mi sro ba de lung ston// sems nyid yod dang med do zhes// byis pa rnams ni rtsod par byed// mkhas pa yi nas spyod dang bral// yod meng rtog pa'i chag
118b4(rnying rgyud): po brjod// da mi gas gas gsang ba // sa cas sran gyi gas yin gyi // klu mi ga/ bag na phyugs das// gsang bar sgra gcig sa dang 'brung // des pa rnams kyi gas lung 'di// gang dag mi shes ngas 'gyur ba/
118b5(rnying rgyud): drag deng bdud rtsir rdebs ni// srang byed gnyis ka sreg par 'gyur// kun gsal me long 'ad rtse// ma 'dres meng sa rdzogs ston pa de// mkha' sbyar 'gro 'gyur med pas na// 'tshe babyang zlog 'gyu sprin bzhin med// byang chub snying po yang
118b6(rnying rgyud): bar// de srid bstan pa gnas pa yin// thog ma tha ma med pa nas// byung bas sA m+b+hi yod ma yin// dang po med las byung brjod pas// bla ma'ang brjod bral med par 'gyur// gdung 'dzin thog ma'ang de bzhin nyid// tha ma 'dri de las gzhan mi
118b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'di nas de bzhin nyid 'dir gshegs// ba ga khyab chen po'i gang na brdzogs// sems kyi dkyil lakhang 'jigs me pa// de bzhin nyid du rnam par snang // byis pa'i bad du mo 'phrul zhig/ me tog bzhed pa'i 'digazhan na// ma ga
119a1(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya bar snang // snang ba'ang byed na sad pa med// de bzhin zhing khams gang dag \u0f7f// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas snang mang dab// ska ma'i dmyal pa de bzhinan// mi snang 'od kyang gzhan sgru// me baspyod rdo thugs margyag sad/
119a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten khams ni dpag tu med// mun snang rang 'byung rang bzhin yin// skye med ye shes nyid kyi dbyings// gdong nas bder gshegs snying po las// rnam rtog glo bur las kyis bsgribs// de nyid 'gro
119a3(rnying rgyud): mgon skyabs chen yin// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po// 'phrul gyi blo dang gros mchog ste// yun gyi don srid chen po las// blo gros dam pa'i yul du snang // rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'jug pa// ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// nyid du nges pa'i ngo
119a4(rnying rgyud): lnga// blo bzhag de nyid nges pa yin// chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// ye shes spu can rgyal ba rnams// sgra la dngos can dngos med pad+ma// sku gdung ring bsrel ji ltar 'byung // sems can rnams la phan don du// med pa nyid las sprul pa
