153a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// mu~M brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// l-I ste dgrag med pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// mA~M mi zad pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// b+h+rUM skyon med pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o/
153a7(rnying rgyud): tAM thogs pa med pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hrIHgsung 'dzin pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// d+h+r-i go 'byed pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// k+Sha mthong ba'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// dz+r-IM 'joms pa'i chos nyid rnam par sna
153b1(rnying rgyud): pa sgyur// dzA rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi chos te rnam pAr snang drung nar// rnaTIr yang 'azung ba chos ti rnam par snang ba'i // sgra sgrogs par chos tid rnam par snang bangand// u byed yang ma nges par mas rnam par snang bang lta
153b2(rnying rgyud): byams pa chen po'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hUM dwaga'i bachen po'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo// m+me betang snyoms chen po'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// drA ting nge 'dzin gyi
153b3(rnying rgyud): gyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// pu dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul gyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// baM byin gyi brlabs kyi cho 'phrul gyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hoHmchod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// ya stong pa nyid
153b4(rnying rgyud): kyi rnam par zir pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// zla mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par zer ba'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hrIHsmyon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hUM thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par
153b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang 'di sgo'o// dzaHdon 'dren pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hU~M don brjod pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// 'dzin rnyed pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'i// hU~Md+hadaM ni mthun pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba
153b6(rnying rgyud): gyi byang chub kyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// hUM stobs kyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo// waM dbang po'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i/ 'o// blo rdzu 'phrul po chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// k+Sha sring ba'i mtshan+da nyid rnam par d+hA
153b7(rnying rgyud): sgo'o// ye dran pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang bar sgo'o// blo sbyong ba'i chos nyid rnam par sdung drin spro'o// e sgo dro chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo// bzhi pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i spro// mi mtha' rgyas pa'i chos nyid dam par
154a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba ra// ba dun nanas spyod mya snang dang da// shAts+tshan dang bla na mas nyid dmya pa du snang ba na// d+ha rgyas 'byung ba'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i ltung // madran pa rdzob nyid rnam par ba
154a2(rnying rgyud): ba nga byo nyid rnam par snang sto// bsgoba'i ma nyid rnam par dutu// rtsen pargyang rlung pa'i chos nyid rnam bya snang 'dzin ga/ shes pa'i tshe nyid dmu bye snang bar gyur/ ti chom nyid rnami par dang na
154a3(rnying rgyud): bras bu'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i na'o// dzaM rkyen gyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i spyod// sgra phung po'i chol nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// klu las kyi chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// de nag po'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sbyo'o// rnga dkur
154a4(rnying rgyud): ngo chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// oM rang grub pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o/ hU~M rtsa ba'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// mAM ji bzhin pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yi ge'i cho 'phrul pas chos
154a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lang ka'i bdag po phyi ga'i skyo nas chos rnams cad rnam mkhang dang 'dra bar khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzungs dang / sgra dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / gsal bzo pang
154a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du TI ga rgyas thams cang / yang byed par 'gyur ro// de ni yang mtshan par byed // rang bdud yang gas myed byed do// lung ka'i bdag pa de dag ni ga tso zus ste sgo nas chos nyid du rnam par snang ba // lang 'byeng dug
154a7(rnying rgyud): gang ma bcos par chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos can mtshan mar snang ba'i rang bzhin rnams// chos nyid mtshan ma med pa'i ngang du snang // sems can dngos por snang ba'i rang bzhin rnams// sems nyid dngos po med
154b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngang du snang // ji snyed rnam par snang ba de rang bzhin rnams// ji bzhin de bzhin nyid kyi dang du snang // nyon mongs dukra wAr spyad 'di dang bzhin rnams// rnam thob pa shes lnga pheM dang du snang // dug gsum rtsa bar snang ba'i rang bzhin
154b2(rnying rgyud): rnams// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du snang // gzung 'dzin rtog par snang ba'i rang bzhin rnams// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med dang du snang // bya dang byed par snang ba'i rang bzhin rnams// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ngang du snang//
154b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig tshogs phung por snang ba'i rang bzhin rnams// rnam grol zag med phung po'i ngang du snang // kun nas nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rnams// rnam byang mya ngan 'das pa'i ngang du snang // 'jig rten g.yo rdul mi g.yo'i rang bzhin rnams//
154b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba bzhi bcu gnyis kyi rang du snang // mya dran 'das dang 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rnams// btsal med ma bcos de nyid dang du snang // zhes yongs su grag cing grags par 'gyur ro// lang ka'i bdag po de ni chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul te// de dag
154b5(rnying rgyud): kyang so sor ma 'dres par gcig tu yongs su 'grel to// spangs rgyasa? kun+da gyi dgongs pa 'dus bya'i mdo chen po las rdos snang ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // lang ka'i bdagra po kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ 'di
154b6(rnying rgyud): lta ste/ chos kun ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa// nges pa ji ltar yin po'i don// phyin tso ma log nyid brjod pa// de nyid rnam dag la me chen yin// sgra dang gasbyong thug snga ra de bzhin yang // ga na med de de khro na// dpag med rgyal ba mtha' yas
154b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan no med de de nyid yin// gti mug ma 'dres kun nas rmong pa// rong du rdzogs pa'i stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres po de rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// zhe sdang ma dris mnar sems pa// yongs su rdzogs ngas sto
155a1(rnying rgyud): ba med// tad ma sa pa zugs/ man tu tu// / na na ma rna san nang na tud nan
155a2(rnying rgyud): gas ma 'dres kun du zhen// yongasu su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyi dam 'dres yongs rtogs na// mA brjo de bzhin nyid kho na// phrag phyog ma rjes kwin nus 'khrugs// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres ma
155a3(rnying rgyud): gas na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// gzugs ni ma 'dres 'jigs pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// tshor ba ma 'dres myong ba nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas
155a4(rnying rgyud): da bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// 'du shes ma 'dres 'dzin pa nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// 'du byed ma 'dres
155a5(rnying rgyud): mngon du byed// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma badres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// rnam rig ma 'dres tha dad shes// yonga'asu rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// mo bcos
155a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kho na// sdug bsngal ma 'dis kun gdung ba// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid du ma 'dres yong pa rdzogs na// mu bcos de bzhin nyid khyon// khams ni ma 'dres sa bon nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de
155a7(rnying rgyud): nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcas de bzhin nyid khon// skye mched ma 'dres spyi ba'i blo// yongs su rdzogs pas sbyong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dren/ yong 'ardzogs na// sgra bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// rtswa rkyen ma 'dres 'du 'phro nyid// yongs su

155b2(rnying rgyud): pas / mam sa / ga ga
156a1(rnying rgyud): dus spyon thug// sangs pardzogasangs spyong bdas da// rgyud pa gyus// pa byu nan pas// dang pa // bang rnags pa bang bdag kyang// had du 'das na/

156a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i stong ba dag med// dang ma rdzu su mardzogs na/ mi bzhi cho// byas nyid 'dal pa 'dug mas rdzogs pa spyod tang ba phred/ danyi ma du cigs ni// mabartso do nyi / ma thong
156b1(rnying rgyud): rten gyi rgyad// yangs sa rdzogs pas snang bdag med// de nyid ma 'dras snang sadzag spya// ma bcas de bzhin kyang khon// dgas sum 'dus zanas ma chags// sangs su rdzogs pas snang bdag yar// de ny-id dA na kyang gas na
156b2(rnying rgyud): mu cos de bzhin nyid khon// chos bla rnam par dag pa'i nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid mya 'dres spong sa rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid khon// thams cad ma 'dres tha dad pa// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med/
156b3(rnying rgyud): de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// me bcos de bzhin nyid khon// chos kun brjod pa'i tshe 'bul las// ma bcos de bzhin nyid snang ba// dbu mar mi dmigs gsang bzhid// skyes bu dam pa'i spyod yul yin// gsang sngags rdo rje theg chen
156b4(rnying rgyud): 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gsal// ci phyir rdo rje gsang sngags dang // sems can sangs rgyas tha dad min// gsang sngags rdo rje rnal 'byor pa// skyes bu thabs kyi pha rol phyin// rdo rje rnal 'byor mi ldan na// de nyid thabs dang shes
156b5(rnying rgyud): rab bral// de bas rnal 'byor chen po yis// rdo rje gsang sngags dam pa yi// cho 'phrul bzhi yi rang bzhin las// na mu ya 'angang bar bya ba min// zhes smras pas/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni chos thams cad kun rngu bzang po nyid
156b6(rnying rgyud): do sa yongs su zag d+hi grags par gyur to// lcang kwa'i bdag po de dag ni kun brjod pa'i tsho phrul te/ de dag kyang sa sor ma 'dres par de kho na nyid gaN+DIg tu yongs su 'grub to// sang+yas bya sA kran+da gyi dgongs pa 'das pa'i parda d+ha
156b7(rnying rgyud): po las kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul bstan po zhes bya ba'i le'u skye bcwa brgyad pa'o// / lang ka'i bdag po de 'arjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul gang zhen// zhe gnas yongs su rdzogs par 'grel pa ni 'di lta ste/ ji snyed pa thams ca
157a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa nyid du yangs su rdzogs pa 'bang zhig go// de lta zhe na/ 'du gyu ste/ da nyid ma gal nam mkha' lnga// g.yodul bu dang rnga spyad pa// mA rtag sa shes rgyu marbaN+Da// gcig las rnam pa yang kyus med// rang bzhin spun
157a2(rnying rgyud): grub dkyil 'khor che// de na dman dang sems dbang dang // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ming yang med// lhan mnyam byang chub snying po las// nges pa'i dgongs pa'i mnyam rnyed nas// ji bzhin ma bcos de kho na// zab mo dam pa nges pa'i don//
157a3(rnying rgyud): pargod dam pa chen po yis// rdo rje snying po nyid la nyid// dgongs pa'i don la 'di skad dgrel// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma'o ngo
157a4(rnying rgyud): mtshur rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs kyang kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad
157a5(rnying rgyud): dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsad// mi gnas pa las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i
157a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'od med las 'gro 'od nyid// 'gro 'od nyid na 'gro 'od med// e ma'o de mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // ma bcos ma bslad byas pa med// ji bzhin rang bzhin rnam par dag
157a7(rnying rgyud): e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin las// bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gzhi rtsa med pa'i
157b1(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// e ma'ang mtshar rmad kyi chas// rdzogs pa'i sa
157b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi gsang // nges par brtags na rtag pa nyid// rtag chad de nyid gnyen po med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // nges par chad na chad pa med// byang chub nyid de log rgyan chad// e mno
157b3(rnying rgyud): mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// e mdo ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i
157b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// e ma'o ngo mchor rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rab 'byam mtha' yas gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod mi tshol// e ma'o ngo mchor rmad kyi chos// rdzogs
157b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sems nyid rtog pa sangs rgyas te// de las gzhan du yod ma yin// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // srid gsum ye nas snying po nyid// ma nor ma bcos ldan
157b6(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// oM ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi zlos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsangadra// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// btsal ba med par rdzogs sangs rgyas// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun
157b7(rnying rgyud): gyi gsang // kun nas kun du dang bzang po// thams cad ye 'byam rmad du grogs// me mdo ngom tshur snod kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // snying po byang chub de nyid las// ma gtogs gang yang yod ma yin// e mo
158a1(rnying rgyud): mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // thams cad sangs kyis yin pa la// rtog pas bsgribs pas dam shes// oM ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byin gyi gsang /
158a2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa nyid na rtog med phyir// bde gshegs snying po gzhan nas min// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // kun gyi snying po byang chub la// ye nas dgongs pa lhun gyis grub// oM ma'o ngo mtshar med kyi
158a3(rnying rgyud): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po la// sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba med// e mA'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // ye nyid 'bras bu dam pa la// thob par bya ba ga
158a4(rnying rgyud): la yod// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas sems can thun gyi gsang // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
158a5(rnying rgyud): gsang // dbus pa gsang ba rmad 'byung ba// rdo rje snying po 'dus pa nyid// e mA'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa'o// e ma'i ngo mtshar rmad
158a6(rnying rgyud): kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // zla ba gsang ba las byung ba'i// gsung gi thig le zab mo byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas//
158a7(rnying rgyud): gzugs snang mkha' la 'ja' ltar gsal// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // snad srid sgyu ma'i ye shes las// sprul pa'i dra ba sprin phung byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
158b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gsang // sprul pa thabs kyi dra ba las// mtha' gnyis 'dzin pa'i zhag sa 'byung // e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // bya bral rnal 'byor mthun 'jug spyod// sbyor thabs bya ba las rgyad byung //

158b3(rnying rgyud): byu sa pa// na du lug/ ma rnam
158b4(rnying rgyud): kye chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rab 'bum rmad du grags pa 'di/ bka' yi rang rgyud dam pa nyid// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// bstan pa 'byung
158b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po mchog/ e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // zab mo 'dres pa'i gtan tshigs 'di// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i snying po'i yum// rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar mdzad// mi 'gyur mi 'jug rdo rje sems//
158b6(rnying rgyud): dpag tu med pa gsang mtha' yas// yon tan rin chen sna tshogs 'byung // mtha' dag lhun grub gdon mi za// rdo rje snying po nyid la nyed// nyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor shar// bsam med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// dpagu med brgyad khri bzhi
158b7(rnying rgyud): stong sgro// grags pa'i rnam grangs bsam yas kyang // nges pa'i theg pa gcig las med// gsang nyid ma nges 'dug par du// theg pa'i sgo yang bsam mi khyab// gsang nyid nges par snang ma thag/ theg pa'i sgo yang de las med// brjod dang
159a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i rnam grangs san// dragra na dun nan rdzun// phyag 'a brjod pas dan rtad / rnams ldan 'dugs na da tu ga // dam pa rnams ca gyun// jug bya
159a2(rnying rgyud): gcig gis kun la khyab// thams cad lung chen nges par bstan// de dag de nyid dang grol na// gsang sngags mthong bas das rgyas te// kun kyadu ba rkyen byang chub sems// tog bral dri me rnam par dag/ bde tshan nyid la 'ad can rdzogs
159a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyi ma'i snying po shar// mA lus mtha' dag theg ste rtse// ye nas gtsal med btsal myi dgos// rgyu 'bras dbyer med de nyid de// mi g.yo me tog yul 'das la// rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog 'dzin gyis// thams cad s+tha mA 'khrul pas
159a4(rnying rgyud): bcings// dung bung ye shes nyis byed// mA bcoM sa bzhin gnas pan// steng pa rji dwagams med// rnams cad byung chub kyi tho bas// kun kyang mi brdul bde pa gnos// snying srid mamar pa'i khabargya byung // ma
159a5(rnying rgyud): las gar mi phyin// mtha' thug med pa'i gzhi bgrod kyang // snying po de las g.yos pa med// dpag med rgyal ba kun bskrun kyang // snying po yongs su 'brel ba med// sems can mtha'i thug med 'byung yang // de nyid de las 'grib pa med//
159a6(rnying rgyud): skye bzhi rgyud lngar gang snang ba// sangs rgyas nyid de ye shes sku// thams cad de nyid de gcig pas// ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// skye 'gag med pa'i snying po yin// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ye nas bsgrubs zin lhun gyis
159a7(rnying rgyud): grub// sgrub pa 'di la gang gnas pa// rnal 'byor de nyid skal ba bzang // ji ltar bsgoms bsgrubs ci spyad kyang // de nyid yin te don gyi mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi snying po nyid// byin brlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams
159b1(rnying rgyud): kye yum// sangs rgyas bde chen de las byung // ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di// spros med theg ler gnas pa pas// rgyal sras sems can kun gyi phyir// nyid la 'chad cing nyid la 'grel// zhi gnas mi rtog ma kha' khyab la// lhag mthong ma rmongs/
159b2(rnying rgyud): 'ja' tshon gsal// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa las// dgongs pa nges par 'grel par bshad// lang ka'i bdag po stong pa nyid las de skad du sgra brtan byung bas thams cad ma 'dres pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'grel pa ni kun du bzang ba
159b3(rnying rgyud): nyid do// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na gang gi dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba de dag kyang gzhi dang / 'jug pa dang / sbyor ba dang / rtsa ba dang / nges pa 'bang zhig pas gyur pa dang / snang ba dang / brjod pa dang / bstan par rig par bya'o// de skad ces
159b4(rnying rgyud): smras pas/ lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yi rangs te/ thams cad ma 'dres pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par thugs su chud nas mtha' dbus med par grol te dbugs phyin par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi
159b5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang yongs su rdzogs par 'grel pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ye
159b6(rnying rgyud): shes rnam pa bzlos byung rdul na pa m+b+ha pa ni// de nas yang 'a ka'i mang dag byung chub sems dpa rna sems dpa chen po das gsang bapa'i bdag pa masngon du byung ba cig bcu gnyis pa'i drug pa gle pa 'i bas pa bla 'i na
159b7(rnying rgyud): grang shes 'bang ba'i drab mangs sa dris pa/ kye+e gsang ba pa du pa nyid kyis theg partson pa ga nga dam pa 'byung ba'i tshul sbyin pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i thabs pa/ bdul bya slabs la babre ba'i mini yang byung zhes bkad pa rjon
160a1(rnying rgyud): rten pa gang zhag gdul byu skabs la bab nas yongs su btul ba grags pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka' bdag po gsang sngags 'byung ba'i chu gdul bya khyang bar can 'jig rten sreg par byed pa khro bo tshul rngam pa gdul gyur dus la ngas/
160a2(rnying rgyud): par bab pa'i tshe yongs su btul ba na phyogs dus kun gyi sangs rgyas thams cad snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dus nas skyes bya dam pa dag la rnam par bskul bas ji lta ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sgron ma yongs su bkod pa lta bu'i khro bo'i sprin rnam
160a3(rnying rgyud): par 'jigs pa rdul snyed kyis btul ba de kho na'i tshe de kho na'i dus nyid du 'byung zhing grags so// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gdul bya de gang las byung / de las dang skye ba ji ltar legs/ gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyur ji ltar 'gyur/ de
160a4(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol ba las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ khye lang ka'i bdag po de ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung bA ni sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba bskul ba kun dga' zhes bya ba la lhor khams mngon par
160a5(rnying rgyud): dga' ba zhes bya bar byung ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu zhes b+ha ba ga~Mng ji lta ba bzhin theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skyor ba/ thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos ma bskrad pa rnal 'byor du gnas pa/ skyes bu
160a6(rnying rgyud): dam par chud pa zhig byung ba des sems can thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su mthong zhing de dag yongs su bskul ba la brtson pa 'ba' zhig byed do// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med par skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i las dang / skye ba
160a7(rnying rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i brjod kyis mi rdzogs te/ las skabs gcig gis skye ba cha gcig la gzung na 'di lta ste/ nye 'khor du khyim bdag ke ru ka ya zhes bya ba la bu thar pa nag po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ bu de la g.yog ngan bag zhes bya ba zhig
160b1(rnying rgyud): sru nga/ tshong 'dras rnam gang dag dag sbyong ba / ga tsun nu la rnal 'byur rgyalas sa te/ glanas pa byu sgyul ma bya gnas shing dru 'byung la spyod par byu // dza ts+tsha 'angasan thar pa nag blang ga /
160b2(rnying rgyud): slong thub dka' gzhon nu 'das/ thams cad ji lta ba bzhin ston par thos nas thams cad ni dga' bar spyod pa bzhin du lam yod pa'i chos dag 'byung ngam zhes rtog pa/ gang dag la yang dris pa las thams cad kyis de ltar 'byung bar smras
160b3(rnying rgyud): de nas g.yog dang bcas pas dge slong ba la ba der zhugs te gnas su phyin nas de 'dun pa legs par 'dun nas gsol pa/ dge slong chen po thams cad ji lta bar spyod pa bzhin du lam ston pa'i thabs la mkhas par thos na de de lta nyid du nges
160b4(rnying rgyud): na sa nga jug rnas sa/ dun ga na / shA
160b5(rnying rgyud): du gsol/ bdag kyang khyod la thams cad mi 'gag pade lam blangs te rnal 'byor du gnas par 'tshal bas dam pa nyid du nges par gzung du gsol zhes 'dun pa las/ dge slong des smras pa/ yin no legs so// de ltar bya'o zhes legs
160b6(rnying rgyud): pabyin nas thar phran grwa po rab tu byung nas dam par bzung / ngan bag ni dus 'dzin dra bzung ste dge slong thar pa'i g.yog tu byas so// de nas thar pa dge slong gis gsol pa/ dge slong chen po thams cad ji lta ba'i lam dam pa de gang lags/
160b7(rnying rgyud): smras pa/ ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na// dngos po bzhi la gnas smad kyang // nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin te// 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam// de skad ces smras pas/ thar pa g.yog dang bcas pa yi rangs te/ e ma'o thabs la mkhas
161a1(rnying rgyud): so// des sa// yan no// gtad do// bdag thams cad du de la yongs su gnas so zhes gas p+pa te/ sU dza lta ba de bzhin du s+yAd bya lus thang pa dge slong nu gro bras kyi nges pa ma sbed de/ skra 'bral thug la phyags pas dngos pa par+d+ha
161a2(rnying rgyud): nas srad de zhen nas lus dam pa'i cha byad du bcug nas sems ngan 'gro ba'i lam du zhugs so// g.yog ngan bag ni sgra gzhi'i don gyi nges pa rnyed nas blo gros dam par 'bral te/ don 'ba' zhig la phyogs pas ji bzhin pa kho nar spyad de zhen nas yongs
161a3(rnying rgyud): surnal 'byor pas lus ma rabs kyi cha byad du bcug nas sems dam par nges pa'i lam du zhugs so// de nas thar pa g.yog dang lta ba ma mthun te/ smras pa/ bdug cag gnyis ni dpon gcig la sgra gcig tu byung ba 'di la so sor ma mthun pa 'di
161a4(rnying rgyud): lta zhig/ dan bag gis smras pa/ bdag gis ni da ltar nges par 'jog pa 'di kho na las gzhan ma thos lags so// smras pa/ bdag gis kyang da ltar nges pa rnyed de spyod pa 'di kho na las gzhan ma thos so zhes smras pas/ de la rtsod pa chen por
161a5(rnying rgyud): gyur te/ lta ba ma mthun pas g.yog dang so sor bkal te ma mthong ma phrad par dam bcas nas g.yo khams ring por ba shugs te spangs so// de nas thar pa dge slong ngo mngon pa'i nga rgyal log pa'i ri bor skyes te dben la so so'i nges pa rnyed pa gsol ba
161a6(rnying rgyud): las/ dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu ma bcos ma bslad pa'i rnal mar spyod pas kha gsag med de rang bzhin gsong por smra bas na ngan bag ltar nges so zhes bsgo bas thar pa kun nas 'khrugs te smras pa/ dpon par 'dra na gaN+DI ga ltar ro zhes kyang ma mnyam
161a7(rnying rgyud): par nges par bdag bkang bcag pa dang sun phyung ba 'dis byas pas dpon 'di yang khams 'dir ma chags par byas la/ 'di dag bdag gi khams su bya'o zhes dam bcas nas che ba'i nga rgyal skyes te dpon yang khams ring por bshugs te yongs su
161b1(rnying rgyud): spangs so// de nas thar pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgo grangs mang zhing rgya che bar gyur pas thams cad du ston pa dpag par dka' ba'i phyir yongs su ma chud de gzhal ba gnyis kyis gzhal ba ma byas par thar pa rang gi tshad ma la zhen phyogs
161b2(rnying rgyud): drangs nas thams cad kyang log par bsgyur/ nyid kyang log pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs te/ log pa'i dka' thub drag po dang / log pa'i brtul zhugs chen po la zhugs pa ni dur khrod kyi mi ro dang / blangs te kha zas su byed cing pags pa dag bshus te gsang
161b3(rnying rgyud): gzhir gyon te longs spyod pa ce spyang nag po dang / 'phar ba rkang rdebs dang / dred mo lag rdebs dang / bya gcan gsod byed dang / dur bya kang ka dang / za byed dur phag la sogs pa'i gson ma mang po brten te thams cad kyi srog gcod cing sha drag
161b4(rnying rgyud): la longs spyod par byed pa/ smad 'tshod ma'i tshogs mang por bsdus te chags pa chen por spyod pa/ dngos po bzhi las mi 'da' bar dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid las yongs su 'das par gyur to// de nas skye ba de 'phos par gyur
161b5(rnying rgyud): te/ de skye ba de'i phyi ma la ce spyang nag po'i lus su skye ba lnga brgya blangs te srog chags 'ba' zhig gsod pa'i las spyod cing sha dang khrag dron mo za bar gyur to// skye ba de'i phyi ma dag la khyi lu 'di la sogs pa gdug pas gsod pa'i las can sha khrag
161b6(rnying rgyud): zas su byed pa tha dad pa'i lhas su skye ba lnga brgya blangs shing gzhan gyis bsad cing skye ba 'phro ba sha dgA tA gyur to// skye ba de'i phye ma dag la d+ha ne le sha zan dang / khrag 'thud mchu dmar dang / dur bya kAng ka dang / ru rtse rkang ldag la sogs
161b7(rnying rgyud): pa tha dad pa'i lus blangs shing gzhon gyis bsad cing skye ba 'phab sha dag tu gyur to// skye ba de dag gi phyi ma dag pa sbrang bu tre ma dang / srin bu bra ka dang / ro za rkang 'jeb la sogs pa 'bru dang shin tu 'bru chen tha dad pa'i lus su phre nga blangs shing
162a1(rnying rgyud): dag kyang gnyen pos gsang cur bye ba 'pho ba sha dag tu gyur to// sgrib dang phye ma dag la ngan lcags kyi'angaman gnas pa skye bar skyes pa skye ba lnga brgya blangs te gnyen pas gsad cing skye da ba shA dag tu gyur to// skye ba dag
162a2(rnying rgyud): gyi mang srog chags dag gi lus la gnas shing zas kyang de dag la byed ba'i skye bor skye ba lnga brgya blangs te gnyen pos gsad cing skye ba 'pho ba sha dag tu gyur to// yang skye ba de'i phye ma dag la gsad pa'i sha dang / shi ba'i ro dang / rnam par dul ba dang / lung
162a3(rnying rgyud): pa thu dang rdo dang / gam brag dang / sdong chen la sogs pa'i nang du gnas pa'i skye bor gyur te de la gnas shing zas kyang des 'tsho ba gnyen pos gsad cing skye ba 'pho ba 'bang zhig tu gyur to// skye ba de'i phyi ma dag la mngal gyi grong khyer na gnas pa
162a4(rnying rgyud): skye bo bye lnga brgya gan+d+has te gnas deng 'tsho pa yang de las byed par gyur to// yang skye ba de'i phyi ma la mnar med pa'i gnas rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar de nyid kyi tshe'i tshad brgyad khri'i bar du gnas te/ dmyal ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshad ni brjod du
162a5(rnying rgyud): mi rung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi mdun du sdug bsngal gyi tshad de brjod na gong gis thos pa de brgyal bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na dmyal ba des e ma'o 'di ci nyes smras pa'i skad cig gcig gis phyin par gyur to// rdo rje sems
162a6(rnying rgyud): dpa'athub pa'i dbang po chos kyi rgyal po de sa kho na nyid kyi las yin zhes chos bstan pas las de yid la byas pas yongs su shes te 'gyod par gyur to// 'gyod pa tsam gyis gnas de nas 'phos nas rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal ba'i gnas su yang de nyid kyi
162a7(rnying rgyud): tshad rgyad khrir gnas te mnar med pa ji lta ba bzhin no// de nas yang 'phos nas cha bcung ngu dang / dru 'bod chen po dang / dra 'bod dang / bsdus 'joms dang / thig gnag dang / 'bar ba dang / yangasas la sogs pa'i dmyal ba'i gnams
162b1(rnying rgyud): yang dadagag kyang bang gnas temanur rjod pa nga / na ma shAdun// dadagan phyug pan yang 'dugatan gyi khyam sa gzhan ga myal burnams sa ltung gyun// de dag 'as bsan byang ba /
162b2(rnying rgyud): pa ga du na dang mtshan garang du byung ba dang de skye bar byed do// 'jig pa de dag gis de dag ga tings pa yang gzhan dag gang 'dug pa'i dus su yang der skye ba len pa 'gyur ro// de dag las bang nas kyang sha dang ngas pa'i rnyed dun da
162b3(rnying rgyud): 'i zla ba'i rigs su bskal pa byed khring skye ba len cing 'phro bar 'gyur ro// de las thar nas gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba lnga brgyar gdung bar gyur to// de las 'phos nas lus srul po'i dwags su skye ba blangs so//
162b4(rnying rgyud): rdo'i phyi ma la sha za rigs su sgo babyung bo// skye ba de'i phyi ma la skyil pong ragasas skye bzungs te/ srul po gnya' dreg can zhes d+hU ba'i theskal po gtogs 'dod can zhes bya bar skye ba blangs so// skye ba de'i phyi ma lo yul yang ka bA ra nas

162b7(rnying rgyud): dri 'i 'dimatshan drug so// de do 'ang sanas nam sa nga bye ngas te bras bdud bye rgya ba bya pa// de khrag tu ngas pas phrag bdun kyi 'tshabs su// dngas du ma rgyas pas sa
163a1(rnying rgyud): bas kyang // de nas ma'i nang grol zad par pos pas 'tsho ba'i bya bar gyur // de nas sha zad par byas pas na bya 'dun kyang kyang bya ba thus so// de nas gzhon nu nas par gyur na sa dra khrong sbya d+hams kyis rtswa ba
163a2(rnying rgyud): byA sgrus s+ho// de nas shin d+ha tas par gyur ba dang / do sa zas su bshing dgas dang bags rnams ston te/ drang khyod kyim po dang / sha za dang / ye dgas kyi tshogs dang / lags pa'i tshogs mang po yang ma rnams
163a3(rnying rgyud): dzin gyis pa'i rang bzhin gyi mthos dbang du 'dus te/ drang pyod pa gdug pan pan kyi bdag par gyu / na bye bye sbyin 'jog pa/ migang dung gang dag gson pa bzhing mdang 'brog pa/ shin tu 'jigs dang gzugs can ma
163a4(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// ma'i sha rjen zos pas nam zan ma tang ka zhes ming grang dag gis yongs su grags so// yi dgas chen gro de'i kha nangs las ni tsha ba'i nad byung bas 'byung bas khyab ste 'gro ba gang lus can rnams zug rngu drag pos gzer ba/ snanas
163a5(rnying rgyud): grang bdi nang byung bas 'byung ba khyab ste kun du gdung bar byed do// mig dug gis phog pas 'chi bar nges pa/ drag po'i sngags gzer bzlas pa byas pas thams cad dbang du 'dra bar gyur pa/ lus chen po la mdog thal ka sngo sbyar 'dug pa khrag
163a6(rnying rgyud): dang zhag gi thigaM les btsun pa/ thod pa'i zing ba sa ral du thogs pa/ dmar po khrag gis bslus pa'i pags pa bgos pa/ thong phyogs khrag gis bkang brtag par 'thung ba/ sba ril pa kham nag 'ban cing gtigs pa/ 'bu ser thong rdzas
163a7(rnying rgyud): zas su za ba/ thal pa dang gro tsam nas lus brtan pa/ bya'i gshog pa lus las byung bas nam mkha' la bya bzhin bya ba byed pa/ gcer chu thogs me rtogs pa med pas rdul nya bzhin bya ba byed pa/ gangagis mthong ba mig tso rig dzin
163b1(rnying rgyud): zhing brtul bar byeng ba/ lus phyag gi spucan nu ba la yan lag sbrul du byung zhing sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ sen mo kang ka'i mchu sder du byung bas gang zin pa'i lus tsanA sha rus myags par byed pa/ sngon goms pa'i mthus lus can tha dad gsad par
163b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa/ gang mo'i dbang po thams cad sdud par chags pa/ lus cin mthu' dag tag sngags te zil gyis mnan nas 'dir yod yed dujog pa/ 'jig rten gyi ma dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin mthu can gyis phyag byas te gtso
163b3(rnying rgyud): tho ba/ gdug pa can mthang dag sangag gi zug pa dang / / g.yog dang / yang gtsag dang / zan dang / yang zan du 'khor zhing / kun la da myur ba nga byug can par gyu // / cas kun gyi dgangs pa das pa'i
163b4(rnying rgyud): chen po las gang yongs su ma dag pa'i b+he rgyud brtan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas yi dgras drag po deng rgyal gyi gtum ska 'byin te/ e mra'o thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po ni bdag yin na/ bdag las gzhan pa'i drang
163b5(rnying rgyud): dang phra ma yod na de yang bdag gidu 'gyur ni/ bdag ni 'gran gyon med che btsan gcig pur thung ngo zhes dra rtsal gyi gdungs dar sgrogs so// de'i tshe 'gro ba rnams kyi tshul 'di ltar byung ste/ shes blo thams cad rmugs shing bdud kyis byin gyis
163b6(rnying rgyud): brlabs pas thams cad kyang shin tu stong pa rgyun ched du gyur te mtha' zad pa sha dag go// bdag tu zhen par gyur te zer zug pa shwa dag blo// 'grog pa 'jug par gyur te 'gags shing 'das pa sha dag go// gadrug cing gtum par gyur
163b7(rnying rgyud): ta mi dang bod pa byung ba sha dag go// log par lta bar gyur te mnar med pa slong ba sha dag go// banam ming 'grus par gyur tegashin rje'i 'jig rten du skyeng ba shi na no// rkye tug yang bachen por gyur to ma khom po'i gnas suM/
164a1(rnying rgyud): srung ba sha dag ga// shin du gti mug gis rmongs par gyur to la song gA gnas sa snang ba shA drug ga/ shin na chags pas myos par blang te mngal gyi khams su 'grob sha dag go// byang chub kyi shing rnams ngadu
164a2(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rtsa ba tshig pa sha dag go// lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar grags shing grags te grags par gyur to// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul
164a3(rnying rgyud): ni sngon byung ba// de rdo sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// stong pa nyid du mu chad pas// chang pa'i khams chen nyid du gyur// de nas slar yang 'phos pa yis// rgol drar lam ni chad par 'gyur// 'das pa'i drung na/
164a4(rnying rgyud): sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu bdag tu sbrul btsun// ther thug rtag pa badrag chen gyis// thams cad
164a5(rnying rgyud): rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas de nyid blar byung bas// dam pa dag la rmongs par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de
164a6(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad ni// shin tu 'byog la brtson par 'gyur// shin tu 'grog pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gags shing yongs su 'das par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na snron byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs
164a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur// shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yis// 'odidi 'bod par snang bar 'gyur// de nas 'phom pa'i sems ca
164b1(rnying rgyud): bgachags las kyis mtshams gyur nus// shin tu bdug brdzun par 'byung// blo yang bdud pas zin pa dbyas nas// drag nad dmas dang rtsa sbyin na// gnod pang zag dra bya zar mngang // bdud dang phrag den rnam //
164b2(rnying rgyud): tu gtumajam ma rungs pas// 'jig rten gsum dag 'jig byed cing // dam tshig dag la za bA dang // dam pa'i chu bo rga bzlog ste// lha mi 'jig rten 'phro bar byed// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de badzin
164b3(rnying rgyud): gI sha~Mg tsA pa'i gsung dbal// 'gro ba tshul ni spyon byung ba// de tshe sems can rnams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par 'gyur// lta ba shin+da tu log pa gyis// mnar mad dmyal ba chen por spyad// de nus gapa te smar d+hang na// ma
164b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam nyid chad par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu brkam zhing 'jungs par
164b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu le los g.yeng bar 'gyur// shin tu
164b6(rnying rgyud): g.yeng ba'i le lo yis// mi kho ma gnas su ltung bar 'gyur// de nas de nyid slar byung bas// bskal pa gsum gyi bskal par 'gyur// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
165a1(rnying rgyud): gsung rab la// 'gro ba 'tshul du sngon byung ba// da tsho sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gti mug rmongs par 'gyur// shin tu gti mug rmongs pa yis// gti mug rgyal sang nyid du lhung // de nas du nyadas
165a2(rnying rgyud): bas// mthong snang lam yang chad par 'gyur// 'dres pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du rgya
165a3(rnying rgyud): pas myos par gyure// shin tu chags pas myos pa yis// mngal kyi grong khyer nyid du lhung // de nas de nyid slar byung bas// 'dod pa'i me yis gdung bar 'gyur// zhes thams cad du grag go// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo man po las
165a4(rnying rgyud): 'das pa sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lA dA ka'i bdag po de ltar yi dwags drug po des mi gang ji snyed pa dbang du gyur pa'i skye ba bcom zhing / e ma'o dbang thub
165a5(rnying rgyud): bdag lngas su dag che su dag yod ces nyid la dam pa dang / lang ka yul gyi grong rdal mtsho rkota thang mar gyi gling byan lag mchongs kyi rim la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse zhes bya ba na lang ka'i mnga' bdag srin po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas
165a6(rnying rgyud): thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i slob mar gyur pa/ mthu dang rtsal rmad du byung zhing ngo mtshar che ba/ blo gros yongs su chub pa/ thabs rgya mtsho 'dra ba sbyin+da lta bu 'byung ba zhig 'jig rten na che'o zhes grags pa las// yi dgas bya'i gshog pa n+dan
165a7(rnying rgyud): de rab tu 'khrugs 'khams nas ru tra'i me dpung du 'bar nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang 'phur rtsal gyis byan lag mchongs pa'i ri'i rtse mo la babaso nas nga rgyal gyi gtum skad du ru tra ma tra ma ra tra zhes bsgrags pas/ lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdal shig shig/
165b1(rnying rgyud): rab tu shig shig/ yam yom du gyur pas lang ka'i srin po kun dang srin mo kun kyang skrag cing dngangs nas/ e ma'o 'di ji ltar zhig mig rtsa rig rig dngangs yid med gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin bya'i gshag pa can gtum rngam 'khrugs pa
165b2(rnying rgyud): zhig bdag cag gi lakhras sa na gnas pa mthong zhing thos par gyur to// de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag chen po la sogs pa srin po'i tshogs kyis dmag gi tshogs kyi bsdu ba byas te gzhom par 'bod cing 'bad pa las/ yang srin po bya'i gshog
165b3(rnying rgyud): pa can des srin po'i tshogs bag 'khum pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon du byas nas/ da ni dbang phyug chen po ste// rgyal chen ris bzhi nga yi g.yog/ lha srin sde brgyad nga yi bran// gsang ba mchog gi bdag yin pas// sa zlog
165b4(rnying rgyud): de la 'gran zla yod// ru tra ma tra ma ra tra zhes dargyal gyi gtum skad bsgrags pa las srin po zil gyis non zhing bag 'khums nas/ la la ni 'di ni srin po'i khams rgyal bar byed pazhig skye bdag cag gi gtso bo'i ngos so zhes sgrogs/ la la ni 'din
165b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'jig par byed pa ni grwa ste bdag rgyag gi gnyen por 'gyur ba zhig glo zhes sgrogs/ lal dag 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug chen po zhig go zhes sgrogs/ la la dag 'di ni mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi tshogs bdag glo'i sna sgrogs srin po
165b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po lang ka'i mnga' bdag ni 'di ni 'byung po'i bu gtogs 'dod can zhes bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten gsum skrag pa de kho na nyid ma gtogs pa/ thams cad rlag cing dbang du byed pa log pa'i tshogs bdag ste/ 'di gzhan gyis mi thul te/ 'di'i
165b7(rnying rgyud): gnyen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdzad sprul pa rdo rje chen gyis btul nas nges pa dam par bkod de/ yang dag par lung ston pa zhig pas 'di'i rgyus gsang sngags dam pa'i nges pa theg pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'brang
166a1(rnying rgyud): gas sa sugan
166a2(rnying rgyud): nye drug su ci stong mye ba pa tu byas dbun drin po byan grob dag nga madran gyis smra pa/ bdag rtag pa gan de'i ni nyid rjon// zhes glags ci ba dam par to//
166a3(rnying rgyud): dbu khor byu ngan par gyi so// de nas pang yin po kyi gshes na min pa'i dang zin pa nyid zhes byeb grags pa dang rgyal rgya bya ba com ste bdag la sache gang zhig yo yang sra zhig yin du rnga mja mar rdzags zlogs pa
166a4(rnying rgyud): lha'i ded dpon ma tang ka run zhes bya ba mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thabs dang che ba khyad par du rdung ba de dpags so rnas grags pa las/ bdud chu d+hanag po da shin+da tu la 'ams 'khrugs nas ngargal gyi gtum spyad bsgrags/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang dpur
166a5(rnying rgyud): sa ma tang kardu nA'i gnas su babs te yang s+yAd pAr joms na/ nga zhwa ma ra sad pa mi 'dra nas lus can yin pas 'ud nas 'thabs 'thabs sA byung ba'i ngad la cha grang dbugaswA ha ma nas nad kyi mtshon cha smos nas kho na de'i lus la khyab ste/
166a6(rnying rgyud): me dpang nag pa'i 'byam pas grang nas mi bzod pa'i zug dus gdungs te kho nang po de dung thabs su bsad do// na te Sh+Ti dam 'dam bu'i gli du tan pa sas dge gnas kyi yul brjid du snang ba// 'ad nas kho na nyid bsad pa'i khyi
166a7(rnying rgyud): dang drung khor rnams ni gnod sbyin bya'i gshog pa can de'i 'khor du dzin/ lha ma yin dang / sha za dang / rol pa/ ril bdud de'i ser dzin/ rgyal po bzhi gang gi skyabs su bkrugs kyang yongs su mthar bar de'i bran du dzan/
166b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yon dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / drug pa la sogs pa kun kyang gang gi skabs sa brlabs kya ma nar bar de'i bran du ngan/ dadang ma la yang zag pa nas na rgya sar smras/ la la'i myu zlas la na
166b2(rnying rgyud): mo ra byas/ la la ni mdza' mor byas/ la la ni bran mor byas/ la la ni pho nya dang mngag par byas/ lce mi yongs su srid brlag nas thams cad nag po bkrag med kyi khams su gyur to// de yang 'di ltar grags shing grags te grags
166b3(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// nag po khyung gshog 'phur rgyal can// gtum jam shIn tu ma rungs pa// mi sdug gdong mi sdug gzugs dang // mi snyan sgra yi tsham ngam dang // sha spungs rus spungs 'bu dang rnag/ khrag dang bra shang gci'i khu ba la/
166b4(rnying rgyud): klog pa'i rdzu mni drag padas// din lha ma'i srid brgyanan/ skye sa skye po kArlan// ba nying babad nas// 'alang yang nga gi nam \u0f7f// gdug pa'i thab tu med dbyung bas// ban+d+ha
166b5(rnying rgyud): ga byung ba jigs nga / bag pa na byas / den nga smra / / byas skyeng da/ nga du ni rgyas /
166b6(rnying rgyud): chings pa gtogs 'dod lha dpung br-inAs// drag po'i skyabs su nye bar dong // tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang po dag/ shin tu skrag cing 'jigs 'gyur te// rdo rje can la skyabs su dong // de bzhin glang la skyabs yod par// nye bar brgyugs/
166b7(rnying rgyud): kyang mthar bar// 'jigs byed de mi bran du jen// zhos thams cad du grags par gyur to// 'ud nas bdud ru tra nag po lta zhig/ lha mi g.yong gul thams cad dbang du mdzad de/ lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdol mtsho rko ka 'ang mar byan lag
167a1(rnying rgyud): mchongs kyi ri ba ma ri thod pa mkhar zhes bya bar 'khras te/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ni phrag tu btsugs// bdud kyi rwa mtshon ni sgor phyar te rang gi phru mas yongs su bskor// drag po rang gi rdzu 'phrul bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'i
167a2(rnying rgyud): rab mdzub mo'i rtse la bzhag ste/ spyi bo la 'gying bag tu basbyor zhing nga rgyal gyi gtum skad sgrogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ ru dza ma tra ma ra tra sa khams na bdag las su zhig cha gang zhig yod/ e ma'o sngon dpal shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas 'chi ba dag
167a3(rnying rgyud): gi bdud btul ba'i tshe de'i bstan pa lo byung ba'i mchog chen po nyan thos rnams kyis thams cad zhi bar lhan pa'i sgribs smras te/ nga'i bka' nyon cig ces zer ba las kyang bu chung go zu 'phrag pa la khol la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar nos shig
167a4(rnying rgyud): ces byas nas ma nyan nas des kyang bdag dbang du byed ma nus so// de'i drung na dpal rdo rje snying po ngag gi dbang phyug lha zhig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul nas hri zhes dbang rgyud du nyan na/ kho na nyid kyis tha kha Tarda ba pa byas nas 'grun bu khyod kyang
167a5(rnying rgyud): bde bar nos shig ces bsgo bas de yang thug khos te slar chen no// gnam rim pa bcu bzhin dpal rdo rje snying po lha zhig 'gran gyi zla med par bris nas de yang bdag dbang du byas la thams cad 'u ba lnga rjen man zhes sgrogs shing 'bran gyi zla myed
167a6(rnying rgyud): rje btsun gcig pu nyid du lta'o// ji lta ji ltar thar pa nag po gang yin pa cu dra nag por smin par gyur pa de'i tshe dri'i dus na gang thub dka' gzhon nu de ni snying po byang chub gdan par rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid du gyur to// gang ngan bag de ni de'i
167a7(rnying rgyud): tshe de'i dus na rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba nyid du gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dres pa'i mdo chen po las ru dra nag po'i spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // bam po
167b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi par thug pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub gang na bar 'dus nas stong pa nyid du bshig nasu skyes bu dam pa stong pa nyid la sdang bar mdzad de/ de nyid kyi ska nyid la grub pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi zhing
167b2(rnying rgyud): khams kyi bya ba yongs rdzogs par ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma rdzogs par ci'i phyir byang chub par bya snyam/ tha dad du rnam par snang bar mi mdzad par ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
167b3(rnying rgyud): par bya snyam/ de skad ces grag pa las stong pa nyid de las 'di skad du grag go// kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don gang gi dbang gis zhing khams kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang tha dad
167b4(rnying rgyud): du rnam par snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ de skad du gras pa las/ yang thams cad kyi de kho na nyid las bskul ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dang po 'di skad du grag go// stong nyid mi g.yo nam mkha' la// mi bskyod bde bar gshegs mdzad
167b5(rnying rgyud): pa// mi dmigs mi rtog de bzhin nyid// rtog bya sna tshogs skyed par mdzod// ces grag go// de la yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// mi rtog dang las rtag nyid du// brtags pas smong pa grong byung ba// de nyid rtog pa
167b6(rnying rgyud): chen po ste// gang mi rtog pa rtog pa'i rgyu zhes grag go// yang thams cad kyi de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi snying po las// rang bzhin kun du snang ba'i 'od// yongs pa khyab pa snying rje'i yul// mtha' yas rgyal
167b7(rnying rgyud): srid skyed par mdzod// ces grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// kun 'byung kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings// ma skyes mi 'gag kun du sbeng // sbubs mdzod med yul las dengs// mtha' yas mtha
168a1(rnying rgyud): yas bskyed pa'i lam// zhes gagag// pa thams cad gau tan las 'dI lda dung gags// tha dad rnam par snang mang ngan// gsung gi b+hag na ye shes las// rgyal ba rnams ni yi ger snang // yi gong pa gas
168a2(rnying rgyud): skyed par mdzod// ces grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// de nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// rang byung yi shes muM du gsal// sems nyid yi ge dwe rang bzhin te// sna tshogs yi ge hU~M du snang // rgyal ba'i yi ge'i rang
168a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// phyag rgya yi ge oM la sogs// thams cad yi ge'i rang bzhin te// ma skyes gsang ba'i yi ge a// zhes grag go// yang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las 'di skad du grag go// ye shes pha rol phyin rdzogs pas// rnal 'byor
168a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i sgo mtshon pa// thugs kyi rtags snang snang ba mdzad// rnam grol ye shes bskyed par mdzod// ces grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// rtag tu rnam rtog med las 'bung // /
168a5(rnying rgyud): mi rtog rnam grol ye shes thugs// rtog le rnam rtog mtshan mar snang // zhes grag go// yang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las 'di skad du grag go// stong nyid mi rtog me long las// ma skyes mi 'gag gzugs snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' snad
168a6(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin du// dbyings las phyag rgyar bzhengs su gsol// zhes grag go// yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go// de bzhin nyid du mi dmigs kyang // rang bzhin kun du snang ba'i dbyings// mi 'dres yongs su rdzogs pas na// /
168a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzugs mchog rnam par snang // zhes grag go// de ltar bskul ba dang po des yongs su rdzogs par bskul bas skyes bu dam pa de kho na nyid de stong pa nyid kyi dbyings de las stor pa nyid kyi sgo rnam par sdang ba ni ji lta ji ltar chu ba'i dkyil 'khor
168b1(rnying rgyud): stong ba'am// nam mkha' la 'ja' snang ba'i tshul du byung nas gang ma nges pa'i ye shes kyi gnas pas gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gnyis pa 'dis nges par bskul bya ni 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin ma byung ma badz+ra
168b2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// ye nas mi g.yo bde ba chen po'i dang // btsal zhing g.yo ba 'di la ci yang med// ye shes dbyings nyid tshig gi tha snyad de// de nyid dngos dang dngos min 'byung gnas nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs mi chod ma shog pa'i//
168b3(rnying rgyud): ye nyid je bzhin bde mchog mi g.yo ba// rdo rje sems mchog nam mkha'i snying ba lnga// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bshes gnyen po// 'phags rje sprul pa mang po byung ba'i gnas// kun gyi rang bzhin ma long 'od po che// rgyal
168b4(rnying rgyud): shi ba bskam pa nga// gling nga dus rgya da / kyi nga smra/ na sa ba skye nas ng+yas/ sa
168b5(rnying rgyud): rtog las pi ge sna tshogs sprul// sras kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil// gzugs skur bstan nas nyon mongs slad du gsol// gang du dang po rdo rje snying po ni// kham sna gsum nas byung bde chen ldan gyis grub// gtum byung gdug
168b6(rnying rgyud): pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// dri med sna tshogs glos ni hUM ru sbrul// 'od zer tshul gyi phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi thugs dam spyon lam dbang gis na// cis kyang mi bskyod gzugs su bstan drug stsol// gang du dang po rnam par
168b7(rnying rgyud): snang mdzad ni// khams gsum nas thung cir yang snang bar mdzod// rmongs byed mun pa thabs kyis grol mdzar phyir// rnam ngag byang chub blos ni oM du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyis phreng bas ba skor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lam
169a1(rnying rgyud): thugs dam dbang gis na// cir yang snang ba'i gzugs sla bstan du gsol// gang du dang po yon tan 'byung gnas ni// khams gsum nas byung yid bzhin rin po che// 'dod pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad kyir/
169a2(rnying rgyud): rnam dag 'thung gnas blos ni suM du sprul// rin chen phreng bas mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na// 'dod pa kun 'byung gi zugs sku bstan du gsol// gang du dang po 'od dpag med pa ni// khams gsum
169a3(rnying rgyud): nas byung gsung rab snang mtha' yas// chags pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// rnam ngag dri med blos ni oM du sprul// gsung snyan yi ge phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil// sngon gyi smon lamu bugs dam dbang gis na// sna tshogs ston pa'i
169a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs sra bstan du gsol// gang du dang po gdon mi za ba nI// khams gsum nas b+hang sna tshogs tsar yang mdzad// bya ba rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// rnam dug nan tan khros ni hU~M du sbrul// mdzad pa gar gyi zing bas bskor ba
169a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil// sman gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na/ thams cad mdzad pa'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol// zhes bskul ba gnyis pa des yongs su rdzogs par bskul bas chos nyid sgyu ma las ye shes sgyu mra'i sgra snang ba na dzaM lta ji ltar me long gi
169a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bzhin gyi de kyil 'khor snang ba bzhin du ye shes rang snang bar granas pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gsum pa 'dis mngon du rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs par bskal ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid du gshegs
169a7(rnying rgyud): pa khyod// 'jig rten mngon rdzogs rgyas mdzod lo// snying po byang chub ji bzhin pa// sems can don du snang bar mdzod// 'jig rten khams ni dpag med du// ji snyed bde bar gshegs pa yi// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang /
169b1(rnying rgyud): 'das bu rnam snang mdzad// khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa lnga// gzhan gyis phan pa'i sman ma mchis// yang dag bdud rtsi'i stan sbyar bas// 'khor ba 'gu tsang rting srung mdzad pa// sdug bsngal zug ngu nad sal ba'i// sman paH
169b2(rnying rgyud): mchog gtso bor gshegs// nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pa// bdud rtsi sman gyi rgya mtsho yis// log pa'i nad dgras gzir ba yi// nang pa'i tshogs kun bslang bar mdzod// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu nyid// snying po byang chub la dgongs
169b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer snang ba rgyas bkye ste// mun pa bsal ba'i dgongs pa mdzod// kye ma skyes bu don grub pa// bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag don rjes thob pa// gang 'dir 'dul ba'i dus la bab// gtsang ma'i gnas mchog 'og
169b4(rnying rgyud): chos kyis mthong ba'i gzhal yas su// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skud gshegs te// snying po bskul ba'i bya ba mdzod// ces rnam par bskul bas/ ji lta ji ltar sprin mthongs nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba ltar// mi
169b5(rnying rgyud): g.yo ba yi dbyiras nyid las// gzugs sku nyi ma shar bya ste// chos kyi mtho ba zhes bya ba'i gzha la yas su rnam par snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi cho 'phrul bskul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu
169b6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// // de nas chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs long sde spyod pa de rdo rje go dgyid yongs su bsdu ba'i mtshan mi mdzad pas mthang thug pa med bya'i zhing khams stug po bkod pa nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba kun nas yongs su dadus par gyur to//
169b7(rnying rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas snying rje yongs su rol pa'i tshogs kyis gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/ kye kye sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po'i byung ba'i tshogs// snang ji kun du rab tu 'dir 'byung ba// srid pa log pa'i gdug pa can// 'khor ba'is
170a1(rnying rgyud): ba sa shA/ lardzun pa pa ldanams/ ga 'a gyu zug la sa/ A dag grug sha na//
170a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams mthar rlog 'doms byed 'di// gdul pa'i zhing mchog rmad du byung // snying rnga'i bdag po kun 'dus nas// las ngan las kyi rgyan bcad de// bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs// zhes gras mo// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i gdung dang
170a3(rnying rgyud): sde'i tshogs kyis gcig par bgros pa/ kye ma'i 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'das pa'i rjes na sngon thung ltar// da ltar dus 'di nyid du byung // lung log mngon pa'i ngo bor bsnyegs// rang rgyud bsregs pa'i bskrad ba can// bdud gyi
170a4(rnying rgyud): gyen gyis brlabs pa yi// glang chen myos pa drag po che// shin tu mi bzad drug chen gyis// 'o dod 'bod par gsang brtag pas/ ro gling dur khrod mthar zhen pa// je lta'i thabs kyis phan par 'gyur/ zhes bzos so// sangs rgyas nor bu'i
170a5(rnying rgyud): gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis gcig tu mthun par bkros pa/ nag pong gdug pa sbyin pa 'di// ji ltar de dgar bzhag 'gyur na// mi bzad dug mtsho chu rlabs kyis// nag po'i khams su rgyas 'gyur bas// dam pa rnams kyi rgun gcod cing /
170a6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma sgron mi 'jig par 'gyur// de tshwa las kyi mun pa yis// thams cad mun nug smag tu 'khyams// zhes bgros so// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu mthun par bzos pa/ gang 'das pa dus na sngon byung
170a7(rnying rgyud): pa// las kyi 'khor los 'phangs pa yi// blo gros log pa'i ru tra de// snying po dbyings nas byung ba ni// skyes bu dam pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdud kyis bdud btul gnyer bkod ltar// da ltar 'di tshe zung ba ni// dug 'gyur brtsegs pa ri
170b1(rnying rgyud): 'ad// rdzaHkhros pa tha chen gyis// badz+rag cing gzhom pa'i dus la bab// ces bzlas pa// sangs rgyas gzhon nu'i gdung dang lnga 'phags kyis mgrin gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/ khong nas 'khyil ba'i drug nan pa// thar mi skye
170b2(rnying rgyud): nad kyis zin// rtag chad khams su shi ba'i ro// lam log lam stong dmus ldong 'di// ye shes khros pa'i tshe 'phrul las// 'bar 'gro 'khrug pa'i gzer chen gyis// skrag chen mun nag gzhom pa'i phyir// ye shes can sde snod
170b3(rnying rgyud): nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus te// ye shes rdo rje khros pa yi// cho 'phrul smin lung gtibs pa'i sa// mthun 'jug byis pa'i cha byad kyis// rnam par rol pa'i mngon spyod kyis// drug chen rgya mtsho ma bsnams na// 'dir ni snying
170b4(rnying rgyud): 'tsham mam// chos nyid nyid rje chen po yi// gang 'dir da mchog dam pa'i phyir// dngos po bzhi yi bstan pa mdzod// skyes babros so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'dus pa chen pos rnam par 'gros pa'i pha
170b5(rnying rgyud): nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de ltar 'dus pa chen po'i bka' ba gros yongs su chad nas las rnam bzhi gang gis gdul ba'i skabs la bab par dgongs pa yis gang de rnam par brtag pa'i phyir thub dka' gzhon nu rdo rje snying por gnas gyur pa'i
170b6(rnying rgyud): 'od zer las sprul pa thub pa'i dbang por byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sprul pa de la bsgo ba/ thub pa'i dbang po dus 'di lags// de bzhin bden pa'i byin pa rlabs kyis/ dngos po bzhi yi me dpung ba zlog/ byang chub snying po bsngal
170b7(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod// ces yongs su bskul nas thub pa'i dbang po ngas dur khrod bye ba dag po de'i phru mar snang bar mdzod nas thams cad zhi ba'i skye bar smras pa las/ dur khrod kyi bdag po ngas tha'i kha brdabs nas 'di skad du smras so// bu chung khyo kyis bdag
171a1(rnying rgyud): bral ba ma yin te/ sngon nga gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon drag po zhes bya bar gyur pa na khon nyid lta bu mang po skad nas nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/ nga'i bka' nyon cig zer ba las kyang ma mnyanan da khyor ci dbang du bdag ga la ma
171a2(rnying rgyud): go zu se mo dor gzod la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar mnos shig ces bsgo nas bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa la zhugs nas phyir log go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
171a3(rnying rgyud): yang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i sprul pa kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su bsgo ba/ rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung // chos rje 'od dpag med pa rdo rje chos// spyan ras gzigs sbrul hri las rngam chen ston// ngag gi dbang
171a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rta gdong zhal gyis gnon// zhes yongs su bskul bas skul pa rdo rje rta gdong chen pos dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i gnas su snang bar mdzad nas ha ha hi hi hri hu lu hu lu hu lu zhes lhong lhang tshe 'tshar rta skang drag po'i dbyangs phyung ba las/ srin po'i
171a5(rnying rgyud): gru ma yongs su mra zhum zhing bag 'khums pa tsam du gur yang dur khrod kyi bdag po kho na dro bo des rang gI nga rgyal gtum skad du ru tra mu tA mA ra tra zhes bsgrags nas rnam par brjing phyung ste 'gyings pa las zil gyis ma non te slar kho na ngo bo des slar bsgob/
171a6(rnying rgyud): mgrin bu sngon yang khu do lta bus bdag ma non pas khyod kyis bdag rjen pa ma yin te nyid kyi gnas gang yin par bde bar nos shig ces tha'i kha brdab pa byas te/ yang bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa
171a7(rnying rgyud): skyes nas phyir log snyam pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkhang lta bu la gtsang blo mi mngang bas ma log par slar nyan pa las khon ngo bo pa thim par rngams nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi dbang phyug deb mthun 'jug tu khon dga' lhang thim du ha
171b1(rnying rgyud): na/ nga nas de bzhin gshegs pa de sa da bu kho na'i gtsug tu phyung zhabs kho na'i mthil du grung nas rdo rje hrI nas rgyas bsA lus kun du rgyas te kho na des ma bzang pa'ang 'od kyi sgra mthar bton pa ni Ats+tsha ma'o// ci mdzad mur bar mdzod ces bton /
171b2(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngas kho na na'i sgrib pa sbyang ba mdzad nas bde ba kho nar kho ni drag tsug tu byung sten ma mkha' la d+ha'i dbyangs phyung bas srin po'i tshogs bu d+he mar shwor shug tu gyur te zil gyis non cing bag 'khums nas gsol pa/ dpa' na
171b3(rnying rgyud): 'bangs su mchi// ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces zhus pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ris ga spangs pa/ ngas ni khyod ma btul gyis khyod kyi gnyen po rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang gis dbang bsrur ba shin tu
171b4(rnying rgyud): gtumaja ma 'khrug pa ma rungs shing mi bzad pa bdud kyi bdud chen po 'jigs byed 'bar ba zhig 'byung gis de la skyabs su dong cig ces gsungs te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho grang du mi dmigs par gshegs so// de nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i de bzhin
171b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po rnam par babros nas phrin las bzhi yi sgo gang gis gdul ba'i skabs la bab pa brtags na/ gang ni rgyas kyis 'dul ba mi 'drams dbang drag gis 'dal bar bka' ba gros dam par nges par bcad
171b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo yongs su gsung ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol spyod pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcang ba'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu 'gog pas zhi ba la// khros pas phan par mi 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma bcos de nyid las// zhi
171b7(rnying rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod// rnal 'byor tshul can zhi bas kyang // srid pa'i myu gu 'gag zhus na// rnal 'byor yod med stong pa'i mthus// 'gog pa bslang pa smos ce dgos// shin tu rdo skams rlan pa la// gang du 'gog rnams
172a1(rnying rgyud): bslang bar phyir// 'gag med stong ba'i chos nyid las// sna tshogs mjugag da zhin mdzad// zas nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa po nyid med par tshugs kyis bka' bzang ba'amadra gzungs
172a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ shin tu spong pa nan chad la/ dngos pos phran par mi 'gyur te// rgyud gyi byang chub stong nyid las// med 'gyur de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod// stong nyid tshul can stong pas kyang // ci yang med par gnas 'bur na// med pal
172a3(rnying rgyud): byung rnal 'byor ma byas// mthar zad mu zlog spos kyi dgos// shin tu rkun chang bzlog pa dang // gang du med las skyes pa'i phyir// rgyun dang bcas pa'i stong nyid la// tshe gyon kun gyi 'chad par mdzod// ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de
172a4(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu ther drug rtag pa la// med pas phan par mi 'gyur te// snying po byang chub de nyid las// bdag nyid chen por thams cad mdzod/
172a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur tshul can rtag pas// dngos po brtan g.yor byed nas na// bdag nyid chen por lhan grub mthus// ther zug zlog pa smos ci dgos// bdag tu zhen pa zlog pa dang // dngos 'dzin rka mgo bsgyur ba'i phyir// bdag med rtag pa
172a6(rnying rgyud): sa nyi las// byed med ring bzhin nyid du mdzod// ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas h+yan par mi
172a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag phrag nus na// sangs rgyas zhugs rje khom pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos
172b1(rnying rgyud): byung da smra ga dus pa dang // ngam myig paspyad nas/ nga byed// 'bang brtan pa grang dgu las// rlur khrod gAng gadrug rgyur mdzad// rdzas ngas pa dam par bcad do// danas dbazhin gshegs pa rnan gang ba khon nying nga pa/
172b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyis bka ba zen pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu log par zhen pa la// bden pas phan par mi 'gyur te// gsang chen sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs las// thams cad mthun 'jug nyid du mdzod// mjedade spyod tshul can spyod pas
172b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // thams cad bkabyed nus na// thugs rje mdun 'jug mdzod stod kyis// lam log drang srong spros ci dgos// dngos pos dngos po dgrol ba dang // dug gis dug nad bsal ba'i phyir// thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i//
172b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa gar gi phyag char mdzad// ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de nas rab de na gshegs pa nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu 'jungs shing brkam pa la// btang bas phan par mi 'gyur
172b5(rnying rgyud): te// med la mi zad kun 'thung las// thams cad mi zad nor bur mdzod// dkar thub tshul can 'gags pas kyang // tshe gcig 'tsho byar byed nus na// med la 'dod dgur 'thung ba yis// khams gsum gadzang ba smos kyi dgos// 'drung
172b6(rnying rgyud): pathim par bya ba dang // yongs su gdung ba bsal ba hrIr// theg chen gsang ba'i longs spyod pas// nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgyar mdzod// ces nges pa dam par bcad do// de ni srad de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon nu'i gdung dang sna'i tshogs
172b7(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' bcad pa 'amado gsungs pa/ shin tu la log sang ba la// bskul bas brtson par mi 'gyur te// grubatsag med pa'i tshes nyid las/ thams cad bya ba med par mdzod// mig yo'i tshul can gnas pas cing // dam pa'i las
173a1(rnying rgyud): lam gtsung zad na// zlazla gas pa ldan pas// gtanag ngan ca // mas pa rgyud nga phyung// 'amag ba dun ga naman // ma na chu bya drug/ rdzu
173a2(rnying rgyud): par phyag kyar mdzod// zas nges padam par bcad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang po'i gang dang sde'i tshogs gis bkranga' brjid pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ nin+da d+hus ti me rmongs pa pa// brtan byas go bar mi 'gyur te// khyang par
173a3(rnying rgyud): yang mtshungs pa las// thams cad gti mug chen por mdzod// gti mug tshul can rmongs pas kyang // thams cad mun par byed nus na// maM dpyod blang dor med pa yis// khamag gsam rmongs pa smos kyi dgos// mun pa'i skye mched gzhoms
173a4(rnying rgyud): dang // rmongs pa rnam ma bar bya ba'i phyir// gti mug rnam dag ye shes lngas// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs phrug rgyar mdzod// ces nges padam par bcad // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bkas bcad pa'i mdo
173a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa/ shin tu chags shing zhen pa la// gnyen pos phan par mi 'gyur te// chags dbu chen po sa shes byas// thams cad chags pa chen por mdzod// chags pa'i tshul Na ni sprad pas kyang // khams gsum byug tu byed nas
173a6(rnying rgyud): nA// 'dod chags rnam dag chags spyad pas// khyams gsum khyen chags hos ci dgos// 'dod chags mag mcho ma pa dang // chags pas rdzogs pa gcad pa'i phyir// 'dod chags rnam dag ye shes las// 'dod chags kyi
173a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyar mdzad// cesangs pa dam par bca // de nas rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas bcad pa'i dog shin bya ngos po rnyen papa/ bgagangs ldan pa mi 'gyur te// shes ra thangs
173b1(rnying rgyud): las// thams cad mthun 'jug spyod par mdzod// mthun 'jug tshul can mthun pas kyang // khams gsum ldog par byed nus na// thugs rje kur gyi mdzad spyod kyis// 'jig rten blo log smos ci dgos// de la sogs pa mtha' ya
173b2(rnying rgyud): steng // 'jig rten 'jig rten mtha' yas kun// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// drangs te yang dag gsang bar sbyor// khro la byams dang khro tshul mdzod// zhi la zhi ba spong sbyor nyid // drug shul can lnga drag po nyid// g.ye ma la g.yem
173b3(rnying rgyud): dang gnyen por mdzod// zags la chags dang rnam spong nyid// g.yed la sems sdad g.yeng ba nyid// rmongs la khyab par mnyam pa nyid// ri la ting 'dzin ri bo nyid// phrag dog can la phrag dog tshul// de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed// kun
173b4(rnying rgyud): sa / ma
173b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid// ye nas yin par nges pa na// mtha' thub med pa'i sems can rnams// ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa bzhin// ma bkag ma bcos ji bzhin pa rwa// nges pa nyid du gyur pa yi// thabs mchog dpag gis me lang ba'i// mdzad spyod
173b6(rnying rgyud): gar thabs sprin phung gis// ji ltar spyad kyang de nyid la// ma g.yos mi gos dbyings na dpa'// nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo las// mtha' yas dpag tu med pA yi// sgo nas byams cad ma bkag par// ci dga' nyid du bde drangs te// dam pa rnams
173b7(rnying rgyud): kyi nges par mdzod// 'dir ni nan tan drag shul gyis// mi zad 'bar ba'i ye shes las// dur khrod bdag po rab 'jigs pa'i// che mchog 'bar ba'i phyag gyar mdzod// ces nges pa dam par bcad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus
174a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mad chen po las bka' bgos dam pa ba nad par le'u nas rba sta nyi shu lnga pa'o// // lang ka'i bdag par ma da'i dus na kho bo 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa zhag gas shes bzhin du gang yongs su sad pa'i phyir yang 'khor dang /
174a2(rnying rgyud): 'khod par gyur pa de byang chub sems dpa' bskug pa'i go cha blo gos zhabs ldan zhes bya ba zhig la yongs su dris pa/ kye sems dpang chen po yi dgas chen po 'di rgyu ni gang las kyang / rkyen ni ci las kyang / 'bras bu ni cir smin/ rigs ni gar gtogs/
174a3(rnying rgyud): las skal gyi spyod pa ni ci spyod/ ma btul na ci gnod/ btul na ci zhig dgos/ de skad dris pa las/ bskal ba'i go cha chen po des smras pa/ sems dpa'i chen po gsang ba pa'i bdagra po yi dgas chen po 'di gang lags pa'i rgyu rkyen las ni ma byung /
174a4(rnying rgyud): nyes pa 'bad zlog gi rgya rkyen las byung ste/ rgyu ni mun pa'i ri bo las byung ngo // rkyen ni bka' bsgo log pa'i dka' thub drag po las byung ngo // 'bras bu ni sdug bsngal gyi ri bor smin no// rigs ni dA mangs rigs 'khor ba gdol pa 'byung po yi dgas
174a5(rnying rgyud): gsal kyi 'ang ba sa bzhi lta dpa rtag kyispyod do// dede btul na sa can gyi byung na baning po dang nam po'i byod / ldang no// ma nA na dun gyi snying b.rad ci kyipa lam mngon bar gyur
174a6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o sems dpa' chen po 'o na dus 'di ni dras pa bab pa'o// las 'di las kyi mchog go// gsang ba 'di ni gsad pa'i yang gsang ba dam pa'o// thul kun du rab
174a7(rnying rgyud): tu thul/ dus la rib pa'i skabs chen 'dir// las la bapi pa'i sems can 'di// stongs la bab pa'i thugs rje yis// 'du shes bsgyur ba zugs rje'i mchog/ stong gsum ma lus ston pa bas// 'bum gyi char yang mi phong ngo // zhes nye bar
174b1(rnying rgyud): lu'o// de nas de byasnyen gshegs pa thams car tha.u na bug gnas gyur pa zhes bu ma tha brda can du snang banyid la stong sasu ban pa mang dang / rdul brnyan cigs mad pa// thugs kya dag zung ba 'dzin// drug pa brgya la thugs /
174b2(rnying rgyud): na po can// dbanga' po 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// sngon gyi gocha chen po'i mdzung// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gdul dka' drag po 'drul mdzud pa// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// sems dpa' sngon po bar
174b3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i dba' byad can// gtum rngam 'khrug pa ngo bo yis// dur khrod bdag po rab tu rtsom zhes yongs su bathul ba / skyes pa rdo rje 'dzin pa de// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// 'byung po'i rgyal pos dbang du byas/
174b4(rnying rgyud): shAn tu ga tumarngam 'khrug pa des// lha mi 'jig rten badrag la khangadra// bzhin dang mdangs kyar me gsal bar// kun du mog mog po gyur nas// dus ma yin te'i mun pa yang // mun nag smag tu gyur pos 'thibs// tsha dang gling dang du
174b5(rnying rgyud): dang rims// mengs sna tshogs kun duN+Da/ dam rda 'brub dra med pa dang // rnag khrang rdo dang mtshon snang car // sa ma yin par kun du 'byung // skye dman 'tsho ba dang log par gyur// gI ga pa sna tshogs sems can gyis/ na
174b6(rnying rgyud): ta ma thug gardzas sbyin pa'o// chos chud pa'i 'dig rten te// mkhyen tAM drug / gdung byin// rab rnam pa'i brdung gas kyi / rjes kyi rgyu gdong la/ tshig tu 'di na du// ngag gi dbang phyug rdo rje
174b7(rnying rgyud): ngaka'i yul gyi grong rdal gyi// dbus kyi ri bo ma la pa// rgod zed mar rnga mtsho'i ngo // dreg shul yod pa'i rtsa la dong // rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i lU'i// rlung khrod bdag po rdzogs dang bcas// ming ma skabs lings chen po la// khang sa
175a1(rnying rgyud): klaskam da na dza/ sa bsnod ma jugs pa// so myas sa sunas dun na du/ nga na dun na/ rdzu byu maman// snong ba rgyan nam gal// dbang brnyan
175a2(rnying rgyud): du sa pa // / 'a ga zhag
175a3(rnying rgyud): pa sa / sa rgya nas // de ngas shugs / mthol ba ba shegs pa / ga ma bcwam pa dag gis / dbyugs ma thus
175a4(rnying rgyud): dag gyu te// yang dag ny-i la dgod par byagyi// dbangs pa pas ba kun 'das pa// rnyed 'drung gsang 'i da 'i // myan drug med pa'i stenas can rnams po bskul ba'i blan 'arlabs mdzod// rjes rdo badzin pa de
175a5(rnying rgyud): drug tu brtul pa nga / chos kyi dbyings kyi lo myang nas de den gshegs pa thams d+ha ge shis rje ng+ge po'i mengs mye 'i b+hal pa'i ma ltung bar ba'i thigs rje'i sprin phrang nam mkha'i ni thab klas par 'thebs nas 'byur ba chen po gyer dgrar mngon
175a6(rnying rgyud): spyod du mdzad rlu rdo rje d+ha'i tshogs la bkrus bskyob/ sod ban du rab tu sod// NA lI rdo rjes byas dgu yis// 'jig rten glo dgu'i 'dod pa ston// 'jig rten nag po gtum pa'i tshogs// drar khrod skyabs ling sa spyod pa la// rdo rje rtog pa'i bya sgo/
175a7(rnying rgyud): kyi/ 'khor ba mi drul bar byu // dam bcas gcis na pa'i// snying rje chen pa 'oton dren // drirje sa mche tshod par gyis sa drug tu sams/ byos rab dag ma ma// gzigs dang du sbyin /
175b1(rnying rgyud): brjod dga' bya// kAng mya dngag ga nga dun 'grus// byang chub rtan pa thaMd nas ga// thabs can dag yong 'drug byas// don tu gdong smras pa tshogs// nam mthus khams kun myos bka nas// mal la du
175b2(rnying rgyud): lcags// 'khor ba me stongs par du ni// rdzogs rje dbang gis spyan ras gzigs// drug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang // dgongs pa gsang ba gcig cing 'drug// khams gsum yo sgrob snying por dgongs// rngas gsum gtan gas byin
175b3(rnying rgyud): brlabs mdzod// 'khor ba chos nyid spyan ras gzigs// sdug bsngal byang chub pam du mdzad// las nyid rang snar ye shes 'brel// rnam smin kun phyung rdo rje nyid // ye nas je bzhin ma bcos pa'i// rang byung dkyil 'khor chen por dgongs
175b4(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // sgra dang gsung drug rdo rje las// sprul pa'i sras mchog rdo rje 'dzin// gzhon nu bye bas yang mdzad// thams cad dbyer gyi sprin phung bzhin// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthal klas par// ma la yA li skye hA
175b5(rnying rgyud): lcags// muthun 'jug thubs kyi cha byang du// gang 'dir gyis pa'i spyod pa yis// bdud kyi spyod yul bun mdzad do// 'jig rten khams su dris par bstan// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen phyogs las bzhi rdo sgos
175b6(rnying rgyud): loT zhes bya steshA drug pa'o// / de nas mthun 'jug skyes zedes// man gang gzigs na// las skyed nas drug pa / bzhis ni dbyung byas pa// rnam par sbyin pa'i dngos po ni// bamu thar pam pa
175b7(rnying rgyud): rtsar// khrag dang bshing gci sha chen dang // rkang dang klad pa klang chos dang // rnag dang chu ser lo sogs pa'i// 'dam gyis phu ma yongs su bskor// bu dang shin tu 'bru chen po// slang ma spang rgod brang pi dang // sbrul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs// kang
176a1(rnying rgyud): ka kha nye gzhug pa'i tshogs// ce snang stag ser la sogs pa'i// gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis bskor// lA y-i sde dpon kA rba na// bu mo r+g+had ma ma srid dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug wA chen gyi// ma skyeng chung ma bu mo rnams// grogs
176a2(rnying rgyud): nas dbang du byas pa yi// sbas dang gyi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad la sogs// ma mo phra men gnod sbyin mo// srin mo shu za khrag 'phrog ma// bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla kun ma// blon mo dmag dpon sde dpon ma// ru dpon pho nya
176a3(rnying rgyud): mngag par bcas// rang dang rten dang lag char bzlas// tse bag+h+nAM b+haSh+maSh+Ta nyan bka' sdong 'khor// skrod gtong rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod// srin po'i bu mo dri zla brgyad// stug seng wa spyang brgyad tshigs dang // dur bya bya rogA drug pa'i tshogs// bsto
176a4(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod// srin po'i nye gnas chen mo brgyad/ kau r-i tse rI pra mo ha// be t+ta pi dadapuk+ka si// g+hasmA ri dwang sma sha ni// tsaN+Da li la sogs pa yi// gtum zhing rngam pa'i ma tshogs ma// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs su 'khod// dur
176a5(rnying rgyud): rgyu ma ga m+bu par smyi na/ can pa / // stong ba ga s+ho gsus/ ba pa tu ba ma mdu// ra ma gag
176a6(rnying rgyud): pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// bA ma ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis// brtan par btab pa'i nang bdagra mo// nye gnas kro d+hi shwa ri ma// thod phyogs khrag gis bkang ba dang // 'bru mar rdzas lnga chang
176a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba// rtag par rang gi longs spyod 'don// chags pas smyos shing bsam pas na// 'dod pa'i dbang mo brkam par grags// rba rje'i rtsamathong rdal ro// 'bar 'chen po'i gar dran yi// bcom ldan dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir// the ngo
176b1(rnying rgyud): brtul ba'i 'khor 'dus pa// 'jig rten dbang phyub mthu chen rnams// phal cher las la gra ma skabs su// dpal chen rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i// de nyid par drag dngos min pa'i// gzhon nu snum nas bton pa'i sras// rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtags// mthing
176b2(rnying rgyud): gnag khro gnyer ral ba can// 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mdzad// dur khyod bdag po ji bzhin du// dbu dang phyag zhabs der mdzad de// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// bshung ba lnga ni bdud rtsi ban+d+ha ra// thams cad stong nyid bdud rtser sbyangs// te gan
176b3(rnying rgyud): la sogs 'khor mo rnams// spyod la mchags ye shes dang // byas la ni sogs phrin las kyis// mthun 'jug khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis// dbang bsdus dang sbyangs sprul pa ni// sems dpa' ro shes sprul pa'i rdzogs// ko tso la sogs mchogs
176b4(rnying rgyud): dang // seng stag la sogs lus du snang // 'dod pa'i dbang mo bkam pa des// chags pa'i dbang gis gang mthong ba// s+thir ni rang gi khyo ba dag ste// lhag pa'i gzo tshon 'bar bar mthong // snyam pa'i dbang gi the tshom skyes// e mdze bdag gi
176b5(rnying rgyud): bdag po pasdu// shin tu 'od 'ab rAg rkyen po// 'di ji lta ba sprul ba zhig/ snyam du yid gnyis rtog pa las// zabapa mchog rdo rje gzhon nu des// srin skad thang gsum byung ba las// the tshom rtog pa chad par gyur// chags pa'i dbang gis
176b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// sku la nges par 'khril ba ni// tsan dan sbrul gyi sdong po lnga// tshud pas bdas pa'i sbal 'khrel pas// mi rtog tshad po'i gdung snrel ltar// gang la tshugs pa mi mnga' bar// gang gi gdung ba rnam par sel// de nas sleb
176b7(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa des// thams cad kyi dga' 'byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu'i snying por// nye ba'i reg pa 'ang brjod pas// bya ba thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ oM sbyar gu/ aH/ \u0f88\u0f90 pheM/ u m+b+ha kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ yang dag dngos min tshe 'phrul
177a1(rnying rgyud): ma du rnam 'phrul ba sa// ga ngapas / dun // ba pa / sar+b+ba / lda // na / 'dub sa
177a2(rnying rgyud): du / de sa na // das pa das
177a3(rnying rgyud): rnam / na ga //
177a4(rnying rgyud): ni'i / dade phyi 'i skye de/ bya gas bya me ni zla sbyi padem pa'i byung / gsang smra ga pang bdag parjod/ na pa dang drug par / 'dug gnas
177a5(rnying rgyud): nga/ na sri 'i ga pa 'a nga// na nam gyun// bdag gnas te// de rnam pa rjon/ tsa nag sa
177a6(rnying rgyud): rIng gi gro ba dag yon dran te// e ma'o rdeg po dpa' bo rjod// gang 'di ngan du rtog pa'i tshig/ 'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam chi// dab na khyod kyi dgongs pa gla // deng bran tan ldan nyi pa ti// kho na 'am tsa sbyar bya// dpa' bo sgeg po zhangam
177a7(rnying rgyud): nyid// phan na pa rtag/ ga ci byud/ da kyi tsu pa'o/ dngas sa thogs pas 'drud pa dang / mang dgas so du drag mings dge ba'i bas su nga / den nga po bdas pa'o//
177b1(rnying rgyud): 'thon 'khyung ba'i// thabs gsum grag pa'i sgra phyung bas// dpal gyi rngam skad drag po yis// drag po drag mo la sogs brgyal// de las slar log mthong snang ba// 'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la// sngo gnag rngam pa'i ral pa can// dbu dbu bya
177b2(rnying rgyud): ni brngu brgyad pa// rdo rje gshog pas par snang khebs// ba sA lcags kyu bzegs 'dra ba'i// sdom deng sdig dang glegs dang sbal// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis sa gzhi khebs// thod sgrogs stir gyu zhags dang // ti zla khyung dang drug pa khwa/
177b3(rnying rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa dang // za ma tog dang rdul yub dz+ra// ri rab spyi skor stong gsum baphen// klu dbang 'bram gyis brgyan cing bklubs// dus mtha'i bskal pa me ltar 'bar// khro gnyer snang mig 'ab ba yi// nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras gzigs/
177b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad 'bar bas lha brgyad gnon// rdo rje srin po khro bor gyur// lha dang bdud las rnam par grags// de nas yi dwags drag po de// kho na'i sems rtog rtas nas kyang // nga rgyal drag po'i gtum skad kyis// 'khor gyi dbang phyug rnam par bskul/
