207a3(rnying rgyud): yis// rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te// gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa ni// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig go// zhes gsol to// de nas 'dod chags can rnams kyi bdag po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dbang phyug chen po bdag
207a4(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ ma dang bu mo sring mo dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bud med la// 'dod pa bas ni chags spyod pa// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams kyis 'di skad
207a5(rnying rgyud): ces gsol pa/ 'jigs byed chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can thams cad kyi// srog ni shin tu phrogs nas kyang // sha dang khrag la longs spyod pa// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes
207a6(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jigs byed chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ nor gyi bdag po thams cad la// gser la sogs pa blangs nas ni// rang gi 'dod par longs spyod
207a7(rnying rgyud): pa// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rtog pa can rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yid bzhin rtog pa'i rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gang gi mgo zad bcad nas ni// dge mtshan
207b1(rnying rgyud): gas de su 'chang ba// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rigs ngan sde sha can rnams kyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// mnga' thang rtogs pa'i rgyal po bdag cag
207b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ ba lang khyi sha rta sha dang // mi sha glang chen sha la sogs// zos na yon tan thams cad 'grub// bdag cag rnams kyi dmachog de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas srin mo khrag 'phrog ma rnams kyis 'di skad
207b3(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// khrag 'thung rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ srog chags dag ni thams cad kun// bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag/ 'jungs na gzig bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de
207b4(rnying rgyud): lags so zhes gsol to// de nas phra men ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// cho 'phrul chen po'i mnga' bdag bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ thod rus rkang dang 'bru mar khrag/ chang dang a mr-i tar sbyar ba// rdzu 'phrul grub
207b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam rdzas te// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rigs ngan ngan skyugs can rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gtum rngam chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste// sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag
207b6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dam rdzas te// nad rnams ma lus 'joms par byed// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas bud med rnams kyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sgeg po chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam
207b7(rnying rgyud): ga ni 'di lta ste/ bro gar glu tshig snyan dngags dang // 'jo tshul stabs kyis yid phrogs te// bsten pa thabs kyis 'khrig spyod pa// 'di dag dka' ba'i dam tshig ste// bdag cag rnams kyi dam chog de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas sho par
208a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// ngag gi dbang phyug bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gzhan gyis dpag par dka' ba'i phyir// ngag gi sprul pa 'tsham smra ba// slu ba chen po'i mchog yin te// bdag cag
208a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// skyes bu yang dag chen po bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ yang dag dang du kun rig na// che chung las gnyis gang byas kyang //
208a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur na// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas gsang tshig bsten pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ bshang gci zag
208a4(rnying rgyud): dang sol khu gos// brgya 'am spyong du gyon nas ni// ling ga gcad na sangs rgyas 'jigs// gsang sngags gsang pa'i dam tshig go zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gad+ha ma 'dres pa yongs su mi 'gog pa'i dam tshig bka'
208a5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ gang 'dir 'dus pa'i skal ldan kun// so so'i mos pa tha dad pa'i// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ni// yongs su rdzogs par blang bar byos// gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms byed cing // mtshams med lnga po spyod bzhin du// bdag nyid
208a6(rnying rgyud): rlon por dmigs pa de// sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i snod du gsungs// ma dang bu mo sring mo dang // rgya ba'i bud med thams cad la// 'dod pa bas ni chags spyad na// de dag 'grub pa'i snod du gsungs// gsod la dga' ba gang dag gis//
208a7(rnying rgyud): srog gi dbang po rgyun bcad nas// sha rus za zhing khrig 'thung ba// yang dag dam tshig chen po yin// nor gyi bdag po'i gter khungs nas// gser la sogs pa ma byin par// blangs nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod pa// 'di ni yang dag dam tshig
208b1(rnying rgyud): yin// rnal 'byor rig pa'i blo can gyis// gang gis mgo rjod bcad nas ni// dur khrod sdod la chos shes pa// yang dag lta ba'i dmachog ste// 'dod pa'i dmachog dam pa'o// ba lang khye shA d+ha shA dang / sha chanA glang pa mchog yan ta/
208b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i zas yin pas// gzhan na bza' bar mi bya'o// dmar chen khrag gi rgya mdzel// gang zhig thung bar byed pa de// khrag 'thung kun g+hi dam chog ste// zad par 'thung na gzi byin che// tho gar g+ha chog la sogs pas// bud da
208b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad bsten nus ni// 'dod pas log par spyod 'gyur ba// chos nyid dam tshig chen po yin// gang nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir// med las yod sgra yod las med// yul la mthun 'jug brdzun smra ba// sangs rgyas bka' yi dam tshig
208b4(rnying rgyud): yin// gang dag thog ma med pa nas// gang 'khyams rang gis nyes pa'o zhes// spro brgyad dag ni brdzun smra ba// sangs rgyas gsung gi dam tshig yin// bye brag thams cad gcig pas na// las kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ba// ma nor ma bcos dam
208b5(rnying rgyud): tshig ste// nam smin med pa'i dem tshig yin// mig yo mi 'byur bri bskyod pa// dmigs pas spyod med med migs kyang // stong pa med pa gang yin pa// me g.yo'i dam tshig chen pog// de nyid chen por kun gcig pas// thang dang dor ba yod
208b6(rnying rgyud): med do// gnyis su snang ba'i chos rnams kun// de nyid chen por yongs kyis gcig/ dkar po nag po gang 'di la// rgyu dang 'bras bu so so yang // num mkha' bzhin te med pas na// mnyam pa'i dam tshig chen po yin// mnyam nyid rig pa'i
208b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po las// bye brag rnam pa yongs kyis med// rang gis rnyed la gzhan gyis min// rang 'byung chen po'i dam tshig yin// bshang gci zag pa'i gos gyon te// ling ga skye ba rgyun bcad na// skye ba rnam grangs brgya snyed du// bzlas na de nyid
209a1(rnying rgyud): dar sbyar na// sangs rgyas gzugs sku ji snyed pa// chos su nyid du 'jig 'gyur na// rdo rje sngags kyi dam chog yin// 'dod pas spyod pa'i longs spyod lnga// 'dod pa bas ni chags spyod na// chos nyid can gyi dam chag ste// 'ad
209a2(rnying rgyud): po nyid kyi dam zhes bka' stsal pas/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams rab tu mgu zhing drangs nas kun gyis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ e mdo yid bzhin mdzad pa'i rgyal po bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa drangs so// bdag cug
209a3(rnying rgyud): kyi gtso bo lags so// bdag cag rnams kyi rgyal po lags so// bdag rtag ma bcos pa'i dam tshig tu gzung du gsol zhes gsol pa las/ lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des bkang stsal pa/ a ho/ yin no// legs so//
209a4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dam pa de nye bar zung shig/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes gang de nyid las mi 'da' bar gzung ngo // lad ka'i bdag po de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das ni bdag
209a5(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyi sgron ma lags na/ bdag cag rnams da rang gi dam chog 'di la gnas na rigs ni gang 'dzin par 'gyur// go 'phang ni gad du thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa las/ lang ka
209a6(rnying rgyud): bdag po bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rang rang gi dam tshig la gnas na ji ltar 'gyur pa dag bshad kyis nyon cig/ e ma'o thod pa can gyi tshogs// khyod kyimi smras pa tshig 'di rnams// mdud pas brdungs pa'i chog
209a7(rnying rgyud): yin te// nam yang grol bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag yang dag ces smra ba// yang dag nyid kyang mdud pa ste// marung ba dgrol bar ma byas na// tha ram phyed par mi 'gyur ro// mtshams mod la sogs byed pa dang // gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms
209b1(rnying rgyud): yis// rnam par grol bar myi 'gyur te// 'di ni bdud kyi las zhes bshad// chags pa'i las sam myong ba dag/ chags pa'i dbang gis der rmongs te// de dag de yi grong khyer du// gnas 'gyur de yi sems can yin// gang du sdang bas gsod/
209b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i las// gang gi lus la srog phul nas// shan pa gsod pa'i rigs dag tu// lhung 'gyur sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin// rgyal ba rnams ni rnam dag pas// gang tshe bder gshegs rgyal ba'i zhal/ smad pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs kyis// yongs
209b3(rnying rgyud): su bstabs pa gang byas pa// de tshe las ni rnam smin gyis// zar med nad kyis bzung nas ni// ngan stegs 'dam du gying bar 'gyur// sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas// rku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste// gang gis zos pa'i lus rnams la// dri
209b4(rnying rgyud): ba dudu sunas/ yadas dang ba sa bas par byed// ga sa da ma/ da da dun// 'du spyod pa// phyog pa ga pa sa// dug
209b5(rnying rgyud): po yin// dkar nag las la khyad med ces// thams cad khra bor spyod pa ni// rigs med rigs chad log pa'i rigs// 'bras bu log pa'i khams su 'gyur// bder gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la// yan lag tshig tu ma dag na//
209b6(rnying rgyud): nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni// gang gi dus rnams thams cad du// dbang po yan lag ma tshang zhing // dran pa'i snying po nyams par 'gyur// bder gshegs rgyal ba sgom zlos pa// cha mthun bcos pa'i cho 'phrul ltar// gang gis der brtags
209b7(rnying rgyud): der red nas// las kyi srin po rig 'dzin yin// rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad kun// gang gis de dang der brtags na// bram ze mi sdug lugs rig 'dzin// chu srin nya sogs yan lag 'byung // ting 'dzin rtog pa thams cad kun// gang gis
210a1(rnying rgyud): de dang der brtags na// ci yang rtog cing chags pa yi// 'dzin pa'i phur pa chen por 'ju/ AHdang dz+nyA la sogs pa yi// rgyu yi yi ge thams cad kun// de dag sa sor der brtags na// tsan dan sbrul gadrug la sogs pa/
210a2(rnying rgyud): ltung 'gyur rtog pa'i gags chen yid// khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas chen lnga// dngos po khyo nar der brtags na// 'byung po khrag gi dri sdom pa'o// lus lan rigs ni 'don pa yin// ma mo rngam pa'i cha lugs su// gang gi rtog pa der brdu
210a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang btsan bran mo'i tshogs// de 'dra nyid du nges brtags na// gnod sbyin nag mo'i tshogs su 'gyur// gzhan gyi tshe la 'tshe ba yin// des na mdud pa dam po 'dri// bskur du lci ba'i gdos yin te// log par lta bas mig long bas//
210a4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi nor bu rin chen de// rtag chad khams su stong par 'gyur/ zhes bka' stsal pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag rtog pa'i nad kyis zin cing rang rang gi dam tshig las log par rig nas/ e ma'o sgyu ma'i bdag pos ni bdag cag
210a5(rnying rgyud): bsdus so/ zhes rmag chad na sa ngus so// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag rang rang gi rgyud la rnam par ltos shig ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshogs de drug gis las kyi rgyud bya ba ji lta
210a6(rnying rgyud): yin pa bltas na thams cad me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin snang bar gyur te/ lang ka'i bdag po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni log pa'i dka' thub tu gyur
210b1(rnying rgyud): par nges na 'di dag nyid yang dag pa'i dka' rngub tu mdzad par gsol// ji ltar rang rang gi dam tshig rnams ma bkag par spyod bzhin du chos nyid kyi dka' thub tu mdzad du gsol/ de cing slad du zhe na/ bdag cag ni rang rang gi dka' thub la chags
210b2(rnying rgyud): shing zhen pa lags so// chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta thad cir yang 'gyur ba lags so// theg pa chen po'i sgoni bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu lags so// de bzhin du nam mkha' lte bu dang / sa chen po lta bu dang / rlung chen po lta bu lags so// sangs
210b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thabs rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag lags pas se sa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin pa shad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des dgyes pa chen po'i bzhed pa mang de nas kye rigs kyi bu dag theg pa
210b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i don de ltar zhu ba ni legs na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang the tshom skye ba yin na khyed rnams lta ci smos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das the tshom
210b5(rnying rgyud): skye bar bgyid pa ni nges pa ma mchis pa lags na/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nges pa can lags na nges pa ma mchis pa'i chos 'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye
210b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs chos thams cad nges pa med par nga smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ther zug tu red pa'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// de bas na khyed rnams kyi rang rang gi dam tshig la yang nges pa med de/ skye ba 'di las gzhan dpag tu med pa
210b7(rnying rgyud): blangs pa dang len pa'i skabs su so so'i skye ba tha dad pa de bzhin du mos pa dang / las dang / skal ba dang / gnas dang / sde dang / sha tshugs dang / rigs dang / kha dog dang / 'tsho ba dang / lta ba dang / spyod pa tha dad na/ da khyod kyis nges par gang
211a1(rnying rgyud): la gzung // de'i phyir chos thams cad nges pa med par nga smra'o// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ 'o na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig rnams nges pas bzung na ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
211a2(rnying rgyud): pa// 'dus pa'i tshogs 'di lta ste// mtshams med lnga yi dam tshig ni// dam tshig ting 'dzin shes rab dang // byang chub sems dang snying rje ldan// bar mtshams med par rgyun mi gcad// 'di ni mtshams med dam tshig yin// chags pa chen
211a3(rnying rgyud): po'i dam tshig ni// 'khor ba dang ni chos nyid las// shes rab snying rje mi gtong ba// 'di ni chags pa'i dam tshig yin// ma dang bu mo sring mo ni// chos nyid dang ni ye shes lnga// rang las byung ba'i shes rab ni// de bzhin nyid kyi gzungs su
211a4(rnying rgyud): bshad// gang la skye ba med bstan na// srog gi dbang po mi len pa'i// skye ba'i rgyun ni chud pa dang // rnams cad stong par bcom pa ni// srog bcud pa zhes de la bya// dngos po med las dngos por ston// dngos por snang la med smra ba// rgyal ba kun
211a5(rnying rgyud): gyi bka' yin te// slu ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// gzhan gyi yid bzhin nor bu la// rjes su mos pa'i 'od zer gyis// blangs nas byang chub 'dzeg pa dang // de nyid lcags kyus len pa ni// ma byin len pa'i dam tshig yin// de nyid chen po de 'des
211a6(rnying rgyud): byas// mtshan ma zhin las log spong ba// 'dod pas log par spyod pa ste// sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig ting 'dzin shes rab dang // sems nyid snying rje chen po lnga// sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag/ rnam pa lnga po sbyar ba 'di//
211a7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi yo byad yin// yo byad 'di dang ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// log par 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang // lha dang nyon mongs las nyon mongs// 'dod pa bdun lnga nyid sbyar te// de la'ang de skad bsdigs pa
211b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// log par spyod pa'i lta ba lnga// sme sha lA zhes grags pa ste// des na lta ba mi gtsang bas// yang dag lta las ltos na sde// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag
211b2(rnying rgyud): gis skye ba med pa'i don mthong bas shin tu yang ngo mtshang bar gyur te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on bdag cag gi dam tshig 'drirna mas theg pa chen por ma gsol tam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i tshogs so so'i dam tshig rnams theg
211b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par ni ma bkag go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma bkag pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar nam mkha'i rang bzhin du// snang srid ma bkag snang ba bzhin/
211b4(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po'i nam mkha' 'dir// lha spyod thams cad ma bkug ste// de'i phyir thams cad nam mkha' sdang zhes gsungs pas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad ngoms shing ngo mtshar du gyur te ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin
211b5(rnying rgyud): du bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i tsho gas khyod rnams kyis ci zhig thos nas dz+ra/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yun gyi don srid chen po 'dil ba bdag cag la sar ma bstan pa thags rje ri chung zhes gsol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
211b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs dang dganas mkha'ang / rang rang gi sred pa / dra bas panas pa da za ste/ rlung dang kun ma mkhan tad dum ba la gang gas / myed
211b7(rnying rgyud): nyid rig par 'gyur te/ bag bzhi bskums/ yan lags la brdabs nas lus gdan khrir phul te/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyong zhing rna bas chos nyan pas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong ste/ rig 'dzin lus kyi seng ge dang / rta dang glang po la sogs
212a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhabs kyi gdan tha'i bya ba mongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs nas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa mdo chen po las rmongs pa'i stsal bslad mthun dkrol ba'i yang sgra sum na drug pag// / bam pa drug par thub pa/ dan
212a2(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yongs su dri ba dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gis gang la brgyad de grags pa'i gsang ba dam pa de sngon du byung ba spyad pa spyod pa grags pa'i
212a3(rnying rgyud): gtam rgyud de skad brjod pa rnam par brjod pa lags zhes smras pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po sngon du byung ba'i gtam rgyad gsang ba dam pa spyad pa spyod par grags pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis bcom
212a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba dam pa gang gis spyad pas legs pa dang / nyes pa'i spyod pa ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan
212a5(rnying rgyud): 'dis des bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngags dam pa gang gis smad pa spyod pa ni rab tu dka' bar shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba dam pa ni shin tu me dang 'dra ste/ ji ltar me ni rgyun du bcangs shing
212a6(rnying rgyud): smad legs na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun du spyad par 'dod pa 'byung ngo // me nyid dri lta ba de bzhin du swA trA~MHsa na me'i phung po chen por gyur te/ gang spyod par byed pa de yang bsregs// khyim nas khyim yang bsregs// rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang
212a7(rnying rgyud): chog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngogs 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/ chu gang gi thabs kyis zin no ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung ngo // gang chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la mi mkhas pa ni gang spyod par byed pa de nyid g.yang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
212b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dam pa 'di na badrug pa'i gcan gArba nA dang 'dra ste/ gang gdug pa'i gtsun gzan ni gzhan gyi srog/ gcod par byed cing gzhan dag 'joms par zad na yad+ma/ gang thabs la mkhas pa dang lta ba bzhin dbang du 'jug/ byang thags/
212b2(rnying rgyud): kyis ma zin na ni rang gi srog la 'bab par byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags 'di ni sbrul gyi mgro la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/ gang ji ltar thabs kyis zin nu rin po che de la dga' ba der spyad du yod la/ gang gi thabs kyis ma
212b3(rnying rgyud): zin na tshe dang bral bar byed do// gzhan yang ldum bu lang tang tshe dang 'dra ste/ gang gi thabs kyis zin na tshad nad drag po yang gcod par byed la/ gang thabs kyis ma zin na srog dang 'bral bar yang byed de/ de ltar na gang thabs kyis zin pa ni
212b4(rnying rgyud): dug 'gyur rtsi dang / gser 'gyur rtsi dang / mun gyur gyi sgron ma bzhin du chung ngus chen po 'joms par nus te/ gang phyin ci ma log par nges pa nyid kyis thams cad de kho na nyid du 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de lta bas na gsang ba dam pa
212b5(rnying rgyud): 'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon du byung bar spyad par spyod pa dag gsang ba dam pa ngos ma zin pas log pa'i lam du byung ba yang yod do// gang thabs la mkhas pas ngos zin pa ma nor ba'i lam du byung ba yang yod pas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gang
212b6(rnying rgyud): sang po dam pa ngos zin pa'i thabs kyi sprin chen pos spyad pa spyod pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang du gsang sngags log pa'i lam ni gang
212b7(rnying rgyud): lags/ gang ma nor ba'i lam pa ni gang lags/ bdag cog rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs
213a1(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ brgyad de grags pas gang spyod pa// gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// ji lta de ltar gtan la dbab// 'di ni yang dag gsang ba'i lam// gang du log pa'i chos rnams dang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying pa
213a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis// btags pa ming gi sgra gcig phyir// nges pa'i rtags de zin par bya// theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags 'di// mthun 'jug thabs kyi sgrar bstan pas// phyi rol gzhan du 'gyur srid phyir// tshig dang sgra la don mi bzhag/ dam pa rnams
213a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dgongs pa 'di// dpe'am tshad ma 'am gtan tshigs sam// rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis// rtogs par nus pa ma yin no// dgongs don gsang ba'i snying po la// gang gi blo ni ma 'byor par// su zhig smra bar brtson pa de// ma smras na ni mi
213a4(rnying rgyud): 'tsho 'am ci// de bzhin spyod dang ldan pa dang // sgrub dang rtog dpyod byed pa rnams// don la des blo ma rnyed par// ma spyad na ni ci zhig nyes// ci phyir gsang sngags rgya mtsho 'di// dper na gang gi sbrid bsangs bzhin// dam pa'i bka' tshig re re la'ang //
213a5(rnying rgyud): don ni tha dad du mar 'byung // des ni gsang sngags dam par don// mu rtogs bzhin du gang smra ba// gang gis mtshams med lnga byas pas// ldog sgra'i sdig de de bas lci// gsang ba nyid la gol ba yi// gsang bar smra ba'i log sred can// gsang
213a6(rnying rgyud): sngags tshogs zin gyur na// gang gis 'tsho ba srog bcad kyang // de ni nyes pas mi 'gyur zhes// log par kha lo sbyar ba 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe ni// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bram ze 'tsho ba'i log sred cen// log sku rgyu spyong dbang
213a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba'o// gang 'dir log par spyod rgyas pas// kun kyang log pa nyid la 'jug/ de la gsang bar sgra mtshon nas// gos sngags de la mngon spyod 'byung// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'dres pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du gzhan 'byung na
213b1(rnying rgyud): de min 'dra gzhan spyod pa'o// gang du 'di sbyar log pa'i chos// gsang sngags dam pa'i chog dang sa// gcig la ma gtsigs sol// rmongs pa'i mun par gang snang ba// sngags pa bdud kyi las byud de// shi nas dmyal ba chen por 'gro// tso phyir mA
213b2(rnying rgyud): bsam zin phyir// bdud dang srin pa'i spyod pal// dga' mgur spyad cing 'dod dpur 'jol// de la bug chag sna sbyin pa'i mthus// dmyal bar dbang pa brgyad kyi yang // rdo rje dmyal ba chen por ltung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na sman/
213b3(rnying rgyud): byung ba// log pa'i stobs ldan ya mtshan can// log zhen sdug bsngal skye gtsug pa'o// e ma'o 'gro ba rnam mi grol// ci phyer 'ong ba'i dus rnams su// g.yo can bcos pa'i gsang tshig gis// dri med gsang ba'i bstan pa rnams// dkrugs 'gyu
213b4(rnying rgyud): bka' bskaskrad gzung bor nas// don med log chos rgyas par 'gyur// gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te// rtsa ba nyid las gyur par zad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// 'di par ma gyur bskrad pa can// de rgyung dran pas de nyi
213b5(rnying rgyud): nga/ ma na phyi / ni mag bzhi ga gas ma / demyang nan/ 'das pa smin na byung ba// las zag
213b6(rnying rgyud): pa// log zhen log sde drug brgyad pa'o// gang la mig zhen log dbang gis// log zlos ldog mthong gtsor bzung nas// lha sgo kun du mi 'jug cing // rmongs pa'i lta bsu brtan par gnas// de yid ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngan
213b7(rnying rgyud): nga ba// log lha gcig tu zhen sems pa// char ka nag po kun rmongs pa'o// gang 'dir bcing ba lngas bcings nas// rang gi che ba'i thabs bzung ste// rtog dpyod tsam yang mo 'jug pa// glang chen myos pa rmongs 'dra 'byung // de yang ji lta
214a1(rnying rgyud): zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid gcig pur chos smra ba// log phyogs gcig pur spyod pa'o// gang du dmus long lam zhugs pa// yid kyis gom pa'i tshad dpags nas// nyam nga'i lam du rgyag pa ltar// tshod
214a2(rnying rgyud): dpags tsam la gtsor 'dzin 'gyung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon bung ba// gang du mun pas zin pa yi// brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin lnga sde pa'o// lud med rnal 'byor sgom pa dang // chos med chos su smra ba dang // sdig can smon pa'i
214a3(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs la// dpa' brtul skyod pa ched spyod 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang gi tshad mas ma gzhal ba'i// mu tsor smra ba sde bzhi pa'o// don med 'dug la brtson pa dang // lugs ma la sogs gzugs brtan dag
214a4(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin po yi// gang du rigs pa'i ri bo 'byung // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du chub kun bkag pa// mnyam par 'jug pa bdun sde pa'o// sbas pa'i don rnams sgrar bsgyur nas// dpyod khongs
214a5(rnying rgyud): tsam du byed pa rnams// steng du mi 'bab gol sar 'gro// sku gsung thugs kyi sgra byed yin// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na// de skad gsang ba mchog des bshad// gzhan yang thabs ldan 'di lta ste// de nas 'khor der 'dus phyir pa'i// rnal 'byor
214a6(rnying rgyud): theg pa mchog smod pa'o// tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba la// gang der mos pa chud spyod pa'i// rnal 'byor grags ldan zhes bya bas// 'di skad gal du dri pa dris// dam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i 'od// gang 'dir dam pa spyod do zhes// shin tu dman pa'i las
214a7(rnying rgyud): spyod pa// de yi sman pa tha dad phyir// mun pa snang bar mi 'gyur zhing // dman po dam par ga la 'gyur// dper na ma tho sar bgrod 'dod pa// gzhol phyogs lam du 'bab pa bzhin// go 'phang chen po mthong 'dod pa// ngan 'gro ya nga'i rgyud du zhugs/
214b1(rnying rgyud): zhig btung ba'i chu 'dod pa// smig rgya bsnyags pas tshim med ltar // dman pa dam par smin 'dod pa// mnyam la dman spyod 'gyur ma yin// sbrul 'bras khyung gis brnos 'gyur yang // phyin ci log 'gyur mi srid pas// de nyid kho nar snang ba
214b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// dman pa ma par 'gyur mi srid// gang gi gsang ba las log pa'i// gang 'dir log spyong dman pa dag/ thams cad rang bzhin med stong pas// nyon mongs byang chub stong mnyam zer// 'tsho ba'i sman dang 'chi ba'i dug/ 'gyeng pas bskyed par
214b3(rnying rgyud): rga gcig kyang // 'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa'i mthu// de nyid mi mthun so sor snang // des na gang 'dir la la zhig/ 'byung bas bskyed pas gcig mnyam zhes// dug kyang za zhing btung ngam ci// de bzhin dam pa dman pa'i las// rang bzhin med par don
214b4(rnying rgyud): gcig kyang // mnyam zhes dam pa nyid bzhag cing // dman pa ched du snod dum ci// des na dam pa dman pa dang // gtsang dang mi gtsang che chung gnyis// bzang ngan bde sdug la sogs dang // bsti gnas sbyad byar snyoms med pa// mnyam sbyor rtags
214b5(rnying rgyud): yin zhe na// dug dang kha zas bde sdug rnams// mi mnyam mnyam par ga la snyoms// ma bcos mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// glo bur las kyis mi mnyam ste// nam mkha' dri med ye nas gsal// dag par bya gyir 'khru 'dod 'dra'o// gang du nad rnams
214b6(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i sman// nad med rnams kyi drug tu 'gyur// lha log 'jig rten dang ba'i thab pa// nasu mar spyod na nyes par nges// mthun 'jug spyod pazang ba'i thabs// gang gi dbang du spyod byed pa// gang spobs rig dang ldan pa yis// mi mthun bcom
214b7(rnying rgyud): nas mthun 'gyur ba zhin// tshig mthun don ldan dam pa pas// ji ltar rigs pa de ltar ngos/ chub pas khe nam gyi// grags pa drid kying gdang med par// gsu rmugs pas rig 'gra bzlas na// gdan dpa nyid brlag par 'jur
215a1(rnying rgyud): de bkren dmya par bcos pa yi// khe dang grags pa sa sems stong // log sred dang ba'i mthun spyod pa// yang dag dam par nges ban nas// mig ga lam nyid stA sma na// bdag srung gzhan badrug dman ba // rnams cadag
215a2(rnying rgyud): gizeg tshad dang // go dang rtogs dang nus tshwad dang // gang du 'dul tshang ma gtogs pa// tshad las 'das na yul med do// 'das na 'das pa nyid du 'gyur// gang yang tshad las 'das pa ni// zas kyang drug tu 'gyur bzhin du// dug chen za ba'i smyon pa de// dam
215a3(rnying rgyud): pas kyang ni mi rigs so// gang dag gang gis bcings pa las// de nyid ma grol ma thar par// thams cad thams cad sgrol ba yi// srub chen po de ci zhig/ de nyid ma rig ma grol zhing // de yi sems dag ma byung na// sangs rgyas sa la ngos bzhag
215a4(rnying rgyud): kAng // de nyid mthong ba dmyal ba'i gnas// de rig de yi don ldan na// dmyal chen de dag zhing khams dag/ gsang de'i snying po ku ni khyab kyang // de rigra de dang ma ldan na// long ba'i mdun du gzugs bstan ltar// gti mug 'khor ba'i mun pa
215a5(rnying rgyud): yin// de skad gal du dris pa las// tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba yi// rnal 'byor dam pa theg chen pos// rnal 'byor mos pa chung spyod pa// grags pa'i tshul ldan bya ba la// dam par nges pa'i tshig smras pa// gang 'dor mos pa chung 'dzin
215a6(rnying rgyud): grags pa'i tshul 'dzin bya ba khyod// gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas nyid 'di ma gtogs pa// gang gi spyod yul ma yin pas// tshul 'dra tsam gyis mi 'grub po// gang 'dir dad mos 'dod nus nAn// de nyid de la der bltas na/
215a7(rnying rgyud): de la de sbyor de nyid de// de dag tsam ni theg tshad yin// gang 'di theg pa mang bshad pa// tha dad yod pa ma yin te// mos pa tha dad drang ba'i phyir// thabs kyi sgo ni mang por bshad// de kun mos pa ma bkag pa'i// dran pa'i thabs su sbyar ba
215b1(rnying rgyud): na// kun la nges pa'i blo mi bzhag/ gang du nges pa gcig nyid la'o// kun shong kun 'jug 'di bde bas// theg pa chen po brjod pa yin// theg pa che dang thabs mang bas// thams cad gang yang 'gog pa med// gang mi 'gog par 'jug
215b2(rnying rgyud): lam bde// bde ba nyid la spyad par sla// thabs dang theg pa'i bye brag rnams// so so mi mthun tha dad kyang // thabs kyi nges pa spyod pas na// nges pa nyid na khyad par med// dam tshig bsgrub pa spyod pa dang // lta ba sna tshogs tha dad kun// dud
215b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro yi dwags mi ma yin// don skyugs ched du byed las sogs// phyin ci log tu bltas pa rnams// dam pa'i don la gzung ba'i phyir// rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad kyang // yid nyid rdo rjer gcig dgongs nas// sna tshogs kun dang mthun 'dug phyir//
215b4(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas bsten brid drang ba dang // ljid pa'i thabs su sbyar bar zad// 'jig rten kun gyi dman pa rnams// sna tshogs dam par drang ba'i phyir// dman pa'i lta spyod mtha' yas pas// yongs su rdzogs par byed par zad// sprul sgong khyud du mi 'gyur yang //
215b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman bzhin du// dman pa kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ma bcos shes na dam par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// don 'gro go 'phang mtho dman med// ston slongs byang chub tha dad kyang // stong pa nyid la de gnyis
215b6(rnying rgyud): med// drug dang sman gnyis so so yang // 'byung ba dag la de gnyis med// ma 'dres sna tshogs tha dad kyang // kun gyi rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs// gang 'drir dam par 'gyur des na// dman pa'i las rnams ched du spyad// de nyid ma mthong gang dag
215b7(rnying rgyud): gis// tshig brda lam gyi rjes 'brangs pas// yang dag lam las gol ba yi// log pa'i lam pa sha dag 'byung // lang ka'i bdag po de skad du// tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba des// grags pa'i tshul dang ldan pa yi// dri ba chung ngu the tshom bcad// ces
216a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po des lang ka'i mnga' bdag la smras pas/ gang du mos pa chung ngu'i sems can rnams theg pa chen po nyid du nges par grol bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi dri ba bcom
216a2(rnying rgyud): bcad pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye lang ka'i bdag po kho bo dran pa thog ma'i tshe// kho bo'i ston pa
216a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor dam pa de'i nang du gsang ba brgyad pa'i grags pa'i gtam chud brjod pa ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste// nga yi dgongs pa skabs gcig na// gsad pa'i bdag po don 'di dang // ma nor ba nyid nub par gyur//
216a4(rnying rgyud): tshul lam bcos tsam gang dag la// phal cher don du spyod mod kyi// don du nges pa ngas ma mthong // kun kyang log pa'i lam la spyod// gang du log pa ji gang na// 'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang // 'di la log dang log tshul spyod// 'di tshul ma yin
216a5(rnying rgyud): 'dir ma nges// g.yo sgyus bden 'drar bcos log gam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bskal lha kun bkod bya ba la// sangs rgyas mngon 'byung rgyal po de// mya ngan 'das par gur 'og tu// gyud pa'i rnal 'byor bzang ldan de//
216a6(rnying rgyud): mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshul bcos log pa'i sngags bstan pas// lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa de// don las gol cing 'khor bar log/ de 'dra'i tshul 'gyur der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// rmad 'gyung gsang
216a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di// rnal 'byor dbang sgyur tshad ma rnams// phal cher mi gnas skabs dag tu// mi shes ngan tog can rnams kyis// log brtags don bslad gzhung por te// nor bas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing // 'di yin gzhan rtogs ma yi ni zhes/
216b1(rnying rgyud): bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa log/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bskal pa de yi dus nyid la// rnal 'byor dpal byin bya ba zhig/ don la blo shad ma bya zhing // gros kyi thabs la mi mkhas pas// blo gros nges pa'i gzhung bar nas// chos ma yin pa'i chos
216b2(rnying rgyud): spyod cing // nges pa'i gros ldan gzhan dag la// de ltar ma des blo gros ni// bdag gi blo gros 'di yin zhes// mngon pa'i nga rgyal cher spyod pa// 'di ni srid pa log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gnod 'dul 'di lta ste/
216b3(rnying rgyud): byung rgyud kyi rjes gnas pas// gdong med bzhin du dpon bstabs nas// tshig gnyer drags pa'i dbang des ni// mi shes bzhin du ras spyod pa// tshul 'tshos sems kyi gya gyu can// skyon thabs blun pa'i sdig can yin// de yang de lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i
216b4(rnying rgyud): dus ni ston byung ba// kun bkod grags pa de nyid la// tshul brtags 'anon pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dri med spyod ces bya ba zhig/ sngar byung mkhas pa rjes su gnang // khri phrag bcu yi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rjes su byang ba yi// don med rnal 'gyor de nyid/
216b5(rnying rgyud): la// tshig gi khur chen ljid phab nas// rigs rgyad 'dzin par dpon bstabs te// che bas che ba'i dregs pa skyed// mi shes bzhin du tshul 'chos te// 'dra tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas// 'khor bcas dregs pa'i ru trar lhung // de 'dra'i tshul
216b6(rnying rgyud): byang der ma spyod// gzhan yid gnod 'dul gsang ba'i bdag/ mdza' 'drin bsdang ste zhing rnams dang // rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba'i 'khor// gzhan dbang nyid du 'gyur dogs nas// ris dang tshom ste so sor gcod// 'di dag bdag gis gdul
216b7(rnying rgyud): byi yi// 'byor pas 'tsho ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag gang 'dir ma 'du zhes// nyon mongs chog gis blo byed nor// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba// gang du grags pa de nyid la// na zhi na zhes bya ba zhig/ rnal
217a1(rnying rgyud): lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas// shin tu gsang sngags cher spyod ces// dgon pa'i rgyun du dben gnas te// gang gi ljongs chen de dag na// gnas pas gnas pa de dag kun// kha gsag zabs rgyud zhing du spyod// gzhan gyi sde
217a2(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa pi// rnal 'byor mig ldan don mthong zhing // gang de ched du gnyer 'ongs nas// don dam nges lam de kho na// rgyas par bsnyen du brtsams pa las// dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin pas// nyon mongs log pa'i sgo bo byas// 'di khams
217a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gi zhing yin gyis// kho na ngo bo nyid deng shig/ tshan dang gzhan gyi ris bcad pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam du lhung // de 'dri'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gdul dka' 'dul ba yi// rnal 'byor dam par bsngo rgyu la// bdag
217a4(rnying rgyud): gir 'dod spyod gsog 'jog byed// gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nam zhar log spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// grags pa kun bkod de nyid la// badreng shis zhes ni bya ba yi// rnal
217a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor zhen chags 'khor dang bcas// sngags tshig sgra yi rjes spyod las// de yi 'khor der 'dus gyur pa'i// bud med bzang rgyun bya ba zhig/ 'tsho ba 'dzin par sbyar ba las// ser snas gsog du rtog byas pa yis// yi dgas khyi yi lus blangs te/
217a6(rnying rgyud): dman pa'i lus su gtan du 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul b+hing der ma spyad// gzhan yang gsang bdag gnod 'dul la// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// log lta sti brtol gtum khro che// sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang // bdag 'di nges pa kho na zhes/
217a7(rnying rgyud): bab chol bka' thun smra byed bslad// de yad d+hi lta bu zhen// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// chos skyong pa yi rnal 'byor pa// pr-i ma ta zhes bya ba zhig/ don dang la mo la ma mthong bar// bdag ni lam mkhan kho na zhes// kun la rgya cher grags pa las/
217b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i bka' rkun 'gro gang rnams// bslus par gyur pa'i smin pa yis// ngan 'gror byid gyur gnas de nas// thar nas log pa'i 'jig rten pa// bdag 'dzin spyod pa'i gnas su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag
217b2(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba po// zi tshig nyams shing don la rmugs// grags pas de la khas 'che phyir// rgyal po'i rgyalas thob 'dod pa// khrel med spyi brtol mun sprul 'tshal// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// gang du grags pa
217b3(rnying rgyud): nyid la// rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa// ben pa ya bya ba zhig/ brgya yi sde dang bcas pa byung // rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don dang ldan par tshul 'chos phyir// rgyal po'i rgyal thabs che blangs
217b4(rnying rgyud): ga gas bzhin/ jug pa sa// nga bya da du pa ga dug sa / dul thu dngas spyod// gzhan pa dgas pa'i bdan gyus// marnas pa dzin
217b5(rnying rgyud): ma chub par// mnyam zhes tshig gi lam 'byin zhing // chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'chel pa// rnal 'byor lngas kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// grags 'byung bskal pa de nyid la// bde sbyin zhes ni
217b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor stong gi 'khor dang bcas// gsang ba dam par nges so zhes// sten khrid chags sdang gnyis la 'chel// de nyid yongs su smin pa yis// rak+Sha srin po'i khams su ltung // de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gosang bdag
217b7(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// rnal 'byor gang dag blo chung rnams// rnal 'byor gang dag don glengs na// de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// spre zhum mi dga' 'byol byed blun// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// grags 'byung bskal pa de nyid
218a1(rnying rgyud): la// sbyin de zhes bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor las kyi dang byung // rnal 'byor ngos don mang po gzhan// dus don gsang ba'i don gyi san// lha spyod 'khor ba ngas de las rtsol// nor pa'i sems kyis phrag rlog skyes// rang ga gnas
218a2(rnying rgyud): dor ngan du brjod// de yis bskal pa dpag med du// yang dag don grol log par 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma stod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// rnal 'byor nyid kyi rnal 'byor la// rnon po gdug pa'i dug mda' gtong /
218a3(rnying rgyud): thatshig btsan po rdzong lta bu// 'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bgegs yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor blo gros bya ba zhing // mi 'jigs zhes bya'i rnal 'byor pa// don med bcos par spyod pa der// blo gros dam pa 'dus par gyur// bzod
218a4(rnying rgyud): ldan de la ngan sems kyis// skur btab kha na ma tho brjod// des ni mi 'jigs mnar med ltung // de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'jig nyon cing // lta ba'i dmigs bu dang bral nas// yang dag dbu ma'i lam mi gsal/
218a5(rnying rgyud): spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de ni rnal 'byor ldong ba'i tshogs// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po rab tu gas la ledzin pa// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rjes zhugs te// shes rab lta ba mig med par// rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul bzung nas//
218a6(rnying rgyud): thos rjes su tshul spyad pas// gti mug mun pa'i khams su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul byung der mya spyod// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ thams cad 'khor ba'i lam par lhung // des na gsang ba'i snying po 'di// gol sa che bar rgyal bas
218a7(rnying rgyud): bshad// desan thabs la mkhas pa dang // blo gros dam pa shin d+ha gces// thibs mo khas blo gros ldan pa yi// nges par legs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi// rdul chen rnams kyi bcid rgyud 'di/ skyes brungam pa'i spyod dul/
218b1(rnying rgyud): yon tad ma bsngags smras zlos pa// mying tsam gyis kyang bde thob cing // dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ shin tu gsang ba'i snying po 'di// ma byung ba yi sngon dus na// lha gnas gsum du glags pa
218b2(rnying rgyud): sa// lha ya ni 'od ldan to// mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas// sngon byung sA ltas byung ba na// mi bde bar ni 'du shes gyur// ma 'ongs 'du shes bzhag pa las// mi gtsang zas kyis 'tsho ba yi// srog chags blun pa'i lus
218b3(rnying rgyud): len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong // shin tu skrag pa'i 'du shes kyis// skabs kyi yul ni yid la byas// gang der gang dran ma byung bar// theg chen gsang ba'i snying po'i mtshan// tshig gi lam du grags pa bzhin// zos
218b4(rnying rgyud): pa yid la byas pa yis// ngan 'gror 'gro las slar log ste// bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khod// de 'dra'i tshul byeng de bzhin spyod// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon// theg chen gsang bar rab nges na// rnam smin drag pos gar
218b5(rnying rgyud): 'phangs kyang // ji ltar pho long brdabs pa bzhin// 'phen 'gro don gyis der mi gnas// ci phyir thams cad stong nyid pas// sdug bsngal gnas su bcas de yang // sems can bcas te stong pa'i phyir// reg 'gyur myong bar 'gyur ma
218b6(rnying rgyud): yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// dmigs pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa// theg chen zab mo'i tshig thos pas// shin tu skrag cing dngang 'gyur te// skur btab rgyab phyogs snying ral nas// ngu 'bod gnas ltung ma myong/
218b7(rnying rgyud): bar// bde 'gro thar pa'i gnas su thon// de 'dra'i tshul byung shes par gyis// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang 'di la// gang dga' gang zhig 'dun skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur thob// de yang ji lta bu ni na
219a1(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// zam za thams ldan zhes bya bas// gsad chan gsang ba'i snying pa 'di// mthong bas mos te kunu la bltas// de yang rnyed par ma b+har te// gang gi phyogs su gnas nas ni// shin tu dus nas
219a2(rnying rgyud): gdungs sngags skyes// e ma'o bdag ni las re pham// skyes nas rgas par gyur bar du// yang dag gsang ba'i don btsal na// gang 'di ma mthong las re dan// da yang de ltar mthong bar 'gyur// btsal bas rnyed par yod min te// bdag la skyo
219a3(rnying rgyud): pa gang su zhig/ sgra cher ngus te smras pa las// nam mkha'i khams nas sgra byung ste// skal dang ldan pa'i rigs can khyod// 'di ltar nges pa'i blo brtan pas// khyod ni don gyi bgo skal pa// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// khyod pa byin
219a4(rnying rgyud): brlab pa mdzad// de bas mos pa ma g.yel bar// don dang phrad pa'i thabs dag la// mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te// gdos pa'i lus ni gdod bor nas// snying po don la nges bltas na// de ma thag tu mthong bar 'gyur// de skad lung bstan
219a5(rnying rgyud): thos nas ni// dga' bas mos pa cher g.yos te// ji ltar bstan pa der bltas pas// rigs chen 'dzin pa'i sras su gyur// de 'dra'i tshul gyung mos par spyod// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste// mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs te// thams cad du
219a6(rnying rgyud): yang de bzhin te// tog gi rtse mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs kyis nub pa ma yin no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba// lta bu khri tsho bcu dang bcas// snying po gsang bar rnal 'byor la// rin chen 'od ldan gtsug 'dzin du//
219a7(rnying rgyud): tu dang bas dger g.yos te// lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang // bcas nas dam pa'i drung du dong // dga' bas 'dun pa'i tshul bzung nas// snying po gsang ba'i don la zhugs// cho 'phrul chen po bzhi thob ste// lha gnas kun du bgrod pa dang // 'bung
219b1(rnying rgyud): chen lus las sprul pa dang // ri bo 'degs dang 'phang ba dang // yun gyi cho la gnas pa thob// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du// mthong ba drug gi chos nyid de// bskul par nub par ma gyur to// de 'dra'i tshul byung 'jug par gyis// gzhan
219b2(rnying rgyud): yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste// mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pa// ye shes sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyi// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// theg chen gsang
219b3(rnying rgyud): par rab nges pa// lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa yi// rigs chen 'dzin pa'i sa nyid thob// de 'dra'i tshul byung mthong bar gyis// gzhan yang gsang chen 'dzin pa nyon// gang dag theg chen mngon spyod la// dga' bas rjes su yi rang bas/
219b4(rnying rgyud): de ni de dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu dag la mtho dman med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan pa// rnal 'byor can gyi 'khor dang bcas// theg chen zab mo'i don la zhugs// gsang sngags gsang //
219b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i byin brlabs dag/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po rnams// thog ma kun du grags par gyur// de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bram ze dge slong bya ba zhig/ shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// dam par nges pa'i bslab pa zhus// byis/
219b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyod yul ma yin phyir// gsang chen gsang bar rab tu gsungs// bram ze ma log yo byad dag/ de la de bsngos dag par sbyar// skyes bu dam pa de yul du// yid kyis phyogs der smon par brjod// 'di la mos pa'i byin brlabs kyis//
219b7(rnying rgyud): snying por nges pa'i dam pa dang // rjes su yi rang dam pa gnyis// thob pa mnyam pa nyid du gyur// 'di ltar tshogs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i rigs chen 'dzin// de 'dra'i tshul byung mkhas par gyis// gzhan yang gsang 'dzin 'di lta ste//
220a1(rnying rgyud): bsam pas bsam gyis khyab pa yi// rgyal bas 'di gzigs 'di mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'khor ba'i bshes gnyen du// dam pa gsang ba'i bdag por gyur// de yang de lta zhe na/ das // gsal
220a2(rnying rgyud): byin bya ba'i khyim bdag zhing // theg chen gsung ba 'dir gnas pas// rang gi gsang ba nyid mthong bas// gsang chen gsang ba'i nges rnyed de// kun gyi gsang da dres par mthong // chos rnams sun ste// de
220a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal por gyur nas ni// smra ba kun gyi seng ge zhes// zhing khams kun du grags par gyur// de 'dri'i tshul gyur bslab par gyis// gzhan yar gas 'dzin gcod 'dul nyon// theg chen gsang ba'i tshig lam gcig/ khong du mun par
220a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni// skye bo nyan thos bsam yis dang // rgyal ba mtha' yas sras bcas la// mchod yon tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi rkar yang mi phod do// ci'i phyir theg chen 'di shes pas// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mtsho pa 'di yin// nam mkha'
220a5(rnying rgyud): khyab rnal ba dang // theg chen gsang ba'i snying po gnyis// so so ma yin tha mi dad // des ni rgyal ba gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin+da// mu dang gsung thugs gcig las med// 'dul ba'i nga ba gi khyad par las
220a6(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mkhyab bstan par zad// de pad+ma ji lta bu na// 'das pa dusun ston byang ba// sbrul ldan yongs su dag pa'i rigs// dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis// glang du mos pa ste so skyes// gcig la gcig 'dring tha tshig bcas//
220a7(rnying rgyud): gis dman pa'i theg pa la// spyad nas bya ba'i las chen byas// gcig ni theg chen gsang ba'i dod/ rgya cher nges par chub pa las// theg chen zhon po'i gsapa blan ni// rigaso chen gcig gis mngon par chu// bya ba byed pa'i dge ldan ni//
220b1(rnying rgyud): sbed bskal pa gsum gyi sa nub// des na theg rgyan gsung ba la// rje hrI rgyal byung tshul bzhin spyod// gzhad yang gas 'dzin 'dag ston// gas pa rtag tu gang sha pa// ma bskyong rgyab pa la sogs pade// po tu gan cing drang//
220b2(rnying rgyud): gzungs dang btsas pa zob// de pang de lta bzhen// khyim bdag mes byin bya ba de// bar+Na pri khor dang bcas pazhig/ rtag par rtog rten 'dir gnas pas// sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs rgyal po yi// 'khor dang bcas d+ya ba//
220b3(rnying rgyud): dzin pa gcig gis thob// de 'dri'i tshul byung dag par spyod// gzhan yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste/ sku dang gsung rdugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par bsgrub pa rnams// rtogs nas smra ba dgra byed pa// gom sra pas brjod dang sbyin pa sa/
220b4(rnying rgyud): sa par bkod pa la s+ho// mang pas rigs rten 'dzin pa thog// gling de ba sdigs parjod byed pa// gabye'i bdag chos kyi rgyal ba dUr ga N+Di nA gsang ba 'di// den pa brdzags po brjod par skyes// rjod ni 'i dgo
220b5(rnying rgyud): thob// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam pang // theb chen gsang ba'i snying po yin// rnalnga 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas// srad tsog thang cig yud tsAm+ba la// gsang chen gsang bar nges bzhug na// rgyal ba kun kyang rigs 'dzin gyi// gsang rten
220b6(rnying rgyud): gsang bar rab nges pa'o// gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar na// gsang chen gsang ba'i snying po gang // nges par legs pa'i bcad rgyud dang // log par nges pa'i gcad rgyud rnams// sngon byung brgyad pa gagos pa yin// de ni de gsang ba mchod
221a1(rnying rgyud): nyid gsung // zhes gsang ba'i bdag pos spyo byung ba'i gtam rgyud ji ltar brgyad cing grags pa brjod pa'i bya ba byas pasu la da ka'i bdug po la sogs pa mngon du snang ba'i sems dpa' dman par lus can rnams gang du mangs
221a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i som nyi yongs su chad par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sngon du byung ba gtam rgyud yongs su brjod pa'i li'u ste sum rtsa brgyang pa'o// / theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las btsun pa
221a3(rnying rgyud): kyis grags pa na yang byung bya ba gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste phung tshul bstan pa bskyed pa'o// // de nas yid lang ko'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon du srid
221a4(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'i dgu pa gang gi ched du mdzad pa ni yang byang zhes pa byung ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kyi gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gseng ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i rna bas kye ga ga
221a5(rnying rgyud): du mdzad pa na par byed zhes bkod pa de ji lta ji ltar mdzad de yongs su grags pa lags// smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po glang ma bcos pa de kho na bzhin mdzad pa la bya'o// spros pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang ma bcos pa de kho na bzhin du mdzad pa
221a6(rnying rgyud): de gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po chos rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid la bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid la ni sangs rgyas kyang med// sems can yang med// pho mo yang med//
221a7(rnying rgyud): rigs khyad kyang med/ gzugs med/ bstan du med/ mtshon du med/ dpe yang med/ mdzad pa yang med de/ dpag par rab tu dka' la gang gis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang ci yang med pa las sangs rgyas dang
221b1(rnying rgyud): sems can dang / phra mo dang / rigs rgyud dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / bstan pa sna tshogs dang / mtshan pa dang / dpe tha dad pa dang / mdzad pa sna tshogs dang / rdzas su dpag pa la sogs pa ji snyed pa ma pa spyong pa gang phra
221b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba lags zhes yongs su dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ 'di ba'i bdag po yongs su dri nga chen po 'di ni legs so// rab tu legs so// gang ci yod med pa las cing par snan pa'i don 'di ni de'i rang ban
221b3(rnying rgyud): phyir te/ grong khyer chen po gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa tha dad par snang ba 'ba' jig go// grong khyer gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khye snang gi grong khyer dang / kun snang gi grong khyer dang / mi snang ba'i grong khyer ro// ka'i bdag
221b4(rnying rgyud): khyer gsum nyid chos nyid yin pas na de la ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyinas gang yin pa dang / grong khyer gsum gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'dir gcig pa'i phyir te/ thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo dang / ga
221b5(rnying rgyud): pa kho na'o// la ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ljid du sgo gsum du snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo dang / rig pa'i sgo dang / gsang ba'i sgo'o// lung ka'i bdag po gzungs sgo yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsusu snang ba mdzad pan
221b6(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ de nyid kyi rten gyis zhi gnas dang / de 'dzin gyi rten gyis steg mchong dang / rje 'jug gi rkyen gyi las mtha'o// lung ka'i bar gAso rig pa'i sprob yang grong khyer gsus kyi rlu du gsum snang po mdzad pa ni 'di ltar/ me nang
221b7(rnying rgyud): zhi gnas dang / snang ba'i ched du lhag mthong dang / zhen pa'i che ngu las mtha'o// lang ka'i bdag po gsang ba'i sgrol yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang bar mjed pa snang ba ni 'di/ me snang ba'i ched du ni gnas dang / snang ba
222a1(rnying rgyud): lhag mthong dang / zhen pa'i ched du las mtha'o// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sangs rgyas gsum snang ba mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste// me sdang ba'i ched du 'dus ma byas kyi sangs rgyas dang / snang shA'i ched du 'dus byas kyi
222a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / zhen pa'i ched du gzugs kyi sangs rgyas dang gsum mo// lang ku'i bdag ma grong khyer gling ma'i rkyen gyi sa sem can gsum ste/ de nyid gol ba'i rkyen gyis gzugs med pa'i sems can dang / de 'dzin gol ba rtson
222a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi sems can dang / de 'jug zhen pa'i rkyen gyis 'dod pa'i sems can no// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi rkyen gyis/ lus gsum bstan pa ni med pa dang / rigs pa dang / pho mo dang / ma ning ngo // lang ka'i bdag po 'dod
222a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rkyen gyis gang gi yab bum dang / sras rgyud dang / 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa ltar snang ngo // de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad
222a5(rnying rgyud): de/ lhums su zhugs pa dang / dri na yang de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa the tshom gco pa dang / slar log pa dang / zhu ba dang / zhu bar sdog po// dA/ gnang ba dang / bye ba dang / d+he ba snyed du 'jug par mdzad ngo // lang ka'i bdag pa grob
222a6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi ched du bstan pa gsum ste/ de nyid kyi rkyen gyis theg pa chen po dang / nge 'dzin gyi chen gyis theg pa sna tshogs dang / de 'jug gi rkyen gyis theg pa chung ngu snang bar mdzad do// ldang 'ong bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du ting nge
222a7(rnying rgyud): gsum snang ba ni 'di sa hU~M/ rdo nyid kyi med du bzhin nyid kyi ting nge la ni dang / de'idzin gyi tshod du kun du steng gi ting nge 'dzin / de'i drug ga chang du d+d+he ting nge 'dzin to// 2 sha'i bdag pa kyar gsum gyi ched du khyod rten gsum
222b1(rnying rgyud): ba ni 'di lta ste/ thugs kyi mchod rten dang / sku'i mchod tan dang / gsung gi mchod rten no// lang ka'i bdag pa grong khyer gsum gyi ched du dkyil 'khor gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin
222b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang / gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sngags gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags dang / rI gi sngags dang / gzungs sngags so// lang ka'i bdug po grong khyer gsum gyi
222b3(rnying rgyud): ched du 'bras bu dang / rkyen dang / rgya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag la sogs pa grong khyer gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa yongs su snang bar mdzad de/ de dag ni thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i da
222b4(rnying rgyud): chen po las thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos la ka'i bdag po la smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi ched du yang dag pa'i gsang ba 'di yongs
222b5(rnying rgyud): su gsung bar mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa ni// thams cad nyid las mi gzhan phyir// ci yang blang dror med pasad// rdo rje nam mkha' gdon mi za// lang ka'i bdag po yang rang sangs rgyas kyu ched du snang ba rdo rje bstan pa 'di gsung bar
222b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// dag gi rdo rje phyi gre mod// lus kyi rdo rje ska ston pa// glang gi yid ni 'dir brtag ste// gsang ba nyid du rab nges pa'o// lung ka'i bdag po ya gsang pa mchog gi bdag po des/ nyan thos kyi ched glengabasrab rna mdzad da
222b7(rnying rgyud): pa rjed do// sgo gsum rdo rje bye ba brgya// bsrung ba yongs su dag pa'i mtha'// zhi bo phyogs pang 'dring ba drug ste/ dam pa nyid du mangs pa'o// lung ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu drim pa des rgya 'byor sems dpa'i byed du rje
223a1(rnying rgyud): 'di gsung bar mdzad do// thams cad rnam dag 'khrul snang ba// gzhan med de nyid dam par spyod// rnam sa ga pin+ta 'drer ba thAg ste// gas pyad ma pra ra nges pa'o// ljang ka' badrag po yang myo blangs pa des grang
223a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' yongs su sel ba dag gi ched du nam mkha' rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// gang 'dir yod dang med pa yi// mtha' gnyis nges pa raM rab bsal te// sems nyid gang yin 'dir bcug ste// dbu mor mi dmigs rab nges pa
223a3(rnying rgyud): nas// gsang chen theg par rab nges pa'o// pang ka'i bdeg po yang skyes bu dam pa des gri long la sogs pa gang 'dod chags can gyi ched du chags pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung ba mdzad do// 'jig rten ga po rdul po mo gang // ji snyed dgu lang u ma
223a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// chags pa rdo rje yid bcug nas// gsang rten theg par rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bud ma pa des bri swA la sogs pa gang zhe sdang can gyi ched du gsod pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do// ji snyed g.yo rdul sems can rnams/
223a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mtshon chen gcig gis bsad// zhe sdang rdo rje yid bcug nas// rdo rje theg par rab nges pa'o// lang ki'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang phrag dog can gyi ched du 'khrugs pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung par mdzad do// sha za cag
223a6(rnying rgyud): tu gzhan 'di spyad// kun sdos rdo rjeg ma gas// kun la dru rdo rje yid brgyug nas// gsung chen snying por dbangs pa'o// ling ko'i bdag po'i skyes bu dam pa des kyu la sogs pa gang bras byin gyi ched de phra mdo rje mdzad po'i dag sung bar bad
223b1(rnying rgyud): rdu dam par bye ma // log sa pang dag ltar \u0f7fsa// rdzab dz+ra pang bgyug+sa das / 'du / ga kyang dug nga mdu
223b2(rnying rgyud): gsung bar mdzad do// rdo rje gdul dka' ma lus paM// gnon pa brtsegs pa'i ngoH// ban+d+ha rdo rje padang cug nas// rdo rje theg par rab des pa'o// 'o sha'i bdag po 'a rnaMs zungs pa des srin po sa sogs bsha du rnam pa rdo rje mdzad
223b3(rnying rgyud): 'di gsung bar mdzad do// rdo rje zla ba ma lus pa// thams cad za bar byed pa nyid// rngam pa rdo rje yid bcug nas// theg zhin por rab nges pa'o// pang ka'i bdag pa yang skyes bu dam pa des me khal 'gro la sogs pa gang / phra mon ma dag gi cher
223b4(rnying rgyud): d+ha mdzad pa 'di gsang bar mdza ga// rdo rje bshad brtsis s+t+rai ta// bzung ba ma nges pa yi thabs/ rdo rje yid bajug nas// rdo rje gas dab rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bad po yang skyes bu dam pa des mtha' yas rdo rje mdzad pa gsung bar ba
223b5(rnying rgyud): do// mtha' yas 'jig rten rdul smad na// log cog mi mthun rdul phran snyed// gnyen po rtog 'dul de snyeng+ga k+Shu~M sa// rdo rje theg chen dbyings su myod// mna' yas g.yo rdul sna tshogs pa// gang la mos pa de gsungs pas// sems can rdo rje nga
223b6(rnying rgyud): bcug nas// sems nyid theg can rab nges pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gsung gi mdzad pa gang gi ched du mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gsung gi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi
223b7(rnying rgyud): bcu pa'o// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi don du ma bos je ltar bang mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste// gang gi yul tha dad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ mdzad pa yong za dang
224a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas par snang ba ste// yul la la ni dag pas smin par mdzad do// la lan ma dag pas smin par mdzad do// la la ni dag pa spangs pas so// la la ni gdams ngag gis so// lA la ni p+la 'khral gyis so// la la ni 'jam
224a2(rnying rgyud): pas so// la la ni rtsub pas sngo// la la ni gnyis kas so// la la ni 'jigs pas so// la la ni thar byas so// lA la ni 'dam gyis so// la la ni 'khrugs pas so// la la ni 'jings pas so// la la ni 'thabs pas so// la la ne non pas so//
224a3(rnying rgyud): la ni bsnyegs pas so// la la ni bskangs pas so// la la nI ma bsgyangs pas so// la la ni gnod byas so// la la ni mi gnod pas so// la la ni 'tshe bsuM so// la lA nI mi 'jo byas so// lnga la ni smad pas so// la la ni bstod pas so// lalwa ni
224a4(rnying rgyud): pas so// la la ni myi 'gyod pas so// la lwa ni 'jing slad kyis so// la la ni kha gsagra gis so// la pa ni nan tur gyis sngo// la la ni bu zhabs pas so// lA la spyi phyin pas so// lA la ni blangs pas so// la la ni rdzi ya zlog shes pas so// ya
224a5(rnying rgyud): ni ming spros pas so// la la ni gzugs smos pas so// la la ni gzugs bstan pas so// la la ni smras pas so// la la ni smyos pas so// la la ni rgyan gyis so// la la ni smras so// la la ni dris so// la la ni ros so// la lnga ni reg gis so//
224a6(rnying rgyud): la la ni chos kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// la la ni gzugs srid du mi 'ong byas so// de bzhin du la la ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg ping du mi 'ong bas yongs su smin par mdzad do// gang lnga lnga ni thub pas so// la lA ni rkyen mi 'chad
224a7(rnying rgyud): par smra bas so// la la ni skad cig smrabs so// la la dag ni tsaM yang mi brjod pas so// le la dag ni nges pa mthong bas so// la la ni dam pa'i sgras so// la la ni pa shes gnyen dam pa'i sgras so// la la dI mi rtog pasa'o// la pa de rtog pas so//
224b1(rnying rgyud): la ni sdug bsngal pas so// phya la ni bde bas so// la la ni bdag med pas so// lal ni bdag yod pas so// lam ni mdzen byed rgyas so// la ya ni zhe bas so// lalam byas pas so// la dz+ra dang / ma pa
224b2(rnying rgyud): la ni dug gsum sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras smin par mdzad do// la la ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras so// la la ni brid pa mi myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras so// la la ni srid pa'i longs spyod spangs te/ dka' bub drag pos so// yul da
224b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i longs spyod blangs te 'jol tog tu spyod pas so// la li ni bkag pa'i thabs kyis so// lA la ni gang la par mi reg pa'i thabs kyis so// la la ni bya ba rdzogs pa'i thabs kyis so// la lA ni sbyin pos so// la la ni snyan pas so// la la ni mthun
224b4(rnying rgyud): sro// la la ni spyod pas so// la la ni nod yongs su gtong bas so// la la ni phyi yongs su gtong bas so// la la ni thams cad gtong bas so// la la ni thams cad chags pas yongs su smin por mdzad do// lu la ni rnam par g.yeng bas so//
224b5(rnying rgyud): ni nang du yang dag 'jog gis so// la la ni 'dod pa bkag pas so// la la ni 'dod pa spyod pas so// gang de ltar mos pa tha dad la spyod pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / lta ba dang / rlabs dang / 'dod pa dang / don tha dad par bstan pas yongs
224b6(rnying rgyud): par mdzad do// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni thabs kyis mdzad par rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thabs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i
224b7(rnying rgyud): bdag po nges lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi ched du sgra'i mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/ ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa 'jig rten du bkod pas thams cad kyi gzugs su snang ba des thams cad smin par mdzad pa de kho napo//
225a1(rnying rgyud): mu/ gdun na go/ na na dudun ga
225a2(rnying rgyud): ma / sa ga du byed do/ dag kya rnamam
225a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa bam tha' las gco ga bdag bra gang dang pan pas phra'i ni 'i du myi gsus par ses pa zhin gyi khams 'di hU~M du med pa / ba / mya jig pa song rnam
225a4(rnying rgyud): sab lda
225a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bu'i mdzad pa cad du mdzad bya'o// sangs rnam bran gyi dgangs pa 'dus pa'i mad chen po las phra'i mdzad pa yongs po rdzogs pa'i 'o skye bani bcu gnyis pa 'o// / tshig pa chen pa rjes pa byung ba'i rgya las gang ni cheng du mdzod par nga
225a6(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i btabargyad su mis brgyag rgyas shis rnam par bkras pa thu ma brgyan par grom / dernaMs pa lag dug byang bu thams dpa' sems ba byed byengs sngon du nga gradu sargyas kyi rgya ra
225b1(rnying rgyud): nges par bstan pa na yang gyung zhes byang ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyad du brjod pa'i skabs su lu rkyen ngas par ban pan yang byung bas
225b2(rnying rgyud): bkod pa de de lta zhig tu lung bstan te grags pa lags/ gres ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang dri ba de ni legs so// shin tu legs so// rab tu legs so// don 'di ltar 'khor po thog pa med par dbyangs su bsal ba
225b3(rnying rgyud): ma dang tha ma med pa'i skabs la sangs rgyas thog ma dang tha ma med par gang gi skyon ma snang ba dag gi thabs gcig gi b+ha ba sa gang phyogs gcig tu phan pa nyid du bya ba stong sa su smin par byas te/ thabs dam pas gar phyogs med par phan pa
225b4(rnying rgyud): skyed du yongs su smin par bya ba dag gang gi rjes su gang 'gro bar dam bcas pa nyid des byung zhing snang bar lung bstan pa de yongs su grags par 'gyur gyi/ sgron mo gang gis nyid kyi phul snang ba las ma gtogs pa thams cad snang ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir
225b5(rnying rgyud): lang kwa'i bdag po lung bstan pa de yang di lta ji ltar 'di zla ste/ bsgral ba thog ma med pal// ji snyed gang 'byung brjod mi lang // skabs las gcig byung 'dir brjod kyis// dam bcas go cha bgros khyod ton// bsgril pa kun+da bkod bya ba la//
225b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba brag brgya byung // kun gyi tha mar byung ba 'i// pade ga shegs mngon 'byung rgyal po dris// 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// 'jig rten gcig gam gling gcig tu// bskal pa gcig gi gnas skabs la// yul gcig rdo rje gdan
225b7(rnying rgyud): gcig tu// mdzad pa mthar phyinas des rgyas gnyis// 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong // byung na ma srid chos dang 'gal// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das 'og tu// mang 'byung gas pa'i snying po nyid// rgya zer grags par 'gyur mon so// sangs rgyas sun
226a1(rnying rgyud): gyis lung can ston// ji ltar 'di yang de bzhin te// nga ni ma gzugs 'das 'an tu// klan gyi gangs pa 'dus pa nyid// brtsam dang 'dul ba snang bar 'gyur// de skad dbu pa de lung bstan// gzhan yang 'phrul 'dzin pa ton// ba
226a2(rnying rgyud): pa mthar yas bya ba la// sangs rgyas su ma khri lta stong 'thung // kun gyi tha mar 'gyur ba yi// sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas pa des// 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// khri phrag phyed dang bzhi 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas snga ma 'das rnams kyis// phrin lus mi smin gang
226a3(rnying rgyud): bangs rgyas pan nga nga // dun mar byu pa// sbyangs hU~M ba dun du / da drug pa brgyad nga // dmapa de bzhin gshes /
226a4(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs phyin// brgya phrag bcwa lngar gyur pa na// 'bras bu chub par snang ba yi// rdul bral dri med dam pa nyid// mchog gi zhing khams rlom pa 'dir// snang ba thob pa'i skal ldan can// bram ze shes pa mo ni ga la// gnod la pa nyid kyis gra
226a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyin// bskal pa bzang rgan bye ba la// sangs rgyas bye phrag brgyad cu byung // de dag mtha' zad byung ba yi// sangs rgyas bzung rgyan dpal gyis kyang // 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// bye phrag brgyad du gyu pa
226a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma yis// theg pa byung bar lung bstan bzhin// nga yi snang ba 'di nub nas// brgya phrag phyed kyi dus dag la// 'di tshe gcig la 'grub pa yi// chos kyi me long dam bzhig/ nga 'das gling gi 'jig rten 'dir// 'byung ba'i nga
226b1(rnying rgyud): slong skal ldan can// nyi ma'i snying po bya ba la// bstan pa'i rgyar chen phab nas ni// kun du mthun par grags par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskal ba chen po nyon// bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya blang // de kun mthar zad byang
226b2(rnying rgyud): ba yi// sangs rgyas dkon mchog dpal gyis kyang // 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa// bye ba phrag brgya byung ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis// nges pa dam par lung bstun bzhin// nga snang mi gnas de rjes pa// l-i nI pa rgyang cu rtsa gnyis la/
226b3(rnying rgyud): gsang 'dus theg chen snying po 'di// byang chub snying po can khros pa'i// sa le gser gling bya ba der// rgyal po badre skyob skal yong la// lus dang thugs rje mthun pa yi// chos kyi mig gcig 'bye 'gyur te// rigs ldan kun gyis rbo bA pa 'gyur/
226b4(rnying rgyud): bskul pa chen po gzhan yang hon// bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la// sangs rgyas bcwa phrag bcu 'byung ba'i// bzhi por byung ba'i sgron ma nyid// rngub pa'i dbang po de nyid kyis// 'khor gyi nang du lung ba stan pa// bye phrag brjen cu rtsa bzhi yi// mngon
226b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rgyal po'i nyid kyis// 'dug phyogs dag smin byas nas/ thigs chen rdo rje snying po nyid// rma mer grags par 'gyur ro zhes// kun gyi lung chen bstan pa bdin// nga ni 'di nas mi snad nas// lo ni brgya dang bcu gnyis na// lha gnas gsum du
226b6(rnying rgyud): grags pa yi// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig/ 'jam gleng shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi// me lang zhal ldan rigs can de// rgyal po zhes bya ba pa// sngon du ltos snang gAnang 'gyur ba// drag shul can bres bye ba'i byi/ phyogs kyi them song
226b7(rnying rgyud): dman pa'i lus// li ka'i bdag zi ma sogs la// lab na rje snang bar 'gyur// dam pas de zad lung ba ltar glenang // dri la sogs pa mtha' las par // thog sa tha ma me dpa' bar // des/ de ltar rdzogs pa pad// gsang bapa'i bdag thas
227a1(rnying rgyud): rgyam gsas pa na smra na rgya da dngas pa mang po smra na ho// san sa na byed smra da pa
227a2(rnying rgyud): gyi dag po byang chub mas bya' mams pa'adzini pa das/ dudu byu pa gabacug 'i su pa ga ba ni dag du dastong su marungs ba bta
227a3(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i rnapas su las rgya yongs su gcod pan yang byu sa bshid pa dang / bzhig cigags byung ba'i dge/ gro ni gro na te/ dge pa gang gi bde rje den ste/ gshig 'dags pa
227a4(rnying rgyud): gsum na/ 'ad san mas
227a5(rnying rgyud): nas blang ba yin// ji la 'jigs pa'i thab nas na// bsam kyis gas da // slong ba d+ma nyid gang phyin pa// bzhin shugs dngoganyin pa'i thabs// phyis ga cing pa'ab zhig go// 'al rgyun du byung ba dang /
227a6(rnying rgyud): thugs gyur/ sa / phyun du su na
227b1(rnying rgyud): dngam nasum pa// bdun ta can pa tud na// bams cad da yangs su nas me/ / gang bdag sa // da ga du // 'byung du na nan da// zugs
227b2(rnying rgyud): sa te// ngangani drin la ba ba gnas/ ji lta 'did dang da byor snang // snang byed byed pa dun mi grags/ ba kyi sbyin ga pa / shin d+hang byes mdzad par me/ la 'i ba 'azod na
227b3(rnying rgyud): sangs nas de// mkha' da'i sa bcu bu med b+hings// khams gsum dngos dang ngos med kun// phyogs mtshams kun gyi lus da ga// na gyi gonabs skyeng pod gnas// 'gro dang mi 'tho rten pani/ dngos po rnams cad kyi
227b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// gan la shA gyur pon// mag gnas/ gnyenan dgezhan myed dang badzin gas so// na rdzog na ma 'byung // skyon rnamapa dgag
227b5(rnying rgyud): dran la / ga gsu byug/ // pa ga / ma skye kyims me chug sa nga// mas da na
227b6(rnying rgyud): khyo 'al bar ma tuganas// 'dzin dun pa nga na 'i sa n-i/ dang pa sa na ra/ gang sa
227b7(rnying rgyud): 'di slobs pacu ma mas bra drur/ gan ma rgyas zhes byatshogs/ nga/ 'i 'drig pa ban ni/ driti ni ci'i spongs sani/ ma ma nga nu sudu du// rnamag pa ji na
228a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung bar ldan// dz+nyAn mnyen gsul sbyang mtha' byas// phywa ts+tsha nga na s+ho// smad snang ba g+h+nAn// bla na ngas rgyas spyod pa// / rnams dang stong pa ga r+b+ba ta// dos tu ma rloms rnam
228a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa sun khyed ni/ // sman gi dzin la rung ba
228a3(rnying rgyud): gang / don dam sa pa'i ga pani// gsus sa pa te// brjo rgya khyen de sheng shA ga / de nga tung 'di bya phyag pa/ gang di bden dagle ma na/
228a4(rnying rgyud): yul du gyur duni// rkyen tul nga'i 'bya bas te/ / spyo po/ mdu rnye// 'brang gi dri lade zung bam dres rkyen cing 'brel byang ba// bdag
228a5(rnying rgyud): gcig med mthong bas// brjod med sprul pa'i chos rnams ston// rang gi rtsal gyis bder gan su pa'o// rab kyi phrul dri lce rU ba ni// bdag med bya ma sa snyoms rtog la 'odaste// yul med ma skye'i phyogs dang bral// sad de rnam zer 'der
228a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pas// dngos med do nyid tu nga // yang ga gan ni zug zhan yang gang // dkad nang dag byed cig pa // 'od la gyis gsum nyid de// tham dgel sna ni// dka' rjeb rjem ba d+ha la lugs dag/ mnyam snyid
228a7(rnying rgyud): sgyu med la// bdu sa 'dren pa'i tshul bzung nas// rigs kyi rdo rje l-i na gnas pa'o// khyod mi rnam pa'i snang ba ni// bya ba dag ci'i la sa ng+ge // dal 'byor/ 'dzin mang ldan na// mi gas na se mas pa sa mngon sum du//
228b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi rdo rje 'chang gnas pa'o// rab la nges par snang ba ni// sems nyid yul la rgyal rdzogs te// yul nyid rig pas mngon mthong na// de nyid dang ni mngon byas nas// rdo rje rigs 'chang gnas pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // dang
228b2(rnying rgyud): rnapa sa narkyen
228b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas// rnal 'byor na' chen rdzogs pa'i sa// 'bring 'a rdzogs par gang snang ba// mnyam pas mnyam pa'i don mdzod ni// ma ti ma rdzogs yul shes dbyings yo shes// n+da kun rdzogs pan du sI // chos nyid mi gyur byed pa pa'i
228b4(rnying rgyud): rab la yongs su rdzogs pa ni// ye shes dbyings zhes bya ba'i don// pra snyed tsam du rtogs chud nas// rtsal med rdzogs bral bsam yul 'das// thams cad rdzogs pa'i sbyid ci bas// lar kI re bdag po gzhan par gang // cho 'phru mngon
228b5(rnying rgyud): byung theb pa yang // yul gyi rnam pa gsum sna ba/ zhen dang mongs dang khrug phra po// los ngan 'du shes ngan pa rnams// rgyan gcad pasgyur ba de phrin las ni// sri ga ma dra bA'i 'khor lo dag/ la na /
228b6(rnying rgyud): po'i 'khor lo bskor byas nas// bskal po'i 'khor lo gnad par 'gyur// tsi b+hA R+Ya sems cam baTI ga yi// chags pas sbyin cing gdung bar 'byung// gang tshe sems can kha ciga'i// shin tu rmongs shi pa thabs par 'gyur// gang gis sems
228b7(rnying rgyud): can 'acig na// don tu zug tum gadrug par 'gyur// dbyar rlog ga mi sbyin pa // gang gis yin par bye hU~M/ me ga mtshan nyid du sbyin na rgya/ ma dngas 'gyur// rangang du nga bya/
229a1(rnying rgyud): khros na za byed lnga khros pas// ma lus bskul nas stongs mdzang // nam mkhan rdzo ba za byed d+ha// thams cad rnam pas rnangs par mdzad// dri bzhin nyid du bskul ba'i mchog/ gra na thal 'as pa 'as// zhan sa ga
229a2(rnying rgyud): cad sreg/ zhe gnas nu'i ba la pa yis// nyon ma shA dri ma thams cad wa// na ni sgrub pa zhes/ she byung mas cad bran du bstod// shes rab dam ma kha'i ben pa yeng // mtshan la na chu ngam / 2
229a3(rnying rgyud): ngan myur du rgyan bcad na// gnas ngan dag las myur du sgrol// thabs dang theg pa gang dag lngas// tha ma'i tha ma yin par bshad// snyigs mar gyur pa'i skabs rnams su// 'dul ba rnam gnyis nub pas na// nyon mongs rnams ni dngos por snang /
229a4(rnying rgyud): 'das nas nub po zhes pa la// ma 'das ma nub de nyid ni// dus der shugs kyis 'dul ba yin// lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na// 'di kun gsang ba dam pa yaM/ dbyings lus ga rI yang ma g.yos shing // stong pa kho na'i dbyings nyid las// stong pa'i
229a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa sa
229b1(rnying rgyud): brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byang tshul bstan pa bcu gcig pa'o// // bam po bdun par zug pa// de nas yang khang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i/
229b2(rnying rgyud): za ma dgongs pa rnam par bsgo ba na yang byung zhes snang ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg po chen po gtsang bdam pa phyung bar tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na
229b3(rnying rgyud): yang byung zhes bkod pa de lta zhig tu bgros te blugs pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po gang yongs su dri ba de ni 'di ltar zab pa/ ches zab pa/ 'di ltar dka' ba/ ches dkang ba/ tog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ brtag pang rab tu dka'
229b4(rnying rgyud): brda/ dpag pa las 'das pa ste/ gang rgyud yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang / gangs la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang rab tu bgro bar mi nus pa yin na bdag gis yongs su bgro bur lta ci smos te/ gang gi spyod yul yang ma yin no// de skad
229b5(rnying rgyud): ces smras pas/ lang ka'i bdeg po des 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po gsang ba'i badrag po nyon mongs bya'i snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang g+hi d+ye brartse ba nyid du bgyi ba'i slad du mi chen po rnams kyi spyod yul/ chos thams cad
229b6(rnying rgyud): mngom par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ gang du ma bkag pa'i chos nyid du 'angs spyod pa/ thubs kyi theg pa chen po dgong skye pa ngam pa de kho na nyid de rnam par bsngo zhing smra ba'i seng po khyod kyis phyin rgyam logs par 'gro ba'i dus la bab bo// skyes bu
229b7(rnying rgyud): chen po shin tu rab tu dus la bab po// nges pa dam par 'gro ba'i dus la bab po// de ci'i spyad du zhe na/ skyes bu chen po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gsang ba chen po'i bdag po dbang gis dbang bskur ba lags te/ gang
230a1(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa rnams go 'byed pa dang / gang 'thoms pa dang ba'i thabs smin phung gi dra bas thams cad bde blag tu drang ba'i rmang du dgongs pa dam pa'i lus dkrol du gsol zhes bskul ba las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po des 'di skad ces
230a2(rnying rgyud): smas so// bskul ba'i go cha chen po khyod// kun la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir// gang la bskul bar khyod brtson na// 'gro ba glang bsring legs so legs// 'di ltar 'di skad bdag nyid kyis// nges pa'i don de kho na nyid// zos pa spang ba'i duste gcig
230a3(rnying rgyud): gyu ga rgyan sa//
230a4(rnying rgyud): skad du// bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// lde mi dgo sa sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis// bstan nas bkri ba'i thabs su zos// 'dod rkyed cig ni 'di skad du// rtogs par gyur pa'i dus gcig na// 'dod chen pa la 'dod pa ni// thabs kyis
230a5(rnying rgyud): drang ba nyid du thos// gsang sngags rdo rje nam mkha' che// tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas// brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te// bdag gis bgro bar rab tu dka'// dpe'am tshad ma'am gtan tshigs sam// rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis//
230a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs par nus pa ma yin te// dmus long mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra// don krung bak+sha N+Da li ga rten gtad cing // lo 'i lce rlabs kyis drang ba dang // bskul ba khyod kyi de 'jog ny-i// sngon gyi go cha gyon pa'i mthus// ma rtogs pa rnams kyis
230a7(rnying rgyud): tsam gyis// mtshon nas rnam grol si dag la// brgyud de drang ba'i thabs nyid du// ci rigs tsam du bgro bar bya// rang bzhin yi nas sangs rgyas pa// mthong dang ma mthong rnam gnyis la// dman pa'i skabs na de mthong min// mthong ba dam pa'i skabs
230b1(rnying rgyud): na'o// mthong ba mngon thos rnam gnyis la// mthar phyin ngas pa mngon sum pa// sgo gros rnal 'byor spyod yon can// thos pas mthong bar 'gyur phyir ro// stug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang // chos sku snying por gyur pas na// de yi 'gro ba mi smin bye//
230b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs sku bstan nas tshig lam brjod// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dpag tu med pa'i dus rnams su// rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa gang // ji ltar rnam par bgros pa nyon// lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la 'jug
230b3(rnying rgyud): par 'dod na mdzod du 'jug par bya'o// rang bzhin ma bcos par bya'o// ljon shing bskyed par bya'o// dam par 'jug par bya'o// sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o// khyad par du 'gro bar bya'o// yul la 'jug par bya'o// mi long brtag par bya'o// mthun par 'jug par
230b4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// nad gso bar bya'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ smras pa/ lang kA'i bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag lus drang po dam pa rnams kyi mdzongad du 'jug par byan sogs pa
230b5(rnying rgyud): nas zhugs pas gang med la mi zad pa'i mdzad du 'jug pa nyid do// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sgo gsum gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po sgo gsum 'di lta ste/ spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo dang / thabs kyi skyong sgo dang / nges pa'i gas
230b6(rnying rgyud): dang gsum mo// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sgra de dag gang gis 'byed pa lags/ smras pa/ lang kwa'i bdag po sgo de dag ni lde mig gsum gyis 'byed par rig par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byed pa dang / 'grol ba dang / 'byin pa'o//
230b7(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di lta ste/ yan lag drug dang / mdo bzhi dang / rtsa ba gsum gyi lde mig gis// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mdzod// nges par 'byed ces rgyal bas bshad// lang ka'i bdag po de la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo lde mig gsum gyi
231a1(rnying rgyud): 'byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ yan lag drug dang / mdo zhi dang / rtsa ba gsum mo// de la yan lag drug gang zhe na/ rgyu'i yan lag dang / sbyor ba'i yan lag dang / 'bras bu'i yan lag dang / dngos gzhi'i yan lag dang / bzung ba'i yan
