276a3(rnying rgyud): zhes grags// de la 'dir ni 'di skad de// grogs mchog dam pas de lon pa// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa las// bdud rtsi'i las ni gnyis yod de// nad gso shi ba spong byed na// de gnyis mtha dang yang mi ldan// de smras lan du 'di skad du// ka la nag pos de
276a4(rnying rgyud): bran pa// sngon gyi rgyal ba grangs med kyis// brtul zhugs 'di lnga gtsor spyad na// dam tshig dam par bzung bas na// sngon gyi dam tshig yin par grags// de la dam pas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas dam tshig yin des na// dang po nas bzung rdzogs bar du//
276a5(rnying rgyud): de dang mi 'bral ldan dgos na// zag rgan chad na 'bral 'gyur 'gal// de l-i ka las 'di skad du// bdag de rtag par 'gyur ba yis// zag pa de yang rtag pa ste// kun nas kun du mi 'bral zhing // zad nas bral ba ga la yod// de la dam pas 'di skad du// phyi dang
276a6(rnying rgyud): nang gi zag pa rnams// thams cad thams cad kun zad pas// sa dang rnam thur lus rnams b+ha// ci smos kun snang zag lam zad// de la ka las 'di skad du// ji ltar gal te de ltar na// 'gral ba nyid du yin zin na// thams cad mnyam par 'ches pa rnams//
276a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid du mi 'gal lam// de la ngas pas 'di skad du// kun du med dres mi shes par// bzang po'i tshig la blo gtod cing // kun du bzang por khas 'ches pa// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur// yongs su rdzogs par kun mnyam yang // ma 'dres par
276b1(rnying rgyud): yang kun du snang // yongs rdzogs don du ma mthong bar// rdzogs spyod log pa'i lam pa yin// gsang chen thag pa'i tshig dang sgra// gcig la mi gcig so sor snang // nga ba nyid kyis rnam par phye// gang nyid nges par grol bar snang // nges par zag 'byung
276b2(rnying rgyud): rtsar 'dod na// de dag de bzhin ma bcos par// ye nas stong nyid rtog med pa// yin par nges pa de kho na'o// de dag ci phyir rtsi zhe na// rnal 'byor nad ni rnam rtog ste// rtag par 'khor ba'i gting mthar 'chi// rtogs pa'i rtsa ba phyi nang gi/ kun nas zag pa
276b3(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga yin// de kun de bzhin nyid stong du// rtog bral mu mtha' med 'byung bas// nad gso shi ba slong ba'o// dam pa mchog nges de bla na pas// mtshan mar zhen las de 'grol te// de nyid der nges rnyed gzhan min// de nyid che mchog sman par 'gyur//
276b4(rnying rgyud): lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nad gso bar bya'o zhes nges par thos pa rnam par bgros pa ste 'di ltar nges par shes par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas// lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtshan ma'i rtog pa pas
276b5(rnying rgyud): yongs su grol bar gyur to// snangs rba s+tha kun gyi dgongs pa 'das pa'i mdo chen po las rang babyung bdud rtsi'i lde'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o// // bam po bcu pa s+t+wa~M tha mar zug pa/ de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems
276b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa/ k+She gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyi chu cher bgros pa'i gsang bya dam pa 'di ji skad du brjod par bgyi/ mdo ni gang du 'dus pa lags// de skad ces gsol pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras
276b7(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye lang ka'i bdag pa kho bas ji lta ba bzhin bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ni brjod pa'i rnam grangs brgyad du brjod par bya'o// mad ni bcur 'dus par shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la rnam grangs brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun
277a1(rnying rgyud): dgangs pa 'das pargyam du can pa zhusas byag// nga po nas kyang drug/ NA dag pa'i rgya bus pang b+hag// rnal rgya rdzugasang 'du nas kya b+hag/ na sa ma nas kyang chug/ nag pa can ma mngon par rtags pa nas kyang /
277a2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes kyang bya'o// theg pa chen po byung tshul bstan pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lang ka'i bdag po gang la dgongs pa de nyid las mi 'da' ba dang / gang gi spyod yul ma yin zhing / med pa las thams cad 'byung
277a3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / gang gi ye shes yongs su bkod pa dang / 'di ltar gang nges pa rnal 'byor du lung ston pa dang / 'dir kun nas rngub pa dang / dam pa rnams kyis mngon par chud pa dang / gang la ma 'dres par bkod pa dang / gnas skabs bcu gnyis su nges pa
277a4(rnying rgyud): byung zhing 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lang ke'i bdag po mdo bcur 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang mtha' ba rngu kho nar 'dus pa ste/ de yang 'di ltar gzi gzung bar bya'o// rgyud dgrol bar byang // sgo dbye bar bya'o// mthar phrin par bya'o// thams cad 'dra bar bya'o// pa ngo
277a5(rnying rgyud): bair bya'o// saM gad par bya'o// nyams rnyed par bya'o// tshigs chung bar bya'o// mdo gcig tu bya'o// ljang ka'i bdag po de la chos thams cad gi gzhi ni dam tshig yin par shes par b+ha'o// dam tshig gnas ni 'di lta ste// bsrung bya ba srung du med po ni// chos nyid
277a6(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dam pa yin// kun kyang dam pa nyid yin pas// gang la'ang 'gal bur mi b+ha'o// swa yi dam pa 'di gnas bya// rlig badzi nA dam pa'i sa pa yin// bsrung bar bya ba'i yul rnams la// sgyu gsog g.yo med dam pa nyid// zab sangs rgya che dam pa 'ding// 'di
277a7(rnying rgyud): skad bgrugs pa'i tshul khrims dang // rtog pa'i bya ba ji snyed par// kun 'dir ngam brdungs rnam par dag/ dam tshig 'di ni rmang pa che// kun gyi thun mong ma yin phyir// mos pa chung ngu thams tshong la// bsrung ba'i mtshams dag gzung bar bya'o// theg chen yongs su
277b1(rnying rgyud): gasdang ba dag/ snod ma yin par gyur pa la// phyi drung nang dang gsang ba yi// sba ba'i thabs su bsrung bar bya// bstan pa'i gnas min snod gang dag/ rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams// ma 'ongs rab 'byor dam pa yis// brtags nas gsad bar
277b2(rnying rgyud): bya phyir bshad// gsang chen yid bzhin nor bu 'di// skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te// blo chung rnams la phan don du// thugs rje thabs kyis shin tu gsang // 'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang // log sred log po phyogs la zhen// dad med blo zhan bang
277b3(rnying rgyud): rmugs shing // gang la mi brtson mun par mtshungs// 'di log dam nyams 'di las log/ byang chub zag pa gting nas chad// sems kyi myu gu rtsa tshig pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha smra ba yin// gsang ba'i don rnams slar smra yang // gab pa'i gsang ba 'di
277b4(rnying rgyud): lnga shes// g.yon can shes rlom grogs rnams la// gsang bar 'os pa lhag par smra// yan lag rnam bzhi de nyid la// sgra thos don med nyams mi len// gang gis gang gtad mi thub pa// bcud med 'khor bar zag po yin// lha dang dam tshig spyod pa
277b5(rnying rgyud): yi// dam pa'i mdzod gsum slar smra yang // zhen pa'i mtha' med gnas ma gyur// g.yo sgyu phrag dog ser snas gdungs// bya med chos la nges 'dzin cing // de la de nyid de med par// rnal 'byor n+dan la dman zer ba// dam pa pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'bo// tshul
277b6(rnying rgyud): rtog tshod len khyad tshig 'dren// kha gsag lce gnyis sbyar byed cing // gang la dmod rmongs dam can te// tshe gcig dregs pa'i ched phyir rung // chu g.yo sgyu ldan slu 'drid pa// zang zing phyir 'breng tshig la dga'// rlom sems brjod 'dod tshul 'chos pa// 'og sgra
277b7(rnying rgyud): drug can tha mar sbyong // 'di ster pham 'gyur snod ngan la// gsang chen gsang ba de kho na// zab cing gting dpag dka' bas na// bskyon kyang pham sbyang gnas su 'gyur// de bas bstan par bya ba min// gal te bstan par gyur na ni// ston sna nyan byed dang ni

278b3(rnying rgyud): phyed cing // ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba myed// yang dag bsgrags brjod byed cing // yang dag don du gnyer ba med// dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing // dam chog don du gnyer ba med// ji ltar 'gro ga pa la dag/ nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste// 'drid

278b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log skyed can// gsad pa 'jigs pa'i skur ba lta sa nas// de dgra sdig pa mthong ba ltar// 'chad cing sa bcing gad byed pa// skyes bu de ni dam pa'i sras// dper na gang de gang dag gis//
278b7(rnying rgyud): gang gi rgyal khrims 'das 'gyur na// ring dga' mi gtong lugs dang sbyor// bka' yi ya spongs dka' ba de// rgyal po'i thugs menyes dam pa zhes// kun la snang ba grags par 'gyur// lu mo rang dug gi sdong byas na// ldum pas dug de shes ma thag
279a1(rnying rgyud): rbad nas byung ste/ med par byed// tsa phyir ldum zlas drug la// drug 'phel gyur na'atsho phyir ro// gang dag tams 'gyur drug can da// brtul zhugs can ldan la 'byor bas// gnasas ma la lus shugs te snang // gang dag ma spong mgon byed
279a2(rnying rgyud): bya// de dag gsang po'i das su yin// don larnal 'byong ga zhig gis// tha tshig zab mor bcas rnams la// bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo ba zhin// rtsa ba yan lag brgyas rnams pa// gal te mtshor zhig 'gyur yang // nam smin yod kyang ma ma nyam
279a3(rnying rgyud): dri ltar glang po e nA ya// shi nas ror ni gyur mod kyang // gi wang rtsis ni don byed ltar// rnas 'byor nyams te ror gyur kyang // gzhan gyi dam par de 'gyur zhing // de yi don byed nus pa yin// de lha mod kyang 'di kun rnams// rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya//
279a4(rnying rgyud): ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig/ rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor can kun ma rungs 'gyur// 'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi// ldog pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun// don dam nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas//

279b1(rnying rgyud): brdung // sal 'ang grags med stong ldan sums// shas rab nam thal ma gags mug sa dum m+sa zlunas// rdzas kyinan bu'i mig ldan pas// ma dang byung ba ldangs pa byag// man dul su 'dug shes pas// nga can da dpur ra ga
279b2(rnying rgyud): tshi ga lung las 'byung ba bzhin// drang srong dka' thub dam pa de// dam pa'i dam pa nyid yin pas// de la gsang sgro dbye bar bya// di ltar dka'i thub thub pa ltar// de ltar yid bzhin nor bu ste// yid 'od 'dod dang bde ba 'byung // rig 'dzin rgyal ba kun
279b3(rnying rgyud): yum mo// de bzhin dka' thub dam pa 'di// gnas pas rten pa'i gzhi yin te// dka' thub kun gyi srog kyang yin// dam pa kun gyi nor mchog go// dam pa 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs// dam pa'i bgrod pa'i lam mi mchog/ dmA pa chu bo sgrol ba'i g+ha//
279b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin dngos grub dam pa yin// dam tshig grags kyi mchog yin te// dam ga yong ba'i dmigs bu yin// gzhan sde 'joms pa'i dmag dbang yin// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed// des na dam pa'i gtan tshigs yin// tso nas gang gas
279b5(rnying rgyud): gsum po// dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas// gang 'dir dbang bzhi sun mi 'byung // sgo gsum mi gnod dang bcas gzung // yongs su mu ny+dza mas mdo bzhi'o// mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas// mdo dran pa la bgrang zhing bsngo// 'dul ba'i rgyun

280b6(rnying rgyud): 'du 'dzig yeng ba dang // tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po dang // khro gtum dang thung shin tu 'khrug/ rnal dbyer sbyor ba'i bdud lnga yin// yang dag don la sgrib pa ste// gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis// zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlod// rnal 'byor nor

281b2(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdag po gang 'di las// nyams par gyur pa gang zhe na// kun du nyams pa chen po dang // rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin bzlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// rtag par rgyun gyi khor mor 'byung // gang de bkang bar bya ba'i thabs// rnam pa
281b3(rnying rgyud): lngar ni bshad par bya// las dang rdzas dang 'dun pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang de nyid do// las ni rnam lngas skong 'gyur te// dang po 'bum khri gsum pa ste// rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo// yan lag nyams par gyur pa lnga// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya
281b4(rnying rgyud): sa ga du zugasas // 'ang sde kyi gyu ba / ga sa gag sas bste// m+b+ha / klung dgal gang drug dus pa sa/
281b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang pa dang ba yi ste// gdung ba'i shugs kyi ro yis// rtag par rmag chad pa ni// dmyal chen gnas na spyod bzhin du// gnyen po mchog tu de 'gyur te// de ni song ba dam pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs chen yang // 'jig rten sgeg la me dgos kyang // ba
281b6(rnying rgyud): chags sreg la me maM dgos// rig pa'i ye shes me byung bste// sleb pa'i bung shing thams cad bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang // mtshan ma bdud la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdu lnga kun rnam par 'gyu
281b7(rnying rgyud): lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang // sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes chu byung bas// bag chags ldan ljin thams cad dag/ stong nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing // de bzhin nyid kyi nam mkha' nas// 'bar 'phro me yi bskal par tshig/ de ni skams pa
282a1(rnying rgyud): dus man N+Di du zla ga / nga du pa klu mas dbyu da / shA das sa/ sgyu du smra sgyu byu sgyu spya /
282a2(rnying rgyud): dam me dkang chog la mthang // lang ka'i bdag pa de dbu ni ga di yongs su gzung ba rnam par bkris par shes par bya'o// de srid kyis rnas pas li ka'i ba sol rdzogs pa gi sa spyo ba tha // sa seM sa
282a3(rnying rgyud): dag la du rten pa byu mardzog sa chug sa ga / denas pa ga ba thugs dus pa pa rgyas thal ma pa 'i dag sa nga

282b1(rnying rgyud): la min// nges par kun du bzang nyid na// gang gi blta yul ngan la man// sgron ma 'dzub rlung bskyod la min// 'dod dachal chog du rgyal dman lnga min// blun rmugs rmongs la ga la med// 'jig rten pa'i spyan dang zhin du// dam pa de dag ni ltar
282b2(rnying rgyud): yAng d+ha/ sa mkhan lam la mkhas des na// ji ltar bzod par bla dka' yang // thams cad thams cad bzod par bya// dam pa 'di nis mkhan te// 'di ni bdag gi mgon yin pas// 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad kun// nges par thams cad rnam phyim/
282b3(rnying rgyud): 'dir gyen tsam 'di dag/ dam pa dag gog ma yon// gad cigaces gyi nga la// de m+b+ha zhig na 'di ltal// desbed tsam du bzod par rjod // tsi gA gar cigang byung ba mas smrabs// thogapas min sbyin dang // dam pa'i don du ma
282b4(rnying rgyud): spyam du brtags te dam myur bya// yun gyi don srid chen po la// dmigs nas m+b+ha gros phyir bskyed dri// bden tshig pade pa da mA pa dang // skad cig tsam b+h+rUM Tha tang 'dis// btang snyoms b+ha ba ga la srid// gad+ye dor mgon med bdag dakhyams na//
282b5(rnying rgyud): gis phyogs 'di dag la ni// phun 'byung rigs can su gA na// dam pa ma gtogs gcig 'go'i med// 'di na phan deng mgon mang zhing // dman par 'brel paM gang yod kyang // log par bsgrub pa'i blo gros mkhan// g.yung sang mchongs pa'i spa ba
282b6(rnying rgyud): mkhan// don la 'gog sgyum yod min te// bshes gnyen skyabs med ci skad du// kun kyang dmangs rigs grong khyer 'gro// byams blo'i yul dug pa rung // gang 'drir mun par nga khyams pa la// bde mchog sbyang ba'i lam ston pa// skyabs chen dam
282b7(rnying rgyud): gang de lags// gzhan gyis bskyab par nus ma yin// des nings pa gang ga // basbyin pas shin tu bsnyen par bya// gang 'dir srung ba'i tshul 'byung ni// dam pa nyid du dren par gsol// dam par snang 'grib pan chad// dam pa dri las 'ga' 'gyur/
283a1(rnying rgyud): sa yang ma/ rgyu ma ba// shA n+d+ha pa nas pa las nga bag// shAng sma la smras drams pa// gang rang gangaldaldan pas/ rnanas ma nul ba ngas// ngal dam pa na med do// dbyen
283a2(rnying rgyud): mi ldan pas// bslab pa'i yul bzlas the tshom zos// le los sprul la maM brtson zhing // hral bas de la ma gus pas// shes bya mun pa'i tshogs kyis bsgribs// gang gis nam mthong thibs kyis 'gags// gang pa byis pa shed mi 'phye// mdud pa'i
283a3(rnying rgyud): de lha'i gang zag dman pa de// dam par gzung bar gyur phan chad// dam par nges dang ma des kyang // bka' bcag lugs por ga la srid// gal te de yi rgya nyams na// dmyal ba rdo rjer de 'gro ste// mi bzang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// dmyal bsrung
283a4(rnying rgyud): ni lU de zhes// grags pa seng ge gzugs 'dra ba// mche ba gzangs rings dpal rno bas// zad cing mtshon tshwa'i lam du 'das// swA graM rno dpal ral gr-i nags// nang dug chad rgyags skyabs med// khro chu khol me thal sgo yi// chu bo rab med nang du
283a5(rnying rgyud): 'byeng // rje gsum mdung dang mda' bo che// khab 'dra dpal rno gzangs rings dang // chu bre ral gri rmos gang ba'i// mun dong me 'bar nang du ltung // sdug bsngal rgyad pa de dag las// thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do// slob mar gyu ra na sems ldan pas// dam pa

283b1(rnying rgyud): ge 'bru bkod pa// dbugs chan nang du shar nas kyang // lcags sdig pa mgo dgu pa// rag+na sha yag shar gyur pa dras// bsad nas dmyal ba chen por brgyang // rnam par 'tsho dang nor 'phrog dung // bgegs dang sdug pa'i dug dpal zas/ 1
283b2(rnying rgyud): pa de la 'tshe bar byed// sdig can yin te 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa// 'jigs pa brgyad rnams de la 'byung // sho gam gcan chen la sogs pa// gnod sbyin gyis bas du me bder 'gro// tsaM phyir lha srin sde brgyad las// gtum
283b3(rnying rgyud): gtum mo dam can kun// chos srung bka' yi las mkhan yan// bka' yi las lA dus mi 'dor// des na chos la spyod pa yi// dam par 'dug pa'i bla rnams kyis// nam yang zhabs la mi smod cing // bka' zur gcag par mi bya'o// gang gis rtsi gcig
283b4(rnying rgyud): chos bsrungs na// chos la bsrung ba'i srung ma rnams// gtum po mthu chen rnams kyis kyang // bu bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed// chos srung ba yang gang zhe na// chos rnams kun la ma rmongs shing // nges par shes pa gang yin pa// chos srung ba la mkhas//

283b6(rnying rgyud): de dang 'gal na ltung breb rgya// de stasngan dam pa'i lung mi gcag/ tshad mar nges pa dam pa'i lung // thams cad ldem dgongs can yin te// yul dang 'tsham par sbyor ba yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// ji ltar log skyed can dag gis// su dag 'jig
283b7(rnying rgyud): rten 'dren gang legs// kye ma 'jig rten dga' byed khyod// thams cad dga' bar ston shes na// bdag ltar dga' ba'i don bstan nas// 'bras bu gdon mi za shes na// thams cad mkhyen ces de la bya// da ltar mos pa gang bstan pa// pha ma bra
284a1(rnying rgyud): ze rgyal po rnams// bsad brlag yongs su bcom byas na// de dag rtag tu bde ba'i mchog/ de bstan de yis de spyad nas// bde mchog bde dang ldan pa yin// de bzhin bka' yi ldem dgongs la// mdo dang don gal tshe yod pas/
284a2(rnying rgyud): skabs chen dam par bzung ba de// tshad ma dam par yid ches na// de yi lugs kyang dam par bya// lang ka'i bdag po gang gi tshe// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des// kho bo la ni 'di skadabasgo// sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// bskal pa 'bum gyi
284a3(rnying rgyud): 'dun
284a4(rnying rgyud): na dam pa'i lugs dang 'gal// don dang ldan pa'i dam pA la// dus gsum dus ni thams cad du// phyogs bcu' zhing na bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun b+h+yon na// sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do// sems dpa' lha dang mi dag dang /

284a6(rnying rgyud): bdagra cag rnams kr-i ma lags so// bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod// bdag cag rnams kyi mgon lags so// mi shes rmongs pa'i blo gros mkhan// lam stong rnams kyis mkhan lags// yun khung la byams pa'i sngon ma lags// gdung ba

284b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba thams cad dang // sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa rnams// dam pa'i dam pa las byung bas// dper dran ma yis bu bskyed ltar// de bzhin dam pa shes par gyis// dam pa de yi rang bzhin yang // yid brten sems dang dul ba dang // tshad med

284b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med// ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ltar// gzi ldan brjid che yul mi 'jug/ 'du 'dzi dman pa'i las rnams spangs// 'phyo dang g.yeng bral gang na rtag/ seng ge lta bur gcig pur gnas// dgon pa'i rgyu dang dben lam bsten// 'di dang gang ldan dam pa'i
284b5(rnying rgyud): 'os// dam pa thams cad bkur gnas so// rang bzhin de dang mi ldan yang // dam pa'i mdzod dang gnyer ldan na// dam par gzung zhing dam par bya// chos kun mi shes ma rtogs kyang // dam par gyur pa'i bla ma la// bkur gnas rim gro cher byas pas/

284b7(rnying rgyud): da// khungs dang lung dang dbang gyur dang // blo gros nges de'i tshad ldan pa zhe// de las gnyen po bzhi 'byung ste// sems bskyed skyobs dang 'gyod stobs dang // las kyi stobs dang dmigs pa'i stobs// log po'i stobs rnams 'joms par byed// chub
285a1(rnying rgyud): bzhi las rgal bar 'gyur// rgyud kun yongs su grol 'gyur te// dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas cang ma gsung // des na lang ka'i bdag po 'dir// rdo ldan dga' dang gus pa yis// dam par gyur to 'tshal

286a1(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i 'dun sar rigs pa yin// 'phyo g.yeng brkam dang ma zhi ba'i// spyod tshul yul nas mi bya'o// khams las byung ba'i lus spyod rnams// bsgribs sam phag gam bskor bkab nas// thams cad bde bsgyur 'jam byas

286a7(rnying rgyud): skyes bu gang yin de ltar bya// kun gyis mthun par ma bsngags pa'i// tha shal gang yin de spyod spang // dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyin sreg dang // slob ma bzung dang chos smra ba// lung ma byung bar mi brtsam ste// dam pa'i yul nas de mi rigs/
286b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi don byas na// de ye yo byad mi spyad de// de kun dam pa de la dbul// dam pas ci blangs lhag ma glang // dam pa'i slob ma slob mar yang // dam pa'i mdun du mi rigs so// bkur sti sri zhu la sogs min// gang yin dam pa de nyid mnga'
286b2(rnying rgyud): rjes dam pas ci gnang ba// sri zhu mdun bsu lag gnyis kyis// blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya// rmugs med dran gsal rab bsgribs nas// rang gi spyod lam 'da' mi bya// blo gros ldan pa'i nyi ma des// dam pa lha ltar mchod bya'i phyir// mnyes par
286b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i yo byad brgyad// dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul// skyo dub med pa'i dad pa dang // gyong khengs med pa'i mnyen lcug dang // ser sna med pa'i zang zing dang // som nyi med pa'i sri zhwa dang // g.yo sgyu med pa'i drang dkan dang // kha gsag med pa'i rang rgyud dang /
286b4(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab dang // dri ma med pa'i lhag sems bcad// dam pa de la rdzogs par dpral// dam pas bsgo ba bslab pa'i mtha'// chub par rdzogs pas rked dkrol te// shes kyi kun la thogs med 'gro// rang chud mdud par grol pa yi/
286b5(rnying rgyud): shes rab mkha' la b+ha bzhin chu// mthar che brgyad dgrol yul spangs te// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thung pa'i// nor mchog dam pa de la dbul// rang gi lus kyang te rigs par// rin thang gang yin
286b6(rnying rgyud): nor gyis bslu// de nas ji bzhin gir bde bar// rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog la zhugs// sngon gyi dam pa dam pa rnams// bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro// sngon gyi dam pa bder gshegs rnams// ded dpon dam pa mnyes byas nas// kun spangs
286b7(rnying rgyud): dgon pa'i mthar gshegs pas// nyid las dam pa mnyes par 'gyur// des na ded dpon dam pa dang // nam du'ang 'bral ba ma yin te// ji ltar lus dang grib ma bzhin// blo gros dris na dam par 'gyur// ji ltar cang shes kyi ling dag/ sdom byed sgrog
287a1(rnying rgyud): gis bcings 'gyur ba// bkrol byas bde thag byung 'gyur na// tsa la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar// sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di// mi shes bcing bas bcings 'gyur ba// dam pas rnam gropa s+ho bya bas// shes rlung kun 'grong thogs
287a2(rnying rgyud): med 'gro// 'di na ma shes chud 'gro buM// mdud pa'i cing ba 'grol ba ste// rlung rnams grol bde bslab pa ru// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// yang ka'i bdag po de dag na chung yongs su dkrol ba'i bsgyeb pa'i mtho'i yongs su sa par shes par
287a3(rnying rgyud): de skad ces rnam pa pa na pa'i sa sams bye rnams ga tu ma rje mams dpa ma da dgas nga ngan bye dgo pa mdzi yang rten las na dadas pa mas pa drug na
287a4(rnying rgyud): nas yang gas dbya pa'i bdag sa dam pa'i mas kyi du chubasams dang sa ma pa na/ da das par la/ ga da ma yi rnam pa las
287a5(rnying rgyud): spyod dang klan du mongs// rnam pa gnyis su snang ba pa// tha dad du ma mang por 'byar// blangs pa rnam pa gnyis snang ba// mi shes pa dang log par shis// mi gos rdul brgyad pan gnyis// zhig rtog mur thag su stegs pa// de yang zhen chags log sad
287a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'jug rten pa zhes bya// mu stegs lo gdang gzhan rten log/ rka las 'byung ba zhes kyang bshad// mi shes 'ad ga nyis gzeng snang ba// dman rigs dang ni rigs ma des// rigs che dang dri shos can 'di dang // kun nas dbugs
287a7(rnying rgyud): mun pa yin// 'du shes can bzhi chags pa dang // gang la ka yeng dang yang can// mos pa can gis grag sa pa rnams// sa pan 'dzin pa'i zhing du snang // mig par rtog 'di sa mtshan can// brgya phrag gsum dang drug dru gnyis/ shwa ma
287b1(rnying rgyud): dang // tha dad rnam pa du mar snang // yo byad med pa'i phyogs 'dzin las// 'jig pa'i tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang // log par 'dzin dang lha khyad dang // rang gi brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin te// rigs mi mthun pa ste lngar grags// rang bzhin log pas log pa
287b2(rnying rgyud): nyid// gzhan chen log pa phra med spyod// lung la brten dang rtags tsam 'dzin// bcos mang spyod dang mu cod sgra// lung gi phyogs tsam brten pa dang // phyogs log grol dang bslang bas 'jal// phyogs ltas gcod pe rnam bzhir grags// bcos ma gzhan
287b3(rnying rgyud): las gyur pa dang // 'dra las skur pa gnyis khon// gnas dang 'khor dang yo byad na // longs spyod lnga lnga ni gzhan las gyur// dran pa rtag lta ltos 'dzin rgya// med pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med shes// kun nas rnam par mi g.yeng sa// gong du shes pa
287b4(rnying rgyud): yod sgra lha// de bzhin med par lta ba dang // 'di gang 'di las khyer lta ba// gang du yod min med min lce// bdag shi 'di tshe mya ngan 'das// gang 'dir sgrogs tsam brten pa ni// gang ma yin pa ma yin nyid// phyogs log bol bar gyur gyur pa// dug
287b5(rnying rgyud): ste so so tha dad dang // spyir lta gang rig skyon med pa'o// rgyur lnga byams pas dag par lta// 'tshe ba bcos pas dag lto dang // rgyan pa lham dang gos bcos pa// sra srungs bcas dang rgyan can dang // dka' thub sten pa drag pa'o// bslad pas
287b6(rnying rgyud): 'cha lnga pa gang 'di la// brten pas bdag lta ten rtog dang // rten chags byin chags bkra shis mtshan// skyabs log yongs su 'chal pa'o// phyogs ltos gcod pa gang zhe ni// phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa// gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa'o// gang
287b7(rnying rgyud): 'dir phyi rol rnam pa gsum// bye brag pa dang tha snyad pa// rang sdang gcig phyogs gcad pa'o// yang dag phra dang zab pa dang // rgya che yangs pa de kho na// gsang sngags reg byed rig spyod dang // rigs sbyor dam par phyogs spos gcod// gsang chen ba
288a1(rnying rgyud): zhugs par spyong dang // rgyal dbyug pa dang rnal thabasmra pa'o// zhang las byung ba gang 'di dag/ mthu' lus sde bcud rdzogs paste// gang su ldan pa rnabs 'angan// sangs kyus katu gnas so// ladaka' bdag po gas tha ba /
288a2(rnying rgyud): na
288a3(rnying rgyud): nyid// spyod pa rlabs chen cha shas can// rgya che ba dang mtshan mar spyod// de ni gsang chen gsang bar bshad// mngon rtogs rnam gnyis phyi nang 'jug/ mi mthun phyogs kyi gal bzung nas// cha gnyis so sor 'dod pa 'byung // phyi rol bye brag ba
288a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis gnyig nas 'byung // nang 'dug sems snang dbus mtha' med// rkyen shing phyogs 'dzin tha~Md // gang 'dring nges pang ga stod pa 'thung // mnga' dbus byed dang nges par 'a// gtan la sa
288a5(rnying rgyud): da da nga / na pa'i di sa pa de da nga/
288a6(rnying rgyud): ma skyes skye 'gag med// 'di kun ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// ma 'dres mkha' la gza' skar bkram// yongs su rdzogs pa mkha' khyab bdal// 'ja' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres gcig/ rmongs rim cig car 'jug spyod pa// 'dod pa'i yul la zhen spong dang /
288b1(rnying rgyud): spro sbyar shes rtogs spong dbang byed// shes pa 'jig rten rtog 'phags pa// spyod pa blo ldan dbang sgyur thabs// gang 'di'i snod kyang bzhir gzigs te// zhen chags log sred rigs rgyad can// sgo gros rgyan gyi snod rnams la// bstan bya rnam pa bzhir
288b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// 'dod rkyen bkri drung brgyad pa'i tshig/ ldem dgongs don dam nges pa bzhi// snod kyi rkyen dang sbyar ba yin// 'di kun shes bya'i gzhi gcig la// 'dod pas mthong ba tha dad pa'o// 'di ltar mthong sgo ze dad bzhin// rnam par steng 'byung
288b3(rnying rgyud): bkod pa la// gang gis kun la zhugs bltas nas// gcig tu 'bebs pa dam pa'o// ji ltar bung ba khung tshol ba// kun du 'jug cing byung nas ni// rang gi gseng khung gang yin par// nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar// rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshal
288b4(rnying rgyud): ba/ spyod sgo ci yod bstan te bsdu// lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bsngar nas// don dam nges pa'i gsang nyid la'o// de nyid don gyi rjes gcad phyir// skyo mo kun nas bskur ba yi// bslab par bya ba'i thabs yin te// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// yang
288b5(rnying rgyud): ka'i bdog po de dag ni gyis 'byung bar snang ba'i sgo yongs su dbye ba yin te// kun nas bskur bar bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa'u rnams chos thams cad kyi sgo rang sdang bar
288b6(rnying rgyud): shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug tu brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye grob
288b7(rnying rgyud): po dag mthar phyin par bya ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa ni bsam du med pa mthar phyin par bya'o// bsam du med pa ni sems kyi de kho na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o// sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i ngo
289a1(rnying rgyud): na nyid dug par byen pa rgyarmA/ nas rgya shen/ dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa di kho n+taH la ma khas na sems kyi khan nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems kyar lan nyid la mkhastan bsam du med pal ma kham par 'gyung pa/
289a2(rnying rgyud): bsam du snyed pa las bsta pas ma gyis mi chub pa 'das pa mkhas par 'thad de// bsnam thos sa bya sa lam tshungs pa mkhyen pa ste/ don nas pa tu du she par byed// zugs bdag
289a3(rnying rgyud): sa nga nas nga / sa pa sta/ ni'i nga du sa //
289a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor yang gsum du shes par bya ste// gsum gang na/ 'i rnal byong dang / nang de rnal 'byor dang / kyai rlung gi rnal 'byung ngo // thogs pa dag de la phyi'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa rdo rje zhes bye 'i rnam byang chen po pa
289a5(rnying rgyud): rung dang / durjo dung da mas nga rjodapa nab rjed dang / du/ / dadang / mde yin tu 'durnal 'i skyon rnam chogs byung ba pa de'i byed rnam par byar byeng byung dbyer pa'o// ba bdang /
289a6(rnying rgyud): nang gA rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rna le 'byor chen po dang / de bzhin du rtog pa dang / dpyod pa la sogs pa gang zin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs
289a7(rnying rgyud): dag phyi nang gi rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / dman pa dang / dam pa dang / 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / byas pa dang / ma byas pa dang / bcas pa dang / ma bcas pa dang /
289b1(rnying rgyud): skye mabu dang / khyad par gyi rnam pa rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar byin cing thul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag da dag ni bya ba'i rnal 'byong du shes par bya'o// b+ha ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rten pa dang / sprod pa dang / mig dang /
289b2(rnying rgyud): khyad par dang / ma 'gyur ba dang / rtsal gyis gnon pa dang / kun nas rig pa'o// grogs po dag de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / bskyod/
289b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bsgyur ba dang / rtsal dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / sgo dang / shes pa dang / gnas dang / rig pa dang / lam dang / 'jug pa dang / ye shes dang / khyab pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa
289b4(rnying rgyud): yin pa'o// gzhan yang mthong ba dang / mi yengs pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / sngags dang / yi ge'i sgo rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po ngag de dag ni bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor du shes par
289b5(rnying rgyud): bya'o// kye grogs po dag bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang / bslab pa dang / sbyor ba dang / rtog pa dang / ltung ba dang / ma nor ba dang / nges pa dang / dgongs pa dang / ye shes dang / tshogs dang / bslab pa dang / dngos grub dang / ting
289b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang / chen po dang / ye shes dang / byang tshul dang / che ba dang / rol ba dang / jom pa dang / brjid pa dang / mthu dang / cho 'phrul dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa dag dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid mthar phyin cing phul du gyur par bya'o// de yang ji lta
289b7(rnying rgyud): zhe na/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ ji ltar mthon ri rtse ngag la// skyed mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na// mthon sar snang mthong kun gsal bas// thams cad kun sded lam la mkhas/ de bzhin shes rab mthon ri lo// brtson pa dam pas kun bltas na// kun
290a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa sugs b+h+ya/ lta shAs ma dang // na la skangs par byab// / ma du thung bar ba bya bste// dmang+yas pa sa ba dupa// mkhas par byab na gnas// gas sbyo ba nga ba'im pa ca par thab
290a2(rnying rgyud): shes par byu // krid kyis smras pa'i/ dma' pa'i lus kyis pa 'a rnams kun gle byang kyur ba dgongs pa dris par khyon ting bzod pa zab par dbyer ti// dus rgyas ldan gyi dgangs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsapa kyis mi khyab pa
290a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug tu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba po'i bdag pos dam pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag thams cad du 'du bar byas pa ni 'di lta ste/ bya ba dang / rang bzhin dang / bsgyur bas so// thogs po ngagad la
290a4(rnying rgyud): bani bsdu pa'i bya bas so// rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis so// bskur bas 'dul bar bya pa ni 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang / dus dang / tshad dang / grags pa dang / grags dang / rtags dang / thob pa'o// grogs po dag de la chu ni yo byad chen po lnga kho na'o// dus ni
290a5(rnying rgyud): mthang bcu rdzogs pa dang / nye bar dris pa dang / rigs can 'du ba dang / gsal ba thob pa dang / las su rung ba dang / mtshan ma 'byung ba dang / mang po sngags pa dang / nyams rnyed pa dang / bya ba rdzogs pa'o// grogs po dag tshad ni 'di lta ste/ ded dpon dang /
290a6(rnying rgyud): snga ltas dang / sbyin pa'o// grogs po dag ded dpon gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ goms pa dang / rig pa dang / 'du ba dang / thob pa dang / rdzogs pa'o// grogs po dag snga ltas ni 'di lta ste/ mthong ba dang / 'byor pa dang / nus pa dang thos pa'o// grogs po dag ston pa ni
290a7(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ mngon spyod dang / mi bskyod pa'o// grogs po dag grags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chu bo bzhi'i chud du byung ba dang / gang dag las 'phags pa dang / gang dang ldan pa dang / gang la mkhas pa dang / gang thob pa nyid do// grogs po dag gags gang zhe na/
290b1(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ thob pa dang / mi chags pa dang / mi gos pa dang / sreg pa'o// rtags gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ grags pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / brtson pa dang / 'byung ba'o// grogs po dag thob pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bskur pas thob pa dang / tshul gyis thob pa'o//
290b2(rnying rgyud): grogs po dag de yang 'di ltar thob par reg par bya ste/ gang 'dir snying rje yul rnams la// byin brlabs 'byung ba gang yang rung // 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag la// glegs bam bcu gnyis sbyin par bya// gang sbyor ba yin la 'byor la// nyi zla gnyis na
290b3(rnying rgyud): sbyin par bya// dbugs tshon 'asbyin pa'i rnal 'byor bas// rin chen bdun nyid nges par 'thob// lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gsung drung brgyad dag thob pa pon// rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i ni lce 'byor pas// rdul bcu'i khyad par de nyid 'thab// @
290b4(rnying rgyud): gyi bla ma dam pas ni// rtog stong 'bar ba bla med 'thob// dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang chen 'di// ma thos gzu lums rang bshad pas// rab 'brum bstan pa kun brtul yang // dam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar rdul rigs chud byung ba// mang pos
290b5(rnying rgyud): dbang por dpon bstabs te// 'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis// kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar// de bzhin rnal 'byor chud byung ba// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bstabs te// rtog stong 'bar ba la sogs pas// khyad par glu ma dam par 'gro// 'di ni bla ma'i
290b6(rnying rgyud): khyad par te// rgyal mar nges par 'thud pa yi// rgyal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i thibs// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// kye grogs po dag de dag ni thams cad 'du bar bya ba yongs su babros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dben pa dam
290b7(rnying rgyud): pa dag lung dam pa bstan pa'i drod thob par gyur to// sangs cas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun zung ngo // // de nas yang gsang ba po'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems
291a1(rnying rgyud): dang nas sa la smras pa/ stsogs pa drug pa dang par bya na 'drags/ gang gamaston pa dang // sam ga pa gas ste/ 'dadu rang bstan pa rjes srung snang ba nab/ rnamam pa'i rjesasu 'byung ba 'phrab ba nanamams nyad sa
291a2(rnying rgyud): su sems las byung bya 'thob man/ chos nyid kyi rjes su chos thams cad 'grob yin/ de ba'i zu gangs pad+ma sa ng+ge'i rjeste ga gsung ba dang / byud ma da pa thams cad 'thebs na// dgangs pa kun nas 'dus pa de ltar ba shad pa bzhin du gang /
291a3(rnying rgyud): pa de ltar ro// kye grogs po dag de yang 'di lta ste/ mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam// kun nas mi mnyam yongs su mnyam// gsang sngags stong pa'i khyad par yang // gang dang don gyi mnyam par spyad// byin gyi brlabs kyis spyod pa'am// dbang du
291a4(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi spong ba ste// dper na nam mkha' rtsal po 'am// ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra// da yang de yul che chung gis// zad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin// rul po de yang khyad par gyis// dbang sur bya ba'i khams rnams la// me chung rim pa yod pa bzhin//
291a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang // thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang // bab tshod zad du 'jug pa ste// dper na glang rjen chur 'jug pa// rab dang glang chen bab ma lta// de yang rtsal snyi drag zhan gyis// la la thang du gcad pa la// la la lu li gzhol
291a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs so// de ltar rnal 'byor spyod 'jug pa// 'bras bu don la bab gcod kyang // rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis// ji ltar nas tshad de spyod phyir// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang // sleb dang golas rtog pa dang // bro de dang ngam tshig ting 'dzin
291a7(rnying rgyud): dang // dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang // lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur nas// thams cad gcig las med na yang // grangs sam dbye ba grogs phrag rnams// snod kyi rtsal dang spang nas ni// khad par ci yang bstan pa yin// de yang rtsal gyi khyad par
291b1(rnying rgyud): kyis/ dang po las kyi zad par las// sogs pa'i na la 'byang chu nga rnams// rang rang tu bu bar nas na// rgyal rgam rdzog sa pa'i rnal 'byor la// sngags pa na la 'byor chen po'i tshul// stong par byed nga dron 'aspyod pa// Al zas mkha' stod lus spangasapa
291b2(rnying rgyud): btsal ba'i yul ni chad ma yin// nor bu lus kyi 'phang dmas pa// rang skal 'tsho ba'i tshed bor nas// rgyal po thabs kyis 'bring mtho ba'i// longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang // de dag mi 'thob 'tsho thal zhing // skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag
291b3(rnying rgyud): skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o// de phyir dgongs pa kun 'dus la// gang 'dir rnal 'byur dman don du// gso dang sbyong ba'i spyod pa dag/ dman pa dag dang mnyam par gsungs// gso dang bslang ba'i rtog pa 'di// rtog pa can dang mthun par
291b4(rnying rgyud): spyad// gso ba rtog pas zin pa'i nad// lta sprod nyams pa'i sman gyis gso// shi bslang ba yi rtog pa 'di// khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa rnamAs// rtag chad mthar shi ro gling nas// gti mug bam chen ro blangs te// skye 'gag med par glang ba'i phyir/
291b5(rnying rgyud): rol yid bzhin nor bu yi// sngags kyis btab ste gnon par bya// ro yi gnyen por bdag gyur nas// ro sngags chun mo 'chad par bzlas// ri yi gzi byin byung ba na// bar chad med pa'i brtson 'gus bya// ro de 'gul bar gyur pa dang // gang gi 'gyur rtsis
291b6(rnying rgyud): thug par bya// ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas// bzlas pa drag po chun mi gcad// gang der langs par gyur pa dang // cho 'phrul 'jigs tshul ston par byed// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas// ro la brdabs na gser du
291b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi// rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur// gre bshad ral gri mtshon cha dang // ro yi mgo bo gcod pa des// je ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste// mgo thod go char bzung nas ni// lce yi ral gri mtshon thogs nas// lha min g.yul
292a1(rnying rgyud): yong bzlog par 'gyur// ra langs grub pa'i dang 'phags na// dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste// skyes burnal dang ldan pa mas// sngags banang brnas rtangs gcig tu/ myang 'dangasas pa mababs par// mun 'a blangs skad cig
292a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten bskor// skyes bu lag tshod ma lal bar// dri ma thag tu gnas su skabs// yud ltar shin tu myur ba'i rba'aM// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// ro la 'dod pa thams cad 'gyur // ral ra bsgrubs rogapa na// ro ma dngom tho mi snang bar//
292a3(rnying rgyud): lhar bskabs pa d+ma skad phyir// rol nam rtog ga la yod// rnga ma ro yi rang ban dag/ meng bar shes pas thag tshad bzhin// smang pas de ltar mnyam spad na// lha spyod mnyam zhes dam pas bshad// 'di ni sha~M ba kong ba yi// bdud dru nga
292a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o duste// dgongs pa dam pa'i kun 'dus gsungs// grogs po dag de dag ni shri bskong ba'i rtog pa yongs su spyod par shes par bya'o// grogs po dag la spong po'i spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rtog pa de zug rngu snang ba dang / gud yongs su byung
292a5(rnying rgyud): debartog pa'i zung rngu snang ba ni gang rtog pa'i dngos po snang ba'o// grogs po dag rlung yongs su sna ba ni bkod pa'i rtsi bas skang ba dang // me rtsabs byung ba'o// nga la bkod pa'i bya ba pa spang ba gang zhe ni/ brtsam pa las kyi dang po dang // dam pa'i don la
292a6(rnying rgyud): pan// thabs mchog lngas ni sbyang bar bya// rdo rje du tshigs bsnyen pa dang / gang 'dar nye bar bsgrub pa dang // srub po chen pos sbyar ba la// grangs drus mtshan mar bcas par bya// rnal 'byor bcad pa'i bka' sgo 'dir// gsang mo ma raT+Te swA
292a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// ci phyir dang po yin pas ni// byis pa blo shed ma bye ba// mangs ldog 'dug bcas pa yis// theg chen don las gol bar 'gyur// gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byas pa dag/ 'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang // 'gyur dbang ma nges sa
292b1(rnying rgyud): ste// ji ltar 'tsham par bad thabs sbyar// rdo rje thabs chen chom pa la// rdo rje 'dzin tshogs bzla dag ldan// dbyas kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// dzi b+hU yang na bsam pa 'am// brjod dam dngos sam mtshan ma la// 'jig rten dbang po chos lugs kyis//
292b2(rnying rgyud): mos pa la bskyed dran byas te// rang bzhin yul las phan nas ni// phyags la sogs mchod na ni// rdo rje dman dang rtsir skar ba// yo byad chen po la sogs pas// rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs pa dbul// rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te// mnyes byas las grub
292b3(rnying rgyud): grangs rdzogs nas// mnyes nas chud sbyangs 'dod par bya// snod du rung ba'i slob me dag/ dbang mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis// 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol// rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga yis// bslab pa'i gnyir rnams ci rigs par// rdul gyi rnam
292b4(rnying rgyud): par byin nas kyang // rdo rje gal chen mna' bor ro// de nas sgrub pa tshe chung rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa nan tan gyis// rdo rje rnal 'byor dka' bya'o// mi nus la sogs mi snang ba'i// rdo rje'i tshig gis nAn chags bya// rmongs pa gang phyir sems bskyed pa/
292b5(rnying rgyud): mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur// shes rab mig can shes bya'i yul// thams cad rim bzhin bstan par bya// drod can blo dkyil che rnams la// rnal 'byor nad par gsing sgo dbye// rtsing po 'gros kyi dmu rgod la// gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams
292b6(rnying rgyud): bstan/ rdo rje lung gi tshig can la// ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur// rtsal med malus gang dag laM// phan pa 'bang zhig bsngags pa yin// gnas 'dir gsal dngam gsal dag/ 'od me dbab cing ljid mi dbab// rdo rje glo yi yul can la// rdul chen
292b7(rnying rgyud): sbyong zhes gdam par bya// rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang bral du// rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher// rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye// so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dag/ spri 'am yang na re re'o// gzhan yang shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs// ji ltar thabs kyi tshogs sbyor ltar//
293a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa na/ nas stsos / srung// zugasapa/ ma / /
293a2(rnying rgyud): byas mnyes par bya// thog blamig pa sngags pa// ga don na pa rnams rnam steH/ gtan yad rje'i seMs ma \u0f7f// rjes sa b+ha ba ga // dus pa mnyam par rag gas na// de nyid mnyamanga'i rang bzhin no// rnga lha ma du /
293a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs// 'das dang ngad ltar byung ba dang // mi zung ma nges charnams la// dbang sbyar mnyam ngang rgyal ma rnams// nga ngag dang bya dang smin pa dang // stongs par gyur pa de dag d+haM/ rdo rje rnamathar tshad mang dang // sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa 'i// shes rab ra
293a4(rnying rgyud): dang dam pa'i dkyil// daM t+ta rim par rdo rje yi// klu gang la sogs yo byad kyis// mtshad dang 'jug tshul ji lta bar// cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lha yi nyi ma rnams lar// bde ba chen po pa sogs pa// chomathu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams// sbreng
293a5(rnying rgyud): ramA ra rer sbar bar bya'o// 'das pan ma thar tshogs bskrun te// da ltar 'thung dang med bung la// tshad med sems dang rnam thar bskrun// de ni mnyam pa'i rgyalnga por 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor byang chub sems// rdzogs la bcu drug shA rgyas chu
293a6(rnying rgyud): rje ye shes shar ba na// mkha' la nye shar tshul bzhin du// drim pa 'dzegs pa rdal 'byor pa// yang dag nges panges pa yin// pi cu gsumal la bkod pa ni// rdo rje dus hU~M na rdzogs spyar// mang tshogs dbus rag nyab/ gzhag gis rdzogs
293a7(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// bcu gsum rgyal chen rdzogs pa'is// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas na// brjes pa'i zlab bcu dag gis// tigs la 'ad kyi phyag rgyal// mdzes par skyes pa'i bing bde// baicwa drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pa bgran// rdzogs cing na
293b1(rnying rgyud): bA// de bzhin nyid du spangs pastan// mnyam pas stong par gyur ba sa// thams cad chos skur rdzogs byang chub// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// rmad byung sems bskyed las rkyen spyad// gra ma drong dra krur pa na// dam pa spyad na nya ma 'char// dus 'dri /
293b2(rnying rgyud): gyi bar chad na// snyan pa dag gis bzlog par dka'// bar chad byung na bskang gso bya// mkha' la zla gsal gri rgyas bzhin// sa la rnal 'byor gargyas lud// gang 'di rgyas na bsod nams dang // bsngo ba chen pode las rnams bya// des ni nyi don 'jo
293b3(rnying rgyud): sa
293b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rnams// rgyun gyi rgyun du bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob// rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa/ rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i tshogs ni bskyed sbyar la// mchod bsnyen bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di ni don dam nye ba'i lam// dam pa bskrun
293b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur phyir ro// 'dir ni rkun gyi rgyun tshogs des// dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur// gzhan yang rdorje dra ba'i dbyings// thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'di// rdo rje rdo rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pas ni// thams cad 'brang bas dbyings zhes
293b6(rnying rgyud): bya// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin rdzogs bcas// 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas// de ltar rim bzhin sbyar byas na// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar rje// 'dod pa'i khams ltar mnyam par gsungs// gzhan yang gang
293b7(rnying rgyud): dru gang 'brel ba'i// gsang chen dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'angadi // phan tshun dra bas 'brel pa la// stong nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// sprul pa gyi bcer yang snang // gnyis me dadra pa'i tshul du 'brel// rnal 'byor chen
294a1(rnying rgyud): po'i yul de nyid// bral dang ldan pa'i gsang slo ba// 'di la gsang skyod dbye bar bya'o// gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams ni// blo gros chen pa thabs ldan pas// me stug dga' ba'i ngo mtshar ste// gsang chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/
294a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po nul mor bcas// lnga gnyis zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril tshul slar// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang // rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon nyid sgra brtan dril bu dang // rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// rgya
294a3(rnying rgyud): 'dud ba'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing gA yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chem khyu mchog la sogs pa// sems pa dmun pa'i lus khri la// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcus te// kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar ba//
294a4(rnying rgyud): brgya gsum chu lugs bsregs pa rnams// rim gyis sam ni cig rngung bskyed// gang 'dir 'dong khams chags zhen pa'i// dbang po rim par snang bur bya// de min yab yum yang mi dmigs// gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang // gnas 'gyur
294a5(rnying rgyud): ba yi rang bzhin gyis// lhag rgya rgyal po chul mor bcas// brgyad gnyis zung skyil 'khril 'byung sbyor// sa dang nam mkha' snyan rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// bzhi gnyis dag gis mnyer sbyor ba// bsam byal
294a6(rnying rgyud): sogs de bzhin no// rdo rje sgo dang bcas par ni// rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor longs spyod cher sbyar bas// mnyes nas sbyar phyir rim bzhin dbul// gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rnams bsgrub par bya/
294a7(rnying rgyud): 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba mthun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs// mdza' 'phrod rkyen dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril// ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad// skad cig yung tsom thang cig
294b1(rnying rgyud): ga yang/ yud tsamathan ga cigs ngas// mA s+ya nya ma bkra shas m+b+ha// dus la bab pa'i dus chen dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i ng+yas chen yin// dri ltar dpyor pa'i po byud rnams// rAg dang ma dag khyang par gyis// gtsang ma kha zas d+ha sogs dang // na
294b2(rnying rgyud): nad 'joms bdud rtsi rnams// rgyal ba'i tshogs dang 'byung po la// ji ltar 'byor ldan nan tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang // chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi spangs te bzlog tshul sbyar// rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur// gdung ba'i
294b3(rnying rgyud): ga ma / 9 / na pa sa / pa / da pa ra
294b4(rnying rgyud): brjod par bya ba'i rigs// rdzas dang yo tha~Md thams cad kyang // tsas dngul de ltar rtsal dang sbyar// des na las 'di khyad par yang // tshogs la tshogs bsnyed skye ba sbyangs te// bstan pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu man rkyen
294b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i// de skad sems dpa' ngo rje sa// 'dus pa myal mo chal bshad // 'dus pa kun gyi don mthong ba// dza na dzin pa de la gas pa// skams dpa'achen po bdag cug gis/ sma rnam s+sa san kI rang bzhin gyi// zabs nyid shes rab ti
294b6(rnying rgyud): dang // kun nas mnyam dang bcu drug cha// yi ge tshogs dang 'byung ba'i dbyung sa// gnyis med dra bar 'brel la sogs// rang bzhin nyid 'don gzugs brnyan du// snang bar dris par mthong lags so// de skad gas sebs ras gsungs pa// gang
294b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs med kun// ji ltar mthong ba de ltar yin// yen sa ma bcos ji bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de kho na// dgongs pa dam pa spyan grub pa// ting 'don dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid// de dag rtsa ba sems nyid pas// sems can ga drugs
295a1(rnying rgyud): brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal// rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du// thams cad ye nas zhugs bkod rdzogs// de las khyad par skal ldan me// spyod yul gyur pa gzugs brtan te// ras 'jam khong snyoms bzang la sogs// kha dag
295a2(rnying rgyud): lnga'am nyi shu lngas// ma mthong myongs la bsnyen phyir mtshan// mA nyams mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur// bsnyen ni nges 'jam khang bul// kha dog 'bar bar gzugs mtshon te// cag sum nyams mdzes ldan na// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ston par nus/
295a3(rnying rgyud): gser dngu la zangs lhags la sogs pa// gang thugs rgyal ba'i sgra byas te// phyag rgya mnyams dang ldan na/ de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// shel rdo dang la sogs pa la// 'bar las rgyal bya'i sgra byas na// de bzhin ma nyams rgyas mdzad na// ma
295a4(rnying rgyud): ma 'bung ba'i rten du 'gyur// blag sha byang chub shing sogs la// mkhas pas bzor bzhogs gzugs brnyan gyis// phyag rgya ma nyams kun rdzogs na// 'di yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas// kha dog mdzes dang ldan pas la//
295a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten yin te// mtshan mas mtshan ma grol rig pa// gang dgas las rgyal ba'i dbyibs// kun du lham par byas pa la// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes bkod na// rnam grol rig pa'i rten du 'gyur// gang gi gzugs brnyan gang yin dang // de yi
295a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gcig pas na// 'di la khyad par cung zad med// 'di yis rnam grol rig par 'gyur// bder gshegs pho brang gar yang rAb// dkyil 'khor tshul du gang byed pa// yad 'ong mtshan ldan dben phyogs su// kun nas lham par mdzes byas la// srad bu brgyad dang
295a7(rnying rgyud): sngun byas te// bsgru ba'i byabs mdzes byas pa// de nas srang thu gcig gis bskor// rgyol 'khor rdul du gyur pa dang// nang ba sbyim bsrung tha brgyar// ba'i ma ldan pa dkrur 'gyur te// mtha' zad sum char byas pa la// kun ma nang du thang brags sa// gamongs
295b1(rnying rgyud): mangs par batha// dbul ma na bsas la// nga // slong sum bya// ba brgyad sa me pa kyang la// ngan ka pa nang la bsas// bad gyur // cu zad med ngas par na// la pa gsum thos mo pag

295b3(rnying rgyud): dang chun 'phyang dang // dril bu g.yeng ka the'u chung 'phyang // rol mo sgra sgrobs lha yi bu// mang pos phyi nang nam mkha' las// mchod pa sna tshogs 'bul ba ze// theg chen gdung bzhes rab brgyan te// rin chen khaM ba mchod rten dang // rgyal mtshan rin chen 'od
295b4(rnying rgyud): 'bade bas// gzhal yas mdzes par brtan pa ni// chos kyi sabreng ci 'dra bar// de 'dra de nyid mngon par bre// gzhal yas khang dging chur ba// kun gyis mdzes dang legs par brgyan// mchod pa blan yod med kun// de ltung 'byor lta nan tad dbul/

295b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyud byeng rnam grob reg/ grogs po dag de dag ni dkod pa bya bas yongs su su bar shes par bya'o// grogs po dag 'dil ma'i byabs yongs su spyad pa bu bden/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad chos nyid du sbyang ba'i phyir dngas po rnams ca
295b7(rnying rgyud): me'i rang bzhin du byin gyis darlabs pas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad mo'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ste/ shin tu ngam nas ngo mtshar du bstod pa// e ma'o sems dpa' sems dpa' che// che ba'i che ba blon badrangs kyi// ting 'dzin chen
296a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba che// cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che// thabs mchog dpag gis ma lad ste// chos kun mo dpung 'bar bar snang // de nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong // 'bar 'phrogasal bar gyur pa ni// mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs//

296a3(rnying rgyud): la la hU~M/ thugs rje bde mchog a pA la// dbang phyug 'jigs byed a pA la// gsung mchog rmad 'byung byin brlabs kyis// me yi rang bzhin chen po dag/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// de skad 'dras pas gsol ba las// de nyid dbyes
296a4(rnying rgyud): pas 'di skad nga// 'das pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag/ nges par bshad kyis gus par nyon// khyad par bla ma'i lam mchog 'dis// rna ba snor thabs pu bde sbyar bas// rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsregs spangs// don drung

296b2(rnying rgyud): spyang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs zis// rnam bzhi las tom khung du// bzhi 'am bzhi yi yam sh-ing la// rigs bzhi 'dar ba'i me byung bas// mchod sbyini dngos po bsogs spangs them// 'di yang so so'i khyad par gyis// phyogs dang kha dog
296b3(rnying rgyud): dbyabs dang pa // gang ltar rigs pa da lta skad // shar ston pa byung dkar sa dang pahA// mthing gnag po thal mdog sbyar// zlum po pad+ma le'u tshwa bzhi// 'khor lo grwa bzhi zung brgyad chos// zla gas bu rgya gzhu dbyibs dbang // thugs ma b+ha ga'i mkhang /
296b4(rnying rgyud): spyod// gsum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes// las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis brgyan// ye shes rdo rje las rgyud ldan// bla ma gsum gyi thabs mchog sbyar// dag pa'i mtha' mnyes mchog 'dzin pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i gla bro gang // mchod pa nges pa
296b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor tshogs sbyar// rdo dz+ha las kyi byin brlabs stor// gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas// bsher bta bzhi pa'i lha rgyad dang // rgyas dang dbang bshad rgyud bshad pas// lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dbya// de bzhin grwa yi myud+ma 'byor bya// rigs kyi rigs

296b7(rnying rgyud): brjod nas kyang // mnyes par bya bar thabs chen brtsam// mnyes pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang // gang yang ma byed don chen rnams// grub dang ma grub de rnams dang // mi la mkhas pas btag par bya// me sra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis// 'bar grol
297a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang dbyibs rnams drug/ de dag yongs su shes par bya// gal te mtshan la mi sdug na// yid du mi 'ong rtags yin pas// sreg skang chen pos rgyas par bya// de nas yid 'ong 'dod 'byung ba// me lnga 'dod pa'i mtshan ma rnams// rnam

297a6(rnying rgyud): nas ni// ro rnams khyab par dgod par bya// de nas ro yi phung po de// rten+da nas glegs ma stegs bu yi// steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya// thad kyi cho ga bya ba yang // maN Da la khor yug ran tsam la// brko dang kha khyer lugs bzhin bya// phyag rgya bzhugs
