297b1(rnying rgyud): bar khang dag gi glegs bam la// ro yi bzhin phyags ro bzhir bstan// ro yi steng khang yang 'og tu// ras la sogs la bris pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod// ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la// rdo rje gzungs kyi chud thag bzhes// btags nasahA
297b2(rnying rgyud): ma'i phyag tu phul// shing gi bya ba rdzogs pa dang // de yi gyi mtha' stegs bu la// rnam bzhi las kyi lha rnams dgod// stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // rdo rje las kyi sgos btab pa// rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la// 'khor ba sreg par mnga' gsol te// mi g.yo
297b3(rnying rgyud): me chen rtse gcig pas// maM yi 'du 'phro kun du bya// rdo rje sngags kyi las sngar la// rnam bzhi pas kyi mnga' gsol te// las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya// bla ma rdo rje dam pazheg/ ra y-i nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas// las kyis bsags pa bzang zhing
297b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs// skabs spyod rdo rje bla ma yis// bla med mchod pa rkyen du bya// bro gar bu tshig stabs chen gyis// mchod pa rol mo sna tshogs dbul// rdo rje las kyi smon lam gdab// mchod skabs las kyi mjug tu bya// rdo rje las kyi lha 'dzin pas// dkar byang
297b5(rnying rgyud): las kyi lta bzung ste// legs mtha' dam pa rnams la dbul// ra~M yi nyes mtha' gang 'dzin pas// mtshan ma nag po bud shing dag/ ye shes me yi klong du skyeg// sde stor me la gnas pa'i lha// me yi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// me yi lha mo gos dkar
297b6(rnying rgyud): mo// rgyal ba kun gyi 'od yin te// 'thung ba me la dbang bskung zhing // thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin// srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis 'ches// dngos po sreg pa'i phrin las ni// thugs dam dbang gis yang mi 'da'// gang gi sgrib sreg de nyid mkhyen//
297b7(rnying rgyud): ro yi rnam shes byang ma byang // me la mkhas pas de bzhin brtag/ mi sdug tshul 'byung sreg sbyang bya// gal te legs na me dbang bsrung // thal ba sku gdung ring bsrel dang // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la sogs bya// dam pa zhig na gdung btags te/
298a1(rnying rgyud): rten du dbul bar bya// 'di ni sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ de skad sems dpa' mchog des spras// grogs po dag de dag ni me'i bya bas yongs su shes par bya'o// rdo rje gas bcom gyi spyan// me yi bya ba las byung ba// gdung shes grags pa'i sha re ra swa// dang sha med
298a2(rnying rgyud): ji srid dus drag nas// grangs med sprul pa'i rgyal ba dag/ mya ngan 'das par gyur phyin// med pa las byung sku gdung ni// sku yi gdung dang ring dbrel zhes// 'gro ba'i bsod nams rten du grags// rgyal ba rnams ni dngos med pas// sku gdung ring bsrel mi
298a3(rnying rgyud): spring na/ can rnams pa pani nadu// med las zug pa rjid tshang rnal banag/ de bzhin pang dag 'i// gang 'ding snang bgro ma da// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku ga dung yang// shA nga ma shes grags par 'gyur// des lam ltar brjod na/
298a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// rang 'byung rjes gnas 'byung bcas rnams// tshul mthun gcig par gyur pa yi// sku gdung sa bon byin brlabs kyi// yon tan cha las rtsir 'phel ba// 'dzam glings khams khyab par snang // gdung las byung phyir sra mkhregs
298a5(rnying rgyud): tha spyad rdo rje rab tu grags// sbrang bu byur gas me til skad 'dra// gzhan tshe'i mar ram 'o mar snang // nar son sbyin rtags sra zhing mkhregs// tsa na kA ye 'bru bzhin du// dkar la tsan dmar kha dog gsal// zos pa'i yon tan bsam me khyab// bdud rtsa
298a6(rnying rgyud): mchog tu grags// de bzhin rig 'dzin sems dpa' rnams// mi yi lus su sprul pa dang // gang zags pa tshos mig ldan// bsod nams dpal zhing dag pa dag/ stong bu snying por sbyangs phyi na// skul ba can la snang ba ni// la la dag la sha ri ram// la la dag la
298a7(rnying rgyud): ring bsre ba ste// skal ngan dag la snang mi 'gyur// la la snang bar gyur na yang // sbyor ba dag la yun du rtag/ ma dag nub cing 'bros par 'gyur// yid du 'od dang mdzong ngo'o// 'gyur ba'i lhas ni ston par byed// yod par rtag pa ma yin la// med pa rlag par
298b1(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor las dang 'byor pa rnams// ngag dang ma dag tshul la sbyor// de yang bsod nams dag pa yis// gang lam rgya cher mos pa dang // rnal 'byor rtse gcig rmog btud na// rdo rjes sbrel dang las mthun na// rgyud rnams yongs su dag la 'bab// de yang
298b2(rnying rgyud): khyad par rim pas ni// rgyal ba'i sku gdung sha ri ram// zhing khams kun du khyab par ni// mgar dang bzos ni bzlums pa bzhin// byas pa med las snang ba dag/ dkar 'tshor mdog gsal 'dzag 'dra ba// tsan dmar mdangs su gsal ba yi// nam mkha' gang bar/
298b3(rnying rgyud): char bzhin 'bab// rig 'dzin sems dpa' skal pa'i gdung // dka' gsal 'ga' 'ga' tsam du 'byung // gang zags pa'i rtags chen ni// mdog mnyam gcig gsum gnyis gsum gcig/ la lar lnga 'am bcu 'byung zhing // yon tan de ni de ltar ro// de
298b4(rnying rgyud): yang sra mkhregs rdo rje 'dra// lcags kyi gtun gyis yang mi tshogs// 'di dag phebs pa'i yon tan yang // gang dang gang du babs pa yi// yul khams de dag thams cad du// nad dang mi nges bgegs rnams zhi// gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs pa// drag po gtum po'ang
298b5(rnying rgyud): lhan ner 'gyur// rgyal po 'khrugs dang khams 'khrugs dang / yul khams 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog 'phel smin cing // yid du 'ong ba thams cad 'byung // yul de dmangs dang rgyal po yi// sa bon thams cad bu phor 'gyur// bder bcas
298b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldan rig pa mthon ni// bu pho kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di dag su la 'chad pa rnams// rig 'dzin sa dang skal ba mnyam// 'jig rten 'di yi bsod nams kyang // 'khor los sgyur rgyal dag dang mnyam// de yi dgongs pa kun du 'grub// tshe dang skengs
298b7(rnying rgyud): nga las 'grub 'gyur// phyin cad bla mid byang chub ni// sa la reg pa'i rtags chen yin// gzhan yang yon tan bsam mi khyab// de dag rang gi rang bzhin du// gnas pa'i yon tan de dag go// bsgrubs na yon tan bsam mi khyab// sems can rnam pathang
299a1(rnying rgyud): cad la// byang chub snying po nyid yod pas// me yi las kyi bya ba yis// lnga phung sbyangs na med mAM sid// 'di dgu bsgrub par bya ba yang // shel gyi za ma tog nang du// bsdus te phyag rgya'i rgyas btab nas// shel gyi gdu'i nang du bca'// bslang /
299a2(rnying rgyud): pas de la smon lam dang // sgrib sbyang gsol 'phrod 'du bya// 'phro 'du bya ba'i cho ga yang // nam mkha' gang ba'i sha ri ram// zhing khams gang ba'i rgyal ba las// tshar gyi rgyun bzhin dri la 'bab// rtse gcig bzlas pa gsung gi rgyan// ma hA sha ri ram
299a3(rnying rgyud): hUM// grangs med par chad med par bzlas// mchog tu gsal zhing 'tshor ba dang // 'od kyi zer bying ni zer bzhin// zang zing byung bred snang bar 'gyur// nu ma tog gi phyi rol na// gsal ba de la 'byung bar 'gyur// 'phrul zhing meng por 'phel ba dang // rgyal ba
299a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rig 'dzin gyis// gzugs brnyan shel dang de las ni// gsal bar bdag pa ston par 'gyur// dang po snod de khengs pa yin// gnyis pa phyed dam brgya rtsa brgyad// tha ma'ang grangs 'gas 'phel bar 'gyur// de dag grub pa rtags chen te// de tshe
299a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub blang bar bya// thob pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// tshe 'dir rig badzin sa la gnas// rgyal ba dag dang mnyam par 'gyur// zhar las byung ba'i yon tan yang // 'gro ba kun gyi don spyong pa// sems dpa' che ltar 'grub par 'gyur// thun du de la mchod
299a6(rnying rgyud): dgos te// mchod na yon tan dam pa 'byung // mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yang // sgrib spangs bsod nams dpung bskyed de// rang rgyud dag par byas nas ni// zla ba dus ni thams cad kye// bcu drug cha lo rdzogs pa'i tshe// bdag nyid gcig pu sems yul du// bur ba
299a7(rnying rgyud): byas nas mchod pa ni// za ma tog dang btsas bdag/ rgyal mtshan rtse mor btags byas te// ji ltar 'dod par sngon lam btang // des ni 'dod pa thams cad spongs// de ni rnal 'byor skal ldan gyis// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rdzas
299b1(rnying rgyud): margyag tu// mang gos med du ma rung // de wAr ro dag gsar 'gyur dang // de bzhin me yis bsregs spangs bzhin// dngom par spyod pa ji snyed pa// de nyid dam pa la migaso// de la sogs pa mtha' yas spyang // dngas po bag la gnas spyod pa// rdorje sem+b+has/
299b2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i chos nyid de// spyod pazang 'byung ngam pa yi// ji ltar glang po chur zhugs pa// thogs chags 'jigs pa yod med par// dga' ba'i longs spyod srong tshul gyis// mA ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar// rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa yang // brtulo zhugs rgya mtsho
299b3(rnying rgyud): chur 'jug pa// rtsal chen skyong ba'i grod tshul gyis// thogs chags med par la dor ba'o// spyod pa gang bar bya ba'i thabs// goms pa klong du gyur pa gces// grogs po dag de dag ni la dor bar shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i chon
299b4(rnying rgyud): chen po la surnal 'byor spyod 'jug gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang gsung bya ba'i bdag pos dman pa rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag gang gis gcad par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid do// de d+hi'i phyi
299b5(rnying rgyud): zhen// dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig bsgrubs pas bsam gyis me khyab pa'i chos la bslabs pa'o// de kho na nyid gcig la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'o// de kho na nyid de lta goms na bsam gyis me khyab pa la sgom pa'o// de kho na
299b6(rnying rgyud): nyid de las ma 'das na byasam gyis mi khyab pa'i dam pa bsnyungs pa'o// de kho na nyid de la zhugs na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o// de kho na nyid de la spyod na bsdam gyis mi khyab pa'i yo byad la spyod pa'o// de kho na nyid mngon du byas na bas
299b7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgya mtsho snyed byas pa'i// de kho na nyid de ma nor bar bstan na chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa bstan pa'o// de kho na nyid de phyin ci ma log par thos na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi sgo thos pa'o// de kho na nyid de mngon du gyur na/ dpag tu med
300a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad kyi brgyad du bya ba'am snying por bya ba ni de kho na nyid de de las med pa'i gyur ro// grogs pa dag bas na 'di ltar// de bzhin nyid kyi don mthong na// mthong bas thams cad
300a2(rnying rgyud): ma yin// de nyid go 'phang mchog 'phags na// bla med mtho btsun mtha' dag brdzun// de bzhin nyid du nges phan chad// gang dman spa gong zhum pa med// de bzhin nyid du thag chod na// 'jig rten gnas kyang chos kyi sku// dam par nges kyang 'jig rten 'jug/ 'khor
300a3(rnying rgyud): ma bas// thal ba sa rgyags/ sman kyi pa'i kyim mi // ba bya / 'du pas 'digs pa ny-i// ga ma pa di sa// ba ste/
300a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // khams gsum zil gyis gnon par 'gyur// klong du gyur pa smos ci dgos// dper na med b+hag khyang srong dgra/ mig ma bre zhing mar blangs kyang // kun skrag skyong 'am mkhar 'gro ltar// de nyid nges par gang gyur pa// de dag 'jig rten gnas 'jug kyang //
300a5(rnying rgyud): go 'phang dam pa de nyid du// nges pa ci la'ang bag mi che// rim gyis mtshan mar spyod pa dang // med dang dmigs dang mi dmigs dang // bsgrub dang bgrod par byed pa yi// bye brag med par rtog 'jug pa// blun po de dag stongs pa ste// dam par nges pa ga la yin// gcan
300a6(rnying rgyud): gzan tha ma'i phru gu 'dra// skrag cing dngang ba'i rang bzhin no// mthara' yas ji snyed chos kun gyi// rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa bzhin// ma bcos phyin ci ma log pa// de bzhin nyid du thag chod pa'o// ji ltar khyud chen mkha'i lding ba// 'drab gshog rtsal gyis nam 'phang
300a7(rnying rgyud): spyod// de brag ni nga tha mas kyang // 'thang tshig nu nga / kyang ma 'ang thob/ sdig pa'i spyod na ba'ams kyang // de bzhin ma mngon bye ni// ga nga thos bzhi bang // 'di ni dang dgas pa'o// ma
300b1(rnying rgyud): dam pa nyid pa lta ba yi// go 'phang gcod pa nges par gces// grogs po dag de dag ni sa yongs su gcod par bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa rnams re dogs med par thag gcod pa'i go 'phang thob par gyur to// sangs
300b2(rnying rgyud): ngas pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las the tshom yongs su gcod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dmin pa rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag gang nyam rnyed par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pa dam pa
300b3(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i gtsang ni bsam gtan te// 'khor los dbang skur ji bzhin du// chos kun dbang sgyur bsam gtan yin// rnal 'byor bsam gtan chen po 'di// dug dang mun pa gser 'gyur bzhin// thams cad dbang sgyur bsam gtan yin// des na
300b4(rnying rgyud): garten bya// gal te bsam gtan 'di med na// rgya mtsho di dge pha bong ltar// dpag tu med pa'i sgo bcad kyang // don med snying po skams pa yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan ni// ji bzhin pa yi de nyid la// ma bcos pa yi blo bzhag ste/ ma
300b5(rnying rgyud): meng ba'o// rnal 'byor dam pa ji bzhin pa// sems kyi chos nyid de nyid do// de bzhin nyid ces mi dmigs pa// rtsa ba'i kun shes kun gzhi nyid// ci phyer ma byas ma bcos pa// rang 'byung de bzhin nyid ces bshad// thams cad kun du snang ba ni// dus
300b6(rnying rgyud): bcom nyid// tse phyir kun du snang 'jug pas// phyi nang kun du snang bar bshad// rgya yi rnam par bkod pa ni// 'dug pa rnam shes sgo lnga nyid// thams cad gang gI d+ha bkod pas// thams cad 'byung ba'i n+ya zhes bshad// gang gi dgongs pa
300b7(rnying rgyud): ma yon zer zug med// dbu mar me dmigs kun rig gsil// yod min mod min pas kyang 'das// gang 'dir tshor 'gro ma rabs dang // gang 'gog byis pa'i spyod yul dang // 'di gang nyams pa'i log srid can// yal ba phral pa dmigs
301a1(rnying rgyud): 6// bag ga/ gang da skya bas ma ngas pa / dag pa gnanas mthang sgrubs// mad ma su sa 'anamang snyam nas// de mtha tu na 'byung rgya// mos pacudu thams cad na// gdus bdag med rten bkun mazang // gang bkag g+sa
301a2(rnying rgyud): med pa// ba la gtan dang gi yi rnaM// ban snyed na pa'i sbyong ba sas// shini tog me la byung pa gnyis// stong pa nyid la des padag ste// dashA' ba baspyod pag ma pa'o// bdag gras gzhan sno kyu bstan te// spyan med mig sogan na / 5
301a3(rnying rgyud): nadu sod ci// gang med gnas pa / sa na shin// y-i da par me ku // nyid myed phyir me gang da dzin tho man// ba na phyugs kyi na dpal mid parnaM/
301a4(rnying rgyud): da'i drini med pa 'gror kyang // de nam mkha' med dran po 'is// de nyid skye ga pa mi 'gyur// drug gi spyod du mtshan ma ste// mar+d+han ma dngos por snang skyem hU~M shA shA dag pade de / sbyor srung gong ba zlog tu med// thams cad mas
301a5(rnying rgyud): tshig med ting ga rjod-i // ba btsang pa yongs yongs pab stong po// l-i tsA ba ridagasag 'dzo// me man+tan tan pa sgom me dgas// snron yin spyong len bye nod rnams// gang 'di dpyod med zang 'brer na// gnas lhag mthong
301a6(rnying rgyud): las d+hi // dreg pas de mang med pa nang // dgrags pas byang chub semapa pa ster// smrangs pas mi spyong mthu' yas rgyas// bezlas byas ma dus spyor sa// gang kyang med pas cad ga pas// rnams cing drug pad+mad da pa yin// dngas pa myang
301a7(rnying rgyud): pa med papa spyod do/ gle tha~M nga ngo sa phyir / su 'phrum pa me nga bag drimang pasun de 'ang ba// na dang 'dus su kyi nga // lung theg mi dam pa// nga na ma gyis // mabying papo
301b1(rnying rgyud): ni// cig car 'char ba'i de kho na'o// des na gang dang gang dag gis// ji ltar go dang mos bzhin du// bstan pa gang dang gang dag lnga// sa so yid brnyan yul du bya// de bas sgron ma dpag med kyis// dam pa ji snyed gsungs pa rnams// gcig tu chad dam nges med de//
301b2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar nges// 'di la gang 'jug par gcod pa// le lo bya mang rgod pa dang // g.yeng dang thugs dang 'dod pa dang // gnyid dang ro ngogs the tsom dang // 'dra 'gro slo deng dga' ba'o// de yang rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// dug lnga la sogs kun 'byung nyid// rang
301b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung rang ni de bzhin nyid// dam pa'i don la gang sgrib pa// mi g.yogasal bde sdug bsdub dang // skye ba gsal ba 'byin pa dang // des dang khyad snyems 'byung ni nyid// bsam gtan chen por des snang ba// kun du mi nyams re dogs med// dang ba mo hUM mi g.yo dang // ma
301b4(rnying rgyud): chags mi 'chad len pa med// 'khrug pa med na rang bzhin nyid// rnal 'byor bdud kyi spyod yul ni// dam par 'dun mthong dam par smra// sprul pa grangs med 'gyed mthong dang // dam pas spras kun gsal mthong dang // dus kun shes gsal mthong ba dang // rgyud
301b5(rnying rgyud): dag las nas kun snang dang // de la gdung ba'i shugs 'byung dang // phun snang gsal bar mthong ba dang // ci la'ang phyogs med 'gro ba dang // mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro 'dug dang // dam po'i phyag rgya lung ston dang // kun gyi skad du chos sgra dang // dngos po bsnyen
301b6(rnying rgyud): gapo ba sti ga nas mthong // thams cad mnyam par bkod pa dang // de nyid ring bzhin gsal snang dang // las su drang ba thogs med dang // das pa'i do la bsgo ba dang // 'jig rjen gtso bos mchod ba dag/ rang bzhin shes na dam pa'i rtags// gang mi shes pa ma
301b7(rnying rgyud): drug matsurnams skyes dang // rang 'gyu du bu grizhug/ mi skyes bsrin ga tu meng// de yang de bzhin cing ngo // sa dang me ngas bye// kyis dang legs pa ga sa / myong sa /
302a1(rnying rgyud): btud do// bad+ya na dam pa gang dus pa// rnag 'gror ma can ma'i sngags yin// rgyu klung me gser ga na bar// 'dra 'a tho byung byings pa banan// dam par nges na dam par 'byung // dam par mangs thams cad bdud// dam par ngas na na nga
302a2(rnying rgyud): gang 'byung dam pa'i snga ltas so// gang gi dam pa nyid thos na// mi skrag mi dang dga' ba ste// gang zhig dam pa nyid lta ba// thams cad dam pa nyid du mthong // des pa'i slong du gang gyur pa// nam grangs mang po dam par spang// dam pa nges pa mthong ngan// tshig
302a3(rnying rgyud): rjes su dri mi 'gro// de mthong thams cad dam par gsal// snang ba med pa'i dam pa ni// snang ba med pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nyid kun gyi chu yin te// cho 'phrul grub thams cad 'byung // g.yo dang drod thob brtan pa dang // gsal dang rtags thob brtan pa
302a4(rnying rgyud): dang // nyi zer rdul phran smig rgyu dang // mtsho rlabs rlung dang char gyi rgyun// sprin lding ta la gang 'phar 'gro// sa g.yo 'byung ba'i skye mched snang // 'byung rgyun zug rngu la sogs pa// gang gis yongs su nad zhi ba// mun pa'i skye mched choms pa dang // lus kyi
302a5(rnying rgyud): bzod pa thob pa dang // kun la bde blag ji bzhin pa'o// gang min gong du sbyar ba dang // gang med pa las gang 'byin pa'o// yid 'ong 'dod grub rdzas mchog rnyed// kun dga' kun 'dud kun yid dang // kun la dbang sgyur mchog 'grub ltas// yud las sngon
302a6(rnying rgyud): du 'byung ba'i ltas// sgren mor byung dang rtag par 'khru// rnam dag chu bor 'bogs dang rgyal// char rgyan bum chu 'byung ba dang // gseg dang g.yeng dang rnam par 'thor// 'di gang skyong ba dag pa'i ltas// gang 'dir 'jigs dang bral ba yang // g.yul 'gyed zhi dang
302a7(rnying rgyud): zug rngu byang // tha mar grol dang gshed las thar// gdug pa'i tshogs bral dug nad zhe// bcing grol btsad ltas bzang po yin// khyad par dam pa'i sngon byung ba// khri rkang shing dang ljon shing skas// 'jog dang gyen du 'gro ba dang // ri rtse'i mchod rten nam mkha'i
302b1(rnying rgyud): skas// gong nas gong du 'phar ba'i lhas// gang la gnas dang non pa yang // khri mthon la 'dug glang chen zhon// seng chen khrung lding 'dab chags dang // mchod rten rtse dang po'i sgo// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang // lus las spri byung nyi zla la// 'dug
302b2(rnying rgyud): pa gang la gnas pa'i rtags// dam pa rigs kyi sngon byung ba// bka' rtags dbang por dbang sgyur byed// 'jig rten skas la 'bebs pa dang // dbang sdud g.yul rgyal rgyal bar 'gyur// mgo la me tog zod skyes pa'o// chos gang dbang sgyur sngon byung ba/
302b3(rnying rgyud): glegs bam rnyed dang 'dri spyod dang // gzhan la ston dang gtan la 'bebs// me long bum gang lta rtog 'thung // nor bu thu dang 'khor lo babs// nyi zla zin dang ri rab skor// gang la sgra brgyas stong gsum gang // dngos po mtha' dag yi ger mthong // klags pas
302b4(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar kun skyed dang // mkha' las me tog char 'bab pa'o// dam pa mthong ba sngon byung ba// sgron ma mthong ba yul mthong dang // stong gsum mthong zhing gling rnams bgrod// ri rab rtser phyin thams cad mthong // nam mkha' mtha' yas mthong ba dang // rgya mtsho
302b5(rnying rgyud): gting du phyin pa dang // sgron me thogs dang snang srid dpyod// nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o// lung chen thob pa sngon byung ba// rol mo 'brug sgra seng ge dang // chos kyi bgro ba zos pa dang // gzugs brnyan zhal 'dzum 'od 'byung dang // dam pa'i gsung thos su mi mthong //
302b6(rnying rgyud): glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang // gzhal yas dreg la sme 'byung dang // grogs po dam pa lces 'byung zhing // de nyid 'gro bar byed pa'o// rig 'dzin dam pa'i lhas shar na// byin brlabs mthu yi cho 'phrul yang // nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang // re rab rked nas gsor ba dang /
302b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang // sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba la// sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kyang // khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus// 'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la// so so'i skad du chos mthun par// 'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su// gang la de ltar
303a1(rnying rgyud): ston par dus// nal 'gyur tsalas khyad par byas// 'dag tus khams pan gams su kyang // bams ca man na byung hA// dgub pa rangs par myong 'gyur// g.yang bya la ga sbyang ba las// 'phrul rgyas seMs bsgrags pas//
303a2(rnying rgyud): yid mthong rnam grangs chos rnams kun// sngags snang sngags su ma gyur med// rnal 'byor che chung rim pa dang // rtsal gyi khyad par dag las byung // rim gyis 'jug dang cig car ba// dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang // thos dang mthong ba la sogs te// sems
303a3(rnying rgyud): kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings// zlos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/ yan lag pi gos so yi// rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas// 'phro 'dra'i tshad dang phyag rgya'i khyon// chom pa'i grangs kyang de bzhin no// 'di ni dang
303a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i drug rims te// mthor gyis 'dres shing goms byed pa'o// yi ge ye shes las bstan te// don byed pa'ang phrag rgyar 'byung // rgya mchog non dang nam mkha'i skas// rlung 'ching ba dang rgyan bzlog pa// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhes bdang // nyi blanan nas
303a5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'phang // sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'dug tshul dang // dacig dang spang ba la so myos te// bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa// goms pas las su rung ba yi// rnal 'byor rtsal chen spong bar zung // bzlas pa mthar phyin
303a6(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang // bcing ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang // bsam pa las su rung ba dang // don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa// bya ba yongs su dgra pa dag/ don gcig yul la so sor snang // des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang // de nyid gcig la sgom mod kyi// rnal 'byor
303a7(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyi khyad par ni// bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te// dang pos la gnas pa yi// btsal ba las ni rnal 'byor pa// 'dun pa'i sems pa'i rnal 'byor la// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po// shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dmas pas// ting 'dzin rtsal yang
303b1(rnying rgyud): spong bab// de nyid mthong bar ma 'gyur bas// rang ga mas pa gang dam gastan// dralas pan gang yin pa// ba dag dbyabs kyis pa nas na// swa phye dathugs pa thAswA ta// dI zhal du gu cad du// 'ad zang 'ab nga sogs pa 'apas// 'ba'adugan /
303b2(rnying rgyud): da ba // ga tu cing byur bang // sulakhyen 'a tsam na/ nyis pa'i sa sa gdas pa'o// bka' pas seMn / sogs pa na pa'i byod rnam zin pa/ di sa par gyis// m+b+ha du shin 'gyul/
303b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba bcas pa de// dri 'byung ste ni tshun chad du// 'gro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las// rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i// sgra yi khyon yang de tsam mo// gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor lung gi bka' sko la// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gas pa
303b4(rnying rgyud): po// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod// lha yi sa bon grang yin pa// rang bzhin yi ger bskur byas te// 'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa yis// zos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du// 'phro 'du gsal bar byas pa las// rang gi chag tshad bzhi 'gyur tsam// swa ye/ blon
303b5(rnying rgyud): yang de tsam mo// de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin// lha pi khyad par gang yin pa// yi ge'i rim pa bzhin sbyar nas// 'phro 'dra tshad krung de bzhin te// rim pa ji bzhin sbyar nas kyang // 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang // sems kyi phul ni ji tsam du// ska 'i
303b6(rnying rgyud): khyon gyi khyad par yang // chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas// sgra mi khyon gyis gang ba'o// de ltar gser skangs 'tsher ba bzhin// sems nyid spangs pas de nyid gas la// 'phro 'dra sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'di// rim gyis snod la cig tur rjod// lang ka'i 'das
303b7(rnying rgyud): hU~M/ sadun med pa min // mas dang dud dmings bshad // 'dredun cu rgya sa bya/ rnam ma'i 'dun skyegs bam sa// phyogs sa gas// 'byung na pa spro sugs pas// ga rten gas shug
304a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'chad// rdzas su thAg gi drung bzhin no// da zhin nyid las ma gsasu pas// thams cad bdud ci rgyun mo 'chad // 'khor ba rgya mtsha yo byad rnams// mthong ba rgya mtsha' rang bzhin tu// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kunra// dranu bdang mdzad/
304a2(rnying rgyud): sprin rgyun mi 'chang// bran sa de bzhin nyid dbyings las// sems can sangs rgyas snying por shar// 'gro gang bras ma gyis mi khyab pa// rang 'byung sangs rgyas rgyan mi 'chad// dngos po brtan gsol sogs pa'i// sgra sma bsam gyis mi khyab pade// kun \u0f7f
304a3(rnying rgyud): gsung sngags gsang ba'i tshig/ bzlas pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad// de dang de yi dbyings nyid la// gang dang gang gi thabs sbyor pa// ye nas 'du 'bral med pas na// sbyor ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad// srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ stong pa'i mtshon cha'i rgyal
304a4(rnying rgyud): po yis// dngos po med par bsad pas ni// yoM sgo chen po rgyun mi 'chad// snang med dag pa'i gzhal yas su// kun gzhi dpal gyi maN+Dal la// rnam shes thig chen srad bu brgyad// ye btab dkyil 'khor rgyun mi 'chad// 'dod khams rmang gi ri ra ba la//
304a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs khams pang rim khri 'phang brtan// gzugs med dum ton bum par btsas// gdud chen chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad// nam mkha' me rdzas rlung rnams// rlung bad+mor rab rten du snang // byeng rim de bdun bcas pa rnams// rdo DI bang rim khri 'phang brten// rA
304a6(rnying rgyud): bum rten bum par bcas// 'di yang gdung chen rkyen mi 'chang // 'dzugs pa'i yan lag gzhi rmang rten// la bIr lo tshogs chen khri 'phang brtan// yan lag dang po bla ma rten bcas// snying lo cod pan phreng bas bklubs// de bzhin nyid kyis gzhil// ji bzhin pa 'i
304a7(rnying rgyud): gdapalas khang // ma nor ma bcos rmang chen brtan// byang chub sems kyi rtsig chen gtams// ye shes lnga yi skar mtshungs gsal// bsdu ba tshad meng rna mthar sgo// dran pa yang dag tha~Mm sgras brgyad// rdzu 'phru rta babs dag gis brgyan// mi 'jigs rig pa'i
304b1(rnying rgyud): gdung chen la// yang dag brgyad kr-i ka byas mdzes// rang 'byung ye shes dang rtse 'phags// bden gnyis khyams kyis nges par mdzes// ye shes blugs rje yon tan pas// byin brlabs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// zas nyid rlabs kyi bla re bres// sib stan
304b2(rnying rgyud): sgrogs theg rgyan lpags// ji bzhin chos grwa po zang 'dir// rtul ba bzlogs pa da lta ngas// kun ba zung sems kyi nyid ldas// gan+d+ha gzhis 'dis yongs rdzogs chos// sems dpa' phrad kyis des spong ngos// bstan pa comam ldan ma 'chang //
304b3(rnying rgyud): mkha'i skas bgrod nas// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// snang srid mtha' thug med la lha// de sa ni de yu la yangs par 'gyur// rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams byas te// de la gnas pa'i sems can la// rdo rje sems dpa' brtan byas te// thams cad dam pa'i
304b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer byang // nam mkha' dbyings kyi ling ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dedus gnas par// myur mgyogs chu zla'i 'phen shugs kyis// zhing khams kun du bgrod par bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi ling gal// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// shin tu nges
304b5(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa dang // mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal// rnal 'byor sdigs mdzad rtsa mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'o gang lnga 'bar// shin tu brtan par red pa dang // chu des sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhal// rnal 'byor lug gi dkyil 'khor du// sto
304b6(rnying rgyud): gsum 'jig rten khor yug bcas// nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phangs nas ni// sa nas sar ni spang bar bya// rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba las// zer las nyi ma 'bum 'phros pas// phyi nang mun pa thams cad bsal/
304b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor las// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas// bdud rtsi chu bo'i rkun byung bas// sreg pa'i dmyal ba'i me chen bsad// gzhan yang lang ka 'i bdag po ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo ni 'di kho nar 'dus par gsungs pas// 'di kho na ltar
305a1(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang // de ma thag par ma gyur kyang // de nyid gang brtags de ltar snang // gdos bcas yul na mi sdung yang // yid gzugs mngon shes kun mkhyen snang // gang
305a2(rnying rgyud): brtags de ltar de ltas nas// mngon sum gsal por red par 'gyur// yod med legs nyes rang bzhin rnams// chu khams rtas pa lta bur zad// thams cad 'di yis byed par 'gyur// des na ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso// dper na rgya mtsho nor len mi// sbrul dang
305a3(rnying rgyud): chu srin sbrang ma la// sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun// dka' bas nyams su blangs pa 'grub// de bzhin rnal 'byor rnal tshol ba// rnam rtog bying chags 'phyar g.yeng dgra// gzhom par dka' ba'i las 'di dag/ nyams su blangs na bde thob rnyed// 'di na
305a4(rnying rgyud): dkyi
305a5(rnying rgyud): tid+ya 'dzini dam pa yin// nyams su blangs pa'i bslab pa ste// sems nyid goms par bya ba las// 'dris par byed pa rab tu gces// grogs po dag de dag ni nyams rnyed pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// dman pa rnams gang gi dgongs pa dam
305a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyam drod rnyed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dbang blar gyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad
305a7(rnying rgyud): ces smras so// grogs po dag gang 'di la tshogs chung bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// ci la yang bya ba med pa nyid do// gang la bya ba med pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad gang la'ang
305a8(rnying rgyud): gnod par byed mi nus// de bzhin nyid kyis zin pa yi// dug gsum dug lngas gnod mi 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyis ma zin na// lam gyi phyogs rnams kun spyod kyang // bde 'gro tsam du nges 'byung gi// go 'phang dam par ga la 'gyur// de bzhin nyid kyis kun
305b1(rnying rgyud): gnas par// gang shas nyan mongs rnam par grol// gang zin par ma shes na// dam pa lam rnams grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid blo ldan pas// nyan mongs zin pas gang smad kyang // rnam sgrol rang 'byung mya ngan 'das// chags med kyin dananam
305b2(rnying rgyud): che// gang 'di blo dang mi ldan pas// blo ldan tshul du gang byed pa// dam par grol bar mi 'gyur gyi// 'ching ba thar ram 'khor ba'i dngos// thams cad steng par shes pa yi// blo can mya ngan 'das pa ste// bya ba'i las la sha thong ba'i// tshogs chen dka' ba las dang
305b3(rnying rgyud): bral// dam pa'i blo gros thabs med de// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis dman pa'i lus// sten par byed pa'ang ltung bar 'gyur// dam pa'i blo gros thabs yod na// 'khor ba dman pa'i dngos po yang // skyes bu dam par grol 'gyur te//
305b4(rnying rgyud): grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min// grol dang ma dz+wa la la stsogs pa// gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha'// kun mkhyen rnams ni dbus pa'ang min// de ni grol med grol ba'o// 'di ni gsang bdam pa ste// ma rtogs bro rlung kun lnga gas // smon yon
305b5(rnying rgyud): nyes pa ma yin te// blo chung rnams la phan phyir ro// de phyir blo gros thabs ldan la// rtsol sgrub yo byad gtsor ma gsungs// gral te byas na'ang 'gag pa med// ma byas na yang de ltar nges// de ltar blo gros thabs ldan na// mtshams med lnga yi sems can kun//
305b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub snying rje mtshon gyis bsad// dpag med dger 'gyur mi bsad na// kun gyis don du gnyer ba ni// gang gi sems kyi dbyings nyid kyi// gang gis bskal pa dpag med du// srid gsum dkrugs pas de rig min// 'dir ni blo gros thabs ldan pas// bya
305b7(rnying rgyud): med kyin dang rang rig pas// don chen rnal 'byor nyal mo btsun// ma bal sgron gyis grub pa yin// ji ltar mun pa drug dang rdzas// sman snang gser du gyur pa na// 'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis// dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pa// sdug bsngal spyad kyang

306a5(rnying rgyud): ma
306a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas su / du su
306b1(rnying rgyud): 'dubya/ rnal ba kun gyi drugs dam b+hi// thams cad dam par nyid las// me gzhan gzhan med mangs yad// de las gdu yang 'da' ma 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdzogs 'angs spyod par ba nyid dag pas dgad pas gsungs so// yang gas da /
306b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ nga
306b3(rnying rgyud): sa pa dpapa de// gsungs pas dam cig sa dus pan// ba ma pa sa / 'jung di skyed pa ga'o// bangam rdzun pas rgyun 'byung ba bad dag pa sbyi sa gsasaso// gis 'du
306b4(rnying rgyud): hU~M tha dang pa// byang chub sems su mnyam pas na// de bzhin nyid las gzhan pa yin// ma sa me ga rdo rjo dam// com ldan 'das rje sems dpa'ang ba nyid dag pas de ska ces gsung so// grogs dgra 'd-i ste/ 'dod dang chags pa'i rdza ny-i /
306b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gang poni de bzhin nyid// longs spyod tshor rnam par dag/ spyod la mchags dam// bcom ldan sa khyod brgyab yas nga bya nyid dag pas des nas gdus so// yang 'di lnga ste/ thams cad de dban da m-idz+hangs pas// phrad par bye ba zhing bye cing
306b6(rnying rgyud): 9// rdo rje nam mkha' 'a gsal bste// rmongs pa'i ldanan nam dag gsapa// bcoMm ldan 'das su medza dang ba nyid dag pas 'dis pas gdung ga so// yang 'dres ste/ rnam dag 'a su med pas// yangs dgacigagi paH drung zlag/
306b7(rnying rgyud): yangs pa'i bem du gcig/ da chen stong yang rje ngam// bcom ldan 'das thams cad grub pas de skye kyis gzungs so// yang b+h+yo ste/ de bzhin nyid lus med sa ni// yin dang sa yin gnyis las 'das// bdag me rdo rjen bzhid rte// de me kyi
307a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dam// bcom ldan 'das yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ yod mthong snang grags chos so cog/ tha dad sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang // rang bzhin ma bcos de
307a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid// ma bsgribs 'od gsal rnam dag zhing // bcom ldan 'das dri med skra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ kun du bzang po'i ye shes 'di// sras kyang ma byas dang 'byung ste// thams cad 'byung ba'i rtsa bas na// rang las
307a3(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog smin ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gzhan yang dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ ye nas ma bcos pa bzhin pa// chos sa cog gi snying po ste// med pa las byang sna tshogs sdang /
307a4(rnying rgyud): snang med de bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i dbyung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dang 'byung rig pa'i sems nyid kyis// ma bcos chos nyid dbyings kyi don// lhan grub thabs dang shes rab las// ying
307a5(rnying rgyud): dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal// bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i tog ngo bo nyid dag pas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// bde dang ma bde rnam pa kun// de bzhin nyid du ngo
307a6(rnying rgyud): gcig pas// tshor ba bde sdug gang yang med// ces gsungs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i rgyan ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid du don bstan du// de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas// gang gis gang la gang zhig bstan// nyid la nyid gleng
307a7(rnying rgyud): nang zad// ces gsungs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po nga bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la// dus gsum dus pazhir mi rigs te// ye shes rig pa'i khyad par pas// skad cig bskal pa de skad cig/ ces gsungs so//
307b1(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i rgyal po ba nyid dag pas 'ang skad du/ 'khor ba mya ngan 'das rtag pa// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid du// ye nas mya ngan 'das pas na// rang bzhin lhan grub tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid
307b2(rnying rgyud): pa 'di skad du/ chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni/ ma skyes pa las thams cad skye// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// rigs mchog rdo rje skye gnas dam// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das yongs su dgongs pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// de bzhi
307b3(rnying rgyud): du kun rig na// des khyab gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing // yon tan rin chen sprin bkod pa// dgod par bya ba ci yang med// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od zer ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ dpag tu med pa'i rnal ba rnams// ji bzhin
307b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// de bzhin nyid dang thams cad kyang // gnyis med de bzhin de nyid do// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// so sor snang ba ma yin te// ji bzhin de
307b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid des na// de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med// rgyas gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di bzhin du// de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni// dpag cing gzhal bar mtha' yas pas// dpag med rgyal po'i pho brang yin// de na
307b6(rnying rgyud): kun bkod der gcig nas/ zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das sprin gyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ thams cad 'byung ba'i cho 'jal yang // cir yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes te// gdos par gyur pa'i chos med pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhi
307b7(rnying rgyud): du 'byung // zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das yid 'ong dbrangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i kha babyud pas// ma rig ngo bo de bzhin pa// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// de nyid rig na bde chen gnas// zhes gsungs so//
308a1(rnying rgyud): bang bcom ldan 'das ma lang 'ang snang rnga ba nyid dag pas 'di skad du// nyon mongs ye shes lngar rtog pa// de bzhin du la gnas kyu skyob// srog dang mu rtog gnyis yod de// dag pa nyid yang dag lam// zhus gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das bla dzad
308a2(rnying rgyud): dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ theg pa dpag med bstan pa yang // ji ltar mos pa tha dad pa// khrid pa bya ba'i thabs su zad// rdo rje theg pa nyid las med// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i snying po dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ gang
308a3(rnying rgyud): gis de mthong mthong ma thag/ mi shes tshod pa'i dra ba chod// khyung dang seng ge ji bzhin du// mngal ltar lus kyi mngal gyis bsgribs// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das spos kyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi ye shes
308a4(rnying rgyud): kyis// sgyu ma'i chos la dbang thob pas// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du// thams cad dbang sgyur rang rig yin// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das sngon spro ba'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma dang // log rtog mtshan ma'i
308a5(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma gnyis// rang bzhin de nyid dag pas na// gnyis su shes pa nyid tshigs rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po ngo bo nyid dge pas 'di skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab chos 'di rnams// de bzhin nyid du gcig pas na// gang gi
308a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin de shes pa// kun la dbang sgyur thob pa yin/ zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di// shes nas de la gang gnas pa// rang rig nyid la dbang thob pa'i// de bzhin
308a7(rnying rgyud): reg pa 'dzin pa nyid// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das dka' thub rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de nyid ji bzhin mngon gyur na// med la mi zad 'byung ba yi// che ba'i yon tan rgyun mi 'chad// cir snang kun 'byung rin chen gter// zhes ba
308b1(rnying rgyud): so// yang bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor snying po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji bzhin ma bcos de nyid la// de bzhin pa yi blo gnas pa// de bzhin de nyid ma yin pa'i// sgrub dang bsgrub pa ga la yod// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das nges par
308b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ mkha' la glo ngur smin 'thabs ltar// de bzhin glo bur rtag pas bsgribs// mkha' dag nang du sprin sangs ltar// rnam rtog sangs pas ngang gis sangs// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das nges par gsungs
308b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji snyed dag pa'i gsung brjod kyang // rdo rje gsung la spros pa med// spros med gsung nyid kun gsal khyab// me gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dge pas 'di skad du/ thams
308b4(rnying rgyud): cang rdul la 'dug pa yi// thugs med ma chags de bzhin zlos// ji snyed ji bzhin nyid du bat+tAd// zang med gted ldan rin chen 'thung // zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das ma tog dbang po dbyangs po nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid la bzhugs pas
308b5(rnying rgyud): na// 'di zhes tshig tu ma gsungs kyang // khyab pas gcig pa'i byin brlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa so sor mjal// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das grags pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas sems can la sogs pa// thams cad ma
308b6(rnying rgyud): lus lus pa med// rang rig ma rig rtog pa nyid// kun kyang rang byed ye shes nyid// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ yi ge phyag rgya ye shes kyang // tshig las 'byung ba'i gzhi yin te// de nyid dag pa
308b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad dag/ gsung la gsung nyid ma gnas pa'i// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das sgra dbyangs mi zad pa nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid kyang rang bzhin du// lnga phung nyon mongs rnam par dag/ rnam rtog rdul bral skye 'gag med// tham
309a1(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid du bcom// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das sman gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ dpag med 'jig rten rdul snyed na// 'gro ba rdul phran bsam yas la// khyad par de bzhin nyid snang bas// til 'bru mar gyis khyab
309a2(rnying rgyud): ltar gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od 'phreng bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rdul phran gcong tsam gang zag la// dgongs te mdun du gsung brjod pa// dpag med mdza' yas rdul snyed tsam// de snyed kun du thos par grol/
309a3(rnying rgyud): spangs so// yang bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ gsung gcig mi zad mdza' yas gsung // mtha' dang dbus med kun du khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje gsung // sna tshogs dngos med de bzhin nyid// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das
309a4(rnying rgyud): gser gyi gsung ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ gang yang ma bcos de nyid la// phyogs dang snga phyi dus med de// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de nyid rang rig rang nyid do// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di
309a5(rnying rgyud): skad du/ de nyid de sted rang bzhin te// de nyid ldan pa la// skyes pa rnams kyis suMskye skye bdang // de la ga/ s+yAng de byung med// gsungs s+ho// yang bcom ldan 'das sna dung rje gas pa'i dpapang byed dag pas 'di skad du/ byung ted rnams
309a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po gnyis// ye nas dbyer med gcig pas na// gnod pas 'jigs pa ga la yod// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/
309a7(rnying rgyud): dag pa dag la dag pa nyid// rtog pa dag la rtog par snang // ces 'dul der snang ci yang med// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das dga' mchog dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rang bzhin rang gis ma bcos pa/ yang gis 'od gsapa de ba
309b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi snying po de nyid pas// ces kyang ma bsgribs nam mkha' che// zhes gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji bzhin pa nyid sa mchog ste// de rig ye shes bla ma yis// ye nas de bzhin nyid la gnas// da
309b2(rnying rgyud): gdod bgrod drug la yod// ces gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ stong pa nyid kyi snying po la// sna tshogs snang ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// sras kyang ma byas rang 'byung ba// ji bzhin
309b3(rnying rgyud): pa yi dkyil 'khor nyid// ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i ngo bo nyid dag pa gsang bas 'di skad du/ zad med ye shes dngos grub ni// de bzhin nyid du dngos grub pas// zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// da
309b4(rnying rgyud): gad bsgrub tu gal yod// ces byasang ba tshig 'o// yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kun stong nyi dag pa na sa rgya na na ma pa / mya na 'das smra las// snang rang bzhin rnam dgal// de nyid mi gnas byang chub pams
309b5(rnying rgyud): zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rnam rtog chu bo'i na mgo ste// stong nyid zhing du ma bskur na// 'khor ba'i rgya mchog yeng 'gyur ba// de mi shes la de ltar snang // zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang
309b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das me tog bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i ma yin pas// kun bzang shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom
309b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad snang ba ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas dang // sems can rnam pa thams cad dag/ dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa// de nyid las byung dngos med smra// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das yid dang ngos
310a1(rnying rgyud): nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rang 'byung ye shes na pa ni// byang chub sems nyid yin pas na// de yi rtsa ba sta rje ste// pha ro phyin par thabs kyis so// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge 'bum gzugs dpe nyid dag
310a2(rnying rgyud): pas 'di skad du/ ji snyed ji bzhin nyid kyi don// yi ge ming tshogs sgra mtshon pa// ming tshogs sgra la ma brten par// ta ma drod glo yis rig pa med// ces gsang pa'i tshig tu'o// yang bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ chos kun
310a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi nga bzhin no// de bzhin snod rjes me gzhan pas// de nyid byang chub lam nyid des// lam de sgeg po bgrod pa gnas// zhes gaspyang pa'i tshig tu // kye sgrogs blo dag gzhan yang de dag la sogs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa sgron rje bye bas pa
310a4(rnying rgyud): snyed ngo bo nyid dag pa dang / chos kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad du/ la la ni 'di ltar/ rtog med rang rig skad cig ma// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis kyi dbyings// rig dang ma rig gnyis kho na//
310a5(rnying rgyud): dag dang ma dag gnyis su snang // zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la nI 'di skad du/ de nyid sgra brjod med pa las// dri mtshon phyir na tha dad brjod// gang brjod pa nyid de bzhin nyid// de nyid smos med rdo rje don// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so//
310a6(rnying rgyud): la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid cir yang mi snang na// glo brar rnam rtog tha dad pa'i// rnam tog de nyid snang bar zad// snang pa nyid na snang ba med// ces gsang ba dam par bsngags so// lnga la ni 'di skad du/ ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang byar med na// gang gi
310a7(rnying rgyud): bcos te sra mos byas// byas pa'o zhigag la yod// ces gsang ba dam par bsgrags so// lal ni 'di skad du/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni// de bzhin da nyid yin pas na// de khya ba gang gi chos rnams kun// rang bzhin dag pas bsgribs pa med// chas gas
310b1(rnying rgyud): par bsgrags so// la lan 'di skad du/ de nyid mtshan nyid med pa las// mtshan nyid sna tshogs par snang bas// kun 'byung dbyings kyi rang bzhin pas// myed la zad ma shes par mdzad// ces gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'ad skad du/ sku rgyags
310b2(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i lta ba dang // sdom pa srung ba'i bya ba kun// smad par bya ba ma yin yang // kun kyang ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de la phyogs dang dus med par// gang gis phyogs dang dus brtags pa'i// de nyid de
310b3(rnying rgyud): la rnam par snang // sangs rgyas kyis ni de mi mkhyen// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab kun shes nas// bsam du med par de bzhug na// dpag tu med pa'i yon tan 'byung // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin//
310b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab mi shes par// bsam med dang du glang 'jog pa// byis pa de ni blun pa ste// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur// zhes kun nas brtse ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/
310b5(rnying rgyud): bsam med bsam gyis mi khyab chos// lhag par mthong nas zhi gnas pa// rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa// de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas// zhes pa shes gnyen dam pa nyid du gdams so// la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs so so kun rig kyang // kun grol
310b6(rnying rgyud): rnam drug lam med na// dam pa nyid las shin tu gol// nam yang nges parjod pa med// zhes bka / 'dam par gdams so// lA la ni 'di skadang / sna tshogs rim gyis 'jug pa dang // bas ma spod blo yi nang du 'gyur// bsam med yongs su rdzogs
310b7(rnying rgyud): ma gyis pa yi dug chen yin// zhes khyad par dam par gdams so// la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs so sor ma rig par// de bzhin nyid du nges mi rnyed// de nyid nges pa ma rnyed na// sna tshogs smra ba rung ma yin// zhes nan tan dam par gdams so// la la ni 'dis
311a1(rnying rgyud): dra/ mkha' la 'ja 'a spyang je bzhin du// bsam yas bsam snang de bzhin no// gcig tu nges pa med pa'i gsung // ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar yin// zhes dpag dka' ba dam par gsungs so// la la ni 'di skad du/ kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bshang
311a2(rnying rgyud): pas// 'di don gang rig thos pa'i mchog/ thams cad 'di las 'byung bas ni// 'di shes kun shes shes rab mchog/ ces shes rab mchog dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ gsang ba'i nang na gsang chen 'di// nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong
311a3(rnying rgyud): bar // gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la 'gyur// de nyid dam pa rnams kyis bsngags// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di// gser dang mkha' bzhin mi 'gyur bas// mi nub stong bral med pa'i phyir// chos kyi
311a4(rnying rgyud): dam pa don po mchog/ ces dam pa chen por bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ thog ma med nas bsags pa yi// rnam rtog sprin phung dpag med pa// stong nyid cig car rig pa yis// de bzhin nyid du rnam par sgrol// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni
311a5(rnying rgyud): 'di skad du/ ji snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// chos kun stong par rlig nges na// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan yin// zhes rnal 'byor dam par gdams so// la la ni 'di skad du/ 'khor ba ji srid yod par du//
311a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i snying po nyi ma shar// rang bzhin chos nyid 'khor lo 'di// mi nub rgyun mi 'chad par bskor// zhes gsang ba dam pa'i theg par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ mi 'gyur mi 'jig rdo rje don// sna tshogs kun 'bring rin po che// ma chags rnam pa
311a7(rnying rgyud): pad+madade// thams cad lhan grub mdzad pa che// ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyi// ces yang ngas pa dam par bstan to// la la ni 'di skad du/ stong nying gzugs med rjes kyi sa// skyon med yid las 'das de'i gsung // mtshan med rtog las 'dang po
311b1(rnying rgyud): mngar nga man tan pa // thabs sa par thabs sbyin pasum dang// ts+tsha A sa dung ba bsgrab sa sa kun dang/ d+hag rgyas sas gdapa// gnas su gdangs rnams dad ma// tshogs mtshan nyid ma 'das sa ra/
311b2(rnying rgyud): nan tan chen po khyab grub mdzad// ye nyid kun gyi rang bzhin mkhyen// zhes ye shes rkyen dri 'char bur bsngags sa// la la ni 'di skad du/ snang stong go 'byed kun khyab mkha'// theg dbyings la ni kun gnasas// zhi gnas rnam dag na chen po// lhag mthong
311b3(rnying rgyud): shas 'drang bar me// shrIs bya thogs med 'phrer pa de drung // zhes thams cad 'brang bar bsngags so// le la ni 'di skad du/ 'dres yongs rdzogs gas sa steng gzugs// khyab gas la rang bzhin 'gro bar ste// dang pas sem byed chos byed// don bcwanya
311b4(rnying rgyud): sra myang bar ro// bde mchog don la reg pa nyid// chos yon tan dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di spyad du/ hU~M yang ma sems gti mug le// dngos po kun bcom zhe sdang nyid// ye 'bramang rgyal bdag nyid che// bde rgyun rang bzhin rdzas chags pa// gang/
311b5(rnying rgyud): dri mo 'gyur gzhan phrag dag/ ces blang dar med par bsngags so// la pa n+ti 'di skad du/ kun gyi pa'i zhi ni gcig shes byas// de nyid dbang du thams cad 'dus// kun la dbang sbyar thos pas na// yi dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o// zhes dbang dam pa
311b6(rnying rgyud): brtags na// la la ni 'di skad du// thams cad kun 'dus rig pa'i mang // kun la khyab gnas brtag dka' ba// zab mo sangs rgyas stong yul ldan// rdo rje kun bka rna la dgrang lung // zhes bka' dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de rjid
311b7(rnying rgyud): de ni kun gcig pas// bdag dang gzhan du snang ba med// spyod cing rje ma ga nam mkha' la// gtsa sprir dbri ba rdul yang medo/ sa bdud rtsi dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'od skad du/ byang chub snying po dam pa la// rnam chog rdul gyis ga
312a1(rnying rgyud): 'go/ de nyid chen por drang chung bas// cis kyang mi bskyod nyam ming // zhes de dogs med par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ri bo 'di// seng ge'i khog pa rang zhig ltar// stong nyid rang nyid ma zhig na// gzhan gyis
312a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig par ga la 'gyur// zhes rang bzhin dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ bde chen rnam dag rtog byed pas// legs nyes gnyis ka rnam par rtog/ bde chen nges pa'i rlung zhugs na// gang 'dir rnam par rtog pa med// ces yongs su rtog pa las
312a3(rnying rgyud): 'das par bsngags so// la lan 'di skad du/ de nyid phyin ci ma log par// bsrung ba mo rtog mi gnas pa// le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra bsrung ste// de bzhin de las 'da' mi bya// zhes dam tshig dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten
312a4(rnying rgyud): du// sgron ma bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ji snyed pa yi chos bstan pa// mtha' yas don ni gcig tu 'dus// zhes par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid de las ma nyams na// dran dasam sgyu ma med pa yi// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab nyid// bslang
312a5(rnying rgyud): pa rnam gsum yongs su rdzogs// zhes bslab pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid las mtha' zhi gnas dang // lhag pa'i don mthong 'dres pa yi// sde gsum nges par rdzogs pa ni// 'bum phrag mtha' yas brjod mi lang // zhes ba'i drang
312a6(rnying rgyud): brgyud pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ tshig la de bdangs tshig bsgyur na// tshig mtha' yas pas bsdus na 'das// tshig gcig rnam par spros gyur na// brjod pas de ni zad mi 'gyur// zhes gsung mi zad pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad
312a7(rnying rgyud): drA / smra brjod tshig la gang dag pas// gang gis dgongs pa thog ma nus// gzugs rgya mchithos pa men// tshig gcig thos pa thas pa'i mchog/ ces thos pa tsumatsho'i dam par 'dzugs so// la la ni 'di skad du/ khrab dang mi gnas nam mi rtog/ ma thal mo ga
312b1(rnying rgyud): mchags pa// daH/ da las na gzhan ma dang// pa ra phyin pa na// nas mthar pon pa dam par bsngags so// ra pa 'i di skad du/ 'don brdo nga dra grog don byang pa// dmus stong ngasu nad rgyug pa 'dra// dbyangs kyis dbyings la bris pa don// gang dag 'don brjod
312b2(rnying rgyud): 'dri klog mchog/ ces spyod pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ mtshan mar byas dang snang ba'i mchog/ ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi// mkha' dang 'ja' ltar rnam reg pa// bstod bla med byang chub nyid// ces bsngo ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di
312b3(rnying rgyud): skad du/ chos gang sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis dang mtha' ru gang lta ba// ma rig 'khrul bas phyin ci log/ theg chen gsang sngags lame las log/ ces gdams ngag dam par gsungs so// la la ni 'di skad du/ rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rim gyis pa// blo chung rmongs pas
312b4(rnying rgyud): khrid pa'i thabs// ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la// rten 'brel rgyu 'bras rim gyis med// ces nges par dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la// yid bzhin cir yang 'byung ba yi// cho 'phrul 'byung bas sems can rnams// ji ltar
312b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba mthong thos snang // zhes thams cad rgyu med pa la bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ zlab mo sangs rgyas stong yul ba// gsang ba'i dbyings na gnas pa yi// thams cad gsang ba'i snying po nyid// mthong bas 'gro don rgya mtshor rdzogs// zhes thams cad ldan
312b6(rnying rgyud): gyis grub par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// de mthong ngo bo nyid mi dmigs// drin med bya dang byed med pa// gnas gsum mnyam nyid rjes su dran// zhes ting nge 'dzin dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ gnas gsum
312b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i 'du shes med// ming med tshig gi lam dang bral// bla med 'dus ma byas pa yi// mchod pa yang dag mchog tu bshad// ces mchod pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ bskal pa bye ba dpag med du// log cing zhen pa'i mun pa gsum
313a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid tshul bzhin skad cig ma// kun gsal gcig gis yongs su sangs// zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ mun pas 'thibs pa de dag gis// mi g.yo mi rtog de nyid blta// de mthong mun pa rnam dag sangs// 'gyor
313a2(rnying rgyud): sangs kun gyi mchog tu bshad// ces tshangs pa dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du// mi mthun gnyen po mi dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la// gnas pa gang yin de dag gis// gnyen po bstan du ci yang med// ces la gcad pa dam par bsngags
313a3(rnying rgyud): so// la la ne 'di nyid du// thams cad rang bzhin ma bcos pa// ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin du// rang rig bla na med pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o// zhes sems bskyed pa rnam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad dra/ ci yang mi sems le g.yo
313a4(rnying rgyud): mi rtog rnam par mi g.yong ba// kun la khyab par bdal ba'i dbyings// kun shong bya med rdeg rjen mchod// ces theg pa chen po'i gsang ba dam par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ rdeg chen gsang ba ji snying po 'di// dbu mar mi dmigs mtha' las 'das/ 8/
313a5(rnying rgyud): 'dir dbu mar 'dod pa dag/ mtha' las 'das par ga la 'gyur/ zhes dbus mthar mi dmigs par bsngags so// la la ni 'di skad du/ chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba//
313a6(rnying rgyud): yi don dam yang dag mthong // zhes mthong ba yongs su bsngags so// lnga la ni 'di skad du/ ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin pa// mi skye me dgag rnam kun mkhyen// sus kyang ma byas dang byung ba// rnam par rtog pa'i glo bur yin// zhes ma bslad par dam
313a7(rnying rgyud): par de sdigs so// la la ni 'di ska dadu/ de nyid de dang gang ldan pa// dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin// de la ma gzugs gang zhig ni// sangs rgyas byab ga sro/ rgyas ye nas rgyas par bsngags sa// lal nga byung ba pa kyil
313b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs// rtog 'dzin sgra mtha' ting 'dzin bsngags// med rgyu rtags chags mtshon pa'i tshig/ bsgrub 'grub bltas snang 'bras bu'o// zhes gsang sngags dam pa'i tshig go// grogs po dag de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam
313b2(rnying rgyud): pa de kho na nyid las 'di skad du/ thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa// tshig gi tha snyad tsam dag las// 'di la bya ba ci yang med// rang bzhin de nyid ye sangs rgyas// a ho zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las 'das te bde ba chen po lhun dang bar gyur
313b3(rnying rgyud): to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dper na kun du rgyu ba'i mi// 'dod pa'i yul du gang 'gro ba// yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang // bzod yul lam gnas gcig las mang// de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab par// rnam
313b4(rnying rgyud): na rgyu sa// da nga / ma sa / du k+Sha d+hA sa / sa ba'i ma ra// shA stsu ga /
313b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'dir 'dus kun shes na// de yi ye shes mtha' yas te// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid pas// mdo don gcig tu bsdus par gsungs// grogs po dag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig tu 'dus par
313b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bshad pa ste/ thams cad kyi mdo de kho na nyid du 'dus par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa rnams gcig tu nges pa dam pa rnyed par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid la dman pa
313b7(rnying rgyud): mi rangs te/ mngon par bstod pa/ e mgo skyes chen gsang ba'i bdag/ rtsal chen smra ba seng ge'i sgra// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// sangs rgyas ku ni sngon ye nas byung // khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// che mchog rje btsan
314a1(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i sku// bde gshegs kun gyi bshes gnyen mchog/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// kun gyi 'byung gnas me long gsal// phyogs kun gsal 'grel nges pa'i mdo// theg chen rmad grags ngo mtshar che// gsang
314a2(rnying rgyud): chen byung tshul ngo mtshar che// a ho zhes nges pa dam par mngon par bstod// de nas cang mi dmigs par gyur te/ gang du nges par bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa dag lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du rgya cher grags shing yongs su grags par gyur to// sangs
314a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu lnga pa'o// / theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gi dgongs pa rnam par bgros pa nu yang byung ba'i gtam rgyad brjod
314a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste/ byang tshul bstan pa'i bcu gnyis pa'i tha ma'o// / sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chos thams cad kye me long / bka' thams cad
314a5(rnying rgyud): 'grel pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa dam pa gsang ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsadra ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes drag shul can gyi ri ma la ya'i cher lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yongs su
314a6(rnying rgyud): bgros pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma bo d+hi dang / ring lugs chen po dA na rak+Shi ta dang / zhu chen gyi po tsA ba che btsan skyes kyis bru sha'i yi ge las bru sha'i yul gyi khrom du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// // bkang 'di la dbu zhabs su byung tshul bcu
314a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa/ le'u bdun cu rtsa lnga pa/ bam po bcu dang / sha lo kanyis bcoM lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// // be d+harmA he dra pra b+hA bA hi tsan teSh+ThAn tathA ga toHba dang / tedz+dzadz+dza yoM ni ro d+ha me waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/
314b1(rnying rgyud): mra/ rgya gar skad du/ san ta dzA gA ta pra t+ya mA d+hA gud+ha ko/ Sha swAk+Sha yan d+hi dI ba ma hA pra ta stA d+ha na tan+nadz+nyAn+ta shAr+ya d+hA ti tsakranA ma ma hA yA na sAtra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi zad pa
314b2(rnying rgyud): gter gyi sgron ma/ brtul zhugs chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyud/ ye shes rngam pa sgog gi 'khor po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
314b3(rnying rgyud): 'dag gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun du bzang po chen po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba phyogs bcu dang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid chen po/ gsang
314b4(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ lhan gyis grub pa'i longs spyod chen po/ chos ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chen po/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshong phul chen po'i bdag nyid de 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus brjod du med pa na rang bzhin
314b5(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsad ba yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsus
314b6(rnying rgyud): spros pa med pa'i tshul gyis pho brang gi snying po zlum por gyur pa/ dbyings dang ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ bsod nams dang ye shes
314b7(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs thugs rje rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gsal ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhin rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam sdigs su shar ba/ phyi dang nad med par lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang de na nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang phyed kyis 'od gsal
315a1(rnying rgyud): kun du na du du na na su su
315a2(rnying rgyud): dang / de bkong pa'i dpag pasem ste shing dang / yid bzhin kyi nong bu dpe 'i rjel mtshan / ga rten pa'i sgra dang / lA'i bu mo rnam pa snga sogs pa'i rol mo dang grwa dbyangs kyi tshogs su bas pas brgyan pa'i gnas khyad par rgyan po tshogs pa
315a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i gnas de nyid na thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i nye zla dadu ma chags mgos pa'i pad+ma dang mi zad pa'i rin po che 'bar ba'i gdan khri dang gzims cha dang snam rten du ldan par gnas so// gzhan yang khrag 'byung gi tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas su
315a4(rnying rgyud): yang 'gyur te/ dur khrod kyi kun gyi khyad par mi bye brag zhing gi gdan drang sA pa nag gi tshun bkyang dang thod pa nam gsum gyi mtshan ma dang / rlung nag gaphung po snangs shing dak+ta'i chamatsho me bzad byar 'khrug pa dang / mau seng dag tu 'khyib cing 'bar ba/ gang
315a5(rnying rgyud): kyi'i ngab la su rAk+ta'e khrag zhag gi chung bab pa/ 'bar ba 'phro ba mang po'i khrug pa re gnas na rdzogs pa khyo shug dang / sems can chen pong gdan dang bcas pa'i gnas kun du 'azang po'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las grub pa/ rnal 'byod gyi dang
315a6(rnying rgyud): b+hag chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gyur pa na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor tshogs brjod pa las 'das pa'i yang brjod pa las 'das pa/ sangs chas mi ning gi rngapa phra rab snyid 'khod pa ni rnab dbyor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / lkog tugang ril par rdzogs dang /
315a7(rnying rgyud): dad pas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bgrod pa dang / de bzhin
315b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa na bar 'thang ba du danan gshegs pasnang ba ma 'a' mas dang / dab na gshegs pa dun byung chub ba dang / bdun padas par byas sdug ma dang / bathun ma dam pasangs rgyas kun dang / brdzun ma ngas bus pa po dang / bcud/
315b2(rnying rgyud): ngas go nga po dang / btsun po ba babyol pa dang / nyen yang dgas phyin pa 'byong mi la bar ban mi cig dang bcas pa rnamam pa dang nyam pa nA byung chen po sems dang dun dang / pa byung bye pa den de de rji dang / bye
315b3(rnying rgyud): pa rjo dang / dpa' na pa brjo dang / rnab 'phyi byen marda sems ma dang / rnang byur rten pa na rten me pa ma dang / ba rkyen parje gyi rlomasu pa dang / rnalta 'ar rkyen ma thos kyi sems pa dang / ga de de
315b4(rnying rgyud): dang nyes pa byed na bsem pa da'abani bgyi 'dzud pa da gagis bathang na na pa spyong ba dang / byed ba med pa dam ma pa'i stong po dang / thang na bachen pa sa gas da' gad du/ byung chu na du da rnyi gi
315b5(rnying rgyud): chug chen po ma lta gzhin du dang / byang chu chen po sgrub pa rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub chen po byams pa ma rdzi dang / byang rngub chen po kun rgya bzang po dang / byang chung chen ma theg mo dang / byang chu chen ma thong ba dang / byang chub che po
315b6(rnying rgyud): dang / phreng chub chen mo ga mi dang/ byang chub chen mo byug ma rtse dang / byang chub ched mo mr-i ta~Mg m+b+ha dang / byang chub chen mo par me ma dang / byang chub ts+tshin mod+hi dang / gzhan snang 'joms pa rkyen de'i 'kho btsun mo dang bcas pa rnam mkha' dang ga tam
315b7(rnying rgyud): pa'ijoms bachen po gshin rje gshed po dang / 'joms pa chen po bas pa dang / 'joms bachen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'joms brtson po ti'i rgyal po dang / 'jams pa chen po bdud rtsi zab snod dang / 'joms ma chen mo ljags kyum dang /
316a1(rnying rgyud): 'joms ma chen mo zhugs pa ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo ljags sgrog ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo 'bebs ma dang / gzhan yang thub pa'i sras kyi 'khor rdul phra rab snyed dang mnyam pa/ thub pa chen po lha'i dbang po dang / rngub pa chen po lha ma yin
316a2(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen po mi'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po dud 'gro'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po yi dgas kyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen po dmyal ba'i dbang po dang / de dag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sras kyi tshogs grangs med pa dang /
316a3(rnying rgyud): yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// gzhan yang khrag 'thung rol pa'i dpal he ru ka btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa 'di lta ste/ khrag 'thung chen po dpal bud+d+ha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal badz+ra he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal
316a4(rnying rgyud): rat+na he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal pad+ma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal karma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bud+d+ha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo badz+ra kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo rat+na kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo pad+ma
316a5(rnying rgyud): gro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / badz+ran mo karma kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gsang ba chen po 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa gsang ba chen po rak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po pek+Sha ha ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang pa
316a6(rnying rgyud): chen po sa ma ya he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang bu chen mo rak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo yak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo bi shwa kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo sa ma pra kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs
316a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor dkar mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / rkun mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / spos mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / gtum mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /
316b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs zhes bya ba dang / seng gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / stag gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / tha gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / khyi gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / bzhad gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / kang kwa'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / ngur
316b2(rnying rgyud): bya'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / bA rog gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / 'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / rta gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / phyag gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / seng gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / skye gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba/
316b3(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa/ phra men ma'i tshogs shin tu mang ba dang / gzhan yang rdo rje srin po khro bo'i tshogs rdo rje srin po khro bo rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba dang / gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang / mi g.yo mgon po zhes bya ba dang / rta mgrin
316b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhes bya ba dang / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / hU~M kAr zhes bya ba dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang rdo rje srin mo'i khro mo'i 'khor rdo rje srin mo snyems ma zhes
316b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba dang / sder mo zhes bya ba dang / dur khrod ma zhes bya ba dang / gtun khung ma zhes bya ba dang / gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / mda' snyems ma zhes bya ba dang / sgra 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang / gsod ma zhes bya ba dang / bskyod ma zhes bya ba dang / rlung 'byin ma zhes
316b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i 'khor rigs 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhan ying gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / ston pa'i ngo mtshur rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis rang dbang med par 'khor du 'dus pa'i dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shurtsa
316b7(rnying rgyud): da pa sogs pa kun bran dang yang bran/ g.yog dang yang g.yog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs kyi 'khor 'dres pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan gyi shes pa'i rgyud ni thams cad zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag po dang dgug pa dang bcing ba dang gtang
317a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang dkrol ba dang dang byang ngas pa drugs pa dang bral ba dang ba 'byang dubang ba nga nga ba bdu gams pa dang gas nga/ gnon du dang spya ba dang pham padang / sa pas sugs pabyed cing ba nyin tu rdzordzog dang ga du
317a2(rnying rgyud): 'khod do// de nas yang dpala' bar sram gro d+hi'i rgyal mo yang bcom ldan 'dus gsang ba mchog gi bdag po skal b+hi ti bzugs so// ldan 'dis byeng pa po rje sri du bzang po / pazan mo byab mo na du bam mo bang nanyis su med par ma
317a3(rnying rgyud): suni sa
317a4(rnying rgyud): shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas kyi snod kyi khams nam mkha' dang sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang ri dang / tshul la sogs pa thams cad la rnam
317a5(rnying rgyud): par gzigs so// de dag thams cad lnga rnam par gzigs nas yang nang bcud kyi khams sems dang sems las byung ba'i g.yo ba dang / 'grub pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i rigs so so'i khams
317a6(rnying rgyud): dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / mu stegs kyi khams dang / bdud chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / ru tra dang / ru tra can la
317a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i khams la rnam par gzigs so// de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas pang nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang / rig 'dzinas pa'i bsti gnas dang / phyogs bcu rul
317b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad sa la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas spra bsam pas 'das pa de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi mdzad/ rnam par mi mdzad/ mdzad pa mi 'gog/ mdzad pa rnam par
317b2(rnying rgyud): yang mi 'gog/ mi mdzad pa yang mi gnas/ cang mi gsung / rnam par mi gsung mi sgrogs/ gsungs pa yang mi 'gog/ gsungs pa rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi gsung mi 'gog pa la yang mi gnas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snod kyi khams
317b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang / sa'i khyad par thams cad la yang mi gzigs mi dgongs/ gzigs shing dgongs pa la yang mi 'gog/ rnam par yang mi 'gog/ mi 'gog pa la yang mi gnas so// de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi
317b4(rnying rgyud): nga slo du dang / rlung kyi ma dang ga dang / da dag gsus nga du g+sagi chub nga smra pa / nga na pa Sh+Ti sa sa nga
317b5(rnying rgyud): de bor yang gdags su med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems de yang chos thams cad la yang khyab la smra bas ma las kyang 'das so// de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bor brjod du med pa la brnal bzhin du yum kun du bzang mo rngam pa'i kro d+hi'i tshul mos sto
317b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bsgrub po// oM snang stong stong pa'i dz+nyA na chos kyi sgra// smra bsam las 'das don dam byang chub sems// snong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gas pa/ zhes bskul bas/ bskul ba
317b7(rnying rgyud): thugs su chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun du klong bdal bar khyab ste/ snying rje chen po des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par mdzad do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par mdzad nas yang sdod
318a1(rnying rgyud): kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzadu nas yang brgyad kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad do// bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas sa'i khams kun la khyab par mdzad do// dpe na nyi ma bar sngang la shar ba'i 'od kun la snyoms
318a2(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang stong nyid kyi dang kun la snyoms par khyab bdal to// de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo kun du spang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
318a3(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// lugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu yin no// de nas yum kun du bzang mo jam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo// ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun du khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed
318a4(rnying rgyud): dadul dazung gnas las// longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sa// dbang ba'i sku mchog bdag lnga bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol pa bdab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems
318a5(rnying rgyud): shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung ste/ dper na zla ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang ba la shar ba badzin no// rdo rje'i klu de las rig pa'i yul gyi 'od zhe rnam par 'phro ba ni dper ma nyi 'od kyi 'od zer dus gcig shar
318a6(rnying rgyud): lta bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshu la rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa zhes b+ha bi'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum gro byi'i rgya la mo la gzigs te 'dzum
318a7(rnying rgyud): pa rnam par mdzad do// de nas yum gro d+ha'i rgyal mos kyang spyan thi me bag gi dz+wa ga sris gzigs nas len stong du btung phrag patsal te 'khon bskyong po'i sku 'das rnam par bskul lo// e ma'o yod brjen su mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lnga// rdo rje ga
318b1(rnying rgyud): gyi tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // dgang mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+ma'i gnas su phob ho// e ma'o// dkar pa 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang // chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du// gnyis med 'phros/
318b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i byin brlabs bsam yas las// ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku bsam yas 'thon// ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye// dgon gdungs gnas nas byang chub myu gu skyed// zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par spong // zhes rnam par bskul bas
318b3(rnying rgyud): pa su sa du nga 'dun kyi
318b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / steg pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'khyud pa dang / sdom pa dang / bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / gsol ba dang / myang ba dang / bca' ba dang / bde ba dang / sprod pa dang / 'dzeg pa la sogs
318b5(rnying rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun du rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang pa 'byas klas pa sha ba de las gsung
319a1(rnying rgyud): gi yig 'bru 'khor lo'i tshogs su yang snang ngo // yig 'bru de nyid thugs phyag mtshan du yang gyur/ thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'dra ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rtul ba yab yum dang / sems
319a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' dang / sems ma dang / thub pa dang / 'joms pa dang / 'joms ma rnams kyi skur yang rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de/ de ltar re re larang sangs rgya
319a3(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub po// yang 'od zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to// he ru ka re re la yang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring dang bcas
319a4(rnying rgyud): pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do// he ru ka re re las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi klong gsal bar mdzad do// chos kyi glu dang gar dang / chos kyi char dang / mchod pa dang / chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul ya na man
319a5(rnying rgyud): dang skyil zhi thams cad du ling long phyed do// de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang / bdud dang srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang du gra ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing dul bar gyur te/ rang rang
319a6(rnying rgyud): gi dbang phrogs nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so// de'i tshe na byang chub sems kyi 'od zer kun du khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de yang dri ma
319a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems kyi dbang thob ste 'gro ba'i don byed par gyur to// gzhan yang sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
319b1(rnying rgyud): 'de la rab tu dad do// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag ste gsog pa btab pa/ e ma'o e mdo ya mtshan che// gnyis med rol pa ma mtshan che// 'od zer 'phro 'du la mtshan che// byang chub
319b2(rnying rgyud): char sprin ya mtshan che// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// dkon gdungs spangs pa ya mtshan che// 'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che// ngadag
