319b3(rnying rgyud): kun du bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi stan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar btab nus lce pad+ma'i steng du lus kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/ brkyang phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don
319b4(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongs su gsol// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po dgongs su gsol// gseng mdzod ye shes glog gi 'khor lo dadi// chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab pas
319b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos byed pa po kun du bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sprin spros pas las kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram gcig lag tu bzhag ste/ las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang
320a1(rnying rgyud): du ga du sa du / nan
320a2(rnying rgyud): da sa tsun du rlo da
320a3(rnying rgyud): kyi marnam pa bcwas mdu bye 'ad ma d+hAn+d+ha te/ de nga dbus dag gang gas cigasos/ / rab tu 'thal/ leg rjeg sa/ rab rgyu gas/ yang med
320a4(rnying rgyud): zhing rnam pa dreg kyang sring myong thang pa gyur to// de nas kyang chu ba sems kyi latshan mas 'dus pa'i 'khod rje rjes kyi gnas snyer reg par byas po// dus pa la/ gargyas ma ma ma d+has pa sa/ rdo rje 'dra bar 'dus pa pa// dngus pa chen po rig
320a5(rnying rgyud): don rnams// gong dag rim pa je bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i bral du gnos// bskal bzang dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das na brdeg par 'gyur// rje sa de ste bas dngus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang gri rnams rangs par byas te dmachog thog nas
320a6(rnying rgyud): dro rje gyi sdang ba'i bral du 'khod rnam par 'khrod de// de nas byed pa phyo kun du bzang po las kyi bka' ba des bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gtsugags 'drang phrag rngul 'byor gyi legs su byas te kye dang / nang dang / gsang ba mtshad pa
320a7(rnying rgyud): de'i nyid da ga mi ba ga/ du da/ sargyas pa brgya sa 'dugs sa ma ma sa mi 'du byeng// gagis
320b1(rnying rgyud): rab brjod cing // dbas mtshon tshig gi lde mag gis// gsal bar mtshon te glo bar mdzod// A la la ho zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ngas gsol bu btab pad mkhyen nas brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par/
320b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun du bzang po de la lugs su btud de brgyang phyag btsal nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas gsol ba btub pa/ snga ba'i seng ge byed
320b3(rnying rgyud): pa po rdo rje kun du bzang po khyod la bdag cag zhu bar spobs na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ smra ba'i seng ge kun du bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod ce dang ci 'dod pa bdag ga zhus shig/ bdag gis gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o//
320b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol ba/ smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po dang kun du bzang po khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje btsan/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi lha phud/ chos thams cad kyi mdzod lags na/
320b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag byos bdag cig 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ gsang ba'i tshig lam gyis ston par mi snang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/ smra ba'i seng ge legs par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa
320b6(rnying rgyud): dang / smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ oM AHhU~M a la la ho// rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung / mi gsung ba nyid rgya cher bshid// bshad du med pa'i don de ni// rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnam
320b7(rnying rgyud): par brjod par mi mdzad de/ bka' mi stsal bar dgongs pa'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ de bas na gsang ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi snying po de smra bsam las 'das shing brjod du med pas de la tshig tu smra ba legs pa ma yin te/ tshig tu
321a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa'i dus nyid na gol ba yin par phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal nga rnams kyis kyang bshad de/ da ltar ston pa nyid kyang don nga nyid dgongs nas ma gsungs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams de bas na ma skyes par snying po byang chu
321a2(rnying rgyud): sems smig tu spros pa dang bral gyis kyad kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du mtshan ma'i tshig gi rnal 'byor ba rnams tshig gi tso 'byung ba'i phyir don rtogs pa'i bgyi ba'i phyir tshul ba rnams ci tshig gi sgonas gsungs pa yin no// dus pa 'khor tshogs
321a3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis gsol ba/ smra ba'i seng ge de ltar na bdag cag dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi don du/ rdo rje tshig gi lam du brjod pas don gsal bar byed pa de smra ba'i seng ge las kyi bka' mo khyod nyid kyis zhu bar spobs
321a4(rnying rgyud): shig/ smra ba'i seng ge dbang bus na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gus shig dang / de nas zla ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos 'dus ma'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
321a5(rnying rgyud): gri bdag byol lan stong du bskor ba byas te rmed du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de khyon nyid kyis mchod nas 'di d+hi ga sgrol pa btab bo// oM mAM hU~M ljon pa'i ngo mtshur khyod/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de/
321a6(rnying rgyud): tshig tu brjod pa ma legs na'ang // mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa// don la rtsing la tshig la zhi ba// tshig gis bsam pa rangs bya'i phyir// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon tshig gi lce mig gis// gsang ba de nyid bshad du gsor/
321a7(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa btab pa las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po smra ba'i seng ges gsol ba btab pa yang mkhyen/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa yang mkhyen pa dang / tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor yang thugs su
321b1(rnying rgyud): rlung nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum phyung ste/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa yang nas yang du gsor zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu bsgrags so// oM AHhUM swA hA/ pra d+hi tsid+d+ha gu h+ya sa ma ya/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas
321b2(rnying rgyud): grags pa chen po kun// rab tu spangs te brgyal bar gyur// 'khor tshogs gzhan ma smos ci dgos// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig/ gang tshig gis brjod du rung ba thams cad ni
321b3(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o// ji srid brjod du rung ba ma yin pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o// gang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o// gang tshig dang yi ges brjod du rung ba thams cad ni gzugs kyi sku'o// rigs kyi
321b4(rnying rgyud): bu sngags kyi lta ba dang spyod pa yang de nyid yin te/ gang don dam pa'i bden pa dang / chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi lta ba yin par shes par bya'o// de tid rgyu'i tshul du gnas pa las/ 'bras bu'i tshul du kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / gzugs kyi skur
321b5(rnying rgyud): b+h+r-i ste/ ji ltar spyad pa dang spyang du rung ba thams cad ni stong par rnal 'byor can gyis blta'o// de nas spro ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos a la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol /
321b6(rnying rgyud): de ltar lugs na/ bcom ldan 'das glags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang+gA lags/ lta ba dang spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang lags/ spyod pa 'bang zhig la blo gnas pa ni gang lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ zla ba'i seng ge legs so//
321b7(rnying rgyud): de'i don khyod ngal zhu ba ni legs so// smra ba'i seng gi gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba'o zhig gi dgongs pa'i tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lnga ga la yong
322a1(rnying rgyud): bdan pa gnyis sh+tha A DU // !nga dang spyod ba zloganas pa nan pa byor bas thob pa dang / sna brnyan pa rnam rma/ dAn d+han/ rnam 'byor pa naman+tam du da d+ha rlung ba rnams lda na// bdun pa rnam blags
322a2(rnying rgyud): kyi tshul yod de don dram par mya skyes pa'i tshu d+ha rgyu pa/ n+tu R+R-i bat+ta mtshon ma thabs kyi b+ha ba r+b+he m+b+ha hrI rgyal du yang med pa ma yin d+he/ me rgyan ma stod pa'i rnal rtsor da mtshan ma rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// sle ba pa'i rnal 'byor ngan
322a3(rnying rgyud): bden pa rnam gnyis la rkyen nas ldan gyis ba kyis la ga myis de na dgis zlab pa y-i no// rgyu'i rjes su~M na / don las d+ha d+ha pa rnams ni stong ba ba nag la blo gnas te/ kye phyi rten/ log pa'i rgyur rdzob la
322a4(rnying rgyud): zhig la rtog gi yang dag pa'i gan+da rdzo ba sti'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro// smra ba'i seng ge de bsanA log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i ni bolta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad
322a5(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud bar nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grags so// smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi spong
322a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gang lags/ dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ sgra ga'i seng ge gsung sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams daste bshad kyis nyon cig/ ngas yid tshim par bya'o// smra ba'i seng
322a7(rnying rgyud): gegasang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste rab tu brjod par dka' ni mdor bsnun rnam pa bcur 'dus so// bcu gang zhe nAM/ gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang / gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang
322b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi dngos grub dang / gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang / gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang / gsang sngags kyi cho 'phrul lo// skye ba'i seng
322b2(rnying rgyud): gang dag gi dper brjod pa yang rnam pa bar+b+ba ste/ b+h+ra mA dang / smig r+b+ha dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brgyan dang / dri za'i grong khye dang / blag cu dang / NA zla dang / n+ya'i rje bur dang / mig 'khrul dang / mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo //
322b3(rnying rgyud): seng ge de yang ji lnga zhe na/ sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu'i rtsolA~M ba dang / sman dang sbyor sngags kyi sbyor ba las/ dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang smra ba'i bdag nyid can de snang ba med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i
322b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang yig 'bru dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba las grub pa'i rtags dag snang yang de la rang bzhin med do// smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba sgom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgya la chur mthong yang de la chu'i rang
322b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang tha snyad btags pa yang ming nyid dmigs su ga la yod/ rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po che /
322b6(rnying rgyud): kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang ji ltar spyad na yang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo// gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu 'am me long ngam 'bru mA ra la brten nis bzhin gyi gzugs
322b7(rnying rgyud): su snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa da / ting nge 'dzin dang / yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo// dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang
323a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dang srid gyur yad+ma na gnas t+yA byung mjug rta rtag pa ma ngon pa dang gsang sngags kyi gnas mang rna 'byor ba bdag nyid sa kya babyud bar 'byung ba/ dA pa byur thugs brnyan// nag canas kyang man tad 'drag pa /
323a2(rnying rgyud): nga rkyen pa ti thug mang sugs pa du nga ga / na na dan gyu // sa nga smang
323a3(rnying rgyud): de'i du rjeb kyi ba'i mabyor pa dag nga rin gyi rnyog pa mdado// nga chu sa bya ba'i mtshan nyid na nu rnabs chenagaci las ci bur mang nga ba na nga bad bad rnyan nga ti pan tu rnam pa brjon gyings
323a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig nad can gyis bar snang la bltas na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do// de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba yang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam mang yongs su grub par yongs
323a5(rnying rgyud): su mi lta'o// mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dgra lag na mgal ma thogs nis bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste/ de la dbyibs med do// de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'gyur la dngos
323a6(rnying rgyud): por ma grub pa'o// smra ba'i seng ge de ltar nu gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o// zla ba'i seng ge de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas yid dge pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas doni dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par bya'o// 'phags pa rgyad kyi
323a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed paM po kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das
323b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chung du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun du rab tu mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te 'di skad ces gsol bya btab bo// e mya'o bder
323b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs kun du bzang // e ma'o yi nas dgra ba'i don// oM ma'o gsing ba mchog gi bdag/ e ma'o ye shes rngam pa'i glog/ e ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po// e ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog/ oM ma'o rnam dag dpal khyod la// oM ma'o bdag
323b3(rnying rgyud): cag gsol ba 'debs// byang chub sems 'di ji ltar skyed// dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar lags// phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ci// bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi ji ltar lags// dngos gruHsgrub pa'i rnam grangs ci// sngags kyi sdom pa ji ltar bsrung //
323b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad// dregs pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar gdul// rnam bzhi'i las ni ji ltar bgyi// brnag pa'i nan tar ji ltar bgyi// rnal 'byor rnams la brtse ba dang // bdag cig rnams la sman slad du// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du
323b5(rnying rgyud): gsol// aM la lA ho zhes gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags mdo'i don rnams phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa la phan gdags pa
323b6(rnying rgyud): dang / dad pa can gyi 'gro ba rnams yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ngal zhu ba legs so// smra ba'i seng ge legs so// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas sbyar 'das pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / slad kyis byon
323b7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi don thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ rgyud kyi 'brel pa/ don gyi bkod pa/ rtags kyi rol pa/ ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor los rnam par bsgyings pa gzhung chen po 'dings
324a1(rnying rgyud): bshad bar na smras byu nga ldan pa rnam su gas dgas kyang na drags mams par du kun ma ldanas shAdun la ga sa nga gang nga la tu rdzun mad mgyur pa'o// 'dugs pa rjod storgal ba ma shes rnam pa gagag 'ang dang
324a2(rnying rgyud): mdo zhes bya ba las sngags kyi mdo bstan pa'i leny+tsa sti gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dngas gsang ba mchog hU~M bdag po de snying po b+h+ring chub la nges par dgrel bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// thugs nas yang 'dus
324a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams chos thams cad ni byang chub sems su dngus shing byang chub kyi sems nyid snang ba shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni lhas dang ngag dang sems su 'dus pa/ lus dang pa//
324a4(rnying rgyud): ngagra dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni sems kyang lus dang drug gi rnam pa lta bu/ ngag kyang lus drang sems kyi rnam pa lta bu/ lus kyang tshig tu brjod pa dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bur rang rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rtogs shig/ 'on tang byang chub tu sems
324a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mchod dang // gzung
324a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
324b1(rnying rgyud): byu chub kyi sems 'ad gsungs sa// a ma ngam tshwar yA mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyigs pa thugs// chos kun sgrub mad pa las// b+ha ba di nI rab grags pa// sta dang sti skye gnyi sa med pa// byang chub sems 'dra bstan pa'o// zhes pa
324b2(rnying rgyud): so// de nas yang me long lta bu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun 'gag pa med pa las// 'gag pa'o/
324b3(rnying rgyud): ni rab tu bsgrags// 'gag dang mi 'gag med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'ongo
324b4(rnying rgyud): mtshar ya mtshan gyi// spangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun gnas pa med pa las// gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad so so
324b5(rnying rgyud): kun du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang bya'i thugs// chos kun dmigs pa med pa las// dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/
324b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad b+hA ba la nan tan du sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtsha
324b7(rnying rgyud): gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun spro bsdu med pa las// spros dang bsdus par rab tu grags// spros bsdus yod dang med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang /
325a1(rnying rgyud): das a wal ts+tsha nas smra byung // byung chub sems la bstod pa/ am ba nan san dru dang // a mran t+ta ti byang chub sems// A 'dag pa rlo ma med/ A ma nab gas lung na// a ma' mnyam ny-id dbyang 'dadas// nam
325a2(rnying rgyud): so sor rang rig sems// e ma'i byung sa mas sbyin gyis grub// byang chub sems la cug tshal lo// zhes bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das nyid khyad par du gyur pa yang byang chub sems nyid yin zhing byang chub kyi sems thugs su chud pa'o// bdag nAg rig 'dzin
325a3(rnying rgyud): tshigs su gyur pa rnams kyang byang chub sems la smyon par 'tshal/ 'jug par 'tshal/ ldang par 'tshal/ gnas par 'tshal te/ bdag cig kyang ring rang gi sems g.yos par bsti// reg par bgyi/ nye bar bkye/ nyams su myong bar bgyi bar 'tshal na/
325a4(rnying rgyud): bdag ca gA dA 'dra badri bsam pa can la snying rje chen por dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa dgongs pa mdzad du gso zhes gsol ba gtab pa las gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab par thugs su chung nus snying rje byang chub 'byung ba
325a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad do// gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad pas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis thams cad rgyas par khyab pa ni til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin no// de nas yang 'dri gsungs
325a6(rnying rgyud): so// e ma'o ye shes rnam dag chos// sna tshogs snang yang rtog par gsang // ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med// snod ma yin la bsten pa dka'o// e ma'o srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin la// bdug tu rtog pa srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs kyis//
325a7(rnying rgyud): kun rings dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams// mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor gzung // log rteg nor ba'i dbang gis kun brtags kyang // rang bzhin nyid las mnyam pa rdul tsam med// e ma'o yun rings dus nas rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams
325b1(rnying rgyud): ngan na byung/ ga 'an ma nga rlung na pas // da / ga gas ga /
325b2(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sgra// srid kyi'i nyes dmigs nyid kyang byang chub rnying por gnas// kyi nong snod btsud pa'i yum dang du gas pa/ zhes gsungs pas chos thams cad byang chub senas su gnas so// 'phags nga rgya kyi tshul bya y-i she sra rngam pa'i sgogs
325b3(rnying rgyud): ra DI'i mdo pas byang chung tu sems bskyed pa'i 'du ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'dres gsang ba mchog gi bdag rnyid sgra dang gsung thugs rdo rje las dkyil 'khor thams cadu 'byung bar brjod nis btsun mo dang gnyis su med par
325b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// mngon par 'du mdzad nas yang la 'khor thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje rkyen zhes bya ba'i rtang dzin lakhrugs rje/ dkyil 'khor rnams cad kyi mdo dri gi sbyangs so// 'dus pa'i 'tshang tshogs rnams nyin cig/ gsang sngags byin brlabs pas
325b5(rnying rgyud): yas la// dkyil 'dor bas mA yas brjod mi lung // mdor ba m+b+has rnam pa gyis ma khyen te// rang bani ni sbyin dris dkyil 'khor dang // ti 'dzin gas lda 'i dkyil 'khor dang // baN+Di drang rdul tshan dkyil 'khor te// gsum po dag tu rgyal bas
325b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs// zhes ched du gleng ngo // de nas sme ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gsum du brjod par mthong 'gres so// de yang 'di skad ces gsol ba btub bo//
325b7(rnying rgyud): e mo'i gsang mchog bde ba che// ya nas lhun grubadag pa'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// rdo rje rgyal la gyig 'tshal lo// chos kun yi nas sangs rgyas pa'i// rang bzhin dge pa dri ma med// rang bzhin lhan grub zab mo'i dzin/
326a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan stong pos bshad du gsol// Alal to// de nas 'dzum ldan dadas gsang ba mchogs byudag sa gsal ba btab d+ma don thugs su chud nas ldan gyi bu grub pa nga lnga 'khor 'thung ba'i dza \u0f7fsa nas bya ba
326a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas yang rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor skyes pa dang bral ba 'di gsungs so// e ma 'o sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla med pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i// rgyal bas gsu sa pa'i ye shes gang /
326a3(rnying rgyud): ni dkyi 'khor snang pa yin// zhes gzungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pa des rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor mirnam grangs 'di gzungs sa// de la 'din spyir bsdus pa'o// sams nan kun gyi sems
326a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// phung po lta na sangs rgyas hA// dbyung ba ldadon dbying bathug ma// khams dang skyemamyed meng po kun// sems dbya' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// des ni skyid gsum dkyil 'khor gyi// zhes gsungs su//
326a5(rnying rgyud): lha phung po lta sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du de/ spangs pa yang // srid gisum sems can tham pA tsi kyi// rgyu dang 'bros bu'i gzugs rnams kun// chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na// dbyer med don gyi gti mug pas// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin
326a6(rnying rgyud): yin// srid gsumasams can thams cad kyi// bde stug tshotsA ba'i phreng po kun// mnyam nyid dbyings lnga steng bas ni// de rgyal min 'o'i rang bzhin pas// myong ba rnyan chen 'byung ba yin// sring gsam sems n+dan thams cad kyi// yul dang shes
326a7(rnying rgyud): paphra rags kyi// byed pa'i phung po thams cad kun// ma 'dres dbyings la snang bsen// shes rab rlabs kyi 'dod chags pas// rnyeng ba mtha' yas rang bzhin no// sing gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dge dang mi dag gnyis ki man// sems
326b1(rnying rgyud): ung dang ma sa// rgyu na sna // / na// u rgyu du // dun 'du bu dus/ spyo ma sa / / nga
326b2(rnying rgyud): na pa shes / ste / nga ba du
326b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni// ga da pa/ nam me ge ma nas sgyu / de shul ni ba na/ na na pas// bdag shegs skyeg rang na yin// brjid thab mas
326b4(rnying rgyud): n+ti// brtan byed basbyin rten rnams pa na// sa oM khams su thugs pa rnams// mai b+he dash-is la shar baban// rnam byu na min pas/ de rta rje sa rgya ga rang bzhin ldan// snod cad 'gro ba tham gyi// gyis byung ga
326b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid s+ya/ khams su grags pas+ho// kun s+yA da Sh+T-i sarba shar bsnyen// yon tan tshigs chen kun byung bas// rin d+han cings m+b+ha na bzhin dzin// bzung 'gro ba rnams kyi/ ga 'dzi nga po rnams cad kun//
326b6(rnying rgyud): khams su grags pa rnams// snang gas pa dpyi sa la sher bas na// gsal rdo sreg pa'i rang bzhin pas// paN+Di dbyings phyag rang bzhin yin// b+h+r-id bcung 'grub thams cid kyi// yang g.yo 'degs bskyod thams cad kun// rlung gi khams su grags
326b7(rnying rgyud): g+sa// sgyid kying la ba // gas mi thugs sa/ kyi sum
327a1(rnying rgyud): gsum rnams can rnams ca daH// khadrug sa pa spya bstan// mgu ga nam shes sa sa/ rmugs// mthong ba la shes pan pa myod// sra la na s+ho// sto gas mas smras can pams /
327a2(rnying rgyud): klad pa spyod pa kun// rna ba'i rnam shes zhes su grags// zos pa'i ye shes yin pas na// lug na rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dri rnams kun la spyod pa kun// sna yi rna ma shes zhes su grags// tshe ra ba'i ye shes
327a3(rnying rgyud): yin pas na// nam mkha'i snying po'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// ro rnams kun la spyod pa kun// lce yi rnam shes zhes su grags// myong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir// spyan res gzigs kyi rang bzhin yin// zhes gsungs so/
327a4(rnying rgyud): de pA yul bzhi byang chub sems ma bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma kun// gzugs kyi skye mched nyid du grags// mthong bar bya bo'i yul yin pas// gzugs mdzes lA s+ye'i rang
327a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin yin// snod bzung 'gro ba thams cad kyi// zan dang ma zan gnyis kaM las// byung ba'i sgra yi khams su grags// thos par bya ba'i yul yin pas// nir d+ha ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcung dgro ba thams cad kyi// lhan cig skyes dang sgrar
327a6(rnying rgyud): dang gyur// zhi mi dang de dang de bzhin gzhan// dr-i yi khams dang skye mched de// pad+ma ma~M par bya ba'i yul yin pas// mA lo nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro bar thams cad kyi// kha mingar laM sogs ro rnams kun// r-I yi skye mtshad tid
327a7(rnying rgyud): grags// myang bar bya ba'i yul yin pas// gI ti nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dbang po bzhi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// mthong byed dang ba'i bdag
327b1(rnying rgyud): tidang // mig gi khams zhes bya bar glags// mthong ba'i bya babyed pa'i phyir// thams pa mo d+ha rang bzhin sbyin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// thos byar byed pa'i bdag tad de// rna ba'i khams zhes bya par grags// thos pa'i byang /
327b2(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i phyir// sgrub pa kun sel rang bzhin yin// srid gsum snyoms can thams cad kyi// snom byed dang ba'i bdag nyid do// sna yi khams zhes bya bar glags// tshor bar bya ba byed pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal ljid kyi rang bzhin yin// srid gsum
327b3(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad ci// myong byed dag pa'i bdag nyid de// lce yi khams zhes bya bar grags// myong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir// kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin yin// zhes na sbyangs so// de la dus ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/
327b4(rnying rgyud): snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// rgyu 'bras kun du rnam pa spyad// sngon 'das dus su rnam par grags// sngon 'das dpyid kyi rang bzhin yin// spos me'i rang bzhin nyid yin no// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// rgyu spyang 'bras bu mi g+had kun/
327b5(rnying rgyud): de ltar dbyar gyi rang bzhin yin// me tog nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// rgyu 'bras yongs kyis ma spyad pa// ma 'ongs dus su rnam par grags// 'od mi rig ston rang bzhin ni// A lo ki yaM rang bzhin yin// snong
327b6(rnying rgyud): bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// chu 'bras nges par ma tshogs pa// 'byung bar ma nges dus zhes grags// ma 'ongs dgun gyi rang bzhin ni// gan d+he'i rang bzhin yin par nges// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni lus kyi dbang po dang // rnam par
327b7(rnying rgyud): shes pa dang / yang de'i phul dang de las byung ba'i byang chub sems khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// rig byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// lus kyi khams zhes bya bar grags// reg byed bya ba byed pas na// gci
328a1(rnying rgyud): mas pa // da // / rgyu du / nam// du ga ma
328a2(rnying rgyud): thamam cad ma// da nga gyur ba rnams// d+d+ha sgrim da byed du chugapa// ga pa 'i dngas/ ga ba na// nga gag zhes ma kya / sa rnang gnas 'ang margyad/
328a3(rnying rgyud): brnams pa da / na gi ga pa// gapa ma pan sa rgya mi spyod pa nga ga ba ma sna // bya rdzo ga nga mirdzog/ bar mi ma
328a4(rnying rgyud): blags// la sa lta thar sems // dgas pam 'i ban na ngo// dz+ha da d+ha ba ma // ga na du pa mA pa pa// mnan myur ma yin rjes su thogs// smig kyi la zer sems gyur// zhwa
328a5(rnying rgyud): ma par nga kun // rnyed bad+ma di'i tha~M thams da// skyes pa byed pa mi tha pa// bdag rjem med kyis glags// ba d+hi 'i sems sbya phyir// hU~M la bram 'i rang ba'an sbyin// rnaMs ma// de ra ni dang
328a6(rnying rgyud): te/ drang sa sa sa sa sa
328b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad kyi// 'dus byas ma byas chos rnams kun// chos kyi skyed byed yin par grags// rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pas// kun du bzang mo'i rang bzhin yin// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyangs mnyam dang ma mnyam
328b2(rnying rgyud): pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' sa klas pa// ji snyed rnam grags yod pa'i chos// kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin pas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po paM// rnam grangs yin par rgyal bas gsungs// zhes ched du brjod pa gsungs so// de nas
328b3(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// kun rdzob mtshan ma'i gnas chen kyang // 'og min bla min gnas mchog gam// lcang lo can nam bde ba can// pad+ma can la sogs pa
328b4(rnying rgyud): yi// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor de// mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor ngol snang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la// 'byung chen brtsegs pa'i lhun gyis grub// de steng rin chen sna bzhi las// lhun gyis grub pa tshad dpag
328b5(rnying rgyud): med// de la brten po'i sa gzhi ni// rin chen sna tshogs gcal du bkram// mnan nem bteg 'phar mdzes pa'i gzhi// de la pho brang gzhal med khang // gru bzhi lham po mdzes par snang // rin chen sna bzhi'i rgyu las gru'o// glo 'bur bzhi yang mkhar
328b6(rnying rgyud): thAbs tshul// bum pa'i rtse mo chos kyi tog/ rma byi'i mdongs dang ldan pa'o// sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// rta babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan// gru chang bar khyams mdzes par ldan//
328b7(rnying rgyud): na che ni 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs// sems can pad+ma ti zla dang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan mchog ldan// rin chen khri rkang rnam rten ldan// pho brang de yi gdan mchog kyang // nyi zla nor bu rin chen 'bar// bla re rgyal mtshan na bzang gdugs// de
329a1(rnying rgyud): dang bar mya tog zung // dris bu dang na rnga yab sogs// ram ma ma ba su tshogs brtan// 'jig rten mtshogs mangs pa dang // da la stsogs te rgyan rnams byung // bsam+b+ha rdzas khyab mtha' yus mchog/ gzhal yas du la rmA/
329a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin// glang seng rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rta dbus rnams kyi cong tsong dang // gser gyi skyil bu 'byur ba dag/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yang sgrogs// sgo drung de dag re ren// ta laN+Di skyed shing cid cong 'khril// dri dang gzugs dang 'od du lja//
329a3(rnying rgyud): tA lang sbeng shing de dag pa// khya b+hag la sogs pakra shis pa'i// b+ha rnams snyan pa'i skad kyang 'byin// rlung de dag ring na// khrus rji kyad kyi sa le gas pa// nA mtshi yan lag ldan pa'i // grangs med de dgar ren// b+ha dang lha mo bas
329a4(rnying rgyud): bya// phyi rol kho ra khyor yug ni// rtses 'chags brjod mi lang // de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ ma btsal ye nas spyan gyis grub// lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// rgya las grub par rgyal bas gsungs// pho brang de na gnas
329a5(rnying rgyud): pa yaM// ye shes lha tshogs mang po rnams// gtso gzungs zung du 'khril ba ste// dbus kyi pho brang snying po la// rnam par snang mdzad snying po che// 'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od 'dra// rang rtags lag na 'khor lo bsnams// dpa' bo de yi spyan snga na//
329a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yang // dung dang shel gyi kha dog 'dra// rang rtags lag na rdo rje 'dzin// g.yas su rin chen dbyung ldan te// bai DUr+ya yi kha dog 'dra// rang rtags rin chen zlar brgyad 'dzin// rgya ba na snang ba mtha' yas gtso// badz+ra rA ga'i mdog
329a7(rnying rgyud): 'dra zhing // rang rtags pad+ma dmar po 'dzin// g.yon du don yod grub pa ste// in tra nI la ljang bu'i mdog/ rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin// kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te// dror tshugs rigs lnga dbul brtsan// rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhugs/
329b1(rnying rgyud): dag tananas sa s+ho// gag sanas kun lams// dru byud pa dgag// nga nan // ban du na/ sasag byam mas// gas pa sa smra ba na /
329b2(rnying rgyud): bas nga ga / sna ste/ d+hI pa byer med / shA ba
329b3(rnying rgyud): lhas gyu// b+h+ya rdzun mamal byung ba// b+h+ring ba rang nag sa rab na/ dz+nyAn na mangs pa // sbyin dmi gzigs dpang da ma shrI hU~M// rang rtags pad+ma shA ba da // rgyags pa nas sams da brgyan// sems dpa
329b4(rnying rgyud): skye mo krung du bzhugs// rgyun dang rgya nags sun gyig bcan// de dag gi ni g.yon rdom ni// gar dang ga mo phreng ba dz+yaM sa// g.yas pas thabs kyi N+Dal b+h+rid// g.yon pag da mi 'od zed // de zlang 'dzin cing rgya grags gzhan// rga cim
329b5(rnying rgyud): da kyang mthun pa yin// mdzes pa'i gadzin rnams la ni// byams pa mi dzo dkang ba ste// mangs pa'i rgya shing 'gro 'jams// shar ma ma pa kyi med pa'o// hU~Mb ba rnams pa mthong ga s+ho// chos kyi 'i long rgyu ba te// lto rgyab margya rang /
329b6(rnying rgyud): sgra mdzes par gnas// 'ad ma dpa lce gzhan nu dmar \u0f7f mdog/ rnye rtogs oM la mthi ga ts+tshin// nAb bya mtshams su mdzes par gan sa// kun du bzang po ljang ser mdog// rang rtags rin chen k+She ma dzin// b+hU shrI mtsham
329b7(rnying rgyud): tsa bral gnas// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// sgras dang me tog badrug pa dri// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtsal 'khyud// g.yon pa rang rtags 'dzin par// chathugs thams cad sbyim bzhin// sgo khyung rnams le 'joms pan+de// gaushin rje gshang
330a1(rnying rgyud): mthung nag 'bar// nar mag gdang sa pa labum tshan thogs// shang tu sbyin rnam par gnas// rnamya par rtul babar dga' bar// rnga rdzas gnadas sbyin dar// rnamaman dmar naga'abar bste// nga zla zhugs pa nu ba zlar/
330a2(rnying rgyud): gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang nag 'bar// rgya gram gyis gnon byang gi sgor// s+yAng stabs tshul d+ha ra t+yA gnas// dra khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs ste// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong ni 'khyil// hU~M dang phaT
330a3(rnying rgyud): g+hisgra chen grogs// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// gshed mo dang ni rgyal mya dang // rta mgrin mo dang 'khyil mo rnams// lag mtshan lcags kyi zhags pa dang // sgrog dang dril bu thegs shing rngam// cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang 'dra// sgo khyung dang tu lhan
330a4(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// mdzes pa'i bar khyams de nyid la// sbrul sku thub pa chen mongag// tsa~M du la thabs kyi sgrar ston pas// cha lugs ma dzes du la bIr ston// mdzes pa'i bar khams de nyid las// mdun dang chub kyi phyogs rol gyi// byed pa po dang byed mo//
330a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' yi ni mdog 'dral// ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gnas// de la sogs te mtha' yis mchog/ brjod med dzad du med pa yi// lha yi tshigs kyi sa gang bar gnas// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// lha yi tshogs chen de dag gi/ thugs
330a6(rnying rgyud): kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// tshon gang 'od dang bcas pa'o// ljang la rang rtags yi ge rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal// de lta'i sku mchog re re la// tshul dgu dgu dang ldan po ste// mnyan dang thig dang 'khril bag dang // ldem
330a7(rnying rgyud): bag chags dang gzhon tshul can// gsal dang 'tsher dang lhun stug dang // gzi brjid 'bar bar rab tu gnas// de ltar rang bzhini dkyil 'khor nas// gyi rabs sngags 'tshong rna'i 'byor bas// sprin drangs mchod pa dngul ba 'jos// zhes gsungs
330b1(rnying rgyud): zos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa// de nas smra ba'i snang ga lha sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khar tshogs rnams rang nga gi bsam pa rangs par gyur te/ A la la zhus bya ba'i snabyung nas mgrin ga ga d+ha ma du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
330b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs dang mi dmigs brtan g.yo chos ku ni spyan grub dpag mi lang // rang rig yon tan dpag med pas ma yis mang po de kun brjod myi lang // gsang sngags rgya mtsho thugs rje bsam pas bas ma khyab ji snyed dpag mo yang // sbrul pa rgya mcho gang gA
330b3(rnying rgyud): steng 'gro ba chos ston zhing khams khyab ces ched du brjod pa tshod du brjod do// le'u ste lnga ba'o// / rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi g.yo ba rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
330b4(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas te nga nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur du rung ba tsem du rtogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar
330b5(rnying rgyud): dang dang rkang ba'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags yi mtshan chen po 'di// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de// bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // bskyed dang lhag pa'i
330b6(rnying rgyud): ti dz+nyAn no// thog ma'i rnal 'byor nyid bsgoms te// dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na// ting nge 'dzin kyang rnam gsum ste// dang por de bzhin nyid kyi dang // de bzhin nyid la gnas bcu'i phyir// stong pa chen
330b7(rnying rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gnyis pa kun snang nam mkha'i deng // snying rje sum gyis khyab pa'i phyir// mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gsum pa rang gi sa bon nam// rab tu brtan pa'i yig 'bru a// de las phra mo a 'jos 'dus// spros
331a1(rnying rgyud): tu na du rgyu mju ga
331a2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid nam / mahA hU~M da ma / n-i na pa pa ts+tsha 'i 'o sa // pa sa na dri / sa pa rnyed// de pa kyi la ba ste/ de rnye gyung /
331a3(rnying rgyud): mArnas bsum mkha rnams / badz+ra byin gyis // gnyis myed gyes par 'dril b.las/ byu gA'aM hU~Mb tu ba ga sa// 'a du byings su brim pa // dbang chenas byin dz+ra ldar rngu // e oM ba~M swA ts+tsha/ oM nyi ngasu brgyanam
331a4(rnying rgyud): mi gadzin / na dang na myed bye
331a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin na 'ad / stan / 'i na pa di nga ba / byed// 'a d+hi/
331a6(rnying rgyud): T+TA rAN/ ti thad sbyi/ pab bad+him/ dz+har la/ shASha~M / seM ts+tsha la ni ni 'o// 'ad+hi na // byer bur ba // dgasu mayin shAN+DI seM bar/
331a7(rnying rgyud): na rdzogs par gas pa// thal sregs par yig shU hA// hU~M ya~M sa ban 'on// thal sogs pa hU~M// babyung 'i don byed par bya / gal po nga // rnas shA na/ la sog
331b1(rnying rgyud): lag 'gyu// mig khams la sngags pa lnga// pa la sogs pa'ang byung baH// gan sa stogasam+b+ha mdzad dam+ba dza'i // yul gas pa dag 'du// dras bzhes pan rab rnams// shAl phyogs par lag 'ju na// na /

331b3(rnying rgyud): ba d+hA/ na
331b4(rnying rgyud): ma/ stan rnag sa// / bdAn ba/
331b5(rnying rgyud): sam b+ha// seMnaH// spyan \u0f7f/ gas / rab tu gyur/ ga gas kyad bya san+ta shAn hU~M
331b6(rnying rgyud): man+ta ma na ni badzi na sgrub ngam/ dzi pa ma rba ba dun parnabazla pa na da sa ba sa te ga ti hU~M 'i
332a1(rnying rgyud): thor tshugs la sogs cha lugs kun// rang bzhin kun rdzob dkyil 'khor 'di// rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// yang na gzugs brtan dkyil l+la Sha na nga // lhag pang tang
332a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba// de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun// yum gyi mkhang las gsal bar bsgom// rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par ro// zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur bar mthong ngo //
332a3(rnying rgyud): 'dags pa byed kyi N+Dal po yi sh+'ush+tsa pa rnam pa zlog sa khor mi lta zhes pabralas rjid nga man gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par skye ba'i hU~M drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang bya mchog gi ba shu sa brtags parnyan m+b+ha thA rnam pa
332a4(rnying rgyud): zhes b+ha ba'i tid de 'dun pa rnams par 'gyus nas las dang pon rje pa byor ba snyed ces par bya hU~M rang dus pa'i 'khor phyogs rnam la bka' stsal ba/ b+hag 'ad tshigs rnams cho byams ca ni gzugs brnyan lta gling rnam pa'in
332a5(rnying rgyud): par shes par bya'o// de cing sbyor zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzugs brtan lta bu'i rnam par snang zhing dgas ma 'das pa'i phyir ro// de bas na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar bya yis nyon cig/ de la ngabani rgyud kyi rnam grangs so//
332a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa yi 'grob pa// mtshon pas gsal ba'i don ston phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// brtan zhing mdzes pa'i khang bu la// 'jam por zhab zhal byas nas TI// khang ge lnga yi ga zugs dris pa/
332a7(rnying rgyud): de yang dngos grubarten du bshad// ranas mgro ga ma shing shun nam// ta la 'i lon 'am dur khrod ris// zhing chen ris pa sogs pa la// phyag tso'i gzugs su bris na yang // mtshan ma'i byung ba'i rten du ba shang //
332b1(rnying rgyud): dud dam pa so'i chu las ni// phyag rgya'am gzugs su 'bur brjod nas// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// gser dngul zangs khar la sogs la// mkhas pas legs par lugs byas te// yan lag ma nyams gzugs byas na/
332b2(rnying rgyud): de mtshan ma'i rten du bshad// blag/ sha byang chub shing bu 'am// rgyu shing mnyen las gzugs byas na// de rnams mtshan ma'i rten du bshad// sbyin zhing mnyen pa'i rgyu rnams las// phyag rgya'i gzugs su legs byas na// de yang mtshan
332b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i rten yin no// sa stengs dbyibs legs mdzes pa la// rdul tshon 'dus byas rgya rnams kyis// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor byas na yang // de yang dngos grub rten du bshad// re zhig las kyi dang po las// sa steng sa dkyil 'khor byas par shis//
332b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de// sa stegs bya ba'i gnas mchog kyang // skyon yon bye brag shes pa las// spang blang gnyis su shes par bya// ri bo ri dran 'dus pa'i spyi// gangs ri brag dkar 'dab rtsa ni// steng gcan
332b5(rnying rgyud): 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// zhi ba'i las la de shis so// phug chen dgon pa chen pho dang // brag chen rdo rje gtams pa'i dkyil// gtsu ni can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// mngon par spyod pa sgrub pa'o gnas// dur khrod gnas dang ngam glog dang /
332b6(rnying rgyud): sum mdo grog le bshadra ba'i gnas// durA gcan 'khu ba'i gnas bya'o// dbang du bsdu ba sgrub pa'i gnas// nags tshal mang po gtibs pa dang // shin tu btsan dang 'jigs pa'i ngos// stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// 'dod pa sgrub pa
332b7(rnying rgyud): gnas yin no// mtsho gling chu mngo rgya mchong 'dzings// chu'i glu ma brtson pa'i gnas// drug can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya// las rnams kun la de shes so// ri bo 'dun pa'i rtse rnams dang // tsan+dan nags tshal ye tog tshal// yang 'ong bkra shis
333a1(rnying rgyud): nyams dga' sa// gnas dkyil la khyod bar shos// brgyag dang sadu sma rnams// lags par byud+d+ha d+d+ha la / na sa bya sma gaH// gas na mngan pa rnyanam mkha' shes// pa pa
333a2(rnying rgyud): dog rnam lda'o// sa sor ma 'dres gas pa ba shis// s+ya bA ni shin d+ha ma nyams dang // ma kram mnyam par gnas pa la// hrInas sman po rje med// da lta rab rtags par pa so d+ha'o// skur bar zla ba'i gnas den no// gshin rje gdug pa'i ma
333a3(rnying rgyud): rjes dang // srin po rnam pa'i mchi rjes dang // khro bo gnod sbyin lham rjes dang // ma mo rngam pa'i sbyar rjes dang // 'byung po chu bo'i 'jolas dang // gdug pa klu mi rkun srang dang // skyon can rgyu ba'i lam snying dang // zhwar blon gdug pa'i 'dugs
333a4(rnying rgyud): nga // kha nas mtho 'du na sa dang // rtenA dang dbrel b+h+r-i gnas rnams // tA la ga ba byang du 'odas pa ltar// lAM paM ba/ lA thugs chen po yis// lo l-i buM shugs te rab tu spyang // zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni sa bskong ba'i la4\u0f7f/
333a5(rnying rgyud): dri rapra bslang ba'i las rnams kyang // mngon dang mi mngon bdag po li// rnyed pa nyi byar ni t+ya'i d+hi raM// ser sti spangs pa'i sems kyis ni// rin dang bden pas bcwo la bslang // zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni sa gzung ba ste/ de nas slob dpon bdang
333a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis// rdo rje dril bu re ldan pa yis// rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun du bskor// khros pas hU~M paM nga rgyal bya// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// dengs shig ces su bsgo nas kyang // seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pa// khro bar byin brlabs
333a7(rnying rgyud): gdab par bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni sa'i lha mo spyan drangs pa'o// de nas dbang gyur lha mo de// spyan drangs bskyed dang de nyis min par// mchod bstong tshul bzhin byas nas ni// bdag cag rnal 'byor slob pa po// bdud btum ma
333b1(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs par cha// ru t+na tshogs kyis rgal ba lA// dgyes pa'i las don bgrangs te// bdag cags la bgrod pa'am// rwa rnga'i rgol ba byung ba na// stan wA nad la dbang bal lo// zhes gsungs so// da la 'din rtags brtag bla// mahAn
333b2(rnying rgyud): mos mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// ro lnga mtshan nyid brtag par bya// dge ba'i rtags na dngos grub 'byung // gal te shes par ma gyur na// thabs la mkhas pas spang bar bya// yang na sbyin sreg bya bar brtag/ cis gsungs so// de la 'di ni
333b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen gter sba ba'o// gnas de bsod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // spros lnga 'bru lnga snying po lta// gar+b+ha'i nang du blugs nas su// sa gzhi gter dang ldan par bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni sa byung ba'o// sa zhag spos
333b4(rnying rgyud): chen rnam lnga yi// khu ba bsres nas kun du ni// gru bzhi dbyibs su legs byas ti// bko tsam du skyong rgyal bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// des kyang dngos po kun sbyangs te// rgyal po'i bzhugs gnas
333b5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni b+ha sta zhon pa gnas pa'i cho ga'o// de nas lha rnams ji skyed pa// rang bzhin kun rdzob sman drangs te// spos kyi dkyil 'khor lho grangs bzhin// gang na sar byas
333b6(rnying rgyud): mchod la// lan cig gshegs zhes sta gon bya// de nas 'dus pa'i sems can kun// gsang dang snying gar bram pa dang // ku sha brim dang srung sdud gdags// so shing brim dang rmi ltas brtag/ mchod pa'i yo byad ji snyed dang // rgyan tu 'os pa'i
333b7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa kun// tshang bar bsogs te byin gyis brlab// 'dus pa'i sems can de dag kun// chos ga/ mi rim pas dbugs phyung ste// gsang sngags che ba'i yon tan bshad// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus so// rog byed
334a1(rnying rgyud): dag gi yan lag las// dus rnams shes par bya ba ni// bkra shiswa lha li nyi ma dang // 'byor ldan dus tshad bzang ba ni// mtshan ma' zlog pa yin mod kyang // brtagasan dngos grub mtshan mya 'byung // zhes gsungs so// de la
334a2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o// tshon dang thig spyad rnam lnga la// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te// sprul pa'i phreM 'du rgyun mi gcad// smos sam lce bog dkar po yi// dud pas rgyun mi bcad par bdug/ khros pas drag po'i sngags zlos shing /
334a3(rnying rgyud): chung// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlabs// thig g.yog lus kyi sems ma ste// mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni// phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa yis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam thig gdab// de nas sa thaMg gdab pa yang // 'dul/
334a4(rnying rgyud): bla'i dbang gI bye brag las// maN+Dal tshad ma nges pa med// sor bzhi pa nas brtsams nas su// ji srid dpag tshad thub par ro// oM dz+nyA na tsakra su tra ma ti kra ma hUM zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni tshen dgye ba'i cho ga // rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra dang //
334a5(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de 'dra bar// brtan ma ya ni de 'dra bri// tshon sku 'bras dang 'byung khungs sum// rdo khams rin chen dag la bya// swA gsum sna lnga dag dang ni// rin chen phung ze'i tshon gyis ni// dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba'i na//
334a6(rnying rgyud): rdzas bskor bar bya// phyag rgya gzhan la rkyong bas so// dkar dmar se ri ljang nag po rnams// go rims de las bkad par bye// gtso bo'i thugs su rdzogs par blo// 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya// phal po dag la lag 'brus mo// zhes ga
334b1(rnying rgyud): so// da la 'di n+ya dkyil khor sna can dgang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thar rgyal mtshan 'phan dang gzugs// pi bang gleng zla brngub pa dang // rdza rba mA kun na chen dang // dardar dang mu tsar dang // dbyangs dang gar dang
334b2(rnying rgyud): band pa che// rol mo'i yo byad ji snyed pas// dga' byed dkyil 'khor dag la brgyan// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// gser dang dngulA las byas pa'o// rigs dang mthun pa'i gos kyis dA kris// me tog 'bras bus brtan pa la// 'dud
334b3(rnying rgyud): lnga yis gang byas pa// sman dang rin chen 'bru rnam lngas// gang ba brgyad dam bcu drug gzhag/ dkyil 'khor bdag pos mngon bsngags pa'i// rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du// dbus nyid du ni gzhag par bya// yang na bum pa'i sbyin par ro//
334b4(rnying rgyud): rdzob spyan drangs dang // dbab dang bzhugs dang brtan pa dang // mi g.yo dam tshig zil gnon dang // phyag 'tshal mchod pa brjod pa dang // gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang // dbang bskur ba yaM las rnams bya//
334b5(rnying rgyud): des ni tshe 'di nyid la yang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta spros ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// 'phags brgyud kyi rgya po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gzugs brtan gyi dkyil 'khor rim par
335a1(rnying rgyud): bar la na bdun dru// denas bcom pan dus pa srung ba mjug gang dag pa du nas kun sa thung pa rgyug sam dang gnas rgya ldan pa snyoms pad gas nas jug gangs bya sa rgya /
335a2(rnying rgyud): rnams nyid kyi sgra dang gzung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // gsung sngags kyi mtsho thun po de// rgyag tu bas ma yas ji steng po// mdon ba d+has rnam pa ni rtswa // dang por rgyag tu chen po ste// gnyis pa mcho rgya no// gtsum
335a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya chen po sgra'i rgya// rang bzhin chos sgra dngos med che// gzugs sgra mtshan ma'i rgya zhes ma shed // gzugs sku rang bzhin kun rdzob dang // ngasgom dang bskyed pa yin par bshad// gnyis pa'i rgyal
335a4(rnying rgyud): gsum yod de// bsgom dang gzung dang bcing ba'o// bsgom pa dam tshig gsung yin te// gsal ldan ma ma byin brlabs pa'o// gzung ba rtags mtshan nyid bzung ba'o// dam tshig lag rgya bcing bar bshad// yang na so sor gtso gzung rnams/
335a5(rnying rgyud): sbyor thabs phyag Na tid ljin no// gsum pa'i rna la gsum yod de// rang bzhin bsgom dang banas brjod do// rang bzhin byos kyi phyag rgya ni// chos kyi dbyings su rgyal bas gastengs// bsgom pa mtshan ma'i yig dbyu dag// lce steng snying gi mkha
335a6(rnying rgyud): sogs su// mtshan myi'i rnam par gsal ba'o// rtsu ba bskyed dang bzlas pa yis// snying bye tshig brjod bzlas pa'iH// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya la// rnam pa gsum du dbang pos gsungs// bsgom dpe 'aslong du bcing ba'o// ni m+b+ha panA pa
335a7(rnying rgyud): gang // bsgom pa sgom pa las kyi rgya// lha 'og mkha' 'a mthugs ka nas// rnam bzhi las kyi 'gro 'dun// 'phra 'drulas kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya bcu' dang stengs tshul rnams// bcing ba las kyi phyag rgya bshad// lag rgya dam tshig rgyang/
335b1(rnying rgyud): t+ya rnams// rang ga sgra d+ha rnam bsgoms nas// bcangs shad ma pa' la rnam pakrol na// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang spyod 'gyur na// dngas grang gzhan sa c-i dgas// bdag nyid byug rgya ma nga sgom pa// dbun rnam par
335b2(rnying rgyud): snang mdzad de// lag g.yas rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// 'gu g.yon rin chen 'byung ldan rgya// rkang pa g.yon pa snang mtha' yas// rkang g.yas las+ya kyi sems dpa'i rgya// yon lag rtags kyi dkyil 'khor bas// bskul 'apyod nyams cad rgyag rgya yin/
335b3(rnying rgyud): so mo rnams lu bsgom bya ba// gung mo g+hati sa la oM dang l-i// 'dzub mo gnyi sa la hU~M dang mu~M// dbang mo gnyis li swa dang moM// chung ngu gnyis la oM dang paM// sbom po gnyis la haM dang traM// g.yas pa'i 'bru gdan+ta nyi mu ste// g.yon pa zla pA'i dkyil 'khor
335b4(rnying rgyud): oM dung tsu ts+tsha sbyar d+he// de bzhin hUM dang l+r-i dra k+Sha // haM dang pa~M yang de bzhin te// ma~M dang taMd sbyar ba la// Ne m+WAr hA dang mu~M 'asgreng ba// 'd-i nI shwe t+yai s+thin+d+ha bin+te// dag pa rnal mo sbyar ba las// oM da ts+tsho skAr hU~M dang ni// paM sbrang phra du
335b5(rnying rgyud): d+hasbyar // oM ma~M stAr hota bsgreng // yum b+hi b+h+yo hU~M yin par bshad// dzA khri byor snying gar bcings// oM bsgred rta mor 'khor lo dbar// rin chen dril glos la chos la brtan// rnam par mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rngam par snang mdzod kya //
335b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen khu tshur snying gar bcangs// lce bsgreng rtse la dril gsi 'bar// rdo rje rje lA mo pa sa~M lA khril// 'dzum pa'i gleng sa dang bcas pa ni// bder gshegs dbyings phyug mA yi rgya// rdo rje khu tshud sbri gang brtan// hUM bsgred rtse la rdo rje dbAr//
335b7(rnying rgyud): dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan// myo bsgreng rtsel dril gsil 'ba'o// rdo rje thal mo lis la 'a khrol// 'dzum pa'i mi dngas dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje dbyeng
336a1(rnying rgyud): rgyug zugananan// ngakrik+shan rlung gA ba na// s+yA d+hA pa // dadu dun gas ma pa brtan// 'a pa' mang+ya sa nga bcas pan// da rjes tu b+hag na ma// dAn ma na snang gA btan/
336a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed rtse 'dril gas 'bar// rdo rje zab mo las la wA khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rin rkyen dbyings b+hag phyag tu min// rdo rjem+b+ha tshur snying gar brtan// oM bsgred rtsel pa d+mo bang // rin chen dril gas ma chis la brnyan// 'dzum pa'i
336a3(rnying rgyud): mdangs dang bcas pa ni// snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin// rin chen khru tshur snying gar brtan// baM bskyed rtse la dril gsol 'byar// rdo rje thal mo las l-I 'brel// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// pad+ma dbyings phyag phyag rgya yin// rdo rje ra
336a4(rnying rgyud): snying gAr brtan// taM bskyed ci laral gri babad// rin chen la gas bcos la brnyan// ma pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// don yod gri ba pa'i phyag rgya yin// rin nas pa tsu snyi ge rabarten// te bsgreng ni li rdul gsal bar// rdo rje bral mo las
336a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyul/ pa'i ma me ba smra ba'i// sa s+t+wa~M kye+e byu rgyado pa gas kun/ na mi gas na rjes pa bang/ la lci ba ma ngas kyis m+b+ha dz+nyA na// 'dzin rje ldan// don d+ha ni gar
336a6(rnying rgyud): bskor naswa s+ya// rdo rje thal mo lus la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa'i chu 'i// gar gyi phyag rgya dpa' bos bI shad// rdo rje thugs kar rin chen 'dzin// d+hen chen de lnga gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba na// sa
336a7(rnying rgyud): mi snying po'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje tshur btsings pa ni// de sa la thi kar 'dzin pa dang // 'dzum par mdangs kyis 'dung ban// sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin par po shi // rdo rje ril gro thugs kan// rin chen po gsal chos la brtan// 'dza
336b1(rnying rgyud): mdangs kyis wA ban// nam mkha'i snang pa phyag rgyas na// dzar nA ldan na lhag gzhag/ drin chen byung ba brnang nasas// 'dzum pa mang+yas kyis ban// b+hU ba rgyab na par grags// dzA d+ha ba thugs kan// man+da la gas /
336b2(rnying rgyud): la brtan// 'dzum pa mdangs nis sta~M ba ni// stan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya yin// rin chen po bang 'dzin pa la// rdo rje len par byas nas ni// 'jam pa'i mdangs kyis badrad pa ni// dbyangs kyi myug d+ha yin par grags// rdo rje kA shIng thugs kaH
336b3(rnying rgyud): dril paN+DI pa rmos+ya la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mangs kyis lta ba ni// byams pa mo dri'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen bdug spos thugs kar yidzin-i// rdo rje las la rab tu 'jal// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni// bdug pa'i phya ge gyi sbyin par bya shang /
336b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bo ti thugs kar 'dzin// rin chen dri la gsil chos pa brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba nI// sgrib pa kun sa~M la phyag rgya yin// rdo rje rin cheni nA wAg tu// me tog snod bcas 'dzin pa la// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni// me tog phyag
336b5(rnying rgyud): yin dAr bshad// rdo rje ut+pa la thugs kun// rin cheni dril gsil zos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lte ba ni// 'jam dpal gyi ni phyag rgya yin// rin chen mur mi thugs ka na// rdo rje thal mo las la 'brel// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
336b6(rnying rgyud): 'dud pa ni// mar mo'i ra dpa' pos bshad// rdo rje skye mthugs ka na// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni// kun du bzung po'i phyag d+ha yIr// rin che dathug pa thugs ka na// rdo rje thal mo las lnga 'bre/
336b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ga dar byed pa ni// dri'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// ni rimago gdengs ka gshed po'i rgyu// rdo rje gnon pa stobs po che// thod sbrul gnod pa mar+tha// zla grob gdon pa brgya 'gyu // mdzub gnyis 'khyud pa lcags kyu'i rtsi// mdzub gnyis rgya

337b1(rnying rgyud): bcu'i las kyis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang / gcig sha gcig gis za ba dang / log pa'i lam la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes ston gyi smon lam la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
337b2(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen pos rnam par gzigs nas nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor glog rnam par 'phro ba 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn tA ka ha na dA ha pa tsA/ bi shwa kro d+ha dzA la~M maN+Dal/
337b3(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT phaT hA la hA la/ 'di phyud ma thag tu khro bo chen po'i mthus khams gsum 'a dag thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos so// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur ngur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// shi ka shig/ rab tu shig shig
337b4(rnying rgyud): kun du rab tre shig shig/ gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun du rab tu gtor gtor ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / srin po la sogs pa rnams 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs
337b5(rnying rgyud): pas nyen pa de dag brgya byin la skyabs su song / brgya byin yang 'jigs pas nyen te tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/ tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug thung du song / khyab 'jug kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du song // dbang phyug chen po rang gi mthu yod yod pa ston cing
337b6(rnying rgyud): lha rnams ma sbag/ klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin dang / 'khor du gtogs pa rnams ma skra gcig/ nga'i mthu 'di la gzhan gang gis kyang brdzi bar mi nus so zhes spro bsrings so/ kA bir+g+ha byin dang tshangs pa dang kha'i 'jug rnams
337b7(rnying rgyud): khyod kyang 'jig rten na mthu che ba'i chen po yin pas rang rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas rang rang gi 'khor gdug pa de dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig ces bsgre'o// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug rnams da ma thag tu rang rang
338a1(rnying rgyud): ga mar+d+haH yod pa stan cad dun / dang gad mo drag par byin cid rang rang gi 'khor rnams la ma skrag ma dngangs shig/ bdag cag mthu 'di lta bu gzhan gang gis kyang rnal gyis gnon par ma nus so zhes bsrang // nga nas /
338a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ye shes rnam pa'i rgyal po des de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sum rnam pa'i gro d+hi rgyal mo mngon par byung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyi rol pa'i dgyes pas thim par mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi stan las phaT phaT ba dz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da
338a3(rnying rgyud): ha la ha la zhes pas stong gsum khro bo tshol pas gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid ni dbu dgu phyag bcu brgyad zhabs rnam pa brgyad kyi rnam par snang ngo // de nas dgyes twa d+hI dz+rIM tAM zhes brjod pas dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad las 'dul
338a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gis dbu gsum phrag drug zhabs pa nir gyur te/ khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil na ke rus kyi steng na rnam por gnas so// khro bo tshol pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ji snyed pa kun bskal te slar 'dus nas/ la le ni rdo rje khrag
338a5(rnying rgyud): 'thung chen por gyur nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la pa nI rin chen khrag 'thung du gyur te tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni pad+ma khrag dathung chen por gyur te/ ma hA de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni lus kyi khrag 'byung chen
338a6(rnying rgyud): por gyur te/ khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ khro bo de dag gis dregs pa rgyan de dgra gi nang grol kun drangs/ khrug 'thungs/ rus pa kun 'tshos so// de nas dgyes te oM ru lA Ni lA dza dze zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po brgya gnyis dang brgyang
338a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor tshogs ma lus pa yud tsam cig gis dbang du 'dus par gyur pa ni dper na rdo khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i sgra la rnam pa brgyad kyis 'grel pa'i tshul du gnas so// khrig 'thung bzhi la rnam pa lnga lngas
338b1(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa dang / dgyes te ha ta zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las dkar mo tshogs dang / rgan mo'i tshogs dang / spros ma tshogs dang / gtum tshang tshogs dang / rmongs ma tshogs dang / shul byed ma'i tshogs dang /
338b2(rnying rgyud): sre sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams 'thon to// de nas yang dkris twa~M he he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las seng gdong gi tshogs dang / stag gdong gi tshogs dang / wa gdong gi tshogs dang / khyi gdong gi tshogs dang /
338b3(rnying rgyud): bzhad gdong gi tshogs dang // dur bya'i gdong gi tshogs dang / bya rog gi gdong gi tshogs dang / 'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs rnams 'thon to// de nas yang dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas byang chub sems las rta gdong gi tshogs dang /
338b4(rnying rgyud): pag gdong gi tshogs dang / seng gdong gi tshogs dang / sbrul gdong gi tshogs 'thon nas nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang rang gi gdan ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par phaT ces smos so// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med
338b5(rnying rgyud): pa rnams na dregs pa gang ji snyed yod pa thams cad tshul ji ltar 'dul ba dang / thabs cis 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus btul bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo de dag la dregs pa'i tshogs slar gsol cig ces
338b6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pas/ khro bo de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gso bar gsol zhes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis khro bo de dag gcig tu hU~M zhes pas bsdus te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so// de nas ye
338b7(rnying rgyud): shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des phyag bcwa brgyad dang snopo te btsi bas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam chen por 'khyil to// de nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas 'drid rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba gan mnas rnam par byung ngo // oM badz+ra oM ma~M te ma hA
339a1(rnying rgyud): gyu/ ! b+hU/ d+hAnas rnamang du can ma ga tu ma pa ya na na sa ga/ sa tu nas gdug pa can thasas snga ma kun d+ha dang dug zus mas par /
339a2(rnying rgyud): sems dran nas dpal chen ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po'i sku dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgyar gnas shing yab la khro bo brgya rtse brgyad lhan gyis grub par mthong ngo // phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs kyang shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs rang rang gi stan
339a3(rnying rgyud): dpag char gnas pa mthong nas// shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas zlum pa'i da ngos gsol pa btab pa/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// rnga ma chen rgyal po'i 'bangs su mANi// 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgo pus rting yang rdul na //

339a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi sbyang byung bya// dpal chen nyid kyi zhal nags pa// bdag cag rnams kyi lpags shes pa// dbang po chen po sbal gsol// a la lA na sa gsol pa btab ste/ la las ni rang gi lus gdan khrir phul/ lA las ni rang gi mgo bcud nas
339a6(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi zhal bur phul/ la las ni rlung gi snying phyung nas zhal du gdu/ la pa ni rang gi grags pa pa shus te stsa la g.yang gzhi gas+hol to// dbang phyug chen po rnams dpal chen po'i sA la s+thU la wA rA 'khril bas des dregs pa'i tshogs
339a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang ste/ bden pa mthong nas dmachog dang ldan par mthong bar gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyang rab tu spro ba sems kyis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du me dang ldan te/ la li ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyang ma ring du
339b1(rnying rgyud): 'phan// la la ni ri rab klung la skor/ la la ni tI zlazha pas 'og gnon/ la la ni 'jig rten rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba la sogs pa'i tsho 'phrul rnam pa du mastan rting a la la zhes pa'i sgra rnam par 'byin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gas rab mchog pa
339b2(rnying rgyud): badrag po des 'jigs byed tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du// r-ik+ta'i rba rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil// krod rus ri rab 'bar ba'i snying // me 'bar sreg pa'i klong
339b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil na// drang khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // tshad dang rgya yongs ma chad pa// phyi nang med par gsal ba'i 'od// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsi bas bzhi pa// gru chid par khyams bzhis brgyan pa// gru bzhi sgo khyud 'bar bas mdzes//
339b4(rnying rgyud): bde khyams gnyis ni bar bar gsal// d+hi b+hU sbrul dang thod pas bskrun// khyu mchog dang ni ma he gzig/ stag dang gtum thung dom dag gis// ser mos dregs pa brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dbang phyug bzung ba ni// gdan chen rnams
339b5(rnying rgyud): kyang brdung ba'o// dbus su 'jigs byed chen po ni// skug nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad do// spyan 'bar ba ni nyi shu bden// zhabs brkyang shur du gtams pa'o// rtsub pa'i phyag mtshan skal bar thogs// rdo rje
339b6(rnying rgyud): gshog pa phyogs ban+d+har gtams// dur khrod can gyis rab tu bzhugs// btsun mo rngam pa kro d+hi pang // cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po ltar// de yi phyogs kyi khro bo yong // khrag 'thung rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma las d+hi he r+ya ka/ kun kyang
339b7(rnying rgyud): dbugasum phyag drug ste// zhabs bzhi dag tu rnam par bgrang // b+h+rUM tshogs kyis rab tu 'khrol// 'khor long bar dra'i rtse mtshan la// dkar mo la sogs ral pa can// rang stan lag char ches te gnas// phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dgonas//

340b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// 'phags pargyad k+Sha~M sa~M pA~M ye shes rngam pa zlog gi'i khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba la pa'i tshogs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rngam

341b1(rnying rgyud): bA N+Da dran zlabang dul// pra ka'i mug rgyar ba shad pa yod// gsan pa dang khrag 'dun pa la// gsasu bsnga' khrug cing dus rnas s+ho// / gastsung yo mug maso// / gzhan dus byas pa'i lus mnan nus// byabyas pas kyang 'don bran pa /
341b2(rnying rgyud): kyi ba sa/ ba bas mag pad kyi sa gan su sa byabs ra/ ts+tsha // 'a phreng pa brjel rnas ni/ khan re thags lpags gas pa// seng gang rdzogs kyi cag na//
341b3(rnying rgyud): bar du bsnol nas ni// zhing la 'brang tshugs mjeb bskyer// skrag gding chags kyi cag tu yin// lag gnyis zhing 'phra ba krenas// rtse yis ldag pa ltar dz+haM na// wa gdong tshigs kyi phyag rgya yin// lagu gnyis zheng khong kha byanas// 'brar tshugs

341b5(rnying rgyud): sa snying na pa byed pa// ma ma tha // lo// lhanas ma na bye paH// na sa byas pa'i tshul du zhes// ti 'tshor lta sa pa// teg rdzogs kyi zab ca yin/
341b6(rnying rgyud): ra khrig gdong gis/ dag pa'i tshul bstan pa// lag gdong tshigs pa srid rgyu me// mdzug gi N+Tes pra bu d+ha chu slong // seng ge'i rdo rna ras gshegs pa// seng gde tshogs kyi thab yin// lag gnyis rab
341b7(rnying rgyud): nga / phyogs 'ardar lta bar byed pa na// sprul gardo tshigs kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa'i tshig rdza bcings kyis shing// pa 'o rdul stabs su mchod // g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub nam mkhar 'gyur// g.yon pa dku ru brtan pa ni/
342a1(rnying rgyud): b+hU ka ra li phyag rgya yin// lug pa g.yas pa sder mong gdungs// g.yon pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal rgyu// g.yas kyi sor mo dbyug par brkyang // g.yon pa gang thabs skor bur byed// dbyug ston can gyi phyag chu yin// gsus pan
342a2(rnying rgyud): du tshur nam mkhar 'gyur// g.yon pas gru mo brten pa ni// ge shin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yi ni// g.yas pa'i gung mdzub srin lag bcung // mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan par bya// g.yon pa'ang de bzhin shugs su bye// mi g.yo ral gri'i phyag
342a3(rnying rgyud): rgya yin// lag gnyis mthe'u chung wu gu rgyad// lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa las// dpral ba'i thad kar bzung ba ni// rta mchog dpal gyi phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur mdun du bcangs// zhags pa'i tshul du drangs pa ni// gzhan gyis mi thub
342a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'i na// lag gnyis kha tsur gyen du bsngolnga// dril bu gsuMl tshul bdud rtsi 'khyil// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur 'gyur// brdeg pa'i skabs su byas pa ni// khams gsum rnam chub phyag rgya yin/ lalug gnyis khu tshur thur du brkyang // gnon pa'i
342a5(rnying rgyud): skabs su bgrad pa ni// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// gyad kyi dor stabs tshul du gnas// stobs su mchod pa khro bo'i rgya// srin mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// rkang lag gar thabs bskor ba yin// yang na khro bo'i phyag rgya las// grayas g.yon bzlog pa
342a6(rnying rgyud): yin par gsungs// ci bgyid bka' nyan phyag rgya ni// g.yas g.yon sor mo dragu skyugs po'o zhes gsungs so// 'phags brgyad kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i

343b7(rnying rgyud): ma ldan shes 'di nyed pa// rin chen tshogs can du phreng ga // ga byen cha gdu / dashas du sem / nga ma zhing gastsal bar byas pa'o/ hrI rjesngags rdzi ldan par bya// sas mang du'o//
344a1(rnying rgyud): khrus mchog dag par bya// rdo zlum thAg pas smras la thugs// rdzas ma rgyu nga rdzas bas// nang yang dag pa'i zlad rgyug// do nas byang chub sems bskyed // mau sogasu ngan la sems skur byung // sgo mo grang chub seman na
344a2(rnying rgyud): don// rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya// snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du// lhun gyis grub par yid ches bya// de nas bskul bar bya ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i brda yis bsre bar bya// sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na// sa ma ya b+h+rUM zhes pas bsre// rA ga yA ma
344a3(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod na// ra ho haM zhes kyang ni bya// ti pa su ke zhes brjod na// gan daM tsi ta zhes pas mtshon// a ti pra ho zhes brjod na// pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon// g.yas pa smin ma bskyod nA ni// g.yon pa'i smin mas de bzhin mtshon// de bzhin
344a4(rnying rgyud): brda sna tshogs pas bsre// de nas bskul bar bya ba ni// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer la// bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do// mi g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongs su gsol// rnam par rtog bral shin tu dri med sku//
344a5(rnying rgyud): 'od zer zla rgyas 'dra ba'i mdangs ldan zhal// dgyes pa'i rol pa'i don la gshegs su gsol// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer gyis// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer la// bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do// 'byor ldan yid 'ong rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings//
344a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab zab mo rnam dag pad+ma'i medrangs// rdzu 'phrul thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma// 'byor ldan yid 'ong tshe 'phrul sna tshogs ston// ho/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba// e ma'o pad+ma 'baradra ba'i ze'u 'bru 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
344a7(rnying rgyud): 'bul lags na// dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas// byang chub sems sprin dbab tu gsol// zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba// e ma'o// 'od zer dga' ste yid 'ong ma// sems 'phreng gdungs pa'i shes rab gzungs// ga'u 'khril ba'i pad+ma la// rdo rje
344b1(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i byang chub 'bar// a la la ho// de nas gnyis med bde mchog sems// sangs rgyas sprin gyi tshogs chen la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa dbul// grub pa nyi zla'i snying po de// rnal 'byor rdo rje chen pos blang // 'gro drug sems
344b2(rnying rgyud): can bag chags sreg/ zhi ba'i mtha' la shi ba bslang // phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam bsgral// de ltar bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bsgrub pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de dag dngos grub thob pa'i ni// rig pa'i dam tshig bsgoms
344b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam// sngags kyi bdag po bdag 'grub ste// gang yin las la 'jug nus pa'i// dam tshig sgrub po chen po yin// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las bsnyen bslab rnam
344b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba mchog gi bdag po des 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// bslab pa'i mtshan nyid las dngos
344b5(rnying rgyud): grub kyi bye brag 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la 'di ni phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thams cad mkhyen pa bslab pa'i phyir// rang sems shin tu sbyangs pas na// phra mo'i dngos
344b6(rnying rgyud): grub bsgrub pa gces// rab tu dben pa'i gnas dge tu// bdag nyid nam mkha'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// rang gi lhar ni rang bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun du brtsam// rin tshun rgyu las grub pa yi// bsnyen ma'i
344b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams// tshe chung yungs kar 'bru tshod tsam// snying ga'i dkyil du gsal ba las// trA~M gis khong du drangs nas ni// khong nas kha ru byung bar bsam// hU~M gau dbugs la zhon nas su// s+thA

345b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'jam dpal sa bon muM du bsgom// bdag lus dang ni zla ba dang // muM rnams rim par ji zhi la// stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa las// steng rje muM dang zla ba las// rdo rje 'jam pa'i phyag rgya bsgom// lus dang dge sems rdo rje las/

345b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi// rdul snyeng bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ ces gsungs so// yang na rang gi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni//

346a3(rnying rgyud): na kyo ba thogs pa yi// sprul pa bsam yas 'gro bar bya// dza yA ra NA phaT// gang dgug sta 'am bud med dam// ya~M las rlung gis bteg bsams tAM// kyobs gdan nam snying gnas// gzung ste hU~M gis bsdus byas na// sangs rgyas grags pa
346a4(rnying rgyud): chen po yang // rang dbang med par khugs 'gyur na// 'jig rten bu mo spos ci dgos// gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// de ni 'di ni rdo rje lce bsgrub pa'i thags so// bdagu nyid sngags kyi skyes bu yi// rdo rje'i sbyar ni rab bsgoms
346a5(rnying rgyud): la// lce la pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas oM du bsam// de las rdo rje gsung du gyur// bsam yAs a~M gi 'phrong du las// sangs rgyas gsung ngo sems can dag/ bdag gi lce la 'dus pa ru// yang nas yang du goms par bsdu/

346a7(rnying rgyud): sa// bdag nyid pus dgas mes ji rje// rdo rje gisum du rnam par bsgom// mtshan dang po byad yang dag ldan// ye shes dumachog snying gr-i bsam// dab rkyen rdo rdzogs pa par bya// sha chen dag ni thams cad la// sa bon mo mas rnas par sbya

346b2(rnying rgyud): lnga yi sbyar ba yis// zos na dam tshig sgra gsung thugs// rdo rje thob pa gdon mi za/ phrag na rdo rje 'i mthu sde bas 'grub// cho ga go rims de yas ni// glang po dag gi shi rnams la// d+h+r-i gi 'gro 'dras rab sbyangs te// zos ni mngan shes lnga tho ba 'gyung /
346b3(rnying rgyud): rta sha dgu ni thams cad la// sra yi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs te// zos na mi snang kun gyi mchog/ khye sha dag ni thams cad la// ha yi 'gro 'dus rab sbyangs na// dngos grub rab dbring tha ma kun// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// gnyid kyi dgra yang
346b4(rnying rgyud): mod la 'joms// ba glang sha ni thams cad bya// oM kye 'phro 'dus sbyad byis te// cho ga bzhin du zos na ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi longs spyod 'phrog/ mthu na klan gyi bu mo yang // spyod par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di na
346b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mngon par shes pa lnga bslab pa'i thabs so// rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// bdag nyid rnam pa kun ldan pa'i// sngags kyi luswA swA rnam sbyangs nas// mig gi dbang po thams cad la// yi gA 'bru lnga yI se rabu sbyangs te// 'od zer lur ni 'gro
346b6(rnying rgyud): bi'i sa// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// mug gi mngon shes kun basbas nas// dbang po de la thim pa dang // zos sam mig le rtag bslus na// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// slong yul ji snyed yod pa kun// shing thog
346b7(rnying rgyud): lag tu bzhag pa bzhin// rdo rje mig gi gsal bar mthong // cho ga gong ma'i tshul gyis ni// rna ba'i dbang po thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// rna ba'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas// zos sam rna ba'i nang bzhag na// sangs rgya
347a1(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi// sgra rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rna ba'i drung du 'du pa bzhin// snying gi bye brag thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// dran pa'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas// nus sam snying gar
347a2(rnying rgyud): bzhas na ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// thugs dang sams kI rlu dag ni// mkhyen cing dag pa kun shes 'byung // snum gyi mkha' las byung ba ye// rathA dag ni thams cad ste// sangs rgyas sems pa ni thams cad kyi// gnas
347a3(rnying rgyud): rnams ma lus kun bsdus nas// zos sam snying gar bzhag na ni// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan chags rnams// zheg gsum lon bzhin gsal bar 'gyur// snying garA ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// phyogs brdar gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//
347a4(rnying rgyud): bkug nas de dag rdzu 'phril rnams// grogs nas snying gar bsdu byas na// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kye// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul thams cad kun// 'grub par gyu bar dag na mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje bsrung ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so// sku gsung
347a5(rnying rgyud): thugs ni rnams bsgrims la// steng gar nyi ra dkyil 'khor las// khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba yis// bsrung bar bye ba'i zug rngu rnams// phyeng ste med par bsams nas ni// lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya dag ni thams cad dam// yang nardorje
347a6(rnying rgyud): rgyagram mam// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis// lus dang drag sems rab bsrungs na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs na// phal pa rnams kyis spros ci dgos/ zhes gsungs so// las 'di sbyar bar bya ba yang // ljongs sam grong khyer grong dag tu//
347a7(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi bdag po rab gnas la// nad kun spong ba'i las 'di bya// rdo rje rtse lnga 'od 'thob// bskal por mi bzhin bsams nas su// spros pas nang rnams bsregs nas ni// slar yang rdo rje nyid la bsdu// de nas rdo rje de nyid las// 'od
347b1(rnying rgyud): sir ba smras pa yis// nad rnams stong pa'i gnas da dag/ bskal ba yun du gang bsams te// goms par yang dang yang bsamasan// nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed// de na 'khor ba'i bye ba rnams// sprul pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur//
347b2(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// tshe ring lang tshe bde bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so// rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa ni// nam mu ba'i dbus su zla ba la/
347b3(rnying rgyud): sa su na na/
347b4(rnying rgyud): de las gos dkar nyid 'dres pas// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom// de las 'od kyi gong bran// gru bzhi lam bar gsal bar bsdu// baspu rnams kyi bu gnas// rin chen sbyin chen ba sgos pas// rdo rje rjes smra ba sgoms nas swA//
347b5(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i lus nang dgang // yang nas yang du 'di byas na// bar snang ci 'dod rgyas par 'gangs// nor bu rin chen bzhin 'drar 'gyur// gos brtsam smras ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje dbang du bsdu ba pisleb pa'i thabs ma// rdo rje dkyi
348a1(rnying rgyud): 'byod nag man+ta// nam sa sa myongs sa// rnas pa gag sas stsus/ myong gang bya sa nga // slobasam par bya// ba nga nas nas sa// s+yA nas
348a2(rnying rgyud): zlums nang gang bar bskam// 'ad b+ha lnga 'jas pa pos// 'ad phyil na shA bang ste// da nas pa ba nyid kyis// hU~M ga sung drugs kyi sbyin pasnusan// yangs kyi ny-id kyang ldan// 'grob byeng med sbyin kyi gas// zhes gsums/
348a3(rnying rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje drug po bsgrub pa'i thabs so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// khros pa'i gzugs rnams bsgom bya ste// bskul ba'i me dpung 'thos pa las// khros pa'i rdo rje srin po dang // sna tshogs phra dang bya
348a4(rnying rgyud): rog dud// bA na kyi sogs par// mkhyen pa sam papa pi bzang bas// mkha' kyis gang ba ma rnams nas sa// sa s+yar+thas+ye kun lang/ nod byed na// dngos sam yiden pasam spyanas kyang / rkye gyi thogs pa de dag gas// snying dang /
