348a5(rnying rgyud): nang sgrol dbang po kun// drangs te thos par rub ba sgoms na// dgra rnams 'chi bar nges pa ste// de ltar rab tu bsnams na ni// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // zla ba phyed kyis 'chi 'gyur na// dmachog nyams pa sngos cing gos// zhes gsungs so// de 'i 'dzin/
348a6(rnying rgyud): sne 'gro 'dul ba'i phur bla bsgrub pa'i thabs so// sdig pa byed dmi gnod byed pa// rdo rje phu bus gdul bar bya// dur khrod gnas sam rkang gAcig tu// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am ki li 'am// gang yang rung bar gnas byas la// rdo rje phur zla rab tu bsgoma?/
348a7(rnying rgyud): mi stug 'phro ba'i 'ad grobs// re rab phreng bzhi'i gzugs byis la// ring gi sngags kyis gang babar bya// de ltar rab tu gad ba byas na// 'greng nga po 'og thams cad kun// dul bar gyur par gdon ma ze/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni gzhan gyi rig
348b1(rnying rgyud): sngags gnon pa bsgrub pa'i thabs s+ho// nam mapa'ang bas kya ngas san// dbang can dpa' 'thor pa rnams nas na// las sams dpar bdag gnas pa// g.yas pa rjeT+Ta m+b+ha b+hUg+sa// rlog sngags byung gA ba sams nas na// pas kya dang /
348b2(rnying rgyud): pa dag/ de'i spri nas mnan par bsgom// rig sngags nyid kyang mnan b.rarla bsam// des ni mu stegs can dag dang // phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kun// mnan par 'gyur te the tshom med/ ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni gzhan gyi dpung min na
348b3(rnying rgyud): pa bslab pa'i thabos so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyilnga 'khor dbus gnas par// gzhan gyis mib+hA ba khro ba che// pad+ma dmar ser mdog 'dra ba// shin tu che zhing brjid pa bsgom// pha rol dmag dpyang 'og dag tu// rlung
348b4(rnying rgyud): mtsho dengs skyed la// de la gnas pa'i dpung rnams kyis// steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// nga steng rdo rje rgya sram gyi// steng du ri rab rnam par bsgom// de yi steng du man na bsams ni// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon par nus// mi rgyal dbang
348b5(rnying rgyud): la spos ce dgas// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dgra'i dpung rmongs par bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so// dkri 'am dpung gi gzigs brnyan dgra/ bsams sam gzugs su byas nas ni// rdo rje phur bu tshad ldan la// hU~M las khro bo'i skur bskyed nus//
348b6(rnying rgyud): rlung gi reg sngags rab bzlas te// snying gar btab par rab bsgoms nas// khros pas byas na sangs rgyas kyi// dpung pad m+b+has par gdon me za// zhes gsungs so// de lo 'di ni rgyal 'bying ba med pa bsgrib pa'i zlabs so// nam mA b+ha'i dbyangs
348b7(rnying rgyud): dam pa// sngags kyi bdag pa rab tu bsgom// chu yi steng ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas dgagis gtams par bsgom// steng nas dal gyis bcag par bsam// sangs kyis ngag ni thams cad kyi// spyi ba'i steng du dang po bsgom// de Sh+Ta
349a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu goms pa dang // sA la 'gro bzhin dusmra par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni thogs med rlung gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs so// nam mkhar rdo rje dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par+ya// g+ha ya rnal
349a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor bsgom par bya// 'og gi phyogs sgra ya~M las ni// rlung gis rab tu bteg par bskum// de ltar rab tu bsgom byas na// mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro bar nus// zhing khams kun du bgrod par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni nyi ma gsapa pa
349a3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya b+ha'i dngos grub ba/ ba pa'i thab pa s+ho// sku gsung thugs nI rdo rje yi// snying ga bye na dkyil 'khor bsam// de las bong du 'bros pa las// mun pa'i gnas rnams bkal bar nges// zhes gsungs so// de la 'drini drung bcad pa bsgrub pa'i
349a4(rnying rgyud): thabs so// bdag nyid rnying gi phyogs spong pa// stegs pa b+ha bzhi khyim par bya// skyes kyi theg pa bdun byas te// yo las rlung badren bskyed par bya// rlung lha dgug pa byas nas skye// kham phor gyis ni dag pa zlas te// de steng l-I las rI rab bsgom/
349a5(rnying rgyud): ri rab ce la khra ba ni// 'ab ba dag gis mnan par bsgom// des ni 'jog pa'i drud rnams byung // bcings par 'gyu bar gi na m+me Ta// ne hU~M gsungs so// de la 'din char pa dbab pa'i thabs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus smi na/
349a6(rnying rgyud): pUd+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom// dbus su ba sgribs po che// dadab ma la ni klu brgyang po// bsgoms sam yang na bris kyang rlung // khro bo'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// k+She rnams rab tu mnan nas su// hUM gnyis par du k+ta rnams kyi// snying po sbrur
349a7(rnying rgyud): cing gzir nas su// sku rnams gnas po'i ma phyogs su// hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya// khro bos mnan pa'i klu rnams kyi// kha nas char ba sngags bsams na// 'jig dus lta bro'i char pa'ang 'bagro// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni chang padang /
349b1(rnying rgyud): sor ba gcad pa nagams// nam sa pa'i dbyings kyi dbusas s+ho// na ma dkyil 'khor dbyas gnas par// na mchog dpa 'i ni rnam par bsam// ma mdog pang 'du ba gyu// nam khal khyab rnam par glang das// skyes stong du
349b2(rnying rgyud): bzhag ste// mar 'od dang bcas pa gyis// rmar nas gang ba na rnams kyun// bsam ning ste yis blangs bsams na// zlum bir 'gyur bar gdon me ga// 'ad na ste stengs de nyid du// yalas rlong du ba sgoms nas ni// bas pas snod na ma
349b3(rnying rgyud): ta bar 'gyur// ring na ram b+hag tshus/ char sbyin da ni m+b+ha phy-i gnanas// bcad cing dum thu gtu bas bsams te// dz+nyA na pa gis mdzub kyes/ thags banas// ga A //
349b4(rnying rgyud): spya sa tshul gyis// pan kyis rnam bsgrags na// khams gsum drugs pa pams da kyang // rdu ldan bzhin du nag ra gyu/ sa gsungs sa// de la 'din chom rkun byeng ba'i thabs pa// rjes sa dang kyi zag kyis// i na
349b5(rnying rgyud): med du bcus par b+h+yAM/ ma d+ma'i skye g+h+ra// 'a ba nan phyugs pazlas pa/ n+d+ha Sh+Ti shA ga g+sas nas m+be// mig ni ga dab par bya// gnags rgyags pA wA nA bA twa~M// dzA TI g+san/ nga ga
349b6(rnying rgyud): oM sum ba mas san yan brdzun rjes// 'as brtsam pa // mi nong ba ga pa gad seM grwa/ zhes ga sa // de la 'di rname pa med pa'i zub ga// man ma byed pa'is phyogs s+ho// m+bi sla rgyab pa khrung du
350a1(rnying rgyud): zil lta bu'i bdog pa// sbrul nAg stong gis rab brgyan pa'o// gshog pa mkha' la gdengs pa bsgom// k+Sha rnams dang ni sprin dag pa// dza rje drug tu ba ba nAM// rgyar chen thob lam song rjes// thos nas smin tshogs bsrang
350a2(rnying rgyud): yi// char gyis me yang gsod par 'gyur// gr-i shog pa suM me nyid bkab nas su// mnus parkos chus ni mtshams bcad na// bsgral pa'i myes kyang 'i tshig mi nus// oM badz+rA na ra pa Na/ ni rba ba ya ti na paM pu me g+he hU~M zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni thog
350a3(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa thabs so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// bde ba chen po zhes bya ba// zhal gsum phyag bzhir rnam par gnas// ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba// snyoms ma dang ni byams ma dang // chu sbyin rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba// me tog
350a4(rnying rgyud): rol pa zhes bya yi// lha mo bzhi yis rnam par bskor// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor// g.yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa// phyag gnyis mnga' gzhu 'grengs pa ste// sku las sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sbyin// thor tshugs gsal ba rnam par bsgom/
350a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' las ni bribs pa yi// thog ni rang rig sngags kyis bzlog/ oM ma hA sa khwa badz+ra nag ma dza/ oM swa ri ta ban+d+ha hU~M phaT ces gsas so// de lnga 'di ni gzhan gyi lce gnon pa'i thabs so// mur gyi chos brgyad bcu bzhi la// dur khrod so ba pa
350a6(rnying rgyud): nas sra// sngags kyi bdag por bsgoms nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor stong du ni// mi snyan smra ba'am rgyags hU~M la~M baM'i// lce yi gzugs su bris pra yi// steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rgya kram bsgoms pa yi// dbus su ri rab bskyed
350a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// de steng bdag gis mnan pa sems na// tshig ba sgra yang dbang 'gyur na// shugs kyi sogs pa sgras ca dgas// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni blang bab pa bsgrib pa'i thabs so// lo zangs bcuganyis 'on pa yi/ ba mo ga
350b1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// dbab bya'i snod du rab tu brtag/ ting 'dzin rtsal dang ldan pas bya// gzhan gyis byas na dpyas par 'gyur// dang por phyi nang khrus byas te// sdig pa slang phyir 'dul khrims dbrog/ 'od kyi baphro 'dus byin gyis brlab//
350b2(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi kyad par rnams kyis brgyan// snying gar hUM ni bsgom par bya// spyi bo gtsug tu ha bskam mo// A nI kha ru de bzhin te// de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la// 'phags pa kun mkhyen sprin drangs taM// de las 'od zer bskul zhing dbeb// d+hau ni bskul
350b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags tshig ste// gang dbang ste yis bsgral bar bya// byis pa'i lus la thim par bsam// byis pa'i tsit+ta gzhal med khang // dbab pa ji lha nyid bzhugs bsams te// lag tu rdo rje thal mo las// sor mo phyir bsnol kha sgrub la// mthe pa gnyis so so'i
350b4(rnying rgyud): mthil bkug pa'o// rdo rje tshig tu pazlas pa'i sngags// che ge mo zhig a a zhes// brjod cing rab tu bsgral byas na// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur// khru gang tsam nus lnga yi bar// 'ji gus skrag nas ni 'phang bar 'gyur// snying la gnas pa
350b5(rnying rgyud): lha des ni// sgra gsung kun dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ci 'dod gtam ni skye bar 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad bral ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yang // cho ga 'di yis 'brab 'gyur na// 'jig rten pa lta smos ci dgos//
350b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dug gtang ba'i thabs so// sbrul ni mi sdug gdug cing khro// 'jigs byed nag po rab tu 'bar// dug gi lce gnyis muche ba cen// sol bA rdo rgyas dag gis bre// bskal ba'i yi ge snying po 'di// sbrul gyi khong par rab
350b7(rnying rgyud): tu bsam// khaM kha de nang mi zad drug/ 'jigs par bde ba rab bsgoms na// sbrul de rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur// de nas zos shig ces bskul te// mtshan ma nas ni zhugs nas ni// khong du song ste zos bsams na// dug gis gzung bar
351a1(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za/ zhes gsungs so// dre la 'di ni drag dbyung ba'i thabs so// nam mkhang dbyings kyi dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// spyan ras gzigs ni bsgom par bya// kha dog dkar po hri spos te// dug can
351a2(rnying rgyud): khong du zhugs pa yis// dug rnams dril 'dus nas ni// hU~M gis khong nus phyir phyung dang // phaT kyis bar snang khyams su gtor// yang na gzhan gyi khong du spro// des ni de mo zag tu yang // dug rnams dbyung bar gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de
351a3(rnying rgyud): la 'di ni dug spro ba'i thabs so// dug can snying gar oM dkar las// 'od zer dkar pos dug bsdus pas// oM nyid nag por snang byung nas// gzhan gyi lha 'am mtshan ma'am// khong du zhugs par rab bsgoms na// 'pho ba rtag tu gdon mi za/
351a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni nye ba'i drug gso ba'i thabs so// mdze 'bras shu ba phrol mig dang // 'brum bu la sogs nad rnams kun// a dkar dag gi 'gro 'du yis// gong ma bzhin du dbyung bar bya// spro ba yang ni de bzhin no// de ni khams las
351a5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa yi// nad rnams thams cad nges par sem/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni bkres m+b+ha zla ba sgrub pa'i thabs po// bkres skom can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am// yang na bsgrub pa'am gang yang rung // sbyor ba 'di de brtsam par bya// rnam par
351a6(rnying rgyud): mdzang gzugs cher po// nam mkha'i dbus su bskon pad+ma thA// ba ni kha yi nang du bac+doMm// anr-i s+t+rai rnam bsams te// yang bzhin bdud rtsi lte bu yi// bza' ba'i gnas su de nyid bsam// des ni bkris skom sdug bsngal sel/ zhes
351a7(rnying rgyud): so// de la 'di ni rnam par dag pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so// oM ni mig la rab bas mas te// yul ku ni rnaM snang mdzad du bsgom// de d+har rtag tu goms pa dang // chos kun sku gsung rdo rje mthong // de nyid rnam dag sbyin du grags// zhes
351b1(rnying rgyud): dril nga ni 'jig rten pa'i sku mthu po che rnams zil gyis gnon cing tshig nyan pa bslab pa thabs so// nam mkha' rdo rje dbas sa na// ta mra'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bsam// b+hi zhes bya ba'i ska
351b2(rnying rgyud): yis// mthu chen rnams ni drangs nas su// bsdigs pa dag kyang byas nas ni// zil gyis gnon cing nyan par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni lha mo tsun d+ha bsgrub pa'i thabs so// sngags kyi bdag por bdag gnas pa'i// snying ga re hi ra
351b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// hUM zhes bya ba'i 'gro 'dulas// bdag nyid d+hun d+ha'i gzugs su bsgyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'o// kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom// 'di ni chos dbyings bsgrib pa ste// bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
351b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bshad do// de la 'di ni dzaM b+ha la nor bsgrub pa'i thabs so// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// snying ga rA dzaM gyi 'phro 'du las// dzaM b+ha la yi gzugs dag gis// bar snang khams kun gang ba ni
351b5(rnying rgyud): mdog sngon thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa// gsus po che la mi zung gzugs// yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa yis// dbul ba thams cad sel bar bsam// 'dod pa la ni de dag dbab// des ni dbul ba sel bar byed// nor dang gter gyi bdag por 'gyur//
351b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje any+dzan bsgrub pa'i thags so// shing gcig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am// ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// rdo rje any+dza bsgrub par bya// pad+ma ban d+ha kha sbyar du// tshol chen pa dang gtsi khu ba dang // ma hA rak+ta las
351b7(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i// dra ba ban d+her chags pa dang // bshang gcirakas spras nas ni// r-il bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// gsum du byas na de nyid pa// rang gi gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad// nyi shu dgu yi nam phyed na// btab na dngos grur grub 'gyur
352a1(rnying rgyud): tre// mgu la bslus na ci yang mthong // me snang ba dang nang mgyogs dang // de la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams// thob par 'gyur te gdon mi za/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje ro langs bsgrub pa'i thabs so// nam ma'
352a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba rnam par bsgom// dur khrod ri phrag gnyen pa'i sar// ro yi rdzas btsa la de nas kyang // ro yi gnyen por bdag bsams te// de yi steng du bdag gnas pa/
352a3(rnying rgyud): de la dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// de sngags rgyan du bzlas bya zhing // dgug pa'i bi nya drag tu bskul// mdog mdangs bzag sngam byung ba dang // bdud rtsi yis ni bslu bar bya// de nas 'gul bar gyur pa dang // phyag rgya bzhi yis gzhum pur
352a4(rnying rgyud): bya// sngags kyi 'phrong du rgyun mi gcad// de nas rab tu 'phar ba dang // 'pho ba ris drug gang yin pa// rdo rje drug tu gdub par bya// rdo rje so yis gcad bya zhing // sngags zlos khong dus snyim par bya// de nas langs par gyur pa dang // rdo rje phyin
352a5(rnying rgyud): nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi'i rgyu yang blang par bya// las rnams gang 'dod byed du gzhug/ yang ni ga ser rAm gos mtshan na mo// rkang ma sogs la sogs dngos grub rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa rkyen gyis bsku raM// gang 'dod pa de
352a6(rnying rgyud): gradon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje sgyu ma bslab pa'i thabs so// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rde'u shing bu yi rgya dag las// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te// she'u re spyan gyis byugs nas ni// rdo rje sngags
352a7(rnying rgyud): kyis tshig 'di bzlas// she'u re'u i na ya// a mai kaM a g+ha sa sa g+has// shing bu dag gis gdab bya zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// des ni sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur // bsdu bar 'dod na slar la bzlog/ de yang bkri dra
352b1(rnying rgyud): rlabs su 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'ang na ngo bsreg pa'i bsgrub zlabs po// nam mkha' dbyangs kyi dmyas spyan// bdag nyid 'jigs byed spar bsgoms te// rol sngags kyis brgyab r+b+ham+b+ha n+tu// d+hi gam tshugs byug par b+ha// dz+nyAn
352b2(rnying rgyud): chen khra bar btsos pa yi// ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu// lha yi phyag rgya dgod par bya// gnas der sdong bu de re la// lha rnams snying po zis pa gdags// ro yi phyi rol shun pa la// 'gro drugs bon bkod
352b3(rnying rgyud): nas ni// rim gyis snang ba'i las su bya// thab khrung dkyil gang yin pa yi// phyag rgyu gzhung dang mthun par dgod/ de sbrengs shing brtsigs grwa bzhi pa// kI de zlar bzhi sum brtsegs kyi// bar khang yang thog bcas par bya// bar khang+ga ro gzhag
352b4(rnying rgyud): shar du bstan// ya~Mng stengs ras sam sh+log shog lnga// bris pa'i phyag rgya tshang bar dgrod// bar khang glo ska phyogs bzhi nas// gzungs thag phyogs bzhir bla mar dbul// de mthar 'khor gyi lha rnams dgod// de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis// me
352b5(rnying rgyud): yi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// rdo rje las kyi kar ma yis// las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par rol// rdo rje bla ma gcig gis ni// ro yi nyes pa bzang zhing bshags// rdo rje skabs sbyor chen po yi// rdo rje mchod pa skabs su dbul// bkra shis gnas
352b6(rnying rgyud): smon lam ni// rmA bAs+ya sa ma mjug tu gdab par bya// rdo rje grangs kyi tid 'dzin gyis// grangs gzung dkar byang bla ma dbul// sdig pa'i gnag byang gshegs shing bsreg/ me lha spyan drangadu mdzod pa bla// bstod pa drug kyang legs par bya// rol
352b7(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa 'brongs ma'i blongs// me la~M lhas su blta bar bya// mtshan ma me sdug byung ba na// bsreg sbyang chog rgya tshor bya// de ni tshogs rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// des la 'din rdo rje thab chen bsgrub pa'i thabs so// de la thal ba thams
353a1(rnying rgyud): cad kAs/ ga zhas nug blo myung ba// ris bu lcags gas rnaMs da stsug// rdod+ha mas pa n+de n+tag r+b+ha dA// don dag gas btA ban+d+ha// bAr drugacad pa'i gnyen por 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de d+ma di ni rgyur/
353a2(rnying rgyud): las bzhi sgrub thabs so// laso ba nis sa'i byed par gyis// dz+haiM sa~M dpa pa dag phyogs dang dbyings// yem sh+yed ba sreg rdzas khyed par lis// dkar dang m-ir ser mthing gnag pas// shar k+tonr-ib byung phyogs rig tu// zlum pa len
353a3(rnying rgyud): pad+mA'i// zla bzhi zlar bcud 'khor lo rgyus// bu chung gzhu dbyibs zlags dbang // glug sum b+ha ga mngon spyod pas+ho// ting 'dzin byams dang dang bas ni// s+yAng rje dga'abras rgyas pa ni// dge dang chags pas dbang du 'gyur// btu
353a4(rnying rgyud): snyoms khros pas drug por 'gyur// so so'i las kyi lha rgyud la// sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang // glu rgyud 'byor pas mchod par bya// zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la// khro bos ye shrIs me ru snang // so so'i rgyud du bashrad bstabs te/
353a5(rnying rgyud): klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom bung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis// srung dang thob phyir bsreg par bya// nyon mongs lnga yi dgra m+b+ha sa ni// ye shes lha yi klong du dbul// phung po lnga ni yab lnga laM// 'byung ba yum lnga'i dbyings kyi bstim/
353a6(rnying rgyud): shes bya brgyad ni ma brgyad la'o// yul brgyad phra mon brgyad la bstim// spyi bzhis bsdus pa'i sreg rdzas rnams// rnam thar sgo pa'i'i klong du bstim// sgrib dang dngos grub don rnams ni// me li mkhas pas brtag par bya// so sa bya
353a7(rnying rgyud): dang kha dog la// dbyibs dang kha dog shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdzas bsgrub pa'i thabs gsang ba'o// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// gnas dang sa gzhi brtags par ni// sa stegs tshon gyis bri bar bya// dbus su
353b1(rnying rgyud): thig bzhi 'bri tshe bu// de'i mtha' 'khor lo rtsibs bcang bya// zla bzhi/ khyad bcas par tho// mtha' zad bskal pa'i mi 'byur// dbus su zugam khwa m+bu zla// phyogs mtshams brtadung la brgyad do// 'khor pa'i dung khAngs rba d+ha
353b2(rnying rgyud): la// nang du bltas pa'i khe brgyad gsal// rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad// mu khyung brgyang la phyir bskus brgyad// gru chung bzhi la nang bltas bzhi// ske bzhir phyir blta bri bar bya// phyi rol par khrims de dag la// phyi lta ny+tsi shwaH
353b3(rnying rgyud): bri// bskul ba'i me re phyi khams la// phyir lta ba tu ni bri bar bya// de la phyag rgya rim par dgod// ro yi tshol stadus rnam bzhi yis// dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams btsal// ye shes spyan gyis lta ba dang // rdo rje 'grophros kyis bcas pa dang //
353b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rol pa dang // ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'jo tshul dang // bcol nas maN+Da la sgo bzhi nas// bro chen bzhi yis sbyang bar bya// shur du dug gsum 'joms pa'i bro// lho ru khA gu 'thung rol pa'i bro// nub du rta mchog zhal gyi
353b5(rnying rgyud): bro// byang du gdul skyong drag po'i blos// sbyang bar bya ba rab tu garjes// de nas dbus su gzhag bya ste// mgo bo shar du bstan pa de'i// phung po bruM las gzhal med khang // de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog bsgom// so so'i rdzas kyi gnas
353b6(rnying rgyud): rnams la// rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod// bsnyen pas byin phrebs rtags byung nas// ba mdo byang shar mtshams su bsgril// rdo rje thig gis btab nas kyang // rdzas rnams so so'i skos su gdab// des mtshon rnam lngas bgro bar bya/
353b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i spyi bo nyid nas pogro// rdo rjes snying ga'i phyogs nas bgro// rin chen zur bai rgyad lte ba nas// pad+mas kha yi phyogs nas so// ral gris yan lag rnams nas bkro// de nas phyag rgya'i gnas rnams su// rdzas rnams gau rims bzhin
354a1(rnying rgyud): dgad// la dang sman pa'i dkyul/ lkug dang zla sa dung rgyun sa du ba sa pad+mad+man / malus pa sa banan par bya// rlung du byung bya ga ma dgras// man pa 'das sa /
354a2(rnying rgyud): bar bsham// de nas rdul 'byor chen po kun// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gnas pa de// bgyid pa ting 'dzin tshul bzhin bskyed// rang bzhin rdzogs chen snyan dngas mchod// bsgrub pa nyam sa la ni bzlog par bya// dngos grub gapol dang dang
354a3(rnying rgyud): byA// de nas gtor mtshog stam d+ha// dang byor bcad de sbyin sreg bya// bdams mye bal po tshom par b+ha// tham pa zad gter du thA// lis rnams rdzogs par byas na ni// dpal chen nyid kyang 'thub 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan rna
354a4(rnying rgyud): dgos// zhes gsungs so// dri la 'di ni rdo rje mchog chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs so// don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas// sa steng sa chag byed tshad du bya// su mu brtsegs byas dbus zla gum brgyad// phye latha' bod pas bskor ba la// me dpung 'bar
354a5(rnying rgyud): bas bskor ba'o// de yi gyi rI ma dmar chen rgyas// dbus suM ban d+ha mtshan ldan la// yab yum snying po bris la bzhag/ thugs brgyang la mi brgyad bdag/ mthing gtsug mA Ti me 'bar// de 'og thong tshar gsum du bya// sgo khrims du
354a6(rnying rgyud): khyod rdzas kyis brgyan// sgra rtseg s+ho khyud tha ma bran// gnas mchog rab tu dben pa yi// ri l-i rtsi ba mjugs tshal l+h+wam// ske dpung sde sgo sna sde tshugs shing // 'dra 'jo 'gro/ nga chad par shes// rnal 'byong gding dang rab ldan zhing // badz+ra
354a7(rnying rgyud): cing sran tshugs khu 'phrig rlung // brtul zhugs che la rtog pa med// las kyi phreng ba lhag chad med// dri zhim smar gyis phyi bkra zhing // shi ne rje hUMs nang yang bkru// zang mer sbyar ba'i bka' dag dang // ldan pas dus btab bzhin du
354b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu yang brtag par bya ba na// mdzes shing bkra shris ldan pa la// bong tshod lo ni dar la bab// rigs lnga'i mtshan rtags yod pa shis// bsgrub pa'i rgya mchog de lta bu// dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrungs nas// byin gyis brlab pa rab tu bya/
354b2(rnying rgyud): d+he hu ma 'das dbang po bsgyur// bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis// dbang po lnga la gdab par bya// snang srid gtam ni dri ba 'am// legs nyes dri ba'i pra yang dbab// rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo rnams su// so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// phyag
354b3(rnying rgyud): rgya bkod de bsgral bar bya// phung po gzhal yas khang du bya// nang grol thams cad ltar bsgoms te// bsgral sbyangs sbyar ba byas nas ni// mchod dang mnyes dang dam skongs dang // dngos grub rnam gsum thob nas blang // zhes gsungs
354b4(rnying rgyud): sro// de la 'di ni mchog phran gtsang ma bsgrub pa'i thabs so// maN+Dal gru bzhi tshad ldan la// zla gam sgo gcig rdo rjes bskor// mu khyud sgo bzhi rab tu bri// khyu mchog dbang po phyed ldan la// phyi nang khrus kyang de bzhin bya// dbus sgra bzhag
354b5(rnying rgyud): ste shar du bstan// lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags// mni ngag lung ldan phyag tu dbul// phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgra maM// de yi khong du gzhal yas su// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba'i// thugs kar nor bu rin chen
354b6(rnying rgyud): 'bar// dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la// dpal be'u yungs 'bri'i snying po la// ti le 'bru tsam gyi hUM dmar gnas// rdo rje 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// rdo rje praM yang dbab par b+ha// dri nas mtshan rtags bzang ba dang // dngos grub blangs te bslab
354b7(rnying rgyud): bar bya// bskams te bdud rtsi'i rtsa bar shes// zhes gsungs so// de la 'dzi ni dregs pa tsa ni gnon po bsgrub pa'i thabs so// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// ji ltar rigs pa 'dus pa dang // maN+Dal gzhi gcig sbyong sa /
355a1(rnying rgyud): cha ga mas bstod pa'i maN+Dalwa ban+de// gru bzhir gzha las sngags par zla// de dag myatang gzugs su byA// sting ga man chad dbus su bsnol// mAN+Dal chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/ dbus su 'khor po'i zag btab la// dbang
355a2(rnying rgyud): chen lnga yi phyag d+ha gnas// bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes pa la// gnas dang phral me phyag na dgod// zla bzhi srung de bzhigazhag/ yan lag skal ba'i mgo ba na gnas// b+hi rol khyams la mA ri bya// de mtha' thod pa
355a3(rnying rgyud): gsu mi bltams// de yi phyi rim me bur 'dzub// gu gru thul dang zur tshags// zhing dang sbrul rkun sgo khyud la// ban d+hi snying por bcas pa dag/ so so'i gnas sri bzhini gzhag/ rdo rje'i dbyibs su brtsigs pa'i thab// zur bzhi kha bzhi dag 'a bya// snying gar 'khor
355a4(rnying rgyud): po'i zab tu bya// rigs dang mthun pa'i yum shing btsog/ hom lnga 'brel pa'i las tshun la// thab khung lnga yi b+h+rUM brag tu// chud drug yam shing spangs pa las// ye shes lha yi me klong du// nyon mongs lnga yi bsreg sbyang thim// bya bar 'os pa/
355a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dag kun// rnal 'byor can gyis ci rigs bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni ma tang 'greng bu gnon pa'i thabs so// dkyil 'khor ma ting gzugs su bya// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// mgo lus yan lag rnams pa ni/
355a6(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal bcu gcig rab tu bya// zhal du hom khung gru gra stam la// yam shing dag gis brdzangs nas ni// sbyin sreg hom gyi las rnams bya// steng gar gru gsum rtse gsum la// bdi ram gsum par byas nas ni// phur bu nyi shu rtsa gsum dgod//
355a7(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bya// lte bar gro gsum ma thing nag la// zur 'azod pa tshar gsum bri// gzhu bdun dgra sna brgyad kyang dgod// phung bri dgu dpang nA dgra// cing sar drug cu rtsa brgyad dgod// yum gyi mkhang du bsgoms nas sra// ga
355b1(rnying rgyud): gnan drag po'i las rnams bya// yan lag mgro mtshan g.yas g.yon la// gnas kyi ma mo brgyad rnams kyi// byed ma man+tan mya gzhag par bya// gzhan rnams kyang ni ci rigs par// mata dkrug dang dab bu dang gnon// byin brlabs
355b2(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas tshul bzhin bya// bya ba thams cad ce rigs bya// des ni gnon pa'i las chen 'grub// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa'i thabs so// thams cad 'byor par byas nas ni// sa stengs skyong nul legs byas la/
355b3(rnying rgyud): dbus su pad+ma 'dab bcad pa// zla gram dmar po sgo bzhir ldan// rdo rje'i rabs bskor bar bya// dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod// rin chen sna tshogs bum pa la// tshe yi rdzas kyis gang ba de// pad+ma ban d+ha sa la bkab la// gzungs thag btags
355b4(rnying rgyud): nas dbus su gzhag/ tshe dpag med par de mnga' gsal// bum pa rin chen las byas bzhi// gsangadra ba'i yum du de mda' gsol// rigs dang mthun pa'i bum pa bzhi// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gtso gzungs dang // so so'i 'khor gyi sems
355b5(rnying rgyud): dbang rnams// gtso gzungs drung du 'brel bar ni// phyogs phyogs ngag tu tshom bur bri// sgo bzhir sgo srung la sogs gzhag/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya kun bkod nas// tshe dpag med pa'i thugs ka nas// 'khyed ying nga tshong ba'i byang chub
355b6(rnying rgyud): sems// nyi rnyi ga'u gnas pa de// A yu byang chub sems su bya// de las rgyal mtshan mdzad ldan dang // rin chen gter dang dbang bskur mdzad// gsang ba'i tshe gter 'dzin dang bzhi// thugs kar 'phros nas de bzhin du// tshom tha ma byas
355b7(rnying rgyud): spros nas ni// dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag po ba snyems// skye mo dbyings su spros nas ni// mi 'gyur phyag rgyas gdab par bya// yang na ting 'dzin khyad par gyis// lo 'am zla ba'i mtha' dag te// skya rengs 'charang ba'i dus su ni// phyag rgya chen du
356a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa des// shar phyogs ngos su la byams te// lha grag nod sbyin ji snyed pa// shA phyogs nas mA khar gnas pa rnams// thams cad khong du rngubs pa 'as// phyir mi 'byung bar khong du bstims// dbugs de tha mar sna
356a2(rnying rgyud): rba bcing // phyogs bcud de ster goms byas nas// dpab tshig byin thams cad byeba~M/ ces gsungs so// dpa 'di ni bdud b+h+rUM bsgrub pa'i thabs sa// maN+Dal tshad dang mthun pa la// dbus sra pang+gA 'a ba rgyad bri// su cang zug ma bzhi par
356a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan phyung blug ma ci rigs dgram// bad+ma rtse byin poH// ge sang dag gis mdzes par bya// phyug rgya 'bar ba'i lha tshogs dgod// dbus sgra tshangs pa'i skyed pa can// sbrul med drung rkyen 'khor bar gzhig/ shar dri sa 'grer dri
356a4(rnying rgyud): na te// pag byas ma shing blan/ N+DI shing byu nyis pa blanA/ thaMng drub sa por rje ma sa// snod kyis tshan rnyed pa dang nasas// drind thub kyis dang // sbyin phyogs tshugs sa// de dag skabs su sbya byis//
356a5(rnying rgyud): na / ga na / / / rlung / gas ga gas// danas dgags
356a6(rnying rgyud): rigs so sor dbye bar bya// sa bon lnga yis rnam par spangs// gsang chen de nyid dam pa yi// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs brgya yis// sbyang ba mechog tu bya ba yin// khrol bu dag ni sbyangs pa na// bsal dang bsngo dang bsgra dang dbye// khrus
356a7(rnying rgyud): dang bshags dang yon tan brjod// byin dbab bzlas brtags byung dang // bsgra dang btag btsag gzhal ba bya// mtshan ldan snod du rgya yis gdab// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzungs kyis gdags// dbang bskur byin pa rlab tshul bzhin bya/
356b1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin me g.yeng 'byongs pa dang // dngos grub blang ba la sogs bya// de nas ril bu'am 'de gu'am// sgyu ma la sogs ci rigs par// rnal 'byor mchog gis spang par bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni stan bslab pa'i thabs so// gang
356b2(rnying rgyud): yang rung ba'i sems can de// lus bab pa yi rnal 'byor pas// raM yaM khaM gis sreg spyad bya// rgyud drugs bon 'bru lngas sbyang // rol pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bya zhing // rnam shes sbyor ba'i lhums su 'bang // byang chub sems kyi 'phro'adra yis// sku
356b3(rnying rgyud): bskyed ye shes sur spros te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la so ma nyi med// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni ga Na bsgrub pa'i thabs so// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma lnga// bsnyen sgrub lung bzhin sbyor bar bya// dkar dmar 'dres pa'i byang chub se
356b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje lce yis blang bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bya// 'gro drug sgrib pa sbyong bar byed// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni spyir bsgrub pa'i thabs so// yi dam bcas pa btang na yang // bdag lus phul bar mi gtong zhing // de nyid dran
356b5(rnying rgyud): pa chen por bya// 'phags pa mchod par brtson pa dang // rang gi lta ba gsal ba dang // gsang sngags sgrom la gnas pa dang // gsang sngags phyag rgya ma nyams dang // yo byad tshogs na nges par 'grub// mi ldan don rnams brlag par 'gyul//
356b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so/ de la 'di ni mi 'grub pa'i chad pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub rim par ma rdzogs par// dngos la zhen cing sgrub byed pa// ring rgyud srog par gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni bsgrubs nas ma grub pa'i chud pa'o// bka'
356b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus bzhin grub par ma gyur na// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// ye shes las grub lha rnams kyang // tshal par 'gas pa gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// dngos grub gzhan dag de dag tu// mi zad
357a1(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab ste// de dag la sogs bsam pas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam dang // nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// brjod med brjod las 'das pa yi// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub// rtswa sA
357a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// 'phags brgyad kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u ste brgya gnyis bya'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi
357a3(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sgra dang gsung drung thugs rdo rje las sdom pa zab mo 'di phyung ngo // de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sdom pa ci'i phyir bsrung ba'o// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// log
357a4(rnying rgyud): rtog 'khrul pa bas ma mi khyab// de nyid gzhil ba'i gdul thabs su// phyi nang sdom pa ji snyed pa// rtog 'dul thabs su de snyed gsungs// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi mdo kun 'dir 'dus pa'o// ji snyed sdom pa bsam pas kun//
357a5(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po las// 'dul ba'i thabs su so sor snang // snang yang rtog 'dul ma grub phyir// rmad byung dang du gcig par 'dus// de bas gsang sngags ngo mtshur che// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dam tshig rnam par dag pa'o// /
357a6(rnying rgyud): chos kun ye nas dag pa'i phyir// log tog ye nas rnam par dag/ de bas sdom pa rnam par dag/ dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa'o// thams cad thig le rdo rje bas// bsrung ba'i tha
357a7(rnying rgyud): skad rnams dang bral// kun khyab bangal ba'i ngang nyid la// bsrung du med na sdom pa yin// nam mkha' bzhin du kun du khab// ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni rtogs pa'i dam tshig go// bde chen rnam dag lhan grub par// lta bas rtogs
357b1(rnying rgyud): chung gyur na// dam chog nyid kyang na su drag s+ho// sgrub khyang pa ni byazhin du// 'dul pa la zad pa dade ltar gnas// bas dam cho ga zhes bya ba// rang gi lta ba yin par gsungs// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di na ma chog gi ma ga su
357b2(rnying rgyud): bye'o// gas sngags tsamatsho rgan po ma// cig byasam las sbreng po// rtsu ba lang phyag gnyis su 'das/ d+h+rU ba'i dum tshig gsam pan te// sku ga suMng thugs sa rgyal bas gsangs// yan lag dmachog me sbyong dang // mi 'du
357b3(rnying rgyud): spyod dang shes pa dang // grub pa yin te rnam lnga po// mdor na rnam pa brgyad du grags// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni mdo rgyas pa'o// sku yi dam tshi ge ces bya ba// bla ma sbran pa gdung sems ldan// mngan dang dpya sems spangs pa yin//
357b4(rnying rgyud): bla ma la yang rnam gsum ste// dam tshig dbang dang shes rab rgyad// man ngag lung ston slob dpon la// mngan dang dpya ba'i sems bor na// lus dag sgo nas smos ci dgos// mgo dang mig dang gsang ma snying // rtag tu 'bral bar
357b5(rnying rgyud): 'phangs pa ltar// bla mu rdo rje slob dpon pa// mi 'bral sems kyis de ltar lha// de yi phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'brang// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // slongs ni srog la'ang mi snyan// zang zing gzhan lta smos ci dgos// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal
357b6(rnying rgyud): po'am// lus srog bskyed pa'i pha mya byas// shin+da tu gnyen zhing byug+saR+sha bar b+ha// ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyi// sgo rnams de yi snyan pa yin// dngos grub bye b+hag ji snyed pa// de la phyag lus rjes su 'brang // mdog mun pas gti bos pa
357b7(rnying rgyud): la// sems kyi sgron ma de yis 'degs// g+ha mi yongs kyi 'dren ston yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i srog shing yin// yon tan kun gyi gter mdzod yin// gal te yon tan mi ldan yang // bla mar
358a1(rnying rgyud): bzang nas sbyang byas na// spyan gyi stob dpon brnas pa yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas sbyar ba yin// dr-i ma nyams pa brjod ma lang // saun+na tan ldan pa'i blas de// phyogs badzungs dus rgyas thams cad dang // rgyal
358a2(rnying rgyud): sras dang ni mthu chen rnams// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bkur sti byed// 'jig rten 'di na mthu chen kun// de yi dgongs pa skong ba dang // khur zhing bran d+ha khas len na// rdo rje slob mas smos ci dgos// rdo rje spun la gdung sems kyang /
358a3(rnying rgyud): 'dres dang ma 'dres yongs kyi spun// yang dag lam du zhugs bra la// mngan dang dpyas kyis sems tsam yang // rtag tu spring bar bya ba yin// brtse zhing gdung ba'i shugs phyung la// gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin blta// mdor na srog
358a4(rnying rgyud): la mi chags par// spun dang ming sring dgos pa sgrub// ci phyir rdo rje spun rnams ni// 'di nas byang chub thug pa ru// mi 'brel 'grogs pa'i grogs mchog ste// mar me 'od dang sdong bu 'dra'o// dper na 'jig rten mi rnams kyang // meng po
358a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus na dka' ba'ang 'grub// de bzhin rdo rje ming sring spyan// dngos grub sgrub pa'i grogs mchog yin// dper na grogs dang ldan pa'i mi// 'tshe ba rnams kyis mi tshugs bzhin// de bzhin rnal 'byor grogs ldan yang // rgol ba rnams
358a6(rnying rgyud): kyis mi tshugs shing // 'bras bu myur du 'grub par 'gyur// re bas nan tan bskyed de bsrung // de yang sku yi dam tshig ste// bsrung ba yin par rgyal bas gsungs// mdor na snang srid thams cad ni// gzugs su snang ba mtha' yas
358a7(rnying rgyud): kun// chos kyi sgra las ma g.yos par// gzugs sku 'ja'atshon tshul du gsal// de nyid don las mi 'da' bar// rtogs pa skra yi dam tshig ces// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// gsung gi dam tshig ces bye bi// sngags kyi
358b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gral sgo byas// phyag rgya bzhi ru rnam gsal nas// rdo rje sngags rnams rgyan mi gcad// bsgom dang bzlas dang 'phro 'di'i sngags// ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba la// bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dras bstod nas// sgrib pa'i bud shing bsreg
358b2(rnying rgyud): par bya// bzlas brjod sngags kyis brtul zhugs kyang // sgra chen ma yini chung bar min// mgyogs par ma yin bral bar min// drag par ma yin dral bar min// yig 'bru yan lag nyams ma yin// yongs min gla la sogs par gcod
358b3(rnying rgyud): min// rgyu ba'i sems rnams spangs pa dang // bzlas pa'i skyon bcu spangs nas ni// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi// bsten pa rab tu rdzogs pa gces// ye shes lha rnams nye ba dang // dbyings dang rnam thar 'dzom pa dang // dngos grub rnam
358b4(rnying rgyud): gsum thob pa dang // 'phro 'dus 'gro don bya ba dang // de yis lha rnams mnyes pa dang // las de myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// bsrung ba'i dam tshig yin par gsungs// mdor na snang srid thams cad kun// skye med gsung las ma g.yos kyang // /
358b5(rnying rgyud): gsung gi bye brag nyid yin par// rtogs shing slar yang dbyings su thim// rtogs pa gsung du rgyal bas gsungs// thugs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba// spyir gsang bzhi dang bar gsang bzhi// gsang bar 'os dang granyer gtad pa'i// gsang
358b6(rnying rgyud): sngags gsang ba'i don rnams kun// bum pa'i nang gi me mur bzhin// snod ma yin pa'i gang zug la// dus dang gnas skabs kun du gsung // snod dang ldan pa rnams la yang // dbang ma thob par bshad pa min// ci phyir gsang don
358b7(rnying rgyud): nyid la// ma rtogs pa rnams skur pa 'debs// log par rtogs pa ltung bar 'gyur// don ma rtogs na yid ches med// khams gsum skye bo'i bcas kar 'gyur// dngos grub par gcod bgegs su 'gyur// de bas gzhan du bsten sa min//
359a1(rnying rgyud): mdor na thugs kya mchog na// srid gsam sems can thams cad ce// sems tog rnam pa bams nA kun// skye med dbyings lngas mrag yos kyang // sas dgags bya thugs sna // snang shid dbyangs las ma 'da' bar/
359a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa thugs su rgyal bas gsungs// dwe ni rtsu ba dam tshig gi// mdo nyid nus par bshad pa phyin// rtswa ba'i dam tshig gi medo rgyas par bshad pa'o// mi slong dam tshig ces b+ha ba// 'dod chags ni sdeng ga ti sreg dang // nga rgyal phrag 'ag
359a3(rnying rgyud): ni// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas ngo bo ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// spangs na rnal 'byor don dang 'gal// mi dor dang du blang ba ni// dri chen dri chu rak+Sha dang // ma~M sa dang ni zil pa lnga// 'bras bu lta yis bsdus pa rnams// rnal 'byer pas na
359a4(rnying rgyud): rtag tu bza'// 'di yang dam tshig rmad po che// spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sbyor dang sgrol dang ma byin len// brdzun dang ngag rtsub smra dang lnga// don de ma skyes bus spyad par bya// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phreng sa lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po
359a5(rnying rgyud): yul lnga kha dog lnga// rigs lnga ye shes lnga nyid du// don ldan skyes bus shes par bya// lung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// grub par bye ba'i don chen yang // sangs rgyas lnga pas gzhan mi bsgrub// grub par bya ba'i dam chog ste// 'dri dag bsngar/
359a6(rnying rgyud): pud rab tu gces// de yang ci phyir bsrung zhe na// 'dod chags dang dang snyir snang ba// chags shing zhen pa thams cad kun// pad+ma rigs kyi ngo bo yin// zhe sdang de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs// gti mug sangs rgyas yin par gsungs// nga rgyal yid bzhin
359a7(rnying rgyud): nor bu ste// phrag dog zhes bya las su bshad// de bas spang bar bya ba min// dri chen snang mdod gtso bo yin// dri drug don mi za grub pa// rak+Sha snang ba mtha' yas sku// maMs rin ched 'byung ldan gtso// byang chub sems ni rdo rje sems// des na dang du
359b1(rnying rgyud): byung bar gsungs// sems can thams cad gas dbyub// rdo rje sems dpa'i dmatshig yin// bud med rnams la chags bya ba// snang ba mthu' yas dam tshig ste// gzhan gyi nong 'brog nas snang gas// ran chen 'byung ba'i ga na zlum/
359b2(rnying rgyud): ngag rtsub gdon mi za 'grub pa'i// dam tshig yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de bas spyad par bya ba'o// gzugs su snang ba rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan gratso// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// 'du byed gdon mi ze grub
359b3(rnying rgyud): pa// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'o// sa ni rdo rje zhes su bshad// rin chen chu ste pad+ma mo// thogs med rlung gi rang bzhin te// nam mkha'i khams ni rnam snang mdzad// mig gi dbang po rnam snang mdzad// rna ba rin chen 'byung ba'i tshul// sna/
359b4(rnying rgyud): ba mtha' yas sna zhes grags// lce ni gdon mi za grub pa// lus ni mi bskyod pa ru bshad// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// sgra ni rin chen 'byung ba ste// dri ni snang ba mtha' yas so// ro ni don yod grub pa yin// reg rnams me
359b5(rnying rgyud): bskyod pa ru bshid// de bzhin dkar po rdo rje'i rigs// ser po bder gshegs rigs su bshad// mthing ga ri ni chen dmar po chos// ljang gu las kyi rigs su bshad// de phyir shes par bya ba yi// dam tshig yin pa rang ba'i bros
359b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs// bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu yang // rigs lnga nyid du grub pas na// de grub pa yi dam tshig yin// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// yan lag dam tshig 'da' ba'o// zhes gsungs so// yan lag gi dam tshig mdo rgyas pa'o// de
359b7(rnying rgyud): la 'di ni dbye ba'o// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// bsrung ba rtog pa gnyis su dbye// de dag dngos su bsrung bas na// mi 'da' bsrung ba'i sdom bcas yin// rnam par dag pa'i ngong nyid du// de dag rtogs pas khyad par du// rtogs pa
360a1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig yin par gsungs// de la 'di ni dam tshig nyams pa ltung ba'i gnas so// rtswa ba nyams pa'i sgron chen yang // bskal pa grang ma med bgrangs par yang // dmyal ba'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bla mang sgra smad na/
360a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas brnyas pa yin// byang chub sems la skur pas na// de yi sdig pa brjod mi ldang // dper na 'jig rten sa yi rdul// grangs kyis bgrang bar shes kyang srid// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu thigs kyang // grangs kyis bgrang zhing 'das su
360a3(rnying rgyud): rung // 'di yi sdig pa brjod mi nus// shin tu mi bzad sdug bsdub las// thar bar rnams kyang mi 'gyur te// srid gsum sems can gsad pas ni// bla ma'i bka' bcug char mi phod// rdo rje srun pa smad pa ni// nyams pa'i ston yang brjod
360a4(rnying rgyud): par dka'// bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu// dmyal ba che na bor ltung bar 'gyur// tshe 'dir bsgrub pa log pa dang // 'bad pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur// gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na// dbyings dang rnam par thar pa yi// sgo rnams nyams
360a5(rnying rgyud): par gyur pas na// bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su yun ring ste// grugs pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// yi dgas kyi ni lus su skye// thong gshol babar pa lnga brgya yis// de yi lce
360a6(rnying rgyud): pa gshog par byed// bskal bad mar myong ba dang // dngos grub 'bras zla med par 'gyu ma// ma na rtsa pa nyams kyi na// 'bras bu med cing dran spyod lhung // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // de yi snying khrag 'azung bar dris// mi spong nga mchog
360a7(rnying rgyud): nyams gyur na// dngas grub thams cad spangs par 'gyur// mdor dam tshig nyams gyur na// dngas thab bras tham 'bri thong // mi dgapa slo 'i gnyis su hU~M// spyang pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur ni// 'du shes med pa dgog par byed/ shAs
360b1(rnying rgyud): d+mo na byug D+ga// rgyun pa nas da// da // rgyu gas sus bya // gas sa s+ho/ sas nan// su ldan pa 'gasas da/ ng+yasas sa skrun
360b2(rnying rgyud): na/ sbyiskyes sa na/ na / pa sa /
360b3(rnying rgyud): sa dag gi da sa/ sa da pa sa// gang ga ga na // chos su sa
360b4(rnying rgyud): ma sa/ / / ma par dru ra// 'ang ma d+hA byu ba / 'gu zug na // ma da na
360b5(rnying rgyud): sa kyi maldanas pa ma sa nga ga mardzog ga
360b6(rnying rgyud): sa su sa
360b7(rnying rgyud): ga sa gas
361a1(rnying rgyud): da/ ku na su na / smras nga sa/ smra du sa// stsa smra / ma na nga
361a2(rnying rgyud): spyo ba bsnyen pas// bsgrubs na myu du thub par 'gyur// rigasang na dang ni smye shAtsanAM// rtag tugs pa btsun pa dang // ma thun+da len dang mi tshangs stong // brdzun du sbrul dga' ba dang // nub pa ngag pa dga' bani// gas sa
361a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// phra dang khro bo mes po la// zhe sdang sems kyis bskal bus na// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos gru ba thob// ma dang bri mi snying mo la// 'dod chags sems kyis b+hair byas na// rmugs pa chen po'i dngos pa bathob// snyir rje medapa
361a4(rnying rgyud): gsod pa dang // 'jigs pa med par sbyor ba la// bshang ga ci zas su za ba dang // rang gi khu bas mchod pa dang // dur khrod rgyan la dga' ba ni// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyuraro// bsod snyoms zas la mi chags shing // ma bslangs pa la'ang
361a5(rnying rgyud): mi bya// nags tshal dgon pa ngas phyogs su// bsod snyoms blangs te bzu bar bya// sems kyi brtul thags chen po yis// ting 'don stobs dang ldan par bya// lus kyi brtul zhugs chen po yis// thogs med sbyang thabs tshul du gnas/
361a6(rnying rgyud): la mus chen po yis// sngags kyi yi ge drag tu brjod// dben po'i phyogs su gnas bca swAd// gang dag ni gros su son nas hrI// rje ba'i rgyale rtag tu bskyed// wa oM brdul zhugs chen po zhes// bar byab 'i thabs pa
361a7(rnying rgyud): gas chen po yis// shes bya kun la 'jug par bya// lus kyi rtsal gyi bya ba dag/ gyi ling brtul zhugs chen popo bya// pheg gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// gtsang sme med par kun pa spyad// glang chen mas bde brtul zhugs
361b1(rnying rgyud): kyis// mi 'byed rmongs tshul bstan par bya// stag mchog rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// dpa' brtul gtam pa'i las chen bya// grung chen mkha' lding brtul zhugs kyis// lta ba spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcad// gtam thud dom gyi brtul zhugs kyis
361b2(rnying rgyud): re ba med pa'i las chen bya// rgya mtsho gter gyi brtul zhugs kyis// yid thub mi ldog brtan par bya// lhags pa lug gi brtul zhugs kyis// gti mug bzhin du shes rab ldan// ri bo lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis// mi 'gyur rab tu brtan par
361b3(rnying rgyud): rnam nu gags/ yang na bru par bya// gan ma thugs dus gas thos// gas sal hU~M dbyung bya// lagan rje'i brda ma rnags kyi/ ba dag nga bya/
361b4(rnying rgyud): sa / bag zusag cad pa gyi// klu 'ad rdzogs / da par ni// dgas mi ge ga na pa mags bar bya// dbyang ma
361b5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyis// 'grogs nA bde zhing chags par bya// sgyu ma rgya yi brtul zhugs kyis// thabs la mkhas pa'i las chen bya// ce spyang khra yi brtul zhugs kyis// gtsang sme med par spyad pa dang // thogs med gsod la brtson par bya// brtsa
361b6(rnying rgyud): ge mchog brtul thugs kyis// che ba'i nga rgyal brgyad par bya// mkha' lding lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis// kunu du mdzes pa'i spyod pa spyad// rgyal po 'khor spyod brnal zhugs kyis// sa thub 'khor dang ldan par bya// bcu gnyis dang ni gsum dang
361b7(rnying rgyud): btul zhugs blo dang ldan par bya// de la sogs te bsam mi byab// ces gsungs so// 'phags pa rgyad kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las rnal 'byor gyi rig pa'i btul zhugs kyi le'u stebatu bzhi pa
362a1(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das gsung bu mchog ga padag po rgan pas phrin las rgya mthogan gyis grub panas bya t+ta nga na la snyoms par thugasas// zhugs nas yang 'dun pa sa rnams su 'ad ga cis gdus ga 'an
362a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ btsa la mad ldan grab dkyil 'byor las// phrin las rgya mtsho bswa ma yis kyang // nal 'byor dgos pa'i dbang dag rtsa// las bzhi dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// dang pos pa'i lha yin te// gnyis ba rgyas pa ni
362a3(rnying rgyud): su bya// gsum pa dbyang du sdud pa'i las// bzhi pa drag po'i lus sragasungs// de dag g+ha yi kyil 'khor dang // gnas dang dus dang rdzas rnams dang // dbyings dang kha dog maN+Dal dang // yul dang ting nge 'dzin dag dang // phyogs dang stan dang
362a4(rnying rgyud): 'dug stangs dang // thob sar pa gtor ma dang // bzlas brjod hom dang bskal cho ga dang // 'khor lo me lha'i mtshan nyid dang // yul dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ste// bcu gnyis dang ni gnyis dag gis// bya ba thams cad rtogs par gsung //
362a5(rnying rgyud): nr-i zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de// ma zhes bya ba rgyas pa yin// dbang du sdud pa baM dri bshad// e nyid drag po'i mtshan nyid do// g+ha yi rnal 'byor rim pa yang // rdo rje sems dpabazhi drag bya// rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las
362a6(rnying rgyud): ur// spang ba mapa byas rgyas pa dang / yang gigasen ba gyu/ gdo 'i sa pa myed/ na dge nyid do// kun drab rji ngos ci yang byed// rkye'ado srid du tshig te// bas pa rnam sa byeng
362a7(rnying rgyud): can gyis dang dri byed// grol ma las rnams kun la sbyar// sau yi snying pos byas par byed// nam mkha'i stong ngos 'phel bar byed// regan rdo rjes drag po byed// spya ngas gzigs kyis snying brtse bar// yid kyis yid du'ang bar byed/
362b1(rnying rgyud): bya mas pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// sgrib pa sel bas rnam dag byed// kun du bzang pos nor sgrub byed// 'jam dpal shes rab rno bar byed// sgeg mos sangs rgyas mtshan rnams 'grub// phreng bas rgyan dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas yul du/
362b2(rnying rgyud): phyin par byed// gru yis dbyangs stan grub par byed// rig ma dag dang lhan cig rjen// gar gyis phyag rgya gar mchog dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs// bdug pas yid 'ong dngos grub thob// me tog rab dgyes mdzes par byed//
362b3(rnying rgyud): dI pas 'od gsal mdangs dang ldan// dri yis dring dag par byed// lcags kyu yis ni spyan drang dang // rdo rje sna dgug pa'i las rnams byed// zhags pas 'dren cing 'ching bar byed// sgrog gis dbang du byed cing sdom// dril bus dgyes sgrol dbab par byed//
362b4(rnying rgyud): byed pa pa da tha pa cho/ ma byed pam myed pani'i sbyid// byung sa sa/ sa smras ba kyi tshogs spyod// ga nga rkyen pos gtonag 'dums// sdug 'dung d+ha rjes nga bdunas// de na te
362b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal 'joms// pad+ma he rus 'dod chags 'joms// las kyi he rus phrag dog 'joms// khrag 'thung chen pos thim par byed// badz+ra kro d+his 'khyud par byed// rat+na kro d+his sbyor bar byed// pad+ma kro d+his skyod par byed// karma kro d+his 'bebs
362b6(rnying rgyud): par byed// dkar mo'i tshogs kyis 'gugs par byed// rkun mo'i tshogs kyis mthu 'phrog byed// rmongs ma'i tshogs kyis myos par byed// thal byed mas ni thal ba'i rlog/ skyos mo'i tshogs kyis dbring dro byed// gtum mos sgrol zhing myos
362b7(rnying rgyud): par byed// sme sha can gyis za bar byed// ma tshogs mas ni rgyud daphel byed// seng gdong tshogs kyis zil gyis gnon// stag gdong tshogs kyis 'joms par byed// wa gdong tshogs kyis rol par byed// khyi gdong tshogs kyis gsod cing
363a1(rnying rgyud): tsang+ga ga nga rdzogs kyis chug par byed// dar byas rnam par dzin par byed// na rdzogs sa dbang dung // jug gdang rdzogs kyis 'dron ci // gshad pas 'grags stsos par byed// bdang dz+nyA 'ja la da/
363a2(rnying rgyud): spyod par byed// gzhan gyis mi thab mdag garjeg byed// yes dag rnams 'don pa par byed// dbyug sbyin gyis gsod par byed// stobs chen char 'babs byed pa'i mjug/ me g.yo bas na stugatsang 'khrug/ rdo rje rmugs
363a3(rnying rgyud): 'ching bar byed// rnam par rgyal bas gnon par byed// khams gsum bdag po sna 'joms par byed// sra min tshogs rnams mang po ban+da// mngag gadzag pho hr-ing las rnams byed// skas dang bre mo'i tshogs rnams kyis// thams cad
363a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad byed par 'gyur// mdor na lha yi rnal 'byor ni// cis 'dul thabs kyis de ltar ro// yid 'ong bkra shis dben pa ru// rdo rje zhi ba sgrub par shes// me tog nags tshal skyed mos tshal// nyams dga' bar ni rgyas par shes// kha
363a5(rnying rgyud): dag dmar thing gcod dro mar// ri bor gnas su dbang du bya// sum mdza glog kle rkang gcig dang // rtsub pa'i gnas su dran po bya// snga na zhi ba gung la rgyas// srod la dbang bya gung la ni// drag po'i las rnams brtsam par bya// rdzas drang bsreg pa'i rdzas
363a6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang // dkar zhing dmar pa k+She rdzas rnams dang // zho dang ldan pa'i zhing dag gi// rtse maM las phyis zla pa'i b+ha ba// ser zhing bya ba'i ror ldan pa'i// ba ra gyi shing las byas pa kA nA// rgyas pa'i las su bsngags pa yin// skA ra zhing kha dog dmar
363a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang // rdungs pa pas byas shing gi rnams// dbang gi rdzas kyi rab tu grags// gnag ci rtsub pache ba yaM// ngor ldan rtsa pa'i shing ngas byas// rdo rje drag po nyid pa 'o// zlum po dang rje 'khor lo dag/ zhi ba yini las su gsungs// zur ban zar
363b1(rnying rgyud): drug zur brgyad dam// pad+ma'am rin chen dbyibs 'drab// rgyas pa'i las lA shis pa'o// zla ba kham dang gzu 'i dbyibs// pad+mo phung po 'am mkha' 'dra ba// dbang du bya ba'i lngas yin no// grags mu mam+b+ha ni gru chung dum// rdo rje'i dbyibs dang mang
363b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra bar// byas pa rdo rje drag po la // dkar po zhi ba ser po chus// dmar po dbadal nag po drag/ ljang gu suM yi las sla gsungs// ser skya zhi rgyas las yin te// dmar skya zhi ba dbang gi las// g+ho m+b+ha zhi ba drag po'i las// rgas dang dbang dang dras
363b3(rnying rgyud): po la'ang // zhi ba'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// des na las rnams re re la'ang // bzhi bzhi dag tu rdul bas gsungs// zlum po'i thab khung rdo rje yis// brgyan bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// pad+ma gru bzhi rin po ches// brgyan pa rgyas pa'i las su shis//
363b4(rnying rgyud): zla gam khung bu mda' gzhus brgyan// dbang du bsdu ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// kye gsum kyang thod kyis brgyan pa// drag po spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// ljon pa ma dang lcug phran ma// sdod cig ma dang me reg ma// spyan dang mA ma gos dkar sgrol// byin
363b5(rnying rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i gnas brus te// dad byams snying rje dad pa dang // dga' chags btang snyoms khros pa yi// ting 'dzin dag gis zhi dang rgyas// dbang drag so so'i 'phro 'dra bya// byang du bltas te zhi ba bya// rgyas pa'i tshe na shAr du blta// dbang la nub tu
363b6(rnying rgyud): drag bro b+ho// zhi ba ku shashi'i khri stengs pa// rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung du gnas// pad+ma'i steng du sems dpa' yi// skyil mo krung gis rgyas par bya// khri steng ngag tu phyed skyil gyis// dbang du bsdu byab pas bya'o// sra gzhi gru gsum nyid la ni/
363b7(rnying rgyud): sbal gyi ni rgyas/ tab kyis// mngon par spyod pa brtson par bya// zlum po gru ba'i zlag ma dang // zur gsum tho pa'i gtun tshogs kyis// las bzhi yum gyi gtun khung du// gti mug brgyal 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang mtshan ma dul du brdung
364a1(rnying rgyud): gser dang la zangs dang lpags dag gam// zho can ser sna chub shing la// ri rab tshub du rab brjid pa'i// phrar rab las rnams so so yi// lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa la// rtse mo yo bro ma ya dbyabs// mtshan ma ming du/
364a2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa la// btab na zhi cha sna dbang brag 'gyur// dang lnga phye 'bras chan dkar po la// zhi bar 'gyur po'i gtor mar sbyar// gser bye 'bru chan ser po la// rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma sbyar// dbang la zangs phye 'bru dmar chan// drag po'i lcags
364a3(rnying rgyud): sha khrag la'o// shAn ting puSh+Ti bshang dang // mA ra ya yi sngags tshig la// sA hA swA hA hU~M phaT kyis// brgyan pa'i mgo la oM bzhag pa// bzlas pa'i sngags su shes par bya// hom khung zlum po gru bzhi dang // bla ga ma gru gsum gdengs pa ru// rdo rje
364a4(rnying rgyud): rin+da chen muda' gzhu dang // rdo rje rtse dgu'i phyag rgya gzhag/ zho can ser skyar rtsub pa yi// yam shing dag la me sbar te// lhan ne gzi byin ldan chen dang // gtum chen rngam pa'i lha tshogs la// las bzhi'i tshul du bsregs na 'grub// sngags dang 'dod
364a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ming sbrel te// bskul pa bya ba'i tshig tu bshad// ras sa ma gro ga shing shun la// zhi rgyus 'khor lo'i sngags bcas bri// lcags gsum gu pur bcu gi nas ni// mchod cing bsgral na gdon mi za// zhing chen rA sa sam smad dkris la// dbang drag
364a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo'i sngags bcu saM bri// kham pho ru nang ngam thod par gzhug/ dur khrod gnas la sogs pa ru// bsgral zhing mnanA pa byas na ni// gdon mi za bar mnan par 'gyur// las bzhi'i me lha'i mtshan nyid ni// me yi lha ni sdang mtha' yas/
364a7(rnying rgyud): me yi lha mo gos dkar mo// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas ni// gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur// gdug ts+tsha ba rnams la zhi ba sbyar// dbul phongs rnams la rgyas pasgyur// dbang ni 'dod gzir rnams la ste// zhe sdang can la drag po'i pas// thams
364b1(rnying rgyud): zhi byar 'gyur ba dang // yad bzhin nam mkha' 'gengs pa dang // dgug cing kyi bzhin bzung ba dang // myos nas gas twa bzlog pa ni// lus bzhi 'bras bur rdul bus gsungs// 'phags brgyad kyi rgyal pa ye shes rngam pa skrag gi 'a
364b2(rnying rgyud): long mdo zhes bya ba las las kyi rim par skye ba'i le'u ste bcwa pA pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag phongs ste 'gro thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya bab ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas kyang brna
364b3(rnying rgyud): patI nan tu 'di dag gsungs so// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang // lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang // rdo rje spun la 'khu byed pa// rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur dang // skye bo yongs la gnod pa dang // ma chags
364b4(rnying rgyud): pa yi sems can la// brnag pa'i nan tu ra bya bar gsungs// dgug dang gsang dang bskum pa dang // dbyed de bskyed dang mnan pa dang // bcing pi'i las dang bdun dag gis// grub par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs// dgug pa'i las dag bya ba yang /
364b5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan byas te// rkang rjes nyid kyis blangs la// mi rus bsregs pa'i thal ba dang // dur khrod ro yi ras dag dang // rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo yi// 'gram nyid nas ni blangs pa'i sa// rlung gis khyer ba'i shing lo dang // stsog ma par
364b6(rnying rgyud): sa rnams btags nas su// lung bong gcin gyis smra bar bya// de nas yan lag tshang ba yi// gzugs la hi drag ru gro ga'am// shing shun legs par ldan nas ni// ra khI khrag gis med zis te// dzI dang phan+da kye bar du gAzhug/ drag po'i dkyil
364b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gru gsum du// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// gang na gnas pa de nyid nas// de yi rnam par shes pa ni// thogs med rlung dang 'dra ba ste// lcags kyu yis ni gling drang ste// mi las rlung gis bteg nas ni// bdag gi drung du phyin pa dang /
365a1(rnying rgyud): lcags rgyu
365a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan nang du du brgyug pa// sr-irba pra me khyer 'dra bar gsus/ shegs pa'i \u0f7fgargyas dam du gzug/ lcags ga zug rgyas skrag tu gzug/ dril ze'i phyag rgyas brtan par bya// gu gul nag pong drud pas bad/ nga
365a3(rnying rgyud): kar rgyal po'i mtshon gyis brdeg/ rdo mig gis bltar mngon par// nyams pad+mo nyid gnon par ni// nyin mtshan kun ladrangs te bas me// ya na suMb+ha'ang lhag par 'dra bas// de ni dgug pa'i mchog tu gsungs// gal te gas dpang las
365a4(rnying rgyud): bya na// dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te// dug shing snying po'i tsher ma yis// khugs pa'i gzugs de dbug par bya// drag por gyur pa'i phur pa yis// dpral ba snying mgrin pus mo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu btab par bsgom// rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis
365a5(rnying rgyud): gadra ba// rdo rje rtse gcig phyag rgya dang // be con rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje brjid pas phur pa gnon// bskal pa'i mthar yang zug bsams te// gu gul dud pas myos su gzhug/ yungs kAr rgyal pos brdeg par bya// de nas gzugs kyi dngos
365a6(rnying rgyud): pode// rab tu rno ba'i mtshon cha yis// pho ni dang pa glayas nas gtub// mon rkang pa g.yon nas gtub// rmang du byung ba'i gtor ma dang // bcas te 'ber ba'i lha tshogs la// dreg po ts+tshom du sbyin srog bya// nyin mtshan gung la bya bar gsungs// la
365a7(rnying rgyud): 'di rgya na / zhwa yis bstangs kyang 'ji bar 'gyur// gal te snyam pa'i lus thA sun// dgug pa de nyid sgyur byas te// de yi ming nas ltos nas n+te// gzugs de drug gi tshor mo sto byug// drug dang spyi tshe len tshwa dang // 'bru mar tshwa bAr/
365a8(rnying rgyud): rab 'ardzas te// tsha nga rims kyis gdab pa'i phyir// de yi lus nang gang bar dgeng // tshor ma'i mo la bsgomo par bya// mitshan ma ming du bcas pa ste// kha me phor ram ni rjod par gzhug/ dgra yi sgo gang mnan byas na// skam par 'gyur bar gdon
365b1(rnying rgyud): yang na tsha sa btab par 'gyur// gul te gnas na swa s+pho byA na// tid badzin ldan pa'i rdul 'byor bas// dgug pa de nyid sbyar brus te// rdo rje mig gis mthong bya dang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng drug tu// rdo rje rnga ma rab bsams te// de nyid
365b2(rnying rgyud): rgyab tu brtson nas ni// rdo rje khro bo 'bar ba yis// gshin rje'i phyogs su khrid pa dang // gzhan gyis brdeg pa'i thabs suM sbyar// rol gyis chum gtubs pa dang // bya rog 'ug pa bye rgod kyis// za zhing 'brog par rnam bsams nas// de yA mdun
365b3(rnying rgyud): bcug byas na// des ni myur du smod par 'gyur// rdo rje mi 'chi las kyis sbyar// yang na rkang rjes sa dang ni// shing lo rlung gis gtsubs pa la// mtshan ma meng du bcas par b+ha// ming nas drag tu 'asgral bya zhing // rdo rje 'bar bang khyo bo yis// gshin rje
365b4(rnying rgyud): drung du khrid pa dang // bgegs kyi drung du ldanan byas na// des kyang bslad pa'i lalus su 'gyur// yang na da gra yi sgo ga ru// thod pa mgus ma chag par// rdo rje sngags kyi tshig byes te// rdo rje mo 'chi rnam par bsgom// dgra yi sgo ru bzhag na ni// bskrad
365b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// gal te dbye ba'i las byas na// khro bo'i sngags dang med spel to// 'ug pa'i sgol byis nas ni// bram ze'am dge sbyong sbas dkris te// ldem gyi bzhi mdor bzlos te gzhug/ de la rdo rje khro bo gnyis// 'thab cang rtsod par rnam pas
365b6(rnying rgyud): na// gsang de dbye bar gdon mi za// gal te mnan pa'i las byas ni// dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te// mngon sum khrugs par gyur pa dang // de steng dbang chen rim par bskyed// ri rab steng du 'asgom pa ni// sras kyi lha ste don yod grub// rdo rje rgya gram
365b7(rnying rgyud): brjid ldan pas// banyal ba yun tu gnon par bsam// gzugs brnyan thod pa gang bar gzhug/ lam gyi bzhi mdor de bzhin bya// des ni rab tu mnan par 'gyur// gal te bcing bar 'dod pa ni// dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te// mtshan ma ming du bcas
366a1(rnying rgyud): de// tshon sdud sna lngas mgo lus dkri// rdo rje sgrog gis bcings bsams nas// thod pa ma nyams nang du gzug/ lam gyi bzhi mdo ma dur khrod du// sbas na nges par bcangs par 'gyur// gzhan yang gsad pa'i brtul zhugs ni//
366a2(rnying rgyud): khrag dang dri chub shang gci yis// gsher bar byas pa'i glos son tI// khro bo'i rgyal por sbyar byas nas// rkang pas gzugs brtan mnan nas ni// khros pas gseng sngags bcu rtsa brgyud// rdzogs par bzlas na nges par mi// thal po'i skyo ma spangs/
366a3(rnying rgyud): pa'am// srab shig gcer bur phud pa'ang rung // de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang 'chi 'gyur na// khams gsum spyi bo smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad 'jigs skrag ste/ rang rang gi stan las
366a4(rnying rgyud): langs nas lces sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma bstan nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis bstod pa/ oM ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// cho 'phrul kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// ngo mtshar kun gyi
366a5(rnying rgyud): bdag po mchog/ rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal 'dud// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang // phyag rgya bsten sgrub bsgrub pa dang // sdo ma dang gus lathugs las rnams dang // nan tur bdag po khyod la 'dud// khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// de bzhin
366a6(rnying rgyud): rgyatshul sras snying por 'gyur// bdug cag rnams kyis rten pa'i gnas// ma rungs 'dul gtso khyod la bdud// e ma'o snang dang mi snang brtan g.yo la sogs chos kun nyid kyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'bul la snang // bsam yas bsam dpag las 'das chos
366a7(rnying rgyud): kun ngo mtshar rmad srung tshe 'phrul sna tshogs kun du snang // rtog med mnyam nyid dbyings las de srid baphrul kyang dbyings 'as g.yos dri rdul gyi cha tsam med// don dam bden par tsha 'phrul kun rdzob gsing sngags che ba'i khyad par rmang 'byar e mdzong
366b1(rnying rgyud): mtshar che// zhes mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab ste/ 'dus pa'i 'khor logs rnams lnga la ni byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid la sems shang cang mi smra bar 'khod do// la la ni dkyil 'khor rnams rim gyis dgod// la la rno lhan gyis grub pa'i
366b2(rnying rgyud): gar dang phyag rgya nye bar ston/ la l-i ni gsang sngags kyi sgro zab mo bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhir 'jug cing mi ldog/ la la ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung po'i che bdag ston// la lA ni gsang sngags kyi dam tshig snying la gnas par sdom/ pa la ni shul
366b3(rnying rgyud): zhugs zab mo pa 'dol tog tu dol// la la ni gdug pa'i tshogs rkyen cing tshar gcod/ la la ni rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / 'dod gzer dang / dregs pa rnams dang / sbyor ba'i las kyi rol pas dgyes/ la la ni nan tur gyi che ba ston cing ling
366b4(rnying rgyud): long phyed/ thams cad blo 'khyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gI pi dag po ni yum rngam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la dgongs shing cang myi gsung bar gyur to// 'phags pa chud
366b5(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba lngas nan tu gyi lus rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pi shra mi tra dAng zhu chen gyi lo rtsub pa gor bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing
366b6(rnying rgyud): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun da bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang po mchog gi bdag po de de bzhin nyid kyi dang la mi g.yo bar brnal bzhin du cho 'phrul 'azung ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskula'o//
366b7(rnying rgyud): ma'o mi dmigs chos dbyings dag pa pas// dbar bde sku mchog bdag pa bstan drugaso // rol pa'i tshe brel me zad rgyan du che// don pajam pa'i spyod pas rol du gsol// a la la ho zhes bskul bas bsgril bar thugs su chud nas sra nyi ma'i snang
367a1(rnying rgyud): dus dus sa snang ba sa // don ba ga sa ku du sad pargyas pa dun dang
367a2(rnying rgyud): phrug 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ oM mthogs mchog dge pa'i bdag/ ye shes shes bkri dz+haM d+hA ra lags// dam pa zhes ni gang la bsti// g+hog nga zhes pa ji ltar lpags// 'khor lo zhes pa ji lta bu// mdo yi don ni ji ltar lags/
367a3(rnying rgyud): badz+remya ldan 'das kyis brgyad du gsong // zhes gsol ba btab pa/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol bapa ba ba pa thugs sa chud nas mi shes snying po can+da rnams nyin cig/ ye shes ye shes zhes bya'o// shes dang shes kyi tha~M dang min//
367a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngo bo rnam pA lnga// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas// byang chub sems su rgyal bas gsungs// dregs pa 'dral zhing nan zur gyis// thogs chags med pa'i brtul zhugs pas// sngags spyod rngam pa'i khyad par de// dam pas rngam pa'i ma
367a5(rnying rgyud): hr-id yin// sgrog ni myur du 'jug pa'i phyir// 'jug pa'i yun lag bzhi dag dang // sbom dang pas bA nI khyad par dz+wa la// dngos grub byas lA myur 'jug pa'o// rang bzhin ting 'dren gzugs brtan dang // phyag rgya dngos grub 'brel bcwa
367a6(rnying rgyud): ni// 'khor la zhes suM rgyal bas gsungs// de bus mingan na mthun grags// rig cing gas pa pa'i rib pas// ye shes zhesas brjod pa yin// dam pa zhes pa drug tshul sto/ nga bar ched med pas na// klog gi phreng ba zlas/
367a7(rnying rgyud): nga ba nga dun mi byed// 'brir ba dum ra// gab btsun sus su gyus sa su sus de rjes ba gi byed pa pa na 'i sa sa gro
367b1(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa ji ltar lags// de bzhin dgos dang yang dgos ci// brjod pa ji ltar shes par bco// bcom ldan gsung ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ 'brel dang mdzad med pa dang // phun sum tshogs phyir rgyud ces bya// 'di don
367b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i skyes bu yis// gsang ba kun don shes pa'i phyir// phyogs bcu kun du rab grags pa'i// rgyad kun dung ni 'brel par bshad// gsang ba'i sbyor zhugs rnal 'byor pa// byang chub sems dang dkyil 'khor dang // phyag rgya bsnyen dang
367b3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub dang // sdom dang brtul zhugs ma rungs mnyes// las dang nan tur bya ba'i rnams/ mchog tu dgos pas dgos pa yin// bden gnyis rtog ste nas bdag gzhan don// grub pa yang dgos yin par bshad// dgos pa'i don
367b4(rnying rgyud): yang rjod byed pa'i/ don bsdus mdo 'di brjod pa yin// de bas rnam pa bzhi po yis// bde blag tu ni rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// yang smra ba'i seng ges gsol pa/ dbang mchog dam pa ma thob par// sgrub pa ci yang mi 'grub pa/
367b5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar dbang bskur mtshan nyid lags// snod ni ji lta bu dag lpags// go rimus ji lta bu dag pags// rnam grangs dag gi mtshan nyid ci// dbang thob rtags dang mtshan ma ci// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol// gsang ba mchog
367b6(rnying rgyud): gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i tshi ga la gsal 'dris shing // don la gzhol zhing yid ches kyang // dbang bskur bka' rtags ma byin par// nor bu blon bral bskos pa lngar// sa rnams thob par mi 'gyur ro// sems kyis
367b7(rnying rgyud): chos la dbang thob na// rdzas tshig gang zag dbang rnams kun// ma bskur na yang thob par 'gyur// bskur na dang nyes pa med par bshad// rig pa rang dbang rdzob gyur na// bskor ba'i dbang pa thogs pa med// de ni dbang gi mtshan
368a1(rnying rgyud): ras kyang thu na ma mas da // dang du ldan grus d+ha/ na dus da lagasang// / auk+sha rba // na na // dang na /
368a2(rnying rgyud): mnyan pasam slob sa mo ts+tsha ba// blam ldan pa bkur myi byed// gsang badz+nyAn pa'i dbang babyur // ma bzhigs kyi dgos pa byung // b+ha/ 'i las la suM myod sbyin// kar myalas kyi dbang bgyur ro// sna bas mat+ta ma da don rtags
368a3(rnying rgyud): na// byung 'thab 'chad cing ston pa'i dbang // zod mya gsum dang rabaldan zhing // rkyen tha~M rdo rje slob dpon dbang // theg pa'i rim pa thams cad la// phyogs ris me cing mtshungs na// raba'i byam rgyal po'i dpung thob d+ha 'o// rnon dru
368a4(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs che ba dang // skyon rnams spangs shing dam tshig ldan// gseng ba sgrub pa'i dbang tho ba pa'i// dang por gsang brtan pa'i dbang // drin chen rigs kyis rna b.la'o// de nas rdo rje lAs kyi dbang // las kyi rigs kyis yan lag
368a5(rnying rgyud): la'o// de nas gsang ba skyob pa'i dbang // rdo rje rigs kyis steng gar ro// de nas rgyal 'theb rtul po'i dbang // sangs rgyas rigs kyis spyi bo la'o// de nas gsang pa bachung pa'i dbang // pad+ma'i rigs kyis rgyal bsgyur// de nas rab byamaH/
368a6(rnying rgyud): phan lag ga ltan mi bang sgyur ro// dang pogargyas pa sridzin// sa pade sa sa kA// rtsabadrug gzha don du// dbyung coM g+sa sa pa'i ga sa yin// dam gi mas michen byi no//
368a7(rnying rgyud): par phyi mi dbang brdu babyur// de nas ning dbang brji da nga tsan/ danas bas / tham rnam pa rgyas bcu mug gi ma dang drug ga gis// dbang mchag ngas pa brjir ba dzin// dngas pa 'jig
368b1(rnying rgyud): kyanga'i dbang // gnyis brtags kyi mtshan ma'i dbang // bskam pa shes rab gzugs kyis te// bzhi pa bkra shis bum pa'i dpyang // lnga pa bkra shrI rdzas kyi dbang // drug pa'i na gyen sna bdun dbang // btsun pa gdan mchog dmang
368b2(rnying rgyud): dbang // brgyad pa mdzes pa rgyan gyi dbang // dgu pa gsang ba maung gi dbang // bcu pargya rtags 'khor lo te// rtsi dbang brngu ba rdzogs pa dang // rdo rje nang du gzhag par bya// dang po gsing po nyan cing slob pa'i dbang // gnyis pa glegs
368b3(rnying rgyud): pam zab mo gtad par bya// gsum pa rnam bzhi las kyi rdzas kyang sbyin// bzhi pa rgyal tshab dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin// lnga pa slob dpon pa ni yi theg chen rtags// drug pa ti b+ha pad+ma sems can gAdan// bdun pa rgyal po gsang ba'i dri rkyen
368b4(rnying rgyud): bdun// brgyad pa gzugs brnyan spyi bor gzhag/ dgu pa su gsum ye shes sbyin// bcu pa bkra shris dam rdzas dbang // de nas lag tu rdo rje sbyin// bcu dang gcig gis nad bcug nis// sgrub pa'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// dang por sems
368b5(rnying rgyud): gI gtan tshigs byin// gnyis pa stong rje'i dbang bskur sbyin// gsum pa yi ge 'khor lo sbyin// dwazhi bzong gshol 'bar bu sbyin// b+han dz+ha gang basbyin dang lnga// drug pa mtshan cha sna tshogs te// bdun pa skyon mod pad+ma sbyin// brgyad pa
368b6(rnying rgyud): spyi dkrug pa ston// dbub d+hal nig tsun po sbyin// brgya mang+ge sa mo sbyin// gcig pa da pa'i sangs spyod kun// gaN+DI pa b+ha brgyas rab tu sbyin// gsus bya d+h+r-i gsung med sbyin// btsud nga gsum po rtogs pa dang // gsang bang pa
368b7(rnying rgyud): pa yang // dkar dam da dris pa'i phyi rgyas mos// bu mtshig dom kyi lo gzhas/ snying po ni ngam byang chub sems// ni mi grol gzhag par rgyu// daring mchog thob pa'i rdzas rnams pang // tshul che ba'i bdag nyid dang // srang
369a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang/ ma da / rgyas // / nga/ gyu / dag // 2 ma
369a2(rnying rgyud): dar shA sa rgyas 'ad mi 'gyur// de spang ba'i matsun ma can// rnam pazhin du shes par 'gyur// brgyan pa la na sa/ shi mi me par na/ mamags nyimatha las mam/ ljang dA kyis sus rgyas/
369a3(rnying rgyud): ma pa da bzab pa dang / ba da dpal bdang/ hrI drang ci ba bdang/ dang nga'i daci dag gas de/ bdang/ da du skye nga yang dadang / rnal sa nga ma/
369a4(rnying rgyud): ba nas mi babyud// del srogs te mdung las mchog/ dgrags rnyed brjod pa ba na// dbyar basbyin pa shes par bya nr-id+hIn+de dzang/ thobapa dag tu 'gyur// nyam sa dang rmi lamra dag tu yang // da
369a5(rnying rgyud): mchog ji ster dasrung ba bzhin// de dag tshus pa'i rnam pa 'byung // de dag dbang ba spyi thob pa'i rtag / zhes gsungs so// de nas ying hU~M hUM grong gi byed pa bai d+ha nA~M kun du bzang po sa skad ces gsol ba btab pa// ye shes rnal
369a6(rnying rgyud): na rnam sa kyis// gsung ba mas pa'i byabyas tshub de// srasaM pas thub pad+mang srung ba dang // gsang pa'i dam la gnas d+ha d+hang // brdal dga' bri gyi rnams kr-in// nyi nyi gdung bar byu ba gyur // rdus dang dag b+had+hA rnams can// gsung
369a7(rnying rgyud): bdag pas bshad du ga // zhes gsas pa pa nga/ gabyeng pa'i sa 'du ba ba// gsang sgyus sbyi // rje 'i de kyig bshad hU~M// dadus pa'i ma 'i rnam sa legs par nyin// sa pa
369b1(rnying rgyud): ga can// lug pa g.yas pas b+ha bkran// rnal dbyung ba yis b+ha ba'i bar// g.yon pas bya ba ma yis byu// smra bar thug pa'i lag b+ha ne// b+hak+sha tshal ba pa pa y-iH// dpral par dag 'jug ldan byin// lag pa gapas pa brgyang byung /
369b2(rnying rgyud): te// mgo bo btud par byas pa ni// khams bde'am zhes 'dri ba'i brda// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas ni// g.yon du 'dud pa bde bode ldan// mi gA gnyis dag la reg pa na// gzugs mdzes ston cig ces pa'i byed// gsasu pasgos
369b3(rnying rgyud): pra mdzes pa yin// gnon pa bud med bzang mor bshad// na bdag la rig pa ban// g.yon pa legs pa'i gru stan brda// g.yas pa tshig stan smra ba'i brda// sna phrag gnyis la reg pa ni// g.yas pa bdug pa 'dod pa ste// g.yon pa
369b4(rnying rgyud): d+he dge slong brda// khyis ni ldeg par rnyed pa'i bang // brams su lhag pa sha 'dod pa'o// g.yon du chung 'dod pa rjo ng+ge shad// mcha bas ma ma chu ma na panA~M// gzon pa bud mad reb byang dong // gapas pa skyes pa byadzin no// ma nga
369b5(rnying rgyud): pa gsang 'a yi/ drag mchog gseng ba smra ba'i brda// snyi la nges par byed pa ni// bdag nyid dbyangs stan len pa'i badz+ra// snying gi'i dkyil du re// pa ni// don rtogs pa pi brda ru bshad// rig nas phyir la 'gyed pa ni// smom pa'i brda ru shes par bya/
369b6(rnying rgyud): sgra yang snying gung gzugs pa ni// sgrar yang bsdu ba'i brda yin no// lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni// dbu ma'i nan tan spyod pa yin// dbang por hU~M gsal byas na// ting 'dzin ska ma zhes bya ba yin// phrag pa gnyis ni rton pa'i brda// glags pa 'gugs
369b7(rnying rgyud): po'i brda yin no// g.yon pa slar gtong ba yi brda// dpung pa gnyis la nyug pa'i ngarda// g.yas padregs pa 'dul ba'i brda// g.yon pa longs dod grub pa'i brda// khu tshung g.yas bcangs dbang du sdud// gson po bcangs ni thong shig pa// ba
370a1(rnying rgyud): nyis lhag badz+ra dag kyang // g.yas pa cas la stong bar ba// gdon pa 'ad chags rnam pa'i bar// dus myong / nga ba dag byung// gtsun dung brda 'du bu yin// ngan bcing ba son par bshad// g.yas pa
370a2(rnying rgyud): tu dgrol ba yin// rkang pas gnon pa'i brda dag kyang // g.yon byas thams cad gnon par byed// g.yas pas 'joms par byed pa yin// mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i brda tshul gyis// kho bo'i brda du bshad pa yin// dbang po gyen du bsgreng ba ni//
370a3(rnying rgyud): mdza' bar 'dod pa'i brda// chung dri rtse mo bsgreng ba ni// de tshe sbyor bar 'dod pa'i badz+ra// blon po mngon par ston pa na// bkres zhes bya ba'i brda yin no// gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pa'i byang// khro mi lcags kya drang
370a4(rnying rgyud): byas na// de tshur sh+log brda ldan no// de nyid zlog pa khyed cig pa'o// lug gnyis gar thabs banar nas byung // se go lA drag rdobs 'dren po'i badz+re// bskod nas sbyang ba phyug rgya'i brda// basbyor nas thal mo spyi bor gzhag/ 'di ni mchod
370a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i brda yin no// bskor na sa snying gar gzhag pa ni// bsam gtan rtse gcig brda yin no// bskor nas gnyis kyis ston pa ni// mchod pa stobs pa'i brda yin no// dbang mA~M lce la reg pa ni// tshogs mchod dus la babri pa'i brda'o// gar
370a6(rnying rgyud): thabs bskor nas dbang mor 'thor// de nas lce la reg pa ni// 'dza' gad brim pa'i brda yin no// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// ngag brda dam che ga phyag rgya yang // a ti buM zhes bya ba ni// phyag 'tshal zhes pa'i brda yin no// pra ti pu zhes bya
370a7(rnying rgyud): pa ni// phyag lan 'tshal ba'i brda yin no// ri mo zhes bya gzugs kyi brda// glu ni sgra yi brda ru bshad// tshim byed dri yi brda yin no// ra sa a na ro yi brda// bde ba zhes bya reg pa yin// dga' ba zhes pa rab tu rig/ sbyor ba zhes pa chos su
370b1(rnying rgyud): bshad// ma tog zhes bya khrag yin nano// bdug pa zhes pa ma ngas ba // ma / zhes pa sha rkyen la'o// dang banas pang du bshad// sras gas ngas ldan dag 'ang // 'dong chags sa par 'dzad+ha// khwan g.yon can byung 'dun// blan na
370b2(rnying rgyud): tshod ma'i brda yin no// chung bzhol zla rgyas te// sman gyi mchog ni sha yi brda// zla na ni tshe zhes bya ba'i brda// um mi zhes bya ba'i brda// rgyun 'brum zhes pAd+ha yi badz+ra// glang po pa na se zhes bya// nA li ki ri khyi le brda// oM drag ni b.lang ngo /
370b3(rnying rgyud): da sa na pa'i da/ ga sa nga gyur/
370b4(rnying rgyud): nyipa ba' pa'o// ta phyub sheg pa// rim mnga'i pa sa ni/ rkyen ci gyi / tA ti migs so/ ga na zhig spyo/ da 'du gas sa/
370b5(rnying rgyud): de la sogs nye bsam yas mchog/ zhes gsungs so// de nas yang smra ba'i steng ge'i byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ e ma'o gsang chen bde ba che// mi 'gyur nam mkha' dngos po med// lhan grub bde chen rnam par dag/ ngag mchog
370b6(rnying rgyud): lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang bu zhes bgyi rnam pa du// sbas pa zhes bgyi rnam pa du// thig le zhes bgyi ji ltar gnas// mnyam nyid zhes pa rnam pa ru// dag paM zhes pa rnam pa du// rtogs pa rnam pa du ru bzhed// mtshan nyid gsum
370b7(rnying rgyud): zhes ji lta bu// ting 'dzin gsum po ji ltar lags// bdag cag rnams la smin slad du// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos thugs su chud de bka' stsal pa/ gsang
371a1(rnying rgyud): bshes pa rnam pa da// rang bzhin dan thogagang ba dang // gab pa zas par gsung ba dang // gartan mang du stsogs pa dang / da ma bukar po gsang ba dang / chab tod dang thun gas byung // dran du/
371a2(rnying rgyud): klong nas bsrungs pa dang // dman la mi bstan rdzas rnams dang // gsang sngags theg chen zab mo don// rab tu shes pa dka' ba'i phyir// bstan par yang ni mi bya bsdu// gsang ba zhes su rgyal bas gsungs// de nyid sbas pas smras
371a3(rnying rgyud): pA'i don// smras pa rnam pa gsum yin te// yi sbas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin nang gi smras pa dang // gnyis kar ma des smras pa ste// rlung 'thung sngags kyi stod pa ste// dzA ro ga sde pas mdzod thos na// de la bzod pa zlo
371a4(rnying rgyud): smin pas// de ni sbas pa phye zhes bya// lhan grub bod chen zab mo de// ming gi rnal 'byor phal dag gis// rtogs shing khong du chud par dka'o// de ni nang gi sbas pa yin// gyi nang gnyis su tha dad min// bden pa gnyis su dbyed
371a5(rnying rgyud): med pa// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod sbrul de// ma dri sa skyes par rgyal bas gsungs// smras pa'i don rnams gsal 'byin pa// bla ma rno thugs la gnas// des na smras ni sangs par gsung sa// thab sa dang shes rab na
371a6(rnying rgyud): tis su med pa'i byung hU~M sanaste/ ti thig 'i rnam gsusaste// babs mchog sa ba kyi mkha' nyid dang // she rngub bram kyi nang nyid dang // gnyis med 'di min dang nyid du/ chos ldan 'das shing nicig par
371a7(rnying rgyud): tsu 'a brin pa byed gzug pa sa du bya ba / rgya ma ma su sukya bye gakyi po
371b1(rnying rgyud): sa sug ngas su slong lu // sa na//
371b2(rnying rgyud): na
371b3(rnying rgyud): nga
371b4(rnying rgyud): lun
372a1(rnying rgyud): saldan/ // sa // sa sa da gas// bang sa na na/
372a2(rnying rgyud): myong bar bad dag gi gis gsang // phan gags sbyin pa ga sadun nyid kyis / sa ga / 'du 'i tshan nyid ces // yongs su grub la byings btsas na/
